assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.quest-sergey-npc_comment.ev: It seems like they still have not given those average quest NPCs more nuanced responses.
Well, that is good news for us.
Otherwise doing sidequests might be problematic with your limited means of communication.
Yes, I am sorry.\. I will continue working on it now.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.call-instance-comments.even: Aw, an instance? I wanted to do the quest together with you...
Mon dieu, another instance. Will they let us do any quests together or what?
Ah, this quest also uses instances? Well, see you on the other side, Lea.
With all those instanced questrooms this moon must be almost entirely hollow.
Spheromancer Lea! Where did you teleport to and why can't I follow?! Is this a cheat?!
Another challenge forces these noble Spheromancers to act independently.
Mh, I am all alone here. I guess they want us to solve this quest on our own.
More instances? Makes you wonder why they split you up so much in an MMO.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.call-arid-switch-search.eve: Huh... I guess we have to reach those glowing spots, right?
More glowing spots... all over the place.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-frobbit.event.1.mess: Bunnies. We're currently fighting cute little bunnies.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-hedgehag.event.1.mes: Let's see how those \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s will fare!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-snowman.event.0.mess: A snowman? W-Why would it attack us?!
NOOOO!! NOT THE BUGS! WHY WOULD YOU FIGHT THE BUGS, LEA?!
WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS TO ME?!
WHAT IS THIS? ARE THEY WALKING?!
ARE THOSE SWORDS?! WHY DO THESE BUGS HAVE SWORDS?!
LEA PLEASE! MAKE THEM GO AWAY!!
LEA I HATE THOSE THINGS, PLEASE!
I THOUGHT I'D SEE THOSE THINGS IN THE JUNGLE. WHY ARE THEY HERE INSTEAD?
NOOO! STOP FIGHTING THE BUGS PLEASE! LEA!
THOSE THINGS ARE TOO CREEPY! AND FAST! AND JUMPY!
NOO! WHY WON'T YOU STOP FIGHTING THE BUGS?!
Damn it, Lea. I can only handle so many bugs per day.
Again with the bugs? Can't we fight something else?
Alright, I get it! You like fighting those bugs!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-samurai-bug.event.12: Actually... I think I'm truly starting to get used to those... things.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-overpowered-active.e: This enemy seems strong, better be careful!
You do like a challenge, don't you Lea?
We may want to level up a bit before taking this one on.
Mon dieu, it's strong and aggressive! I hate those!
Lea, maybe we should, you know... \c[3]run\c[0]?!
We didn't ask for this battle, or did we?
I guess someone needs a lesson here!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-blobs.event.0.messag: We're sharing blows with the \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/blob]\c[0]! Be aware of their team attacks!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-plant.event.0.messag: The fearsome \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/plant]\c[0] enters the battlefield! Careful, it can instantly switch locations!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-sloth.event.0.messag: The mighty \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/sloth]\c[0] approaches us! Slowly, but deadly!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-shokats.event.0.mess: The cunning \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/shockcat]\c[0] attacks! Careful, close contact quickly leads to a shocking demise!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-parrot.event.0.messa: The unlawful \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/parrot]\c[0] aims at us!\. Agile and heavily armed!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-fish.event.0.message: The atrocious \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/fish]\c[0] is preparing to attack, shooting and screaming at their victim!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-heat-samurai.event.0: The honorable \c[3]\v[combat.name.forest/bug-samurai-heat]\c[0] unsheathed its blade! Beware its flaming sweeps!
The honorable \c[3]\v[combat.name.forest/bug-samurai-shock]\c[0] unsheathed its blade! Beware its lightning fast reflexes!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-panda.event.0.messag: The monstrous \c[3]\v[combat.name.forest/panda]\c[0] goes in attack mode, preparing its missiles!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-spider.event.0.messa: The horrifying \c[3]\v[combat.name.forest/spider]\c[0] is crawling our way! Watch out for its sticking webs!
Would you be the type to run marathons in your spare time, Lea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-battle-over-S.event.0: Lea...\. that was both impressive and...\. frightening.
I'm kidding!\. I broke all the sweats!\. What the heck, Lea...
Spheromancer Lea...\. that was quite an impressive run.
Phew...\. we left quite the trail in the...\. Trail.
Yes, this amount of havoc was...\. justified.\. It's our duty as Seekers.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-battle-over-S.event.0: Please...\. take it easy, little girl.
Aren't games supposed to be...\. like...\. recreational?\. Was this recreational to you?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-S.event.0.0_0.0.0_: ...Lea?\. I think I need a break.
Do you ever plan to stop, Lea?
How about some live and let live, Lea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-S.event.0.1_0.0.0_: L-Lea...? There is no need to keep fighting, right?
Y-You don't plan to stop anytime soon, do you?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-S.event.0.2_0.0.0_: Spheromancer Lea, you are surprisingly bloodthirsty!
I see you're pushing your Spheromancer skills to the limit!
Spheromancer Lea, your stamina is quite impressive indeed!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-S.event.0.3_0.0.0_: I didn't expect to be playing with such a fierce little devil.
So much killing...\. Are you trying to make a case for violence in video games, Lea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-A.event.0.0_0.0.me: Mon dieu! You just keep going!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-A.event.0.1_0.0.me: Uhm... anyone up for a break?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-A.event.0.2_0.0.me: You seem to be in the flow of the Trail, Spheromancer Lea!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-B.event.0.1_0.0.me: You're pretty into fighting, aren't you?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-B.event.0.2_0.0.me: I see you're up for a challenge today!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.cooldown-B.event.0.3_0.0.me: Those were a lot of enemies at once.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-samurai-bug-end.even: ARE THEY GONE?! PLEASE TELL ME THEY'RE GONE.
IS IT OVER?! PLEASE LET IT BE OVER.
Are those things supposed to be... Samurai or something? THEY'RE STILL BUGS, THOUGH!
You won't stop fighting them anytime soon, will you?
What is this? Some kind of shock therapy?
Let's fight something else next, d'accord?
Did we fight enough bugs already?
Wow, I think I'm healed. It's all good, Lea. We can now stop fighting them!

Not sure if awesome 
or just creepy.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-hedgehog-end.event.0: And that was our first hedgehag. Simple enough!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-meerkats-end.event.0: Do you ever wonder what kind of music those things are listening to?
They do seem very much into it, non?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-meerkats-end.event.1: They were cute at first, now they're just annoying.
No, I won't accept this. Snowmen are great.
I love building snowmen. Peaceful snowmen.
Bunnies, hedgehogs and now snowmen of all things.
Everything tries to kill you. The Track of the Ancients is messed up.
Aaaand that was a flying seahorse shooting bubbles. D'accord.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-penguins-end.event.0: Oui. Penguins on mountains. That's a thing in CrossWorlds.
Well, at least they have some water around here.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-goats-end.event.0.th: They just defy gravity and climb wherever they please.
Well.. at least regular goats won't shoot horns at you.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-goats-end.event.1.th: We used to have a zoo with goats at my place, you know?
And they kept escaping their compound. Simply climbed over that fence. Pas de problème!
So you had goats all over the zoo, that was awesome!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-goats-end.event.2.th: So yeah, that zoo, right? The one where the goats escaped.
Of course they tried to change the fence so the goats couldn't escape.
Made it higher and more difficult to climb over.
Guess what? The goats still managed to escape using a small building next to the fence.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-frobbits-end.event.0: Oui, I take that back. Those bunnies are not cute.
Those bunnies are not cute. Non.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-frobbits-end.event.1: Those bunnies have quite the kick!
But it's nothing compared to the Pentafist's punch, am I right Lea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-frobbits-end.event.2: I think we can safely rename Bergen Trail to "Bunny Mountain", non?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-buffalos-end.event.0: Huh. Did we just beat up a cow wearing some kind of iron mask?
We used to have cows in the neighborhood when I was a child.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-buffalos-end.event.1: I kinda liked the cows in our neighborhood.\. They were cute.
Oui, these buffalos are rough in comparison, but still.\. Feeling sorta bad about this.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-buffalos-end.event.2: I used to see cows every day on my way to school.
After some time I think they even started recognizing me!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-buffalos-end.event.3: Did you ever drink fresh cow milk? It's délicieux!
I actually once milked a cow myself! Sorta weird feeling at the beginning.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-buffalos-end.event.4: Hey, you're not doing this to mess with me, oui?
Wait...\. Yes.\. What do you mean by that?
Oui, oui, they brought back the cows!
Still feeling bad for punching them.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-hedgehags2-end.event: The hedgehags have returned, sharper and edgier than ever!
We finally got birds in CrossWorlds. Très bien.
Other than those space birds, that is.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-blob-end.event.0.the: They are pretty fun to punch.\. Maybe a little bit nasty.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-shokat-end.event.0.t: This place really is filled with those purple kitties.
But damn, they sure are fast once you make them angry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-shokat-end.event.1.t: Those kitties are surprisingly hard to punch.
It's probably better to fight them from a distance, even if that isn't exactly my style.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-sloth-end.event.0.th: Those sloth are probably the most chill enemy of the game.
Until they do their spinning wheel attack of doom.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-parrot-end.event.0.t: Seriously, what is it with birds holding guns in this game?!
Is there a weapon manufacturer so desperate they started delivering the track?
Mon dieu.\. Quite a lot of spiders here, don't you agree?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-meerkat-end.event.0.t: Have you ever seen one of these Hillkats digging...\. over a \c[3]laser bridge\c[0]?\. Yes, they do that.
This whole digging is really just simulated. They don't want to mess up the structure of the ground too much, obviously.
Still, I wish they would have made them stop in front of the laser bridges.\. It does break the illusion.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-seahorses-end.event.0: Those seahorses... why would they do this?
Taking a perfectly fine marine creature and...\. crossing it with a fly?\. Or a mosquito?\. I don't know.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-seahorses-end.event.1: What are these seahorses shooting exactly anyway?\. Water bubbles?
Where do they get all the excess water from?\. You never see them in the water.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-seahorses-end.event.2: I'm sorry, I have to talk about the seahorses again.\. Did you notice they sound like actual horses?
Seahorses are not related to horses.\. I repeat.\. Not related.\. They just look similar, but that's it.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-snowman-end.event.0.t: Hm...Snowman... reminds me of ice cream~
You... like ice cream a lot, don't you?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-snowman-end.event.1.t: Don't even think about licking those Snowmen, Tronny!
W-What? No! I'm sure they won't even taste like anything.
...\. ...\. That's a good point. Now I'm curious.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-penguin-end.event.0.t: Did you know? Penguins like to live in temperate areas too.
In fact, only few of them live in colder climates.
And none of them lives on mountains, right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-scorpions-end.event.0: Of course we can't have a desert without scorpions...
At least I think these are scorpions.. with 4 legs instead of 8.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-scorpions-end.event.1: They say smaller scorpions are more dangerous... Doesn't quite apply to those.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-scorpions-end.event.2: Scorpions are actually pretty amazing.\. They can survive up to one year with just one meal.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-sandshark-end.event.0: Are those shark skeletons? That's funny.
Sharks don't even have proper bones. It's all cartilage.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-sandshark-end.event.1: These sharksters can be tricky to hit. Good thing I have homing VRPs!
Vulturbines, huh? Must be inspired by vultures.
Vultures with... guns? Makes you wonder how they can still fly.
There are a lot of interesting facts about vultures.
Though a lot of them involve bodily fluids. I'd rather not mention those.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-drillertoise-end.even: Drillertoise? I honestly have no idea what those are supposed to be.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-blob-end.event.0.then: Nope...\. I got nothing. No scientific facts about blobs from me.
Sure.\. I know you'd have loved to share another disgusting fact about them.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-blob-end.event.1.then: Hm...\. some people argue that \c[3]algea\c[0] is the "slime" of real life, but it's still a stretch.
They certainly lack the bounciness of the blobs.
Oui.\. Please no science facts about algae, merci.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-shokats-end.event.0.t: Shokats...\. they are surprisingly active for cats, that's for sure.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-shokats-end.event.1.t: Did you know that on average cats spend 2/3 of the day sleeping?
You certainly don't ever see a shokat sleeping.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-shokats-end.event.2.t: You know...\. cats have been domesticated a long time ago, just like dogs.
Though in contrast to dogs they didn't really go through any major change during domestication.
That's because they've never been domesticated.\. They just chose to live with us humans.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-plants-end.event.0.th: Hm...\. I suppose those plants are loosely inspired by the Venus Flytrap?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-plants-end.event.1.th: People tend to make big deal out of the Venus Flytrap.
But did you know it can only bite about a half-dozen times in its lifespan?\. After that the trap is kept shut forever.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-plants-end.event.2.th: Venus Flytraps mostly eat insects, you know?\. They can't just eat any kind of meat.
Somebody actually tried to feed a hamburger to a flytrap.\. The poor thing quickly withered.
Well those plants here certainly have a taste for human flesh.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-sloth-end.event.0.the: Huh...\. sloth enemies.\. I think those are actually inspired by the prehistoric variant...\. the Megatherium.
Also known as the giant ground sloth.\. They used to be the size of an elephant.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-sloth-end.event.1.the: This Behesloth can be surprisingly fast...\. Real sloth are known to be very slow animals.
They have a four-part stomach that can digest very tough leaves...\. very, very slowly.
Tronny is back with those science facts no one asked for...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-fish-end.event.0.then: Floating fishes, alright.\. Pretty much the first marine enemy in the game.
Unless you count those jellyfish enemies of the Faj'ro Temple.
No please...\. let's ignore the seahorses.\. They aren't...\. fish.\. They are nothing.\. They don't make sense.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-parrot-end.event.0.th: Parrots...\. they are among the most intelligent birds we know.
Yet all they could come up with is yet another dumb, gun-wielding foe.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-pandas-end.event.0.th: Pandas...\. Pandas are interesting.\. Originally carnivores, they essentially evolved into bamboo eating machines.
Really, everything about them is evolved to consume bamboo. A false-thumb, a good sense of smell, and an incredibly strong bite.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctron-pandas-end.event.1.th: Ironically, Pandas only absorb a small part of the bamboo's nutrition. That's why they have to eat all day long.
They barely have spare energy to struggle with fellow pandas...\. let alone firing homing missiles.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctr-emil-fish-end.event.0.t: You know, I've not once seen those fishes dive into the water.\. Suspicious.
Yeah...\. good luck fighting those thingies underwater.
That might even be possible...\. given the water is in fact simulated!
Oh no.\. Back to that theory.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctr-emil-generic.event.0.th: Tronny, you like to keep your distance in battle, don't you?
Well... I'm a Hexacast. I specialize in ranged attacks.
You should join me in punching the enemies up close! It's more fun!
Punching? We Hexacast don't punch. We use a close-proximity magical impact.
So what? I can call my fist magical too, if you like.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.ctr-emil-drillertoise-end.e: I don't like those earth turtles. They are hard to punch.
Very true. Also Emilie, those are tortoises. Turtles would mostly be in water.
Are you sure? They do dive into the earth like it's water, non?
Uhm...\. Emilie?\. I'm just wondering...\. it seems like you don't mind the spiders.
Oui?\. Why would I?\. They're just spiders.
But...\. haven't you been afraid of bugs?\. Like those samurai bugs drive you crazy.
Non non, Tronny.\. Spiders are fine, they aren't insects.\. You should know that...
I do...\. But still...\. I don't get it.
You guys think too much.\. Come on, let's punch more spiders!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-blobs-end.event.0.the: I was waiting for these kind of enemies to show up.
You can't have an RPG without good-old blobs.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-blobs-end.event.1.the: Green blobs hidden between the grass and plants. They blend in pretty well.
Not unlike a certain somebody I know...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-behesloth-end.event.0: Poor sloth. I don't see why they can't just relax for some time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-behesloth-end.event.1: Man, these sloths are surprisingly fast for their size when angered.
See this, Polly?\. This is what happens when you forget to water your plants.
They jump out of their pot, float on water bubbles, and bite you?
Exactly.\. Don't forget to water the plants.
I get it!\. I just forgot it like...\. that one time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joe-apo-shokats-end.event.0: Do we really have to fight the poor kittens?\. I feel so sorry for them.
Joern, don't be swayed by their cute appearance!\. They're fierce opponents!
But they just wanted to have them cuddles...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joe-apo-shokats-end.event.1: Hm...\. this reminds me.\. We still have to feed the cats later.
Feeding cats?\. What do you mean?\. You can't feed the shokats.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joe-apo-papagun-end.event.0: So we have parrots in the jungle.\. Neat.
Indeed!\. Gun-wielding parrots that are up to no good!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joe-apo-papagun-end.event.1: More Parrots.\. I think I will call them \c[3]Polly\c[0].
Polly is a common name for parrots. Don't you know, Polly?
Learn how to use \c[3]Melee Arts\c[0] in combat.
Press and hold \i[special] to charge the attack.

You can change your \c[3]direction\c[0] while charging.
Release \i[special] again to execute the attack.
Learn how to use \c[3]Throw Arts\c[0] in combat.
While aiming press and hold \i[special] to charge the attack.
You can change the direction while charging.
Release \i[special] again to execute the attack.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-dash-art.event.1.c: Learn how to use \c[3]Dash Arts\c[0] in combat.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-dash-art.event.1.a: \c[0]Dash\c[0] into a direction and press \i[special] at the \c[3]same time\c[0] to charge a Dash Art.
Release \i[special] again to execute the attack.
Learn how to use \c[3]Guard Arts\c[0] in combat.
While you guard, press and hold \i[special] to charge the Guard Art.
Release \i[special] again to execute the attack.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-quests.event.1.con: Learn how to view and track your \c[3]Quests\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-quests.event.1.acc: You can see all your quests within the \c[3]quest menu\c[0].
Focus a quest to see details on the left.
You can see more details by selecting a quest.
Press \i[help2] to \c[3]mark\c[0] a quest as favorite. You can mark any number of quests!
You can circle through the tasks of marked quests outside the menu by \c[3]pressing\c[0] \i[left-stick] and \i[right-stick].
You can circle through the tasks of marked quests outside the menu with \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-botanics.event.1.c:
Learn how to view and track your progress in the
\c[3]Botanics Menu\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-botanics.event.1.a: You can find the \c[3]Botanics Menu\c[0] within the \c[3]Records Menu\c[0].
See how many drops you need to complete the entry.
Once progress reaches 50% you can find a more detailed location here.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.tutorial-elite.event.1.acce: \c[3]Elite Quests\c[0] are difficult quests marked with an \c[3]exclamation mark and red outlines\c[0].
Even on the same levels, these quest can be \c[3]very challenging\c[0]. However, they often offer \c[3]better loot as reward\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-dies.event.0.1_1.0.m: Mon Dieu! What is going on?!
I'm back to kick some derrière!
I see there are still enemies left for me!
...Pardon. That was just too much for me to handle.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-equip-update.event.0: Excellent! Got new gear to punch enemies even harder!
Lea, look at the new stuff I just bought!
Getting closer to the ultimate punching machine, one step at a time!
I got new gear! Too bad your appearance doesn't change, non?
Dang-it! That attack came out of nowhere!
...You know that water can have 3 states. And this is the only deadly one.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-revived.event.0.0_1: I'm back! I see you're still going strong... right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-revived.event.0.1_0: Looks like I wasn't quite up to the challenge, sorry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-revived.event.0.1_1: Gosh... That didn't go too well... sorry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-equip.event.0.0_0.0: I got some new gear. Yes, mages have gear, too.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-equip.event.0.0_1.0: I got my gear up-to-date now. It was about time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-equip.event.0.0_2.0: I got some really cool gear this time!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-equip.event.0.0_3.0: Got new gear. Though I wonder how those edges and triggers are supposed to improve my magic...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-dies.event.0.0_0.0.m: I'm out!\. Keep fighting for justice in my place!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-dies.event.0.0_1.0.m: I suffered defeat!\. Keep fighting!\. For the honor of Spheromancers!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-dies.event.0.0_2.0.m: I'm out, but don't give up!\. One Spheromancer can handle any challenge!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-dies.event.0.1_0.0.m: This wasn't right!\. Why was I defeated?!\. This smells like cheating!!
A Spheromancer returns to the battlefield, all foes beware!
Justice still needs to be served!
In the name of Justice, I have returned!!
I see you handled this conflict without my help.\. Well done, Spheromancer Lea.
Your fellow Spheromancer returned! Alas, a bit too late!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-equip.event.0.messag: I just updated my gear, you should do so as well, Spheromancer Lea!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-dies.event.0.0_1.0.me: Aaand I'm dead.\. Sorry, your tank has fallen.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-revived.event.0.1_0.0: Your tank returns.\. Aaand it's already over.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-revived.event.0.1_1.0: It looks like you handled things without me just fine.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.1.thenS: Lea? Where did you go? Did you just teleport into a dungeon or something?
Lea? This is strange. You just teleported away but we couldn't follow you. Where are you?
Spheromancer Lea! Where did you teleport to and why can't I follow?! Is this a cheat?!
This is strange...\. It seems I can't follow you to your new location.\. Where are you, Lea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.3.thenS: Hm... I think we have to enter the dungeon somewhere else to continue.
Lea, Lea. Taking your time to revisit previous dungeon rooms while the race is on hold, non?
And back to the race! Gee, where did I leave off again?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.4.0_0.0: Dungeon time, it is! See you again, soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.4.1_0.0: Back in the dungeon? See you later!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.4.2_0.0: Right! Dungeon crawling is an important part of becoming a true Spheromancer! Good luck!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-enter.event.4.3_0.0: Dungeon time. So we're split up, I suppose?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.0.thenS: Huh...\. back again.\. What was up with that, Lea?
Ah... there you are.\. I was almost afraid we lost you.
Spheromancer Lea!\. This was most suspicious!\. Explain yourself!!
Ah.\. There you are again.\. Was this some kind of bug?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.1.thenS: So you need a break from that gloomy mine? Alright.
But let's hurry. We still have to finish the race!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.2.thenS: Wait... If anybody needs a break, everybody leaves the dungeon?
That is... a very lax kind of race, isn't it?
Sure, it's not like I was right in the middle of that one puzzle...
No problem. I can simply redo that one battle I just had to cancel.
And all the immersion is gone.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.3.0_0.0: Ahh, finally outside! It's just way too gloomy in those dungeons.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.3.2_0.0: I see you left the dungeon! Did you manage to further hone your Spheromancer abilities?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.all-dng-leave.event.3.3_0.0: Welcome back. It's more fun to run around together.
Let's better not contact anyone from here to reduce suspicion.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.join-blocked-area.event.0.t: You should not invite any party members now.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.join-blocked-finale.event.0: You should not invite any party members now.
You should not remove any party members now. That would be even more suspicious.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.0.then: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.5.then: Uhm, hey Lea. Why the DL? I'm in your party, non?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.6.then: I wish you the best of luck with the tower dungeon! Though I'm confident you'll be fine!
Show that Mr. Fancypants what you're made of!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.7.then: No time for talking right now, chérie!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.8.then: I'm ready, Lea! Let's go to that \c[3]Dojo\c[0] and show that Sidwell guy he's messing with the wrong players!!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.9.then: Did you already hear the news from Tronny?
It really is a shame that he won't have time for CrossWorlds.
We should all play the game together while he's still here.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.10.the: Mon dieu, \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0] is quite the city, isn't it?
I love the fact that you can jump on those cars to cross the streets.
Totally should try that in real life some time...
Hahaha! I'm just joking, chérie! I'd never do that!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.12.the: Why...\. Why did they have to bring back the bugs?
I really enjoyed my time in Gaia's Garden, but this new Saphire area is the worst.
Please don't let me go through all of this alone, chérie...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.13.the: It really is a shame, that things didn't work out for the raid.
There will be many more opportunities.
For now let's focus on Exploring \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]!
Do you mind doing it together? I'm free!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.14.the: Tronny told you already, non?\. We plan to meet at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.15.the: Not now, chérie. I really need to focus here.
I can't let Grasshead win this one, oui!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.16.the: Bonjour! Making good progress here on my side!
I feel like this shock-themed dungeon is right up my alley!
Though I have to admit that some of those Wave-ball puzzles make my head hurt.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.17.the: Such an interesting place, isn't it?
I've always heard horrible stories about water dungeons in games, but this one isn't really.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.18.the: I'm sooo ready for our next dungeon race!
Gaia's Garden is pretty neat in general, isn't it?
So colorful and... entirely bug free!
Guess I really had the wrong idea about this place.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.19.the: I'm waiting for you at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]. Please hurry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.20.the: Bonjour Lea! Tronny and me are still waiting at the \c[3]statue\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall - Ancient Center\c[0]! Let's meet there!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.21.the: Lea, just meet me and Tronny at \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0]! We'll be waiting next to the \c[3]fountain\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.22.the: Did you explore all of Autumn's Fall, yet?
It's very much like Autumn's Rise, just ruins everywhere.
Oh, and the cows are back! Yay for cows!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.23.the: I didn't expect there to be so much water in here.
You know... for being right within a desert.
Anyway, I will not fall back! Let's go!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.24.the: Maroon Valley is pretty massive, isn't it?
I'm not exactly a huge fan. A desert isn't exactly the most interesting location, non?
Though the oasis is pretty nice, I suppose.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.25.the: Hey Lea! We should go back to the \c[3]First Scholars\c[0] and do that quiz already, non?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.26.the: Sorry, I'm really tense right now.
There could be more of those horrible bugs around every corner, you know?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.27.the: What is it Lea? Already tired from dungeon crawling?
Good! I sure hope you won't drop out of our race!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.28.the: Just now, I saw a group of \c[3]penguins\c[0]!
I'm preeeetty sure that penguins are usually not around mountains.
Aaaanyway, just tell me when you want to start a party!
And don't forget, no entering the next dungeon without me, d'accord?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-contact.event.29.the: Bonjour! I'm currently in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] enjoying the landscape.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.0.thenSte: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.5.thenSte: Lea, we're waiting right at the \c[3]Cross Central\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.6.thenSte: Tronny told you already, non?\. We plan to meet at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.7.thenSte: I'm waiting for you at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]. Please hurry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.8.thenSte: Hm? It's getting a bit late Lea. I actually think I'll log off soon.
So no more party today, pardon.
Let's just chill a bit longer here on top of Faj'ro Temple.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.9.thenSte: Bonjour Lea! Tronny and me are still waiting at the \c[3]statue\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall - Ancient Center\c[0]! Let's meet there!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.10.thenSt: Lea, just meet me and Tronny at \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0]! We'll be waiting next to the \c[3]fountain\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-join.event.11.thenSt: Hey Lea! I'll just focus on finishing that quest myself, oui? See you later!
Yes! Party time! Une seconde, I'll be right there!
I see you're looking for a formidable punching force. I'm ready!
It's time for chakrams and fists to roll over the field!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-remove.event.4.thenS: So you want to do the Autumn's Fall Quest by yourself after all? D'accord!
Just make sure to tell me once you collected the Shade!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-remove.event.5.0_1.0: That was fun! Any time again!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.emilie-remove.event.5.0_2.0: Awww, already? Well...\. see you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.4.the: Hi, Lea! It's nice running around with you in CrossWorlds!
Though... I think it's ok if we just talk normally, right? No need to use a Direct Link.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.5.the: I'm still around and ready if you'd like to start the party. For now at least.
Really, I think I'm gonna miss CrossWorlds and strolling around with you... but there is hardly anything I can do about it.
It's a private matter. I told you, right? Sorry, I prefer to keep my real and virtual life separated.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.6.the: Gosh... Rhombus Square is massive! And so much going on. Traffic and people everywhere.
To honest... It's almost too much noise for my taste. I was never a huge fan of bustling cities.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.7.the: Hello Lea! We're waiting in \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0] right in front of the entrance to \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.8.the: It's a shame that you don't want to participate in the raid. I was kind of looking forward to it....
I mean... I understand that the last raid wasn't exactly the best experience for you...
But that probably was just an odd coincidence that's unlikely to happen again...
Well, I suppose I can't change your mind.
It's fine! We can still explore Sapphire Ridge together, if you like!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.9.the: Hey Lea! We're waiting at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] for you! Are you on your way?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.10.th: Still with the D-Link during the dungeon races...
Shouldn't we all just focus on getting through those puzzles quickly?
What are you doing? Is this all a ploy to distract me?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.11.th: Hello, Lea! Did you have time to explore Gaia's Garden some more?
There certainly is a lot to explore....
By the way...\. did you notice how it just rains in certain locations?
For instance it constantly rains in Basin Keep and in the western part of the jungle.
Yet not a single drop in the southeastern part.
I'm telling you, something is wrong with the water in this game!
It's all simulated, it has to be!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.12.th: Hey Lea! Let's meet at the \c[3]Peridot Approach landmark\c[0]. The one in the north of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. See you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.13.th: Hello Lea! We are waiting for you at the \c[3]statue\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall - Ancient Center\c[0]! See you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.14.th: Hello Lea! Emilie and I are waiting for you at \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0], right next to the \c[3]fountain\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.15.th: Hello Lea! Having fun exploring Autumn's Fall?
Apparently all these ruins are remains from the old civilization of the Ancients.
And they conveniently deteriorated to perfectly shape all these neat little jumping puzzles. Lovely, isn't it?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.16.th: Hello Lea...\. don't you think that it's sort of weird to do D-Links during a dungeon race?
Well... I'm busy over here... I have to get past this room and it's quite tricky so... Talk to you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.17.th: Hello Lea!\. Hope things are going well for you!
Maroon Valley really is a fascinating place, isn't it?
All these cliff structures and dunes...
Almost makes me forget about the bizarre fauna... if you can even call it like that.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.18.th: Hello Lea!\. I'm waiting at the \c[3]West Entrance\c[0] Landmark. Just outside of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.22.me: ... Well... Not much to talk about so far, right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-contact.event.24.me: Small talk has never been my forte.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.4.thenSt: Hello Lea! We're waiting in the \c[3]Cross Central\c[0] right in front of the entrance to \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.5.thenSt: Hey Lea! We're waiting at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] for you!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.6.thenSt: Uhm... it's getting rather late isn't it?
I'm also a bit tired right after beating Faj'ro Temple. Let's call it day, okay?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.7.thenSt: Hey Lea! Let's meet at the \c[3]Peridot Approach landmark\c[0]. The one in the north of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. See you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.8.thenSt: Hello Lea! We are waiting for you at the \c[3]statue\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall - Ancient Center\c[0]! See you soon!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.9.thenSt: Hello Lea! Emilie and me are waiting for you at \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0], right next to the \c[3]fountain\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.10.0_0.0: Are you in need of a mage? I'll be right there!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.10.0_1.0: Sure I'd gladly join if that bit of magic of mine is enough for you.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-join.event.10.0_2.0: Sure, it's always nice chillin' in CrossWorlds together, right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.glasses-remove.event.4.then: Oh, so you want to do the Quest yourself after all? That's fair.
Please don't forget about the Raid though. Let us know when you collected the Shade!
I had a great time! See you soon!
Thanks for party! Glad to join you again!
I'm just glad I didn't bust up the wrong thing today. Until next time!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.4.then: Why would you use a D-Link when we're in a party, standing right next to each other?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.5.then: Spheromancer Lea! It is now up to you to serve justice in that tower!
I know you can do it! Make a fellow Spheromancer proud!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.6.then: No time for chit-chat now, Spheromancer Lea!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.7.then: Spheromancer Lea! Let's make haste and enter Vermillion Wasteland as soon as possible! There is justice that needs serving!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.8.then: Spheromancer Lea! Do you enjoy exploring \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0]?
I recommend checking out the \c[3]Area Booster Store\c[0].
It's the key to further expand your Spheromancer potential!
Now as for our next duel...
What? Yes, actually that is what I just wanted to say.
I still need some time myself to prepare for our next duel.
I will let you know when I'm ready.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.9.then: Spheromancer Lea! We're waiting for you inside of \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0]! Make haste!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.10.the: Spheromancer Lea! Sapphire Ridge is quite the mysterious place, isn't it?
Covered by an eternal shadow, filled with mazes of bamboo.
Just barely touched by human civilization as well.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.11.the: Spheromancer Lea! Joern and I are planning to explore \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]! Let us know if you want to join us!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.12.the: Spheromancer Lea, we are in the middle of a race! This is not time for chit-chat!
Because our full attention should be on overcoming the trials of the Grand Krys'kajo!
Alright, enough. You're wasting my time!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.13.the: Spheromancer Lea! I have to say this concept of "dungeon races" is interesting, indeed.
You don't meet a lot of players with this competitive spirit!
Why yes, I'd consider myself a competitive player as well!
I am already looking forward to our next duel!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.14.the: Spheromancer Lea! I assume you are still exploring the realms of Gaia's Garden.
Did you already tackle the dungeons in the north?
Very good! Fulfilling your Seeker duties, mastering the challenges of the Ancients!
Joern and I are doing the same at this very moment!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-contact.event.15.the: Spheromancer Lea! You're running through very obscure places right now!
We should focus on resolving the conflict between humans and Shad, don't you agree?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-join.event.4.thenSte: Spheromancer Lea! We're waiting for you inside the \c[3]Cross Central\c[0]! Make haste!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-join.event.5.thenSte: Spheromancer Lea! I am currently exploring the dungeons of Gaia's Garden together with Joern! I'm afraid I can't join your party today.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-join.event.6.0_0.0.m: It is time for Spheromancers to once again join forces!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-join.event.6.0_1.0.m: Spheromancer Lea! Of course we can travel the wide lands of Shadoon together!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-join.event.6.0_2.0.m: Two Spheromancers teaming up are always a sight to behold!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-remove.event.4.0_0.0: If you are ever in need of a fellow Spheromancer, you know who to call!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-remove.event.4.0_1.0: And with this, the two Spheromancers part ways! Will they meet again on their journey? Only the future can tell!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.apollo-remove.event.4.0_2.0: This was a good round! You've become quite the capable Spheromancer, indeed!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.4.thenS: Hey Lea. No need to call me when I'm right next to you, right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.5.thenS: That tower seems very tall. Be careful in there, Lea.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.6.thenS: Not the right time to chat, Lea.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.7.thenS: So I can still my shopping afterwards.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.8.thenS: Rhombus Square is nice. Almost like a proper city.
So many shopping opportunities. It's a shame it's all for virtual in-game content.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.9.thenS: We're currently at \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0] waiting for you. I'm looking forward to seeing the city.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.10.then: Are you strolling through Sapphire Ridge right now?
I appreciate the oriental flair, but the bugs are sort of annoying.
I also tend to lose Polly when he's running into the bamboo. His hair really blends in too well.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.11.then: Hey Lea. Polly and I plan to explore Sapphire Ridge today. Care to join us?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.12.then: Hey Lea. Polly and I are currently running the dungeons in the north of the Jungle.
Polly is way too quick and expects me to keep up with him.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-contact.event.13.then: What's up, Lea? We should finish that quest in the jungle, don't you agree?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-join.event.4.thenStep: We're currently at \c[3]Cross Central\c[0] waiting for you. I'm looking forward to seeing the city.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-join.event.5.thenStep: Hey Lea. Polly and I are currently running the Jungle temples. We're both busy right now, sorry.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-join.event.6.0_0.0.me: Sure, I can join your party. Just a moment.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-join.event.6.0_1.0.me: Sure! It's a nice change of pace playing with you compared to Polly.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.joern-join.event.6.0_2.0.me: I suppose having a tank in the party is quite useful. I'll be right there.
That was fun. Call me when you want to play again.
Sure let's call it a day. See you around.
That was nice. Until next time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.0.t: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.1.t: Still feels too awkward contacting him now...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.6.t: That is quite an impressive tower.
Makes you wonder what Instatainment originally planned to do with that construction...
Anyway! For you it's just about taking on that blue avatar's challenge, right?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.7.t: Lea, why are you contacting me now out of all times?
Come on, let's focus on saving those Evotars!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.8.t: Hey...\. I just came back from changing all my credentials...
It's a good thing we have tools prepared for situations like this...
Oh...\. just work related stuff, don't worry.
More importantly, let's put an end to this mischievous memory-stealing business!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-contact.event.9.t: Hallihallo! Don't forget about the raid! We're waiting for you at \c[3]Para Island\c[0].
Hello Lea! You've been gone for some time, haven't you?
Anyway, Tronny and Emilie have been looking for you.
I see! So you should know about the raid.
Well then, make sure to quickly collect that \c[3]\v[item.376.name]\c[0]!
Also it would be worthwhile to upgrade your equipment before the raid.
You should check the \c[3]new offers\c[0] in Rookie Harbor.
If you have the time, you can go for the trading equipment, but just buying the Silver equipment from the store works, too.
Oh, then you definitely should meet up with them!
I don't want to spoil the surprise.
Hallihallo!\. So I heard you entered Maroon Valley?
I see. Enemies in that area can be a bit if a pain, if I remember correctly.
Most of them should have a weak point that makes it easy to defeat them, though.
And when it's still too hard, just remember to \c[3]upgrade your equipment\c[0].
That's all the advice I have for now. Good luck out there!
Hi there, Lea! Already in the dungeon?
Good luck, then! Hope you won't be overrun by all the machinery!
I'm sure you'll handle it fine!
Hallihallo! Trying out contacts via DL?
Japp. Modern communication as you'd expect it.
Voice with hologram representations - the full package.
It's weird if you think about it. A hologram of your avatar.
So the player is hidden behind the avatar as well as the hologram. Pretty indirect, hm?
Wanna stroll around with a good-old Triblader? Sure thing.
I suppose we're with matching level now, so why not.
Not sure I'll be as good a party member as my Evotar copy, but I'll try.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.schneider-remove.event.4.0_: It seem like this Schneider has cut enough things for the day.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-contact.event.4.the: It looks like the plan was a success so far...\. kinda?
Now you just have to take on Gautham's challenge.
Let's just hope he doesn't go entirely overboard with this. He tends to do that.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-contact.event.5.the: Hey there Lea, preparing for the final attack on Evotarground?
Enemies over there can go up to \c[3]level 60\c[0].
But don't worry too much about reaching that level.
Just make sure you get the \c[3]good equipment\c[0] from \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0]. That will do.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-contact.event.10.me: Well... looks like we're both at a loss for words.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-contact.event.11.me: I suppose...\. I should thank you for bringing Sergey to us.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-contact.event.12.me: Let's hope we can find a way out of this situation.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-join.event.4.messag: Thanks for the offer, but I don't think I can be of much help.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.shizuka-join.event.5.messag: I can't even enter most of the playground, you see?
Yeah, I think I played enough for today...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.0.thenSt: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.1.thenSt: Still feels too awkward contacting her now...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.6.thenSt: Lea dear, I hope you'll be fine in that tower.
It looks so intimidating from down here.
Now I really wonder about the background story for this tower and area in general.
To be honest though, I can hardly see how it would fit into the current lore at all.
Maybe that was part of reason why it was dropped?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.7.thenSt: Now is not the right time for D-Links, dear!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.8.thenSt: Lea, dear! We're waiting in Sapphire Ridge.
I can't wait to see what this undisclosed area looks like!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.9.thenSt: Lea, dear! So I heard you finally reached Rhombus Square?
Oh... are you surprised that the main story of the game ended so abruptly?
Yes, yes... A lot of players were very disappointed about it. There was quite an uproar.
But here's the way I see it: the developers have been working hard so far to bring us a great experience.
And of course, they're still working on it to make it better and complete.
We just have to be patient and will be rewarded eventually.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.10.thenS: Lea, dear! Did you already arrive in Sapphire Ridge?
It's such a striking place. All moody and mysterious, eh?
Oh and the main quest of the area is something special!\. It has so many implications on the lore.
I just hope Emilie will be fine, considering the enemies of that area...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.11.thenS: Lea, dear! We're currently having a little meeting in the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]! Come over and join us!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.12.thenS: Lea, dear! It's great to have you back!
So... how much did you already explore in Gaia's Garden? Did you already complete the quest with the mayor and the shad village?
It really is a story as old as time. A conflict between different cultures, all of it connected to the Track of the Ancients.
Oh and I especially loved the last dungeon of the area.
I'm sure you'll like it too, Lea!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.13.thenS: Good morning, dear! The raid is about to start! We're waiting for you at \c[3]Para Island\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.14.thenS: Lea, dear! It's nice to see you online again.
Did you already arrive in Autumn's Fall? I remember that Emilie and Tronny finished the quest of the area recently.
It's such a fascinating place, eh? Ruins from old constructions of the Ancients everywhere.
You really get the feeling that there is a deep history to this place, when you walk through it.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.15.thenS: Good morning! You are online again, I see.
When you logged in, you probably ended up in the empty headquarters, eh?
Everybody is busy with other things right now, it seems.
But you can still contact everybody with \c[3]Direct Links\c[0] if you have any questions or need help.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.16.thenS: Lea, dear, is this really the time for a DL?
I'm waiting with the others in the seminar room.
Let's redo the quiz once you refreshed your knowledge about \c[3]Di'aro\c[0]!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.17.thenS: Lea, dear! How is it going with the dungeon?
It has been some time now. Then again, the Temple Mine is quite long.
Hm? What is it? Wait...\. did you beat the boss already?
Oh! Wonderful! Then make sure to read all the information you get at the heritage site.
And come back to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] afterwards.
I'm waiting with a nice \c[3]quiz\c[0] for you!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.18.thenS: Hello, Lea! How is it going? Already exploring the dungeon?
Dear, just remember it's a game.
And with patience I'm sure you'll be able to get through it!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.20.messa: Lea, dear! We just shared contacts and I already get a message, how sweet!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.21.messa: I'm really looking forward to your quiz!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.22.messa: I'll prepare the best questions for you two!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.hlin-contact.event.24.messa: Don't worry, dear! I'll keep it simple.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.0.then: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.1.then: Still feels too awkward contacting him now...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.6.then: Good day, Lea. Is something the matter?
Are you by chance wondering about my \c[3]favorite meal\c[0]?
Of course you're not. Right now it's time to take on the challenge in the tower.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.7.then: Now is not a good time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.8.then: Good day, Lea. I still can't believe we are about to run through unofficial playground territory.
This is going to be interesting.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.9.then: It's good to know that Ivan seems to be convinced of Evotars.
Let's hope that things will work out in the future.
I hope that your meeting with Ivan will have a positive impact on the future.
Even though things didn't seem to have worked out that well.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.10.the: Good day, Lea. I'm waiting for you in \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0]. Better be quick, Ivan doesn't have a lot of free time.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.11.the: So you saw me together with \c[3]Ivan\c[0] in Rhombus Square, hm?
Please promise me not to tell the meeting spot to the others, especially Buggy.
Oh...\. right.\. You can't tell them in the first place.\. I forgot.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.12.the: Good day, Lea. Sorry but I am currently busy.
I am meeting an old friend in Rhombus Square.
We can chat later, if you like.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.13.the: Good day, Lea. Is something the matter?
Are you by chance wondering about my \c[3]class\c[0] choice?
I designed my appearance intentionally to break the stereotype.
That's why I look like a seasoned warrior rather than a traditional mage.
The downside is that a lot of players mistake my class, but that is fine by me.
I appreciate that this game gives you so many liberties in adapting your appearance.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.14.the: Good day, Lea. Is something the matter?
Are you by chance wondering about my \c[3]temparature sense\c[0] settings?
I feel this is the best way to experience the game.
You really feel the freezing cold of Bergen and the heat of Maroon Valley. It's the most immersive experience.
Plus, they put a lot of effort in developing the sense synchronization. I'd feel bad just disabling it.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.15.the: Good day. Is something the matter?
So why would you contact me?
Are you by chance wondering about my \c[3]nickname\c[0]?
You may have noticed nobody calls me that.
I understand they find the name cheesy.
I mean it's the name of an old legendary hero.
But it seems it's rather overused. What a shame.
I probably should have gone with something simple like your name.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.17.mes: Good day. Is something the matter?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.grumpy-contact.event.20.mes: It's rather strange to contact someone just to say "Hi!", isn't it?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.0.thenS: Now is not a good time...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.1.thenS: Still feels too awkward contacting him now...
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.6.thenS: That huge tower definitely looks like it's compensating for something, am I right?
Man, I feel like I'm out of shape when it comes to jokes these days.
That's okay, this isn't the right time for jokes anyway. Good luck up there, Lea!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.7.thenS: I'm busy right now, Lea! You should be, too.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.8.thenS: Man we're actually gonna storm that new area today, I still can't believe it!
This is going to be awesome!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.9.thenS: Ah dang it, I can't think of any joke today.
Btw. I get the feeling that Albert is up to something today.
He was behaving really suspicious when I talked to him before...
You wouldn't happen to know anything?
Well, not like you could tell me the details anyway.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.10.then: Hi!
Hey, Lea! I suppose I learned my lesson.
Making fun of your speech limitation all the time wasn't the most decent thing to do.
It also got old quickly, didn't it?
[nods]
Yeah, I'll try to come up with better jokes from now.
I wasn't joking this time, you know?
Just drop by at the First Scholar HQ and I'll give you a little reward.
Congratulations! You're the 1000th caller of this number!
As a reward you'll be given \c[3]1 million credits\c[0]!
Of course, we'll have to make sure you're not simply a bot calling this number.
So all you need to do to collect your prize is to answer one simple security question.
What fruit is yellow, usually curved and can be peeled from two sides, one arguably the "correct" one?
Why...
I am sorry, wrong answer!
Nyahahahahaha!
Oh...\. I may have gone too far with that one.\. I'm sorry, Lea.
Why...
L-Look, I'll make it up to you. Just drop by the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] and I'll give you a real reward.
Please don't expect 1 million credits though...
Wait!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.11.then: Hey Lea! We're currently chilling over here in the headquarters. You should definitely drop by for some great news!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.12.then: Welcome to McBuggys. May I take your order?
Do you wish to add any sides?
Of course, our world-famous Why-Fries. Anything to drink?
I'm sorry, we're all out of Lea-monade.
How about some cool and refreshing Bye-ced tea?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.13.then: Oh, hi Lea!\. Haven't seen you for quite some time!\. What's up?
Still not much of a talker, of course.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.14.then: How why how bye Lea wait!
How why how bye Lea wait!
Man, I wish I could have recorded that!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.15.then: Man, I love that prank. Absolutely everybody falls for it!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.16.then: Hello! And how is it in the dungeon?
Did you already see the... \c[3]non-mechanical\c[0] enemies?
Come on, bugs are awesome, right? Especially if there's a lot of them!
No? Man, bugs are so underappreciated.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.18.mess: Hello. You reached the voice mail of First Scholars member "Buggy".
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.19.mess: Please leave a message after the beep.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.buggy-contact.event.25.mess: You almost bought it, didn't you?
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote.event.2.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote.event.6.messag: Ah've just got a beep from ma machine.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote.event.7.messag: Ya'll already found 25% o' them plants.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote.event.9.messag: Now that's what Ah like to hear.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote.event.10.messa: Ah have a li'l somethin' fer ya'll. Come meet me in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name] - Quest Hub\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote50.event.2.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote50.event.6.mess: Ah see ya'll jes' hit the 50% mark. Nice work!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote50.event.8.mess: Ah got a li'l sumthin' preped fer ya'll. Ya'll come find me at the \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name] - Quest Hub\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote75.event.2.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote75.event.6.mess: Ya'll been busy. Ma machine shows me you got 75% of the flora analyzed!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote75.event.8.mess: Ah've got another upgrade to celebrate! Ya'll come find me at the \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name] - Quest Hub\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote100.event.4.mes: Well, Ah'll be darned. Y'all've gone an' done it all!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote100.event.5.mes: Y'all found all the plants, even them super rare ones!
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote100.event.8.mes: Y'all deserve a big reward fer all yer hard work.
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote100.event.9.mes: Ah've got a small place Ah call home in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name] - North\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.commonEvents.botanicsNote100.event.10.me: Y'all come drop in, Ah'll be waitin'!

You just loaded an \c[3]old save file\c[0].

You now have the option to \c[3]Update your savefile\c[0].
This will allow you to \c[3]continue the story\c[0] while keeping all items, level, dungeon and quest progress.

You can still reload the save and select to update your save if you change your mind.

The \c[3]Chinese Translation\c[0] should be up-to-date, but was updated in a hurry, so things might not be perfect

Translations will be extended and improved over the new few releases!
