With the human arrival also came the trend of Shad to go outside the village itself. This is why in rare cases one might find a Shad wandering areas you normally wouldn't find them.
assets/data/database.json.lore.heat-dng.title: Faj'ro Temple
assets/data/database.json.lore.heat-dng.content.page-01-01.content: This temple stands in a large ravine right before \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] and is the second challenge a \c[3]Seeker\c[0] has to overcome as part of the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0]. In this Dungeon the Seeker can acquire the second element: \c[3]Cold\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.heat-dng.content.page-01-02.content: To enter the dungeon, however, a Seeker must visit \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], home to the Shad. Only there can they find the key to gain access to the temple.
assets/data/database.json.lore.heat-dng.content.page-01-03.content:
Its unique shape granted it the nickname: \c[3]Hourglass\c[0]. Steam-powered furnaces, water blocks, and poles that can hold elemental charges are what Seekers must use to overcome the puzzles inside. 
In contrast to the infested \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0], Faj'ro Temple is home to moths, floating jellyfish, and fierce Golems.
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle.title: Gaia's Garden
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle.content.page-01-01.content: Gaia's Garden is an enormous jungle and the largest area to be found on Shadoon. Its high trees stand towering beside the many rivers that stretch from the north-west to the south-east. In the center of the jungle a huge lake can be found with a small island that is home to the paradoxical \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle.content.page-02.content: In the south-east a small Shad tribe calls the trees their home. They mostly keep to themselves and live in harmony with the jungle. However, tensions between humans and Shad have arisen ever since humans build a power plant at the entrance of the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0]. A vile infestation has spread in the north-east of the jungle which seems to originate from the power plant.
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle.content.page-03.content: In the north one can found the mighty \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]. A tree that stand above all other trees. However to get close to it, A \c[3]Seeker\c[0] first need to to finish the trials of both the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] and \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0] which stand beside the tree.
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle-city.title: Basin Keep
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle-city.content.page-01-01.cont: Basin Keep is a city build on a small island admits a huge lake in the center of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. Its a technological wonder only possible by the through its location and many safety mechanisms. To make sure the jungle does not creep into the city, the outside walls are engulfed in a special alloy which fends of most plants.
assets/data/database.json.lore.jungle-city.content.page-02.content: The city grew large very fast at it became the main supplier for clean electricity that meets the demands of humans on \c[3]Shadoon\c[0]. Many Bars and luxurious penthouses can be visited or rented respectively.  Basin Keep is often viewed as gloomy since it is always raining and the high buildings leave the city in a permanent dark setting. Still many prefer the more urban nature of it compared to bright cities like \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.shock-dng.title: Zir'vitar Temple
assets/data/database.json.lore.shock-dng.content.page-01-01.conten: This temple is the third or fourth challenge a \c[3]Seeker\c[0] needs to master in order to progress on the Track of the Ancients. Other than the previous temples, both this one and the \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0] can be completed in any order. In this Temple the Seeker can acquire the element: \c[3]Wave\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.shock-dng.content.page-02.content: Unique to this dungeon is the power plant right in front of it. It uses the outgoing energy to generate power for the humans. This however lead to tensions between the Shad living the to south-east and the humans as they accuse them of poisoning the jungle.
assets/data/database.json.lore.wave-dng.title: So'najiz Temple
assets/data/database.json.lore.wave-dng.content.page-01-01.content: This temple is the third or fourth challenge a \c[3]Seeker\c[0] needs to master in order to progress on the Track of the Ancients. Other than the previous temples, both this one and the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] can be completed in any order. In this Temple the Seeker can acquire the element: \c[3]Shock\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.shockwave-dng.title: Grand Krys'kajo
assets/data/database.json.lore.shockwave-dng.content.page-01-01.co:
This temple is build right into the name giving tree at the heart of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. It can only be accessed by first completing both the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] and \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0]. 
A \c[3]Seeker\c[0] needs to show that hey have mastered both elements acquired in the temples to prove their worthiness. It is said a guardian tests every Seeker personally at the top of the tree.
assets/data/database.json.lore.forest.title: Sapphire Ridge
assets/data/database.json.lore.forest.content.page-01-01.content: Sapphire Ridge is a system of hills located to the east of Shadoon. It's covered in eternal night by a strange weather phenomenon that is currently researched by the \c[3]United Voyager Nation\c[0]. Many years ago miners miners carved deep into the hills to unearth the valuable \c[3]Cobalt Ore\c[0]. Although not much was found, the miners uncovered many hidden paths that lead to the north of the area. Otherwise Sapphire Ridge is rather rural as most paths lead through the cave-systems up \c[3]Ascension Temple\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.forest.content.p2.content: The south houses a hostel called the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0], which counts among the oldest structures build by humans on Shadoon.
assets/data/database.json.lore.human-government.title: United Voyager Nation
assets/data/database.json.lore.human-government.content.page-01-01: The \c[3]\v[lore.title.human-government]\c[0] is the governing entity on planet \c[3]Shadoon\c[0]. They use a council of 10 high ranking military and political individuals to administer resources and provide support for the 4 \c[3]Factions\c[0] as part of \c[3]Operation Trackwalker\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.factions.title: Factions
assets/data/database.json.lore.factions.content.page-01-01.content:
Factions are groups of humans who work together to secure the survival and further advancement of humanity on \c[3]\v[lore.title.planet]\c[0].
Most humans are part of one of 4 large factions with different fields of duties and core philosophies, each divided into regional subdivisions:
- \c[3]Venture Alliance (VA)\c[0]
- \c[3]Human Preservation Department (HPD)\c[0]
- \c[3]Association of Human Advancement (AHA)\c[0]
- \c[3]Amity of Balance (AoB)\c[0]

While the factions are filled with highly resourceful experts of their field, they often need the support of the \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]s\c[0] because of their special connection to the \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-main.title: Venture Alliance
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-main.content.page-01-0: The \c[3]Venture Alliance (VA)\c[0] is a faction mainly responsible for doing pioneer work by exploring and claiming new land, hunting and scavenging wildlife and mining natural resources. Thus it often attracts an individualistic, adventuring type of person who prefers active work in the field, even if it's dangerous.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-rookieharbor.title: Falldivers
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-rookieharbor.content.p:
As the subdivision of the \c[3]Venture Alliance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Falldivers (FD)\c[0] are the primary recon force in the entire Autumn Area and the southern coast of the continent.
Aside from scouting for unexplored regions and monitoring any movements of the creatures connected to the \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients] they also hunt and search for useful resources and Ancient artifacts.

The Falldivers are currently under the command of \c[3]Elenya Volkewsky\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Forerunner\c[0]. It should be noted, however, that the command structures in this Faction are very flexible.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-bergen.title: Bergen Digging Mates
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-bergen.content.page-01: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Venture Alliance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Bergen Digging Mates (BDM)\c[0] explore Mt. Bergen to find precious resources and also manage all the mining operations done in that area.
The BDM are currently under the command of \c[3]Turis McEdinthil\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Chief Miner\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-baki.title: Arid Breeze
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-baki.content.page-01-0: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Venture Alliance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Arid Breeze (AB)\c[0] explores Maroon Valley to find ancient tombs and the artifacts that reside within them.
The AB are currently under the command of \c[3]Jonathan Lorenzo Mahir el Valente Al-Nassar\c[0] (also known as \c[3]Joel Mahir\c[0]), who holds the title of \c[3]First Wind\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-jungle.title: Woodland Vanguard
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-heat-jungle.content.page-01:
As the subdivision of the \c[3]Venture Alliance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Woodland Vanguard (WV)\c[0] explores Gaia's Garden to find hints of Ancient culture and technology. They have a strong affinity to both vintage artifacts of the Ancients and technological advanced gadgets.
They are very proud in already doing explorations of the Ancients even before it became a prime directive.
The WV are currently under the command of \c[3]Kacela Madaki\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Lead Pioneer\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-main.title: Human Preservation Department
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-main.content.page-01-0: The \c[3]Human Preservation Department (HPD)\c[0] is a faction mainly responsible for the protection and discipline of the human settlements on \v[lore.title.planet]. Thus they both serve as the main standing army of the human forces and also as the police force. Also part of the HPD are doctors and all kinds of rescue service personnel.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-rookieharbor.title: Rookie Harbor Guard
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-rookieharbor.content.p: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Human Preservation Department\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Rookie Harbor Guard (RHG)\c[0] is tasked to keep justice and order in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] and the surrounding areas like \v[area.autumn-area.name]. This includes both defending against attacks from the track and solving crimes done by other humans.
The guard is under the command of \c[3]Sgt. Julius Brassler\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-bergen.title: Bergen Guard
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-bergen.content.page-01: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Human Preservation Department\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Bergen Guard (BG)\c[0] are tasked to keep justice and order in \v[area.bergen.name] and the surrounding areas of \v[area.bergen-trails.name]. This includes both defending against attacks from the track and solving crimes committed by other humans.
The guard is under the command of \c[3]Sgt. Silvia Sterling\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-baki.title: Maroon Baki Guard
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-baki.content.page-01-0: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Human Preservation Department\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Maroon Baki Guard (MBG)\c[0] is tasked to keep justice and order in \v[area.heat-village.name] and the surrounding areas of \v[area.heat-area.name]. This includes both defending against attacks from the track and solving crimes committed by other humans.
The guard is under the command of the old veteran \c[3]Sgt. Rainer Niellos\c[0], who is know for his friendly relations with the local Shad.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-jungle.title: Basin Police Force
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-cold-jungle.content.page-01: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Human Preservation Department\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Basin Police Force (BPF)\c[0] is tasked to keep justice and order in \v[area.jungle-city.name] and the surrounding areas of \v[area.jungle.name]. This includes both defending against attacks from the track and solving crimes committed by other humans.
The police is under the command of \c[3]Sgt. Daz Bronzel\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-main.title: Assoc. of Human Advancement
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-main.content.page-01-: The \c[3]Association of Human Advancement (AHA)\c[0] is a faction mainly responsible for trade, manufacturing and scientific research.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-rookieharbor.title: Coastal Trading Coalition
As the subdivision of the \c[3]Association of Human Advancement\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Coastal Trading Coalition (CTC)\c[0] serves as a parent organization to every trader and craftsperson in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]. While their members usually act autonomously, the division can organize cooperations, mediate in disputes and also negotiate missions to outside forces with the backing of the entire organization.
The Coalition is controlled by a council that is regularly replaced by yearly elections.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-bergen.title: Bergen Trade & Metalwork
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-bergen.content.page-0: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Association of Human Advancement\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Bergen Trade & Metalwork (BTM)\c[0] serves as a parent organization to every trader and craftsperson in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0].

The BTM is controlled by a council that is regularly replaced by yearly elections. Currently \c[3]Mrs Summers\c[0] is the chairman and thus responsible for handling complaints brought up by Bergen traders.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-baki.title: Baki Bazaar Union
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-baki.content.page-01-: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Association of Human Advancement\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Baki Bazaar Union (BBU)\c[0] serves as a parent organization to every trader and craftsperson in \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0].
The Union is controlled by a council of successful Shad merchants, highest among them the ambitious \c[3]Kney'tehab\c[0], who also prides himself a master of human proverbs and rhetorik.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-jungle.title: Basin Trade Partnership
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-shock-jungle.content.page-0: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Association of Human Advancement\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Basin Trade Partnership (BTP)\c[0] serves as a parent organization to every trader and craftsperson in \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0].

The Trade Partnership is controlled by a council that is made up of the most influential companies of the city. \c[3]Esha Basu\c[0] serves as one of the most prominent neutral spokespeople and responsible with assisting members with their problems.
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-main.title: Amity of Balance
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-main.content.page-01-0: The \c[3]Amity of Balance (AoB)\c[0] is a faction mainly responsible for farming, gathering and the research of native life and gaining an understanding of the inner workings of the \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-rookieharbor.title: Fruits of Autumn
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-rookieharbor.content.p:
As the subdivision of the \c[3]Amity of Balance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Fruits of Autumn (FoA)\c[0] are responsible for supervising and researching the effects of the \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients] on the local flora and fauna of the Autumn Area. 
They are also in control of most of the agriculture needed to feed the population of both \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] and even the capital city \v[lore.title.rhombus-square]. In particular, their rich harvest of many different kinds of apples is one of the major backbones of the human diet on \v[lore.title.planet].
The faction is led by \c[3]Manzana Sarbolev\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Chief Woodkeeper\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-bergen.title: Ascension Spirits
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-bergen.content.page-01:
As the subdivision of the \c[3]Amity of Balance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Ascension Spirits (AS)\c[0] are responsible for supervising and researching the effects of the \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients] on the local flora and fauna of Mt. Bergen.
Even when compared to other Subdivisions of the AoB they take a very spiritual approach to their task, which is hard to grasp for outsiders. Their connection to the track and understanding of its behavior outweigh all scientific doubts, though.
The faction is led by \c[3]Nemuh\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Ascended Wisdom\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-jungle.title: Gaia's Gardeners
assets/data/database.json.lore.faction-wave-jungle.content.page-01: As the subdivision of the \c[3]Amity of Balance\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0], the \c[3]Gaia's Gardeners (GG)\c[0] are dedicated to monitoring and protecting the climate and stability of the environment in Gaia's Garden.
The faction is led by \c[3]Claude Renyes\c[0], who holds the title of \c[3]Lead Gardener\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.guilds.title: Guilds
assets/data/database.json.lore.guilds.content.page-01-01.content:
Guilds are organized companies of \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]s\c[0] who closely work together on a regular basis, even moreso than the usual groups of \v[lore.title.seeker]s.
Guilds often hand out tasks for other players to complete for them in order to further increase their reach.
assets/data/database.json.lore.omni-gilders.title: Omni Gilders
assets/data/database.json.lore.omni-gilders.content.first.content: \c[3]Omni Gilders\c[0] is the name of a guild in CrossWorlds. As one of the largest guilds, it has multiple bases in various towns and villages. Their main goal is to become a large trading guild which helps low level players with fetch quests and uses the income to build more bases.
assets/data/database.json.lore.first-scholars.title: First Scholar
assets/data/database.json.lore.first-scholars.content.p1.content:
The First Scholars are a tiny guild dedicated to the lore of \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0]. Even though they're small in size they still own a small house in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

Its current members are:
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.hlin]\c[0] (Leader)
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.beowulf]\c[0] (Co-Leader)
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.schneider]\c[0]
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.buggy]\c[0]
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.lea]\c[0]
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.emilie]\c[0]
- \c[3]\v[lore.title.glasses]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-code.title: CrossCode
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-code.content.page-01.content: The \c[3]CrossCode\c[0] is the central part of the \c[3]avatar controlling module\c[0] and developed by \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]. By using a neural network analyzing the player's neural oscillation, it allowed controlling avatars like your own body.
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-code.content.page-02.content: However the CrossCode went beyond just analyzing players' thoughts to control avatars. Using the same neural network as a foundation, it is possible to entirely simulate features of the brain. Perception, logical thinking, emotions and even memories. This means the CrossCode \c[3]evolved into a fully fledged A.I.\c[0], Running this on an Avatar is what was called an \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-code-2.title: CrossCode 2.0
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-code-2.content.page-01.conten: A specialized version of the original \c[3]CrossCode\c[0] able to create a copy of the neural network resulting in the birth of an \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-worlds.title: CrossWorlds
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-worlds.content.page-01-01.con: \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] is a \c[3]Massively Multiplayer Online Game\c[0] created by \c[3]\v[lore.title.dev-company]\c[0]. It features a unique setting on a moon circling a giant gas planet in the eastern part of the galaxy. It is owned and terra-formed by \c[3]\v[lore.title.dev-company]\c[0]. It's current version is \c[3]1.69-2\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-worlds.content.page-01-02.con: Players make use of the \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-gear]\c[0] to connect to special Avatars made out of \v[lore.title.instant-matter]. The goal of the game is to beat the \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0], a set of open areas and dungeons players have to overcome in order to get to the end.
assets/data/database.json.lore.playground.title: Playground
assets/data/database.json.lore.playground.content.page-01-01.conte: The \c[3]Playground\c[0] is the official location where \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0] takes place. It is often called \c[3]"The Croissant"\c[0] by players because of its shape.
assets/data/database.json.lore.player.title: Player
assets/data/database.json.lore.player.content.page-01-01.content: The \c[3]Players\c[0] in \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] are actual real human players, playing the game. They control temporary physical bodies, called \c[3]\v[lore.title.avatars]\c[0], that entirely consist of a formable material called \c[3]\v[lore.title.instant-matter]\c[0]. In the game they play as a \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] who tries to solve the \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.balls.title: Virtual Ricochet Projectile
assets/data/database.json.lore.balls.content.para-1.content:
VRPs, short for Virtual Ricochet Projectiles, are, as the name suggests, projectiles used as an offensive weapon in the world of \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0]. 
Unlike the Avatars themselves, VRPs are not made of \c[3]Instant Matter\c[0], but are virtual projections interacting with the game world. This means that people like the \c[3]Maintenance Crew\c[0] are not able to see them unless they wear special goggles.
assets/data/database.json.lore.balls.content.para-2.content:
Since the term "Virtual Ricochet Projectile" is quite long, players started calling them simply \c[3]"Balls"\c[0]. Obviously jokes started to appear and quickly spiraled out of control.
Over time, however, making joking about it became unpopular and nowadays even hinting at such a joke is sure to only earn disrespect and scorn from most players.
assets/data/database.json.lore.money-trade.title: Credits Trading
assets/data/database.json.lore.money-trade.content.page-01-01.cont:
Back in the early versions of \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0] it was possible for players to easily trade the in-game currency \c[3]Credits\c[0].
However since that was used by players to gain money by trading real world cash it was removed. Instead a system was created to allow players to create custom quests. By building in restrictions based on game progression of a player a lot of low-level proxy accounts were effectively shut down.
assets/data/database.json.lore.direct-link.title: Direct Link
assets/data/database.json.lore.direct-link.content.p1.content:
The \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] is a messaging system used to talk privately to players in your contact list. To contact a person, you just need to open the \c[3]social menu\c[0] and select the player you want to talk to. If the player is not online, you can leave a message. 
The system works via voice only. This means there is actually no way to message another player via "typing text" in \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.direct-link.content.p2.content: According to \c[3]\v[lore.title.dev-company]\c[0], the developers of CrossWorlds, this was done to increase the immersion. However, some players argue that it makes talking to friends occasionally difficult since the \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-gear]\c[0] is known to sometimes have issues with voice synchronization.
assets/data/database.json.lore.dev-company.title: Instatainment ltd
assets/data/database.json.lore.dev-company.content.page-01-01.cont: \c[3]Instatainment\c[0] is a galaxy wide company focused on providing entertainment via \c[3]Instant Matter\c[0] technology. One of their biggest products is \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0], a \c[3]Massively Multiplayer Online Game\c[0] which takes place on an actual moon in the galaxy.
assets/data/database.json.lore.avatars.title: Avatars
assets/data/database.json.lore.avatars.content.page-01-01.content: \c[3]Avatars\c[0] are humanoid bodies made of \c[3]\v[lore.title.instant-matter]\c[0] that are controlled by human players of \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.avatars.content.page-01-02.content:
The bodies of avatars are extremely light. This is because avatars are basically just shells controlled by a remote player. Simulating touch and mass makes it possible for players to still feel the weight of attacks or motions in general. 
The low weight means that even a child can lift avatars!
assets/data/database.json.lore.evotar.title: Evotar
assets/data/database.json.lore.evotar.content.page-01.content:
An Evotar is an A.I. run on an Avatar using the \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-code]\c[0] technology created by \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]. Evotars are fully able to feel, move and communicate just like a normal human being. 
However Evotars showcase a significant issue when being confronted with their origin, often plunging them into mental breakdown which ultimately leads to severe malfunctions.
assets/data/database.json.lore.milky-way.title: Milky Way Galaxy
assets/data/database.json.lore.milky-way.content.page-01-01.conten: The \c[3]Milky Way Galaxy\c[0] is the home of the human race. At this point about half of the space has been explored and numerous colonies have been established working under the banner of the \c[3]ACF\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.milky-way.content.page-01-02.conten: Thanks to \c[3]\v[lore.title.com-tech]\c[0], communication between colonies and travel is almost instant, making the galaxy itself the home of the humans.
assets/data/database.json.lore.milky-way.content.page-01-03.conten: \c[3]Trivia\c[0]: To this date no other sentient life has been found in the galaxy. Only hospitable planets and animals.
assets/data/database.json.lore.real-planet.title: Raritan Gem
assets/data/database.json.lore.real-planet.content.page-01-01.cont:
\c[3]Raritan Gem\c[0] is the name given to the moon on which \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] was built. Not the be confused with the "in-game" name of the moon which is \c[3]\v[lore.title.planet]\c[0].
The diameter of the moon is roughly \c[3]12.000 km\c[0] and it's mostly covered by water with only one large patch of landmass. Researchers assume that the moon once had more landmass and some event led to the oceans rising.
assets/data/database.json.lore.real-planet.content.page-01-02.cont: Despite the moon's orbit around a gas giant, its unique position in its solar system makes the air breathable and the temperature consistent enough to be hospitable. That's at least what people believe.
assets/data/database.json.lore.colony-federation.title: Accord of Colony Founders
assets/data/database.json.lore.colony-federation.content.p1.conten: The ACF is a council consisting of leaders of the largest colonies in the galaxy. Most colonies joined the ACF after the \c[3]\v[lore.title.old-war]\c[0] creating the largest peace seeking organization in the galaxy. Because of this the ACF works similarly to a federation. They operate from a System in the 1st galactic quadrant Perseus arm called \c[3]Novus Terra\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.lore.old-war.title: Old War
assets/data/database.json.lore.old-war.content.p1.content:
The \c[3]Old War\c[0] is a term used to describe a dark time in the history of humankind roughly 1000 years ago. In the age of exploration when mankind started to chart galaxies all over the 1st quadrant, a war broke out. The cause of this war has never been fully understood. Most believe it to be resources while others believe ideological differences could have been the cause.  
Historians tell us that more and more weapons were built, powerful enough to destroy worlds. But those were never used as their primary purpose was to be a deterrent. That is at least what children learn in school. History books are oddly spotty on the subject of the Old War and our ancestors involvement in it.
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-gear.title: Cross Gear
assets/data/database.json.lore.cross-gear.content.page-01-01.conte:
The \c[3]Cross Gear\c[0] device is used to connect a human to the world of \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0]. Through the \c[3]\v[lore.title.com-tech]\c[0] it is possible to control the character in-game with absolutely zero lag, resulting in great immersion as all senses are tightly connected to the device and thus the game, too.
However, the technology used for the gear is still experimental and as such still has issues. A prominent example is the \c[3]Speech Desynchronisation\c[0] which happens because of interference between the gear and the \c[3]\v[lore.title.avatars]\c[0] in CrossWorlds.
assets/data/database.json.lore.com-tech.title: Quantum Porting
assets/data/database.json.lore.com-tech.content.page-01-01.content:
\c[3]Quantum Porting\c[0] is the technology used to transport matter and information instantly between end points. Around 1500 years ago, scientists first discovered a way to securely transport matter into a higher dimension and return it.
This gave way to many breakthroughs which resulted in humans starting to be able to explore the galaxy.
assets/data/database.json.lore.com-tech.content.page-01-02.content: The drawback to this technology is that in order to get from Point A to Point B, both points must have various devices installed to allow for the porting.
assets/data/database.json.lore.instant-matter.title: Instant Matter
assets/data/database.json.lore.instant-matter.content.page-01-01.c: \c[3]Instant Matter\c[0] is a low-density material that can easily be created and formed by a remote system. It serves as a core component of \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0] because all non-static entities, like \c[3]Player-\v[lore.title.avatars]\c[0], \c[3]Enemies\c[0] and \c[3]Non-Player Characters\c[0] are created from it.
assets/data/database.json.lore.instant-matter.content.page-01-02.c:
Objects made out of Instant Matter can barely have any effect on real objects of solid mass, because they are \c[3]too light and unstable\c[0] to actually apply noticeable force. 
In the same sense, while they can be easily destroyed by physical force, structures of Instant Matter can be reformed just as quickly as long as the connection to the remote system persists.
assets/data/database.json.lore.solar-fist.title: Solar Fist
assets/data/database.json.lore.solar-fist.content.p1.content:
A bazooka-like weapon used by \c[3]\v[lore.title.cap-jet]\c[0] to prevent the \c[3]\v[lore.title.designer]\c[0] from taking Lea. 
It seems to be capable of disrupting \c[3]\v[lore.title.instant-matter]\c[0] temporarily.
assets/data/database.json.lore.insta-matter-bomb.title: IMF-Neutralizer
assets/data/database.json.lore.insta-matter-bomb.content.page-01-0:
The \c[3]"Instant Matter Field Neutralizer"\c[0] is a bomb used on the \c[3]M.S. Solar\c[0] by \c[3]\v[lore.title.cap-jet]\c[0] to "make sure that no traces of \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] are left on the ship", as Jet put it.
While it has no apparent effect on solid matter or organic lifeforms, it seems to completely disrupt and thus destroy anything made from \c[3]\v[lore.title.instant-matter]\c[0] within its range.
assets/data/database.json.lore.cargo-ship.title: Cargo Ship M.S. Solar
assets/data/database.json.lore.cargo-ship.content.page-01-01.conte:
The cargo ship of \c[3]\v[lore.title.cap-jet]\c[0], which served as a training area for \c[3]Lea\c[0] before entering \c[3]\v[lore.title.cross-worlds]\c[0] for real. Its main task is shipping maintenance parts and personnel to the \c[3]\v[lore.title.playground]\c[0] to keep the real world technology of the game intact.
The ship is powered by solar energy, which is the reason for its huge solar panels on deck.
assets/data/database.json.lore.hackerspace.title: I.H.S.O.
assets/data/database.json.lore.hackerspace.content.page-01.content:
The \c[3]I.H.S.O.\c[0] is an organization dedicated to finding and eliminating any kind of exploits and bugs found in systems used by companies.
It's also one of the oldest groups in the galaxy, existing for almost 2000 years in one way or another. \c[3]\v[lore.title.dev-company]\c[0] is just one of many that received help from them.
To support the cause, many companies created "Wanted Lists" for potential bugs with large bounties for those you can find and fix them.
assets/data/database.json.lore.logs-header.title: Strange Logs
assets/data/database.json.lore.logs-header.content.page-01.content: A collection of log entries of unknown origin that have found their way into CrossWorlds.
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-1.title: Log Entry #001
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-1.content.page-01.content:
\c[2]Log Entry #001 - Expedition to Sector SOS-03\c[0]

Tomorrow is the day. The \c[3]ACF\c[0] sends us out for another big expedition to one of the\c[3] SOS-Sectors\c[0]. Apparently it's \c[3]Old War\c[0] territory. I don't know what they want us to find there but scrap metal and drained stones but whatever pays the bill, right? The official task is to "chart the sector and scan planets when possible". Standard ACF exploration.
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-2.title: Log Entry #020
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-2.content.page-01.content:
\c[2]Log Entry #020 - Expedition to Sector SOS-03\c[0]

It has been roughly 3 weeks and we finally made it into \c[3]Sector SOS-03\c[0]. It's crazy to think that this is uncharted when 1000 years ago the colonies waged the largest war humankind has seen here. We're just outside the \c[3]Orion Spur\c[0] and it looks bad. You can see dead ships everywhere. It kinda gives me the creeps. All the lives lost in this battle? All over resources? It must have been pretty dark. History books don't do justice to the damage that has been done here.
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-3.title: Log Entry #042
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-3.content.page-01.content:
\c[2]Log Entry #042 - Expedition to Sector SOS-03\c[0]

Something is off. There is no way we're just here to chart this area. The seniors are all riled up because they found an ancient signal. Like before the \c[3]Old War\c[0] ancient. Should be nothing special, we often find old signals, left by our ancestors floating in space and sending out binary signals. But this one made them very excited. Now our job is to find more signals like that in all directions. No more charting, no more scanning. I don't know what they're thinking but the whole team knows we're kept in the dark.
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-4.title: Log Entry #066
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-4.content.page-01.content:
\c[2]Log Entry #066 - Expedition to Sector SOS-03\c[0]

I found stray signals, which seemed to phase in and out. The signals were complete garbage, but the phasing was strangely... binary. So I tried recording the phase-intervals to see if I get something. 
What I found is a message from what I think was a captain of a war ship called \c[3]Phoenix\c[0]. The message is very broken and is missing a big chunk at the end. It will take some time to repair it... if that is even possible.
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-5.title: Log Entry #104
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-5.content.page-01.content:
\c[2]Log Entry #104 - Expedition to Sector SOS-03\c[0]

Today two things happened. First, our ship is going home. Everyone is pretty exhausted and nothing new has been found. Well, except the strange signals. Which is the second thing that happened. The repair routine is finally done and it might not have recovered much, but here we go:
assets/data/database.json.lore.log-5.content.page-03.content: Where it all began? Some Planet they called home? No wonder the seniors are all so interested in this. Are we close to finding a new inhabitable planet? In \c[3]Old War\c[0] territory? But what is this about a Singularity? I can't imagine them talking about a real one, that would be insane. But a new planet? After this message there's bound to be more expeditions into this \c[3]SOS-Sector\c[0].

assets/data/database.json.quests.bull-arena-1.briefing: You have saved the food delivery. Now business can be conducted properly with full stomachs!
assets/data/database.json.quests.bull-arena-1.tasks.0.task: Find the \c[3]food collector\c[0] along the \c[3]main route through \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.bull-arena-1.tasks.1.task: \c[3]Clear out the pit on Pathway 5\c[0] to get the package back

assets/data/database.json.quests.bull-arena-1.tasks.4.task: Go back to \c[3]Mr Nomsworth\c[0] on the \c[3]Marketplace\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.hubSettings.loc: Need support for a high-priority mission from the higher ups. \c[3]- Rookie Harbor Marketplace\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.name: New Metal
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.description: \c[3]Mr. Nomsworth\c[0] has sent you to the \c[3]main headquarters of the Coastal Trading Coalition\c[0] for another assignment. It must be very important!
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.briefing: You have helped the metal production in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] to advance and also introduced yourself to the board of the CTC in the process!
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.tasks.0.task: Talk to the \c[3]Guard\c[0] in \c[3]Traders Kontor\c[0] at the \c[3]Alley Quarters\c[0].

assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.tasks.2.task: Talk to the \c[3]metal trader\c[0] in the \c[3]Trader's Den\c[0] of \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.tasks.3.task: Find the smelter parts in \c[3]a room that harbors heat\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.tasks.4.task: Report back to the \c[3]metal trader\c[0] in \c[3]Trader's Den\c[0] of \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.rftc-3-metalstuff.tasks.5.task: Report back to \c[3]Chairman Steward\c[0] in the \c[3]upper Traders Kontor\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-1-treedoc.hubSettings.locatio: Some precious trees have become sick and need treatment. \c[3]- Fruits of Autumn HQ\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-1-treedoc.name: Sickly Trees
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-1-treedoc.description: \c[3]Four trees in \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] have been infected with a disease and endanger the harmony of the Track. Find them with your \c[3]Analysis\c[0] and cure the sickness with the \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-1-treedoc.briefing: You have healed the sick trees and preserved the balance of the Track.
Heal the tree east of \c[3]Obelisk Lake\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-1-treedoc.tasks.1.task: Report back to \c[3]Chief Woodkeeper Manzana\c[0] in the \c[3]Fruits of Autumn HQ\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-2-tree_defense.hubSettings.lo: A very important tree has become sick and needs intensive treatment! \c[3]- Fruits of Autumn HQ\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-2-tree_defense.name: Intensive Tree Care
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-2-tree_defense.description: \c[3]A sacred tree in \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] has been infected with a disease that endangers the harmony of the Track. Cure the sickness with the \c[3]\v[item.189.name]\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-2-tree_defense.briefing: You have healed the sick tree and preserved the balance of the Track.
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-2-tree_defense.tasks.0.task: Cure a \c[3]sick special tree\c[0] in \c[3]Pathway 3\c[0] of \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] with \v[item.189.name]

assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-3-buffel_cave.hubSettings.loc: A Bovine is burning with sickness and must be released from its pain. \c[3]- Fruits of Autumn HQ\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-3-buffel_cave.name: Bull on Fire
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-3-buffel_cave.description: \c[3]A once proud Bovine\c[0] has fallen ill with a burning disease which set the beast ablaze in both body and rage. Find its hiding spot and lay it to rest!
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-3-buffel_cave.briefing: The bovine has been delivered from its pain. It will do no more harm to the lands of Autumn.
assets/data/database.json.quests.foa-3-buffel_cave.tasks.0.task: Enter the \c[3]Densewater Caverns\c[0] on \c[3]Secluded Path\c[0] in the northeast of \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]

assets/data/database.json.quests.unknown-warrior-1.name: A Promise Is a Promise
assets/data/database.json.quests.unknown-warrior-1.description: You found a weird player wearing armor from all classes trying to find a \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0]. He said you can find it in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] in an area where it rains and you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0].
assets/data/database.json.quests.unknown-warrior-1.briefing: You found the weapon and returned it to the player, learning nothing but his name: \c[3]Ketin D'Kar\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.unknown-warrior-1.tasks.1.task: Hand over the \v[item.133.name] to the strange player at the  \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name] Market\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.hubSettings.location: Howdy! Much is at steak so I need some brave help! Hope to meat you soon. \c[3]- Rising Exit\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.name: Wood 'n Steaks
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.description: \c[3]Ms. Selena Teak\c[0] wants to create the best steaks in all of \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] and needs someone to deliver the ingredients. A worthy task indeed!
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.briefing: You have acquired the requested items, but the result was not satisfying. Maybe different types of wood will do the trick?
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.tasks.0.task: Collect \c[3]\v[item.88.name]\c[0] and both \c[3]light wood\c[0] and \c[3]sharp wood\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_1.tasks.1.task: Deliver the items to \c[3]Ms. Teak\c[0] \c[3]near the Weaponstore of \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.hubSettings.location: The first try was a failure, but the next steaks will be perfect! Come and see! \c[3]- Rising Exit\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.name: Meating Expectations
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.description: Despite the disappointing first try, \c[3]Ms. Teak\c[0] is still determined to find the perfect preparation for steak. This time you should search for a different combination of wood!
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.briefing: This time the wood has done the job perfectly! Now you can acquire delicious \c[3]Rare Steaks\c[0] from Ms. Teak's booth!
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.tasks.0.task: Collect \c[3]\v[item.88.name]\c[0] and both \c[3]regal wood\c[0] and \c[3]dry wood\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_2.tasks.1.task: Deliver the items to \c[3]Ms. Teak\c[0] \c[3]near the Weaponstore of \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_3.hubSettings.location: Now is the time to take my steaks even further and taste perfection! \c[3]- Rising Exit\c[0]
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_3.name: Raising the Steaks
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_3.description: \c[3]Ms. Teak\c[0] wants to improve her steaks even further. This time you should search for a different variety of ingredients for a proper marinade!
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_3.briefing: The pinnacle of steak has been reached! Now you can acquire even \c[3]Gourmet Steaks\c[0] from Ms. Teak's booth!
assets/data/database.json.quests.steaks_3.tasks.0.task: Collect some \c[3]old wood\c[0], \c[3]honey\c[0] and \c[3]apples from the East\c[0]
