assets/data/item-database.json.items.146.name: Faj'ro Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.147.name: Faj'ro Master Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.147.description: The Master Key of the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.148.name: Yellow Sand Shade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.149.name: Mine Pass
assets/data/item-database.json.items.149.description: The pass for \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0]. Acquired after extensive amounts of forced exposition.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.150.name: Neutral Stone
assets/data/item-database.json.items.150.description: A conventionally shaped rock that emits neutrality. Might one day empower your circuit?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.151.name: Hermit Repairkit
assets/data/item-database.json.items.151.description: A repair kit for the generator in the basement of the Hermit's House.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.152.name: Mine Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.152.description: A regular key for the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.153.name: Mine Master Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.154.name: Thief's Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.154.description: A rusty but astoundingly sturdy key. Opens bronze chests.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.155.name: White Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.155.description: A silver key so bright it appears white. Opens silver chests.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.156.name: Radiant Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.156.description: A golden key emitting a mesmerizing pulse. Opens golden chests.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.157.name: Ye dirty 'ol cheater
assets/data/item-database.json.items.158.name: Stone of Valor
assets/data/item-database.json.items.158.description: One of the \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0]. Shifting smoothly between orange and red colors.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.159.name: Bug Shell
assets/data/item-database.json.items.159.description: A shell shaped like a bug. It emits a blue aura, pulsating almost like a heartbeat.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.160.name: Blue Orb
assets/data/item-database.json.items.160.description: You can hear something buzzing inside.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.161.name: Proper Tophat
assets/data/item-database.json.items.161.description: An expertly patched tophat. It's not uniquely impressive but at least without holes.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.162.name: - Devillish Tophat
assets/data/item-database.json.items.162.description: Decorated with goat horns and a pink flower. It really shows that you mean business!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.163.name: Metal Gears
assets/data/item-database.json.items.163.description: Just gears made out of metal, yepp.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.164.name: Ancient Sandals
assets/data/item-database.json.items.164.description: Worn out sandals, probably of Ancient origin. Still emit some residual aura.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.165.name: Sweet Lemonjuice
assets/data/item-database.json.items.165.description: Still quite sour despite lots of sugar, but filled with precious vitamins.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.166.name: Hotsauce
assets/data/item-database.json.items.166.description: So hot, you will stop feeling cold for quite some time.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.167.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
assets/data/item-database.json.items.167.description: The best flavor of ice cream, everyone knows that!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.168.name: Holiday Hat
assets/data/item-database.json.items.168.description: A special hat you got from \c[3]Holiday Man\c[0] for helping him. Wear it proudly!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.169.name: Holiday Present
assets/data/item-database.json.items.169.description: A present from \c[3]Holiday Man\c[0]. Give it to other players!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.170.name: Guild Pass
assets/data/item-database.json.items.170.description: Grants access to the \c[3]guild village\c[0] and \c[3]First Scholars home\c[0] in Autumn's Rise.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.171.name: Pure Autumn Cider
assets/data/item-database.json.items.171.description: A liquid extracted from the fruits of the \v[area.autumn-area.name]. Allegedly heals sick trees.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.172.name: Geo-Data #3469
assets/data/item-database.json.items.172.description: Geographical data collected by the explorer Tucos, stored on a small data storage.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.173.name: Autumn Probe
assets/data/item-database.json.items.173.description: A lost and found data probe installed by Henry the Researcher.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.174.name: Tough Sand
assets/data/item-database.json.items.174.description: Special sand used to forge extremely sturdy glass.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.175.name: Glaring Rock
assets/data/item-database.json.items.175.description: A rock that shimmers brightly when held against the sunlight.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.176.name: Rainbow Gem
assets/data/item-database.json.items.176.description: This unique gem only forms at cliffsides during the rare rainfalls.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.177.name: Vivid Water
assets/data/item-database.json.items.177.description: Sweet water, rich in minerals. Found in the rivers of Maroon Valley.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.178.name: Palmapple Seed
assets/data/item-database.json.items.178.description: A mix between a palm tree and a pineapple. It might sting when eaten.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.179.name: Cactone Fruit
assets/data/item-database.json.items.179.description: A hybrid between a water melon and a cactus. Both juicy and sweet!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.180.name: Old Bones
assets/data/item-database.json.items.180.description: Fossilized bones with engraved symbols on them.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.181.name: Helix Relic
assets/data/item-database.json.items.181.description: This tremendous fossil is colored in shades of red and yellow.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.182.name: Lucid Shard
assets/data/item-database.json.items.182.description: It's almost transparent, making it appear as ordinary glass to most people.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.183.name: Everlasting Amber
assets/data/item-database.json.items.183.description: A gem so old that it precedes the time of the Ancients themselves.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.184.name: Weird Hillkat Tech
assets/data/item-database.json.items.184.description: A mysterious piece of tech dropped by the \c[3]Hillkat Bandleader\c[0]. It might store data?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.185.name: Crystal Leek
assets/data/item-database.json.items.185.description: This salty crystal is shaped like a leek and is used in local cuisine.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.186.name: Arid Lumber
assets/data/item-database.json.items.186.description: A piece of wood so sturdy that it can survive without water for centuries.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.187.name: Ancient Earth
assets/data/item-database.json.items.187.description: This inconspicuous rock holds the most durable ore on all of Shadoon.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.188.name: Maroon Chestnut
assets/data/item-database.json.items.188.description: A rare chestnut found only close to the old maroon tree in Maroon Valley.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.189.name: Autumn Salve
assets/data/item-database.json.items.189.description: A highly concentrated healing ointment made from the fruits of the \v[area.autumn-area.name].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.190.name: Refined Metal
assets/data/item-database.json.items.190.description: Polished yet still used metal parts. Created from old metal parts.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.191.name: Precious Metal
assets/data/item-database.json.items.191.description: High quality metal created by melting refined metal parts.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.192.name: Epic Metal
assets/data/item-database.json.items.192.description: Metal popular among the Ancients. Extracted from precious metal parts.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.193.name: Gourmet Steak
assets/data/item-database.json.items.193.description: An outstanding steak with the perfect marinade.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.194.name: Poison Stinger
assets/data/item-database.json.items.194.description: A stinger from the tail of a \v[combat.name.heat.scorpion]. Still full of poison.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.195.name: Drill Stone
assets/data/item-database.json.items.195.description: An incredibly sharp stone in the shape of a drilling head.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.196.name: Dry Fin
assets/data/item-database.json.items.196.description: Tail bone of a \v[combat.name.heat.sandshark] which is more fragile than one might think.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.197.name: Squishy Teeth
assets/data/item-database.json.items.197.description: A tooth that is soft to the touch. Truly uncanny.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.198.name: Hardened Liver
assets/data/item-database.json.items.198.description: Despite its name this liver is free of any strange substances.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.199.name: Phoenix Feather
assets/data/item-database.json.items.199.description: Does not cure death despite popular belief. But it does look nice.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.200.name: Butter Silk
assets/data/item-database.json.items.200.description: Yellow silk used to craft nigh-impenetrable yarn.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.201.name: Jelly Extract
assets/data/item-database.json.items.201.description: No matter how you stretch it, the shape of a triangle persists.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.202.name: Magma Residue
assets/data/item-database.json.items.202.description: Left by the extreme heat a \v[combat.name.heat.heat-golem] creates when attacking.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.203.name: Laser Eyes
assets/data/item-database.json.items.203.description: A crystal ball that is said to grant the feat to shoot rays of light.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.204.name: Steel Goggles
assets/data/item-database.json.items.204.description: Steel frames with reinforced glasses allow for an excellent protection of the eyes.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.205.name: Steel Edge
assets/data/item-database.json.items.205.description: A powerful weapon crafted from a highly tempered alloy of iron and carbon.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.206.name: Steel Mail
assets/data/item-database.json.items.206.description: Fine body armor from reinforced steel. Sadly also popular with criminals.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.207.name: Steel Boots
assets/data/item-database.json.items.207.description: Very robust but still as light as possible. Even blisters are a rare occurrence.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.208.name: Fin Cap
assets/data/item-database.json.items.208.description: A huge fin attached to a cap. Helps to keep balance and grants a predatory aura.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.209.name: Rapier Carrot
assets/data/item-database.json.items.209.description: A long, self-regrowing carrot. Its vitamins give life, the pointy end takes it away.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.210.name: Dessert Vest
assets/data/item-database.json.items.210.description: A lacquered vest, often worn in dry regions. Was named for its sweet smell.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.211.name: Desert Sandals
assets/data/item-database.json.items.211.description: Can't be made without Sand, so they're obviously ideal for the desert.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.212.name: Nomadic Turban
assets/data/item-database.json.items.212.description: Typical headdress of hunters in the desert who are said to be excellent marksmen.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.213.name: Chilling Veil
assets/data/item-database.json.items.213.description: A fine headscarf blessed with cooling protection to withstand even scorching heat.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.214.name: Shiny Glasses
assets/data/item-database.json.items.214.description: Polished glasses that give off a threatening glare. In need of regular readjustment.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.215.name: Magic Robe
assets/data/item-database.json.items.215.description: Shad-crafted flowing robes, blessed by the Ancient power of the elements.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.216.name: Assassin Garb
assets/data/item-database.json.items.216.description: Light clothes for covert operations that are made to look strikingly inconspicuous.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.217.name: Crystal Plate
assets/data/item-database.json.items.217.description: Heavy plate, reinforced with crystals and gems that actively defend against harm.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.218.name: Curly Slippers
assets/data/item-database.json.items.218.description: Amazingly soft and comfortable footwear that somehow also manages to be curly.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.219.name: Lavish Anchors
assets/data/item-database.json.items.219.description: Heavy boots with extravagant decorations. Reinforce both stance and self-esteem.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.220.name: Carpet Runners
assets/data/item-database.json.items.220.description: Feel almost alive on your feet. The soles are crafted from real magic carpets.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.221.name: Hidden Blade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.221.description: Small, surprising and deadly. The preferred weapon of spies and assassins.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.222.name: Maverick Edge
assets/data/item-database.json.items.222.description: Once wielded by a young hero of great courage but little sense.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.223.name: Western Starfist
assets/data/item-database.json.items.223.description: Gauntlets with excellent armor. Many owners would already be dead without them.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.224.name: Bergen Probe
assets/data/item-database.json.items.224.description: A lost and found data probe installed by Henry the Researcher.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.225.name: Blue Ice Shade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.225.description: Opens the passage to \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] and activates \c[3]Neutral Level 2 Circuits\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.226.name: Steak, rare
assets/data/item-database.json.items.226.description: A fine, lightly cooked piece of meat that is supposedly not very common.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.227.name: Stone of Space
assets/data/item-database.json.items.227.description: One of the \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0]. Emits strange sparks when touched.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.228.name: Thief's Band
assets/data/item-database.json.items.228.description: Just wearing this band will make enemies drop more Credits in fear.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.229.name: Mighty Strand
assets/data/item-database.json.items.229.description: Once used to train a young warrior aiming to be an all mighty hero.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.230.name: Red Flame Shade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.230.description: Opens the path to \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] and activates \c[3]Elemental Level 2 Circuits\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.231.name: Purple Bolt Shade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.231.description: Grants passage to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] together with the Azure Drop Shade.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.232.name: -ModifierTester
assets/data/item-database.json.items.233.name: Meister Gloves
assets/data/item-database.json.items.233.description: Worn and old gloves once belonging to a master of parries.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.234.name: Aspiration Proof
assets/data/item-database.json.items.234.description: Some old looking image of a Frobbit, hewn into stone from Mt. Bergen.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.235.name: Wooly Socks
assets/data/item-database.json.items.235.description: Soft and warming socks, hand-knitted from healthy goat-wool by very patient monks.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.236.name: Maroon Cave Pass
assets/data/item-database.json.items.236.description: Pass to access the sacred cave below the \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.237.name: Shiny Orb
assets/data/item-database.json.items.237.description: A shiny orb that is indeed very shiny. The statue in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] should react to it.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.238.name: Laser Pickaxe
assets/data/item-database.json.items.238.description: A highly advanced mining tool based on an age old classic.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.239.name: Laser TNT
assets/data/item-database.json.items.239.description: Conventional chemical explosives combined with lasers. What could be stronger?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.240.name: Mining Docs
assets/data/item-database.json.items.240.description: A long documentation describing the workings of the mine, complete in 70 languages.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.241.name: Parched Leaves
assets/data/item-database.json.items.241.description: Leaves covered with strange markings resembling animals.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.242.name: Ripe Apples
assets/data/item-database.json.items.242.description: These sweet apples are commonly used in juicy fruit salads.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.243.name: White Grain
assets/data/item-database.json.items.243.description: Pure grain found near ruins all over Autumn's Fall.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.244.name: Sunset Dew
assets/data/item-database.json.items.244.description: Minerals found inside this dew make it appear orange when held against light.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.245.name: Wolf Cicada
assets/data/item-database.json.items.245.description: A legendary autumn bug. Its melody resembles that of a howling wolf.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.246.name: Crimson Dragonfly
assets/data/item-database.json.items.246.description: These creatures only appear at night, sparkling dark red.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.247.name: -Nirustein
assets/data/item-database.json.items.247.description: The ultimate speedrunning item. Aim to become the fastest thing alive!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.248.name: Flintzer Excretions
assets/data/item-database.json.items.248.description: Weird lump of mass secreted by Flintzer. Is usually very soft but hardens on touch.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.249.name: Curly Farn
assets/data/item-database.json.items.249.description: This leaf fell from a jungle plant and curled up on the ground.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.250.name: Steel Comb
assets/data/item-database.json.items.250.description: The honeycomb is so sturdy that it is used to craft armor.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.251.name: Elder Wood
assets/data/item-database.json.items.251.description: A piece of wood from the oldest trees found in the jungle.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.252.name: Venom Shroom
assets/data/item-database.json.items.252.description: Poisoned mushroom used to brew oils for weapons.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.253.name: Glowing Sphere
assets/data/item-database.json.items.253.description: A luminescent sphere glowing because of chemical reactions inside it.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.254.name: Virus Root
assets/data/item-database.json.items.254.description: One of the roots responsible for the Infestation of a part of \v[area.jungle.name].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.255.name: Blue Mango
assets/data/item-database.json.items.255.description: The bluish color of this fruit makes it look inedible despite its sweet taste.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.256.name: Exotic Resin
assets/data/item-database.json.items.256.description: This colorful resin is commonly used to harden wood constructions.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.257.name: Star Fruit
assets/data/item-database.json.items.257.description: Star-shaped fruit. Its origin dates back to a small island in the ocean.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.258.name: Common Planter
assets/data/item-database.json.items.258.description: This fish jumps out of rivers into plants to absorb healthy nutrients.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.259.name: Spiky Nut
assets/data/item-database.json.items.259.description: \v[combat.name.jungle/parrot]s store these in nearby water plants in case they need food.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.260.name: Moon Fruit
assets/data/item-database.json.items.260.description: A yellow bent fruit only found in rainy parts of \v[area.jungle.name].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.261.name: Galaxy Berry
assets/data/item-database.json.items.261.description: Strange shimmering fruit. The inside seems to magically spin.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.262.name: Royal Hive
assets/data/item-database.json.items.262.description: A special bee hive with the same density as a diamond.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.263.name: Progression Proof
assets/data/item-database.json.items.263.description: Some old looking image of a PengPeng, hewn into ice-coated stone from Mt. Bergen.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.264.name: Silver Goggles
assets/data/item-database.json.items.264.description: Both silver frames and the flawless glass are giving off an impressive shine.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.265.name: Titan Goggles
assets/data/item-database.json.items.265.description: Very durable goggles that also offer visual augmentation.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.266.name: Silver Edge
assets/data/item-database.json.items.266.description: Said to be effective against the unnatural. Works just fine against everything though.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.267.name: Titan Edge
assets/data/item-database.json.items.267.description: With two of these powerful weapons you could slay even the largest of foes.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.268.name: Silver Mail
assets/data/item-database.json.items.268.description: A sturdy mail, made from silver. Perfect when sleeping in a haunted castle.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.269.name: Titan Mail
assets/data/item-database.json.items.269.description: Made from titanium, one of the strongest materials known to man.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.270.name: Silver Boots
assets/data/item-database.json.items.270.description: The quality of these boots almost makes up for all the polishing they need.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.271.name: Titan Boots
assets/data/item-database.json.items.271.description: While extremely robust, they are not actually made for titans, so they will fit just fine.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.272.name: Zir'vitar Key
assets/data/item-database.json.items.273.name: GIT
assets/data/item-database.json.items.273.description: Goat Interspecies Translator. Allows for communication with intelligent goats.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.274.name: Static Furball
assets/data/item-database.json.items.274.description: A really soft ball of fur close to the critical mass.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.275.name: Slime Drop
assets/data/item-database.json.items.275.description: The classic. Probably want to keep that in a jar.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.276.name: Palette Blossom
assets/data/item-database.json.items.276.description: This leaf can be used to create all possible colors. In a range of 0-255 that is.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.277.name: Huge Nut
assets/data/item-database.json.items.277.description: Spit out by Papaguns as defensive measures. Can only be busted with strong pliers.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.278.name: Lazy Claw
assets/data/item-database.json.items.278.description: This callous claw is in need of a thorough manicure.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.279.name: Stout Backplate
assets/data/item-database.json.items.279.description: Impenetrable plate used by Behesloths to protect most of their body.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.280.name: Power Spinach
assets/data/item-database.json.items.280.description: A vegetable of mythical power. Greatly increases the flexibility of fellow plants.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.281.name: Living Bolt
assets/data/item-database.json.items.281.description: A mass of electricity with something that some describe as a "soul".
assets/data/item-database.json.items.282.name: Metal Down
assets/data/item-database.json.items.282.description: Are 100 grams of them as heavy as 100 grams of regular feathers? It's a mystery.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.283.name: Plain Cube
assets/data/item-database.json.items.283.description: Perfectly rectangular shaped cube. There is nothing unusual about it.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.284.name: Glow Pear
assets/data/item-database.json.items.284.description: A glowing bulb in the form of a pear. Yepp.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.285.name: Disc of Flora
assets/data/item-database.json.items.285.description: A truly perfect guide for the exquisite plant lover.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.286.name: Azure Drop Shade
assets/data/item-database.json.items.286.description: Grants passage to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] together with the Purple Bolt Shade.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.287.name: Strawhat
assets/data/item-database.json.items.287.description: This inconspicuous hat enables the wearer to find even the rarest materials.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.288.name: Gaia Temple Pass
assets/data/item-database.json.items.288.description: Pass to provide access to the \c[3]temple complex within \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.289.name: Prime Pistachios
assets/data/item-database.json.items.289.description: Surprisingly big variant of a tasty nut. Opening the shell is half of the fun!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.290.name: Salted Peanuts
assets/data/item-database.json.items.290.description: Small, tasty plant seeds that are popular as a relaxing snack.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.291.name: Cup o' Coffee
assets/data/item-database.json.items.291.description: A classic wake-up drink. Drink it black to also feel more mature!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.292.name: Energy Espresso
assets/data/item-database.json.items.292.description: Highly-concentrated coffee with a distinct taste. Will eliminate all sleepiness.

assets/data/item-database.json.items.315.description: The favorite dish of poets and philosophers.

assets/data/item-database.json.items.318.description: Will turn into something tasty in the future! #notabug

assets/data/item-database.json.items.467.description: An upgraded version of the \c[3]\v[item.287.name]\c[0]. It's bigger and better.

assets/data/item-database.json.items.468.description: An upgraded version of the \c[3]\v[item.467.name]\c[0]. It's red and smells sweet.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.469.name: The Last Strawhat
assets/data/item-database.json.items.469.description: The last upgrade. The ultimate strawhat, vastly increasing your focus.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.470.name: Climate Cowl

assets/data/item-database.json.items.471.name: Serene Bubble

assets/data/item-database.json.items.472.name: Furious Hothead
assets/data/item-database.json.items.472.description: Headgear that empowers its user with powerful generators while creating heat.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.473.name: Trackwalker Visor
assets/data/item-database.json.items.473.description: State-of-the-art visor that was custom-tailored to the needs of Trackwalker expeditions.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.474.name: Skirmisher
assets/data/item-database.json.items.474.description: Fast weapon that performs exceptionally with hit and run tactics.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.475.name: Unbreaking Fist
assets/data/item-database.json.items.475.description: This huge fist was created from the hardest materials and is said to be indestructible.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.476.name: Golden Falcon
assets/data/item-database.json.items.476.description: A long-ranged weapon, perfectly refined to destroy targets far, far away.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.477.name: Zealous Lamellar
assets/data/item-database.json.items.477.description: Light armor, composed of various materials, each representing a warrior's virtue.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.478.name: Pioneer Vest

assets/data/item-database.json.items.479.name: Reactive Plate
assets/data/item-database.json.items.479.description: Highly advanced heavy plate armor that repels hits with explosive force.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.480.name: Vermillion Mantle
assets/data/item-database.json.items.480.description: Wide garment, dyed in an unsettling reddish color. Emits a weird kind of energy.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.481.name: Deadly Dancers
assets/data/item-database.json.items.481.description: Elegant shoes favored by agile gunslingers. Allow for fast movement in firefights.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.482.name: Praetorian Anchors

assets/data/item-database.json.items.483.name: Mistwalkers
assets/data/item-database.json.items.483.description: Almost weightless boots that are often used by skilled agents, only known from stories.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.484.name: Geta Wood

assets/data/item-database.json.items.486.name: Geta Glue
assets/data/item-database.json.items.486.description: A strange mixture made from honey and tree sap.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.487.name: Golden Satchel
assets/data/item-database.json.items.487.description: A satchel with golden coins in it. It should be worth something.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.488.name: Golden Bars
assets/data/item-database.json.items.488.description: A stack of golden bars. They should be worth quite a lot.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.489.name: Golden Ticket
assets/data/item-database.json.items.489.description: A golden ticket to some good company. It fetches a very high price.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.490.name: Dk Pepper

assets/data/item-database.json.items.491.description: Traditional Swabian "Spaetzle" noodles with fried onions and grated cheese.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.492.name: - Maultasche OLD
assets/data/item-database.json.items.492.description: The favorite dish of poets and philosophers. \c[1]UNUSED\c[0]
assets/data/item-database.json.items.493.name: Durian
assets/data/item-database.json.items.493.description: The One True King of the Fruits! \c[2]Heals 50% of max HP\c[0].
assets/data/item-database.json.items.494.name: PengoPop
assets/data/item-database.json.items.494.description: Something that looks vaguely like a blue penguin.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.495.name: Spicy Beat-0-Type
assets/data/item-database.json.items.495.description: A tiny pulsing globe. Be careful not to "go faster than the music".
assets/data/item-database.json.items.496.name: - Werewolf Stick OLD
assets/data/item-database.json.items.496.description: A Popsicle depicting a werewolf on a stick. \c[1]UNUSED\c[0]
assets/data/item-database.json.items.497.name: Old Blueprint
assets/data/item-database.json.items.497.description: A blueprint of something that looks like a... shoe?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.498.name: Kunoichi
assets/data/item-database.json.items.498.description: Run like a Ninja? Now you can look like one too!
assets/data/item-database.json.items.499.name: Antique Token
assets/data/item-database.json.items.499.description: An ancient coin-like token that bears images of primitive humans from old times.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.500.name: Radiant Bracer
assets/data/item-database.json.items.500.description: Highly empowered arm protection that can manipulate the aura of everything around it.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.501.name: Chest Detector
assets/data/item-database.json.items.501.description: Emits an impulse when entering a room that contains an unopened chest.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.502.name: Moistured Line
assets/data/item-database.json.items.502.description: A long, resilient line that shows signs of watery influence.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.503.name: Trash
assets/data/item-database.json.items.503.description: Why did you pick that up?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.504.name: Thrashing Ripper
assets/data/item-database.json.items.504.description: Barely controllable, formless weapon that seems to exist in several places at once.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.505.name: Rusty Hook
assets/data/item-database.json.items.505.description: A long, jagged hook that is covered in rust. Is it treasure or just bait?
assets/data/item-database.json.items.506.name: Gorgon Veil
assets/data/item-database.json.items.506.description: Based on a mythical beast, this veil grants adeptness in slowly weakening foes.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.507.name: Centaur Vest
assets/data/item-database.json.items.507.description: Based on a mythical beast, this vest grants exceptional aim on the move.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.508.name: Unicorn Greaves
assets/data/item-database.json.items.508.description: Based on a mythical beast, these boots grant inhuman speed and endurance.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.509.name: Chestlink
assets/data/item-database.json.items.509.description: Used to unify chests of all different material, forms and sizes into multi-purpose chests.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.510.name: Lifefiber Uniform
assets/data/item-database.json.items.510.description: Dress spun from living thread that forms a nigh symbiontic relationship with its wearer.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.511.name: Infinity+1 Bag
assets/data/item-database.json.items.511.description: This container transcends infinity and can preserve anything until the end of time.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.512.name: Mantis Whip
assets/data/item-database.json.items.512.description: Long, flexible blade that is nigh-invisible and can lash out in an instant.
assets/data/item-database.json.items.513.name: - Nanopoint Needle
assets/data/item-database.json.items.513.description: Pierces everything on a good hit. \c[1]UNUSED in 1.0.\c[0]
