assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.gamepad-box.info-text:
You can play CrossCode with any X-Input compatible gamepad.
What to do:
1. Connect your gamepad
2. Press any button (not the analogue sticks)
If you read 'connected' next to the gamepad symbol, your gamepad should work!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.quick-menu.description.analyze: Analyze the the enemies on the field.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.quick-menu.strategy.description.T: Party members will focus enemies as they please.
Party members will focus the same enemy as you.
Party members will focus enemies you are not attacking.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.quick-menu.strategy.description.B: Party members will use an aggressive playstyle.
Party members will stay back and focus defensive maneuvers.
Party members will stay far away and do nothing.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.quick-menu.strategy.description.A: Party members will use combat arts at a normal interval.
Party members will use combat arts as much as possible.
Party members will never use any combat arts.
Your party members will take action as they see fit.
Your party members will focus the same enemy as you.
Your party members will stay back and focus on defending/evading attacks.
Your Party members will do absolutely nothing and stay back.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.quick-menu.noData: Insufficient Data! Fight against this enemy to reveal more information.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.shop.leaveWithCartItems: Items are in your cart. Still return?
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.rhombus.help: \i[help-icon]Select a location on the map you like to travel too!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.hub.description.rate: Shows how much of the quests available at this Bulletin Board have been finished. This does not count hidden quests.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.hub.description.availab: Shows the number of quests currently available in the surrounding areas. Come back from time to time to find new quests.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.trophy.description.rate: Shows how much trophies are unlocked as a percentage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.trophy.description.poin: Shows the total number of trophy points acquired.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.equip.colorDesc.green: Indicates that the levels are well aligned.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.equip.colorDesc.white: Indicates that the levels are aligned good enough.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.equip.colorDesc.orange: Indicates that the levels are not well aligned.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.equip.colorDesc.red: Indicates that the levels are badly aligned, which could lead to problems when fighting enemies of a similiar level.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.hp: Shows you your current and Max HP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.sp: Shows you your current and Max SP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.exp: Shows how much more experience you need for a level up.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.buffs: A list of all your active buffs.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.favs: You favorite consumables. Add one to see its name and description here.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.item.description.avail: Shows where your commonly find a trade item.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.status.description.elem: Values below are displayed for the element shown here. See the manual to see how to switch between elements.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.status.description.page: Name of the current Page. See the manual to see how to switch between pages.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.level: Shows the suggested level for you to be to do this quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.type: Quests with a red exclamation mark are much more difficult but reap better rewards and challenges.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.conte: Display the tasks you have already finished and the one you currently have to completed. The 3 dots show that more tasks have been finished and can be checked int the detailed view.
Displays all tasks for the quest in a scrollable view.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.locat: This shows where you started the quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.owner: Shows you the name and image of the quest giver.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.quest.description.rewar: A list of rewards you can obtain for finishing the quest. Entries with a question mark are revealed once the the quest is completed too.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.circuit.description.poi: An overview over the points you have available for each element tree.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.circuit.description.bra: Shows the skills on one side of a skill branch. The arrows shows which skills are swapped.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.social.description.equi: The equipment of the selected friend. They will automatically upgrade when visiting shops.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.synopsis.description.ob: You current objective. This is tied to your story progress. Check back if you ever get lost.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.synopsis.description.qu: Shows the current marked quest and the current task for the quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.synopsis.description.ac: Displays your latest activities, such as quest tasks, new encyclopedia entries and more.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.map.description.chest: Shows you the amount of chests left to find in this area.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.map.description.stamps: Shows you the amount of stamps set by yourself as well the maximum per area.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.lore.description.type: This displays the type of the lore entry. Note that some entries can still be uncompleted as indicated by the percentage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.lore.description.conten: The content of the entry. Unlocked more pages for an entry by exploring the world!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.trader.description.info: Displays the trader and the location to find him.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.trader.description.cont: Shows what items are needed to acquire this item. Current owned items are shown in brackets.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.trader.description.mone: Find the fee you need to pay for the trade here.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.type: The type of the enemy as indicated by the tab. Golden ones are bosses and have a special tab.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.res: Shows the elemental resistance of the selected enemy. The lower the value the more damage you do with the shown element.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.view: Displays the enemy. Maybe if you wait, you can see them do something special? Below the display you can find the EXP and Credit gained be defeating an enemy.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.rewar: Shows you the items you can get by defeating this enemy, including the rank needed. To unveil the name of the item you only need to have at least found one of it.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.maxhp: Maximum amount of Health Points for the selected enemy.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.atk: Attack power of the selected enemy.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.def: Defensive power of the selected enemy.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.enemy.description.foc: Focus of the selected enemy. Determines how often it deals critical hits.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help.botanics.description.in: After analyzing an object long enough by collecting its drop you find the location and drop chances for them here.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.name: Name
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.level: Sorty the list by item level. Highest first.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.auto: Sorts the list by a natural order.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.area: Sorts the list by the area the enemy is found in.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.enemyLevel: Sorts the list based on the level of the enemies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.unlocked: Sorts the list by unlocked entries. Unlocked Entries are sorted by \c[3]Auto\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.name: Sorts the list by the item's names.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.amount: Sorts the list based on the amount of each item.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.rarity: Sorts the list based on the rarity of each item.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.questLevel: Sorts the list based on the level of the quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.questAccepted: Sorts the list based on the time or date you accepted the quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.hp: Sorts the list by the hp stat of the equipment.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.attack: Sorts the list by the attack stat of the equipment.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.defense: Sorts the list by the defense stat of the equipment.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.focus: Sorts the list by the focus stat of the equipment.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.status: Sorts the list by the online status and if the player is in your party.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.socialLevel: Sorts the list by the level of the contacts.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.invite: Invite the player to join your party.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.inviteFull: Can't invite because party is full.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.locked: Cannot be added or removed right now.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.remove: Remove the player from your current party.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.contact: Contact or leave a voice message for the player via Direct Link.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.trader: Sorts the traders by the order you found them. Newest first.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.botanics: Sorts the plants by the order you found them. Newest first.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.botanicsName: Sorts the list by the plant's names.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.featLock: Sorts the list by unlocked trophies first.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.featName: Sorts the list by the name of the Trophies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.sort.des.featPoints: Sorts the list by the amount of points you can get, highest first.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.items: Browse through your items and use consumables.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.skills: Upgrade your abilities by activating nodes on the circuit boards.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.equipment: Equip items to enhance your battle stats.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.status: Check your Status, including all Skills, Modifiers and Equipment.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.synopsis: See all the things you found and experienced in CrossWorlds.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.map: Take a look at your current location and use the Teleport-System.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.quests: Take a look at all active and completed quests.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.options: Change the options to fit your play style.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.description.social: Add, remove or just interact with your friends and contacts.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.head: head
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.levels:
Displays the current player- and average equipment level.
 - Green: Levels are aligned.
 -White: Levels are okay
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.maxhp: Maximum amount of Health Points. Determines the damage you can survive and the efficiency of regeneration.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.atk: Increases the damage of your attacks. The higher the number, the more damage can be inflicted.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.def: Reduces the damage you take from hostile attacks and increases the power of your shield.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.foc: Determines the probability of critical hits, your SP gain, status conditions rate and invincibility while dashing.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.heat: Resistance against the heat element. The higher the number the less damage you take from heat attacks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.cold: Resistance against the cold element. The higher the number the less damage you take from cold attacks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.shock: Resistance against the shock element. The higher the number the less damage you take from shock attacks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.wave: Resistance against the wave element. The higher the number the less damage you take from wave attacks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.ITEM_GUAR: Using Items cannot be stopped by any attacks. However you can still suffer damage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.SP_REGEN: Increases SP regeneration of any form.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.MELEE_DMG: Increases damage done by close combat attacks, including Melee Combat Arts.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.AIM_SPEED: Increases the speed of getting precise aiming.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.XP_ZERO: Disables exp gain from quests or defeating enemies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.XP_PLUS: Increases amount of experience gained from defeating enemies
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.RANGED_DM: Increases damage done by ranged attacks, including Throw Combat Arts.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.KNOCKBACK: Increases knockback from charged shots on enemies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.ASSAULT: Fires additional projectiles when using melee attacks with a fraction of the attacks strength.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.DASH_INVI: Increases the duration of invincibility when dashing.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.STUN_THRE: Increases knockback resistance to weak attacks, depending on your MaxHP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.HP_REGEN: Regenerates given percentage of HP over 10 seconds of combat. Healing frequency increases with higher percentage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.DROP_CHAN: Increases drop rate for items from enemies and environmental objects.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.GUARD_STR: Strengthens your shield and decreases the damage taken while guarding.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.ITEM_BOOS: Increases the effect of healing items and duration of buff items.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.OVERHEAT_: Slows down Overload while using an element.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.AIM_STABI: Decreases the loss of aim from quick aim movement and dashes.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.SPIKE_DMG: Damages enemies that hit your shield, based on the absorbed damage and defense.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.AIMING_MO: Increases your movement speed while aiming.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.MONEY_PLU: Increases the amount of credits you get from defeating enemies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.CROSS_COU: Increases damage on attacking or charging enemies.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.ONCE_MORE: Survive exactly one attack that would normally kill you.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.PERFECT_G: Resets your perfect guard when landing a successful perfect guard.
Increases the time window for a perfect guard.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.GUARD_SP: Restores SP on guard based on the power of the attack. Double that for a perfect guard.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.RANK_PLAN: Combat Rank also increases the drop rate of items from environment objects.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.BREAK_DMG: Increase damage on enemies that are in stunned, weak or in break state.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.BERSERK: Increases damage dealt when at critical HP. (Below 33% of Max HP)
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.GUARD_ARE: Allows to guard against attacks from the side. Activate twice to shield attacks from above too.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.APPETITE: Increases numbers of available buff slots. Every step of 100 unlocks another one.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.COND_EFFE:
Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Burn\c[0] Condition and its effect. 
\c[3]Burn\c[0] causes damage over time, depending on the MaxHP of the victim.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Chill\c[0] Condition and its effect. 
\c[3]Chill\c[0] decreases the overall speed of the victim.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Jolt\c[0] Condition and its effect. 
\c[3]Jolt\c[0] causes damage and stuns in short intervals.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Mark\c[0] Condition and its effect. 
\c[3]Mark\c[0] increases the received ranged damage by 50%.
Increases the speed of inflicting a \c[3]Status Condition\c[0] and its effect.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.COND_GUAR:
Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Burn\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect. 
\c[3]Burn\c[0] causes damage over time, depending on the MaxHP of the victim.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Chill\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect. 
\c[3]Chill\c[0] decreases the overall speed of the victim.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Jolt\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect. 
\c[3]Jolt\c[0] causes damage and stuns in short intervals.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Mark\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect. 
\c[3]Mark\c[0] increases the received ranged damage by 50%.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.COND_HEAL: Increases the recovery speed from negative status conditions.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.SPIDER_SL: Makes it possible to freely walk on the sticky webs created by the \v[combat.name.forest/spider].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.equip.descriptions.BEGONE_IC: Makes it possible to run and perform actions on ice without slipping.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.skill.shade: Find the [xyz] to break the chains and unlock more skills.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.skill.chain-des: Use \c[3]Activate All\c[0] to activate all previous skills and this one with sufficient CP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.skill.learn-prev: Activate previous nodes to see this one!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.item.head: Head
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.save-menu.delete-info-conten: Hover over a slot (except the auto save slot and the new save file slot) and press \i[help2] to delete the slot.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.save-menu.description-save: Select a slot to save to.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.save-menu.description-load: Select a slot to load from.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.m: Take a look at your current location and use the Teleport-System.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.q: Take a look at all active and completed quests.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.l: View a synopsis of the story so far or read about the lore of the game.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.t: Bask in the glory of your trophies and find new ones to accomplish.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.r: Admire a detailed record of your various stats and activities.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.i: Here you can find a detailed list of all items and where to find them.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.t: Look up the locations and offers of every trader you found so far.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.e: Find detailed information about all the enemies you have come across on your journey.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.m: Enjoy the things you have unlocked.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.h: Missed a description or a helpful hint? Find it in this section.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.synopsis-menu.descriptions.b: Look up all environment objects of CrossWorlds and what kind of items they can drop.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.enemy.killMore: Defeat \c[3][x]\c[0] more [y] to unlock this page!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.social.name: Name
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.streakKilled: Most Enemies Defeated in one Streak
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.finalStat: Total Number of Stats in this Menu
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.hiCount: Total Number of Times Lea said "Hi"
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.yawns: Total Number of Times Lea was bored
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.questActive: Max Number of Simultaneous Active Quests
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.rewardCp: Total Circuit Points gained through Quests
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.skillPoints: Total Number of Skill Points Used
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.stats.keys.randomNumber: Here is a Random Number for you
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.map-menu.popupDesc: Hover over any place you like to set a Stamp and press \i[help3] to set it. Stamps cannot be set close to other Stamps or Landmarks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.inventory.pages.0: This is where you can take a look at all your collected items or set certain consumables as your favorites.
Use \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right] to cycle through the categories or press on the tabs if you use the mouse.
The first tab shows the last items you have collected to keep an eye on all your loot!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.inventory.pages.1: Most consumables are \c[3]buffs used to aid you in battle\c[0]. Hovering over a consumable that is also a buff shows a little interface telling you what the item does in the \c[3]bottom left corner\c[0].

The symbols you see tell you what stat or modifier changes and how strong the stat is increased. While in the Help Screen, select the \c[3]UI in the bottom-left\c[0] to see what each of the symbols mean.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.inventory.pages.2: Add-Ons are helpful items or visual effects you can toggle on and off as your please!

Items in this category are grouped in \c[3]Sets\c[0]. In Sets with \c[3]round checkboxes, only one\c[0] of the items in the set can be active at the same time. \c[3]Square-shaped checkboxes\c[0] indicated a set where you can \c[3]toggle any item\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.inventory.title: \c[3]Inventory Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.inventory.text-2: Hover over an item in the Consumables Section and press \i[help2] to add it as a favorite
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.equip.title: \c[3]Equipment Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.equip.pages.0.con: In this menu you can equip your collected gear into 5 different slots.
Select a body part by clicking on one of the buttons. You can also use the mouse to click on the buttons in the center.
Additionally you can cycle through the body parts using \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] or \i[left] and \i[right].
Press \i[help2] to go directly to the status menu.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.equip.pages.1.con: Hovering over a piece of equipment shows the changes to your \c[3]status\c[0] on the left. Having already equipped an item will show how your parameters change when switching to another piece of gear.
\c[3]Modifiers\c[0] are shown below the status parameters. Press \i[help4] to expand the list if more modifiers are equipped or shown then fit into the list.
Use the \c[3]Status Menu's "Modifier"-List\c[0] to get a detailed description for each equipped modifier.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.circuit.title: \c[3]Circuit Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.circuit.pages.0.c: In this menu you can spend your collected \c[3]Cross Points (CP)\c[0] to unlock skills on the skill trees.
select one of the unlocked trees and press on it to enter the detailed view of the associated tree.
Scroll right to get more info on the detailed view that appears once you press on one of the trees.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.circuit.pages.1.c: Use \i[key-up]\i[key-left]\i[key-down]\i[key-right] or drag the mouse to move around the skill tree.
With the gamepad you can use \i[left-stick] to move the cursor around and \i[right-stick] to just move the camera.
Hover over a skill to see what it does and how many CP you need to activate it.

Note that in order to activate a skill you must first unlock its parent. Alternatively you can activate all parent skills provided you have enough CP. In that case the button will display the text \c[3]Activate All\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.circuit.pages.2.c: Notice the branches on some paths along the skill tree? Those always offer 2 ways and you can only walk on one of them.
However you can \c[3]switch between both paths at any time without spending any additional points\c[0] as long as you have a skill activated on one of the branch paths.
By pressing \i[help2] you can enter a special swap mode in the overview where you can quickly swap branches. Just select a panel and press it to swap the skills!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.circuit.pages.3.c: The aforementioned branches always contain at least one \c[3]Combat Art\c[0] on each way, which you can recognize by their \c[3]light-grey background\c[0].
Those Combat Arts are skills that don't increase your parameters but instead allow you to perform special abilities during combat, in exchange for \c[3]Special Points (SP)\c[0].
Combat Arts can greatly increase your chances in battle, so it is advised that you learn at least one of them as quickly as possible!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.title: \c[3]Map Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.pages.0.conte: Here you can check out your current location displayed as a \c[3]red box and white dotted lines\c[0], see how many treasures you have found and use the teleport system.
Use \i[key-up]\i[key-left]\i[key-down]\i[key-right] to move the camera or drag with the mouse. You can also use \i[left-stick] to move or \i[right-stick] to pan the camera with the gamepad.
Pressing \i[help3] places a custom \c[3]Stamp\c[0]. You can update the stamp by clicking on it or creating one.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.pages.1.title: \c[3]Map Menu\c[0] - Teleport System
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.pages.1.conte: Once a \c[3]Landmark\c[0] is activated it can be selected by hovering over the symbol \i[landmark] with the mouse or the gamepad cursor.
Clicking or pressing \i[gamepad-a] on the gamepad opens a confirmation dialog.
Selecting yes closes the menu and teleports Lea to the location of the landmark
If a landmark is greyed out it means it was blocked. (eg. because of Story progression) To access them, simply find them gain.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.pages.2.title: \c[3]Map Menu\c[0] - Worldmap
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.map.pages.2.conte: Pressing \i[help2] opens or closes the worldmap of CrossWorlds. In this menu you can select an area you have already visited.
Hovering over an area reveals the name, a short description and the chests found in the area.
Clicking or pressing \i[gamepad-a] on the gamepad displays the maps of the area. Here you can use the teleport system to warp you to landmarks you activated in the selected area.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.options.title: \c[3]Options Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.options.pages.0.c: In this menu you can change various settings to customize your game experience. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through the tabs.
Some options might require a restart. Options like these are \c[3]marked with a red information text.\c[0]
Options are saved as soon as you leave the main menu.
Use \i[help2] to reset all settings back to default. This will also reset all your key bindings.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.synopsis.title: \c[3]Records Menu\c[0]
This menu features a wide array of information about all your quests, stats and achievements!
On the left side you can a see a quick summary including your \c[3]current task\c[0] and your \c[3]latest activities.\c[0]
To see more activities go the \c[3]Activity Log\c[0] Tab in the Statistics Menu.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.quests.title: \c[3]Quest Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.quests.pages.0.co: In this menu you can watch all your active and finished quests.
Cycle through the tabs using \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right].
Selecting a quest shows you a quick summary including the latest fulfilled tasks and description.
Pressing on a quest opens the \c[3]Detail View\c[0]. This menu gives you a more precise look at a quest.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.quests.pages.1.co: Pressing \i[help2] while hovering over a quest in the active section marks it as favorite quest. Pressing \i[help2] on a marked quest un-favorites it.
Favorite quests are highlighted outside the menu in the top-right corner of the screen.
You can change between them outside the menu by using \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right] on the keyboard or by pressing \i[left-stick] and \i[right-stick] on the gamepad.
You will only cycle through the ones you marked as favorite.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.quests.pages.2.co: A quest can have up to 4 sub quests.
In case such a quests is activated, all sub quests are indented below the parent quest when the \c[3]Data\c[0] or \c[3]Auto\c[0] Sorting is active. This way you always know where a sub quest belongs.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.quests.text-2:
Hover over a quest in the Active Quest Section and press \i[help2] to set it as a favorite! 

Do the same on a faved quest to un-favorite it.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.shop.title: \c[3]Shop Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.shop.pages.0.cont: In this menu you can buy items or sell them if you don't need them.
Use \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right] to cycle through the categories or press on the tabs if you use the mouse.
Press on an item to select the quantity you want to buy. You can use the \i[up]\i[left]\i[down]\i[right] to change the amount.
Press \i[help2] to open the checkout view when you have at least one item in your cart. Once you sure you want to buy or sell the selected items, press Buy/Sell to confirm.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.shop.pages.1.cont: When an item is selected you can use \i[left] and \i[right] to de- or increase the number by one directly.
Some vendors might only have one category from which you can buy items. This is indicated by the grey buttons next to the category name.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.save.title: \c[3]Save Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.save.pages.0.cont: In this menu you can save your progress and see all the save files you have created.
Scroll through the save slots using \i[mousewheel] with the mouse or the direction buttons on the gamepad.
Click on a slot or press \i[gamepad-a] on the gamepad to save the game on the selected slot.
Press \i[help3] to create \c[3]a new save file\c[0] or \i[help2] to \c[3]delte a save file\c[0] by hovering over a slot.
You can also use the first entry in the list to create a new save file.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.save.pages.1.cont: A single save file displays some basic information about you progress:
--\c[3]Chapter\c[0]:-- Reflects your story progress via the chapter you are in and a small graphic.
--\c[3]Level\c[0]:-- The level you have on this save file.
--\c[3]Location\c[0]:-- The area and map you saved in.
--\c[3]Element\c[0]:-- The elements you have on this save file.
--\c[3]Version\c[0]:-- Displayed next to Leas head. Reflects the version of the save file in contrast to the current game version.
--\c[3]Playtime\c[0]:-- The play time of this save file.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.load.title: \c[3]Load Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.load.pages.0.cont: In this menu you can load a save file and start where you left.
Scroll through the save slots using \i[mousewheel] with the mouse or the direction buttons on the gamepad.
Click on a slot or press \i[gamepad-a] on the gamepad to load the save file on the selected slot.
Press \i[help2] to \c[3] delete a save file\c[0] by hovering over a slot.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.load.pages.1.cont: A single save file displays some basic information about you progress:
--\c[3]Chapter\c[0]:-- Reflects your story progress via the chapter you are in and a small graphic.
--\c[3]Level\c[0]:-- The level you have on this save file.
--\c[3]Element\c[0]:-- The elements you have on this save file.
--\c[3]Location\c[0]:-- The area and map you saved in.
--\c[3]Version\c[0]:-- Displayed next to Leas head. Reflects the version of the save file in contrast to the current game version.
--\c[3]Playtime\c[0]:-- The play time of this save file.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.lore.title: \c[3]Encyclopedia\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.lore.pages.0.cont: In this menu you can read about all the interesting topics you come across while exploring CrossWorlds.
Cycle through the tabs using \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right].
Select an entry to to highlight and scroll through its content.
You can also use \i[left] or \i[right] while hovering an entry to scroll through it directly. On gamepad using \i[right-stick] does the same.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.lore.pages.1.cont: There are multiple ways to unlock lore entries. You can either just talk to people or find more information about a topic by progressing the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0].
I added some extra code here for you, Lea. Next to the in-game categories I added one for your progress and one for characters.
I will insert those entries for you when they come along!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.enemy.title: \c[3]Monster Fibula\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.enemy.pages.0.con: In this menu you can find detailed information about every enemy you encounter.
Cycle through the tabs using \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right].
Select an entry to reveal the first page of the enemy and use \i[page-left] or \i[page-right] to switch pages.
If you find the tag "special" above the enemy view than that means you unlocked an enemy through a \c[3]special event or a quest\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.enemy.pages.1.con: Reports are unlocked by first defeating an enemy a certain amount of times.
They show useful information or trivia about the selected enemy.
This first page, including the species of the enemy, will always be unlocked.
Additional reports are unlocked through various tasks, such as defeating even more of enemy, solving quest, progressing the story and so on.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.traders.title: \c[3]Trader Book\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.traders.pages.0.c: This menu offers a log of every trader you met in each area.
Cycle through the tabs using \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right].
Select an entry to reveal a detailed overview over what items you need and how much it will cost you.
While the detail view is open you can still switch through tabs and select different items.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.title: \c[3]Status Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.pages.0.co: This menu gives you a detailed look at all your stats and parameters for all available elements.
Use \i[page-left] and \i[page-right] to switch through your elements.
To switch between the different views, use \i[circle-left] and \i[circle-right]. Available views are:
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.pages.1.co: As the name suggests the summary services as an overview over your equipment and stats.
The parameters shown on the left are your final parameters for the currently selected element, including equipment and skills.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.pages.2.co: This views displays your base parameters for the currently selected element.

For each parameter you can see how the final value comes together based of the \c[3]Base Value\c[0], the \c[3]Equipment\c[0] and finally the \c[3]Skill Additions\c[0] from the Circuits. The description shows the purpose of each parameter.
To see the absolute values of each step for the final value of a parameter press \i[help3].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.pages.3.co: This views displays all modifiers from your equipment and the currently selected element.

For each modifier you can see how the final value comes together based of your \c[3]Equipment\c[0] and the \c[3]Skill Additions\c[0] from the Circuits. The description shows the function of each modifier.
To see the absolute values of each step for the final value of a modifier press \i[help3].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.status.pages.4.co: This views displays all currently active combat arts seperated by type. (\c[3]Throw\c[0], \c[3]Melee\c[0], \c[3]Dash\c[0], \c[3]Guard\c[0])
Next to the name and description, each Art shows how many \c[3]SP\c[0] are consumed, the damage modifier and additional effects.
The damage type (displayed as DMG) highlights if the damage is either \c[3]Melee\c[0], \c[3]Ranged\c[0], \c[3]Mixed\c[0] or \c[3]None\c[0].
Effects show both the \c[3]Stun Type\c[0] and if the Art inflict a status condition. Stun Types can be the following:
--\c[3]\i[status-stun-1]Interrupt\c[0]:-- These Arts can interrupt enemy attacks.
--\c[3]\i[status-stun-2]Lock\c[0]:-- These Arts lock enemies in place until its finished.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.social.title: \c[3]Party Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.social.pages.0.co: In this menu you can invite/remove other players into your party or contact them.
Hover over a contact to get a closer look at the stats and equipment of the player.
Click on a slot or press \i[gamepad-a] on the gamepad to invite/remove the player.
This way you can also contact the player. Note that some players might not answer if they are not online.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.stats.title: \c[3]Statistics Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.stats.pages.0.con: This menu is a compilation of all your progress in numbers. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through the categories. To scroll through a category use the mouse wheel or \i[down] and \i[up].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.botanics.title: \c[3]Botanics Menu\c[0]
This menus lists all destructible environmental objects found in CrossWorlds. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through the areas.
Each object first needs to be analyzed, which is done by simply destroying them and collecting the drops.
Once \c[3]50% are analyzed\c[0] you can see the location of the object and once \c[3]100% is reach, all items the object can drop are revealed\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.trade.title: \c[3]Trade Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.trade.pages.0.con: Here you can trade your items against other items as long as you fulfil the requirements and have enough credits.
A trader can have multiple offers. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through them.
The values in \c[3]brackets show how many of the required items you have\c[0]. If the offer is a piece of equipment you can check the parameters on the left side.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.questHub.title: \c[3]Bulletion Board\c[0]
This menus lists all quests \c[3]available in the surrounding areas\c[0].
The 3 tabs show open, active and finished quests in that order. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through the tabs.
At the bottom you can see how many quests are currently available and your completion rate on this Bulletin Board.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.feat.title: \c[3]Trophy Menu\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.menu.help-texts.feat.pages.0.cont: This menus showcases all your accomplishments. You can also see what you need to do for to unlock a trophy, at least for most of them.
Trophies are separated by 3 categories: \c[3]General\c[0], \c[3]Combat\c[0] and \c[3]Exploration\c[0]. Use \i[circle-right] and \i[circle-left] to navigate through the tabs.
Each tab can have multiple sections. Click on one or use \i[left] or \i[right] to show the trophies within them.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.MAXHP:
Increases MaxHP by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
Determines how much HP you can have to survive damage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ATK:
Increases Attack by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
Increases the damage you can deal with your attacks.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.DEF:
Increases Defense by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
Decreases the damage you take and improves guarding.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.FOC:
Increases Focus by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
Determines frequency of critical hits and status effects, the time window for parry and dash invincibility and your SP Gain.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ALL_ELEMENT_R: Increases resistance to all Elements by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.RANGED_DAMAGE: Increases the damage of Ranged Attacks by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.CHARGED_KNOCK: Increases the knockback distance of charged projectiles by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.MELEE_DAMAGE: Increases the damage of Melee Attacks by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ASSAULT: Melee attacks fire additional small projectiles for \c[3][xyz]%\c[0] of the base damage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.CRITICAL_DAMA: Increases the damage of Critical Strikes by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.AIMING_SPEED: Decreases time needed to aim by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.AIMING_STABIL: Decreases the loss of aim from quick aim movement and dashes by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.AIMING_MOVEME: Increases your movement speed while aiming by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.DASH_DISTANCE: Prolongs the invincibility when dashing by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.GUARD_STRENGT: Strengthens your shield and decreases the damage taken when guarding by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ADDITIONAL_GU: Allows to guard against attacks \c[3]from the side\c[0]. Activate twice to guard attacks \c[3]from above\c[0] too.
Allows to guard against attacks \c[3]from above\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.STUN_THRESHOL: Increases the immunity to knockback from attacks by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0], depending on MaxHP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.STATUS_CONDIT:
Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Burn\c[0] Condition and its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Burn\c[0] causes damage over time, depending on the MaxHP of the victim.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Chill\c[0] Condition and its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Chill\c[0] decreases the overall speed of the victim.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Jolt\c[0] Condition and its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Jolt\c[0] causes damage and stuns in short intervals.

Increases the speed of inflicting the \c[3]Mark\c[0] Condition and its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Mark\c[0] increases the received ranged damage by 50%.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Burn\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Burn\c[0] causes damage over time, depending on the MaxHP of the victim.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Chill\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Chill\c[0] decreases the overall speed of the victim.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Jolt\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Jolt\c[0] causes damage and stuns in short intervals.

Increases the resistance against the \c[3]Mark\c[0] Condition and reduces its effect by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0]. 
\c[3]Mark\c[0] increases the received ranged damage by 50%.
Increases the recovery speed from all negative status conditions by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.HP_REGENERATI: Regenerates \c[3][xyz]%\c[0] of HP over 10 seconds of combat. Healing frequency increases with higher percentage.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.OVERHEAT_REDU: Slows down the Elemental Overload by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ITEM_BOOST: Increases the effect of healing and the duration of buffs from items by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.SPIKE_DAMAGE: When guarding, reflects \c[3][xyz]%\c[0] of the total absorbed damage back on the attacker.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.CROSS_COUNTER: Increases damage on enemies that are attacking or charging by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.BERSERKER: Increases Damage by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0] when at critical HP. (Below 33% of MaxHP)
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.BREAK_DMG: Increases Damage on enemies that are stunned, weak or in break state by \c[3][xyz]%\c[0].
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ONCE_MORE: Survive exactly \c[3]one attack\c[0] that would normally kill you.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.GUARD_SP: Restores SP on guard based on \c[3][xyz]%\c[0] of the attack's power. (\c[3]Double\c[0] for perfect guard)
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.skills.descriptions.ACTIVE_PLACEH: \c[3]Placeholder\c[0] for a Special Attack that can be learned in future versions.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.item-hud-size.name: Item HUD Size
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.item-hud-size.description: Changes the size of the item notification window.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-quest-style.name: Task Updates
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-quest-style.descri: Changes how completed tasks in quests are displayed.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-landmark-style.des: Changes how new landmarks are displayed when found.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-lore-style.name: Encyclopedia Updates
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-lore-style.descrip: Changes how new Encyclopedia entries are displayed when found.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-drop-style.name: Botanics Updates
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-drop-style.descrip: Changes how new Botanics completion is displayed when achieved.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-trophy-style.name: Trophy Updates
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.update-trophy-style.descr: Changes how new trophies are displayed when achieved.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.hp-bars.name: Party Status Bars
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.hp-bars.description: Change under which party members status bars are shown.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.party-combat-arts.name: Party Combat Arts
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.party-combat-arts.descrip: Change how Combat Arts execution is shown for party members.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.quick-menu-access.name: Quick Menu Access
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.quick-menu-access.descrip: The access style to toggle the quick menu.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.skip-confirm.name: Confirm Cutscene Skip
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.skip-confirm.description: Tick if skipping cutscenes should be confirmed.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.equip-level-display.name: Show Levels in Equipment
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.equip-level-display.descr: Enables the display in the equip menu which shows the player- and average equip level.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.level-letter-display.name: Show Level Symbol
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.level-letter-display.desc: Shows the Level Symbol next to the level of an equipment item.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.buff-help.name: Show Buff Help
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.buff-help.description: Shows a small help text when hovering consumables in the inventory.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.skip-tutorials.name: Skip Tutorials
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.skip-tutorials.descriptio: Tick if all optional tutorials should be skipped. \c[1]Not recommended for first playthrough!\c[0]
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.quest-show-current.name: Show Finished Tasks
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.quest-show-current.descri: Tick to show the task that was finished when a quest updates instead of the next task.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.min-sidebar.name: Small Right Sidebars
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.min-sidebar.description: Tick to make right sidebar smaller. Only works with a \c[3]Pixel Size\c[0] of 2 or higher.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.xeno-pointer.name: Show Dialog Pointer
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.xeno-pointer.description: Tick to show an effect if an NPC can be talked while text is above it.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.difficulty.name: Difficulty
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.difficulty.description: The difficulty of the game. TODO add better text
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.rumble-strength.name: Screen shake
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.rumble-strength.descripti: Changes the strength of screen shake effects.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.message-padding.name: Message Padding
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.message-padding.descripti: Changes the padding around texts in dialog bubbles/boxes.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.text-speed.name: Text Speed
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.text-speed.description: The speed at which text appears in dialogs and side messages.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-text-size.name: Circuit Info Box Size
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-text-size.descrip: The size of the info box when hovering over a skill node in the circuit menu.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-display-time.name: Circuit Info Display Time
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-display-time.desc: The time the info box stays after leaving focus on a node in the circuit menu.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.min-quest.name: Minimize Quest Window
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.min-quest.description: Displays only the name and progress of the quest in the favorite quest window.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-quick-change.name: Circuit Chain Activation
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.circuit-quick-change.desc: Allows to chain activate nodes in the circuit menu when selecting a node.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.hud-display.name: Display HUD
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.hud-display.description: Toggles the status display in the top left corner.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.close-circle.name: Show Melee Indicator
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.close-circle.description: Toggles the circle indicating the close combat range for mouse input.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.element-select.name: Show Element on Lea
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.element-select.descriptio: Toggles the current element display when switching elements on Lea.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.element-overload.name: Show Element Overload
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.element-overload.descript: Toggles the corner graphics indicating element overload.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.language.name: Language
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.language.description: The language of the game. \c[1]Parts of the game only in English right now! Needs a restart!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.low-health-warning.name: Show Low Health Warning
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.low-health-warning.descri: Toggles the corner graphics for low health.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.combat-art-name.name: Show Combat Art Name
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.combat-art-name.descripti: Toggles if the name of a combat art should be displayed above Lea when executed.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.sp-bar.name: Show SP Bar
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.sp-bar.description: Toggles if the SP bar should be shown when using Arts or recovering SP.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.damage-numbers.name: Show Damage Numbers
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.damage-numbers.descriptio: Toggles the damage numbers. This applies to healing numbers too.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.damage-numbers-crit.name: Show Only Criticals
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.damage-numbers-crit.descr: If selected only shows critical hit numbers. (Healing numbers are still displayed)
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.show-items.name: Show Item Notification
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.show-items.description: Toggles the item notification window when obtaining an item.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.show-money.name: Show Money Notification

assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.quick-location.descriptio: \c[3]Quick\c[0]: Show when in Quick menu. \c[3]Map\c[0]: Show when entering map. \c[3]Disable\c[0]: Never show.

assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.web-audio.description: Enables WebAudio for better sound quality and positioned sounds. \c[1]Needs a restart!

assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.options.close-combat-input.descri: Enables being able to click close to Lea to execute a melee attack.

assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.shakeit.pre: Can thee not seeth yond i am singing?
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.loading.trophyUpdate: Trophies have changed and we tried to make sure you got all the trophies you should have until this point.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.loading.skillUpdate: The Skill tree structure has changed, so we had to reset your skill configuration. Sorry! You can reassign your skills again.
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.loading.versionOutdated: This save file is outdated, bugs might occur. Use at own risk!
assets/data/lang/sc/gui.${LANG}.json.labels.loading.questUpdate: Some quests have changed. Those have been resetted. This means you might have to re-do some tasks or you get your rewards after you close this message.

assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.372.settings.event.9.message: And this... is the cliff side.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.372.settings.event.11.message: It's where you realize...\. that this place is actually pretty small.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.372.settings.event.13.message: And yes...\. there is indeed no exit.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.372.settings.event.15.message: Well actually...\. There is that one door just over here!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.372.settings.event.18.task: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Spiral Cliff\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
I have no idea where it leads but it's as close as it gets to an exit.
I didn't plan to end the tour on such a depressing note.
Actually, now that I think about it...\. there is one more thing I'd like to show you!
We'll have to run back all the way to the \c[3]East Town\c[0], though.
What? Is the old granny tired already?
Go back to \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - East Town\c[0] to conclude Lukas' tour.
You feel like this has happened before...
Do you to skip ahead to the Vermillion Dungeon?
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.23.message: How unexpected! Now I really wonder about the history of this location.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.25.message: There is time for that later, we need to hurry!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.75.message: Hey, is this that Sidwell guy?!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.82.message: You all should be perfectly aware that this area is off limits.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.83.message: Leave at once unless you want all your accounts to be suspended.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.85.message: Everyone, do not listen to him.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.86.message: He cannot risk reporting this through official channels!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.92.message: Your empty threats will not stop us!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.94.message: Oui! Nothing will turn us back now!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.98.message: So what is it you are after?\. The server?
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.99.message: It will be impossible for you to reach.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.100.message: And even if you did, its data will be lost before you get there.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.104.message: And then you'd lose the sole copy of every Evotar.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.108.message: The Evotarserver is your last hostage.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.109.message: A hostage you can't afford to lose!
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.113.message: You'd be wise not to overestimate my attachment to all of this.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.139.message: But I won't let you stroll around unhindered.
assets/data/maps/arid/cliff-1.json.entities.436.settings.event.160.message: The barrier is down! Time to split, everyone!

assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.14.message: Recruits, welcome to operation \c[3]Track Walker\c[0], subdivision \c[3]Project Red\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.15.message: Our goal is to explore and investigate the \c[3]Vermillion Wastelands\c[0] and find their connection to the track.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.25.message: Your first task is to inspect the southern \c[3]Trial Building\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.26.message: It's located in the \c[3]river delta\c[0] region to the \c[3]south\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.34.message: To gain access to the building, you need to locate and activate these \c[3]devices\c[0] in the same area.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.10.settings.event.14.message: Thank you for fulfilling your objective.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.10.settings.event.15.message: Please return to your room and rest for the day.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.11.settings.event.15.message: Today we don't have any particular task for you.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.11.settings.event.16.message: Feel free to explore the area and go back to your room if you want to rest.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.12.settings.event.14.message: Today we have a new mission for you.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.12.settings.event.24.message: Your task is to inspect the \c[3]northern Trial Building\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.12.settings.event.32.message: To gain access to the building, you need to locate and activate these devices in the \c[3]lake\c[0] and \c[3]forest\c[0] region to the \c[3]west\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.13.settings.event.14.message: Thank you for fulfilling your objective.
assets/data/maps/arid/expo-space.json.entities.13.settings.event.15.message: Please return to your room and rest for the day.

assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.9.message: Now we enter the realm of \c[3]Ebony Forest\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.10.message: As expected...\. it's full of trees.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.12.message: Yet there are no evil wolves in this forest. It's just viruses as always.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.14.message: Also no bugs. I'm sure Emilie would be glad to hear that.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.16.message: Seriously though.\. Emilie and her fear of bugs...\. I don't quite get it.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.17.message: She made such a huge deal out of the Faj'ro Temple boss. That giant moth, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.19.message: But when I asked her about the midboss...\. that antlion?\. No problem there!
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.21.message: Yeah apparently it's all good, because it's "slow" and "stuck in the sand".
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.22.message: Personally I thought the antlion was much higher on the scary scale.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.24.message: Right? Well, that's Emilie for you.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.30.message: Over there is a pretty interesting spot!
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.510.settings.event.34.task: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Ebony Forest\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
I call this here the \c[3]field of the indecisive flowers\c[0].
Indecisive because they can't decide to what height to grow.
I mean just look at them. Some are stuck on ground level, others several meters high.
Look, I can't even explain a lake to you, so what do you expect now?
Anyway those flowers are awfully convenient for an elaborate jumping path, don't you think?
I mean this wouldn't be CrossWorlds without unlikely jumping paths literally everywhere.
The only thing I'm missing here is the treasure chest to collect.
So I suppose we both can guess when those flowers will come into play.
Enough of this forest. Let's go back to the lake. There is one more location I want to show you.
Head back to \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.0.message: Is there really nothing else you'd like to do?
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.514.settings.event.0.message: Hah, told you we'd be jumping over these flowers.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.538.settings.blockEvent.4.messa: Come on, Lea. Let's call it a day.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.538.settings.blockEvent.5.messa: There's still time for the trial building tomorrow.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.541.settings.event.25.message: Enemies already?\. Let us enter the damn building first!
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.20.message: Honestly, I don't have a good feeling about this.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.21.message: There will probably be more high-level enemies in there.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.22.message: And with you being like this today...
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.24.message: Should we continue another time?\. There is no reason to rush this, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.27.message: It really would help if you'd respond... at all.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.28.message: I mean...\. I understand why you'd feel down in a situation like this.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.29.message: But...\. things don't have to stay that way.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.560.settings.event.30.message: I'm sure we'll find a way out.\. Out of this place...\. out of this game...
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.561.settings.event.6.message: Here we are. For real this time.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.561.settings.event.14.message: They might throw another high level enemy at us, so better keep your guard up.
assets/data/maps/arid/forest-1.json.entities.561.settings.event.16.message: Can't wait to see what kind of room they'll show us this time.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.27.settings.event.16.message: I see.\. Let's try to rest and meet up tomorrow. We'll see what happens.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.29.settings.event.6.message: Alright, guess that's all for today.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.37.settings.event.9.message: So...\. I guess this is where we split.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.37.settings.event.11.message: Will you be okay by yourself?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.38.settings.event.9.message: I hope you can still sleep well after you saw the nightmare that is my flat.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.38.settings.event.11.message: Make sure you're well rested for tomorrow.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.19.settings.event.15.message: Did you also hear the alarm from before?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.19.settings.event.16.message: I wonder what just happened. Sounded like somebody was fighting within the dormitory.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.19.settings.event.20.message: You don't look too well today...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.19.settings.event.25.message: Uhm...\. Should we just go the quest hub for today's quest?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/barrack-r.entities.19.settings.event.31.task: Go to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] together with Lukas.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.1.settings.destinations.0.label: Down
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.11.settings.event.17.message: Huh. It's a new kind of virus, I guess?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.20.settings.event.13.message:
Wait.\. Wait, wait, wait.\.
That thing is \c[3]Level 60\c[0]?!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.20.settings.event.15.message: Better stay on your guard, Lea. I'll try to knock it down as fast as possible.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.25.settings.event.5.message: At least we got that out of the way. Let's go on.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.1.settings.destinations.0.label: Down
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.11.settings.event.17.message: Again time to clean up the small fry first.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.20.settings.event.13.message: Alright, here we go. Be careful, Lea!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/challenge.entities.25.settings.event.4.message: I don't think I've ever seen an enemy like this. Scary stuff.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.33.message: Uhm...\. Junge, I sure wonder what room this is?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.54.message: What? Just because my name is written on that letter?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.55.message: That could be anyone called Lukas!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.65.message: Alright, I give in! It's \c[3]my room\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.73.message: I know, it's messy!\. It's not always like this I swear!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.82.message: Pleeaase!\. You're judging way too hard!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/flat.json.entities.35.settings.event.108.message: Come on, we've seen enough. Let's go.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.30.settings.event.12.text: So?\. How did it go so far?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.30.settings.event.16.message: Otherwise...\. he recalls things...\. more quickly.\. I think...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.30.settings.event.19.text:
Good.\. Please keep a 
close eye on them.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.31.settings.event.13.message: Somebody interfered...\. hacked the environment server...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.31.settings.event.17.text:
The odds were still highly 
stacked against them.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.31.settings.event.23.text:
This is like the Cargo Ship 
all over again.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.31.settings.event.24.text:
Gautham, you need to 
stop playing around.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.31.settings.event.31.text:
For now, continue
with the interrogation.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/gautham-r.entities.32.settings.event.13.message: Time...\. to put an end to this...

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.11.message: Somebody mind turning on the light?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.25.message: Looks like a lobby of sorts.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.27.message: It's...\. strangely familiar.\. But I can't quite pinpoint it.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.34.message: This is...\. weird.\. It's very weird.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.37.message: ...I don't know.\. Something just feels very weird.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.39.message: It's probably about time for me to log out.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.51.message: Huh...\. looks like we spent enough time in the room?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.52.message: So what exactly was the point of all this?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/lobby.jso.entities.33.settings.event.54.message: I really don't get this place. Let's go.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.55.settings.event.10.message: They got a holographic projector up there, just like in Rookie Harbor.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.57.settings.event.22.message: How does this connect to the rest of the lore? What even is "Project Red"?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.57.settings.event.23.message: I wonder if Hlin would know anything about this.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.57.settings.event.24.message: Too bad I can't seem to contact her... or anybody else for that matter.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.57.settings.event.27.message: I don't know what else to do, so let's just try and solve that quest, alright?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.57.settings.event.30.task: Solve the quest \c[3]The Southern Trial Building\c[0] together with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.58.settings.event.9.message: So... I suppose we should hand in the quest at the hologram portal again?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.20.message: That's got to be the laziest quest writing I've ever seen.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.27.message: And did I get this right? We're supposed to return to our "rooms"?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.29.message: Do they seriously assign rooms to all the players here?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.30.message: What is this?\. Some kind of prison?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.32.message: This is stupid.\. You know what?\. I'll just log off.\. Right now.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.33.message: Gotta look up how to get out of this place.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.36.message: Anyway, thanks for playing with me Lea, see you soon!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.53.message: ... What?\. Am I still in the game?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.67.message: Is the system broken?\. I'll just remove the...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.59.settings.event.77.message: Am I stuck in the game now, or what?!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.60.settings.event.9.message: Alright, ready to get today's quest!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.61.settings.event.18.message: They just want us to walk around and that's it?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.61.settings.event.27.message: Actually, I had a look around before and I found a few nice places.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.61.settings.event.28.message: So since there's nothing to do, do you want me to show you around?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.62.settings.event.9.message: Okay...\. time to enter space again.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.63.settings.event.18.message: Well at least we got a proper quest today.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.63.settings.event.21.message: Look, it's clear something isn't quite right with you.
