assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.63.settings.event.22.message: Should we somehow try to...\. talk about it?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.63.settings.event.26.message: Or we just go ahead and solve today's quest?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.63.settings.event.30.task: Solve the quest \c[3]The Northern Trial Building\c[0] together with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.65.settings.event.26.message: Well then, we're free to go to the tower now.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.65.settings.event.27.message: I don't know about you, but I'd rather sleep another night before we go there.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.65.settings.event.28.message: Who knows what will await us in there, right? It might take some time.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/quest-hub.entities.65.settings.event.31.message: Alright then, let's head to the dormitory. One last time.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-1.entities.5.settings.destinations.0.label: Down
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-1.entities.21.settings.event.8.message: So many of them out there.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-1.entities.21.settings.event.10.message: Well then, let's take that elevator.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.0.settings.destinations.0.label: Up
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.46.settings.condAnims.0.interac: I totally saw that one coming!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.90.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Now this terminal is almost too conveniently placed, don't you agree?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.90.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Let's hope that exit opened up now...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.91.settings.event.7.message: There's supposed to be more guards down here.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.100.settings.event.8.message: Hm... this is the only way, isn't it? Maybe there's something in this room.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/stealth-2.entities.125.settings.event.11.message: Alright, another elevator! Let's hope that one goes up again.

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/store.jso.entities.29.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hello. You can purchase equipment here.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/store.jso.entities.30.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hello. You can purchase consumables here.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/store.jso.entities.32.settings.dialog.0.text: I could use a sandwich now...

assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.2.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
You certainly do not see this anywhere else in the Playground.
Avatars would just mess it up in a heartbeat.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.33.message: Lea, are you alright?\. Can you still hear me?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.36.message: You were suddenly kicked from the game, right after that fight.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.37.message: I was unable to get you back online for several hours.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.38.message: It seems to be working again, finally.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.50.message: Oh, do you remember this place? Did you see it in your dreams?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.52.message: I see, so you must have been here before.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.53.message: Let us have a look around, okay?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.31.settings.event.55.task: Have a look around the room.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.28.message: But your vocabulary seems fairly limited, no?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.30.message: Just who exactly put you back into the game anyway...?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.31.message: You were not supposed to be... around anymore.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.34.message: What about this room? Does it at least look familiar?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.37.message: I see. So your memory might return sooner or later.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.41.message: I had better not tell you too much.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.43.message: Anyway, we have a little something for you to do.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.56.message: Gautham...\. Just what exactly are you doing here?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.61.message: He used to be an old colleague of mine. One that went \c[3]missing several years ago\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.69.text: Alright Lea, can you hear me?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.70.text: Please step outside and exit the corridor to the \c[3]west\c[0], then \c[3]south\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.71.text: Somebody you know will be waiting outside.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.76.message: Lea, we should do as he says.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.77.message: I will...\. tell you more about Gautham soon.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.78.message: For now, let us try to figure out where exactly we are.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.33.settings.event.82.task: Go \c[3]outside the building\c[0] to meet somebody you know.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.13.message: This whole situation is getting stranger every minute.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.14.message: Okay, first: About this place... \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0] was the name, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.15.message: This place was originally developed for CrossWorlds, but the project was put on hold.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.16.message: They already developed a large part of the environment but ultimately the area was never integrated into the playground.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.17.message: No avatar is supposed to enter this place.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.19.message: I am wondering that too. How could those avatars end up in this place?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.25.message: Oh... Do you wonder how I know all of this?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.27.message: Well... I suppose there is no point in hiding it.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.28.message: I am an \c[3]Instatainment employee\c[0]. I have been involved in the creation of CrossWorlds... for many years already.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.29.message: That is why I have access to internal documents. Some of them at least.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.31.message: Still, I was not aware that development of this region had continued in any way.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.32.message: This place should be abandoned for all I know.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.33.message: I mean... It is possible this is a confidential project we are not supposed to know about...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.36.message: The fact that the avatars here cannot seem to logout is even more strange...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.38.message: And their loss of memory as well.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.44.message: Yes, just like you, Lea. Their situation is very similar to yours.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.45.message: But...\. I doubt those players are all...\. in a coma.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.51.message: S-Sorry.\. I think I...\. just misunderstood something.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.54.message: Anyway, there is nothing we can do in this room.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.55.message: So I suggest we call it a day, alright?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.34.settings.event.58.message: Lea...\. Please...\. There is nothing left to talk about.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.22.message: Good! Did you remember something new?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.28.message: That is new!\. Okay who could it be...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.30.message: Was it an avatar? Somebody logged into CrossWorlds?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.33.message: Was it...\. Gautham by any chance?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.37.message: Of course, you saw him yesterday, this must have triggered the memory.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.43.message: Hm... Was there a third person?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.51.message: I think now is the right time to tell you more about yourself.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.53.message: Yes...\. I do know a few things about you.\. We have known each other in the past.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.54.message: However...\. I thought it was safest for you to recover your memories by yourself.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.55.message: After all this is part of your...\. healing process.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.59.message: Anyway, if you remembered Gautham, Satoshi and me...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.60.message: ... this must have been from about \c[3]5 years ago\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.61.message: Back then, all of us were \c[3]employees of Instatainment\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.63.message: That is right, we were all involved in the development of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.64.message: And Satoshi...\. he is your brother.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.66.message: I am sure you will remember more about him soon.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.67.message: Anyway... about 4 years ago, all 3 of you \c[3]went missing\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.69.message: Nobody knew exactly what happened to you. There was no way to track you down.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.71.message: That was until I found you again.\. Lying in a hospital.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.73.message: And with you being awake in CrossWorlds, your memories are my only lead to Satoshi and the others.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.75.message: I want to get you to wake up. And I want to find out what exactly has happened... to you and the others.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.77.message: Whatever did happen...\. I am sure it has to do with this place.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.78.message: I get the feeling we are very close to the answers!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.85.message: Oh yes...\. it looks like the door was unlocked some time ago.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.86.message: In fact, I am a bit late with your login... something was holding me up again.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.35.settings.event.88.message: Lukas is probably waiting for you outside.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.11.message: So we are back in the room?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.13.message: I am still trying to wrap my head around all of this...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.14.message: Why are these players stuck in this place? And why did they all lose their memory?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.15.message: Just what exactly is the whole point of this place?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.17.message: And just how in the world can all of this happen without anything being reported?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.23.message: Oh! You mean I could report all of this?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.25.message: Theoretically, yes. But that would be a bad idea.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.27.message: Because...\. what we both are doing here...\. is unofficial.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.28.message: At least I do not have the approval of the company to log you into CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.30.message: I essentially...\. sneaked you into the game.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.31.message: That is exactly why we have to be careful to not draw too much attention.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.32.message: And that is also why I cannot afford to act carelessly when tampering with the game's system.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.33.message: CrossWorlds is designed with an insane amount of security checks to avoid cheating and other kinds of abuse.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.34.message: Even simple things like moving you out of this place...\. it will very quickly lead to a ban.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.36.message: There are ways to get around these checks, but my options are very limited right now.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.37.message: Because I do not have access to the \c[3]environment server\c[0] of this region.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.38.message: Really, nobody should have access to it because this area was discontinued.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.40.message: Still...\. I am looking for ways to get you out of this.\. It will be tricky, but it is definitely possible.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.36.settings.event.42.message: Shall we call it a day?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.37.settings.event.21.message: Well then, time to head out, correct?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.37.settings.event.34.message: Wait...\. wasn't the door opened just before?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.17.message: Did the players here start a rebellion of sorts?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.50.message: What is this?\. You can speak now?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.53.message: That is what I want to ask!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.57.message: You were supposed to be gone!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.59.message: Not very talkative after all, I see.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.60.message: When was the last time we met?\. A year ago?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.64.message: Of course not!\. They tried to undo everything.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.67.message: All the lengths they went through for you...\. I just don't get it.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.75.message: Well then!\. Allow me to refresh your memory!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.76.message: I don't know what exactly they told you.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.77.message: About who you are, why you are here and where those memories come from.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.78.message: Whatever they told you, \c[3]it's a lie\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.83.message: Seeing me might feel strange to you... like looking into a mirror.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.86.message: No...\. that's not right.\. We're not the same.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.87.message: I am the original.\. You are a just a \c[3]copy\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.89.message: A \c[3]copy of my avatar\c[0], that's what!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.104.message: That is why you'll never be able to leave the game!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.107.message: You can deny it all you want.\. It won't change anything.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.108.message: The more you will remember, the more it will become clear to you.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.110.message: And all those memories you see? Those are mine.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.111.message: My memories.\. My personality.\. It's all copied.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.113.message: The "next big step" in artificial intelligence is what they call you.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.118.message: A miserable copy, that's what you are!!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.141.message: We all ended up in this hell because of you!!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.143.message: A program with access to all of my memories?!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.144.message: Just how the hell did they ever think this was a good idea?!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.177.message: You talking was the last thing I needed!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.184.message: You have no right to exist.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.185.message: Whoever brought you back...\. should just delete you immediately.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.239.message: You do not have to...\. You must not believe her!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.264.message: Lea? Can you still hear me?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.266.message: Lea, please! You have to get over this!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.268.message: I cannot afford to lose you! Please!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.270.message: You are the only lead I have!
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.283.message: All I can tell you is that there is hope...
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.40.settings.event.301.message: Do...\. Do you want to...\. logout?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.43.settings.event.22.message: Lea, please...\. Give me a chance to expla-
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.43.settings.event.27.message: I am just glad that you seem to be getting through this.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.34.message: ...about what happened the day before yesterday.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.35.message: This was not planned... nor intended.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.38.message: That's right, you can say a few words now.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.39.message: Well then... do you mind telling me something?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.40.message: Who exactly put you back into the game?
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.42.message: I suppose you won't find the right words for that.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.45.message: We'll find that person sooner or later.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.77.message: Don't worry. Things are fine on my side.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.79.message: However, at the moment I cannot talk to you like usual.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.80.message: For now...\. please go to the tower as you planned with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid/interior/the-room..entities.47.settings.event.82.message: I will try to get you both out of this place.

assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.448.settings.blockEvent.0.thenS: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.448.settings.blockEvent.0.elseS: The tour does not include the river area. We've been there yesterday already.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.450.settings.blockEvent.2.messa: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.451.settings.blockEvent.2.messa: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.501.settings.event.8.message: So we're just out of town and oh look!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.501.settings.event.19.message: Yet the almighty plot decided we're not ready to proceed, so these things remain unresponsive.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.501.settings.event.21.message: Nothing to do here, so let's appreciate the amazing nature of this place.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.501.settings.event.26.task: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
Because it's filled with water...\. or whatever that purple stuff is.
Sorry this tour doesn't include basic scientific explanations.
I'm sure Tronny would have a good explanation for you.
Aaaand he'd probably also complain about those weird rock formations.
Be careful not to step on a virus along the way!
Head to the north from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.503.settings.event.0.message: Alright, our final sight will be further to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.503.settings.event.1.task: Head to the west from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.504.settings.event.0.message: You're so quiet today...\. even for your standards.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.12.message: The view here isn't all that bad, hm?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.17.message: Okay, look...\. I can't keep watching you like this.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.18.message: There must be a way to help you out of this.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.19.message: We gotta try to talk about this. Somehow.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.21.message: I'll just ask some questions, ok?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.24.message: I suppose you remembered something about yourself... Something that made you sad?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.27.message: Okay, so what could it be?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.28.message: Did you...\. lose somebody dear to you?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.36.message: Just what did this person exactly do to you...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.38.message: Are all your troubles... because of that person?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.48.message: I wonder how the others are doing.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. all of them.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.50.message: It seemed like you got along quite well with Emilie and Tronny, didn't you?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.52.message: So...\. I'm sure we'll be missed.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.53.message: In difficult times like these...\. it's good to know there are people out there that care for you.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.55.message: Even though it looks like we're on our own for now.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.71.message: I think it's probably better if we call it a day.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.72.message: Let's finish the trial building tomorrow, okay?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.74.message: Alright then, back to the dormitory.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.511.settings.event.76.task: You decided to call it a day and head back to the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.11.message: Beating up that Rhino-thing just to see such a place, I can't believe it.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.13.message: How the hell do they even know what my room looks like?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.14.message: And why would they put that kind of reconstruction in this place?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.18.message: Anyway... I seem to remember a little more now.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.19.message: Like the place I live at...\. the place I work at...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.20.message: What was the name of the company again?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.21.message: Anyway, I think I worked in the IT department...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.23.message: Still... this all feels very strange.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.24.message: Like...\. why did I forget all of this suddenly?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.26.message: You know... I had a... pretty scary thought.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.28.message: I'm spending all of my time in this game now....
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.29.message: The only thing left from my "real life" are those memories that are slowly returning.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.30.message: But what...\. what if there is no real life anymore?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.32.message: What if we're just stuck in this game, forever?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.34.message: Is...\. is this maybe the feeling you had yesterday?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.43.message: Does that make our lives any less meaningful?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.45.message: We don't know why we're stuck in this game...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.46.message: But honestly...\. we don't even know why we live in the first place.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.48.message: So we're either stuck in this game or stuck in "real life". What's the big difference?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.50.message: Is it so strange thinking that way?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.53.message: I think what's important... is that it's a life worth living.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.54.message: And being stuck in this game isn't the worst fate imaginable, now is it?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.56.message: We're not alone. We have friends in this world.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.58.message: And heck, I know a few people that would be happy being logged into CrossWorlds permanently.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.60.message: So it's not all bad, is it?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.61.message: Especially if we get out of this place. This place kinda sucks, honestly.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.62.message: Now that I think about it, my room fits in pretty well...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.512.settings.event.72.message: Let's hand in that quest already!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.524.settings.dialog.2.text: Already? We just started the quest! We still gotta go to the forest!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.524.settings.dialog.2.event.4.t: So you got the quest for the second trial building already?
Yes, finally! That really took some time. I was bored senseless yesterday!
No quest for us today, so all we can do is have a look around.
I'm sure the quest will be there for you soon as well.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.527.settings.event.39.message: Mon dieu, what are those... robot thingies?!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.527.settings.event.41.message: The barriers are connected to those enemies, we need to get rid of them to proceed!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.540.settings.event.15.message: Look! It's one of those... Evotars!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.540.settings.event.24.message: Hey you! You should go to the quest hub!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.540.settings.event.26.message: Uhm...\. They got amazing loot there!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.540.settings.event.30.message: Go there if you want to get out of here!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.540.settings.event.31.message: Quick, there's just this one chance!
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.27.message: Now that you've gathered the Evotars, what's next?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.29.message: I have to get in touch with Instatainment and explain the whole situation.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.30.message: And hopefully we will be able to create a proper future for Evotars that way.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.35.message: So...\. what will happen with Lea now?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.39.message: I am afraid I cannot afford to keep her in the game for much longer.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.40.message: I am not allowed to do that in the first place...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.41.message: And I really should not break company rules while I try to discuss the matter with them.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.43.message: But...\. there is no need to log her out right away, non?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.44.message: We can at least play together for a little longer, oui?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.46.message: I suppose... there is no reason to rush things now.
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.49.message: What are we waiting for, then?
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.547.settings.event.68.text:
It all began when I set out\.
to find my long-lost colleagues.\.
\.
My old friends...
assets/data/maps/arid/lake-1.json.entities.550.settings.event.11.message: Those cliffs really do not make any sense.

assets/data/maps/arid/river-1.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.0.text: Red light...\. so shiny...\. so bright...
assets/data/maps/arid/river-1.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.1.event.0.e: Because I don't want to see no more...

assets/data/maps/arid/river-2.json.entities.390.settings.event.8.message: Right... so this is a \c[3]Trial Building\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/river-2.json.entities.390.settings.event.9.message: Does that mean more of those low-level virus thingees?
assets/data/maps/arid/river-2.json.entities.390.settings.event.10.message: I'm fine with those, just keep them coming!
assets/data/maps/arid/river-2.json.entities.390.settings.event.14.message: No really, it would be troublesome if they threw high level enemies at us now. It's better that way.
assets/data/maps/arid/river-2.json.entities.401.settings.event.0.message: Laser Bridge! So many laser bridges!
I am not here...\. you didn't see me.

assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.195.settings.blockEvent.0.thenS: Lea? Don't you remember all those guards lining up right at the entrance?
We better avoid running into those.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.196.settings.blockEvent.12.mess: Hm? Should we cancel the sneaking?
Fine. But let's not wait too long, okay?
Alright, let's not give up that quickly!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.9.message: Alright... now we just have to get through there... undetected.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.10.message: There's supposed to be a door up there that we can enter.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.17.message: Lets go separately, it's probably easier to stay hidden that way.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.20.message: Huh, do you want to go ahead?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.23.message: You're rather small so they'll have a hard time spotting you.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.242.settings.event.33.task: Sneak with Lukas through the guarded area to reach \c[3]Vermillion Tower\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.253.settings.event.7.message: Wait... we're back at the entrance?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.253.settings.event.14.message: Hm... maybe we find a route walking over these roofs here?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.256.settings.event.9.message: Okay, it seems we're getting closer!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.258.settings.event.10.message: Whoa... we did it, didn't we?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.258.settings.event.12.message: Okay... let's see if we can access the tower from here.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.258.settings.event.27.message: What a strange way to prioritize security.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.258.settings.event.29.message: Well then... nothing stopping us here. Let's enter that tower!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.258.settings.event.37.task: Enter the tower together with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.261.settings.event.12.message: I gotta be honest... I have a bad feeling about this.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.261.settings.event.14.message: The way we managed to get past all those guards.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.261.settings.event.16.message: Like they wanted us to get through here?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.261.settings.event.18.message: Well... it's not like we have any other option, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.261.settings.event.20.message: Alright then. Let's enter and see what happens!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.262.settings.event.7.message: Alright! Let's continue from where we left off!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.19.message: I don't know what you hope to achieve with this...
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.20.message: But it is clear that your goal is to interfere with the Evotars of this area.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.21.message: I won't let you continue doing this as you please.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.36.message: Lea, I'm sure you didn't forget about one particular Evotar.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.56.message: His well being is still at my mercy.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.57.message: I will give you this one last chance to reconsider your current course.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.63.message: Lea, do not give in to his threats!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.64.message: The current plan is our best chance to rescue him!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.76.message: I suppose that means I can't change your mind.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.78.message: In any case, you are about to hit a brick wall!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.268.settings.event.102.message: Lea don't give up!\. We're this close!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.281.settings.event.2.message: Wait, that doesn't seem right. The \c[3]fixation failed\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.281.settings.event.3.message: He managed to add a counter measure already?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.281.settings.event.4.message: Lea, focus on staying alive! I will work on a solution ASAP!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.16.message: It looks like you're still at it?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.18.message: Shizuka?! What are you doing here?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.21.message: Don't worry about me, I already moved locations in advance.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.23.message: More importantly, it looks like you need a hand here, Lea?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.27.message: Let's show them what we can do!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.282.settings.event.29.message: Keep them busy for a little longer, I am almost finished!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.283.settings.event.8.message: One of the Shredders will be marked with \c[3]yellow stars\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.283.settings.event.9.message: Defeat those and push them towards the Evotars.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.283.settings.event.10.message: They should be able to \c[3]break the blockers\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.283.settings.event.11.message: We might need several attempts though.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.284.settings.event.2.message: Hm, you found a workaround already?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.287.settings.event.31.message: It seems like your plan didn't work out as expected, hm?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.287.settings.event.32.message: You have zapped every Evotar in the area.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.287.settings.event.52.message: W-What happened? Lea... is that you?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.46.message: That was supposed to happen, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.51.message: Yes, but do not worry about the Evotars.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.52.message: Their data is still intact and can be recovered.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.71.message: Hm. That was your plan, I suppose?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.72.message: The Evotar server has crashed, so I can't access it.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.74.message: I assume simply rebooting the server won't fix it either, will it?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.77.message: To think you'd go that far, finding such an obscure loophole... just to recover some data.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.85.message: You really don't hold even an ounce of respect for all the work we did over all these years, do you?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.89.message: Oh I do, Shizuka.\. I most certainly do.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.90.message: The Evotar interrogation program has been a tremendous success.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.91.message: And it is thanks to all your efforts, I would never deny that.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.97.message: WHY would you do all of this to us?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.106.message: Because you didn't leave me any choice.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.107.message: I only did what was necessary to uphold this business.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.109.message: Tell the authorities.\. Make me pay for my evil deeds.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.110.message: Conveniently ignoring the fact that we were all in this together.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.111.message: Please don't forget that we started off as \c[3]partners\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.112.message: And we'd still be partners to this day, if it wasn't for this one...\. ideological disagreement.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.116.message: We are creating Evotars to extract information.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.117.message: And once that is done, we just throw them away!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.122.message: You are killing digitized human beings, Sidwell!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.123.message: What kind of monsters do you think we are to just go along with that?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.128.message: We've had this discussion so many times already...\. I've grown tired of it.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.129.message: I've supported your research for many years now.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.130.message: I effectively enabled you to create Evotars in the first place.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.131.message: I made it so that Evotars have a place to exist at all.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.132.message: Ending this business would mark the \c[3]end of every Evotar\c[0] in existence.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.134.message: I DO understand your concerns about how we abuse Evotars.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.135.message: But there are no other options.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.136.message: How else do you think we can generate revenue, Shizuka?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.138.message: Make anything of this public and Instatainment will shut us down at once.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.139.message: We can only operate in the shadow of this company, hidden in the Playground.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.140.message: The black market of information is our only option.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.150.message: That is a conveniently limited view if I ever heard one.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.151.message: Assuming that there is simply no way to find an agreement with Instatainment.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.152.message: Sure, the company will be hard to convince.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.153.message: But you underestimate the achievements Satoshi and the others have made here.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.154.message: Those Evotars...\. they have the potential to change the world.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.155.message: Even Instatainment might be able to understand this.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.167.message: But of course, things wouldn't be quite as much under your control once Evotars become public.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.168.message: Japp!\. Obviously you'd like things to stay just the way they are.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.172.message: Yes! Just what they said! 100% agreed!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.177.message: Fiend!\. Your deceptive speech shall not blind us!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.182.message: Oui!\. Now shut up and get down here in person!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.189.message: I assume you plan to just walk up to the server, reboot it and fetch the data, am I right?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.190.message: Well, I have bad news for you.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.192.message: There is a reason the server is located \c[3]inside the tower\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.194.message: I hold control over the environment server.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.195.message: I can clear the room instance of the server at any time.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.196.message: Effectively removing the platform below it.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.197.message: Letting it \c[3]fall and crash\c[0]. Rendering it \c[3]unusable\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.200.message: That's right. The command to clear the data doesn't go through the Evotar server.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.202.message: No! How could I forget about this?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.205.message: That was quite the fuss you put up there.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.234.message: This tower...\. it is our domain!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.236.message: And therefore, we will make the rules!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.237.message: The server will remain untouched until our final demand has been granted!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.261.message: Now filled with strength and determination!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.262.message: We are overjoyed to have you back!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.263.message: For we have prepared the ultimate challenge!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.293.message: The tower is waiting to be entered!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.294.message: Reach the top and you shall find the server you seek!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.295.message: We are thrilled to watch your ascent!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.315.message: Uhm...\. what is going on?\. Anyone?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.318.message: Who was that fancy-looking blue guy?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.324.message: Oh!\. That former colleague of yours?
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.326.message: It seems he has taken control of the Environment Server.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.331.message: Now we might still get our chance to access the server!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.332.message: Yes...\. that is, if Lea takes on his challenge.\. By herself.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.339.message: Lea!\. You gotta go and show them!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.340.message: That's what all our dungeon races have prepared you for!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.288.settings.event.344.message: Spheromancer Lea! I'm confident you're up to the task!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.22.message: Spheromancer Lea! Have you returned victoriously?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.31.message: We recovered backups for all Evotars I found on the server.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.32.message: Satoshi, Lukas...\. they are all safe.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.33.message: Meanwhile...\. it looks like Sidwell gave up on his business.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.40.message: He committed suicide within the dungeon compound.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.55.message: It happened so quickly, and there was nothing we could do to stop him.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.67.message: Now of all times!\. Why would he do this now?!
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.76.message: I just thought...\. he didn't care anymore...
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.84.text:
It was one thing I never considered...\.
\.
That it was him, who took on the heavy burden.\.
Handling the worst parts of Sidwell's business...\.
\.
He must have lost control...\. a long time ago.
assets/data/maps/arid/tower-1.json.entities.302.settings.event.88.text: Our long journey was about to end.

assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.15.message: Purple water... This is strange. I roughly remember something along those lines from early content production...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.17.message: Anyway, this is most definitely not the official Playground.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.18.message: I will do a bit of research about this place...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.35.message: They told me to meet up with another player. Is that you?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.37.message: I see.\. Man, this place is weird.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.38.message: And it looks like we're stuck here, right? At least I can't seem to teleport away.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.41.message: I'm not even exactly sure how we ended up here. Any idea?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.45.message: Anyway, I guess we both are supposed to start a party. So... shall we?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.56.message: There is quite the level difference between us, but I guess that's not important now...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.58.message: Next station will be the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of this area. They want us both to show up there for a \c[3]quest\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.63.message: It's right over there to the \c[0]west\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.72.message: Schneider is here as well?\. How...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.73.message: Does that mean that regular players can in fact access this part?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.74.message: But I have never heard of this area. There is no way this is official Playground.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.292.settings.event.75.task: Visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0]
Don't go up there... there is no point.
You are new here... right? This passage will be blocked for you.
Nobody is certain what's beyond there anyway...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.295.settings.event.0.message: My room is in the building to the south, yours too?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.22.message: It looks like you had your fair share of beauty sleep.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.26.message: I mean it does feel like sleeping once you log out, right?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.27.message: I'm just glad they allow you to do that once you enter your room.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.29.message: I really needed the break after what happened yesterday.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.30.message: I sure lost my nerves, didn't I? Not very proud of that.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.32.message: I'm really impressed how well you're taking all of this.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.34.message: Anyway, let's go to the hub again.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.35.message: They won't let me take today's quest unless I form a party with you.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.296.settings.event.39.task: Visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0]
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.10.message: This is the last thing I want to show you today.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.11.message: I know it's hard to miss...\. it's the huge tower up there.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.24.message: Some of the other players here told me about it.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.25.message: It seems like there is a way to get up to this tower.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.26.message: Some of our fellow inmates went there... and never came back.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.28.message: So that can mean two things:\. either they escaped...\. or they just disappeared.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.30.message: Anyway, you can only get there once you've finished the second Trial Building.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.31.message: Let's hope they'll give us the quest for that soon.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.39.message: And yes, this concludes today's tour!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.41.message: It sure was pointless, but I still hope you had a good time!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.44.message: First Rookie Harbor, now Vermillion Wasteland. Guess I should think about a career as a tour guide.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.46.message: ...unless I'm already doing that in real life.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.48.message: I...\. still don't remember much about my life outside of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.50.message: Hm?\. Do you mean it will all come with time?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.54.message: We can still have a look around, otherwise I'm ready to hit the hay.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.297.settings.event.57.task: Head back to your room in the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.298.settings.event.0.message: So what happened? Did you have a bad dream?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.299.settings.event.18.message: So...\. should we finish that trial building today?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.299.settings.event.26.task: Continue the quest \c[3]The Northern Trial Building\c[0] together with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.15.message: So... are you ready for the tower?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.28.message: Going straight upwards will definitely not work.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.29.message: No way we'll get past those guards.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.30.message: But... I was told that there is a secret route in the upper east over there.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.34.message: We might have to do a bit of climbing to get through there, but it should be possible!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.43.message: Also...\. once we reach the tower, there might be no turning back.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.44.message: If there is something you still want to do in this hell hole, you should do it now!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.300.settings.event.49.task: Sneak through the \c[3]north east\c[0] exit of \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - East Town\c[0] to approach the tower.
H-How long have I been sitting here?
I... must have lost track of time.
Remember the other guy that was with me all the time?
Yesterday, he went to the tower... So he's gone now.
Should I... go there myself as well?
I really don't know.\. I don't get this...\. I don't get any of this.
Going to that tower is the only way left.
Yet nobody knows what awaits us there...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.306.settings.dialog.1.text: Are you really sure you want to go there?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.306.settings.dialog.2.text: I have a really bad feeling about this...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.306.settings.dialog.3.text: What else is there to do?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.307.settings.dialog.0.text: We've waited long enough already, don't you think?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.307.settings.dialog.2.text: I'm really sick of sticking around here.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.307.settings.dialog.3.text: If you don't want to come with me, I'll go by myself.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.311.settings.event.13.message: Spheromancer Lea! There are still several players left in this area!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.311.settings.event.14.message: Alright, let us zap them right here!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.336.settings.event.10.message: Great! Please join Emilie and Lukas in the west! They're defending the Evotars!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.339.settings.event.8.message: I found a few more strolling around up here!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.339.settings.event.10.message: Nice! Please join the defense in the west!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.26.message: Looks like we caught all Evotars in this area!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.27.message: We're close but still not there yet!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.28.message: There have to be a few more Evotars somewhere!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.37.message: There are more Evotars over there, right in front of that tower.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.38.message: However, they seem to be stuck. I couldn't get them to move over here.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.61.message: Albert, you help Apollo and Joern defend the area.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.340.settings.event.62.message: Lea and I will have a look at the tower!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.343.settings.event.30.message: Unexpected Error...\. It seems the Evotar server crashed.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.343.settings.event.38.message: That is some messed-up justice, Polly.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-1.json.entities.344.settings.event.0.message: Laser bridge!! I missed you so much!

assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.290.settings.blockEvent.0.elseS: The tour does not include the river area. We've been there yesterday already.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.394.settings.event.0.message: Japp, here it is. That large building right over there.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.397.settings.dialog.0.text: Don't go up there, they'll punch ya....
Hi. Welcome to this small little hellhole.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.0.text: Now take the fish and cook it up in the jelly for 2 hours...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.1.text: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.3.text: Add lemon juice. Add the pineapple. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.5.text: Cover in breadcrumbs, fry another 30 minutes.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.6.text: Wrap it with two layers of cheese. Deep fry for 15 minutes.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.8.text: Add water and bring it to a boil for 2 hours or until soft.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.407.settings.dialog.9.text: Mix it all up in the blender and let it cool for an hours. That's how you make the jelly.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.8.message: Hey you two! What is it with this place?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.10.message: Add the sesame, season with pepper and oregano.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.14.message: Hey! Are you listening to me?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.15.message: Add lemon juice.\. Add the pineapple.\. Stir fry for 20 minutes.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.18.message: W-What the heck is wrong with you?!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.26.message: You... what is it with this place?!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.39.message: Hey Metal Face! Talk to me!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.408.settings.event.48.message: DAMN IT! THIS CAN'T BE REAL!!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.11.message: I just died and respawned, didn't I?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.14.message: Well, at least we won't die in real life when we die in-game. That's something.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.16.message: You remember that strange feeling I mentioned before?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.18.message: I figured it out.\. I can't remember things.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.19.message: I can't remember what... is outside of the game.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.22.message: Is it the same for you?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.25.message: Things are just very blurry right now. Do you think our memories will return?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.27.message: Did... did it already happen for you?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.31.message: There's got to be a way out of this.\. There just has to be.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.38.message: Let's return to our rooms, ok?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.39.message: Maybe there is a way to properly rest in there, however that works.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.47.message: Lea, do I understand this correctly? All the avatars in this area cannot log out?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.51.message: Sorry, I do not know. This is all extremely bizarre.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.52.message: I looked a bit into this place...
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.63.message: Just go ahead, I will tell you later.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.411.settings.event.66.task: Head back to your room in the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
Here we are in the \c[3]town center\c[0].
The town doesn't really have a name, so let's just stick with \c[3]Vermillion Town\c[0] for now.
Vermilion Town! Home of the metal blocks and endless pipes.
Nobody actually knows what's in the pipes though.\. We're probably best off not knowing.
Vermillion town is also home of these friendly metal-armored fellows.
Like most folks, they don't like to be hit. They really don't like it.
But what am I saying? You saw what happened yesterday.
Also be especially careful about that area in the north. They really don't like you to be there.
Well what am I saying? You already went ahead and explored the whole area, right?
Then again, folks were talking about some nice treasure you can get when you manage to sneak past them.
Now let's exit the town \c[3]to the west\c[0]!
Head to the west from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.413.settings.event.10.message: Welcome to my little \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland Tour\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.413.settings.event.11.message: I will show you all the remarkable sights of this truly underappreciated landscape.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.413.settings.event.16.task: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - West Town\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.419.settings.dialog.0.text: I can't believe we're stuck here with nothing to do.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.419.settings.dialog.2.text: Should we just go out and grind a bit?
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.38.message: Those markers will catch the laser beams. Use them for your protection.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.58.message: Alright Lea, we are ready to start.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.59.message: Here is what you need to do, listen closely.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.60.message: Our goal is to \c[3]zap every Evotar in this area\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.61.message: For every Evotar there are \c[3]3 steps to follow\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.62.message: \c[3]First\c[0]: You need to defeat a nearby \c[3]Shredder unit\c[0] to start the \c[3]Fixation Routine\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.63.message: \c[3]Second\c[0]: Move the defeated Shredder \c[3]close to the Evotar\c[0] to \c[3]fixate it\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.64.message: \c[3]Third\c[0]: The \c[3]fixed Evotar\c[0] needs to be \c[3]hit by the laser\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.65.message: If you can't find any Evotars, \c[3]standing on Laser Catchers\c[0] will make them point at the nearest one.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.424.settings.event.81.message: Everyone, follow Lea and focus on fighting the shredders!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.445.settings.event.10.message: Spheromancer Lea! We found more players in the forest!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.445.settings.event.12.message: Good! You can look for more Evotars further to the east!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.451.settings.event.12.message: Sup?\. We brought more Evotars from along the river!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.451.settings.event.14.message: Good! Please join Apollo and Joern in the east of the town!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.455.settings.event.24.message: Looks like we caught them all in this area.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.455.settings.event.25.message: Emilie, Lukas, you both stay here and make sure that no enemies interfere with the Evotars.
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.455.settings.event.26.message: Lea, you head to the east and join with the others!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.455.settings.event.27.message: We got this area covered! Good luck over there, chérie!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.456.settings.event.49.message: They exploded!\. Just like Emilie back then!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.456.settings.event.52.message: What?! Is that what happened to me?!
assets/data/maps/arid/town-2.json.entities.459.settings.event.0.message: Laser bridge! The only true kind of bridge!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/jump-las.entities.1.settings.destinations.0.label: en_US
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/jump-las.entities.2.settings.event.23.message: D-D-Did we just literally break the fourth wall or something?!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.8.message: W-Where are we...? Is this even still the playground?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.10.message: Lea, please hurry! Run towards the sea, somebody will pick you up!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.42.message: No matter what I do... I... I just can't move...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.44.message: Is this some bug or something?!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.59.message: Lea please... this won't go anywhere.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.75.message: Somebody must know their way around here!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.76.message: It makes us wonder who exactly is leading the way.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.77.message: Alas! This is as far as you'll be going!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.78.message: Your friend is now under our full control.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.79.message: We disabled his movement. He can be relocated at will, shall it be required.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.83.message: His very fate rests in our hands!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.84.message: If his well being is of your concern, you'd do wise to obey and stop this escape at once.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.101.message: THERE IS NO POINT IN WAITING FOR ME! RUN!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.114.message: There is nothing I can do about Lukas.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.116.message: We have to escape on our own!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.117.message: It is our only option left!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.180.message: You keep pursuing this fruitless endeavor...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.181.message: There is no escape from this place. Not for avatars like you!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.199.message: Still not very explosion proof, I see!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/outside..entities.86.settings.event.200.message: I'm here to fetch the lass!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.30.message: The interior of this tower is instanced.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.31.message: That is why Lukas is not here. It is like a dungeon.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.33.message: Do not worry, I have a plan.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.34.message: If things go well, I can get both of you out of this.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.35.message: We will just have to break a few rules... and walls.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.37.message: I need a bit of time to prepare things.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.38.message: I have to reach Lukas... Somehow.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-01..entities.27.settings.event.40.message: Meanwhile, I need you to move to the next room to the north.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-02..entities.2.settings.blockEvent.2.message: Uhm... Lea? I need you to leave through the \c[3]other door\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-02..entities.36.settings.event.4.message: Alright, this looks good. Next you'll need to move towards the \c[3]west\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-02..entities.36.settings.event.6.message: Just trust me on this for now.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.1.settings.blockEvent.1.message: No not that way, Lea. Please use the exit sign.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.1.settings.blockEvent.2.thenSte: I promise, it will work this time...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.34.settings.event.6.message: Okay, you are at the right position now, Lea.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.34.settings.event.7.message: I just need a little bit longer to manage things on my side.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.34.settings.event.8.message: Meanwhile, you can take care of the enemies in this room.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.48.settings.event.24.message: I got Lukas just at the right position and he seems to be waiting for us.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.48.settings.event.25.message: Now we will just have to meet up with him...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.48.settings.event.26.message: ...by breaking through the dungeon room instances.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.48.settings.event.29.message: I will now spawn an exit point.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.48.settings.event.36.message: Now, try interacting with the symbol.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.49.settings.interact.event.4.th: S-Sorry! I must have made a little mistake here.
Let me go over the parameters again.
Oh, I think I got it!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-03..entities.49.settings.interact.event.5.th: Oh right, forgot about that thing.
Sorry Lea, we need one more attempt.
In my defense, this whole routine is pretty experimental...

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.0.settings.blockEvent.1.message: Uhm... better not go this way Lea. Things might break.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.1.settings.blockEvent.1.message: Lea, please take the exit point, not the door.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.14.message: Lea, we just jumped to another room instance!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.15.message: Dungeon instances... they work on a room-by-room basis.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.16.message: And all room-instances are placed within a \c[3]massive compound\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.17.message: What we will do is jump between those instances until we reach the room Lukas is in!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.18.message: And then... escape this compound itself!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.20.message: As strange as it sounds, it is our best chance to get out of this place.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.21.message: Okay let me see...\. the next exit point should be...\. here!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.29.message: Yes, it has to be on that side of the room. Sorry.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-04..entities.24.settings.event.30.message: But the way it looks you should be able to reach that point.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-05..entities.0.settings.blockEvent.1.message: Lea, not the door please. The exit sign.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-05..entities.1.settings.blockEvent.1.message: Lea, not the door please. The exit sign.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-05..entities.67.settings.event.9.message: Nice landing! The next exit is down over there.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-05..entities.67.settings.event.10.message: You can just ignore the puzzle in this room...

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-06..entities.0.settings.blockEvent.1.message: We should not leave through the entrance. Strange things could happen.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-06..entities.1.settings.blockEvent.1.message: Lea, not the door please. The exit sign.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-06..entities.31.settings.event.19.message: Oh! Well... we should take care of those first.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-06..entities.43.settings.event.10.message: This time we'll exit through the wall to the east!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-06..entities.44.settings.interact.event.9.th: Sorry, I forgot to fix the routine for sideway jumps...
A-Anyway, it should work now. Promise.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.31.message: Wha...\. What the heck is this?!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.57.message: This was certainly not meant to be seen by the likes of you.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.58.message: In this tower you shall abide to the constraints laid in front of you.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.59.message: Not break through the walls as you please.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.60.message: We won't tolerate behavior like this!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.79.message: Your little journey will end now!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.87.message: He found out sooner than I had hoped.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.88.message: Lea you must not be caught up in one of his battles, we have to escape!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-07..entities.3.settings.event.89.message: Run to the next symbol as fast as possible!
