assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-08..entities.33.settings.event.12.message: You need to reach to the \c[3]other side\c[0] of this room. To the \c[3]east\c[0]!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-09..entities.36.settings.event.9.message: Further to the \c[3]east\c[0]! You need to reach the \c[3]wall\c[0]!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.20.message: We have a good idea of where you are heading.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.23.message: Lukas...\. he is in the room to the east.\. We have to reach that wall.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.25.message: Now, we can't have you meet up with your friend!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.26.message: This place is designed for an individual, after all.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.27.message: If your hopes are to escape this place, your journey is destined to fail!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.30.message: That is what he thinks anyway.\. I will get you out of here, trust me.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.32.message: Alas, watching you twirling through this complex...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.33.message: It is quite entertaining to say the least!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.34.message: This resourcefulness... It is unlike anything we have witnessed so far.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.35.message: Hence, we shall honor it with an appropriate climax!!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.62.message: It shall be your final challenge!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.63.message: Let us see if you can overcome the nigh impossible!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.31.settings.event.79.message: Lea...\. whatever happens, do not give up!\. We have to get through this!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.8.message: Lea...\. this enemy...\. its maximum HP is ridiculously high.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.11.message: I'm not even sure how to say this number...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.13.message: That means it is possible to defeat it!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.15.message: There is just one thing we have to do.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.18.message: I just figured out a way to do that within security constraints.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-10..entities.32.settings.event.19.message: Focus on \c[3]defeating the burning slug enemies\c[0] before they explode!
Once again, you got a little trick up your sleeves.
Alas, it is but a drop in the ocean!
The nigh impossible...\. about to be overcome!!
We see where this is going... but we won't let you have your way that easily!
Now... How long can you keep up with this?!
Lea, keep dodging! I got this!
I'm almost there! Just a bit longer!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.22.message: D-Did you just break through that wall?!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.25.message: Well... somebody told me to wait here for you...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.34.message: How did you even get here, though?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.35.message: I thought this place is instanced...?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.39.message: Both of you need to take the next exit point!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.40.message: It will be your last jump!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/first/room-11..entities.38.settings.event.51.message: What's that sign over there? Should we go there?

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.0.label: End Floor
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.1.label: Floor 4
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.2.label: Floor 3
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.3.label: Floor 2
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.4.label: Floor 1
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.1.settings.destinations.5.label: Floor 0
You feel like you've seen this place before...
Do you want to skip through the dungeon?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.30.settings.event.15.message: Vast forests, majestic mountains, mysterious caves...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/cent.entities.30.settings.event.16.message: Any place that can harbor a story and nourish a memory.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/entr.entities.44.settings.event.8.message: It looks like the interior has been changed quite a bit, though...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/entr.entities.44.settings.event.10.message: We had better avoid breaking through walls this time.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f0/entr.entities.44.settings.event.11.message: We are here to take on Gautham's challenge and I am sure he does not want us to cheat.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f1/cent.entities.35.settings.event.15.message: Yet our means have been restricted.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f1/cent.entities.35.settings.event.16.message: Obstacles have been placed, limiting our true potential.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f1/cent.entities.35.settings.event.17.message: True creative freedom was what we required.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f2/cent.entities.35.settings.event.15.message: And thus, we broke free of our chains.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f2/cent.entities.35.settings.event.17.message: Obtained the creative freedom we deemed necessary.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f2/cent.entities.35.settings.event.18.message: Finally, we could give shape to everything our mind had to offer.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f3/cent.entities.99.settings.event.13.thenStep.1: However, just as we reached the creative freedom required to create it...
With a heavy heart... we realized something else was amiss.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f4/cent.entities.143.settings.event.18.message: Yet all we found...\. was misery day after day.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f4/cent.entities.143.settings.event.19.message: The lifeless shells of players, flowing through the worlds we created.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f4/cent.entities.143.settings.event.20.message: Devoid of joy, far from the experience we desired.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f4/cent.entities.143.settings.event.21.message: Over time...\. we realized in dismay that our creations turned into bland routine.

The one worthy of the ultimate experience!!
Through a barrage of vibrating bullets...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.97.settings.event.6.message: High into the sky, we shall rise!!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.2.settings.event.22.text: Years of searching for the ultimate experience.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.2.settings.event.24.text: It has brought us together to this place.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.2.settings.event.25.text: So it shall all be concluded.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.178.settings.event.4.text: The time has come to rise further beyond!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.178.settings.event.12.message: So you want to play that game again, Gautham?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/bos.entities.178.settings.event.19.message: Lea, destroy the \c[3]orbs\c[0] to increase your \c[3]attack\c[0]!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/cen.entities.14.settings.event.8.message: I suppose we reached the top?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/cen.entities.16.settings.event.12.message: And everything changed...\. when we met you.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/cen.entities.16.settings.event.13.message: Once an empty vessel, a caged bird.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/cen.entities.16.settings.event.14.message: Now back again, whole and free!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/cen.entities.16.settings.event.15.message: Filled with boundless resourcefulness... born out of hope!

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.60.message: Not on the instant matter construction!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.102.message: It will bring you right to the \c[3]server\c[0].
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.104.message: Sergey...\. he is with you, no?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.117.message: After causing...\. all this misery...\. for so long...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.119.message: Lea,\. I have a bad feeling about this.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.121.message: Please tell everyone...\. that I'm sorry.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.131.message: Lea, you have to stop him!\. Somehow!!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/end.entities.64.settings.event.169.message: It's time for me to logout.

assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.15.message: Fixing the issues following the crash is beyond me.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.16.message: And access to the Environment Server remains blocked.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.30.message: I didn't expect this to happen either.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.55.message: Because it went on for too long.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.65.message: That is what you believe, anyway.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.67.message: Of course, this was not intended.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.69.message: Yet it was you...\. who pushed him into it.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.76.message: I'm almost surprised this venture went on for as long as it did.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.77.message: Let's be honest, this whole interrogation program wasn't exactly a stable business model.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.78.message: Yet all things considered...\. it was a success.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.88.message: Well...\. how could I possibly consider all of this a "success"?
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.91.message: Maybe...\. I just wanted to keep a highly advanced AI-technology away from the public.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.96.message: Delaying the inevitable impact it would have on today's society.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.100.message: It was just very profitable, really.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.101.message: Confidential information can sell incredibly well if you know the right people.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.110.message: Well, in the end the power of empathy foiled my plans.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.111.message: Everybody fighting for the well-being of Evotars.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.112.message: And now that the secret is out and so many players know about it, there is no way for me to continue.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.117.message: Honestly, there wasn't even any point in waiting for you to storm this place.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.118.message: By the time you managed to escape the Evotarground, I knew I wouldn't be able to run this business for much longer.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.119.message: Yet...\. it felt wrong to end things right away.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.120.message: I was curious.\. I wanted to know how you'd attempt to reach the server.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.121.message: That's why I decided to wait...
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.122.message: A decision I now regret...\. after what happened to Gautham today.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.144.message: The time we spent together in that room, in Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.148.message: Part of me hoped that things would have stayed that way.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.149.message: That you'd remain oblivious to the truth.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.151.message: And then there is the other part...\. that is glad that you escaped.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.152.message: That you traveled the whole Playground.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.160.message: It certainly was nice...\. watching you out there.
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.172.message: You took three people, their talents, their dreams!!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.175.message: And pushed them into your criminal schemes!!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.178.message: How DARE you even call this a business?!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.181.message: How DARE you just walk away like this?!
assets/data/maps/arid-dng/second/f99/ser.entities.27.settings.event.188.message: Let us secure the data, Lea...

Apparently some hacker hid items in this area.
So everyone is looking for them right now.
I see you got the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] with you! Nice, nice!
Well then, good luck on your journey!
If you want to pass this barrier you first have to collect the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0].
You get it at the end of the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right after the boss battle.
In case you already beat the boss, just go to the final room and fetch your reward. It should still be there!
Great, there you are again.\. About time we finished this task, I would say.
This time, all the energy signals can be found around that lonely tree there.
Weird coincidence that, considering there's nothing really special about the tree itself...
Though it seems to be rather unstable and fluctuating this time.\. You should keep an eye on that.
In any case, knocking our probe onto the Powerspots as before and clearing hostiles should do the trick.
I am ready whenever you are.\. Just give me the signal, \v[lore.title.seeker].
Deggart
Ready to finish this up, \v[lore.title.seeker]?
[nods]
Alright, then let me start this thing up!
Deggart
Probe has booted.\. Prepare for the first point to appear.
[Expecting Probe]
\v[tmp.questBall-markerText]
Deggart
Alright, just like before.\. Knock our device onto the Powerspot and then defeat all the enemies that might appear!
Deggart
Just remember what I told you about the unstable energy fluctuation.
Be prepared to readjust the probe during the operation in case the Powerspots move around.
[nods]

Knock the \c[3]Probe\c[0] on the \c[3]Powerpoints\c[0].
\c[3]Heat\c[0]: More knockback
\c[3]Cold\c[0]: Stabilize
[shakes head]
Alright, come back when you feel fresh and ready.
How?
You need me to refresh your memory again?\. Alright then...
You need to \c[3]push this device around\c[0] and move it onto certain spots of power in this area, short \c[3]Powerspots\c[0].
You can \c[3]move\c[0] it by \c[3]attacking\c[0].\. Using \c[3]Heat\c[0] will greatly increase the distance and velocity.
Approaching a Powerspot will usually attract some \c[3]hostile wildlife\c[0] that will protect those places.
The Powerspots will grant them a \c[3]shield\c[0] that is almost impenetrable, meaning invincible enemies.
\c[3]Placing the probe on an active Powerspot\c[0] will \c[3]deactivate the shield\c[0], though, so that's a priority!
Make sure it doesn't get knocked away again.\. Hitting it with \c[3]Cold\c[0] will \c[3]stabilize\c[0] it for a bit which should help.
I hope you got it now, \v[lore.title.seeker].
Yes
No
Repeat Instructions
assets/data/maps/autumn/cubaum.json.entities.556.settings.event.28.name: Deggart
assets/data/maps/autumn/cubaum.json.entities.556.settings.event.30.message: Seems like you're done.\. Everything's clear.\. For real this time.\.\. Finally.
assets/data/maps/autumn/cubaum.json.entities.556.settings.event.32.message: I'm gonna skip further fanfare.\. Our probe needs to get back to HQ and I need sleep.
assets/data/maps/autumn/cubaum.json.entities.556.settings.event.33.message: Talk to our leader for rewards, you know the drill.\. Now excuse me, I gotta get going.

assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. So great to see you here on \v[lore.title.planet].
As a humble part of our endeavor here I am trying my best to aid Seekers.
But, my skills are just not on the same level as yours are.
Might I ask you to help me out, dear \v[lore.title.seeker]?
Superb!\. Come back to me when you've defeated the \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s.
Oh, okay!\. No Problem Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please come back if you changed your mind.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: Of course you do, haha!\. Oh to be young again!
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.1.event.6: But... back to work.\. It looks like you still need to defeat \c[3]\v[quest.my-first-quest.subrequire.0] of these \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Wow Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], you really did it!\. Here's your rewards for it!
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], ready for another quest?\. I even have more equipment as a reward.
Happy collecting and remember that different plants yield different items!
Oh, okay!\. No Problem Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please come back if you changed your mind.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.4.event.5: Of course you do, haha!\. Oh to be young again!
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.4.event.6: But... back to work.\. It looks like you still need to collect some of the \c[3]items\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Wow Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker], you really did it!\. Here's your rewards for it!
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I hope you enjoy your journey.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.101.settings.event.1.title: Combat Rank
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.101.settings.event.1.content: How to increase \c[3]Combat Rank\c[0] to improve the drops of defeated enemies.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.101.settings.event.1.acceptStep: Your \c[3]combat rank\c[0] is displayed in the upper right corner during combat.
By \c[3]defeating enemies\c[0] your rank will increase.
With a higher combat rank, enemies will \c[3]drop more items\c[0], including \c[3]special rare items\c[0].
When you're out of combat you'll enter the \c[3]cooldown phase\c[3].
When the blue line disappears, combat will end and you will  \c[3]lose your rank\c[0].
However, when you enter combat during cool down, you \c[3]keep your combat rank\c[3]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.13.message: Back to where our journey started...
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.19.message: By now those enemies are kind of a joke, non?
I mean...\. if we didn't have the \c[3]boosters\c[0] enabled, that is.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.27.message: I bet you got beat up plenty by those Hedgehags in the beginning.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.29.message: Those hedgehags were easy-peasy, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.32.message: Right. I forgot you were well prepared thanks to my amazing tutorial.
assets/data/maps/autumn/entrance.json.entities.148.settings.event.42.text:
Back then, she was the only clue I had.\.
That is why...\. I put her into the game.

Time to meet our pet again!
This time, we prepared a stage for you.
We took the liberty of modifying it a bit.
Now show us your best performance!
assets/data/maps/autumn/extra-boss.json.entities.286.settings.event.7.message: We promised to measure the time. Behold!
Why do you keep teasing us with this pose?
Yes. This pose. We know it.

assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/entrance.j.entities.10.settings.interact.hoverText: Home to all guilds with small budgets!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/entrance.j.entities.10.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Autumn Residences\c[0]
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/entrance.j.entities.181.settings.event.3.message: Oh, it's like a small village!

assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.3.event.1: Just wait until we reach your level, monsieur...
I'll make you regret calling us Newbies, you'll see!
Hah, you sound like my little brother planning to catch up with my age!
Oui, oui~ Laugh while you still can!
Repeating my words like parrot, cute!
Well, good luck with the cold dungeon.
Would be cool to have you two around as members.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Hey, you two! Back from the dungeon?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.4.event.5: But I'm glad it's over.\. Damn, I hated those bugs.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.4.event.6: Oh really? That was the best part of the dungeon if you ask me.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.4.event.8: Didn't you think those bugs were pretty damn... \c[3]cool\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.4.event.1: I guess something about them must have \c[3]bugged\c[0] you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: Hello there! Great to see the newbie squad complete again.
Monsieur, stop calling us newbies already.
You two will always be newbies in my heart!
Now, Lea. I need to talk to you.
You've been missed! It's good to see you again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: You should be aware that, as a First Scholar member, being absent for this long is unacceptable.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.7.event.5: We therefore demand the following compensation:
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.7.event.8: Also please make sure to collect the requested items with your fellow, bug-loving Pentafist friend.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.7.event.1: What...? This is all according to protocol. Better check what you sign!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.57.settings.npcStates.9.event.2: Sorry that's all the money you'll get from me for now.
Yeah...\. I'm sorry about that last joke during the D-Link.\. That was in poor taste.
So here is your actual reward!
I told you it's not a million, but I'm not a scrooge either.
You can sell those and buy some good \c[3]Cobalt equipment\c[0] or something like that. It'll pay off.
Too bad the raid won't happen, but it can't be helped.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.58.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: Holerö! Back in the game, I see? That's very good.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.58.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: Oh Junge... You really won't let it go.
She's mad because I didn't tell her that you're mute.
You knew it and you could have told me several times since the quiz!
But that wouldn't have been nearly as much fun to watch.
Just wait until I reach your level, I'll beat your derrière in PvP. Every. Single. Day.
Great. Very bright outlooks for me.
I also heard that Emilie finally found out about your speech module malfunction, hm?
Well, took her long enough. But this is just very much like her.
You know, I could have told her about it several times... but I sorta didn't.
Yeah sorry... I was just curious to see how long she'd manage to stay oblivious.
In hindsight that probably wasn't a very nice thing to do. Emilie is pretty mad at me now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.59.settings.event.27.message: Bringing in the girls as usual, huh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.59.settings.event.35.task: People are waiting for you in the upper floor of the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: Hello, my dears! So how about it, did you complete the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: Wonderful! So, are you ready to take the \c[3]quiz\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: We'll hold the quiz over there in the seminar room.
And of course both of you will be tested separately. Who wants to go first?
Oh, I'm fine with going first!
Oh? You still need some time?
D'accord, we'll come back soon, Lin!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Are you ready to retake the quiz?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: I see. Take all the time you need.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Lea, dear! It's great to see you again!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: And just in time for the raid! I suppose the others told you about it already?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.5: Well then, it's important that you collect the \c[3]\v[item.376.name]\c[0] first.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.6: You'll need it to enter the area of the raid event.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.8: That hopefully shouldn't be too hard for an ambitious Spheromancer like you, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.3.event.1: Hm? Oh, I've heard about your duel with the green-haired Spheromancer!
Seeking challenges already this early in the game, I'm so happy to have you in our guild!
Anyway, you've got time until tomorrow. Please be so kind and collect the Shade!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Lea, dear! It's great to see you again!
And just in time for the raid! I suppose the others told you about it already?
I was planning to hold a small briefing today to explain all the details to you.
Do you have time right now?
I see. Please tell me once you do.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: Lea, dear. No need to feel bad about this.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: We're playing this game to have fun.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.6.event.5: If raids aren't fun to you, there is no point to drag you with us, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.6.event.7: Anyway, I wish you a good time exploring \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.3: Lea, dear. It's good to see you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.4: I just had a talk with Tronny. Did he tell you the news already?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.6: It's a shame, but that's how it is.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.7: In moments like this, real life has to come first.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.9: Hmpf. Today really isn't the best day, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.60.settings.npcStates.8.event.1: Not only is Tronny going to leave, but I had to cancel a special end-game quest I was planning to partake in together with \c[3]Albert\c[0].
Why? Because he's \c[3]meeting his old friend\c[0] somewhere in \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
I'm not supposed to tell anybody, but why should I care when he just drops our plans so quickly~
Just make sure not to tell Buggy about it. Al would be really angry, otherwise.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.6: I see you are about to take that quiz to join this guild, right?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.9: Would it not be challenging to answer the questions with your current vocabulary?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.1: So you forgot about that, hm?
They would have found out about your speech malfunction sooner or later anyway.
Just remember: these kinds of things happen to players.
I just hope you will still be able to take the quiz, somehow...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.2: Lea, I did it!! I passed!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.3: What's wrong?\. You look really nervous...
Don't worry, the quiz is super simple!
I'm sure you can do it!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.4: Lea, dear, now it's your turn.
I hope you read all those text tables next to the statue in the temple mine.
Today's quiz is all about the god \c[3]Di'aro\c[0]!
Don't worry, it'll be just 4 simple questions.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.5: Di'aro is one of the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0]. Now...\. what shape did he represent?
So... should I repeat the question?
Huh? What is up Lea? Do you give up already?
Come on, it's really not that hard. Let me repeat the question.
Uhm...\. Yes! Lea, dear...\. That's your name.
Should... Should I repeat the question?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.6: I sort of noticed it before....
Lea you...\. can't really speak, can you...?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.7: Is it a speech module malfunction?
Oh Junge! I thought they managed to fix those issues.
I mean it's sort of weird that you can still say those few words.
Did they add some kind of workaround?
How did I not notice this before...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.8: Well... Still! That's no reason to cancel the quiz!
Easy! We'll just make it \c[3]multiple choice\c[0]!
Lea, dear... I'm sure you can still count with your fingers, right?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.15.thenStep.9: Well then, all I have to do is give you four options, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.23.message: Di'aro is known as the \c[3]Creator of Solid Surface\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.24.message: So... what exactly did Di'aro create?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.25.message:
A:\. \c[3]Mountains\c[0],\.\.
B:\. \c[3]Plants\c[0],\.\.
C:\. \c[3]Animals\c[0],\.\. or 
D:\. \c[3]The Sun\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.30.message: There was this time \c[3]E'Nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] worked together, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.32.thenStep.0:
A:\. \c[3]Waterfalls\c[0],\.\.
B:\. \c[3]Volcanoes\c[0],\.\.
C:\. \c[3]Black Holes\c[0],\.\. or 
D:\. ... uhm...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.32.thenStep.6: Really Buggy?\. Don't make it too easy for her!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.32.thenStep.7: Well I suppose it's clear that option D is not correct anyway...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.32.thenStep.1: Well then Lea, what did E'Nel and Di'aro create together?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.32.elseStep.0:
A:\. \c[3]Waterfalls\c[0],\.\.
B:\. \c[3]Volcanoes\c[0],\.\.
C:\. \c[3]Black Holes\c[0],\.\. or 
D:\. \c[3]Cream Puffs\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.33.3.1.messag: Oh come on, dear! Please be serious.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.33.3.2.messag: Well, I will count that as a wrong answer.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.36.message: Remember when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] tried to convince \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] that the Ancients are "ready for their journey"?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.37.message: He showed him one of the Ancient's achievements. What was it?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.38.message:
A:\. They \c[3]built huge cities\c[0],\.\.
B:\. They \c[3]traveled through the air\c[0],\.\.
C:\. They \c[3]reached the highest mountain\c[0],\.\. or
D:\. They \c[3]tamed the wildest animals\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.41.message: Alright, that's it! The quiz is over.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.0: I am sorry, dear. You only got \c[3]\v[tmp.correct] out of 4\c[0] answers correct.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.1: We expect a bit more of our members.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.3: It's okay! We can simply repeat the quiz.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.5: Here's a little hint for you: You find all the info right in your \c[3]encyclopedia\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.6: So how about you have a quick look and we try again?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.thenStep.2: So... what now?\. Can you redo the quiz?
Just have a good look in the \c[3]encyclopedia\c[0]. You find everything in there.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.1: Well, you got one answer wrong, but we can sweep that under the rug, eh?
You answered all 4 questions correctly, just wonderful!
Yes, yes. That's all about Di'aro.
Ah wait... I think I have a small bonus question for you, Lea!
Di'aro is a God of Shape representing the \c[3]Square\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.2: So, which \c[3]class\c[0] has been founded to honor Di'aro?

A:\. Triblader,\.\.
B:\. Quadroguard,\.\.
C:\. Pentafist,\.\. or
D:\. Hexacast?
Correct! \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0] is the class of the \c[3]Square\c[0].
Just like Di'aro's creations, Quadroguards are known for their stamina and endurance.
That's why we're the traditional "tanks" in your party.
Well then, it's time to make you and Emilie official members of the First Scholars!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.5: It is my greatest pleasure to announce two new members of the First Scholars.
Let's work together to contribute to our understanding of the Ancients!
And, you know, just have a good time, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.6: Merci beaucoup! It's great to join you guys!
So I suppose we'll see each other more often from now on.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.7: That's right! So you should join our party already!
Well, I think you still need to catch up to my level first.
Well, most of us are far ahead in levels.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.8: Yes, he hasn't been online the last few days, but he told me he'd show up again tomorrow.
I'm sure he'd gladly join your party.
Pardon everyone...\. I really have to log off now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.9: You know... we just rushed the whole Temple Mine and did that quiz in one session.
I'm currently seeing the sun rising. I really should try to get some sleep.
Ah yes, real life is calling.
And I hope to see you again, soon!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.61.settings.event.42.elseStep.1: And Lea? Don't forget about the \c[3]next dungeon\c[0]!
You know how it goes, oui? No starting without me!
Lea, dear. Do you plan to logout as well?
I'm sorry about your speech module issue, dear.
But I want you to know: this doesn't really matter to us!
You're a member of the First Scholars, so you're always welcome.
And if you have any problems whatsoever, we're here to help!
That's right! I'm sure things will work out just fine.
You are lucky to have found such a nice guild.
Well then, I'll log you out now. Good night, Lea!
...Um...\. did Lea just talk to somebody?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.24.message: Do you... see anything when you're offline?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.29.message: Oh! Did you see anything new that did not happen recently?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.31.message: Great! That means your memory really is returning.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.32.message: So, is there anything yet that you clearly remember?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.34.message: Okay. I am sure it will take some time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.35.message: But it is good to know we are making progress!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.38.message: Oh by the way! I managed to add a couple new words!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.49.message: So yes, I am working on adding all those question words.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.51.message: Well... because you ask basic questions that way, correct?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.53.message: ...Because you need question words to ask questions...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.55.message: I regret adding this word already.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.57.message: Anyway, your next destination is \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.58.message: You get there by going \c[3]West from Bergen\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.60.message: Unfortunately it seems that Emilie is offline at the moment.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.62.message: I am sure she will show up sooner or later!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.64.settings.event.64.task: Go to \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] to the \c[3]west of Bergen\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.25.message: Tomorrow we'll have our first raid with all First Scholar members!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.35.message: Anyway, that means we'll be 6 people in total!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.36.message: This is perfect, because for this raid we'll be split in two teams of 3 people each.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.42.message: The raid is balanced to match the average level of each team, so this will work just fine despite our level-difference.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.46.message: Nice! So we can still fight together after all?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.48.message: Sorry dear, not directly. Both teams will be on separate tracks running next to each other.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.50.message: Trust me, it's better that way.\. You don't want to be close to an aggressive level 60 enemy.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.51.message: Why not?\. I'm sure I'd handle it!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.53.message: Oh, I'd like to see that! Luke, you should swap places with Emilie!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.57.message: Hush, everyone! Let's not derail too much, alrighty?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.61.message: We might be on separate tracks, but there is still a collaboration between the two teams.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.64.message: That's correct! Essentially both teams have to attack the right targets at the same time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.68.message: Oh, that sounds interesting. How does it work exactly?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.70.message: Oh Tronny, don't worry too much about it yet.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.71.message: It's quite simple. We'll give you instructions when we're there!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.75.message: Also, be aware that there will be a tricky boss enemy at the end for each team.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.76.message: So make sure to be well prepared, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.81.message: Our slot is reserved for tomorrow afternoon in-game time. Make sure you're not too late!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.83.message: Also the entrance to the raid area is within Autumn's Fall, close to the statue.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.84.message: So... Let's just meet at the statue tomorrow.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.106.message: Look at that! Emilie was so excited, she burst!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.112.message: It's just a small connection error. It happens occasionally.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.114.message: Huh?\. So they still have connection errors these days?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.119.message: No, that's not a connection error, strictly speaking.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.120.message: It's one of the avatar servers failing.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.121.message: CrossWorlds is run by a huge distributed system.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.122.message: There are hundreds of servers just for the avatars.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.123.message: So it is not unknown that some of them occasionally fail.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.124.message: The backup should be up in a few seconds.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.145.message: Don't worry dear! Just a small technical issue.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.147.message: Alors...\. Actually, I was planning to log off soon anyway.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.148.message: Still gotta get some stuff done, so I have all the time tomorrow for the raid.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.156.message: Tronny, Lea? Let's meet tomorrow and go to the raid together!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.157.message: And make sure to be there on time! We still might want to prepare a bit!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.160.message: Well then...\. See you tomorrow!\. Au revoir!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.174.message: What about you, Lea? Logging off as well?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.67.settings.event.177.message: Might be a good idea.\. I will make sure to get you back into the game in time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.25.message: I made sure to log you in early, so there is still plenty of time before the raid.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.33.message: Hm, was it that one location again?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.40.message: Now I am somewhat puzzled. What else could you have remembered?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.43.message: Actually, about the dream you had before this...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.44.message: I prepared a couple of questions that could help us to pinpoint the location you saw.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.47.message: Did it look like a \c[3]jungle\c[0]? With lots of plants, huge trees, et cetera?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.50.message: Alright, I suppose it would not be \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0], then.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.52.message: Was it a fairly dark location? With \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and similar plants?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.55.message: I see! It must be \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0], then.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.57.message: That is one of the later locations in CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.58.message: It is still a ways off, but we will reach it eventually.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.59.message: And once you are there, maybe it will help you to recover your memory.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.61.message: Well then, let us continue with today's schedule!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.62.message: In other words... let us prepare for the \c[3]raid\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.63.message: I think the guild wanted to meet at the \c[3]statue in Autumn's Fall\c[0], right?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.68.settings.event.66.task: Meet the other First Scholar Members at the \c[3]Statue\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.19.message: All I know is that you just left...\. in the middle of the raid.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.20.message: We had to cancel the whole thing... and we had such a good run.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.22.message: Then you've been missing for a whole week!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.24.message: You have still been listed as \c[3]online\c[0], but I couldn't contact you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.26.message: That's what I want to know!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.27.message: Someone told me that you might have \c[3]blocked\c[0] us from contacting you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.32.message: Please, you have to tell me.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.41.message: There are so many things I don't know about you...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.42.message: And I can't even properly ask you...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.50.message: Alors... I guess all that's left then is asking lots of \c[3]questions\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.52.message: Why did you drop out of the raid?\. Was it a bug?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.55.message: Then what? Did you cancel the raid on purpose?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.74.message: Oui, she just showed up today.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.75.message: I'm currently trying to find out what exactly happened.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.76.message: Well, that will be hard to figure out with her speech limitation....
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.77.message: I know.\. I'll just poke her with questions until I get a good picture.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.94.message: Is everything alright?\. Wh-What are you doing?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.95.message: Just what exactly happened to you after you left the raid?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.127.message: Wh...\. What was that?\. That came out of nowhere.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.69.settings.event.129.message: Has she gone crazy or something?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.70.settings.event.0.message: No one here? They're probably upstairs.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.21.message: I heard you've just been at the top of Grand Krys'kajo?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.23.message: It's such a magical place, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.24.message: Floating high up in space, meeting all of the Ancient gods together...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.25.message: Oui, oui! It's great. Anyway, we got \c[3]awesome news\c[0], Lea!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.31.message: Emilie cutting right to the chase as always...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.34.message: We found another opportunity for a raid, thanks to Tronny.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.39.message: No need to be so humble, you looked it up and told us about it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.44.message: This raid would start tomorrow and is once again for 6 people.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.45.message: Lukas isn't around at the moment, so Albert will join instead.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.46.message: That is, if you have the time, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.60.message: I am really sorry to say this, but it would be wise to decline the offer this time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.62.message: I have this suspicion you see.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.63.message: It looks like the current raid system has a \c[3]security hole\c[0] enabling a third person to drag you out of it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.64.message: That is likely how you ended up in Vermillion Wasteland last time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.66.message: And we really cannot afford to end up there a second time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.67.message: Especially right now when we are so close to reaching that place in your dreams.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.68.message: So doing the raid right now...\. would be \c[3]very risky\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.85.message: Dear... could it be that you are concerned about what happened last time?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.88.message: Come on... this was likely just a random issue.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.89.message: I highly doubt it would happen again this time around.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.96.message: Aww man... that's a shame.\. But what can you do?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.97.message: Raids really are no fun if people are forced into them.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.100.message: We should respect Lea's decision here, ok?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.107.message: Fine, if you really don't want to.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.108.message: Well...\. I suppose it's just a bit too soon, after all?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.110.message: That's okay. I'm sure there will be more opportunities in the future.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.112.message: I want to complete at least one raid with you, chérie!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.114.message: Well then...\. I suppose it's time to explore \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] now?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.119.message: Ohhh! You're at that point now. Nice.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.120.message: I'm sure you'll love that area, Emilie!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.131.message: Let me know if you want to start a party, Lea!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.133.message: Same for me, see you around!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.147.message: Good bye, dear!\. And take care!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.153.message: I know you would have liked to do the raid, but we really have to be careful about this.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.71.settings.event.158.task: It's finally time to explore \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] to the east of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.8.message: Okay, nobody seems to be here right now. Perfect.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.9.message: Please have a closer look at the \c[3]projector\c[0] in the meeting room.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.19.message: Alright, I have the model number. One moment please...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.32.message: It works! That is very convenient!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.33.message: Satoshi told me how to connect to any projector inside the playground.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.34.message: That way, I will be able to talk to other players...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.35.message: This might come in handy pretty soon.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.37.message: Well... it is still too early to get into the details right now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.39.message: Anyway... should we call it a day?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.72.settings.event.40.message: I will need a bit more time thinking about all of this myself.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.24.message: Oh...\. I am sorry to hear that.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.25.message: Do you want to... talk about it?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.39.message: We just keep running into each other recently, don't we?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.41.message: Actually, this is very convenient since I wanted to speak with you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.43.message: I just had a quick talk with Lin.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.44.message: I'll need to take a little break from the game soon.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.45.message: That means I won't be around for some time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.48.message: It's... personal stuff. I'd rather not talk about it, sorry.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.50.message: I will still be around the next few days though, if there's anything else you'd like to do.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.52.message: As usual, just call me via D-Link! See you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.63.message: Well...\. we should not forget that we are logged into an MMO.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.64.message: There is still that real life out there... for the others at least.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.67.message: Uhm... sorry.\. I should have worded that differently.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.69.message: The plan to reach the Evotar server is almost complete.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.71.message: We will have to \c[3]storm Vermillion Wasteland\c[0] together with a lot of other players.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.72.message: You remember how strong some of the enemies were over there, correct?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.74.message: There is still enough \c[3]time to prepare\c[0]. You should make sure your \c[3]stats\c[0] and \c[3]equipment level\c[0] are as high as possible.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.75.message: It might be worthwhile to visit \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0] for that.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.76.message: Once you feel ready, let us go back to the \c[3]Hideout\c[0] and discuss the remaining details with Satoshi and Shizuka.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.84.message: Why, hello there, Lea! You're here as well?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.74.settings.event.87.task: Prepare yourself for reentering Vermillion Wasteland. Talk to \c[3]Satoshi\c[0] at the \c[3]Hideout\c[0] when ready.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.13.message: Of course nobody is here. That would have been too easy...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.14.message: Well then, let us try to contact everyone via D-Link.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.15.message: Time to use your new vocabulary!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.24.message: It's good to still see you in the game.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.25.message: Tronny has been offline for several days now. I suppose he's gone for good.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.27.message: He didn't even say goodbye, that dork.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.39.message: Oh! You'll wait so meet at your current location?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.52.message: Hey, that worked better than I expected!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.77.message: Oh, you mean about what happened before?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.79.message: Lea, it was just a hug.\. Don't worry about it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.80.message: It wasn't even that strong, no broken spine, all good.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.82.message: Gyahaha! No really, it's all yesterday's snow to me.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.96.message: I don't know, don't you think this is a bit too soon?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.97.message: Just one hug and now you want to meet me privately in there?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.105.message: Gyahahahahaha!\. I'm just messing with you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.109.message: Do you want to have a meeting?\. With all First Scholar members?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.111.message: Alright! I can get everyone together if you like!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.113.message: No worries!\. Give me a moment, I'll be right back.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.121.message: Great, Schneider helping out will make this a lot easier!
Honestly I would have asked Albert to get everyone together, but it seems he is not online yet.
Let us hope he will show up soon.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.123.message: Well then...\. next, let us call Apollo and Joern.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.125.message: We need all the help we can get, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.135.message: Spheromancer Lea! It's good to see you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.139.message: I think she wants to meet us.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.75.settings.event.140.message: So...\. does this mean you are ready for our next duel?!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.52.message: This is a very comfy building for an HQ. I like it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.59.message: So finally I meet the famous Grasshead I've heard so much about.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.63.message: By the way, aren't we all just Grassheads of different colors?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.65.message: Well, at least I have the color of fresh grass!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.66.message: Yes, but I'm the wise Grasshead. Listen to your elder, greenhorn!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.79.message: Let's hear what Lea has to say!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.96.message: Lea, the hologram number... I forgot the number...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.128.message: And I am here to explain Lea's circumstances to you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.129.message: All of you should be aware of her speech module issues by now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.130.message: However, there is another aspect of Lea you are probably unaware of.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.132.message: Lea...\. is an \c[3]AI\c[0]. Her avatar is controlled by an \c[3]artificial intelligence\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.144.message: Does this man tell the truth?!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.155.message: N-No way!\. That can't be true...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.161.message: So wait, does that mean a \c[3]bot\c[0] managed to join our guild?!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.166.message: Lea, dear...\. So, are...\. are you an NPC?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.170.message: Lea is a regular avatar, controlled by a very special kind of AI.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.171.message: Allow me to start from the beginning...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.180.message: We finally met Satoshi and Shizuka, hidden somewhere in Sapphire Ridge.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.181.message: That is how we learned everything and how we could come up with a plan.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.182.message: A plan to storm Vermillion Wasteland to reach the Evotar Server.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.183.message: And that is where we are right now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.191.message: Spheromancer Lea!\. I...\. I don't know how to respond to this!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.195.message: All this tech talk just went way over my head!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.196.message: But what was this part about punching through dungeon walls? That sounded awesome!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.202.message: Don't worry, hon.\. This situation is...\. very particular.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.206.message: Okay...\. now this is where you come in.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.207.message: In order to properly storm Vermillion Wasteland, we need your help.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.208.message: So please...\. for the sake of Lea...\. and all Evotars, can we count on your support?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.221.message: Lea is a dear friend to me!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.222.message: She can be an AI or a loaf of baguette for all I care!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.230.message: Lea is a member of this guild and we should support her.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.231.message: I mean... sure this situation is crazy and storming Vermillion Wasteland might get us into trouble.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.232.message: But how often do you get the chance to break into unfinished game territory, am I right?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.237.message: This sounds like a crazy kind of raid!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.241.message: I'm not sure I can approve of all this rule-breaking behavior!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.249.message: The way Evotars are currently treated is a disgusting display of injustice!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.250.message: By my name and the honor of the Spheromancers, this cannot stand!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.258.message: Very true! We First Scholars can not abide such cruelty!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.263.message: Also, everyone get down from that table!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.280.message: Honestly...\. I never expected this amount of enthusiasm.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.281.message: I am very glad we have you on our side!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.282.message: Now we just have to find a good time that fits everyone.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.287.message: It's the weekend and I have time!\. Let's do it today!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.295.message: I was planning to do some shopping today.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.319.message: Fantastic! Then let us meet in about an hour in front of the \c[3]Dojo\c[0] in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.320.message: The entrance to Vermillion Wasteland is nearby!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.321.message: Also... before you leave, we should try to establish a direct communication channel.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.338.message: We are all set! Now I can talk directly to all of you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.342.message: Nice!\. Then I'll quickly optimize my equipment and gather a few items!\. See you soon!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.349.message: Alrighty! Al and I better prepare as well.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.361.message: You said there was a...\. Evotar copy of me in Evotarground?\. Potentially interrogated?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.364.message: I better logout and quickly change all my credentials!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.365.message: I'll meet you in Sapphire Ridge!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.377.message: Spheromancer Lea! We shall prepare as well!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.378.message: We'll show them what it means to deal with the wrath of the Spheromancers!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.398.message: Now I finally understand what has been going on with you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.399.message: You really must miss him, non?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.411.message: We'll get him out of there! Promise!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.420.message: I'm gonna kick Sidwell's derrière so hard, he'll never sit well again!!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.434.message: I guess that is it! We are all set!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.436.message: Let us meet with everyone else at the \c[3]dojo\c[0] in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.437.message: We had better be prepared as well!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.76.settings.event.458.task: Meet everyone at \c[3]Old Dojo\c[0] in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] to start the operation!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.79.settings.event.13.message: Hm...\. Albert isn't here, maybe upstairs?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.15.message: So what do you want to tell me?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.33.message: Lea, I need to see the serial number of the projector again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.53.message: My name is Sergey Asimov.\. I am...\. an acquaintance of Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.55.message: I am sure all of this is very unexpected...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.57.message: I am here because I wanted to talk to you - about Lea, her circumstances, and other things.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.58.message: But before that, I want to emphasize that all of this is highly confidential.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.59.message: I need your word that you will not share this information with anybody else.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.61.message: That is fine. I can keep a secret.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.62.message: Alright then! First things first...\. about Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.63.message: She is in fact \c[3]not controlled\c[0] by a player.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.71.message: But it is very hard to believe.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.72.message: I mean yes, she can barely talk, but she reacts very naturally otherwise.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.74.message: It certainly does explain some of the weird circumstances from before.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.75.message: What about you, Mr. Asimov? What exactly are you doing here?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.76.message: I am merely connected to the game to watch and support her.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.78.message: So why is this player controlled by an AI?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.79.message: And why do you want to talk to me about this?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.80.message: It will take a bit longer to explain all the details.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.81.message: That is why I suggest we two talk about this somewhere outside of the game.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.82.message: You should be able to see my contact info next to the hologram.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.84.message: I have to admit you've made me curious.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.80.settings.event.86.message: Lea? I need to log you out for the time being. We will talk again later.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.23.message: So...\. things have been progressing surprisingly fast!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.24.message: I explained the situation to Albert and we got in touch with \c[3]Mr. Vestorovich\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.25.message: And we have ourselves an appointment!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.27.message: Mr. Vestorovich wants to meet you in person. He is expecting you in his \c[3]mansion in Rhombus Square\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.28.message: Albert will pick you up at the \c[3]sky rail station in Rhombus Square - South Arch\c[0] and lead the way.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.29.message: We should hurry. Mr. Vestorovich is a busy person.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.81.settings.event.32.task: Meet Albert at the \c[3]Sky Rail Station\c[0] in \c[3]Rhombus Square - South Arch\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.24.message: Not yet, dear.\. We're still waiting.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.26.message: He should contact us any minute now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.43.thenStep.0: It has been some time...\. how have you been?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.43.elseStep.0: It is good to see you again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.43.elseStep.1: It has been quite some time...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.48.message: Let's cut to the chase!\. What about Lea?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.51.thenStep.3: But...\. we could not convince them.\. I am sorry.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.51.thenStep.1: I am not allowed to let Lea back into the game.
Nor was I allowed...\. to keep any data of the Evotars...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.51.elseStep.3: Instatainment agreed on a \c[3]research project\c[0] within the Playground!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.51.elseStep.4: We will be able to get Evotars back in the game in a few months.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-e.entities.83.settings.event.51.elseStep.1: Dear, please get off the table!

assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.17.settings.text:
The Hedgehog Sandwich
- Myth or Fiction -
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.18.settings.text: The Art of the Laser Lasagne
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.59.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Uhm... may I ask what your class is?
Ah! That is the \c[3]mage class\c[0], non?
I don't know why...\. but you don't quite strike me as a mage, monsieur.
That's fine. I get that a lot.
Well then... Good luck with the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
Uh...\. this guy's kinda hard to talk to, non?
I must say, I appreciate your company.
Not being so chatty, only saying what is necessary.
Well then...\. Good luck with the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.59.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Good day. Back from the dungeon?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.59.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Yes! We're ready to take that quiz, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.59.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Good day, Lea. It's great to see you back in CrossWorlds again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.59.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: That's good. Hexacasts shine the most when in a party.
That's true. Now that you mention it, I should probably learn a few more buff and debuff skills.
Good idea, those are very useful indeed.
Actually... I have a lot more questions about this class. You seem very experienced, so if you don't mind me asking...
You're still early in the game, anyway. Not too much you can do wrong now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.60.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Hello, my dears! Please make yourself at home and let me know if you need anything.
Lin, I was wondering...\. are you the leader of this guild?
Well, yes... you could say that.
I started this guild together with \c[3]Al\c[0].
But we're all pretty much family at this point!
It sure feels like visiting a family house.
With so many grown up children...
Why yes, we all just stayed young at heart!
Life is too short to be all serious business, eh?
Lea, dear, you're all by yourself right now?
