Well, just tell me when you two completed the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0] so we can have the quiz!
Ah don't worry, my dear! I'm sure you'll do great!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.20.message: Now, now, Raphael - don't call them 'newbies'! It's rude.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.21.message: Come on, Chief! You know I'm joking.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.30.message: My nickname is \c[3]Hlin\c[0], but you can call me \c[3]Linda\c[0] or just \c[3]Lin\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.36.message: Good day. Pleased to meet you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.40.message: If you two joined our guild, we'd have members of all 5 classes!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.41.message: Ah, but I'm getting ahead of myself.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.61.message: Nothing like I had imagined it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.64.message: It's like the house I always wanted to own.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.65.message: Now of course it's not the fortress that many people expect.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.66.message: But really, the few of us wouldn't know what to do with all the space, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.69.message: Japp. Also it's not like we could afford the castle of our dreams.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.72.message: So...\. there're just...\. 4 members right now?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.73.message: Not quite, dear. Someone else joined us not too long ago, but he isn't around at the moment.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.74.message: So that makes \c[3]5 members\c[0] in total.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.75.message: And you two just started playing, right?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.77.message: Oui! We just reached Bergen and were about to enter the mine.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.78.message: Ah, wonderful! The first real dungeon. It's always something special.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.79.message: It's the first time you'll be entering a \c[3]heritage site of the Ancients\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.81.message: Why, it's what we \c[3]Seekers\c[0] are looking for.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.82.message: We try to solve the \c[3]Secret of the Ancients\c[0], eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.83.message: Each heritage site includes a few pieces of the big puzzle.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.86.message: Did you know that the full secret of the Ancients has yet to be discovered?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.88.message: Oh yes, they're so crafty about it!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.89.message: The official path of the game will only tell you so much.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.90.message: They keep releasing new quests that will reward you with more information.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.91.message: But the puzzle has yet to be completed!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.92.message: And yes, that is what our guild is all about.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.93.message: We are the First Scholars and we study the Ancients!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.94.message: We want to be the first to unravel the secret!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.98.message: And now you understand why our guild is so small!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.103.message: Well, I think it's nice to be in a small guild like this.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.105.message: There is just too much stress and responsibility with the big ones.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.106.message: I think it's nice, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.109.message: Lea, my dear, you've been so quiet all the time. Is something the matter?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.113.message: Anyway, I'd be glad to join! You too, Lea?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.116.message: Now, now! We have a small tradition here for new members.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.119.message: Oh don't worry, it's very simple!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.120.message: We want to test your knowledge of the Ancients.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.121.message: But for that I'm afraid you first need to complete the Temple Mine in Bergen!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.122.message: Just make sure to read everything at the heritage site and you should be well prepared.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.130.message: Come on, Lea! Let's do the dungeeeeon!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.140.message: It was a pleasure to meet you two.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.141.message: Feel free to drop by whenever you like.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.142.message: Oh, and I suppose now is a good time to share contacts, too!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.148.message: Alrighty! Tell me when you're ready for the quiz!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.174.title: Contact other players
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.174.content: Learn how to contact other players of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.61.settings.event.174.acceptSte: You find your contacts in the \c[3]second tab\c[0].
You can \c[3]contact\c[0] those players to have a small chat as long as they are \c[3]online\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.63.settings.npcStates.2.event.1: So you two are determined to enter the dungeon together?
You are aware that dungeons are instanced, right?
You have to beat it by yourselves.
But we enter at the same time and do a race on who completes the dungeon first.
Just like with \c[3]Rhombus Dungeon\c[0]. I was first that time.
Well, to be honest, it was very close.
Oh Junge, you're quite the competitive pair!
Hello Lea, how are you doing? Emilie not with you right now?
Japp. You're a quiet one, alright.
Well, not that you'd get to talk much with chatty Emilie being around.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Holerö! Did you finish the dungeon?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Oui, we're ready for the quiz now!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.6: Oh well...\. all those stupid cold bugs put me off.\. I really hate bugs, you know?
Don't worry Lea, there are still several dungeons left.
Right and I'll win all of them!!
Whoa, this rivalry right there.\. Scary.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.8.message: Bonjour everyone, look who's back again!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.19.message: It's good to see you again after all this time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.21.message: Our little runaway has returned!\. Hi!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.28.message: We've been very worried about you. It has been so long...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.30.message: Dear, what exactly happened to you back then?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.34.message: Well...\. we couldn't really figure out the details.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.35.message: But it's clear that none of it was Lea's intention.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.36.message: Why of course not!\. There never was any doubt about that.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.41.message: I was just stubborn.\. I'm sorry, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.42.message: It's alright Emilie. We've all been rather bummed out about the raid.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.43.message: But I'm sure that another opportunity will come up, soon enough!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.47.message: So that's all well and great, but one major question remains.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.75.message: Why make a big deal out of it? Maybe she just likes to hug people...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.77.message: It really did come out of nowhere, though...
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.78.message: Man, I wished I could have seen that.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.83.message: I'd rather like to know how this whole situation was even possible to begin with.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.84.message: Lea being online with no way to contact her.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.85.message: Especially over such a long time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.90.message: You know what? You should talk to Ivan about this!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.92.message: Please, that's not how it works.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.93.message: Why would he care about individual user issues like this?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.94.message: All games have them. It's not relevant for the bigger picture.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.95.message: Yeah, yeah...\. as long as profits are flowing, the big-shot shareholder is happy!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.98.message: Just for the record, that's why I'd never introduce you to him.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.103.message: Well...\. Sorry, but I have to logout now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.110.message: I'll be back tomorrow so we can continue our dungeon race then!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.68.settings.event.141.message: Oh! Yes, of course! Until tomorrow, Lea!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.41.message: I see...\. How about you tell me by number this time?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.44.message: Gautham?\. What did you remember about him?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.47.message: Anything hinting to where Satoshi could be located?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.49.message: Hm... what else could there be?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.52.message: Actually, there was something that struck me back when we saw him in Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.53.message: Gautham... he didn't look like he was an avatar.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.54.message: He was the spitting image of how I remember him from real life.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.57.message: Oh?\. Was that what you saw?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.58.message: So Gautham...\. he is indeed not an avatar? Is he himself located right in the Playground?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.60.message: This...\. this is insane...\. Why would he even be here?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.71.message: Tronny and I have been waiting for you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.72.message: We should continue our dungeon race, non?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.74.message: Great!\. I've plenty of time today!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.75.message: Maybe we might even complete all the dungeons of Gaia's Garden!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.77.message: So let's start a party and keep going!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.84.message: Not much further until we finally reach \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.87.thenStep.0: Complete the \c[3]So'najiz Dungeon\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.70.settings.event.87.elseStep.0: Complete the \c[3]Zir'vitar Dungeon\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.13.message: Should we try to contact him via D-Link?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.35.message: I'm sorry, but I really don't have time for a guessing game right now, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.36.message: Please try to discuss this with someone else.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.42.message: That...\. did not got too well.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.44.message: Let us be more persistent. Just call him again!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.46.message: Come on! I know you can do it, Lea!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.56.message: Are you just calling me again to say sorry?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.58.message: It's fine. Just don't call me again. Thank you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.67.message: Lea, I know it is unpleasant, but try to be more assertive.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.69.message: The future of Evotars may very well depend on this call.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.93.message: And you can't discuss this with anyone else?
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.97.message: Should we meet in person? In CrossWorlds, I mean.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.99.message: Alright, maybe that way you will get your message across.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/inner-fs-o.entities.71.settings.event.112.message: Now you just have to wait for him on the ground floor and try to drag him into the \c[3]meeting room\c[0].

Hello Seeker. I'm terribly sorry, but this guild is currently upgrading their headquarters.
Because of this, entry to it is currently not possible.

assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/left.json.entities.280.settings.blockEvent.1.thenS: Lea... if we plan to talk to Albert, we definitely should do so alone.
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/left.json.entities.283.settings.event.8.message: Here we are, the \c[3]Headquarters of the First Scholars\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/left.json.entities.283.settings.event.15.message: Aww! It's a cute little house!
assets/data/maps/autumn/guild/left.json.entities.283.settings.event.17.message: Told you we're a small guild, right?

You want to give this to me?
That's awfully nice of you. May I ask why?
Wait, what? Please tell me your voice module is broken.
Phew, well no problem. It can happen.
assets/data/maps/autumn/lake-observatory.entities.527.settings.interact.title: \c[3]The Observatory\c[0]
assets/data/maps/autumn/lake-observatory.entities.527.settings.interact.event.0.t: To observe those who seek all elements is our duty.
assets/data/maps/autumn/lake-observatory.entities.527.settings.interact.event.1.t: If you dare to seek our wisdom, then only what is broken can open this door.

Ye just go into that big room to start the fight.
I'll keep track of the time ye take for it.
Ye just go into that big room to start the fight.
I'll keep track of the time ye take for it.
Ye back for another try or to see yer best time?
Ye just go into the big room lass. I'll save the time for ye.
Ye wanna take a look at yer best times?
Alright. Ye come back later then. The challenge takes a while to be ready again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.7.message: Just like in the ol' days.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.19.message: Still a big room inside a darn small building.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.20.message: Them developers sure know how to make it look plausible.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.22.message: Well, the counter is still there. So I guess ye can take on the challenge.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.24.message: Ye want to try it out?
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.26.message: But ye better make sure ye're up to the task.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.27.message: The challenge here is pretty darn tough.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.29.message: Heh, can't stop the lass from a fight.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.30.message: Ye just go into that big room to start the battle.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.4.settings.event.31.message: I'll save the time ye need for it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.39.settings.event.4.message: Ye did it! Very good performance, lass.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.39.settings.event.6.message: As promised I saved your time. So just talk to me to get an overview.
assets/data/maps/autumn/observatory-inne.entities.39.settings.event.7.message: However the challenge will need some time to be ready again.

Let me guess, I'm not your first, right?
I'm not sure why, but someone just sends me gifts from time to time.
Well, I don't mind the free stuff, so keep them coming.

A Spheromancer? Not something I see very often these days.
You see, the class is very hard to master, so it became a bit unpopular, I would say.
And nowadays, you only find a handful of people trying to play it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-1.json.entities.192.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-n] Normal Clearing
\i[arrow-w] Road to Bergen Trail
\i[arrow-e] Rookie Harbor
I... I am so sorry.\. For real this time.
I'm serious!\. I'm out of smokebombs anyway, otherwise those damn \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s never would've gotten me.
But maybe they've been sent by the Track to show me the error of my ways.
This time I will turn myself in and atone for my crimes. Truly.
So... if you will excuse me.
B... but I was going to come to you anyway.\. Don't you trust me?
Sorry pal. Trust is nice and all but I won't take any more risks with you.
In any case, thanks girl.\. You did great work here.\. Report back to the chief to get your reward.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-1.json.entities.306.settings.event.7.name: Shady Shorsh
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-1.json.entities.306.settings.event.9.message: Ahhh, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, help meeee!
Oh! W-Why hello S-S-Seeker!
Hi!
How very f-f-fortunate, I just finished my preparations.
And even exactly the kind of s-seeker I was looking for.
Good S-Seeker, I'm in desperate n-need of help.
W-W-W-Wait, you're still h-here?
[nods]
T-That is most unexpected I must s-s-say.
P-people often rather choose to ignore m-m-me.
I d-d-don't suppose y-you would like to h-h-h-help me?
[nods]
R-R-R-Really?!?
S-Splendid!
O-Okay, l-l-let me introduce myself first.
Henry
I'm H-Henry! Henry the Researcher.
I study this fine moon's F-Flora and F-F-Fauna.
W-What is your name?
Lea!
A f-fine name, a f-f-fine name indeed.
I will r-remember it.
You see, I-I want to gather some d-data for \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
B-But it seems that I alone can't gather everything I w-w-want.
The \c[3]T-Track of the Ancients\c[0] only allows \c[3]Seekers\c[0] to find c-certain things.
I c-c-compiled a list of things I need.
F-First I need some items and Information on the local w-wildlife.
Additionally I n-n-need a list of all the landmarks in this a-area.
Finally I need y-you to retrieve a p-probe I installed further ahead.
I would be honored if you would help me g-g-gather all the intel.
P-Please find out what you c-c-can and return to me!
[nods]
T-thank you so much for your h-h-help!
A-and in case you wondering how the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-ones next to m-me.
O-Oh... You are not interested after all I see...
[shakes head]
Ah... I t-t-thought so...
Yes
No
In c-c-case you wondering what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-ones next to m-me.
Were you able to f..find all the data I r-requested?
I d-don't know what to s-s-say!
With t-this I might be able to piece together h-h-how they made this area.
H-Here, take this! I'm looking forward to w-w-working with you again.
H-Hey Lea! Thanks again for h-h-helping me.

assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.72.settings.condAnims.0.interac: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
Can't you see I'm in the middle of something here?
Still in the middle of something.
Oh dang it, I fell asleep again.
Sorry for startling you. Is this for me?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.18.message: Mon Dieu, not this guy again~
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.21.message: Good!\. I see your level is now in an acceptable range.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.23.message: As if that one level would have made a big difference.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.25.message: Your previous actions have not been forgotten!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.26.message: Being a cheater is bad as it is.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.28.message: But seeing a \c[3]Spheromancer\c[0] displaying such dishonest behavior!\. It breaks my heart!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.32.message: We Spheromancers are a noble, yet unappreciated class!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.33.message: I can't allow a player like you to further damage our reputation!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.36.message: Why of course!\. Don't you see my striking crimson outfit?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.38.message: Pardon, I thought you were a Triblader with all that green and...\. pointy hair.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.40.message: It's plain to see that fashion is beyond your grasp.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.43.message: Anyway!\. I'm talking to you, blue-haired Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.58.message: Come on!\. We just started playing!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.60.message: Of course we won't do it right here and now.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.61.message: Let's have our duel at the \c[3]entrance of Bergen Trail\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.62.message: I'll test your skills properly - to make sure you don't use any more dishonest methods!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.69.message: Good!\. I'll be waiting for you!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.82.message: Are you sure it's okay to accept his challenge just like that?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.86.message: Then let's make sure you're well prepared!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.87.message: I want you to kick this guy's derrière!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-2.json.entities.257.settings.event.91.task: Apollo challenged you to a duel and waits for you at the entrance of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0]. Be prepared!

assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.40.settings.condAnims.0.interac: The sick tree. Applying \c[3]\v[item.189.name]\c[0] should cure it but it will take time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.91.settings.condAnims.0.interac: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.254.settings.event.8.message: We don't like it but we are forced to give you this.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.254.settings.event.16.message: Don't expect a second reward from us.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.262.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-ne] Autumn Residences
\i[arrow-w] To Bergen Trail
\i[arrow-e] To Rookie Harbor
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.287.settings.event.20.task: \c[3]Defend the tree for 2 minutes\c[0] for the salve to take effect!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.327.settings.event.7.text: Salve lost effect. The sickness returned!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.327.settings.event.18.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
Now this is the entrance to a small and humble \c[3]guild area\c[0].
You'll need a pass to enter, so here you go!
This item gives you access to our headquarters as well.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.330.settings.event.2.message: The entrance is over there to the \c[3]north\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.12.message: That...\. Lukas...\. he does not remember what happened, correct?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.14.message: I...\. kind of suspected as much.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.15.message: Sorry, I should have talked with you about it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.16.message: That Lukas you met in Vermillion Wasteland...
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.19.message: In fact...\. I suspect that was the case for all players we saw back there.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.22.message: Do you...\. not want to go back to them?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.26.message: But I am sure they still mean well with you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.28.message: M-Maybe give it a bit of time.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.29.message: I am sure you will be able to reconcile eventually.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.32.message: I suppose...\. we should go to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] next?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.33.message: That is the next major area, north of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.34.message: Our goal is still to reach \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0], correct?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.37.message: I really should try to extend your vocabulary at least a little bit more.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.38.message: It will be difficult, but I know a few words that might help you in situations like this.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.41.message: I will get on that while you make your way through \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0], alright?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-1.json.entities.456.settings.event.48.task: Head to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] (north of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]) by yourself.

Good day Madame. I see you play the lonely class of Spheromancer.
A view I consider quite rare.
It was a pleasant event to meet you.

assets/data/maps/autumn/path-3-4.json.entities.117.settings.condAnims.0.intera: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
I wonder if they'll ever bring back the fishing system...

assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.791.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Halfway through! I'll go to the end and wait for you.
Hey you!
I'm one of the testers for this game!
The devs asked me to test an almost finished new quest type: \c[3]Parkour\c[0]!
I'm kinda tired and you just came along. So\..\..\.. Wanna try it out?
Nice! Good to see some enthusiasm!
Alright, get this. You will start right next to me.
When you touch this checkpoint, another will pop up.
Your goal is to walk through every marker until you hit the last one.
Aaaaand the last one is over there.
It will only appear after you hit the last normal marker.
Yeah, I know. But it's more fun that way right?
Well, at least if you like running.
Also, if you leave the map all your progress is lost!
Another bummer, I know.
Anyway!
Ready to try?
[nods]
Awesome! As I said, just start by stepping on the first marker here!
[shakes head]
Really? Oh man, I don't wanna do this all alone.
That's like\..\..\.. so much work.
If you ever change your mind...
Come back, alright?\.\.\. Please?
Just one more, it's right next to you!
Go on, you can do it!
Just step on this first marker here and start running!
Just one more, it's right next to you!
Go on, you can do it!
Just step on this first marker here and start running!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.813.settings.event.7.message: And there was no problem, right? No sudden shocks or anything?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.813.settings.event.12.message: Thanks a lot! Take this for your efforts.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.813.settings.event.13.message: I hope we can meet again.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.813.settings.event.15.message: ...So you can help me again, you know?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.819.settings.text: A data probe installed by Henry.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-7-1.json.entities.820.settings.text: A data probe installed by Henry. The data has been retrieved.

assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.9.thenStep.2: Are y'all inner'sted in plants too?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.9.elseStep.2: Y'all gave me quite the scare there.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.10.message: They got some mighty strange doohickeys inside, don'tcher think?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.14.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.15.message: Ah've takin' a notion ta findin' an' analyzin' as many as ah can.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.16.message: But that's turned out ta be a lot harder than ah 'spected.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.17.message: See, gettin' at what's inside seems ta only be doable by Seekers.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path-8.json.entities.429.settings.event.18.message: Ah can only collec' what they bring me.
Might y'all be inner'sted in givin' me a hand?
Y'all already seem ta know the drill.
Much obliged, girl, that there's mighty kind o' y'all.
First, lemme give y'all this here...
This handy li'l gizmo will help y'all keep track o' yer progress.
Jes' keep hittin' them plants an' analyze 'em by gettin' them doohickeys.
Y'all can check yer progress in the menu too!
Ah took the liberty of addin' mah findin's fer the \c[3]Alpha Ball Plant\c[0].
Jes' keep hittin' them plants fer me, a'right?
Alrighty, Ah'll be off explorin' fer more o' them plants.
Might even meetcher again along the way.
Once y'all're finished, come find me in \c[3]Rookie Harbor Alley Quarters\c[0].
Well bless yer heart, girl, y'all come back if y'ever change yer mind.

assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.115.settings.condAnims.0.intera: One of the sick trees. Apply \c[3]\v[item.171.name]\c[0] to cure it.
Hello. I am the canonical NPC.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.569.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] To Bergen Trail
\i[arrow-ne] To Rookie Harbor
\i[arrow-s] Old Path
Sorry, I'm kinda in the middle of something here...
Oh wait. You're that girl\..\..\.. Lea, right?
Jean already told me you'd come.
Sorry to get you involved. I can't understand why she's not using the Direct Link.
This is about the bunny or whatever she saw right?
I do remember that you can summon some sort of \c[3]Legendary Bunny\c[0] by collecting 5 \c[3]\v[item.139.name]s\c[0] somewhere in \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].
But there was another requirement. I can't remember what it was. Maybe our Hexacast-friend Jock knows more about it.
Yep, that's all. Also, I'm \c[3]Jeff\c[0], nice to meet you.
Ah, there's the problem with the speech module Jean told me about.
Nah, don't sweat it. I'll just DL Jean everything I told you.
She should learn how to use the Direct Link System anyhow.
I DL'd Jean everything, so you don't have to tell her.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.616.settings.dialog.2.text: We're clearly missing some key item here.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.616.settings.dialog.3.text: They do that to promote backtracking to previous areas.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.616.settings.dialog.4.text: I bet the content is totally worth it.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.0.thenStep.5: There you are! Thanks for dropping by.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.8.thenStep.1: There you are! Thanks for dropping by.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.9.message: Let's just go straight to the headquarters.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.10.message: It's to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]. Just follow me!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.15.message: So how big is your guild, anyway?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.16.message: Not big. You're about to see it yourself.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.628.settings.event.17.task: Follow \c[3]Schneider\c[0] to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] near \c[3]Autumn's Rise - Pathway 3\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.637.settings.dialog.0.text: Those damn Bovines barely take any damage from my attacks!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.637.settings.dialog.1.text: I told you, throwing balls won't impress them much. You gotta get close and personal!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.637.settings.dialog.2.text: Do I look like some kind of brawler to you?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.637.settings.dialog.3.text: I don't think the Bovines care. All they understand is literal ass-kicking!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path4.json.entities.637.settings.dialog.4.text: Then I guess I will need to get used to it.

assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.624.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-nw] To Bergen Trail.
\i[arrow-ne] To Rookie Harbor
\i[arrow-sw] Ye old Observatory
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.6.message: Hm, I hope we don't get lost around here.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.16.message: Seems we have to head \c[3]northwest\c[0] to reach Bergen Trail.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.21.message: I hope it's not too far.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.22.message: I will have to logout sooner or later, you see?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.24.message: Oh, don't worry. I'll stay until you beat up Mr. Grasshead!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.25.message: And please don't hurry too much because of me!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.26.message: We have to make sure you're well trained, non?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.37.message: We have been playing for a long while now, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path5.json.entities.632.settings.event.39.message: Anyway, I suppose there is still time for you to face that duel.

Waaah...!
Don't be so loud! Do you want THEM to hear you?
I'm talking about those thieving Bovines!\. They've ambushed me and stole all the fruits and herbs I've been gathering!
Look at that beast, grazing there like nothing happened!\. And there's more of them in the bushes, just waiting for a victim!
But... you were sent to help me, right?\. I worked all day collecting that stuff, we need to get it back!
Well...\. you have to do it.\. I have to...\. watch for reinforcements.\. So...\. good luck!
Go slaughter them and bring me the package!\. I'll be right here, surveying the situation!
Great work!\. Now... please bring me the package?\. I don't trust this silence.
There they are, the fruits of my labor!\. Literally.
Thanks a bunch!\. You totally saved my butt here!\. But now I gotta get going and deliver these before it's too late.\. So...\. bye!
Sorry I can't muster more feeling, but I get these things way too often.
I don't get it. How does a stranger know what I want?
I don't know why you give me these but you gotta stop.
About time someone showed up.\. And I hear you also helped us out with that lost data?
You really saved my butt there.\. I would've lost weeks of work if some critter had decided to eat it.
But we gotta make it count now.\. I'm sure the group that jumped me had a special leader with them.
Cut that one down and they might just become your usual pack of beasts again.
Right.\. I've already spotted that sneaky rat again and tailed it to their hiding spot.
It's in a cave across the river northeast of here.\. Follow me!
You should go inside and see what you can find.\. I'll guard the entrance.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.19.name: Tucos
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.23.message: Judging by that satisfied look on your face and the noise you made in there I assume you got it?
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.25.message: Ha, that should teach those things to not mess with a Falldiver Pioneer.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.26.message: Seems like you also found something interesting.\. Lemme have a look.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.30.name: Tucos
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.32.message: Huh, that looks like some kind of \c[3]data storage unit\c[0] as well, but not the kind we would use.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.33.message: If that Hillkat bigshot had it then it might be extremely useful.\. HQ should definitely give it a thorough scan.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.34.message: Here, take it back.\. I'm not gonna hog your glory after everything you did.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.44.name: Tucos
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.985.settings.event.45.message: A'ight, I better get back and share my report.\. 'Til next time!
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.5.name: Tucos
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.7.message: Alright, here we are.\. It seems quiet out here, but don't let that fool you.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.8.message: I didn't sense it leaving, so it should still be inside.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.10.message: So...you go inside and deal with it, while I stay here and make sure no one enters or leaves.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.12.message: Hey don't gimme that look.\. I'd love to settle that score myself but extermination in the wild is Seeker business.
assets/data/maps/autumn/path6.json.entities.987.settings.event.14.message: So go on and give it a good beating from me as well, will ya?

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.77.settings.event.0.message: Aannd again! Water in a cave. Below a lake. We're literally below a gigantic lake.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.77.settings.event.2.message: There is just no way you could make this work! Just imagine the water pressure!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.77.settings.event.3.message: Who cares? It's just a game!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.77.settings.event.4.message: We're on an actual moon here. Physics still apply!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.0.message: More water. Is this water even real? Maybe it's all virtual!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.3.message: Well, the augmented reality tech they're using is pretty advanced, so it's hard to tell.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.4.message: And it would allow them to break physics as they please.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.5.message: Monsieur Scientist, I propose we do an experiment!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.6.message: We kick you into the water repeatedly. Just to make sure it's real!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.7.message: That...\. That wouldn't even confirm anything!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/caves/path-.entities.99.settings.event.8.message: Maybe, but wouldn't it be fun?

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
Traveler, envoy of change,
you have mastered the trial of these fields.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
I will bestow upon you the Shade
to open the passage to the north.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.0.t:
Your journey has taken you across
these signs of prosperity long passed.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.1.t:
Seeking your next destination
in the wilderness to the north...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.2.t:
... you must first accomplish
the \c[3]trial of these fields\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.3.t:
Pursue the path 
of the \c[3]luminous creature\c[0]...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.4.t:
...and prove your mastery
of the elements acquired.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.5.t:
Traveler, envoy of change,
will you accept this trial?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.6.a:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/expo-space..entities.5.settings.event.8.elseStep.6.d:
Come back and accept this trial
when you feel prepared.

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-01.jso.entities.531.settings.event.0.message: Looks like there used to be a village here, non?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-01.jso.entities.531.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: A long, long time ago.\. Literally Ancient.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-01.jso.entities.532.settings.event.0.message: The return of the Laser Bridge!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.555.settings.event.8.thenStep.0: Man I sure wish I could jump around like that.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.555.settings.event.8.thenStep.1: Wouldn't that make exploration too easy?
I guess...\. but how much fun would it be...?
Well, at least we can do our regular small jumps, right?
Oui, regular jumping whenever we want. It's at least something.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.0.text: Have you ever heard of the \c[3]Old War\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.0.event.3.m: 'Sup! You wanna know more about the \v[lore.unlock.old-war]\c[3]Old War\c[0] too?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.0.event.5.m: It's a pretty dark time in human history. Various colonies waged war against each other.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.0.event.6.m: They taught us resources were the trigger but I heard other stories too.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.0.event.8.m: Ah, don't worry! It's all in the past now. Like 1000 years past.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.1.text: Sure thing. I think it's taught on every ACF planet these days.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.2.text: I can't believe there was such a dark time in our past.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.3.text: From our perspective it all seems so distant.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.4.text: Which is the problem, right? Humans tend to forget their past all too quickly.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.5.text: I don't know man, I mean we have had peace for so long now.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.561.settings.dialog.6.text: Depends on which colony you're on.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.562.settings.event.0.message: There really is a lot more water here compared to Autumn's Rise...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-02.jso.entities.562.settings.event.1.message: I suppose they wanted to raise the difficulty.

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-03.jso.entities.601.settings.blockEvent.3.messa: I think C'tron and the others are waiting for you at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0], correct?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-03.jso.entities.601.settings.blockEvent.4.messa: You probably should go there before heading to \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
I see you got the \c[3]\v[item.410.name]\c[0] with you! Nice, nice!
Well then, good luck in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]! Beware of bugs!
If you want to pass the barrier up ahead you first have to collect the \c[3]\v[item.410.name]\c[0].
You get it at the end of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] dungeon in \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
If you've already finished the dungeon... just revisit the \c[3]final boss room\c[0]. I'm sure you'll find the shades somewhere in there.

Thought Ah'd rest a spell here after all that awful cold an' heat.
Feels a mite familiar, t'be honest.
Well, how's the explorin' comin' along? Doin' good so far?
Good ta hear! Y'all keep it up now.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.705.settings.event.27.task: Solve the quest "\c[3]Chase of the Hologram Frobbit\c[0]".
Here comes the Bunny...\. that annoying bastard.
No spoiler. Just look at it jumping away! We all know it's gonna be annoying.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: You should tell Emilie via D-Link!
I suppose you just got the Shade!
I think Emilie wanted you to contact her at this point, right?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.0.elseStep.7: Bonjour Lea! How is it going? Did you collect the shade?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.1.message: That means we're all set for the raid!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.2.message: But before that... there's one thing I wanted to tell you.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.4.message: You heard what the geezer in space said, right?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.5.message: With this new Shade you can now enter \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.6.message: And well... that area is supposed to be a \c[3]jungle\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.8.message: You know what you usually find in jungles?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.12.message: I really don't want to go there by myself.\. So uhm...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.13.message: It would be great if you could wait for me so we can enter the Jungle together, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.16.message: But let's wait on that until after the Raid is over, alright?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.18.message: Oh and now that we're all ready, we should meet up at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.19.message: Lin wanted to give us a small briefing about the Raid and explain all the details.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.708.settings.event.22.task: Meet with the guild members at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] to discuss the raid in detail.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.9.message: The others already went ahead to the raid area.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.13.message: All we have to do is wander through this cave here.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.19.message: We still have some time left, though.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.20.message: We should make sure we're well prepared.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.21.message: I wouldn't mind checking equipment options in Rookie Harbor one last time.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.22.message: Don't be such a worrywart, Tronny.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.23.message: I'm ready to kick some derrière right now!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.711.settings.event.28.task: Meet up at \c[3]Para Island\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] to start the \c[3]Raid\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.714.settings.event.0.message: Ah I see we're back in the Ancient ruins of puzzle village!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.714.settings.event.1.message: Still serving puzzles even thousand of years later.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.715.settings.event.0.message: Say hello to the hardest puzzle of the Playground!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-04.jso.entities.715.settings.event.2.message: Huh? Isn't that one quite trivial?

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-05.jso.entities.2.settings.blockEvent.3.thenSte: Lea, that's the route to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
You probably should first meetup with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] before you go there.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-05.jso.entities.2.settings.blockEvent.3.elseSte: Lea, that's the way to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]. We wanted to go there together, non?
But let's wait with that until after the \c[3]raid\c[0], d'accord?
Lea, that's the route to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
I think you wanted to enter that area together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] after you're done with the \c[3]raid\c[0], correct?

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.670.settings.event.0.message: So Tronny, how unrealistic is this rock in particular?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.670.settings.event.1.message: I'm not that much of an expert when it comes to rocks, honestly...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.670.settings.event.2.message: I suppose it's somewhat plausible. These shapes can form with erosion over time.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.670.settings.event.3.message: Though not so sure why you'd find Ancient ruins on top of it of all places...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.671.settings.event.0.message: Look another ruin of an ancient puzzle village!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.671.settings.event.1.message: I call this one...\. La Petite-Brick-Ville!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-06.jso.entities.671.settings.event.4.message: Let's see... Since it used to be an Ancient village, I'd go for something close to their traditional names, like Faj'ro or Ba'kii Kum...

Deggart
Hi!
A \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. You were sent to help me with the operation, I suppose?
[nods]
I see.\. Good, good.\. Almost got worried. I would need a tent if assistance took any longer.
Hey, I really need some sleep!\. Spent all day surveying the area and calibrating our probe here.
Deggart
Yep, this work of wonder was fed the data from the Hillkat Leader's device.
We can use it to extract energy and data from \c[3]Ancient Powerspots\c[0] directly on the Track.
And this area has quite a few of those, which is ideal for a proper test run to gather data.
[nods]
Well, I should just explain how to operate it so we can finally get this over with and I can get back to bed.
Simply put, you need to \c[3]push this device around\c[0] and move the \c[3]Powerspots\c[0] that appear in the area.
You can \c[3]move\c[0] it by \c[3]attacking\c[0].\. Using \c[3]Heat\c[0] will greatly increase the distance and velocity.
Approaching a Powerspot will usually \c[3]attract some hostile wildlife\c[0] that will attempt to protect it.
Worse, the Powerspots will grant them a \c[3]shield\c[0] that is almost impenetrable!\. Invincible, angry critters!
Yes, exactly!\. But luckily for you, you've got our probe here!
\c[3]When placed on an active Powerspot\c[0] it will sap away the energy and \c[3]deactivate the shield\c[0]!
Just make sure it doesn't get knocked away.\. Hitting it with \c[3]Cold\c[0] will \c[3]stabilize\c[0] it for a bit which should help.
Deggart
And that's it.\. Surely an experienced \v[lore.title.seeker] can figure it out, right?
[nods]
Good.\. Talk to me again when you're ready and prepared.
Deggart
Heyo, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You ready to do this?
[nods]
Alright, then let me start this thing up!
Deggart
Everything's running.\. The first spot of power should appear in a second.
[Expecting Probe]
\v[tmp.questBall-markerText]
Deggart
Ah, there it is.\. Knock our device to that position and then defeat all the enemies in the area to proceed!
Deggart
Just repeat that procedure with every new Powerspot that pops up and then we can go on.
[nods]

Knock the \c[3]Probe\c[0] on the \c[3]Powerpoints\c[0].
\c[3]Heat\c[0]: More knockback
\c[3]Cold\c[0]: Stabilize
[shakes head]
Alright, come back when you feel fresh and ready.
How?
Okay, let me explain it again.
You need to \c[3]push this device around\c[0] and move it onto certain spots of power in this area, short \c[3]Powerspots\c[0].
You can \c[3]move\c[0] it by \c[3]attacking\c[0].\. Using \c[3]Heat\c[0] will greatly increase the distance and velocity.
Approaching a Powerspot will usually attract some \c[3]hostile wildlife\c[0] that will protect those places.
The Powerspots will grant them a \c[3]shield\c[0] that is almost impenetrable, meaning invincible enemies.
\c[3]Placing the probe on an active Powerspot\c[0] will \c[3]deactivate the shield\c[0], though, so that's a priority!
Make sure it doesn't get knocked away again.\. Hitting it with \c[3]Cold\c[0] will \c[3]stabilize\c[0] it for a bit which should help.
I hope you got it now, \v[lore.title.seeker].
Yes
No
Repeat Instructions
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.24.name: Deggart
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.26.message: Well, my scanners show that you've harvested all the Powerspots.\. Thorough work, I suppose.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.28.message: Shame we're not quite done yet.\. Just a minute ago I spotted a high concentration of energy just South of us.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.30.message: Yeah, seems like the Track doesn't want me to get my overdue sleep.\. In any case we need to handle that as well.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.31.message: The data we can extract there could be too valuable to ignore.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.669.settings.event.32.message: Follow me south so we can get this over with.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.675.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Now that one was just mean!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-07.jso.entities.675.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: Jumping over these entrance pillars, really now...

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-08.jso.entities.653.settings.event.0.message: Huh...\. a little ruin surrounded by cliffs.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-08.jso.entities.653.settings.event.1.message: Must have been a neat little place to chill out, far away from all the troubles of the world...

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.254.settings.event.18.text: Our little journey is almost over.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.254.settings.event.19.text: Now for your last trial I want you to show me...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.261.settings.event.12.text:
Traveler.
You have proven your proficiency.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.261.settings.event.13.text:
You passed the trial.
Seek your reward from where it began.
Still annoyed they didn't make it explode.
They made us chase that thing for so long! The least they could give us is a proper bunny explosion!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.831.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Alright, you better get ready, Lea.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.831.settings.event.0.thenStep.1: Oh, come on! It's so clear that this is the final stage!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.850.settings.event.0.message: This land really is shaped in the most implausible and inconvenient way possible, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/path-09.jso.entities.850.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: You said that before already, stop nagging.

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.54.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: I see you found your way to the location of the raid, eh?
Oui, you should call Tronny to join our party again.
Hurry! I wanna start the raid already!
Oh that's right, you should call Emilie to join our party again, Lea!
We can start the raid once we're all assembled!
Oh, but \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]Tronny\c[0] aren't with you.
I think they wanted to meet you at the \c[3]statue in Autumn's Fall\c[0].
That's the same statue where you started to chase after \c[3]hologram frobbit\c[0], remember?
Please be so kind and pick up those two. They're waiting for you.
If you decided to split before, make sure to \c[3]call them back to your party\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.54.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: It looks like everyone is assembled for the raid!
I hope you all are \c[3]well prepared\c[0]! There are a lot of battles ahead of us!
So how about it? \c[3]Are you ready for the raid\c[0]?
I see. No worries, there is still some time.
If you want some advice for equipment you can talk to \c[3]Lukas\c[0]! He knows his stuff.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.55.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey there! The raid is about to start. Of course we all should be well prepared.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.55.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Do you want me to have a look at your stats and equipment?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.55.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Good equipment and stats for your level. You'll be fine!
Hm... I'd say you \c[3]could do better\c[0].
Things might still work with those stats, but it won't be a breeze.
I suggest you look for \c[3]better equipment\c[0]. It's the most important factor for your stats.
Oh junge. You really gotta \c[3]work on your stats\c[0]!
Those may have been sufficient back in Faj'ro Temple, but you'll have a \c[3]hard time\c[0] like that in the raid.
No really, you really should \c[3]improve your equipment\c[0]. It's by far the most important factor for your stats.
Also make sure to \c[3]check your circuit tree\c[0] if there are any more skills you can learn.
Oh yes, and when you look for equipment just pay attention to the \c[3]level number\c[0] you see at the icon.
Just make sure it's roughly around your level. The higher, the better!
And if you don't want to bother with traders just check the \c[3]equipment of the stores\c[0]. Those will do the job as well.
Fine. I'll trust your judgement, then.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.56.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: There you are! Ready for the raid?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.56.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: I heard there's a ton of bugs waiting for us to fight up there!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.25.message: An important milestone of the track!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.26.message: They say that in old times the Ancients used these grounds for a \c[3]test of teamwork\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.27.message: And now it's up to us Seekers to prove to the Ancients that we're no strangers to teamwork as well!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.28.message: They say a great reward waits for those that reach the \c[3]top of the hill\c[0] on this island.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.29.message: However, the top shall only be reached when two teams move in unison.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.34.message:
The first team, ascending on the left, will be the Newcomers of the First Scholars: 
\c[3]Lea\c[0], \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.41.message:
The second team, ascending on the right, will be us old timers:
\c[3]Schneider\c[0], \c[3]Buggy\c[0]... and \c[3]me\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.43.message: "Old timer", huh? I definitely don't get that a lot.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.45.message: Well you got the matching hairstyle.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.52.message: Now, reaching the top of this hill is quite the challenging endeavor, indeed!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.53.message: There will be many foes and obstacles that will put our teamwork to the test!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.54.message: Our attacks will have to be coordinated. That is why \c[3]communication is key\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.58.message: Don't worry, Lea! I didn't forget about you.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.59.message: In fact, I think I have the perfect role for you!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.60.message: See, one member of each team will be the \c[3]column tackler\c[0]! And I think you'd be a good choice for this.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.61.message: It will be your task to attack specific enemies during the raid.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.63.message: Tronny and Emilie will support you and keep the communication with us going.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.69.message: D'accord! As long as there is stuff left for me to punch.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.71.message: Alrighty! I'll give you more instructions during the raid! Just keep your heads up, eh?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.76.message: So who'll be the column tackler in our team?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.78.message: Can I be it, please?\. Please, please, please.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.80.message: Alright, Raphael. But please be mindful and don't forget about the teamwork.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.95.message: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.100.message: Alrighty! Everyone, get in front of your track! \c[3]Column Tacklers\c[0] please step on those marks on the ground!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.57.settings.event.139.task: Complete the \c[3]raid\c[0] together with the other First Scholar members!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.16.settings.event.16.message: That's just warmup! Stay on your guard!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.24.settings.event.16.message: More Hillkats. Great. Gimme some new stuff to punch!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.24.settings.event.17.message: Come on. Give it some time, Emilie.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.44.settings.event.13.message: We now have to fight the \c[3]Pillars\c[0]! Now it's time for the \c[3]Column Tacklers\c[0] to act!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.44.settings.event.14.message: Basically we all have to fight the small blocks with the \c[3]same color\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.44.settings.event.18.message: Let's start with the \c[3]red blocks\c[0]! Lea, Buggy, only attack those!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.44.settings.event.19.message: Once the blocks are activated, everyone can help to bring them down!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.46.settings.event.2.message: Alrighty! Now let's take on the remaining \c[3]blue blocks\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.46.settings.event.3.message: Achtung! The pillar will now attack with the heavy caliber!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.47.settings.event.14.message: On to the next stage, everyone!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.30.settings.event.4.message: Next pillar! Lets fight the \c[3]Blue Block\c[0] first this time!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.33.settings.event.5.message: Alrighty! Time to hit those \c[3]red blocks\c[0] now!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.42.settings.event.20.message: Look at this, a new color! Let's beat the \c[3]Purple Blocks\c[0] first!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.42.settings.event.21.message: I wanna get rid of those annoying Seahorses first!
I think those are \c[3]Shock\c[0] attacks! Better be careful!
Those are \c[3]Shock\c[0] attacks! Probably the first time you see those!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.67.settings.event.5.message: Next round! Let's focus on the \c[3]Blue Blocks\c[0] first...
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.67.settings.event.9.message: Wait! I already hit a \c[3]Green block\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.67.settings.event.10.message: Raphael, don't be so rash! Alrighty, lets focus on \c[3]Greenish blocks\c[0].
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.68.settings.event.5.message: We almost got it! Last round of blocks!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.80.settings.event.11.message: Good work, everyone! We're doing quite well!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.80.settings.event.12.message: There's one more pillar battle in that cave there and then it's time to face the \c[3]boss\c[0]!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.20.settings.event.29.message: This will be the last pillar enemy! We'll let \c[3]you decide\c[0] which element to attack this time!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.20.settings.event.30.message: Decide quickly! I want to start hitting stuff!
Hey! Which element should be destroy?
Oh dear... It' seems like Lea is all alone right now. Let's wait for Emilie or Tronny to respawn.
You waited for that one, didn't you?
\c[0]Blue blocks\c[0]! It's time to \c[3]break the ice\c[0]! Cool, delicious ice.
Monsieur, you gotta keep that craving for ice cream under control.
We're fighting the \c[0]Blue blocks\c[0]! It's a shame that Tronny is out. I'm sure those are his favorites.
Uhm we attack those \c[3]purple blocks\c[0] now. The shock blocks!
We're fighting those \c[3]Purple blocks\c[0] now! Let's be quick as lightning!
\c[3]Greenish blocks\c[0] now. Nope. No pun, I got nothing. What's this element anyway?
We're fighting the \c[3]Greenish blocks\c[0] now. Whatever those are...
That's \c[3]Wave\c[0]. And honestly, nobody quite knows what it is.
It's the element of peace and good vibrations! Let's smash it, everyone!
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.24.settings.event.10.thenStep.0: Out cold! All blue blocks, that is.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.24.settings.event.12.thenStep.0: The element of peace is no more.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.25.settings.event.19.message: Nevermind, I must be imagining things.
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.40.settings.event.9.message: Here we are! Time for the final stage! Everyone ready?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.40.settings.event.30.message: Wait...\. something is not right here!

assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.207.settings.event.21.message: Is... Is this some kind of bug?
assets/data/maps/autumn-fall/raid/raid-0.entities.207.settings.event.27.message: Damn it! Why now of all times!

assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.289.settings.interact.title: - \c[3]Bergen\c[0] -
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.0.text: I know that you wanna meet up with your friends, but do we have to stand out in the cold?\. I'm freezing!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.1.text: Maybe I want them to see us without searching half the town.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.2.text: Besides, why are you complaining about the virtual cold anyway?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.3.text: Hey, you can modify your Avatar-senses remember?\. Got them sized to the max!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.4.text: Alright, but... why do that and complain?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.832.settings.dialog.5.text: Because roleplaying is all about the immersion, duh?
Oh...\.\.\. Oh...\.\.\. What should I do?
Oh... Hi...
Hi...
I'm sorry, I'm just too distracted to really talk right now.
There is just no time.
You probably know who I am right?
[shakes head]
Wait what? Really? \.\.\. But I'm \c[3]Holiday Man\c[0]!
Giving gifts and bringing joy and peace to people? No?
[shakes head]
Aw man... \.\.\. Maybe you are just new here...
Whatever, I don't have the time!
Look, I have to get all these presents here to certain players in CrossWorlds.
And I have to do it NOW.
I should have started earlier...
Wait\..\..\.. I know this comes out of nowhere, but could you help me?
I promise you'll get something too!
Yes! Thank you so much. This makes things so much easier.

Alright, let's split the work. You go find the players here in \c[3]Bergen\c[0], then \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] and finally \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0].
I will take care of the west and north of CrossWorlds.
Here, take these presents.
\v[item.169.name] x 16
Ah, yeah about the players...
I don't really know who they are... It's a kind of secret Santa thing.
But in each area it's always a \c[3]Triblader\c[0], \c[3]Hexacast\c[0], \c[3]Pentafist\c[0] and \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0].
You will know when you find them.
Well... Come back once you're done, okay?
[nods]
Alright, until then!
Noooo!\.\.\. Okay, no hard feelings.
You still have some presents left to give I see.
Don't wait too long, we'll have to do this quick!
Oh... you are back! We have a problem!
I was on my way to my secret place to get some presents for the rest of them...
...and this weird looking snowman just popped up and attacked.
I couldn't do anything. I'm good at gifting people stuff, not fighting.
You gotta help me! If we don't defeat this thing, all of the presents might be destroyed!
Okay, my secret stash is over here.
I'll lower the wall so you can get in.
Did you do it? Did you defeat the gift-destroying fiend?
[nods]
Oh, you did? Ha! What a relief...
And... \.\.\. How are my presents?
Oh... wait, what?
"Lea" is not the answer I expected.
OH! It's your name?!
Oh no, how rude of me to not ask for your name.
No wonder you've been so quiet all the time.
Don't worry about my presents! I will check for myself.
Thanks a lot for helping me with all of this.
Ahm... \.\.\. Here, take my hat as a reward!
\v[item.168.name]
May it bring as much joy to you as it did to me!
Is something the matter?
Don't worry, the hat is almost new!
I knew you would like it!
Again, thanks a lot! Let's chat again soon!
[nods]
Hey, Lea, nice to see you!
I have to say, without my hat, I feel kinda\..\..\.. naked.
But it does suit you much better!
Ah yes! I have another present for you!
Took me some time to find a pair of the right size.
I'm sure it will go well together with that \c[3]\v[item.168.name]\c[0]!
Oh yes! I think I may have another present for you!
...Though I think I need a bit more time to prepare it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.861.settings.event.3.thenStep.2: Ah oui, we made it! La Bergen!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.861.settings.event.3.elseStep.2: You made it, Lea! This is \c[3]Bergen\c[0], the snow village.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.861.settings.event.7.thenStep.2: After that long climb I sure wouldn't mind a break in one of those cozy houses...
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.861.settings.event.7.elseStep.2: Hm, would you call this a snow village?\. I mean it's a village and there is snow...
The next dungeon should be close by.
I hope they let you enter without a huge load of exposition.
Anyway, if I remember correctly the next dungeon should be close by.
You probably should tell Emilie when you plan to enter, correct?
You see that house over there?
The townsfolk are pretty quiet about it, but something very very strange is going on over there.
Some nights, I swear I see light coming out of the cracks even though the house has been abandoned for years.
Urgh, this guy is blocking the storage house again.
I wish he would meditate somewhere else. Under a waterfall or whatever.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.895.settings.event.0.message: Hm, what's this small house doing on this side of the river?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.895.settings.event.1.message: It must be really inconvenient to live here, having to jump over the water everyday.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.10.name: "A guard of Bergen"
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.12.message: Halt, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I, a guard of Bergen, have business with you!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.14.message: Yes, greetings.\. I have been sent by our leader, Sgt. Brassler, to take this rogue goat into custody.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.16.message: Yes, I was told to take her outside the city where she belongs.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.20.message: You are a good little goat, yes you are.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.22.message: Well... I will take care of this.\. You... can report back to the headquarters now.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen.json.entities.900.settings.event.27.name: "A guard of Bergen"

assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.264.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-nw] Old Temple Mine
\i[arrow-w] Bergen Railway
\i[arrow-se] Bergen Trail
Hey there!\. Do you like Mr. Cottonsnow here?
How nice of you!\. It took me a while to get him the perfect hat, but it just looks so precious on him!
Oh, hello!\. Can I help you or do you just wanna admire this handsome image of coolness here?
Ah, want to know about that hat of his?\. Yeah, I made it myself!
I can make you one as well if you want.\. But the materials I need are really tricky to get!
Especially the old hats... you can get them from his mean brothers in Bergen Trail.
But you'll need to defeat them \c[3]with style\c[0]!\.\. Otherwise those fancy hats will just mysteriously disappear...
Well... good luck with that!\. I look forward to making more of those.
Heya!\. Still searching for those things?
Don't forget to keep a fancy \c[3]rank\c[0] while hunting those mean snowfiends!\. Otherwise no hats for you.
Ooh, there you are again. And you got everything, yay!
You just wait right here!\. I'll have those pretties patched up in a flash!
I can make even more for you if you want!\. Just bring the materials and I'll work my magic!
Heya!\. Want another one of those stylish hats?
Oh, a random gift. Swell. We'll take those.
Foolish people have angered the Track in their search for riches.
But now the mountain is restless and tries to cast us away with its icy breath.
But remember this, \v[lore.title.seeker]: The Track respects those that beat its challenges according to the traditions.
Thus, if you are deemed worthy, it will arm you with the power needed to face your obstacles.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.0.text: Alright, the first dungeon is just ahead.\. Just stay calm, remember the basics and you should be fine!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.1.text: I guess. Still...\. I've always been fighting \c[5]in groups\c[0] up until now so it's a bit of a change.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.1.event.7.m: Oh, hey there. Are you also on your way to the \c[3]first dungeon\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.1.event.9.m: It's not that hard but a lot of new players are scared of it, especially since you gotta do it \c[3]on your own\c[0].
Yeah, I was confused about that as well...
The puzzles are a core element of those temple-dungeons and they wouldn't really work in groups of random sizes.
So it makes sense to restrict them to solo-instances.\. You gotta prove your own skills to progress in the story.
