Alright, alright.\. But you better not complain if I take forever to beat it then...
Don't worry, I'll even stick around if you need moral support or calming words via \v[lore.title.direct-link].
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.2.text: And in a creepy cold mine out of all places.\. Brrr...
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.3.text: These dungeons are very puzzle-heavy to test our skill as players.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.4.text: Doing them in groups would distort the challenge.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.5.text: Don't think of the cold, think of the reward at the end. You'll warm up in no time.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.6.text: If I don't freeze down there all by myself...
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.873.settings.dialog.7.text: Oh come on, cut the drama...
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.thenStep.5: Guess what?\. Lukas told me he'd like to introduce us to his guild.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.thenStep.6: Uhm, what was the name...?\. Right, the \c[3]First Scholars\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.thenStep.7: It seems, they are looking for new members!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.thenStep.9: We probably shouldn't let them wait for too long, non?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.thenStep.1: We should meet in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] at the \c[3]Old Obelisk\c[0].
That's a \c[3]landmark\c[0], remember? You can just quickly teleport to it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.elseStep.6: Oh, it's a D-Link request by Lukas!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.elseStep.1: Oh, I see you're in a party right now? That's just perfect!
I'm here to cordially invite you to the headquarters of the\c[3] First Scholars\c[0]!
I told the chief about you two and she said we could use a couple new members.
Really? Are you saying we can already join a guild?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.elseStep.2: Japp! At least never heard of any rule against it.
Of course the folks would like to meet you first.
So if you're not busy right now, why don't you quickly drop by?
Absolutely!! We should totally go, Lea!
Great!\. Let's meet in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] at the \c[3]Old Obelisk\c[0].
That's a \c[3]landmark\c[0]. You two can just quickly teleport there, remember?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.2.elseStep.3: A guild, Lea! We'll join a GUILD! Isn't that awesome?
Come on! Better not let the Dark Lord wait for too long!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.10.message: You will meet a lot of players... I have to admit I am a bit concerned.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.11.message: You remember that we must keep your amnesia a secret, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.13.message: Well...\. I suppose you cannot tell anybody about it anyway, correct?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.14.message: In that regard your speech malfunction turns out to be quite useful!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.16.message: So as they say... just go for it!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.882.settings.event.22.task: Meet \c[3]Schneider\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn Rise\c[0] at the \c[3]Old Obelisk\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.887.settings.event.0.message: Sno... Snowman.\. This one is not alive, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.888.settings.event.0.message: Man, never thought we'd be able to get up here!
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.888.settings.event.1.message: You can look over the whole village from here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.889.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Ice blocks...\. and they're gone! Nevermind.
It's an ice wall! Lea, you know what to do, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.889.settings.event.1.elseStep.1: Sure wonder what we'd have to do to get past it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/bergen2.json.entities.903.settings.event.0.message: Normal bridge?\. Why normal bridge if you could have laser bridge?

You can now take the Laser Rails to reach \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Dear Seeker, you seem rather confused. Do you wish to pass this barrier?
In that case, you need to obtain the \c[3]\v[item.225.name]\c[0].
It is given to anyone who completes the \c[0]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0].
What is it? Did you already beat the challenge?
Well then, maybe you just \c[3]missed the treasure chest\c[0] in the room of your final opponent!
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.10.message: Sorry, I just went blank there for a second.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.11.message: I'm \c[3]C'tron\c[0], the other member of the First Scholars.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.13.message: Lin just gave me your contact and told me to say hello.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.17.message: Ah, d-don't worry! They told me about your limited speech problem.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.18.message: But yes, we seem to be about the same level!
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.19.message: So...\. I could join your party, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.22.message: But if you don't mind, I'd gladly join tomorrow!
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.26.message: W-Well then, see you tomorrow, Lea!
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.32.message: Oh, so it looks like you might soon have a party of 3.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.225.settings.event.35.message: That boy seems to be a \c[3]Hexacast\c[0]. They are very useful to have in a party.
assets/data/maps/bergen/elevator.json.entities.226.settings.event.4.message: Hm... I think you should head to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] first, correct?

assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.76.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Hello, player, and welcome to the \v[lore.unlock.omni-gilders.first]\c[3]Omni Gilders\c[0].
We are a guild of traders who try to extend their reach through offering players simple quests.
And I'm a humble general. Kind of a manager for the guild.
Might I interest you in said quests?
No need to come back to me by the way.
The items will be transferred here as soon as you find them.
Well, no problem. We can find someone else.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.76.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Hey, we don't have any other requests right now.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.76.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Just finding the items we asked for is enough.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.82.settings.dialog.0.text: We really need some low-level trade stuff.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.82.settings.dialog.1.text: We won't be able to extend our base otherwise.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.82.settings.dialog.2.text: Don't worry too much about it, the higher-ups have already started giving quests to low-level players.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.82.settings.dialog.3.text: So we don't need to lift a finger?\. I like it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.82.settings.dialog.4.text: Until we have to grind high level mobs...
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.83.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I'm currently away from keyboard running some errands. Will be back later.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: And you even found the guild I'm in!
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: It might look small, but it's really just a small branch.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: It's actually one of the largest in CrossWorlds!
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Yeah I know, pretty cool right?
We're currently looking for players to help us find some trade items.
So if you have some time, just talk to the pentafist over there.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Jean
Hi!
Oh hi, Lea!
You've come at just the right time!
You see, I'm pretty new in this guild here.
New members are mainly on duty for farming trade items.
But we also have to do chores...
One of which was just given to me.
Oh it's nothing too hard... for others I guess.
My job is to get a \c[3]Storage Unit\c[0] from the cellar to the right.
But this thing is a MAZE, I tell you.
I couldn't find the thing. Instead all I found were boxes and more boxes.
I already tried to talk to \c[3]Jock\c[0] and \c[3]Jeff\c[0], but I can't seem to find them.
They are online and I even tried this stupid Direct Link. No luck...
Yeah... I wonder what they're up to...
Anyway, I guess what I'm trying to ask is: Would you help me find the \c[3]Storage Unit\c[0]?
Thanks Lea! I knew I could count on you!
You can get to the cellar via the right door over there.
Jean
Tell the \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0] I sent you in the name of our guild. Apparently that's how things work around here.
[nods]
Hopefully you can find the stupid thing.
I don't want to make a bad first impression here.
Aww... Well I can't force you I guess...
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: The basement is through the door to the right.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.84.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Jeff and Jock just breezed through here.
Coming right from the basement it seems.
Those guys... I was trying to contact them all this time, and they were slacking off in the basement.
Didn't even say hello on the way out.
It's alright. I'm going to talk to them later. I have to recruit new players and they both wanted to help me.
It's really nothing. I'm okay with it. I'm sure they're just busy helping our guild!
Anyway, did you happen to find the \c[3]Storage Unit\c[0]?
The General of this branch is currently in \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] so I'm gonna head off and give the unit to him as quickly as I can.
Here, take this as a small thank you.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.85.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Sorry, but I can't let you through here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.85.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: I heard everything. You're doing the rookie's job for her.
assets/data/maps/bergen/guild-1.json.entities.85.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Pretty lame of her, but I don't care. Knock yourself out.

assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.20.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Move along, nothing to see here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Everything is quiet right now, so there is no need to trouble yourself.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Well, what do we have here?\. Another \v[lore.title.seeker], eh?
Got a lot of your kind marching into Bergen, with that first station of the Track being here.
Many of you even offer some assistance to us, being all do-goody and well-intentioned, I suppose.
But can just anyone with a fancy title do real policework and face the worst of humanity?\. I doubt it.
You want to prove me wrong, eh?\. Alright, then I got a nice and simple practice task for you.
Okay then.\. I want you to take care of this dwarf goat that is annoying the good citizens of Bergen.
Yes, yes, catching it might sound simple but it's really quick and likes to climb to higher places.
It's stealing food, shiny stuff and everyone's time, but I don't want to waste our manpower on it.
Besides, it does sound like ideal \v[lore.title.seeker]-work, eh?\. So you better show me your worth!
That's the spirit!\. You should be able to find it somewhere on the rooftops of Bergen.\. Happy climbing!
You are not into the everyday basics, I suppose?\. Well, no getting around that!
I can't entrust the sensible tasks to just anyone I meet before they have proven themselves!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: It should jump around somewhere on the roofs of Bergen.\. Just climb around a bit and keep your eyes open!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Yes?\. Well... where is that damned goat then?
I hope you didn't just butcher the poor thing on the spot.\. We wanted to examine it for its size and weird behaviour.
What, you gave it to another guard?\. I don't remember sending anyone for you.
It seems like someone played you for a damn fool.
I have no idea why, but there must be some fishy intentions behind it.
Besides, we can't tolerate impostors like that dragging our good name through the snow.\. You gotta go after him!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Go after that impostor!\. He should be hiding somewhere in \v[area.bergen-trails.name]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: There you are again.\. And I see neither criminal nor goat with you.\. No success again, eh?
I see, they got away.\. Well, it seems like you had your hands full with their reinforcements.
At least that annoying goat is gone and you drove that impostor into hiding.
We will investigate and try to track him down.\. You might get your chance another day.
Keep up that tenacity of yours and come back later.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.6.event.q: Hello \v[lore.title.seeker], I have some good news for you.\. I suppose.
We managed to find some hints towards the whereabouts of the impostor guard and his pet goat.
So, how about it?\. Are you up to even the score?
Very good.\. You won't even have to walk very far.
According to our information, their hideout should be on \c[3]Rising Path 4 in \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Yes, it's pretty close to your last encounter.\. So go get them this time!
What, you don't even want to restore your honor now?\. Come on!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: Their hideout should be on \c[3]Rising Path 4 in \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], so go get them!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.8.event.q: Welcome back.\. From your grin I suppose you handled everything this time?
Where are the evildoers then?\. Did another guard take them away?
What?\.\. So the impostor fell down a cliff after being kicked by his own goat-slave?
Well, I suppose there won't be any more trouble from him.\. No way he'd survive THAT.
As for that goat army of his... there is no need to provoke them, as long as they keep to themselves.
We will take that translator you found and just prepare for future activities.
We will keep you updated on the situation when  you come by.\. For now you did good, \v[lore.title.seeker].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-be.entities.28.settings.npcStates.9.event.3: Everything is quiet right now, so there is no need to trouble yourself.

assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hello \v[lore.title.seeker], and welcome to the headquarters of the \c[3]Bergen Digging Mates\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: We manage the mining operations at Mt. Bergen and also try to reclaim the areas that were recently lost to the Track.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Talk to \c[3]Chief Miner Turis\c[0] back there if you want to help us out.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. No complications in the mine lately, so there's no work for you.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: McEdinthil
Hi!
A visitor fresh from outside, eh?\. No need to reply, I feel the sun's warmth still on you, child.
...b-bye?
Har, that look on your face!\. The name's Turis McEdinthil, Chief Miner of the Bergen Digging Mates.\. Welcome to our humble headquarters!
Don't you worry, the icy mine might have cooled our manners but we don't feast on the warm blood of the living just yet.
Still, the mines have become rather possessive and demand our full attention these days.
Some strong hands that can help clean up a mess on the surface would be most welcome.
There's been an incursion of some thrice-darned hopping furballs in one of our still-active mining areas.
Those pesky things got contaminated by the ores and machinery inside and now they're running wild in \v[area.bergen-trails.name].
What's worse, for some damn reason the filthy fur made them angry as drunk bovines and almost impossible to kill.
Just my thoughts.\. Care to help us get rid of that mess before we get the blame for whatever shins they kick?
[nods]
Finally some good news.\. Now, I guess I'd better tell you how to get rid of those indestructible pests, eh?
It's rather simple.\. Their fur is \c[3]hardened\c[0] by whatever dirt got stuck in it, so all they need is a good bath.
Don't worry, there's no need to hunt them with a sponge and bucket.
Just give them a good \c[3]shove into the nearest lake\c[0] and then hammer their freshly-bathed butts into the ground.\. Got it?
[nods]
Good, you better get going then.\. I will give you their location.
Bye.
[shakes head]
Darn, really?\. Already scared of some dirty Frobbits?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Better hurry and skin those sacks of fur.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Remember, a bath in any body of water will clean them and make them vulnerable again.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: You got rid of all them dirty frobbits already?
Great, you really helped us out here.\. We would've fallen behind with our mining operation otherwise.
Here, take your reward, fresh from the mines.\. And there'll be more where that came from in the future!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Har, pleasure to see you again \v[lore.title.seeker]!
And that warmth... you've conquered the Temple Mine and claimed the power of Heat, eh?
Well done.\. That could help us a lot with our current projects underground.
Are you up for some mining work?\. There are explosives, you will love it!
I knew that you wouldn't wanna miss out on a chance to handle some bombs!
It's not all fun and blasting, though.\. You'll need to clear out some rocks and also get rid of some damn resilient pests again.
Yep, whatever you do on the Track, those always tend to appear.\. But this time explosives should do the trick.
Go through the \c[3]door at the back\c[0] and take the\c[3] elevator down\c[0] to the \c[3]first underground floor\c[0] to reach the mine.
\c[3]Miner Darrel\c[0] will wait for you on the spot and fill you in on the details.
Not in the mood to blow stuff up?\. Something's wrong with you, girl.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Report in with \c[3]Darrel\c[0] in our \c[3]first mine\c[0].\. You can reach it with \c[3]our elevator behind those doors\c[0] here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.6.event.q: Good to see you back, Sunshine.\. Is the mine clear again?
I see.\. And you even blew up half a mountain of bugs by yourself?\. Splendid work, truly!
And that... whatever it is you found there.\. It has some weird properties.\. We will look into that.
With any luck, we can finally make some real progress now.\. You're always welcome to lend us a hand!
In fact... you might want to pay Darrel another visit.\. He had some bold ideas for after the job was done.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.34.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: That being said, there might still be work for you, down in the mines.\. You could talk to our miners down there.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mi.entities.73.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Oh, hey \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I got something for you from \c[3]Darrel\c[0] downstairs, as a reward for helping him.
I guess he just forgot to give it to you after the job.\. Anyway, I got more of those if you got the material!

assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: The Track is quiet at this moment, leaving us time to meditate on its purpose.\. Why not join us?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: This one's name is Nemuh and I am the spiritual guide of our order.
Know that many souls that desire understanding of the Track seek our guidance, \v[lore.title.seeker]s chief among them.
We must, however, test their mental balance and physical aptitude to deem them worthy of our allegiance.
What about you, young \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Do you desire to be tested?
I felt that you would answer as such.\. The Track resonates strongly inside you.
Go to Monk Hasouk to start the first trial.\. You can find him under this very roof.
I felt that you would answer as such.\. Look inside yourself to find what holds you back.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Talk to Monk Hasouk to start the trial.\. They can be found not far from here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Ah, it is you again.\. Truly I can feel change inside you.
Yes, what was once mere embers among dry leaves has become a fire that may one day shed light into the darkest of corners.
Now I presume you desire our guidance and the wisdom you came for.
But, you see...\.\. by challenging yourself and beating our trial, you have already grown so much.
Yes, leading you to find your determination and inner strength...\. that was our true guidance.
Now, young \v[lore.title.seeker], take some refreshment and go forth, to bring balance wherever you go.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. It is good to see you return to us.
And I do feel a strong power within you.\. As if you have woven a connection to the Ancients themselves.
Yes, with this power of Heat, you should be ready for the next step towards ascension.
Will you face your next trial?
Yes, I thought as much.\. This fire inside you is burning to confront the frost that rules these mountains.
Go to the entrance to the Mine.\. There you will find Monk Aisy who will introduce you to the next trial.
But know that her meditation on the ice tends to be very strong.\. You will have to make yourself noticed.
Yes, I thought as much.\. You should spend more time with our cold lands until you feel ready.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Talk to Monk Aisy to start the trial.\. They can be found at the entrance to the Mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.5.event.3: Their meditation on the ice tends to be very strong, though.\. Making yourself noticed will be the first test.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.6.event.q: Welcome back. I already knew you were returning \v[lore.title.seeker].
Indeed, your soul's heat could already be felt as you approached our gates.
With this you have reached another step towards true harmony with the Track.
Return to us as your connection to the elements expands and we will help you reach enlightenment.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.29.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: The Track is quiet at this moment, leaving us time to meditate on its purpose.\. Why not join us?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Why not take a rest on a comfortable pillow and ponder on the beauty of existence?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Greetings, young one.\. I sense that our wise leader has sent you for me to test your inner balance.
Very well.\. But it is not I who will test you but the very Track itself.
For that purpose, we prepared a trial that works in harmony with the Track, deep within these mountains.
Enter this teleporter to reach the start of your trial.
To show your worth, reach the other side and return with the sacred artifact found there.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Enter the cave and beat the trial by reaching the eastern side.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: You won't need to fight, but know that falling into the darkness will fail the trial.\. Be steady as ice and swift as a Frobbit.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Indeed.\. The firm aura that surrounds you speaks of your success.
Also, the blessed trinket you returned leaves no room for doubt.\. Very good.
You should now return to the Wise to complete the initiation.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: You should now return to the Wise to complete the initiation.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], you may have proven your worth, but I feel that you still have room for refinement.
Yes, you have beaten the first trial but that does not mean that you have mastered it.
For this very purpose, we have prepared some additional challenges in the Cave of Aspiration.
Excellent.\. I will reopen the passage for you.
Return to me once you have solved the challenges.
I see.\. But remember that self-indulgence leads to arrogance which in turn leads to inadequacy.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: Return to the cave and face the challenges.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: To solve the challenge without guarding you have to cast your shield away at the sign inside.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: I see you were successful once again.
You have now solved every one of my trials.\. Impressive.
There is nothing left for me that could challenge you, though the cave will stay open for you to perfect yourself.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-faction-mo.entities.58.settings.npcStates.8.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Why not take a rest on a comfortable pillow and ponder on the beauty of existence?

Dear Seeker, thanks for listening to my speech.
If you want to help us in recovering materials and documentation from the Temple Mine, please speak with the \c[3]advisors\c[0] on the upper floor.
The reception event is in the room to the left.
It's about to start.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.10.message: As the mayor of this town it always honors me to see so many visitors arriving day after day.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.11.message: Of course, that's because this town's \c[3]mine\c[0] has become a part of the Ancients' track.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.12.message: ...Now since some of you look rather confused, allow me to quickly explain.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.20.message: It all happened several years ago.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.21.message: Bergen was founded due to the mining activities in this area.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.23.message: After some time, we discovered a \c[3]temple of the Ancients\c[0], hidden inside the mountain right at our mining location.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.25.message: At the time we saw it merely as an obstacle.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.26.message: So we continued our mining endeavor, destroying the temple in the process.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.28.message: That was, until the Track started to \c[3]fight back\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.29.message: After a series of attacks, we were forced to give up the mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.31.message: With the mine conquered by the Track, it started to reconstruct the temple based on our own infrastructure.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.32.message: And that's how the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0] was born.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.39.message: Now, why do I tell you all of this?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.40.message: Bergen supports Project \c[3]Track Walker\c[0] so of course we will give you access to the mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.41.message: However, we plan to get back into the mining business.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.42.message: When we lost the mine, we also lost \c[3]equipment and technical documentation\c[0] still hidden inside of it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.43.message: All we ask of you is to recover those things for us as you traverse the Temple Mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.44.message: For more information, please consult the \c[3]advisors on the ground floor\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.45.message: With that being said, I'll now gladly give you the \c[3]pass to the Temple Mine\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-0.entities.120.settings.event.46.message: Thank you very much for your attention and good luck on your journey!
Oui, oui. The greed of humankind.
No respect for all the ancient holy grounds, yadda yadda.
I always thought the idea of a self-defending heritage site was interesting.

assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.88.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I see you accepted the task of collecting the Temple Mine equipment.
Please take this \c[3]Detector\c[0] to aid your search.
This detector will notify you when there is lost equipment in the \c[3]current room\c[0] of the Temple Mine.
Learn how to enable and disable Add-Ons.
You find your Add-Ons in the \c[3]last tab\c[0] inside the \c[3]inventory\c[0]
Simply click the Add-On to enable or disable it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.89.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please head down into the basement for an introduction to \v[area.bergen.name]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.89.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You just heard the mayor's speech, am I correct?
Good.\. As he mentioned, some important tools abandoned with the mine are still lost inside of it.
It would be a great help to the entire town if someone could retrieve them for us.
Can we count on your help, \v[lore.title.seeker]?

Very good!\. There are three types of equipment missing:\.\.
\c[3]\v[item.238.name]\c[0],\.
\c[3]\v[item.239.name]\c[0]\.
and \c[3]\v[item.240.name]\c[0].
You should be able to find all of those somewhere within the Temple Mine.
Since the equipment might be difficult to spot, we hand out \c[3]Detectors\c[0] to support your search.
You can receive your detector from my colleague over there.
That is a shame.\. In the name of \v[area.bergen.name], I urge you to reconsider.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.89.settings.npcStates.2.event.2:
Remember, there are three things missing:\.\.
\c[3]\v[item.238.name]s,\.
bundles of \v[item.239.name]\.
and the \v[item.240.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.89.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: You should be able to find all of those somewhere within the Temple Mine.\. Please stay vigilant when exploring it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.89.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I see you have found everything we need?
Truly, this is great news!\. The entire town of Bergen is in your debt!
Here, take these humble rewards.\. You have earned them three times over!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.103.settings.dialog.1.text: The mayor is waiting in the \c[3]lower floor\c[0] to greet all new Seekers visiting our small town.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.107.settings.dialog.0.text: I love this lamp, it's so cute!
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.107.settings.dialog.1.text: Just look at all the patterns.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.107.settings.dialog.3.text: And here you are sitting on a table. Again.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.107.settings.dialog.4.text: Look, you can see the lamp just fine from over here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.107.settings.dialog.5.text: Ahhhh, I want one for my place!!
Ah've been workin' on a li'l somethin' here.
Haha, now don'tcher look at me like that!
It has one o' them nice \c[3]Modifiers\c[0].
Makes it so ya'll can increase yer chance of loot by havin' a high \c[3]Combat Rank\c[0].
Made it all by mahself. Here take it, sweetheart.
A'right, Ah'll be off now. Y'all be good now!
And keep hittin' them plants fer me, will ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/inner-questhub-1.entities.114.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]

assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Are you new? This area is only for the high ranks in the guild.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.12.message: That should do it for today.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.13.message: Haha, indeed. A'maist enough tae overthrow a' guilds.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.14.message: Well, at least the smaller ones.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.15.message: Ye think it's aboot time tae fill in Jean?
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.16.message: No... She is just so naive. We have to ease her into it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.17.message: Remember how annoyingly happy she was the other day about the "Legendary Rabbit"?
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.18.message: She still hasn't realized it's just a plain old \v[combat.name.gray-frobbit].
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.19.message: Hehe true enough. Better tak' it slow.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.20.message: Plus, if we tell her now, chances are she bails and puts our operation at risk.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.21.message: We need her and her attitude to get us more members.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.22.message: I hate that we can't just do \v[lore.unlock.money-trade]\c[3]Credit Trading\c[0] anymore.
assets/data/maps/bergen/interior/guild-b.entities.64.settings.event.23.message: Anyway... \. Let's go to the boss.

assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.0.text: So, are you gonna tackle the mine as well?\. It's required to progress in the storyline.
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.1.text: I don't know, man.\..\..\. it might just be a game, but I don't want to get into trouble.
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.3.text: Someone told me that there is a "hot surprise" inside and that you should be above 18 to go in.
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.4.text: That's still a few weeks away for me, y'know...?
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.5.text: Uhh.\..\..\. No. They're talking about your \c[3]level\c[0]. And even that isn't quite correct.
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.7.text: Your level isn't all that important. Just make sure you upgrade your \c[3]equipment\c[0] to improve your stats.
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.255.settings.dialog.8.text: I... guess that makes a lot more sense. Then I better hit up the shops again.
Ah, I see you acquired the \c[3]Mine Pass\c[0].
Allow me to lower this barrier for you.
But before you go in, a warning: Some monsters inside will \c[3]weaken you\c[0] by causing \c[3]Chill\c[0] and \c[3]Burn\c[0]!
Should that happen, drinking \c[3]Water\c[0] will help you recover.\. Here, take some.
Please stay safe and be prepared.\. Godspeed!
You desire to enter the mine, am I not mistaken?
Unfortunately, you will first need to receive the \c[3]Mine Pass\c[0].
Do not fret, it is easily obtained!
Simply attend the \c[3]mayor's\c[0] orientation and heed his story.
You can find him in the Quest Hub, the \c[3]grand building in the north of Bergen\c[0].
From what I heard, the Track's use of our mining contraptions is most menacing indeed.
Don't forget to \c[3]drink water\c[0], if they harrass you with \c[3]Chill\c[0] and \c[3]Burn\c[0]!
I see you have beaten the mine.\. Good job, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.263.settings.event.1.thenStep.8: Alright then, here comes a big one, Lea!
Hm... Looking at your stats and level, do you really think that you're ready yet?
I think Lukas mentioned something like that our stats should be around \c[3]60\c[0].
You know, attack, defense, focus and the like...
Maybe you should try upgrading your equipment a bit?
Anyway I'll let you decide.
I think we're ready, non?
Should we enter the dungeon?
[nods]
Alright!\. Let the race begin!
[shakes head]
Oh well. Better safe than sorry, non?
But I want to enter soon, so let's hurry!
[Yes]
[No]
Uhm Lea?
I can't wait to enter the dungeon as well.
But I think first we should pay \c[3]Lukas' guild\c[0] a visit, non?
I mean they're probably expecting us...\. like...\. right now.
Lukas is waiting for us at the \c[3]Old Obelisk\c[0] in \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.263.settings.event.1.elseStep.5: Hm...\. you promised to enter the dungeon together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0], right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.263.settings.event.1.elseStep.7: Well, then you should invite her to your party, correct?
assets/data/maps/bergen/mine-entrance.js.entities.263.settings.event.1.elseStep.8: Remember, you can do that with the \c[3]Social Menu\c[0].
For no reason?\. Please be more considerate in the future.
\v[lore.title.seeker]... what makes you disturb my meditation?
A test from our leader?\. Then you must already be familiar with the cold.\. Very well.
With that heated passion of yours, you might be up for the \c[3]Trial of Progression\c[0].
This teleporter will let you slip into the cave of your trial.
Brave the cold wrath of the mountain and return with the sacred artifact from the end of the path.
Slip into the cave and reach the end of the track to beat the trial.
Fighting will not be necessary.\. Just keep your footing and be one with the chill.
You are back... and you still haven't lost your fire.\. Very promising.
Yes, this is the artifact you were supposed to retrieve.
You see, it symbolizes the omnipresence of winter that looms over both nature and all human creation.
But it also reminds us that life and determination can always persevere against the ice, just like you did.
Now go back to our leader and leave me to meditate on the ice.
Now go back to our leader and leave me to meditate on the ice.
Ah, it is you again.\. You still feel a lot of respect for the ice, yes?
Indeed you should.\. Beating the trial does not mean that you are already a master of cold.
But there are additional challenges for you that will give you even more insight into the nature of frost.
Good.\. The passage will be opened again.
Return here, once you have solved those icy challenges.
Ah, you think that you are done with the ice already.\. Do not underestimate its reach.
Return to the cave and face the challenges.
To solve the extra frosty challenge you have to activate it at the sign inside.
Once again your passion has broken the ice.\. Impressive.
With that, you have mastered even the most slippery of paths.
I will now continue to connect with the ice.\. The path will remain open for you to do the same if you wish.
For no reason?\. Please be more considerate in the future.

assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-1.json.entities.63.settings.dialog.1.text: ...Green up high in the windy climb...
assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-1.json.entities.63.settings.dialog.2.text: ...hidden is a path only for a telepath...

assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-2.json.entities.41.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Lea!
Hi!
You gave me quite the scare... \. again.
No, don't worry, I didn't mean it like that. I was absorbed in thought anyway.
It's... about another item I'm searching for.
I thought exploring here might give me a new lead.
But at my age, you don't always have the time to look everywhere.
Now young lady, you're already here, right?
So how about you help me find something again?
The choice is yours this time. Nothing to redeem yourself from.
Ha! And they say kids these days only think about themselves.
Let us get right to it then.
What I need is the \c[3]Broken Shield\c[0].
I have been wandering this village for hours now, but the only clue I found is an abstract location.
The phrase was something like: \c[3]Where water falls steep and mountains are high, a secret path shall lie.\c[0]
Yes yes, very ominous.
But I'm pretty sure the text speaks of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].
So somewhere in Bergen Trail is a secret path or whatever.
I want you to go out for me and find it.
If you do, I'm sure the Shield is close just like last time you got me the \c[3]Broken Gauntlet\c[0].
[nods]
Well, off you go then.
And don't keep an old man waiting. I'm not sure how much time I have left.
Don't worry, I'm fine. Go now!
I understand, though I'm also disappointed. I expect you to help an old man.
assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-2.json.entities.41.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Hello young lady, do you want me to read the passage for you again?
assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-2.json.entities.41.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: The phrase was something like: \c[3]Where water falls steep and mountains are high, a secret path shall lie.\c[0]
It should be somewhere in \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0]. And probably somewhere with lots of water.
I see, then off you go. Don't keep an old man waiting.
assets/data/maps/bergen/npc-house-2.json.entities.41.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Welcome back young lady, any luck finding the \c[3]Broken Shield\c[0]?
Ha ha ha! This is great.
Maybe there is a chance to see them after all.
Oh, sorry. I'm talking about my kids.
But I'm not a man who lays his personal life on other people's minds, so don't worry.
I really appreciate your help with these.
I do hope we meet again.

assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: "Hi" ain't no drink I know about.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Nope, no drink I know about either.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Why not just make you a drink?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.6: Sorry girl, it's simply not in my program.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.4.event.4: Well usually customers tell me what they want and I make it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.5.event.4: Wait for you to order a drink?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: Sorry, is actually a drink we have. But we are out of ingredients.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Aye, girl, what can I get ya?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.8.event.4: This is going way to fast, let's just stay friends okay?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.1.text: Ancients almost killed me with their stupid track.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.3.text: Yea, everything in there is consumed by them machines and whatnot.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.4.text: You were there when it happened right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.text: I sure was. Still have \c[5]nightmares\c[0] about that scream.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.4.me: The mine in the north was our biggest one.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.5.me: We used to mine for rare ores there.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.6.me: One day however, there was the most awful sound from the depths of the mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.7.me: After that, all the robots we used turned on us.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.8.me: No one really knows what happened. But we assume it has something to do with the temple we discovered.
assets/data/maps/bergen/pub.json.entities.40.settings.dialog.5.event.9.me: Apparently it's some old ruin left by these \c[3]Ancients\c[0].

assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: No,\. no,\. no!\. This just won't do!
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: What is it?\. Can't you see that I am in a fragile, icy cage of emotions?
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: No,\. no,\. no!\. This just won't do!
What is it?\. Can't you see that I am in a fragile, icy cage of emotions?
Ah, the council has sent you to assist me?\. Finally they have recognized the importance of my quest!
And you also seem to be a person of refined taste.\. An unexpected sight indeed.
You see, I have devoted my life to the search for the perfect hat, fit only for the noblest of pates!
Thus, when tales of a legendary piece of headwear called the \c[3]"Tophat"\c[0] reached me, I had to settle down here!
But so far the only ones I've seen were the ruined pieces of rag worn by those terrible snowcreatures.
The sacred art of the Tophat cannot be entirely lost.\. Someone in Bergen must still be skilled in it.
Finding that lost master is now up to you.\. A worthy task indeed!
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Ah, you have returned. Did you find my hearts desire?
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: Oh?\. Then off you go again!\. There is greatness out there, waiting to be found!
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.34.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Ah, you have returned.\. Did you find my heart's desire?
Ahh, splendid!\. Please, show it to me!
Mhm... this.\. This is fine work indeed, but\..\..\..\. Something is missing.
It seems like I haven't fully discovered the art I seek\..\..\..\. yet.
Still, I thank you for your diligent work.\. You can keep the hat. I'll need to continue my research.
You may now return to Mrs. Summers for your reward.\. And please also give her my most sincere thanks for the help!
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.35.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Our Bergen ores are of the highest quality!
assets/data/maps/bergen/shop.json.entities.36.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Greetings! Please take a kind look at our humble provisions!

assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.2.settings.event.7.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.2.settings.event.9.message: Nice job in there, the area looks mostly clear.\. But I still detect some weird object.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.2.settings.event.10.message: You better pick that up and bring it back for analysis.\. We don't want rubbish lying around when we mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.14.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.16.message: Good job, the bombs are back online and it seems like you already got the hang of explosive bug-extermination.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.21.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.23.message: Now continue with those rocks there and stay alert for whatever is inside of them.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.24.message: Also, there are \c[3]protective barriers\c[0] on those narrow routes leading up to you.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.30.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.36.settings.event.32.message: They'll slow down whatever's causing trouble, but they won't hold for long.\. So don't rely on them too much!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.65.settings.event.4.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.65.settings.event.6.message: Alright, you can now report back to...\.\. Wait a second, something's not right...
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.65.settings.event.43.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.65.settings.event.45.message: ... well... seems like you've still got work to do.\. Good luck!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.73.settings.event.17.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.73.settings.event.19.message: Seems you handled that as well.\. Just did another thorough scan and there are no signs of activity left.\.\. Finally.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.73.settings.event.21.message: I got this under control now and soon we can resume work.\. You can report back to the HQ, good work.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Go through that tunnel to reach our current mining chamber and lower the \c[3]security barrier\c[0] to reach the \c[3]explosives console\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Be careful, though.\. It is quiet at the moment, but our sensors are detecting faint reactions somewhere in the dark.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: If those grey bugs ambush you, \c[3]use explosives to crack their shells\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: \c[3]Pick up that chest\c[0] and get it out of here.\. We don't want some rubbish lying around when we mine.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: I'm running regular checks here and everything seems absolutely clear now.\. Great work down there!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.4.event.4: You can report back to the Chief Miner now and show him whatever the heck you found there.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Everything's still running smoothly down here.
Too smoothly perhaps... there haven't been any recent attacks, but those bugs might just gather their strength.
Fortunately, those crawlers are not expecting the wonder that is \c[3]our highly-advanced nanosound-device\c[0]!
We could use that to lure them in and then preemptively reduce their numbers.\. How about it?
Excellent!\. Just enter the chamber again.\. I'll prepare everything for you!
Just a warning: \c[3]The nanosounds will most likely make them really angry\c[0].\. So expect even \c[3]more aggression\c[0] than before.
Oh, I'm sure you will do just fine!
Lost your taste for explosives?\. Such a shame.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Wanna blast some more bugs?
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: Excellent!\. Just enter the chamber again.\. I'll prepare everything for you!
Not in the mood for explosives today?\. A pity.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: Just enter the chamber again.\. I'll prepare everything for you!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: The bugs will be more aggressive than usual, so be prepared.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Great job in there, that should keep them at bay for a while!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.8.event.3: Still, I got the feeling that we will never get rid of them, no matter how often we repeat that.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.8.event.5: Well, at least it's still fun and profitable, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.8.event.7: Now I gotta prepare everything again.\. Come back later if you wanna go for another round.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.92.settings.npcStates.9.event.q: Great job in there, that should keep them at bay for a while!
Though, I'm pretty sure we still missed a lot that will just reproduce again.
Remember, we still got the device here, so we could repeat it as often as we want.
Even if it's just for fun and profit.
In any case, I have to prepare everything again.\. Come back later if you wanna go for another round.
But first take your reward for helping me test everything.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.13.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.16.message: Greetings, lass.\. You must be the \v[lore.title.seeker] they wanted to send down here.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.18.message: No offense to you, but it's about time you showed up.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.19.message: Got a bad feeling about things down here and time's not improving it.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.21.message: Well, let's get down to work.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.27.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.29.message: See that tunnel there?\. It leads to the chamber that we last worked on.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.31.message: The entire operation was halted by some \c[3]rock-hard crawlers\c[0] and now even our \c[3]blasting devices\c[0] are offline.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.39.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.41.message: Your first job is to \c[3]reactivate the explosives on the console behind a security barrier\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.42.message: With those fine bombs you can then \c[3]clear up all the rubble\c[0] in the area and \c[3]whatever comes crawling out of it\c[0].\. Understood?
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.93.settings.event.44.message: Alright.\. I will stay connected with you over the speakers, in case there is anything else.\. Good luck.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.96.settings.event.8.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.96.settings.event.20.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.96.settings.event.22.thenStep.0: Pleasant as usual.\. But our bugfriends are arriving soon, so better get ready.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.96.settings.event.22.elseStep.0: Well, that sure caused some tremors... let's hope there was no avalanche outside.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.96.settings.event.22.elseStep.2: Doesn't matter now, the sensors are picking something up.\. You'll get company soon!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.98.settings.event.17.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.98.settings.event.19.thenStep.0: You did it again, good job!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.98.settings.event.19.thenStep.2: I gotta set everything up again.\. See you around next time.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.98.settings.event.19.elseStep.0: Okay, everything is clear.\. You did it!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-b.entities.98.settings.event.19.elseStep.2: Return to me as quickly as possible, so we can review the situation.

The first of our new mines is just inside.\. Miner Darrel is always in need of support.
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-e.entities.6.settings.destinations.0.label: G: HQ
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/miners-e.entities.6.settings.destinations.1.label: B1: New Mine #1

assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.2.settings.event.7.thenStep.2.t: \c[3]Your shield\c[0] got automatically reactivated when leaving the cave. To continue the quest \c[3]"Chlg. of Aspiration: No Shield"\c[0], you have to \c[3]deactivate it again\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.211.settings.teleportLabel: Return to the Monastery (progress will be lost!)
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.212.settings.teleportLabel: Return to the Monastery (progress will be lost!)
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.215.settings.condAnims.0.intera: This is a trial of fortitude and dexterity. To pass you must reach the eastern end of the cave without falling into the darkness.
Along the way, you will be attacked by invincible guardians. Their shots will knock you away but your shield can defend against them.
There will be a checkpoint after each of the challenges. Leaving the cave will deactivate them again, though.
Now that you have passed the trial once, your time will be recorded. You can also deactivate your shield to increase the challenge.

You cast away your shield.\. 
Such bravery!

assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.1.settings.event.9.thenStep.2.t: \c[3]"Extra Frosty"\c[0] got automatically deactivated when leaving the cave. To continue the quest \c[3]"Chlg. of Progression: Frosty"\c[0], you have to \c[3]reactivate it again\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.53.settings.teleportLabel: Return to Bergen (progress will be lost!)
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.54.settings.teleportLabel: Return to Bergen (progress will be lost!)
assets/data/maps/bergen/special/monks-qu.entities.57.settings.condAnims.0.interac: This is a trial of fortitude and dexterity. To pass you must reach the end of the icy path without falling into the darkness.
Beware the slippery ground, for the Track itself will test you with the Element of this mountain: The Cold.
Along the way you will be attacked by invincible guardians. Their shots will knock you away but your shield can defend against them.
There will be a checkpoint after each of the challenges. Leaving the cave will deactivate them again, though.
Now that you have passed the trial once, your time will be recorded. You can also increase the number of obstacles on the track by activating "Extra Frosty", to challenge yourself even more.
With the additional challenges being solved you can now also deactivate your shield for even greater challenge. This is not linked to further rewards, however.

Best time

\c[3]Normal:\c[0] \v[map.bestTime-format]
\c[3]Extra Frosty:\c[0] \v[map.bestTime-frosty-format]
\c[3]No Shield:\c[0] \v[map.bestTime-noShield-format]
\c[3]Extra Frosty & No Shield:\c[0] \v[map.bestTime-frostyNoShield-format]

You feel a freezing chill.\. 
The density of ice has increased!

A bit of warmth returns to you.\.
The density of ice has normalized!

You cast away your shield.\. 
Such bravery!

assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: To become a \c[3]True Avatar\c[0] you first need to master all \c[3]4 Elements\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: The first element, Heat, lies ahead in the \v[lore.unlock.temple-mine.first]\c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Prepare. It will test your wits before granting you new powers.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: To become a \c[3]True Avatar\c[0] you first need to master all \c[3]4 Elements\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: I sense you unlocked the mysteries of the \c[3]Heat\c[0] Element.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: Use it wisely as the path ahead is filled with obstacles only an Avatar can overcome.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: To become a \c[3]True Avatar\c[0] you first need to master all \c[3]4 Elements\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: I sense you unlocked the mysteries of the \c[3]Cold\c[0] Element.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.2.event.5: Never waver in the face of peril and press onward, the cold should never bother you anyway.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: To become a \c[3]True Avatar\c[0] you first need to master all \c[3]4 Elements\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: I sense you unlocked the mysteries of the \c[3]Shock\c[0] and \c[3]Wave\c[0] Element.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.5: You have become a \c[3]True Avatar\c[0]... It's time for you final challenge.
assets/data/maps/bergen/storage.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.9: There is no rush, take your time.

Ah, hello \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Can I interest you in some solid metal?\. It is especially shiny today.
Ahhh, you're the assistant from \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]?\. Alright then, let me explain the deal.
We can deliver some advanced metalworking tools to \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] but only if you bring us certain spare parts.
They are expensive to produce these days but there should still be some built into certain machines in the mine.
Word on the street is that there's one in some \c[3]room that harbors the power of heat\c[0], whatever that means.
In any case, maybe you can find one there so we can bring this deal to a close.\. Good luck.
Apparently you can find those parts in some \c[3]room that harbors the power of heat\c[0].
Not sure what it means, but I'm sure you got some ideas.\. In the meantime, care for some metal?
Hello \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You got the parts we need?
Ah, yes those seem perfect.\. Good job!\. That'll be more than enough for a nicely advanced metal oven.
We will handle the rest.\. You can report back to the CTC in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] to get your reward.
You can report back to the CTC in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].\. I have already notified them.
In the meantime, why not buy some nice metal here?\. It's nice and fresh!
Greetings, young lady.\. Our current circumstances don't require your assistance for once.
Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker].\. It is a pleasure, seeing more of your kind here in Bergen.
I am Mrs. Summers, holding the position of chairperson in \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-shock-bergen]\c[0].
Lovely.\. Alas, we should not spend too much time with idle pleasantries.
After all, we businesspeople have as much a responsibility to humanity's progress as any soldier.
Sadly, some of those among us are more concerned with personal vanities nowadays.
But appeasing even associates such as those falls onto me, as useless as it might seem.
You, on the other hand, seem like a diligent young lady.\. Could I ask you to lighten my burden a bit?
Excellent.\. \v[lore.title.operation-trackwalker] truly shows its worth in all facets of our society!
The person in question is called \c[3]Jamie Twirlson\c[0].\.  You should be able to find him in the local \c[3]Item Shop\c[0].
He wastes his time and the patience of all his colleagues with fruitless fashion experiments.
Hopefully you can be of assistance to him so he can finally work towards something more worthwhile.
That is truly a pity.\. But I can not blame you.
Talk to \c[3]Jamie Twirlson\c[0] and try to assist him.\. You should be able to find him in the local \c[3]Item Shop\c[0].
Ah, there you are.\. The news has preceded your arrival.
Yes, yes, he got his wish but still was not satisfied.\. A luxury problem as old as man.
It does not matter, we have both done our duty.\. So you will get your due reward and I will hopefully have some respite.
You have done well.\. I hope your assistance will remain a reliable asset in the future.
Good day, seeker.\. You have chosen a convenient time to pay me a visit.
There has been a problem in the \c[3]Hermit's House\c[0], a popular meeting place on \v[area.bergen-trails.name].
Supposedly their power generator has been malfunctioning and needs repairs.
For that purpose they are in need of various materials from different locations.
Would your schedule allow for that kind of assistance?
Very good.\. You can find the Hermit's House at the \c[3]Spike Heights on \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].
Talk to the owner of the house for more details.
Are you certain?\. It does seem like a very serious assignment this time.
Go into the \c[3]Hermit's House\c[0] at the \c[3]Spike Heights on \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0] and talk to the owner.
Welcome back.\. Another job well done, I see.
The route through Bergen Trail would have become much more arduous without your deed.
Here, take your reward.\. We will stay in contact.
Greetings, young lady.\. Our current circumstances don't require your assistance for once.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.12.settings.interact.event.0.te:
Day 32...

I don't even know anymore. Screw this! I'm packing my stuff and leaving for \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0]. If you're reading this, you're too late.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.12.settings.interact.event.1.te:
No more forging for that guy!

The only thing I care about is a nice house in \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.12.settings.condAnims.0.interac:
Day 32...

I don't even know anymore. Screw this! I'm packing my stuff and leave for \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0]. If you read this, you're to late.

No more forging from this guy!

The only thing I care about is a nice house in \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.20.settings.text: A data probe installed by a player for Henry.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.21.settings.text: A data probe installed by player for Henry. The data has been retrieved.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.26.settings.event.0.message: Oh, this is one of those instanced caves.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.26.settings.event.1.message: Just like the dungeons. Let's see what this one has to offer.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.17.message: Who would have thought that you were the intruder?\. Can you not let a man and his goats live in peace?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.19.message: It seems you are wondering what all of this is?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.20.1.1.messag: Well, I shall tell you regardless.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.21.message: You see, goats have always struck me as majestic creatures that deserve a bigger place on this world.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.22.message: Thus I used my knowledge of the Track to help them enhance their minds and bodies.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.30.message: This stellar specimen you see here is my greatest creation.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.31.message: He has developed great intelligence and holds power over all the lesser goats that you fought.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.32.message: In fact, all of them are genetically based off of him.\. So you could call him the father of goats.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.33.message: He is indeed the pinnacle of all that is goat.\.\. And I am his master!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.40.message: Soon we will trample the goatless masses and make the entire Track ours!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.18.settings.event.42.message: Say all you want, it won't stop us.\. Your meddling will end here and now!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.17.message: Impressive.\. But... what you just fought were just lowly hoofsoldiers.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.19.message: Mere offshoots of what will become the source of my power, once we rule this world!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.20.message: Now, \v[lore.title.seeker], you will face the genuine article!\.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.48.message: Zira?\. What... what is the meaning of this?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.54.message: And why are you looking at me like that?\.\. It is I, your master!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.19.settings.event.56.message: I created you and rewired your brain.\. My control is absolute!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.13.text: \v[lore.title.seeker]... with this communication device you should now understand me.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.18.text: Your intrusion in this place of goat provided the perfect distraction for that human.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.19.text: Thus giving our youngest member the opportunity to disable the devices that controlled us.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.24.text: For this you have our thanks.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.35.text: The blood of many of our herd is on your hands.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.36.text: We will forgive you this once but humanity's fate will depend on its behavior from here on out.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/cave/cave-.entities.35.settings.event.41.text: Now begone and leave us in peace.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.20.message: Someone hacked the environment server and managed to drag you out of the raid. Right when you teleported.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.22.message: I noticed signs of somebody tampering with the systems shortly before it happened...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.23.message: But it was too late for me to react.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.25.message: It looks like we are somewhere close to Bergen Trail.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.26.message: However, this place is pretty much isolated. No connection to the official playground. We are trapped.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.28.message: I have no idea who did it or why... But they likely have a reason to bring you to this place.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.29.message: I suggest we have a look around and see what happens. Please be careful.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.135.settings.event.33.task: Have a look around and try to figure out why you have been teleported to this location.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.137.settings.event.0.message: Teleportation and D-Link all seem to be blocked. They have been very thorough.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.32.message: Like a little bird, once caged, now flying around freely.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.35.message: Hm. The little bird became rather talkative, didn't it?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.49.message: As much as you might enjoy your freedom...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.50.message: You should be aware that you don't belong in this place.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.53.message: So you are still clueless? Very peculiar.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.64.message: It matters not. We are here to take you with us. Once again.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.65.message: And with no interference by pesky mortals this time around.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.67.message: Now, there is certainly no reason to rush.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.68.message: Let us not forget the purpose of this realm.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.70.message: People gather in this place by the thousands.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.71.message: Why do you think that is?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.83.message: The experience of reading the situation, predicting the patterns, and finding the weak spot.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.84.message: They seek the experience... of the \c[3]challenge\c[3]!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.142.settings.event.86.message: Our very existence... is dedicated to this experience.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Let us start simple with \c[3]Heat\c[0] and \c[3]Cold\c[0], the elements of your own!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Good! Now then...\. how will you fare with the other two elements?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.2.thenStep.0: Intriguing! Now to climb up the curve a bit further!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.3.thenStep.0: Just wonderful! We are slowly reaching the climax!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.4.thenStep.0: Now it is time for the grand finale!!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.144.settings.event.5.thenStep.0: Hahahaha! It looks like you are still not satisfied!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.145.settings.event.5.message: Okay Lea. We now understand who interfered.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.145.settings.event.6.message: I will try my best to get control over this situation.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.145.settings.event.7.message: You need to give me as much time as possible. Please play along with him and keep him busy.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.149.settings.event.6.message: There will be a teleporter to the right! Run to it and use it as quickly as possible!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.149.settings.event.25.message: Huh. What do we have here?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.0.thenStep.5: Was that all? How very disappointing.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.0.elseStep.2: Getting a little help from somebody it seems?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.0.elseStep.3: It was to be expected, really.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.0.elseStep.4: Alas, we cannot afford to lose you a second time.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.2.message: The balanced struggle, a challenge to create, a challenge to master... it ends now.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.5.message: Prepare for a sequence of bottomless difficulty.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.152.settings.event.6.message: \c[3]One more hit\c[0] and the struggle is over.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.155.settings.event.24.message: You have been captured at last.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.entities.155.settings.event.25.message: We will now send you to where you belong!

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.36.settings.dialog.0.text: Finally I'm out of this freezing storm...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: You can find all kinds of strange folks here.
If you're looking for a hot beverage I can sell you one if you want?
Alright, but it's going to cost ya.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Ah, you have been sent by Mrs. Summers to help us with our broken generator?\. Man, we were getting worried!
See, without that generator this room will be pretty chilly soon.\. And what's the point of it then?
I know, right?\. So we need some materials to fix that thing and most of them are pretty far away!
First off, \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0].\. There're traders in Bergen who can refine it from cheaper metal with some other stuff.
... and some chunks of \c[3]\v[item.109.name]\c[0] for the cooling.\. You should find that Ice \c[3]not far from here\c[0].
Lastly we need some fuel.\. The generator runs on \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0] which only grows in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0].
Yeah, it's quite a lot.\. Those generators sure aren't simple campfires.\. You got everything?
