Alright, hope to see you soon.\. Before we're all icicles in here.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.2.event.s: Oh, hi there.\. Haven't gotten the materials yet, eh?
Well, we are still running on backup-power, so it's fine.\. But better not take too long with it.
Anyway, can I get you some drinks in the meantime?
Alright, but it's going to cost ya.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Ah, it's you.\. And from that look on your face I guess you got all that stuff that we need for the repairs?
Awesome!\. Now I'll just use it to make a repair kit with everything you'll need.\. Gimme a second...
... and that's it.\. Take this, go through the door behind me and just jam it into the generator in the basement.
Well... you will also need to get through some security barriers that appeared shortly after the generator broke.
Don't ask me what powers them and why they are protecting a damaged generator.
The Hermit must've had some crazy ideas about interior design, back in his time.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.4.event.s: Need a hot drink before going to work?\. It's really cold down there!
Alright, but it's going to cost ya.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Hey there, hero.\. We got power again and everything's running smoothly.\. Amazing!
I already sent a message back to Mrs. Summers so you can claim your reward.
Also, as special thanks, we will give you a small discount on all our drinks.
I hope to see you around more often!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.37.settings.npcStates.6.event.s: Welcome back, fella.\. Great to see you around!
The \c[3]Hermit's House\c[0] still has its amazing selection of drinks.
For you, it's still on a discount, of course!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Some friends of mine told me that you get some quests here after you beat the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/hermit-1.j.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Not really seeing anyone new though...

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.427.settings.dialog.0.text: Did you notice how they removed the meeting place here?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.427.settings.dialog.1.text: Yeah, Patch notes said it's for some bigger update soon.
Are you...\. a new player too?
Great! ...\. I mean uh...\. Could you help me with something?
They offer it in the armory of R-\.\c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0]...
I'd teleport back to the city and buy it myself...\. but...\. see...
I hate towns!\. They're always so crowded!\. So many people, signs and noises!\. I-\.I can't take it...
So uh...\. Could you please buy a \c[3]\v[item.30.name]\c[0] for me in Rookie Harbor?
O-\.Of course I'll pay you back...\. So...\. uhm...\. pretty please?
P-\.Please buy me that \c[3]\v[item.30.name]\c[0] from the armory in Rookie Harbor.
...Oh!\. I-\.Is that the \c[3]\v[item.30.name]\c[0] you bought for me?
Here, I'll pay you back the price!\. P-\.Plus some extra!
A-\.And also some items I found in Bergen Trail!\. It's not much, but maybe you can use it...
I g-\.gotta go now!\. Thanks again!
W... W... Welcome to Bergen Trail!
Puh... Apologies my lady. I just came down from \c[3]Bergen\c[0].
They say: "Down is the easy way".
At my age, neither way is the easy way.
Ahhh!
S...S... Sorry!
I just had the most traumatic event ever. Seriously.
I'm still shaking...
Yeah, hi... \.\.\.Again, sorry. I'm normally not so jumpy.
I mean, you won't believe what happened.
I was running on an off-road path here in Bergen Trail.
Suddenly, this \c[3]HUGE\c[0] and \c[3]VICIOUS\c[0] bunny-creature attacks me from the side.
I was so surprised I just ran down here and collapsed.
I mean, I heard there was a super strong monster in the mountains, but...
I can't believe it. I still have to become much stronger.
[nods]
... \.\.\.You know what?
You're right.
I shouldn't be scared of some monster. It's just a game, right?
I should find this thing and give it a good whacking!
[nods]
Right! But\..\..\.. how about you help me?
You know, ease into the action and all that jazz?
I'll reward you too! Come on!
[nods]
Yeah! Thank you so much!
I think we should start by asking my friends about that thing.
Both of them are pretty smart and they always know stuff.
One of them is a \c[3]Hexacast\c[0] and is in Rookie Harbor.
Not sure exactly where he is though. I remember him saying something about an \c[3]INN\c[0] he loves.
The other is a \c[3]Triblader\c[0]. He should be at the Obelisk in \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
I'll send word to both of them, via \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] so they know that you're coming.
Sorry, I'm not a fan of this "Messaging". I like to handle things personally.
While you talk to those guys, I'll talk to the people here.
Jean
By the way, what's your name? I'm \c[3]Jean\c[0]!
Lea, Hi!
Is your speech module jammed or something? Kinda seems like it.
[nods]
Ah, I see. Must be hard using the Direct Link.
I'll include this in my message to the guys.
Alright, Lea. Let's begin!
[shakes head]
O... Oh... I see...
Hey Lea! You want me to tell you where you can find those guys again?
One of them is a \c[3]Hexacast\c[0] and is in Rookie Harbor.
Not sure exactly where he is though. I remember him saying something about an \c[3]INN\c[0] he loves.
The other is a \c[3]Triblader\c[0]. He should be at the Obelisk in \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
I've sent word to both of them via \c[3]Direct Link\c[0], so they'll know you're coming.
Okay, no problem! I hope I find out more here.
I just heard back from the guys!
I can't believe this. I told them not to \c[3]DL\c[0] me...
Then again\..\..\.. Your speech module is broken. So it's probably better this way.
So, from \c[3]Jeff\c[0] we know that we need 5 \c[3]\v[item.139.name]s\c[0].
And from \c[3]Jock\c[0] we know that we need a capture device.
And I found out that this creature seems to show up a lot on the \c[3]Windy Climb\c[0] parts of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].
You go and collect the \v[item.139.name]s and I'll try to get my hands on one of these capture devices.
We'll meet here again once we're finished, alright?
Jean
You're back! And just in time, too.
I found a capture device!
Yeah, it was super expensive, but it's totally worth it.
Did you get the \v[item.139.name]s?
[nods]
Very nice!
Now we only have to capture this legendary bunny or whatever people call it.
From what I understood, the guys I got my info from said you have to bring the \v[item.139.name]s to \c[3]Windy Climb\c[0].
As I said, it's a part of Bergen Trail.
Turns out, it was the same part I was attacked in!
Right? Which means we just have to get the \v[item.139.name]s to that place.
The guys said just having the capture device and defeating the monster would capture it.
[nods]
So\..\..\.. Here you go. Take the device.
What?\.\. Did you think I would go up there again?
Never\.\. ever!
Come on, you got the carrots too. I'm not really a fighter...
It's not because I'm scared or whatever.
Thanks! I know you can do it! But prepare yourself!
This creature must be super strong.
[nods]
Hey Lea! Did you fight the bunny yet?
A.. Ah.. Alright. Don't push yourself okay? I was told it is super strong!
It should be somewhere in the \c[3]Windy Climb\c[0] parts of Bergen Trail!
Jean
Hey, Lea!
Hi!
Wow, you seem exhausted!
Wait... does that mean \..\..\.. you captured it?
Oh my gosh, really?!
I bet it was super hard to beat, right?
[nods]
Thanks so much Lea! C... Can I have it?
[nods]
Wow, kinda looks like a normal \c[3]\v[combat.name.gray-frobbit]\c[0] don't you think?
I thought it would have dark red eyes and bloody fur or something.
Well, what matters is that we captured it, right?
Alright, alright\..\..\.. you did it!
Again, thank you so much!
I have to log off and show this to my friends. They won't believe it!
A live legendary monster in my inventory! \.\.Super awesome!
Here, take this as a reward.
Bye, Lea! Hope to speak to you soon!
Bye!
Lea hi, hi Lea!
... I assume that means: Me too?
[nods]
Hehe, no problem. It was nice meeting you.
You are not going to tell her it is just a regular Young Frobbit?
[Shakes Head]
Mh.. I guess it is probably better this way.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.460.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-n] Ascent to Bergen Village
\i[arrow-s] Autumn's Rise
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.463.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-s] Autumn's Rise
\i[arrow-n] Ascent to Bergen Village.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.464.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-s] Autumn's Rise
\i[arrow-n] Ascent to Bergen Village.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.19.message: So where is Monsieur Grasshead? Don't tell me he's late...\.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.35.message: It is time for our duel!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.36.message: As for the location, this place here is just perfect.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.39.message: People should witness the grace of the Spheromancer's fighting style!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.42.message: Now, there is no reason to rush.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.44.message: Prepare yourself and tell me when you're ready to start.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.45.message: And don't even think about chickening out.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.47.message: Hell no! We're gonna show you!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.49.message: Must I remind you of the definition of a duel?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.53.message: I'm gonna watch as Lea beats you up!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.469.settings.event.55.message: Anyway. Just talk to me when you're ready.
Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
You can still challenge with your current stats, but don't even think about using it as an excuse.
What is the deal with your \c[3]stats\c[0].
This explains why I waited for so long. You took your time to prepare.
Oh well, let's get this over with.
Those are some \c[3]excellent stats\c[0]. This is going to be interesting!
Are you ready for the duel?
Pentafist! It's time for you to step back.
What is it? Is this your first PvP battle?
We fight several rounds.\. \c[3]5 out of 9\c[0].\. No items.\. No escape.
Go Lea!!\. I'm sure you can do it!
I, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], will show you the right path.
The path of a proper Spheromancer!
Alright. Don't make me wait too long.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.473.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: This round goes to you. Not bad!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.473.settings.event.0.thenStep.1: Time to show you the true potential of a Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.473.settings.event.0.elseStep.1: Witness the true potential of a Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.473.settings.event.0.elseStep.2: Don't give up, Lea!\. Punch him!\. Punch him hard!
It looks like I underestimated you.
Yes, you are indeed a worthy opponent!
I'm glad to know that skilled Spheromancers remain among us.
You have yet to unlock the true potential of this class!
It looks like you still have much to learn.
You are nowhere near unlocking the true potential of the Spheromancer!
Train hard, and you may become worthy of your class!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.16.message: Next time we meet, I'll make sure to test your skills once more!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.37.message: Looks like you got yourself a rival, Lea.
You really did kick his derrière, though! That was awesome!
Well, don't worry too much about losing this duel.
That guy seemed pretty experienced, non?
I'm sure you'll have plenty of opportunites to get your revenge!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.40.message: Anyway... I really have to go now.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.42.message: Seriously, we've been playing for so long!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.43.message: But it was so much fun!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.44.message: So let's play together again next time, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.76.message: It looks like I added the word just in the nick of time.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.78.message: I figured you would need it sooner or later.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.79.message: Well then, I think we should call it a day as well.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.80.message: I kind of need a break myself, to be frank.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.474.settings.event.83.message: Do not worry... You will be back in the game soon enough.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.486.settings.event.3.message: You accepted the duel! I am waiting!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.486.settings.event.10.message: Come on, Lea!\. Monsieur is waiting for his beating.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.0.text: Sure feels nice to have a change of landscape.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.1.text: I don't think I wanna see another apple in a while.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.2.text: But I've heard that we could actually do more quests in Rookie Harbor now.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.3.text: Sounds like a good idea before climbing that mountain, right?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.4.text: B... but... you wanna walk all the way back for that?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.487.settings.dialog.5.text: Well, there IS this quick-travel system, you know...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.27.message: And...\. you still remember everything from yesterday, right?\. Meeting Emilie and all that?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.31.message: Oh, by the way!\. It seems that Emilie is online as-
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.35.message: It is like a phone call. Just take it!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.42.message: This is a Direct Link!\. First time you've seen it?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.45.message: Anyway, I already went ahead a bit and had a look around Bergen Trail.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.46.message: We can form a party again if you want.\. Just tell me via D-Link, oui?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.49.message: I think the next dungeon will be in that mountain village, non?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.50.message: We should enter the dungeon at the same time.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.51.message: Keeping the tradition of our dungeon racing duels!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.54.message: Très bien!\. Make sure you don't enter that dungeon without me, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.63.message: You can invite Emilie to your party or go by yourself. It is your choice.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.66.title: Manage your Party
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.66.content: Learn how to invite and remove party members.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.66.acceptSte: Select a party member to open the submenu.
Use these options to \c[3]invite\c[0] contacts to your party or \c[3]remove\c[0] them. You can also simply \c[3]contact\c[0] them for a small chat!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-1-ent.entities.541.settings.event.67.task: Climb the mountain along \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0] to reach the village of \c[3]Bergen\c[0].

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-2.jso.entities.292.settings.dialog.1.text: Now I need someone to h-help again.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-2.jso.entities.292.settings.dialog.1.event.6.m: And it j-just so happens that I h-have a new request.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-2.jso.entities.292.settings.dialog.1.event.8.m: Ah, wait... I m-m-mean I just finished up preparations again...
A-Anyway... \.\.\. I k-know you helped me already, but how about doing it again?
[nods]
R-R-R-Really?!?
V-Very Good!
The t-t-tasks are the same as last time!
I-I want to gather some d-data for \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0] this time.
Your h-h-help will make it much easier.
I c-c-compiled a list again...
Some enemy scouting, local flora and the landmarks here.
And of course a probe... I asked another player to place it in a cave.
The problem is that I don't know which one it is...
I'm sorry but it seems like you have to check all of them.
I would be honored if you would help me g-g-gather all the intel.
P-Please find out what you c-c-can and return to me!
[nods]
Th-thank you so much for your h-h-help!
A-and in case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-one next to m-me.
O-Oh... You are not interested...
[shakes head]
Ah... I t-t-thought so...
Yes
No
In c-c-case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-one next to m-me.
Were you able to f-find all the data I r-requested?
I'm sure they will be happy with my results, hehe...
O-oh. B-B-Bad wording. I meant the A-Ancients, of course.
T-Take this! A s-small token of my gratitude.
H-Hey, Lea! Thanks again for h-h-helping me out.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-2.jso.entities.295.settings.event.1.message: Good thing there is no risk of falling to our death...

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-3-1.j.entities.368.settings.event.0.message: Phew, better to not look down right now.

Look at them plants here. The leaves look like feathers, don'tcher think?
And how's yer explorin' comin' along? All good?
Well that's jes' wunnerful! Y'all be good now!

Wow, that's pretty nice. I hope it's something good.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-3-3.j.entities.354.settings.event.0.message: Is this a hidden bunny lair or something?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-3-3.j.entities.355.settings.event.0.message: Now that treasure better be worth it.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-3-3.j.entities.357.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Laser bridge out of the snow!

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-1-1.entities.366.settings.event.0.message: It's like we're standing at the edge of the world, non?
An endless cycle of agony and pain.
We are but trapped in a nightmare, awaiting the final call.
Oh... a gift? \.\.\. You give me this, just like that?
I... I don't know what to say.
Thank you so much. I've never gotten anything from anyone.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.500.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] The Rocky Climb
\i[arrow-s] Base of the Mountain 
\i[arrow-ne] Old Crater
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.534.settings.event.0.message: Sure, let's jump along this narrow path above the endless abyss... Pas de problème!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.17.message: The first mountain for every Seeker to conquer!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.21.message: And it's filled with cute little frog-bunnies.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.23.message: I still feel bad about beating up so many of them...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.27.message: These little bunnies might seem cute, but they can cause quite a lot of havoc as well.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.29.message: Have you heard of the \c[3]Great Frobbit Plague\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.33.message: That is some history I do NOT want to hear.\. Thank you.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-4-2.j.entities.539.settings.event.43.text:
I only wanted her to remember.\.
Remember what happened.\.
Tell me where I could find them.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-5.jso.entities.9.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-n] Bergen Village
\i[arrow-se] Base of the Mountain 
\i[arrow-sw] Off Road
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-5.jso.entities.520.settings.dialog.0.text: Of course I got guard duty on Bergen Trail...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-5.jso.entities.521.settings.event.0.message: Oh, a small house in the middle of nowhere. Isn't that nice?
Oh now look who it is!
Hi!
Could not imagine a better person to show up right now, too.
Oh, hehe. Looks like you already know what I'm going to ask?
[nods]
Well... \. That makes things easy then!
I got a new job testing parkours, but this time it needs to be done within a time limit.
Sounds pretty dope, right? But also like... \. lots of work, and I might start sweating even.
Who would have thought this job could be so hard?
You'd imagine that running around as an avatar wouldn't really exhaust you.
Anyway, what do you say? Wanna help me do this?
[nods]
Sweet potatoes!
Alright, let's see...
Okay, there we go. Just walk through this point like last time.
The timer will start automatically and you'll have to finish before it runs out.
Pretty simple stuff, really. I'm sure you can handle it!
[shakes head]
Oh man, what a bummer.
Come back if you change your mind...
... I'll just wait here.
Just go to the start marker on the left. Time will start automatically.
But don't leave or it'll reset. Really annoying, I know.
What are you doing? You only have \v[timers.roundBergenTimer.formatRemainingTime] left.
Wow, that looked so taxing. But you pulled through.
And you didn't even break a sweat. Do you work out or something?
And nothing weird happened, right? No sudden strokes or anything?
Thanks so much... \. again! You really nail these tracks.
We make a great team, don't you think?
Okay, right. I'll go do my report now. Until next time!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-5.jso.entities.558.settings.event.0.message: Aw bummer... You can try again by going back to the first marker though!

Girl, you're interfering with our epic stare down!
Just put the present here. This is not the first time this has happened to me.
Every major holiday someone brings me a gift. Different player each time. Super weird.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-6.jso.entities.665.settings.event.0.message: So many waterfalls! Kind of makes you want to jump into the water.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-6.jso.entities.665.settings.event.1.message: Except it's cold. And avatars can't swim. And you really shouldn't swim near waterfalls.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-6.jso.entities.665.settings.event.2.message: Why did I think that was a good idea again?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-6.jso.entities.666.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: You'd think they'd place something unique and interesting on this spot.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-6.jso.entities.666.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: Such a \c[3]perfectly regular\c[0] stone here, don't you agree Lea?

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-1.j.entities.890.settings.text:
Is it a duck or a bunny? 
The right answer eludes us all
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-1.j.entities.892.settings.event.0.message: It sure looks pretty cold around here.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-1.j.entities.892.settings.event.1.message: Good thing you don't really feel all that cold as an avatar.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-1.j.entities.892.settings.event.2.message: I heard you can configure your sensors so you properly feel the temperature... for whatever reason you'd want to do that.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2-1.entities.68.settings.event.1.message: Look at this bunny. It sure looks different don't you think?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2-1.entities.68.settings.event.2.message: Do not tell me there actually was a legendary bunny...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2-1.entities.68.settings.event.4.message: Let us agree to never tell Jean, okay?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2-1.entities.68.settings.event.6.message: Not like you could anyway I guess.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.204.settings.event.18.message: Looks like you found the place where this \c[3]legendary bunny\c[0] is.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.204.settings.event.20.message: Be careful!\. Who knows how strong this enemy is.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.204.settings.event.22.message: So what do you want to do?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.213.settings.event.0.message: What is up with these rock formations?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.213.settings.event.1.message: It looks like it could collapse any second, yet it seems stable.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-7-2.j.entities.214.settings.event.0.message: I didn't expect to see any green spots at this altitude.

assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.530.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] Bergen Village
\i[arrow-se] Descent to Autumn's Rise
Oh sorry, is this for me?
Oh cool, didn't expect this so soon. Thanks a bunch!
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.542.settings.event.0.message: I've definitely never climbed up a mountain this high.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.3.name: Guard Impostor
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.4.message: Oh yes, you really are a splendid animal.\. Just never run away again, okay?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.8.message: What, you again?\. Do you not respect my authority as a noble guard of Bergen?
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.10.message: Ah, it seems that my ruse has been uncovered.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.11.message: I resent the crude deception, but I could not allow my precious pet goat Zira to be taken by you.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.13.message: Oh, you want to bring both of us in for interrogation?\. I fear we can't oblige.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.14.message: You see, we have some big plans that will change this entire mountain.\.\. And besides...
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.29.name: Guard Impostor
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.31.message: ... I believe our three friends here would like some of your time.
assets/data/maps/bergen-trail/path-8.jso.entities.546.settings.event.33.message: Come, Zira.\. And farewell to you, \v[lore.title.seeker]!

You did it.\. Yay and stuff.

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.17.message: What a convenient stage we have here!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.18.message: Now, it is time to face your trial!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.29.message: Let us see if you are the genuine article!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.30.message: A display of your talents shall suffice as proof!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.42.message: I am just as confused about this whole situation as you are...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.43.message: It is certainly a mess, but we will get you out of this.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.44.message: For now, take on this challenge and keep him busy.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.45.message: I know, this enemy looks intimidating, but do not lose hope!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.46.message: I am confident you will be able to handle this!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/boss.json.entities.15.settings.event.48.message: ... Because I can see its battle stats.\. They match your level!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.10.message: Cap, I'm back with the report!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.18.message: Aye... hard to miss that lass.\. Hope ye didn't run into everythin' with those horns there.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.20.message: Wait...\. don't tell me ya didn't notice the horns 'til now, Lea...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.22.message: Anyway, make sure ye clean up that mess ye started down in the cargo hold soon.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.25.message: I hope Sergey is satisfied.\. Is he around?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.26.message: Yeah, just give me a sec to set up your headset.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.33.message: My good man! It's been a long time.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.34.message: Indeed.\. You are still clinging to that jet pack, I see?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.35.message: Ye know I'd never travel the sea without good ol' Betty.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.36.message: Anyway, I hope ye two will be ready to travel on soon.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.37.message: Having a darn avatar on board is just callin' for trouble.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.38.message: Of course.\. We will make this as brief as possible.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.39.message: Gee, Cap.\. What kinda welcome is that s'posed to be?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.40.message: Besides, ain't we talkin' to Jet, former VRP dueling champ?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.41.message: You keep telling us all about your combat moves from the old days.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.42.message: So here I thought maybe you'd want to give Lea a small combat lesson?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.46.message: Ye're tellin' me that wee lass is up for a battle?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.48.message: Right, we'll see about that.\. Just talk to me later t'day.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.51.message: Ye can show the lass around the ship, but don't ye stir up any trouble.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.21.settings.event.60.message: C'mon, Lea!\. It's time for some fresh air!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: This is no place for ye, lass.\. Go play somewhere else.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: There ye are.\. It's about darn time for yer combat lesson.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: Good.\. Let's go to the balcony.
Do ye still need to prepare yerself?\. I don't got all day, lass.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Didn't that boy want to spend time with you?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: Carla is waitin' for you down in the cargo hold.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.6.event.4: Everythin's prepared, so ye're ready to leave.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: Carla is waitin' for you down in the cargo hold.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.7.event.4: Everything's prepared, so you are ready to leave.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Good day, Lass. Back on the ship?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.23.settings.npcStates.8.event.4: Ye're always welcome of course. But better don't stay here for too long or people will get suspicious.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.0: Sorry, still busy with the radar. I'm afraid that won't change anytime soon.

Is that blue guy still out there?\.
Seriously, we never had anything like this happen before.
You'd think they'd make sure players can't escape the playground or something.
Girl! Skip the chatting, will you? We have to hurry!
Are you looking for the captain?
I think he's currently somewhere in the cabins.
Indeed, even a captain needs a break once in a while...

You're that avatar girl we were warned about, right?\.
Sorry, but I need to pay attention to the radar.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.32.settings.event.5.message: It's still on the radar, approaching us at high velocity.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.32.settings.event.7.message: No transmission, no darn ship to see.\. What's goin' on here?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.32.settings.event.16.message: Captain! I think I caught it on satellite! You gotta see this!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.13.message: That Carla...\. orderin' me around like that.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.14.message: I gotta remind her who's in charge on this ship sometime...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.18.message: Lass, ye really seem to be in low spirits...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.19.message: But I really have no time for strollin' around right now.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.26.message: Do you mind if I borrow Ms. Avatar for a moment?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.28.message: No, that'd be just perfect! Please, keep the lass busy!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.29.message: Nice!\. Please come this way, Ms. Avatar!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.38.message: I never expected to see you on this ship again, Ms. Avatar!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.40.message: Huh? Do you want me to call you by your first name?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.43.message: Anyway, I'll go ahead and get everyone together!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.44.message: Just meet me outside, down on the \c[3]deck\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.34.settings.event.63.task: Meet the cargo crew member at the \c[3]deck of M.S. Solar\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.35.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: My colleague should be waiting on the deck for you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.35.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: I'm supposed to wait up here.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/bridge.json.entities.35.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Well... you'll see.\. They have a lot of things planned.

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.0.label: 4th floor (bridge)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.1.label: 3rd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.2.label: 2nd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.3.label: 1st floor (deck)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.4.label: Basement floor (cargo hold)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.9.message: ...Whoa!\. You spoke!\. Is your voice finally back?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.15.message: Her speech synchronization is still malfunctioning.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.16.message: I just hard-coded the word "Hi" into her speech module.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.17.message: That is all she can say for now.\. I am currently working on adding more words.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.18.message: I see... It's a start, I s'pose.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.19.message: Anyway, the Cap and I here have been planning out your combat training, girl.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.20.message: We're almost set and good to go, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.22.message: Aye, this is gonna be interestin'.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.23.message: Well, I'm off to my cabin for some final preparations.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.24.message: I'll be done in no time, so just stick with the captain, 'kay?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.34.message: Aye, I'll be back on the bridge. Ye can talk to me when ye're ready for the lesson.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.35.message: Make sure ye're prepared.\. I'll be expectin' yer full attention.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.44.message: Make sure ye clean up the galley after ye're done cookin', understood?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins1.json.entities.108.settings.event.54.message: It's not like we forgot since the last time he told us.

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.0.label: 4th floor (bridge)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.1.label: 3rd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.2.label: 2nd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.3.label: 1st floor (deck)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.4.label: Basement floor (cargo hold)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.67.settings.event.1.message:
Oh my...\.
Look at this mess.\. The captain will surely not like this.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.67.settings.event.4.message: Jet runs a strictly regimented ship.\. Every room needs to be cleaned before work.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.67.settings.event.5.message: I wonder how these guys managed to skip Jet's daily inspection.
Oh! I thought they canceled this game!

He seems pretty engaged with the game.\.
We should just let him play...
Oh!\. You must be the avatar the captain told us about.
Well, feel free to check out the ship.
It's just one of the smaller ships of the Solar class but it does its job.
But I suggest you don't go near the room across the hall...
So you checked out the room across the hall?
Don't mind it.\. Normally every room has to be clean.
But somehow she manages to get around captain Jet's inspections.
I didn't expect to see you again on this ship, to be honest.
Anyway, how was CrossWorlds so far? Was it fun?
Hm... Seems like you have mixed feelings about it.
Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the captain waiting.
Wait, Carla... is this your room?
Sure is.\. Something wrong with it?
I mean, how did Jet not see this... \! room?
Well, you'll have to wait for another time to hear my secrets I guess.
Better go to the bridge, the cap' wants to show Lea some new tricks as soon as possible.
What? You are not curious, Lea?
Well, I guess we should go then...
Hey there, Lea.\. You better not keep the Captain waiting.
Oh! Hey, Lea! Did you have a look around the ship already?
Lea, girl! Back on the M.S. Solar?
Well I hope things are going fine in the Playground?
Nothing too special happening here. Just shipping around stuff as usual.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.16.message: Why did you wrap her in a blanket?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.17.message: She's an avatar, she shouldn't feel cold or anything like that...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.20.message: She just looked like she needed this, alright? Stop nagging.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.40.message: Poor thing...\. you look like you've been through hell.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.46.message: You two, we'd like to talk to the lass in private.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.57.message: Sergey, ye've got some explainin' to do!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.58.message: What in the bloody hell has been goin' on with you two?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.59.message: Ending up in that place and all.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.61.message: Yes...\. it is about time I tell you everything I know.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.69.message: Let me apologize to you, Lea...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.71.message: I deceived you, telling you this lie about yourself and your past...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.73.message: I just thought it would be for the best...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.74.message: But in all honesty, I did not know what to do.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.77.message: It is because of... what you are.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.78.message: Shizuka...\. she was right.\. You are an \c[3]artificial intelligence\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.80.message: More precisely, you are what Satoshi liked to call... an \c[3]Evotar\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.136.settings.event.81.message: Let me start from the beginning.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.11.message: So yes... that is what you are, Lea. An \c[3]Evotar\c[0] based on \c[3]Shizuka\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.12.message: Your personality and memories are a copy of hers.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.14.message: And... that is also why I did not want to tell you the truth.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.15.message: Back in the day... Satoshi discovered that Evotars had problems handling the truth about themselves.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.16.message: To have the memories of your human self, and discovering that you are in fact an AI...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.17.message: It is a massive emotional shock that the system usually could not handle... leading to \c[3]permanent malfunction\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.19.message: Fortunately, that did not happen to you.\. It seems you...\. accepted the truth.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.22.message: Again... I am sorry for all of this.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.23.message: Things might have been easier if I told you right away... or it could have been an early end to everything.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.24.message: I just could not know what would happen... so I tried to be careful to minimize the risk.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.27.message: So wait...\. did you actually tell her the coma story?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.29.message: Seriously?! I told you that one would be too dramatic.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.30.message: It...\. It was the most logical option, though...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.35.message: Did I understand that right, Sergey?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.37.message: And they copy the personality and memories of players?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.141.settings.event.39.message: That is the other thing...\. there really should not be any Evotars in CrossWorlds at all.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.9.message: All I know is that they found \c[3]someone\c[0] that supported their continued research on Evotars.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.10.message: They even wanted me to join them...\. but I declined.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.11.message: That whole endeavor... it seemed very risky to me.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.12.message: Anyway, it was not long afterwards that I entirely \c[3]lost contact\c[0] with them.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.13.message: I had not heard from them for years.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.14.message: That was until recently... when I \c[3]discovered Lea\c[0], hidden within the game's database.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.15.message: And that is how the whole thing started.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.16.message: I took some time off from work and logged Lea into the game... looking for \c[3]answers\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.21.message: So how did ye end up in that place?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.23.message: Well... that is where things started to become strange.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.24.message: We were pulled into an area that was not supposed to be part of the official Playground... \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.26.message: And then there was this \c[3]masked person\c[0] we saw on the last day.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.27.message: But \c[3]Satoshi\c[0]...\. he was nowhere to be found.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.28.message: We were close...\. really close to the answers.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.29.message: Yet... we could not afford to stay there. It was too \c[3]dangerous\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.31.message: Somebody with administrative access to that area was \c[3]tracking my connection\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.32.message: They tried to \c[3]locate\c[0] me... and almost succeeded.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.33.message: I just barely escaped it by minimizing communication with Lea over the last few days.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.34.message: In the end...\. we just had to escape.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.43.message: Man, that really is a lot to take in, y'know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.44.message: How about we take a little break?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.46.message: Lea? Maybe a little stroll around the ship would help you to loosen up a bit?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.48.message: Surely that's no problem, right Cap?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.50.message: I sure don't like ye deciding that by yerself...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.52.message: Great! Then how about you show Lea around a bit?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.54.message: Please, I'd just like to have a little word with Sergey for a moment.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.68.message: Mister, I got a question for you!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.69.message: Something the poor girl is probably worrying about.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/cabins2.json.entities.142.settings.event.71.message: Once you find Satoshi and everything has been cleared up...

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/challenge-ro.entities.41.settings.event.8.guiInfo.set: THE TIME FOR REVENGE IS NIGH!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/challenge-ro.entities.47.settings.event.6.guiInfo.set:
Awesome! You mastered the final challenge! 
This is all for now. 
Thanks for playing!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/challenge-ro.entities.49.settings.event.1.task: Get ready for the final challenge!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/challenge-ro.entities.54.settings.event.5.text:
Thanks a lot for completing this tech demo of CrossCode!
If you like what you saw, please tell your friends!
We'd like to get word around! :D
Also, follow us on Facebook and Twitter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/challenge-ro.entities.54.settings.event.6.text:
Wait, we're not done yet!
From here on we have a small challenge for you to master, if you like to bash some more enemies. 
Have fun!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/christmas.js.entities.62.settings.event.2.message: Lea, you don't open presents like this!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.0.label: 4th floor (bridge)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.1.label: 3rd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.2.label: 2nd floor (cabins)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.3.label: 1st floor (deck)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.4.label: Basement floor (cargo hold)
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.0.settings.blockEvent.2.message: Come on, Ms. Avatar!\. There are still some boxes left.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.2.message: Come on, Ms. Avatar! There are still some boxes left.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: I got a friend back home who's a regular CrossWorlds player.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: I seriously envy him!\. I didn't have the money for the game and now... well... I'm on a ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: But at least now I can claim to have seen a real-life avatar in person!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.38.settings.npcStates.3.event.5: Maybe some day I'll finally be able to play CrossWorlds as well.\. And then, who knows, we might just meet again!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Dear me, I never knew my colleague was such a geek.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: The whole day he's been blabbing about CrossWorlds and avatars and whatnot.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Well, admittedly CrossWorlds is pretty amazing.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.5: I still find it hard to believe they managed to get all the resources to essentially turn this moon into a high-technology theme park.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.6: ... I suppose it's a good thing they did!\. It's a steady income for me, being a small cog in this machine.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.14.message: And she's a Spheromancer class!\. How awesome is that?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.17.message: Looks like you got your first fan, Lea.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.21.message: Hey there, Carla. Good to see you.\. About all these strange boxes here...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.23.message: Yeah... I know.\. I'm supposed to clean that up.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.24.message: But right now I have to take care of the avatar, y'know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.25.message: I'll do it in a bit, okay?\. See ya later!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.40.settings.event.40.message: She said exactly the same thing yesterday.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.13.message: Anyway, Carla just passed by us again.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.14.message: She told us that you could take care of all these boxes here.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.15.message: I mean, really, can you believe that woman?\. Now she's loading off her work on our guests.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.17.message: It's easy to destroy these boxes with your avatar weapons, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.19.message: Awesome!\. Please, I wanna see that!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.20.message: Well...\. no pressure, you know.\. You are our guest after all.\. But you'd help us out a lot.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.22.message: So, will you destroy the boxes for us?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.42.settings.event.29.task: Destroy all boxes in this room.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.9.message: I'm really surprised how quickly those balls were flying.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.12.message: What are you even talking about?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.13.message: I didn't see any balls.\. Only those boxes disappearing for whatever reason.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.17.message: Yeah, you need to wear these AR goggles to see them.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.18.message: The balls and their impact are all like... virtual and stuff.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.19.message: I see... so that's why you've been wearing those goofy glasses all day.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.20.message: Goofy? You know nothing about style, lady!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.25.message: Anyway, thanks a lot for the help.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ground.json.entities.44.settings.event.27.message: Yes!\. Thank you so much, Ms. Avatar!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/puzzle-chall.entities.119.settings.event.8.text:
Thanks a lot for completing this tech demo of CrossCode!
If you like what you saw, please tell your friends!
We'd like to get word around! :D
Also, follow us on Facebook and Twitter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/puzzle-chall.entities.119.settings.event.9.text:
Wait, we're not done yet!
From here on we have a small challenge for you to master, if you like to bash some more enemies. 
Have fun!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.21.settings.event.10.message: Oh yeah. Lea?\. Just a heads up - the captain's kinda grumpy, but don't worry about it.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.21.settings.event.11.message: That's just the way he is.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.22.settings.event.19.message: Well, well... Our endeavor has not been concluded!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.22.settings.event.33.message: You will not escape our will!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.22.settings.event.43.message: Lea, those are high level opponents.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.22.settings.event.44.message: Do not fight them. Run to the teleporter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.26.settings.event.3.message: One moment! Let me add a little shortcut for you!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.26.settings.event.11.message: This will take you right to the \c[3]teleporter\c[0], where Carla is waiting.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.26.settings.event.16.message: Yes, that sure would have helped back then when we had to run through the whole cargo hold, correct?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room-end.jso.entities.26.settings.event.18.message: Unfortunately I did not have the routine to spawn these shortcuts ready back then.

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.0.settings.event.2.message: Girl, you sure are a natural with that ball thing!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.0.settings.event.3.message: Carla, they are called VRPs.\. Not "balls".
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.0.settings.event.4.message: Ah, c'mon! Nobody calls them that anymore, y'know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.30.settings.event.3.message: Well done!\. Yeah that was all.\. It's a small room.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: What are ya standing around here for?\. The wall is gone, the path is clear.
Well something is different about this switch, right?
I'm afraid one ball just won't cut it.
Now, several balls on the other hand...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Nah, I won't give ya a hint for that, girl.
You removed the wall, the rest is straightforward.
Oh yeah, that one is kinda mean.\. Need a hint?
Did you try to hit this switch with charged balls?
You probably realized that doesn't work.\. It's too slow.
How about you look around?\. There might be another way.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Heh, this is so much fun.\. Just too bad we can't chat along the way...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Ah, don't worry!\. I'm sure Sergey will get the speech problem fixed in no time.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.3.event.7: It is...\. challenging to say the least.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.33.settings.npcStates.3.event.9: It wouldn't kill you to be a little more optimistic...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.34.settings.event.1.message: Entering the next stage, more switches await!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json.entities.46.settings.blockEvent.3.messag:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.27.settings.event.1.message: Oh yeah!\. Never mind the visor!\. I just need this to see what you're doing.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.27.settings.event.3.message: Do not worry about it for now.\. We will explain it to you later on.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Huh? Don't tell me you're already stuck?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Look, how about you try to jump over this container here?
That cardboard box ain't there for no reason.
Walk toward small object to auto-jump on top of them.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: So, that wall ain't there anymore. You're free to pass.
Now all that's left is some jumping over those containers.
Move toward edges to auto-jump over gaps.
You need to find a way to remove this wall.
Basic stuff, Lea. You'll need to throw balls at something.\. That's all I'm gonna say.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Y'know, ball throwing is pretty much the solution to most obstacles around here.
Those boxes here are no exception.
Well, ain't that just another stupid wall....
But the color is different this time. Maybe that means something, who knows?
I'm pretty sure you yourself can't pass it.\. But maybe something else can...?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Well, would ya look at all those switches! Need a hint?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Yeah, that switch is pretty well hidden, huh?
Remember those charged balls?\. Those bounce on walls, y'know?
I'm sure those will help ya out here.
See those switches on the containers? Yes, you can hit those. From a distance, that is!
Just make sure you throw the balls from the same height.
Really?\. You can't figure this one out?
Just jump over the boxes and hit that thing hard.\. That's all, really.
Right, then! Go on! You're almost there!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.39.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: That's all for this room!\. Nice work, girl!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.51.settings.event.17.message: Your task is to reach the door at the other end of this room.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.51.settings.event.18.message: And don't mind me! I'll just stick around and keep an eye on ya.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.51.settings.event.19.message: Well... I might give you some hints. If you ask nicely, y'know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.62.settings.blockEvent.3.messag:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.80.settings.event.13.message: Damn, how're we gonna pass this one?!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room1.json.entities.86.settings.event.6.message: Carla, Instant Matter builder, at your service.

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.23.settings.event.0.message: Welcome to the rats' fortress, standing unpenetrated for centuries!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.23.settings.event.1.message: Apparently somebody had a fun time putting this together.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.49.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Just hit 'em with those balls. That's all there is to it.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.49.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Yeah, you're probably missing the mouse robots here.
Those things are pretty small, y'know?\. Might be they're hidden somewhere...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.49.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Ain't no way you're getting close to those mouse robots in that corner.
But you can still hit them, y'know? Remember the orange walls? Balls flying through them and all?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.49.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Girl, that was so quick!\. Took me forever to put all of this together.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.59.settings.event.8.message: Ha, finally!\. This one's my favorite!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.59.settings.event.11.message: Here you can go wild on these robot mice!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.59.settings.event.12.message: Moving target practice!\. Have fun, girl!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.59.settings.event.18.guiInfo.se: Press \i[throw] repeatedly to hold down the enemies in a rapid fire.
Hold \i[throw] to hold down the enemies in a rapid fire.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room2.json.entities.65.settings.blockEvent.3.messag:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.16.settings.event.6.message: Time for turrets!\. Don't worry, those things won't hurt you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.16.settings.event.7.message: This is in fact just a simple puzzle.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: C'mon, you can do this yourself.\. Really want a hint?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Oh well.\. Look, these blocks are kinda like switches.
Only they don't react to the typical balls.
Maybe they react when hit by something else.
Attagirl! Use that pretty head of yours.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Hm, this one is a tiny bit more tricky. Need some help?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: To make the turret hit these blocks you have to stand between turret and block.
Then you need to dodge the bullet right after it was shot.
You need to get the timing right.\. C'mon, I know you can do it!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: It's actually almost the same as before.\. Only this time the turret and blocks are on a higher level.
So get up on that container in the middle and dodge some bullets!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: These things are kinda unexpected, right?\. Need a hint?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: That mirror-like thing only shoots bullets, when it's hit by your balls.
And it always shoots the bullets right at you.
You'll need a block between you and the mirror and still need to hit the mirror with one of your balls...
So here's the hint:\. Think bouncing balls!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room3.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Phew, that's all for this room.\. Lot's of puzzles, right?\. But don't worry, you will get some real action in the next room!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.32.settings.event.2.message: A bit of advice!\. Hit them with \i[tech]charged balls to cancel their attacks!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.37.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Enter that arena there to start the lil' sparring session.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.37.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: If you liked this room, you're gonna love the next one, trust me!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.42.settings.event.6.message: Yes!!\. That was awesome, girl!\. Sergey, you weren't kidding! She's really got a knack for battling.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.42.settings.event.7.message: Yeah, that sure takes me back.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.9.message: Just a short warning.\. Here you'll meet your first "real" enemies.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.10.message: And by "real" I mean those things will, in fact, attack you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.12.message: Don't get me wrong!\. They're really easy, but still....
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.13.message: If you do get beat down, your respawn point is right in this room.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.15.message: Uhm...\. that means there's no real danger!\. Go ahead and kick some ass!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.18.message: Ah, just a moment!\. Let me enable the dash module before we start the battle.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.21.message: Dash is essential in battle, since it helps you to quickly dodge enemy attacks at any time.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.22.message: Right he is!\. Now please enter to the right in order to proceed with the ass kicking.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.50.settings.event.25.guiInfo.se: Press \i[dash] while moving to dash, though only up to 3 times in a row. You can dash at any time, even while aiming.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room4.json.entities.60.settings.blockEvent.3.messag:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.0.settings.event.3.message: Amazing work!\. Numbers sure can't beat skill.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.7.settings.event.7.message: Would ya look at all those cowards ganging up on you!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.7.settings.event.8.message: But don't panic,\. just keep moving and strike fast!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.16.settings.event.2.message: Aaand another victory for our fearless gladiator Lea!\.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.23.settings.event.5.message: C'mon, show me a right hook! \.\. And a left!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.23.settings.event.6.message: Standard VPI was not modeled after boxing\..\..\..
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.35.settings.event.2.message: Nice moves!\. They didn't even see it coming.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.40.settings.event.10.message: Yeah yeah I know,\. a second waited is an attack wasted.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.40.settings.event.12.message: Still,\. you should know that your strikes have enough punch to interrupt some attacks.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.40.settings.event.13.message: So you can just pummel your opponents without giving them a chance to strike back.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.40.settings.event.15.message: Sounds like a plan, am I right?\. So go get 'em!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.41.settings.event.6.message: Close in fast and whack 'em over the head!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.51.settings.blockEvent.3.messag:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.7.message: Hey champ, get your adrenaline down again for a second.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.8.message: We gotta add a bit more edge to your arsenal.\.\. A sharp one, that is!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.10.message: I see that got your attention.\.\. Sergey, you finished?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.12.message: Yes.\.\.\. Unlocking Virtual Proximity Impact\..\..\..\. now.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.17.message: ...you can quickly tear through several targets in your path at once.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.19.message: Only them close ones, \.of course.\. You got that?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.22.message: Sharp as a blade!\. Now start by clearing that path for us, will ya?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.61.settings.event.24.guiInfo.se:
Click \i[throw] near Lea inside the circle to perform a close-combat attack.
Alternatively, just press \i[key-melee].

Press \i[throw] without touching \i[right-stick] to perform a close-combat attack.
Alternatively, just press \i[gamepad-x].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Just do a few warm-up swings on those pesky obstacles.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Just do a few warm-up swings on those pesky obstacles.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Don't worry, those are the same weaklings as before.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: More punching bags await your blade.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: And here we are at the last challenge.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: Don't let the big number scare you and keep focused.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.65.settings.npcStates.9.event.2: That was quite the ride, huh?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.6.message: Aaand you just crossed the finish line!\. Congrats!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.9.message: It's like you've never forgotten the basics at all.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.11.message: Oh my, you still look so puzzled about all this.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.13.message: I suppose it is about time we explain all the circumstances.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.14.message: You bet it is.\. But let's take a short break before that, okay?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.15.message: I still need to report to the captain.\. He wants to meet Lea as well.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.68.settings.event.16.message: Good idea.\. Best not keep Jet waiting for too long.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/room5.json.entities.70.settings.event.1.message: We can sense your fear...\. your every step!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.78.settings.blockEvent.2.messag: Let us follow Carla for now.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.80.settings.event.23.message: Y'know, the view here is nice, but you gotta see what's beyond the bow.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.80.settings.event.24.message: We're currently steering towards Rhombus Square. That's something to look at!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.80.settings.event.27.message: Actually, why not go to the bow and explain the situation to Lea there?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.80.settings.event.28.message: Seeing Rhombus Square will make it easier for her to understand, correct?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: S...\. Sorry, I'm busy checking the containers here.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.83.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hi!
Hello there! You must be a guest on this ship, right?
Why, don't be shy! We seamen may look rough, but we're easygoing folks, really.
You want to know what I'm doing here?
[nods]
I'm currently checking up on the solar panels here.
These are our primary energy source, so they better work properly!
Otherwise our nice and shiny M.S. Solar won't budge a centimeter.
Trust me, being stuck in the ocean too long is not something you want to experience.
[shakes head]
...No?\. Then what else?
This isn't going anywhere.
Just let me do my work, okay?
[Yes]
[No]
Huh... I suppose he did not even notice you are an avatar.
Well, the human appearance is pretty convincing.
Except for the hair color...
Oh... who are you?
You don't look like a proper seaman. So, I reckon you're a guest?
Not very talkative, huh? Sorry, I'm in the middle of a maintenance routine.
So... if you'd excuse me.
Hi!
Oh! You are back again? That's a surprise.
Last time I wasn't even aware that you've been one of these "avatars" from the game.
In fact to me you just looked like one of these fancy youngsters with their colorful hair and tacky clothes.
Oh and horns. Are horns "in" these days?
[shakes head]
I...\. I see? Anyway, I hope you enjoy your stay!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.86.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Ah, look who's here.\. You must be that avatar, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.86.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Well then, welcome to the M.S. Solar!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.86.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: If you lean over the railing a bit you might even see the name of the ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.86.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Oi, make sure you don't fall into the sea.\. I'm pretty sure avatars are bad at swimming.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.87.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I have no idea what is going on, but you better listen to the Cap' and get going!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Hey, can't you see I'm busy here?\. ... Wait, who are you?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Oh right, I remember now.\. You're that pseudo-robot thing.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: Oh, no offense.\. You see, I just recently had this discussion with a colleague.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: It was about avatars being the same as robots.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.9: And I have to insist they are not!\. Avatars are just some fragile, temporary collection of instant matter.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.91.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Everybody knows real robots are made of metal.\. Like these beauties here.
So I just can't share the excitement of my colleagues about your presence.
You're just an avatar.\. No true robot, see?
Anyway, I have to take care of my babies here.\. So if you'll excuse me...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Oh my!\. That's some extremely colorful hair you have there.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: I had heard that avatar designs tend to be flamboyant, but... really?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: You're not happy about them either, huh?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.92.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: Now I have to wonder who put those things on you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.93.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: I expected the embodiment of some gamer kiddie's wildest dreams.\. Lots of beefcake and such.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.93.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: Yet, here we have such a cute girl.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.93.settings.npcStates.0.event.9: Too bad that doesn't really say anything about the player's actual appearance.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.93.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: Just like in the old days of MMOs.\. Some things never change.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.122.settings.event.3.message: Bow is this way.\. It's a bit of a walk, though.\. Just follow me.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.122.settings.event.7.task: Go to the bow of the ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.122.settings.event.9.message: Carla, what were all of those destructible boxes doing in that room anyway?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.122.settings.event.10.message: I was just practicing how to use those things, y'know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.122.settings.event.11.message: Probably should have done that somewhere else.
