assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.123.settings.event.8.message: Now, girl, have a look at this!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.4.message: Well, I guess this cleared up some things at least, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.5.message: Alright then, I think this is a good time to split.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.6.message: I'm gonna go talk to the captain and try to set up that combat lesson for you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.7.message: Meanwhile you can have a look around the ship, if ya like.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.8.message: The crew knows about ya.\. I guess you already noticed that, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.9.message: You can meet me and the captain later.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.10.message: Until then! Just make sure not to fall into the water, girl!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.20.message: By the way, Lea.\. I had a closer look at those speech synchronization issues.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.21.message: Unfortunately I do not think I will be able to fix them soon.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.23.message: However, I found a little workaround.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.24.message: I might be able to hard-code specific audio patterns into your speech module.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.25.message: ...That means you will be able to say certain words.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.27.message: That should help a bit, correct?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.28.message: So, let us try it out.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.39.message: It works! That should help you start some conversations with the crew here.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.125.settings.event.43.task: Have a look around the ship.
So, ye ready for the battle?
That's what I like to hear! Let the battle begin!
Well then, tell me when ye are.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.7.message: Carla!\. Are ye ready up there?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.14.message: Yes, Cap! Don't forget the goggles!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.26.message: Haven't worn these for some time...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.28.message: I was told ye learned the basics down in the cargo hold.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.30.message: Still, first I want ye to show me yer grip on aimin' and throwin'.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.37.message: Time to say hello to an old friend!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.51.message: Listen carefully.\. I want ye to hit that robot from this distance ten times.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.52.message: And do it quickly! Got that?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.127.settings.event.61.task: Quickly hit the target-bot ten times.
I see ye understand the basics well enough.
Aye, just as I expected. Ye notice how half o' them balls missed the target?
Ye still need to understand how to aim properly.
Be patient, lass!\. Ye missed yer target too often again.
That was way too slow.
Ye're supposed to quickly throw balls at the target.
Ye're supposed to throw quickly, lass!
Not one darn charged ball after the other, ye understand?
Should I explain the basics to ye again?
[nods]
[shakes head]
[Yes]
[No]
Bloody darn hell...
I'll show ye how it's done.\. Watch closely.
See them dotted lines? That's the throwing range.
When I now start throwin' balls, they'll be flyin' randomly in between the two lines.
That's some pretty darn sloppy throwin'.\. We won't have that here, ye hear me?
Now fact is, when ye be throwin' balls yer precision will improve over time, like this.
But clearly this takes time!
Ye wanna be precise quicker?
Then ye better \c[3]keep the aim\c[0] and \c[3]stop the darn throwin'\c[0]!
Quick, wasn't it?
Once ye get yer lines connected, ye can throw with high precision.
See how ye \c[3]keep your precision\c[0] after throwin'?
Once ye got the lines connected ye can quickly throw as many precise balls as ye want!
But, yer precision is lost when ye \c[3]change yer aimin' direction\c[0] too quickly.
So in short: \c[3]Don't rush with the throwin'\c[0]!
First wait for a split second to get the precision.\. Then ye can throw to yer heart's content.
Alright, ye wanna try again?
[nods]
Ye better get it right this time around, lass.
Good, let's see if ye got the message.
Quickly hit the target-bot ten times.
Hits
[shakes head]
Yer choice.\. Just keep in mind that good aim is essential for combat.
Carla!\. We need that turret now!
Time to turn on ol' Betty.
Next we'll be practicin' the dash.
The turret will now start shootin' at ye.
I want ye to do two things.
First, \c[3]keep yer aim\c[0] on the turret but \c[3]don't throw\c[0] anythin'.
Second, \c[3]dodge\c[0] the turret's bullets \c[3]without losin' yer aim\c[0].
Alright then, let's start.
[Yes]
[No]
Ye have to be faster than that, lass.
Don't ye even think about simply walkin' past them shots. Dash at the right moment!
Stop right there! Ye need to keep yer aim, lass.
This practice is about dodgin' without losin' focus. So keep the crosshair on yer target.
Anyway...\. ye seem to be havin' a hard time with this practice.
Remember the way ye do aimin' and dashin'.
It's possible to do both of these things at the same time.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.133.settings.event.5.task: Keep your aim and dodge 3 shots.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.133.settings.event.7.thenStep.0: Move and press \i[dash] without releasing \i[aim] to dash while aiming.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.134.settings.event.10.message: Enough with dodgin'. Now try to handle this attack, lass!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.136.settings.event.9.thenStep.2: Don't ye know how to do a darn \c[3]guard\c[0], lass?
Actually, Jet... As a matter of fact, she does not.
I forgot to activate her guard module.
Sergey, are ye serious? Ye can't send that lass into battle without a proper shield!
Yes... I will fix that right now.
Good, so now ye have yer shield.\. Need an introduction on how it works?
Aye, then let's have another go!
Ye can do better than that! Let's try this again.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.136.settings.event.9.elseStep.5: Very good! That's all the basics I can teach ye for now.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.136.settings.event.9.elseStep.6: Now, to round everythin' up, let's have a proper battle against the turret where ye can use everything ye've learned.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.136.settings.event.9.elseStep.7: Though there will be a little surprise waitin' for ye.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.136.settings.event.9.elseStep.8: I'll let ye take a short breather.\. Talk to me when ye're ready.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.3.thenStep.0: Alright, basics first. Just show me the shield.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.3.thenStep.2: Hold \i[guard] or \i[mouse-guard] without moving to guard.
Hold \i[gamepad-b] or \i[guard] without moving to guard.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.4.thenStep.0: Good. Note that the shield will only block the front. Always look into the direction of the attack.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.4.thenStep.4: Move your mouse while guarding to change view direction.
Use \i[left-stick] while guarding to change view direction.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.4.thenStep.6: And finally, ye can even aim durin' guard. It's slow but it works.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.137.settings.event.4.thenStep.1: You can also aim while guarding with \i[throw].
You can also aim while guarding with \i[aim].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.138.settings.event.9.0.0.messag: Good. Now, it's about time ye try to block this swarm of balls, right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.138.settings.event.9.1.0.messag: Well then, let's go through this again.
Ms. Avatar! You totally rocked that crab! That was so awesome!
But that strange blue guy was pretty amazing, too!
Did you see how he just jumped up from the water?
Not to mention how he just dragged you through the air, telepathy style!
Hi...
Thanks for coming Ms. Ava...\. err...\. I mean Lea!
Hello, so the pseudo-robot has actually returned.
Please, stop calling her that.
She is an actual person with a name!
[nods]
Lea!
Alright then, Lea.
My colleague and I had a little discussion over how well instant-matter based avatars can handle water.
To my knowledge, instant matter easily evaporates when in contact with water.
That's why swimming was never an option with the technology.
But he claims that it can actually withstand decent amounts of water.
Right! Lea was totally fine when it started raining last time she was here, I saw it myself.
Well, a bit of rain maybe, but let's see how she handles slightly larger amounts of water.
...How?
Quite simple.
Please stand at this point here for a moment.
Why?
No worries, you'll see.
Alright, we're ready!
Sorry!\. They talked me into it...
Why?
S-Sorry, Lea!
But you see? She did not evaporate!
Hm...\. I have to admit I didn't expect this.
But that was just the small bucket.\. Now, let's try the larger one!
P-Please. Just one more time.
Do it for the science!
Alright, second bucket!
Ha, see?\. It couldn't handle that amount!
Alright I see...
But you know, it could just be a generous safety measure in case avatars actually jump into water.
Maybe they can potentially take even more water than that.
That may be, but we can't test this now, can we?
That's true.
Anyway, my point stands that Instant Matter avatars are just way too fragile for most serious applications.
Come on, not all applications require high water-resistancy.
If it were just that.\. Did you ever try to lift her?
W-What?\. I'd never dare to do that!
... I sort of expected that.
That's why I invited someone to help us out!
Hey, \c[3]Isabelle\c[0]! Could you come over here for a second?
Hello!!
Oh! Who is that?
...Lea!
Hi Lea!
I like your horns!!
Yeah, she's another guest on the ship currently.
So why would you have her involved?
To show you how ridiculously light Instant matter is.
Isabelle, would you be so kind and lift the young lady for us?
Can I do that?!
Of course you can! Show us how strong you are!
Okay!!
Whoa!!
Lea is so light!!
...Wait!!
Oh boy...\. I wasn't aware of that.
An avatar should weigh an average of maybe 5-10 kg at most.
Instant matter is extremely light and fragile.
It's the tradeoff for being quickly constructed.
...Lea Hi Lea Wait Bye Why?!
Lea is getting heavy now!
It's okay, you can put her down now.
I want to throw her!!
Why?!
Sure, show us some muscle!
Annnd...\. go!
Awesome!!
Again!!
Wait!!
So you see?
Super light, low water resistance and believe me, any kind of real impact and it breaks down.
Alright, I see what you mean.
Still, instant matter does have its applications outside of games, doesn't it?
Wait!
Of course it has applications.
But it will never replace good, hard machinery and architecture.
You can't build a house with instant matter and expect to live in it. It would break down easily.
Hahaha, again!!
Wait!!
It works for CrossWorlds because everything running around the playground is based on instant matter or virtual.
It's like a theme park made out of Styrofoam.
I see...
Ahh... I'm beat.
Lea, you run real fast!
Oh... so either Lea's player is in quite good shape or avatars are not bound to the player's stamina.
It's the latter. You can run for as long as you want and won't get tired.
Anyway, thanks a lot for everything, Lea!
And sorry for all the water and... throwing.
Ahhh... please don't hate me!
I just wanted to show him how awesome avatars are!
Nice work then, you really showed him!
Ugh...\. was it really that bad for you?
[shakes head]
Well... I'm relieved...
It was fun!\. I want to throw Lea again!!
Come on, give her a little rest, okay?
Aw man, okay... See you later!
Hey Lea...\. I see you are having fun with the crew?
I will soon start preparing things to get you back into the playground.
It will take a bit of time, though.
It is probably a good idea to log you off in the meantime.
Before that though...\. There is something we should talk about.
Since you know the truth about yourself...
You are probably feeling a great deal of... uncertainty, correct?
In particular about your future.
[nods]
I...\. I do not want to give you any false hope.
Your current situation... is problematic.
The only place for Evotars to exist is within CrossWorlds without official permission.
And this will only last as long as we can keep it secret from Instatainment.
This is something we have to change, Lea.
This is our goal.\. To create a \c[3]proper place for Evotars\c[0].
One where you do not have to hide your identity.
Satoshi...\. he always envisioned a place like that, even back then.
Finding him is just the first step towards our goal.
With his help, we might find a way to get there.
Well then...\. should we call it a day?
[nods]
Good night, Lea.
Bye!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.146.settings.event.11.message: I'm sorry to interrupt, but we need you on the bridge!\. Right now!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.146.settings.event.23.message: Something is approaching us and quickly!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.146.settings.event.31.message: Sorry lass, we have to stop here.\. Duty calls.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.146.settings.event.36.message: Carla, ye clean up the balcony first and come to the bridge afterwards.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.146.settings.event.54.message: Girl, I have no idea what's going on here, but it'd be better for you to go inside too.
What a peculiar location we have here.
It's a darn cargo ship, ye dobber!
Ye look like someone who jumped right out of CrossWorlds.
This ship is not part of the bloody playground.
So, don't be a nuisance and get lost.
We are aware of the nature of this place.
Yet we perceive the presence of another misplaced individual.
... That's none of yer bloody business!
Get off this ship and back to the game ye came from!
Foolish mortal, do you truly believe we will abide by your command?
... Did ye just call me a "mortal", ye nutcase?
Ye better leave right now or I'll be glad to tighten yer grip on reality!
You bore us.\. We choose to no longer converse with the likes of you.
Besides, our search has already been concluded.
You.\. You do not belong here.\. You need to be removed.
Wait, you seem all too familiar.
Why, it can't be...
Indeed, it might be a mere coincidence!
Oh, but we most definitely have a way to be certain!
I don't even know what to say!
I mean... seriously?\. What's next?\. Cyborg sea serpents?
This is the best day, man!
In all my years on this ship, this kind of thing never happened.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.13.message: This spinning motion, one cannot find it twice in this world.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.14.message: Truly, there is no doubt about it!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.15.message: When was the last time we have laid eyes upon you?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.17.message: Yes, you have our utmost interest!\. You will come with us.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.35.message: Greetings from the Solar Fist, ye pile of instant matter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.36.message: What's this? Yer divine powers can't handle a proper explosion?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.61.message: Okay, lass.\. Ye need to get off this ship.\. Right NOW!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.63.message: Carla!\. Get her back to the teleporter as fast as possible.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.64.message: And tell me once she's off the ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.153.settings.event.65.message: I'll make sure no trace of CrossWorlds is left on my ship!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.0.text: Dude...\. I know you're new around here, but really, ya gotta be more relaxed about all this.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.1.text: What? Just because I was too quick about cleaning duty?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.3.text: Well, if ya keep this up, \c[5]people will notice\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.3.event.5.m: Oh hey! You're that avatar girl right?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.3.event.7.m: I was just giving our newbie here a lesson.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.154.settings.dialog.3.event.9.m: Hey! I've been working here for 6 months!
Ya sure? Before ya know it, ya'll be cleaning da whole deck front to back every day.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.23.message: Ye darn pile of instant matter!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.24.message: Stop puttin' yer trash all over the ship!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.32.message: There are probably some enemies left down in the cargo hold.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.37.message: Puttin' even more trash in my cargo hold?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.38.message: Okay, that's it, play time is over!!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.60.message: You're meddling with matters that are not of your concern...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.62.message: Dobbers like you messin' with my ship are on the bloody top of my list of concerns!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.63.message: I said it before, I'll say it again:
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.64.message: This cargo ship is not part of the bloody Playground!!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.167.settings.event.105.message: What the bloody hell was all that about?!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.20.message: I hope you...\. rested well.\. Any new memories?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.25.message: Well then...\. preparations to go back to the official Playground are all finished!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.26.message: We will have to leave using the teleporter down in the cargo hold.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.27.message: Remember the one where we started?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.30.message: Carla should be waiting there for you.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.31.message: Also...\. I did a few more preparations on my side...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.36.message: Just making sure nobody will be able to locate me.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.37.message: I did the same after you completed the Faj'ro Temple.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.38.message: That is why we had to stay offline for a while longer, remember?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.40.message: Anyway, things should be less critical since we are out of Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.41.message: Then again...\. they most likely still have ways to track us in the official Playground.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.42.message: Otherwise, they could not have dragged us out of the raid like that.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.44.message: I still wonder, how exactly they managed to do that.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.45.message: Maybe they can read the traces we leave on the game servers...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.46.message: Or maybe it is something very simple... like somebody watching us in-game.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.48.message: Well...\. it is all speculation at this point.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.49.message: But we should be careful and watch our surroundings, okay?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.176.settings.event.54.task: Head to the \c[3]Teleporter\c[0] on \c[3]M.S. Solar\c[0] to travel back to the Playground.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.0.text: Cleaning duty again... That's like 5 times in a row now.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.1.text: See? I warned you! Now you are the cleaning maniac of the ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.2.text: People will keep loading off cleaning duty onto you as long as you keep being so quick and thorough about it.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.3.text: I'm not exactly complaining you know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.4.text: I like this kind of work and the ship has been in a much better condition since I took over.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.5.text: Alright, whatever floats your boat, dude.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/ship.json.entities.177.settings.dialog.6.text: Well, this boat probably doesn't float because of my cleaning but it certainly looks better!

assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.46.message: Oh, is the speech synchronization malfunctioning?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.48.message: ... Apparently. Well, something just had to go wrong.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.52.message: Ok. We will make it work, somehow.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.53.message: You... are probably confused about this situation, correct?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.56.message: Alright. Let us take small steps.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.65.message: Carla? We are ready. Please initiate the training sequence.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.78.guiInfo.se:
Press \i[key-throw] to aim.
Release \i[key-throw] to throw.

Use \i[right-stick] to aim.
Press \i[throw] to throw.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.85.message: VRPs are your most essential tool and weapon.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.87.message: Your task is to hit all these robots with VRPs.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.12.settings.event.88.message:
So, give it a shot!\.
Or rather...\.\.\. a throw!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.18.settings.event.8.message:
Well, just to be sure...\.
Let us repeat this exercise with an extended distance.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.18.settings.event.34.guiInfo.se: Aim and move the cursor towards the edge of the screen to extend your view.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.18.settings.event.39.message: Something particular about VRPs: They are not affected by gravity.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.18.settings.event.40.message: Thus, no matter how far you throw, VRPs will not fall on the ground.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.8.message: Ok, next let us enable the Charge Mode.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.16.message: You activate charged VRPs by aiming for a longer time.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.40.task:
Hit enemies with \i[o]
Avoid enemies with \i[x]
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.43.message: Charge Mode allows for the throwing of larger VRPs.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.44.message: Those charged VRPs will ricochet on walls.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.45.message: That is the reason for their name, you see!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.46.message: Using charged VRPs, you can hit the target with the red circle.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.21.settings.event.49.guiInfo.se: Aim until you see a red line to throw a charged ball.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.26.settings.event.21.guiInfo.se: Aim precisely to not hit the \i[7] targets
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.26.settings.event.22.guiInfo.se:
Hit enemies with \i[6]
Avoid enemies with \i[7]
I suppose I talked too much again.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.7.message: It is about time we put you down on your feet.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.8.message: Carla, we are done here. You can terminate the flotation sequence.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.37.message:
Hey there, girl!\.
Welcome to our 
cozy cargo hold!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.39.message: My name's Carla.\. Nice to meet ya!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.41.message: You sure are a quiet one!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.43.message:
Apparently there is an issue with her speech synchronization.\. 
She still understands us, though.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.45.message: No way!\. Is there a way to fix it?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.46.message: I do not know yet.\. I will have to look into that.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.47.message: Anyway!\. I'm sure we'll be able to understand each other somehow.\. Non-verbal communication, ya know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.50.message: Still, kinda would like to know your name.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.51.message: Sergey?\. Can you help us out here?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.55.message: Well then, Lea, ready to get up?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.56.message: We gotta get you ready for what's coming.\. Ball throwing and the like, ya know?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.57.message: And I got just the thing prepared for ya!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.28.settings.event.64.guiInfo.se:
Press \i[key-up]\i[key-left]\i[key-down]\i[key-right] to move around.
Press  \i[pause] to access the pause menu and save the game.

Use \i[left-stick] to move around.
Press  \i[pause] to access the pause menu and save the game.
Hey there, Girl! I'd appreciate if you wouldn't step on my stuff like that!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.57.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Just leave through the door, when you're ready.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.85.settings.event.5.message: Here we are again.\. Time for you to leave this party.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.85.settings.event.10.message: C'mon sweetie, this isn't the time for tearful goodbyes.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.7.message: I managed to add a proper \c[3]landmark\c[0] on the cargo ship.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.8.message: That means from now on you can travel back to the cargo hold whenever you like.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.11.message: But better to not try to drag along other party members.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.12.message: You are the only player that can enter this place.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.28.message: I suppose Sergey talked things through with you?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.31.message: Just so you know you have all our support!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.32.message: If you ever need a break from that busy Playground, feel free to drop by!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.34.message: Well then, let's get you back among all those other players!
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.35.message: Please stand in the middle of the teleporter.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/teleporter.j.entities.98.settings.event.42.message: Everything ready... Good luck over there, girl!

Please stop following me around, \s[6]you're creeping me out...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/test.json.entities.4.settings.npcStates.0.event.10: I'm just here to do some serious talking. We have to check some layout bug here.
You're a quite one, aren't you?
You're a quite one, aren't you?
Okay, so now you're leaving on me, huh?
Don't you also feel a bit lonely around here?
I mean, it's not exactly the most crowded place, right?
Well, except for those robots. But those aren't nice, I tell you!
Trust me, I know from experience...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/test.json.entities.6.settings.npcStates.3.event.11: So I don't know about you, but I do feel pretty lonely around here...
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/test.json.entities.6.settings.npcStates.3.event.13: So... Why don't we just chat a bit...?
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/test.json.entities.6.settings.npcStates.3.event.22: Then I'll just leave you alone.
assets/data/maps/cargo-ship/test.json.entities.6.settings.npcStates.3.event.25: Maybe keep Carla alone after all...

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.0.label: G
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.1.label: B1
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.2.label: B2
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.3.label: B3
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.0.settings.destinations.4.label: B4
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.5.message: Hey, Lea... how is it going?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.7.message: Ah... I just need a short breather, this dungeon is pretty long, non?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.9.message: Btw.... you did see them too, right?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.19.message: But also quick and twitchy and there are just SOOO MANY OF THEM.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.22.message: Yeah, I really don't like bugs. Pardon.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.23.message: I guess I just felt like talking about it....
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json.entities.36.settings.event.24.message: Anyway, those things will not stop me. The race is still on!

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json.entities.42.settings.event.17.text: Press \i[heat] to switch to \c[3]heat mode\c[0] at any time!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json.entities.42.settings.event.21.text: Press \i[heat] \c[3]again\c[3] to switch back to \c[3]neutral mode\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json.entities.43.settings.event.0.title: Elemental Overload
Doing actions in element mode will increase your \c[3]element load\c[0].
Your \c[3]element load\c[0] is displayed around the element mode symbol.
If your element load fills up, you reach the \c[3]Elemental Overload\c[0], which temporarily blocks the use of \c[3]all element modes\c[0].
Your element load will steadily decrease in \c[3]Neutral mode\c[0].
The best approach to \c[3]quickly decrease\c[0] your load is to \c[3]deal damage\c[0] in \c[3]Neutral Mode\c[0].

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json.entities.81.settings.event.10.message: WHY WOULD THEY DO THIS TO ME?!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json.entities.81.settings.event.12.message: Sacrebleu! This dungeon is the worst.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json.entities.81.settings.event.14.message: ANYWAY! Race. Still on. Not gonna give up.

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/center.json.entities.64.settings.event.0.message:
Good luck, Lea!
I'll be waiting at the end!

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
These mountains stood 
for eons, nearly unchanged...
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
Their frozen crown, 
shimmering in the sun.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
Among these heights and hurdles
you persevered.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
Wielding the blazing flames, 
you cleaved through ice and stone alike.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.12.text:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.14.text:
Take this Shade 
and continue on your journey.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.j.entities.4.settings.event.23.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.

assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.10.settings.interact.event.0.te: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.10.settings.interact.event.1.te: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.10.settings.interact.event.2.te: Di'aro is one of these gods. The God of the \c[3]Square\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]solid surface\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.11.settings.interact.event.0.te: Di'aro is the creator of \c[3]solid surface\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.11.settings.interact.event.1.te: His powers could form the most \c[3]majestic mountains\c[0] and \c[3]freeze\c[0] the vastest of seas.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.11.settings.interact.event.2.te: Indeed, his creations are enduring and overwhelming sights to behold, yet motionless and without life.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.0.te: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] is a Goddess of Shape, the mistress of the flame, and creator of the sun.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.1.te: Yet she was envious of her fellow gods, who created fascinating shapes and worlds full of life and color.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.2.te: She longed to take part, adding a warming fire to these worlds, yet her flame was too mighty and consumed all in its path.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.3.te: It was then when \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] had a proposal.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.4.te: He shaped a sphere with an empty core and several holes surrounded by high mountains.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.5.te: E'nel filled this shape with her flame, creating a world with a heated core and life on its surface.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.12.settings.interact.event.6.te: Today, every \c[3]volcano\c[0] is a record of \c[3]E'nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] working in union.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.13.settings.interact.event.0.te: Life on \c[3]Shadoon\c[0] has prospered and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] felt that our kind was ready to start our journey.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.13.settings.interact.event.1.te: Di'aro, however, did not agree. He still saw our kind as infants crawling over the majestic surface he created.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.13.settings.interact.event.2.te: Di'orbis then pointed to Shadoon and asked Di'aro to watch. Di'aro saw how our kind climbed the \c[3]highest of mountains\c[0] and reached the very \c[3]bottom of the sea\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.13.settings.interact.event.3.te: Di'aro was shocked yet proud of our achievements. Reluctantly he agreed that indeed we had been ready to start our journey.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.13.settings.interact.event.4.te: Di'aro then prepared an \c[3]envelope\c[0] of solid rock and ice, used to send the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.2.text: That whole dungeon was one large abyss!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.3.text: The last boss was over a cliff for Pete's sake!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.4.text: Still, you made it.\. I'm so proud of you!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.6.text: So...\. Let's collect the shade already.\. We clearly earned it!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.8.text: They will probably do that "float in space" thing again!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.18.settings.dialog.9.text: I can't take that right now, please!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.11.thenStep.1: Seriously, what was up with that battle for the master key?!
It's like they designed this dungeon after my worst nightmares!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.11.thenStep.2: Oh well!\. I'll get you next time!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.11.elseStep.7: Phew... to be honest, it was very close.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.11.elseStep.8: That dungeon was much longer compared to Newcomer's Bridge, non?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.12.message: Hm, but this room is strange, non?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.13.message: I didn't expect to see other players within the dungeon.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.14.message: I guess rooms like these are simply not instanced.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.20.settings.event.18.message: Anyway, I think we should check out this statue up there.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.23.settings.event.24.message: Alors... do you see those \c[3]rotating info thingies\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.23.settings.event.25.message: I bet those have all the info about the Ancients we need.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.23.settings.event.29.task: Read about the Ancients in the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0] and take the quiz at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0].
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.24.settings.event.1.message: Alright! Just read everything there is.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.24.settings.event.2.message: We should head back to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] and take that quiz!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.30.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Solid as rock, smooth as silk.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.31.settings.dialog.0.text: And, did you find all the chests already?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.31.settings.dialog.2.text: Yeah, me too. Somebody gave me a hint, though.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.31.settings.dialog.3.text: There is one chest that will only appear if you do certain things in that room.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.31.settings.dialog.5.text: Dunno. That's all she told me. She didn't want to "spoil" the whole secret.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.0.text: Alright! Second boss defeated. What did you think?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.1.text: Huge. Pretty slow, though. But I loved the bomb punching!
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.2.text: You know you can throw balls at the bombs, right?
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.3.text: I don't throw balls. I punch with an extension of my fist.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.4.text: Sure, whatever you want to call it.
assets/data/maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.j.entities.32.settings.dialog.5.text: And I cut things with swords!

assets/data/maps/dreams/dream11.json.entities.126.settings.event.46.message: It was just bound to happen.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream11.json.entities.126.settings.event.79.text: There is no point... waiting for me...
