\i[arrow-e] Roads to Grand Krys'kajo
\i[arrow-s] V'rda Vil
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.635.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] \v[area.jungle-city.name] & \v[area.autumn-fall.name] 
\i[arrow-e] Roads to Grand Krys'kajo
\i[arrow-s] V'rda Vil
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.86.text: Lea, what is wrong with you!?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.90.text:
Why have you been 
away for so long?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.94.text:
Just why can't you 
explain yourself properly?!
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.109.text:
Lea... Don't feel 
bad about it.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.112.text:
The fact that you can't talk
is part of who you are.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.113.text:
And it doesn't make 
you a bad person.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.117.text:
To the contrary, 
it makes you special.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream12.json.entities.661.settings.event.118.text:
Because few can 
listen like you do.

assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.47.message: It's nice to finally meet you...\. in person.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.54.message: Gautham, please be careful when interacting with manifestations of instant matter.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.55.message: The risks are supposed to be low, but accidents can happen.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.58.message: You don't have to tell me.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.63.message: Well, it is certainly exciting to walk in the world you helped create!
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.64.message: The sense transmission of the Cross Gear is very accurate, but it still can't match the real thing.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.71.message: Still... I am worried about you. Are you sure you'll be fine?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.74.message: I'll just have to cope with it.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.75.message: It was all part of the agreement, no?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.91.message: I...\. I never expected things...\. to go this way...
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.92.message: To be asked to do... such things....
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.93.message: This is not...\. game design, anymore.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.94.message: This is not for the right experience...\. this is...\. wrong...
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream13.json.entities.33.settings.event.99.message: I mustn't...\. tell you any more...

assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.0.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.44.message: She really doesn't respond at all...
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.49.text:
It started about 
half an hour ago.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.50.text:
Do you think it's because 
of the incident with Shizuka?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.55.message: But I'm afraid it's the first time I've encountered this kind of reaction.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.56.message: I'd need direct access to the Evotar Server to effectively debug this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream14.json.entities.29.settings.event.60.text: That is out of the question.

assets/data/maps/dreams/dream15.json.entities.349.settings.event.45.message: I wonder how the others are doing.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. all of them.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream15.json.entities.349.settings.event.46.message: They're probably worried about us, right?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream15.json.entities.349.settings.event.48.message: In difficult times like these, it's good to know there are people out there that care for you.

assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.61.message: Well...\. it might be due to your appearance.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.76.message: Hm...\. that's something we need to look into.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.77.message: But you still seem to understand us, don't you?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.80.message: A mute woman that can still listen...\. how nostalgic.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.82.message: Say, do you remember your name?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.85.message: So...\. what should we call you then?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.104.message: Here are images of different landscapes.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.105.message: Do you remember what forests look like?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.107.message: Well then... can you point at the image showing forests?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.110.message: So you remember basic concepts pretty well already.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.127.message: So, what about yesterday's sign, can you still do it?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.133.message: Is there any sign you remember?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.137.message: It's pretty clear now that it's not just your speech that's missing.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.139.message: And we only get so far with hand signs...
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.140.message: It's like you're missing the ability to recall  "words"... or any abstract concept.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.142.message: Lea, it's ok.\. Please don't feel bad about this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.177.message: Isn't it funny how it always goes the same way?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.178.message: All the support I gave them...\. all the things I did...\. it suddenly doesn't matter.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.180.message: And all at once things have to go hostile.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.183.message: Sorry...\. this really shouldn't concern you.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.198.message: So, any more hand signs you remember?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.204.message: Alright, so you can still count.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.205.message: That is something you picked up rather quickly.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.207.message: Oh... back to trying this again?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.210.message: You won't need this for any of the signs.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.230.message: Do you want me to tell you more about her?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.234.message: We met through work several years ago.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.236.message: \c[3]Mute\c[0]... but that didn't stop her from doing her job.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.238.message: We communicated via writing at first.\. Then I learned sign language.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.239.message: But even then...\. she never was much of a talker.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.240.message: Just...\. very, very good at listening.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.242.message: My job was all about having good relationships.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.243.message: I've met so many people, always busy keeping up connections.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.244.message: Yet...\. it was all so very shallow.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.246.message: She was one of the few people I could speak openly to.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.250.message: I suppose, I just get along well with mute people?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.268.message: We really like to think highly of ourselves.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.269.message: And sure...\. we certainly came and went far.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.270.message: But in the end...\. we are just another kind of creature lost in this vast universe.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.272.message: Lea...\. do you remember what a clear sky looks like at night?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.274.message: Out in the countryside, no town or city nearby?
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.276.message: I hope one day you will...
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.277.message: It is like...\. a boundless sea of stars.
assets/data/maps/dreams/dream16.json.entities.28.settings.event.278.message: When you see it, you start to realize...\. just how insignificant we are to this world.

assets/data/maps/dreams/eighth.json.entities.191.settings.event.47.message: I call it the field of the indecisive flowers!
assets/data/maps/dreams/eighth.json.entities.191.settings.event.54.text: You like this place, don't you?
assets/data/maps/dreams/eighth.json.entities.191.settings.event.56.text:
I suppose it's as good as it gets 
for a bleak location like this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/eighth.json.entities.191.settings.event.57.text:
It definitely beats being stuck 
in that one room all the time.
assets/data/maps/dreams/eighth.json.entities.191.settings.event.60.text:
It would be nice to show you
all the other places out there...

assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.57.text:
Sorry, nothing seems to work.
She still doesn't respond.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.59.text:
I'm not sure. It's possible that
she still perceives her surroundings.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.61.text:
I'm... very sorry.
I tried everything.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.62.text:
I honestly have never encountered
an issue like this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.64.text:
It's possible that her past 
experiences have led to this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fifth.json.entities.0.settings.event.66.text:
That's why... there's one 
last thing we can try.

assets/data/maps/dreams/first.json.entities.1.settings.event.51.text:
Sure...
It's supposed to be a long parkour.
assets/data/maps/dreams/first.json.entities.1.settings.event.55.text: It's all about the journey, no?
assets/data/maps/dreams/first.json.entities.1.settings.event.66.text: Yes, apple trees all over the place.
assets/data/maps/dreams/first.json.entities.1.settings.event.79.text: I suppose I might as well show that place to you.

assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth-2.json.entities.161.settings.event.24.task: You seem to be caught up in a long dream. Maybe have a look around?

assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth-3.json.entities.169.settings.event.32.text:
It won't be integrated into the 
official playground anytime soon.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth-3.json.entities.169.settings.event.33.text:
Right... There is enough room 
to run some experiments.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth-3.json.entities.169.settings.event.44.text:
Still... we got this far!
We can't just stop now, can we?

assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth.json.entities.195.settings.event.87.text:
Hey, I told you this 
one isn't for everybody.
assets/data/maps/dreams/fourth.json.entities.195.settings.event.89.text:
Come on, I don't want 
you to break your fingers.

assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.48.message: How are your hands doing today?
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.52.message: Haha, sorry. It's not as painful as it looks, I swear.
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.59.message: Again with the weird hand tricks, Tronny?
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.62.message: What? I'm just fascinated by how well it's synchronized.
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.63.message: You don't have to make these creepy shapes to prove it.
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.73.message: Oh man... not looking forward to that jungle.
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.75.message: You know... those places are usually filled with insects and bugs?
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.76.message: Please don't let me go there alone, Lea.
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.103.message: Oui... why are you sitting here like that?
assets/data/maps/dreams/ninth.json.entities.195.settings.event.110.message: You know...\. If something is bothering you, you can just tell us about it.

assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.61.text:
Penguins on mountains. 
I'm not kidding.
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.63.text:
I know. 
They had plenty 
of strange ideas.
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.64.text:
Apparently that's what 
people like these days.
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.74.text: I know, it can be a tad lonely.
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.76.text: But it's a small price to pay.
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.77.text:
After all... 
we're about to revolutionize 
the entire field!
assets/data/maps/dreams/second.json.entities.119.settings.event.78.text:
I'm just glad 
we found somebody
who embraces the potential.

assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.31.text:
You looked so peaceful while you were sleeping...
I didn't want to wake you up.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.32.text:
Anyway, shall we revisit 
the lesson from yesterday?
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.59.message: Dammit, I'm here to come up with interesting game scenarios and challenges.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.60.message: I need a little bit of creative freedom to do my job.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.66.message: Gautham, that is what teamwork is all about.... You have to find a compromise.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.69.message: Tsk... the best we'll ever get is mediocrity that way.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.70.message: There are too many conventional thinkers in this company...
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.78.message: What can I say?\. They just want to keep making the games they know.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.80.message: They have a genius like you on board and don't make proper use of it!
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.81.message: Rejecting your big AI project proposal...
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.85.message: Well to be honest...\. that went way beyond what you would need for a game like CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.87.message: Are you sure?\. I think there are a lot of applications.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.88.message: In fact, I'm currently working on a list of them.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.89.message: So you plan to pitch the idea to them again?
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.90.message: Of course I will! It's just way too promising!
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.96.message: What? I don't work that much, really...
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.97.message: And I do it because it's what I want to do. No need to worry.
assets/data/maps/dreams/seventh.json.entities.28.settings.event.99.message: You should listen to your dear caring sister, Mr. Workaholic.

assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.27.text:
Let me tell you a little trick 
about conversations.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.28.text:
People... they like to 
share their stories.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.29.text:
So if you want to be on their 
good side...\. listen to them.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.32.text:
Add a few comments, ask questions...
let them know you are interested.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.33.text:
Keep the conversation flowing naturally, 
but let them do the talking.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.34.text:
That's how people
enjoy your company.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.37.text:
However...\. none of this works, 
if the other person can't talk.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.38.text:
I found that out the hard way... 
when I met her.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.41.text:
She could only listen, 
very much like you.
assets/data/maps/dreams/tenth.json.entities.27.settings.event.42.text:
So for once...\.
I had to do the talking.

assets/data/maps/dreams/the-room.json.entities.0.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.

assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.53.text:
It makes you wish...\.
you could just stay in this world...
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.64.text:
This world...\.
He gave it to me
to design as I please.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.65.text:
This is what I always 
dreamed about.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.67.text:
So why would you 
harbor all these doubts?
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.68.text:
Things are just 
fine so far, no?
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.78.text: This is no race against time.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.80.text:
I really cannot imagine
how you must feel right now.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.90.text:
It must feel really strange, hm? 
Seeing me like this.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.91.text: That's why they told me to stay away from you.
assets/data/maps/dreams/third.json.entities.68.settings.event.95.text: Because I want you to feel it as well.

assets/data/maps/edge-test.json.entities.15.settings.dialog.0.text: Hey, you kinda look like me #whathappens
assets/data/maps/edge-test.json.entities.17.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Really? Alright, talk to me again if you changed your mind!
assets/data/maps/edge-test.json.entities.17.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Go on, do that quest for me!
assets/data/maps/edge-test.json.entities.28.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey, I just unlocked a Lore Entry about \v[lore.unlock.lea]\c[3]Lea\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/edge-test.json.entities.33.settings.text:
A rock formation!
You're filled with \c[3]Determination\c[0]

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.4.message: Despite countless attempts, we failed to convince Instatainment to support our research.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.5.message: It was in that hopeless moment that we met a certain person.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.16.message: That's the name he gave us at least.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.17.message: We never met him in person and knew very little about him...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.18.message: Yet... he believed in our vision and offered his support.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.20.message: And indeed... with his help we continued our research on Evotars.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.21.message: He provided us with everything we needed.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-1.jso.entities.66.settings.event.22.message: Technical equipment, confidential specifications and most of all...

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-2.jso.entities.273.settings.event.10.message: A test environment...\. within the Playground.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-2.jso.entities.273.settings.event.11.message: We managed to continue our research within CrossWorlds...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-2.jso.entities.273.settings.event.13.message: To this day I don't know how he did it.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-2.jso.entities.273.settings.event.19.message: Things started within this small area of Sapphire Ridge.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-2.jso.entities.273.settings.event.20.message: However, over time we realized that a larger testing area was required for effective research.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-3.jso.entities.163.settings.event.7.message: And that's how we ended up in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-3.jso.entities.163.settings.event.8.message: A discontinued extension to the Playground.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-3.jso.entities.163.settings.event.9.message: Mr. Sidwell made it ours for research.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-3.jso.entities.163.settings.event.12.message: The new location wasn't the most appealing, but it certainly helped with our research.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-3.jso.entities.163.settings.event.13.message: It didn't take us long to reach our first major milestone.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.9.message: Our first Evotar, \c[3]Lea\c[0], was born - derived from Shizuka's avatar.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.11.message: Back then, things were going rather well.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.15.message: We made so much progress...\. it was exciting!
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.16.message: Following prototypes have proven to be almost feature-complete...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.22.message: It was at that point...\. that a long-lingering question started to emerge.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.27.settings.event.23.message: \c[3]What exactly should we do...\. with those Evotars?\c[0]
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.30.settings.event.11.message: I faked a malfunction of Lea's Evotar...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.30.settings.event.12.message: I told Sidwell that the best chance to fix it would be to inspect the state of the Evotar and server side-by-side.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-4.jso.entities.30.settings.event.16.message: However, I wasn't allowed to access the server.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.1.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSte: The door is locked, correct? It seems we are trapped.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.35.settings.event.10.message: Around that time, Mr. Sidwell made requests for additional features.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.35.settings.event.11.message: He wanted to know if we could extract \c[3]memories\c[0] from Evotars.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.35.settings.event.13.message: Hence, his original intent became clear to us.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.35.settings.event.16.message: He made us develop a system to \c[3]gather intelligence\c[0] from players of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.8.message: Of course, once we discovered what kind of business we'd ended up in, we started to protest.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.9.message: We never intended Evotars to be used in that manner.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.10.message: We were ready to drop everything, however...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.16.message: It was too late for that.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.17.message: We'd broken several agreements with our ex-employer...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.18.message: That's why we've been reluctant to report anything to the authorities.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.19.message: And even when we considered doing that...
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.27.message: Mr. Sidwell managed to blackmail us into submission.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-5.jso.entities.36.settings.event.28.message: His intention was clear: If any of us tried to leave, our days would be numbered.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.8.message: The method works on any player of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.19.message: First we apply a \c[3]custom CrossCode\c[0] to the target player, overriding the original.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.27.message: Just after a short learning phase we decouple it again.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.34.message: From then on, the modified CrossCode can be run autonomously.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.56.message: In order to fully regain their memory, the Evotar needs to spend some time within the Evotarground.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-6.jso.entities.8.settings.event.59.message: And as soon as this is complete ... we gather the intelligence.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-7.jso.entities.5.settings.event.8.message: It turns out you can't simply extract their memory.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-7.jso.entities.5.settings.event.9.message: But of course you can \c[3]interrogate\c[0] an Evotar, just like any person.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-7.jso.entities.5.settings.event.10.message: Interrogate them...\. with virtually no restraints on the technique.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-7.jso.entities.5.settings.event.17.message: We managed to collect highly confidential information... in secret, without leaving any trace.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.7.message: The \c[3]Evotar Server\c[0]. It is the host for all Evotars with the exception of Lea.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.8.message: It's located \c[3]within the Playground itself\c[0], somewhere inside the dungeon compound of Evotarground.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.10.message: Only avatars with an \c[3]embedded access key\c[0] can enter the area without triggering the self-destruct sequence.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.11.message: Remote administration is disabled entirely with the exception of one command: the deletion of all data.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.14.message: It is Sidwell's final trump card.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.15.message: The server is impossibly hard to reach and even if we tried...\. He could wipe its data at any time.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.26.settings.event.16.message: It would put an end to almost any Evotar in existence... \c[3]including myself\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.27.settings.event.10.message: As a compromise, I convinced Sidwell to go to the server \c[3]together with Lea\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.27.settings.event.14.message: He attempted to debug the issue while I provided remote support.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.27.settings.event.15.message: In order to do that, Lea was given the \c[3]access key\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-8.jso.entities.27.settings.event.21.message: Despite all the efforts, I told him that the issue could not be fixed.

assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.7.message: As a final attempt, Lea was relocated to my personal development server.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.8.message: But ultimately, I concluded that she was broken for good.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.14.message: I was tasked with deleting her.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.15.message: Instead, I secretly sneaked her back into official game servers.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.16.message: Hidden within a small data corruption of the database.
assets/data/maps/flashback/satoshi-9.jso.entities.51.settings.event.17.message: One where I was certain that an old colleague would eventually be tasked with looking into it.

assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.4.message: It all started several years ago...
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.13.message: At a time when we were all still employed by Instatainment.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.14.message: Satoshi...\. he was one of the head software-engineers for CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.15.message: He was responsible for implementing the \c[3]avatar controlling module\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.16.message: You see... since avatars are controlled with a \c[3]mere thought\c[0], this part was one of the most complex, and difficult to get right.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.17.message: Yet Satoshi... he succeeded in creating a reliable connection.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.18.message: He developed a neural network analysing the player's neural oscillation.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.19.message: After just a short learning phase, it allowed for controlling your avatar like it was your own body.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.20.message: It was a technological masterpiece, called the \c[3]CrossCode\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.33.message: After some time though... Satoshi discovered something new.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.34.message: The CrossCode went beyond just analysing players' thoughts to control avatars.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.35.message: Using the same neural network as a foundation... it was possible to entirely simulate features of the brain.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.36.message: Perception, logical thinking, emotions...\. even memories.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.37.message: Before you knew it... the CrossCode evolved into a \c[3]fully-fledged A.I.\c[0].
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-1.json.entities.75.settings.event.38.message: And it could run an avatar... without the player. A so called \c[3]Evotar\c[0].

assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.8.message: Satoshi was very excited by his discovery.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.9.message: He pitched his findings to the higher-ups... hoping to develop a fully autonomous AI based on the CrossCode.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.17.message: Instatainment was far less enthusiastic about it.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.19.message: Their priorities were clear: it was only about controlling avatars.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.22.message: Any additional functionality, especially the copying of memories, was unwanted.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.24.message: They immediately blocked any effort going into developing Evotars.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.40.message: Satoshi...\. he was deeply frustrated about this.
assets/data/maps/flashback/sergey-2.json.entities.11.settings.event.46.message: Soon afterwards, Satoshi, Shizuka and Gautham...

assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.10.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.12.message: Sir, I have already alerted the staff of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.13.message: There is absolutely no way out for you.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.14.message: I'm also aware that you are in fact not a player but an actual person!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.17.message: Quite so I'm afraid. How you managed to stay hidden however, is still a mystery to me.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.18.message: Well... C-C-Could an actual human do t-t-this?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.27.name: Baxton
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.28.message: What are you doing, I can't move!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.41.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.42.message: He won't be b-b-bothering us anymore, hehe.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.47.message: I can't seem to just d-delete you...
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.65.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.66.message: I can t-trap you and let my little f-f-friends take care of you!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.31.settings.event.67.message: Either you get t-tired or log-off.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.33.settings.event.11.message: He seems to be just... waiting?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.33.settings.event.12.message: Let us put an end to this mockery, Lady Lea.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.35.settings.event.1.message: I was unaware this cave was playable.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.33.name: Baxton
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.38.message: You successfully completed the quest line created by the \c[3]IHSO\c[0] in celebration of the \c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.42.message: The whole quest line you have just completed was created by participants of this event.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.43.message: The goal was to create a scenario that was so convincing that players would believe it.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.45.message: I'm but a tiny fraction of it. My makers wish to congratulate you on coming this far!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.46.message: We hope you enjoyed the quest line!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.47.message: As a reward we offer \c[3]extra CP\c[0] for you to spend!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.48.message: Thank you for playing and good luck in future adventures!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.54.message: So, how did you like the quest?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.56.message: Huh? You mean, why did I not just tell you?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.58.message: Well, to be honest I did not know at first myself.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.59.message: I was really concerned that we had a hacker in the game.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.60.message: But when I went ahead and checked I immediately saw that Henry was actually just an NPC.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.61.message: The \c[3]IHSO\c[0] is an organization dedicated to finding exploits in all kinds of systems.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.62.message: They helped Instatainment to fix some bugs in the early days of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.63.message: I guess that is why they let them have this much fun.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.64.message: Normally the company is pretty strict about these things.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.65.message: Anyway, I did not want to spoil the surprise so I thought I would help keep up the suspense.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.137.settings.event.71.message: But all is well that ends well, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.142.settings.event.2.thenStep.2: Let's s-s-see you you deal with these!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.148.settings.event.2.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.148.settings.event.6.message: I'll just change its party s-s-settings so you c-can't attack, hehe!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.157.settings.interact.event.0.t:
This probe stands here in commemoration of the 
\c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0]
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/cave-09-he.entities.157.settings.interact.event.1.t: Its participants created a quest line for \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0] in order to fool its player base into believing a hacker has infiltrated the game.
You successfully completed the quest line created by the \c[3]IHSO\c[0] in celebration of the \c[3]2205th International Hackspace Convention\c[0].
The whole quest line you have just completed was created by participants of this event.
The goal was to create a scenario that was so convincing that players would believe it.
I'm but a tiny fraction of it. My makers which to congratulate you on coming this far!
We hoped you enjoyed the quest line!
As a reward we offer \c[3]extra CP Points\c[0] for your to spend!
Thank you for playing and good luck in future adventures!

assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.152.settings.blockEvent.2.messa: There is no turning back now. Let's move forward, Lea!
So, did I get that right?
My...\. "clone" is still over there in Evotarground?
Oh Junge, this is such a weird situation.
We both just barely know each other, right?
Yet that "other Lukas" seems to be quite dear to you, because of what you both experienced together.
It really shows how much your life is shaped by happenstance.
Also...\. I really wonder what would happen if I met my clone over there.
Oh...\. I suppose I better be careful about that.
Man, it's still so hard to believe that you are an AI.
Wait...\. does that mean you understand binary?
I have no idea what it means!\. You tell me!
Really though, this is all very exciting!
You have my vote for best newbie of the year!

This whole situation is so hard to grasp for me.
You know... We enjoy games like CrossWorlds, because they allow us to live a fantasy.
So that for a moment we can forget about all the worries of real life.
Yet all of this... suddenly became very real, didn't it?
You could say that our fantasy... is in fact your reality, eh?
Now then... that's all the more reason to fight for your cause!
You really are by far the most human-like AI I've experienced.
You passed the Turing Test with flying colors.
Let us hope that Ivan thinks the same way.
I really do hope that we'll be able to create a place for Evotars like you here in CrossWorlds.
I really do hope that we'll be able to create a place for Evotars like you here in CrossWorlds.
Though it will be difficult to get Instatainment's support.

Now that I think about it...\. I really acted like the worst, non?
I just kept poking you about your real life...\. like...\. all the time!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.10: Not to mention how I reacted after the raid...\. urgh.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.22: I...\. I just didn't know any better but still...\. I'm sorry.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.31: I just want you to know, that you really are a dear friend to me.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.32: It doesn't matter if you are an AI or anything else!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.36: It really is a bummer, that Tronny isn't around for all of this.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.39: He really is such a dork. A nice dork, though.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.7.settings.npcStates.1.event.40: Let's hope he will show up again eventually.
What is it? I'm calling you by your name now, am I not?
Wait...\. Do you want me to drop the "Spheromancer" as well?
I'm afraid I'd never do that.
It is a noble title every player of our class should wear with pride!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.12: Alright, fine! But only this one time.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.13: Lea...\. so now that the truth is out, it seems I was right!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.15: From the very beginning you have been cheating!!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.17: However! Given the circumstances at the time, I suppose it's fair to let it slide.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.21: I am actually very proud of you!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.23: You've grown into a prime example of a Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.24: Looking back, I have to say it has been an honor to have had you as such a capable opponent.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.26: And indeed, you've shown me that there is still potential for me to grow as well.
And while you didn't quite reach my level of expertise, you definitely came close!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.8.settings.npcStates.1.event.28: Now it's time for our greatest act of justice so far! I hope you are ready!
You must have had a hard time, not being able to talk, not knowing about yourself.
It probably didn't help that Polly kept bothering you on top of that.
But really, Lea, you're a strong girl.
From what Sergey told us you really must have gone through a lot.
Yet here you are, still happily saying "Hi" to everyone.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.9.settings.npcStates.1.event.12: It's always a joy to play together with you!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.9.settings.npcStates.1.event.13: Plus, it was very entertaining to watch you beat up Polly like that.
But don't tell him I said that.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.20.message: Let us quickly discuss how we will proceed from here.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.21.message: Our goal is to assemble as many \c[3]Evotars\c[0] as we can find, get them close to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] to the east and then subject them to a certain \c[3]field effect\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.22.message: We need to do this as fast as possible. That's why I suggest we split in \c[3]3 teams\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.23.message: \c[3]Team A\c[0] will run straight to the Quest Hub and deal with all Evotars of that area.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.24.message: I suggest that Lea is part of that team.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.30.message: Then I'll join Team A as well!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.33.message: Lukas, you too!\. No more level excuses!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.42.message: Then we need two more teams tasked with \c[3]gathering all Evotars of the area\c[0] and leading them to the Quest Hub.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.43.message: \c[3]Team B\c[0] will take care of the \c[3]forest\c[0] in the north and \c[3]Team C\c[0] the \c[3]river delta\c[0] in the south.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.50.message: Joern and I will take care of the forest!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/exit-cave-.entities.21.settings.event.57.message: Alrighty! That leaves Buggy, Al, and me for Team C!

assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-06-ch.entities.481.settings.event.0.message: Lea, this is the easternmost cave!
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-06-ch.entities.481.settings.event.1.message: Henry must have come through this place.

assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.166.settings.blockEvent.2.messa: Lea, we must not enter this area with anyone else.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.166.settings.blockEvent.3.messa: Make sure to disband your party before you proceed.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.167.settings.event.1.message: Lea, we must make sure to explore this part on our own.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.167.settings.event.2.message: So it is time to disband your party.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.168.settings.event.7.message: Is it here?\. Is the entrance in this area?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.168.settings.event.10.message: Is there any way to \c[3]activate it\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.168.settings.event.12.message: And you remember how to do it?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.168.settings.event.18.message: It is alright, we will just try our best.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.168.settings.event.19.message: You have a look around and I will watch the logs.\. Maybe I can pick up something as well.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.184.settings.event.1.thenStep.2: I am detecting some \c[3]tracking\c[0] in the logs.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.226.settings.event.1.thenStep.3: Did you hear that sound, too?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.226.settings.event.1.thenStep.5: It sounded like we did something right.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.226.settings.event.1.thenStep.6: Let us look around some more.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-ma.entities.226.settings.event.2.thenStep.4: Seems like we are getting closer.

Spheromancer Lea! Is something the matter?
That's quite the impressive waterfall, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-to.entities.196.settings.event.15.message: Lea? Did you see something you remember?
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-to.entities.196.settings.event.18.message: Well then, we should have a closer look around here.
assets/data/maps/forest/caves/path-11-to.entities.196.settings.event.19.message: But... make sure to explore the place by yourself.

..A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
...A warrior must stay focused even when surrounded...
...This trial will test both strength and speed...
...As your foes are fast and will grow in numbers even faster...
...Now step into the ring and show us your \c[3]Vigor\c[0]...
We have to fight now? Please just let it be spiders...
Now that's a plea I never imagined hearing...
...A warrior must stay focused even when surrounded...
...This trial will test both strength and speed...
...As your foes are fast and will grow in numbers even faster...
...Now step into the ring and show us your \c[3]Vigor\c[0]...
...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
...You mastered all trials and even bested our champion...
...Now it is time to test your limits...
Combo Timer UI enabled! It will be displayed in the bottom right corner.

Welcome to the \c[3]Ring of Spiders\c[0]!

Choose the mode you want to try out to begin the challenge.

\c[3]Survival\c[0] is similar to the original \c[3]Trial of Vigor\c[0]. But instead of 2 minutes, you need to survive for 4.
\c[3]Survival [Hard]\c[0] works the same, but the spiders will be adjusted to match your level.

\c[3]Endless\c[0] will test both endurance and skill. Try to survive as long as you can against the hordes of spiders. 
Enemies will gradually get stronger as time passes on.

Gain points by defeating spiders. Defeat enemies fast to increase the combo multiplier \c[3]by 10%\c[0]. This stacks infinitely for as long as you defeat another enemy in the time limit of \c[3]8 seconds\c[0].
You can enable/disable the combo timer in the selection menu.

Additionally, \c[3]defeating multiple enemies at once\c[0] will give a huge bonus. But you only have half a second so line them up well.
Earning EXP, Credits and Items are disabled for the duration of a challenge.
...Very well. Step into the ring to begin...
Survive as long as you can!

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.8.settings.npcStates.0.event.qu: Seeker, are you ready to face your final trial?
Seeker... It's time for a duel.
You have earned the Mark of Mastery and with it, the \c[3]Meteor Shade\c[0]!
Now walk through the door behind me and speak to the once that came before to receive your prize.
We are impressed. Very much so.
My Brothers and Sisters speak highly of the Seeker that defeated the Twilight.
One even mentioned preparing an old trial.
Meet her at the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0] where you completed the Trial of Vigor.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.6.name: Vagabond
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.17.name: Vagabond
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.19.message: It seems nothing can faze you. Maybe you are indeed ready.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.21.message: You have mastered every trial put in front of you.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.22.message: The golden beetles are proof of that.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.38.name: Vagabond
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.41.message: And you survived our little surprise.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.42.message: But this was not your last trial, oh no.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.43.message: In your last trial you will face the \c[3]guardian of this place\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.25.settings.event.45.message: Speak to me if you wish to start this final test.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.30.settings.event.26.name: Vagabond
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.30.settings.event.28.message: That I would see the day a Seeker would best me in combat...
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.30.settings.event.30.message: It was a good fight. One you can be proud of.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.30.settings.event.32.message: You have earned the Mark of Mastery and with it, the \c[3]Meteor Shade\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/dojo-bo.entities.30.settings.event.33.message: Now walk through the door behind me and speak to the ones that came before to receive your prize.
Noooooo!\. It's instanced!\. I don't want to do this myself!!
Good luck with the final trial, Spheromancer Lea!
Oh it's instanced. I guess we're on our own for the final trial.
Huh. It's instanced. Good luck, Lea!

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
Your journey brought you to this
forest of the eternal night.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
Taking on the trials given 
by the creatures of these lands.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
You proved your vigor, your patience,
your agility, your insight.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
All the virtues to be held
by a true envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.13.text:
Take this Shade to open 
the path through the northern caves.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.22.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.19.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Are you looking for hints on how to get the \c[3]Shade\c[0] of this area?
In that case, my grandmother should be able to help you!
You usually find her at the balcony at the very top.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Talk to the owner of this establishment to learn more about the shade of this area.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: You usually find her at the balcony at the very top.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: And did you talk to her?
Yeah, I know. She is old and it is a bit hard to understand her.
But she really does try to help.
Just go to the \c[3]south\c[0] from here. Walk \c[3]through the bamboo\c[0].
There is somebody there that will help you.
Uhm... Do you wonder why I didn't tell you right away?
Also... she's always so happy when she's able to help.
She doesn't get so much company these days, you see?
So... thank you for talking to her!
Just walk through the \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] south of the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] to find somebody.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Just go to the \c[3]south\c[0] from here. Walk \c[3]through the bamboo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: There is somebody there that will help you.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Ah! It seems you found what you have been looking for.
Ah... it seems you already found that person at the bonfire, didn't you?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.4.event.5: Good luck in passing his trials! I've heard quite the stories from other seekers.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.4.event.6: If you happen to be stuck.... maybe grandmother can help you?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.65.settings.npcStates.4.event.7: Or you know... she'd at least be happy to talk to you!
You find her around the balcony of the top-most floor.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.74.settings.dialog.1.text: Typical self-centered player if you ask me.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.74.settings.dialog.2.text: You'd think he would have seen me \c[3]with those big glasses\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.74.settings.dialog.2.event.3.me: You're looking for that weird dude?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.74.settings.dialog.2.event.5.me: He just ran past, even pushing me to the side.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.3.text: Can you stop the act already? I know this is not about the can.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.5.text: Why won't you simply admit it? You like to sit on tables.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.5.me: See? Now even this random player here agrees!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.6.me: She should just admit it, right?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.11.m: Look, there is nothing...\. wrong about sitting on tables.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.13.m: I mean sure... it's weird. But we're in a game. We're here to have fun.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.14.m: If sitting on tables is your idea of fun then more power to you!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.15.m: But for so many years... people always told me to not do it. That it's bad manners.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.16.m: Who cares, we're in CrossWorlds! This is a place to screw around and let loose!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.17.m: And I definitely never saw any player being banned for sitting on a table.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.19.m: Of course I am!\. Just admit it!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.28.m: Sitting on tables is the best!!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.33.m: Everyone! Sitting on tables is amazing!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.36.m: You see the world from a new angle!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.37.m: It will change your perspective on everything!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.38.m: Damn girl, that's some deep shit!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.45.m: Thank you so much, you two!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.46.m: Finally I was able to open up!!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.47.m: N-No, problem!\. You definitely seem more happy this way!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.49.m: I have to go now!\. I have to spread the message!!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.56.m: Oh dear, she really did a complete 180 there, didn't she?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.77.settings.dialog.6.event.64.m: I better have a look what she's up to now.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: This is the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0], a hostel built inside a house from the very beginnings of human activity on Planet Shadoon.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: If I can offer you a room, please let me know.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: ...Is what I would say if there was actually any room free...
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: I'm afraid, business is going up for us \c[3]Ling's\c[0] again.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.9: Which of course is nothing to be afraid of...
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.1: However, our very own 24-7 shop, as well as traders are at your disposable.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Your lot is pretty popular here these days, Seeker.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: I still remember when I left home to find luck in the big city, our Inn was almost done for.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Imagine my surprise when I got a letter from my mother telling me to return.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: Of course I could never refuse such a request. So my wife and I packed our things and moved here.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-01..entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: And we don't regret it! My wife still has some trouble getting used to our traditions, but she always wanted to live somewhere calm and peaceful.

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.51.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Weapon best quality of Shad but now foremost we produce for human being.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.0.text: How is your chest hunting going?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.2.text: But I heard of a hidden path east of here.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.4.text: Some \c[3]player with the lab coat skin\c[0] walked by, mumbling about it and stuff.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.4.event.3.me: What's up, wanna know about that path too?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.4.event.5.me: It's somewhere in the eastern cavern system if I understood correctly.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.4.event.6.me: He said something about using Electricity to charge some bots.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-equ.entities.78.settings.dialog.4.event.7.me: Not sure what he meant by that.

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-ite.entities.14.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Shop.\. It has the thing you buy.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-ite.entities.17.settings.dialog.0.text: So, found anything useful in here?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-ite.entities.17.settings.dialog.2.text: And this strange device in one of the storage room upstairs.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-ite.entities.17.settings.dialog.3.text: But it really didn't do anything.

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Didn't leave the book on accident.
Sensed something good in you. Also found my drill.
Feeling you're ready for its true power.
Need to find 5 Stones first. Called \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0].
Rumor says each major settlement holds them.
Gotta work if ya want something good, aye?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Need to find 5 Stones first. Called \c[3]Origin Stones\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Rumor says each major settlement holds them.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.1.event.6: Gotta work if ya want something good, aye?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Good. Now find an old friend of mine.
Only one I know who can combine the stones.
Very old, not sure if he's still alive.
Should be in a cave somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Find an old friend of mine.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Only one I know who can combine the stones.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.3.event.5: Very old, not sure if he's still alive.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.3.event.8: Should be in a cave somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.53.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: You're back. Old geezer still got the spark in him.
Alright, take a step back, then put the stone and drill in front of you, will ya?
Thanks for giving me the chance to be of use one last time.
Don't worry, all will be well. Now let's begin.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Baxton
Lady Lea!
It's my pleasure to meet you again.
Albeit it being for rather unpleasant reasons...
Why?
As you might remember from the last time our paths intertwined, I was following a suspicious player.
He has been quiet for a few days, but just hours ago another report was made.
A player with a lab coat and large glasses was seen in this room asking other players for help.
I must find this individual. Only once I see him can I check his account, I'm afraid.
It is quite possible this man is trying to find a way to breach our security systems.
How?
Maybe by finding a weakness in one the sub-systems used in CrossWorlds.
Which must be the reason he is asking players to complete seemingly mundane tasks.
And there are also these odd probes. He managed to smuggle objects into the game that are obviously not allowed.
Lady Lea, would you be willing to participate in my hunt for this perpetrator?
[nods]
Thank you, Lady Lea! This matter is of utmost importance.
Let us split the work load. I will analyze reports that just came.
Please, check every \c[3]Landmark in \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].
Henry might have done something to them, judging from my previous reports.
Don't bother with the ones you've already unlocked.
Once you are finished, please meet me here.
[nods]
This is indeed troublesome.
How did a player manage to get a foreign object into the game?
Something just feels... wrong here.
For now help this Baxton. I will try to help on my end.
[shakes head]
I understand. A player should enjoy the game and not embark in moderation tasks.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Let us split the work load. I will analyze reports that just came.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Please, check every \c[3]Landmark in \v[area.forest.name]\c[0]. Previous reports suggest "Henry" was checking each one.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Once you are finished, please meet me here.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Baxton
Lady Lea, I can see you've unlocked all of the landmarks!
[nods]
Splendid work!
Now let's see... I can use a terminal to cross-reference your data, Lady Lea.
Baxton
Blimey, I can't see anything strange...
Nothing wrong with the landmarks, that is quite a relief.
Enemy data and collection properties are all in order.
The quests given by this Henry person were legitimate as far as I can see.
Wait... There is something here...
Some kind of outgoing link?
Let's see what happens if we block the pathways...
Baxton
Henry
W-w-well, well. I guess my cover is officially b-b-broken.
Lady Lea, is this the the man I am looking for?
[nods]
Sir, it came to our attention that you might be involved in unauthorized activities.
Additionally hacking a moderation terminal is against CrossWorlds Policy.
I regret to inform you that we will have to suspend your account for an indeterminate amount of time.
T-T-Try and stop m-me but y-y-you won't catch m-me!
Baxton
Well, that is quite unexpected. I will just have to disconnect him from this terminal then.
Let's see here...
This is impossible!
I can't find the user. It's as if he does not exist!
This should be simply impossible, lady Lea.
Either this fiend breached our security system quite severely or...
...or he's not an Avatar!
...How?
Lady Lea, we MUST find him.
According to the logs he is still in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
We have to collect clues as to where he is hiding.
Maybe some of the players in this area know something.
I will search the surrounding regions, from here.
Please see if you can find out anything from the players here in the Cave Inn.
[nods]
Lea, this is a very serious situation.
I cannot find this user either and impersonating an Avatar just sounds too far fetched.
Help Baxton, I will see what I can do on my end.
[nods]
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: I will search the surrounding regions, from here.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Please see if you can find out anything from the players here in the Cave Inn.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.3.event.4: Listen to their conversations, maybe they saw something. Anything helps.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Baxton
Hello, Lady Lea. Have you found anything new?
[nods]
Wonderful! What can you tell me?
How?
Why by using words, Lady Lea. Is something the matter?
Lea...
[shakes head]
Ah! I see what is bothering you, dear Lea.
Your speech module must be malfunctioning, is that it?
[nods]
I'm terribly sorry to hear that. What a cumbersome circumstance, indeed...
However, am I right to assume you are able to track our perpetrator?
[nods]
This will do then!
You go on ahead and find him, I will follow you by using our tracking system.
Lea, I have found out more about Henry.
It seems he is part of an organization called \c[3]ISHO\c[0].
Information about them is scarce but they seem to be involved in various hacking activities.
You had better hurry, this might get dangerous.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.63.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: You go on ahead and find him, I will follow you by using our tracking-system.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.91.settings.condAnims.0.interac: Did Henry build these probes here?
It would explain why we cannot find the object in the database.
Oh hello, can I help you?
Yes, hello again. Now, state your business, I'm very busy you know.
Wait, are you saying you found the blueprint I'm looking for?
Give it to me, quick now!
So if I have these materials, I can just put them together...
It says here all the parts are hidden by the creator of the blueprint.
If you find these materials for me, I will build the best shoes you will ever wear.
Let's set this up as a regular trade.
Talk to me to look at the required materials.
Finally I can find a new project.
Now, leave me. My creator-mind needs solitude!
Leave me, Seeker. My creator-mind needs solitude!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.146.settings.dialog.0.text: My Research said the blueprint was somewhere here...
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.146.settings.dialog.1.text: If I would find it, I could complete my dream of crafting the best Geta ever.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.188.settings.dialog.0.text: Grandpa's Armor is still shiny as ever.
Oh, i-its alright! You just startled me a bit.
I only recently moved here with my lovely husband Paro.
I'm still getting used to his families traditions...
One of which is praying for a good day at least once per day.
They said I don't have to do this, as they respect where I'm coming from...
B-But how can I do that when they are all such nice people?
A-Anyway, I hope it is okay if I return to my prayer for now.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.194.settings.dialog.3.text: Well, yes... \.\.\. I want to make sure that I get it right.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.194.settings.dialog.4.text: Aww, Jenni you sweet thing. Don't worry so much, you're doing great!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.194.settings.dialog.6.text: Alright, I'll leave you to it. But don't overdo it, okay?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.195.settings.dialog.1.text: Which reminds me... \.\.\. where is Jing?
I kinda don't wanna talk right now, if that's cool.
My Parents are annoying as is. I can't deal with Seekers right now.

assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: I hope you can enjoy your stay at our humble establishment.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: We \c[3]Lings\c[0] take pride in our Inn.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: If you like, you can also meet my dear mother, who owns it.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Did you find time to talk to my mother?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: She was not always like this.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.6: When my younger brother disappeared into the depths of the bamboo thickets, she became that way...\.\.\. over time.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.8: She never gave up the search and after a while... she started talking in riddles.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.9: At one point she even claimed my brother returned as "the protector of the ridge".
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/inn-og-.entities.22.settings.npcStates.1.event.1: I think this loss was just to hard on her.

Spheromancer Lea! Congratulations on passing the final trial.
And as expected, both Spheromancers passed first!
Spheromancer Lea, what a coincidence! It looks like we both just passed the final trial!
All that sword fighting is hard to handle for a mage class.
Oh! I see Apollo is here as well?
Did you two just finish the quest as well?
You know...\. a mage versus a samurai...\. you can imagine how that goes.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.43.message: Phew, that guy sure was fast.
Polly! You're here, too? And here I thought you finished that quest already.
We just keep running into each other...
Ah I see. You've been doing that quest with Lea, Polly?
Uhm... I thought you were busy today?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.68.message: Or...\. was he just a Samurai?\. I'm not sure...
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.69.message: Maybe his armor just made him kinda... look like a bug?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.73.message: Well actually...\. traditional samurai armor is already bug-inspired,\. so...\.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.85.message: Did we all just pass this quest at the same time?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.89.message: That certainly was the worst quest ever!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.90.message: And it's DONE!\. Done and over with!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.315.settings.event.92.message: Now, the time has come to collect our reward!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.25.message: Uhm...\. did we just...\. complete the game?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.33.message: We completed the track and now can enter \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.34.message: It means we reached the \c[3]end game\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.37.message: Yes... and Instatainment is working on it apparently.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.38.message: People are hoping for an update that will complete the Track.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.39.message: So... you're telling me CrossWorlds is still in \c[3]early access\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.42.message: Complete gaming experiences really have become rare these days.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.43.message: You know, at least it's all coherent with the lore.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.44.message: Humankind simply has yet to unlock the final part of the track.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.45.message: And it will happen if enough Seekers run the track.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.56.message: Lea, that means Grand Krys'kajo was pretty much our last dungeon race, non?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.58.message: So not counting that tutorial dungeon, we had 5 runs in total.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.59.message: And the final score of Lea versus Emilie is...
Man, you really had the upper hand, didn't you?
And here I thought I'd have a chance after I won the tutorial dungeon.
Oui, oui! Pentafists are known for speed, non?
Still, you've been an honorable opponent, Lea!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.61.message: Well... it certainly was a lot of fun to do those races!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.62.message: Let's continue once new dungeons are added!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.67.message: So... anyone want to check out Rhombus Square?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.69.message: Sure, why not! Where do we have to go?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.72.message: Back to \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], then take the \c[3]south exit\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.74.message: I honestly just want to get out of this bug infested place, so I'll go ahead!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.98.message: We did it Lea! We got the last Shade!
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.100.message: That means we can also access the northern part of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
