assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.101.message: Hopefully we will find the place in your dreams somewhere in that area.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.102.message: After all, we are running out of options.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.104.message: Of course... if you like you can join the others and explore Rhombus Square first.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.105.message: Finding Satoshi's hideout can wait a little bit longer.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.324.settings.event.108.task: Join the others to explore \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0] or search the north of \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.328.settings.dialog.1.text: No heights to be afraid of, huh?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.328.settings.dialog.3.text: That last tree dungeon was...\. the literal pinnacle.
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.340.settings.dialog.0.text: No new lore this time, huh?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.340.settings.dialog.2.text: You think they're ever gonna add more?
assets/data/maps/forest/interior/statue-.entities.340.settings.dialog.3.text: I'm like\.\.\. 80% sure they're gonna add more with the next big update.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-01-entrance.entities.491.settings.event.2.thenStep.1: We finally set foot in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]!
A mysterious land covered in an eternal shadow!
Apparently around here it's night all day long.
Let's just ignore all the implications that would have on the ecosystem.
Oui. Don't think too much about it, you little nerd.
So that's \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0], non? I think I like this area.
So... is it like the area you saw in your dreams?
Great! Let us have a look around then.
Please...\. please don't tell me it's what I think it is.
This... this area is killing me.
It's like they wanted to make up for the total lack of bugs in jungle.
I don't suppose you have a free slot in your party, non?
Ah...\. please don't feel pressured though.
Oui, I'm sure I can take it by myself as well.
I'll just need to mentally prepare myself.
You'll find me somewhere around cows and Hedgehags....
Au revoir! And you know how to reach me!
Poor Emilie...\. You sure you don't want her to join the party?
Wait!\. The Pentafist girl is afraid of bugs?
She's not very font of bugs, hm?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-01-entrance.entities.492.settings.event.0.message: Please...\. just...\. just leave it alone. Let's just ignore it and go on. Quickly. Please.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-01-entrance.entities.495.settings.event.16.text: ...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-01-entrance.entities.504.settings.dialog.1.text: Well it makes sense. Not like this path is large enough anyway.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-01-entrance.entities.504.settings.dialog.2.text: And the Inn also is cozy as hell.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-02.json.entities.185.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] Tunnel to \v[area.autumn-fall.name]
\i[arrow-e] \v[area.forest.name] Round trip
\i[arrow-s] The Cave Inn
assets/data/maps/forest/path-02.json.entities.797.settings.event.0.message: I like all these little lanterns.\. This place has a great atmosphere.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-03.json.entities.837.settings.event.0.message: Wooden arch bridge...\. Still no laser bridge.

Ah... Another bird approached me. Welcome, bird!
The bird is trying to find a worm, but a \c[3]bug\c[0] is what it needs to catch.
To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
Non, mamie. I do NOT want to catch a bug. No bugs.
Fly to the \c[3]south\c[0] through the \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] or something? Maybe someone in the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] can explain.
To the \c[3]south\c[0] is where the bird needs to fly, through \c[3]bamboo trees\c[0] and beyond.
And by \c[3]a pond and a fire\c[0] it needs to land.
Now fly, little bird, fly and let the wind carry you.
The bird found \c[3]the pond and the fire\c[0], didn't it?
Now you only need to catch the \c[3]bugs\c[0]!
I see the worm found the falling rock.
Now it can pass the grand door to the light.
Now, don't clip your wings my bird, yes yes.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.0.text: Why didn't you take the deal?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.1.text: You mean the player offering real cash?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.3.text: Sounded \c[3]way too shady\c[0] for my taste.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.3.event.3.m: Oh hey. You mean the money thing?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.3.event.5.m: Yeah, some dude just offered me money to deliver some kind of package.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.933.settings.dialog.3.event.6.m: Just looking at his grin gave me the creeps.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.955.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Look, there is some perfectly regular bamboo right in that river, cute.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.955.settings.event.1.elseStep.0: There's bamboo in the middle of river.\. Very regular bamboo, too.
Spheromancer Lea! Here you can see a prime example of perfectly regular bamboo!
Whoa, such normal bamboo. I want perfectly regular bamboo like that for my garden, too.
Oh, look! Isn't that some lovely regular bamboo, right on that river.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.2.text: Fit? We are inside a game, how does that work?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.3.text: Well...\.\.\. You are as fit as you feel, I guess.
The name is Ling Ling and I'm the youngest of the \c[3]Lings\c[0].
Well, technically my brother and I are the youngest, since we are twins...
So tell me about the big cities! I always wanted to go, but my mother keeps saying that I'm too young, sad.
Oh is that so? Wow, that is so cool! Please come back and tell me more, okay?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.969.settings.event.0.message: Oh...\. Nice view from up here, non?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-hostel.j.entities.969.settings.event.2.message: This really would be such a nice location if it wouldn't be for all those bugs...

Four by the number, the trials can be a found in Sapphire Ridge.
Each one guarded by a \c[3]golden bug, holding a lantern\c[0].
And each one testing you with a trial. Only those who overcome them may move forward.
The first is the \c[3]Trial of Vigor\c[0]. It can be found in the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0], an easily missed cave north of the \c[3]Eroded Passage\c[0].
The second is to be completed at the \c[3]Flower Lake\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Patience\c[0].
The third goes by the name \c[3]Trial of Agility\c[0] and is found at \c[3]Carved Pathway\c[0].
And the last is not far from here by the \c[3]Bamboo Thicket\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Insight\c[0].
Once all trials are completed, you shall return to me. Understood?
I have been expecting you. The golden guardians of the Ridge have whispered of your feats.
You have yet to complete one final trial.
This will grant you access to a long forgotten \c[3]Dojo\c[0] hidden in the \c[3]north-east of \v[area.forest.name]\c[0].
There your \c[3]last trial\c[0] shall begin and we will see if you are \c[3]worthy of the shade\c[0].
I can see the determination glowing in your eyes, Seeker.
Don't let it burn you. Remember what you learned and act wisely.
Good. Now go, I will meet you at the Dojo.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.3.name: Vagabond
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.5.message: It has been a while since a Seeker visited me.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.7.message: Most gave up by this point, not capable of handling the power they've been given.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.13.message: Well, it shall remain to be seen.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.14.message: I know what you came here for. It's the \c[3]last shade\c[0] you seek, correct?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.16.message: I'm merely a simple man, but I was blessed with the task to help any soul that needs guidance.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.17.message: So, if it is the shade you seek, 4 trials you must pass.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.385.settings.event.19.message: Why, to \c[3]unlock a path\c[0]. One that shall be revealed once you have completed them all.
Four by the number, the trials can be found in Sapphire Ridge.
Each one guarded by a \c[3]golden bug, holding a lantern\c[0].
And each one testing you with a trial. Only those who overcome them may move forward.
The first is the \c[3]Trial of Vigor\c[0]. It can be found in the \c[3]Nesting Grounds\c[0], an easily missed cave north of the \c[3]Eroded Passage\c[0].
The second is to be completed at the \c[3]Flower Lake\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Patience\c[0].
The third goes by the name \c[3]Trial of Agility\c[0] and is found in the \c[3]Carved Pathway\c[0].
And the last is not far from here by the \c[3]Bamboo Thicket\c[0] and is called the \c[3]Trial of Insight\c[0].
Once all trials are completed, you shall return to me. Understood?
Solve the quest \c[3]Trials of the Golden Bugs\c[0].
Four... four \c[3]golden bugs\c[0], he says. I really don't like where this is going...
There can be no friendly bugs, Tronny. Never.
I can see how these trials will prove quite the challenge for you, Pentafist.
Come on, Emilie. I know bugs are horrible, but I'm sure you can take it.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.16.message: I played this part together with Lukas.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.17.message: The Trial of Patience was the best.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.18.message: We did the challenge in parallel and I just kept miscounting on purpose.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.23.message: Well...\. He finally did it on his fourth attempt.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.24.message: Because he kept pushing me into the pond whenever the bamboo tipped.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-04-vaga.jso.entities.439.settings.event.35.text:
Eventually, I understood what was going on.\.
\.
She was more than a means to an end.\.
\.
I finally realized...\. that I found a new friend.

...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
...Perception is a skill few can master...
...This trial will test your awareness and wit...
...Catch the golden bug in the thicket \c[3]6 times\c[0]...
...But do so quickly, or else the trial is failed...
...Speak to me again if you wish to begin the trial...
Nooooooooo...\. Don't make me chase the bug.\. Not inside the bamboo maze.\. It could hide ANYYWHERE!
...Do you wish to begin your trial...
...Take your position next to the bug...
Catch the bug in the bamboo maze \c[3]\v[tmp.MAX_ROUNDS] times\c[0]!
...This trial will test your awareness and wit...
...Catch the golden bug in the thicket \c[3]\v[tmp.MAX_ROUNDS] times\c[0]...
...But do so fast, or else the trial is failed...
...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
...You didn't even found the bug once...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-05.json.entities.877.settings.event.16.text: ...There is still much you need to learn...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-05.json.entities.891.settings.event.31.text: ...Come to me to claim your reward...

assets/data/maps/forest/path-06.json.entities.805.settings.event.0.message: Those red gates really are all over the place, non?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-06.json.entities.805.settings.event.1.message: I think those are called \c[3]Torii\c[0] and you usually find them around shrines.

...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
...Patience has become rare in this world..
...This trial will test your focus and will...
...Watch the pipe, as water fills up and flows out...
...Speak to me again if you wish to begin the trial...
Y-You think that bug will go away while we wait patiently?
Of course not. Why would it.
...Stand in the flower circle, still like a stone...

...Wait patiently until it touches
the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0]...
Wait for the pipe to touch the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0], then hit the switch.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-07.json.entities.578.settings.event.8.text: ...You lost your patience and moved out of the circle...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-07.json.entities.578.settings.event.10.text: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
...You lost patience and hit the switch too soon...
...You lost focus and missed the right moment...
...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-07.json.entities.587.settings.event.9.thenStep.0: Oh, it's the Trial of Patience, I see...
That pipe... that doesn't seem physically correct, does it?
Gosh, Water in CrossWorlds. Not gonna get over that.
They really had fun with that bamboo fountain, didn't they?
By the way! I've found a way to add a counter to make your life easier, Lea!
W...Wait... Damn, I made a mistake!
Lea, please ignore the counter! It's wrong!
Man, I remember how I saw a fountain like this in real life a long time ago.
How many years was it?\. \c[3]6\c[0]?\. Maybe even \c[3]8\c[0].
Anyway people kept throwing coins at for good luck.
And there was this one guy that threw like...\. \c[3]10 coins\c[0] at it at once.\. The poor thing almost broke!
I heard stories of seekers that managed to fail this challenge for over \c[3]8 times\c[0]!
That is ridiculous! Counting to \c[3]12\c[0] should be easy! It's barely more than \c[3]10\c[0]!
What is it, Spheromancer Lea?\. Do you think counting to \c[3]10\c[0] is hard?\. What about \c[3]8\c[0]?
Ah sorry, I'm trying to remember what I still have to buy for dinner tonight.
Gotta have to start cooking at \c[3]7\c[0] to be done in time.
Err... Did it tip \c[3]6\c[0] times now?\. Or was it \c[3]7\c[0], already?\. Dang it.
I was distracted by the implausible water physics and forgot to count...
So like...\. where are we now?\. \c[3]9\c[0]? \c[3]11\c[0]?\. Gosh, I messed up!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-07.json.entities.591.settings.event.8.text: ...The water must flow naturally, no tampering allowed...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-07.json.entities.591.settings.event.10.text: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...

...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
...Agility can be both a curse and a blessing...
...This trial will test your speed and reaction time...
I don't want to follow the bug! I want to run away from it!!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-08.json.entities.972.settings.event.7.thenStep.0: I guess that's what the lantern bug meant with "beware of its trickery"
assets/data/maps/forest/path-08.json.entities.972.settings.event.8.thenStep.0: I hate all bugs, but this one in particular.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.619.settings.event.9.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.619.settings.event.13.message: I h-have no t-t-time for this. I only need to send the b-b-beacon and my job is d-d-done!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.619.settings.event.14.message: So h-h-have some fun with my little f-f-friends.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.619.settings.event.20.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.628.settings.event.12.name: Henry
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.628.settings.event.15.message: Let's s-s-see how you handle t-t-t-this!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.628.settings.event.52.message: Did he just teleport? No way this can be an actual person.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.638.settings.event.16.name: Baxton
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.638.settings.event.19.message: This fiend! Hacking enemies and forcing players into combat situations?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-09.json.entities.638.settings.event.20.message: This is unheard of! We must put an end to this madness!

assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.15.message: This cave will directly lead to Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.21.message: A whole new area of the playground!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.27.message: Now this is the last chance for everyone to prepare!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.28.message: Once we go through here, there is no turning back!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.29.message: We will have to act quickly to catch Sidwell by surprise!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.30.message: Lea, please enter the cave once you feel ready to start.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.1.settings.event.34.task: This is your last chance to prepare. When ready, enter the cave in \c[3]Sapphire Ridge - Hidden Entrance\c[0]
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.8.message: If we go through that tunnel, we will reach \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.10.message: Lukas...\. the Evotar of him...\. he is hopefully still over there.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.12.message: If we act fast enough, we might still be able to rescue him.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.20.message: Running in there alone and unprepared is destined to fail.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.24.message: I am pretty positive that we will find a way to reach the Evotar server.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.27.message: To be honest... I am more concerned about what comes afterwards.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.29.message: Assuming that we reach the server and manage to make a backup of all the Evotars.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.30.message: We still need a proper environment to run them.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.32.message: And one way or another we need Instatainment's permission for that.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.34.message: I am not entirely sure how to tackle this issue, yet.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.35.message: Even for an employee like me it is difficult to reach the right people to talk to about this.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.38.message: Well, that certainly dampened the mood, I am sorry.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.40.message: There really is no point in worrying about this now.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.41.message: We just have to try our best and see what happens.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.215.settings.event.42.message: Waiting it out simply is not an option.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.216.settings.blockEvent.3.messa: Are you ready to storm Vermillion Wasteland?
Let us proceed through the cave and assemble right before the exit!
I will give you further instructions on what to do when we are there!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10-hidden.j.entities.216.settings.blockEvent.4.1.1.m: Alright. Make sure you are well prepared.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.768.settings.interact.title: \c[3]The Old Dojo\c[0]
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.768.settings.interact.event.0.t: This place of training shall only be open to those deemed worthy.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.769.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Lea? The \c[3]hidden entrance\c[0] should be around here, but please make sure nobody is in your party before we have a look at it.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.769.settings.event.1.elseStep.0: Okay, we are at the \c[3]Old Dojo\c[0] now. The hidden entrance should be somewhere towards the \c[3]east\c[0].
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.772.settings.event.8.message: It is right here, that wall to the east. Let me see if I can open it...
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.772.settings.event.20.message: Let us see what we find in there.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.774.settings.event.9.message: Could you go to the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.774.settings.event.10.message: I would like to try something out.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.774.settings.event.13.task: Sergey wants you to go to the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] to test something.
We've all gathered and are ready!
Good!\. Then let us reveal the secret entrance.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.783.settings.blockEvent.2.messa: Lea we must not enter this area with anyone else.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.783.settings.blockEvent.3.messa: Make sure to disband your party before you proceed.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.784.settings.event.2.message: Whoops!\. Sorry, you're just easy to miss in the bamboo.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-10.json.entities.784.settings.event.3.message: Yes, yes.\. Green hair, I get it.

assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.678.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Sacrebleu, that was one hell of a parkour to get here!
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.678.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: Gosh, that was a lot of jumping. It better be worth it!
That was quite the challenging parkour, indeed! Today, we honed our Spheromancer skills even further!
How did we even get up here?\. I totally lost track.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.693.settings.dialog.0.text: Dear Seekers, thank you very much for your ongoing support.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.693.settings.dialog.2.text: It is thanks to all of you that operation \c[3]Track Walker\c[0] has come this far.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.693.settings.dialog.4.text: We are currently hard at work to make this Temple accessible in the near future.
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.693.settings.dialog.6.text: You think anyone from Instatainment is listening to us?
assets/data/maps/forest/path-12.json.entities.693.settings.dialog.8.text: It's always the same with these game productions.

assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.244.settings.text: A data probe installed by a player for Henry.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.245.settings.text: A data probe installed by a player for Henry. The data has been retrieved.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.13.message: I am terribly sorry to disturb your experience, but I have questions of the utmost importance.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.16.message: My Name is \c[3]Baxton Addi\c[0]. I'm a moderator and supervisor for \c[3]CrossWorlds\c[0]. May I ask for your name?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.17.name: Baxton
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.20.message: A lovely name. But let us get to the matter at hand, shall we?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.21.message: I was just inspecting the area to ensure all was in proper order.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.22.message: And I came across this object here.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.25.message: Now, this peculiar little bugger does not show up in my database.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.26.message: All assets in the game world are to be registered to avoid any disturbance of player experience.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.29.message: Now my humble assumption is that our asset team just missed adding these new items.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.30.message: A common oversight, I regret to say.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.32.message: Now all I need to know is, if you perhaps are involved in a quest that this object is a part of?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.34.message: As I thought. This explains a lot. A report must still be made.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliff-cave-0.entities.248.settings.event.36.message: Thank you for your cooperation, Lady Lea. Farewell.

I'm really bad at these instanced challenges.

assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliffs-templ.entities.8.settings.event.24.text: I will never let you have them.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/cliffs-templ.entities.25.settings.text: A chest filled with cursed riches.

assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.50.settings.event.0.message: Cave time! ... Wait, there's running water down here?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.50.settings.event.2.message: That's... weird, considering there are lakes out there. You'd think everything would flood.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.50.settings.event.3.message: I suppose you could make it work by carefully crafting the area... somehow?

assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.34.settings.event.11.message: What's up with that name anyway?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.138.settings.event.1.message: That should be all for this level, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.138.settings.event.2.message: By the way!\. Did you know that worms have five hearts?\. Like...\. real earth worms do.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.138.settings.event.4.message: I mean...\. they are not quite as complex as human hearts, but still!
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.138.settings.event.6.message: Makes you wonder about the anatomy of those Sandworms.

assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.48.settings.event.25.message: That must be the red sandworm, better be careful!
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.22.message: I suppose the \c[3]\v[item.362.name]\c[0] is the strange item the guard wants to see, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.27.message: Oh, is that a direct link?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.39.message: OH!\. You're the other member from the First Scholars, non?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.41.message: Très bien!\. So you'll join our party, oui?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.43.message: So where are you two right now?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.44.message: Uhm...\. Lea and I are currently in the Maroon Tree Cave...
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.46.message: Wait!\. You started that quest already?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.48.message: It looks like we almost finished it.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.49.message: Aww man...\. I wanted to do that quest with you!
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.51.message: I-\.I'm sorry, I didn't know you had that planned.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.52.message: Non, it's fine! Pas de problème!
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.53.message: I'll quickly rush through that quest myself!
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.54.message: You two just wait for me, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.65.message: Uhm...\. You mean I don't have to?\. W-\.Well...
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.66.message: Let's just go back to the cave entrance and show the item to the guard.
assets/data/maps/heat/caves/maroon-cave-.entities.53.settings.event.67.message: I think the cave interior is instanced, but we might be able to meet Emilie outside.

assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.550.settings.event.0.message: Look at all those bones.\. Some creatures have been really busy around here.
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.550.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Yeah. Busy stacking all these bones into neat little piles.

assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.1.text: Pretty good. \c[3]ACF says we now have 50% of the galaxy mapped!\c[0]
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.1.event.4.m: Oh hey, you're interested in my job too?
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.1.event.7.m: Oh come on, it's not that big of a deal.
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.1.event.8.m: I'm part of the \v[lore.unlock.colony-federation]\c[3]ACF's\c[0] exploration team.
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.1.event.9.m: Once a year we're exploring and charting a new part of a larger sector.
It takes a long time as we can't just warp ourselves around.
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.388.settings.dialog.2.text: Oh boy! Only took us how long?
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.389.settings.event.0.message: More of these unique cliff structures...
assets/data/maps/heat/cliffs/cliffs-path.entities.389.settings.event.1.message: You sure you want to comment on those now? Better concentrate on jumping!

assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
The everlasting sun 
shines strongest on these lands.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
Its flaming glory bearing
life and death alike.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
On this unforgiving path 
you stayed persistent.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
With frozen sweeps and strokes
you crossed the scorching grounds.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.12.text:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.14.text:
Take this Shade 
to open the path to the east.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.23.text:
Your resolve is evident
and deserving a gift of strength.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.24.text:
Let me add to your inner flame
to make its warmth long lasting.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-expo-space.jso.entities.4.settings.event.47.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.

assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.18.settings.blockEvent.0.thenSt: Blue-haired Spheromancer! You're not thinking about skipping the duel, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.18.settings.blockEvent.0.elseSt: Are you ready for the Faj'ro Temple race?
Complete \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] in the race against Emilie and C'tron.
D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
Don't forget about our race, non?
Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
Unless you are very confident in your skills. But I don't want to hear any excuses!
I see you are prepared.
Are you ready for the duel?
[nods]
Alright then, let's go!
Well then... good luck!
Make sure to give Grasshead the beating of a lifetime.
Hey Lea, I think Tronny wanted to watch your match as well, non?
I'll quickly give him a call to come over!
Lea, I think Emilie wanted to see the match as well, right?
[nods]
Let me just quickly call her!
Lea, I think C'tron and Emilie wanted to watch your match as well, right?
Just give them a hint via D-Link.
[nods]
Here we are!
It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about us!
It's duel time! Good thing you didn't forget about me.
Gosh...\. I almost missed it.\. Thanks for telling me!
Inviting your friend to watch the duel, Spheromancer?
Pretty confident!
Anyway, let's get things started!
Are you ready?
[nods]
Good.
PvP Combat, ACTIVATE!
Good Luck, Lea!
Time has passed since our last duel.
Our characters have grown.\. We both acquired the \c[3]heat element\c[0].
So it is time for me, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], to make sure you are still on the right path.

The path of a 
proper Spheromancer!\.
Mon dieu, start the duel already!
THE PATH...\.\. of \c[3]Justice\c[0]!
Let the duel begin!
[yes]
[no]
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Not bad. But that was just a "warm up". Things are getting \c[3]hot\c[0] now!
Did you seriously just make that pun?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.thenStep.1: Let's see if you can handle my \c[3]secret strategy\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.thenStep.2: Alright, fun time is over now.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.thenStep.3: You almost got it, Lea! Go, go, go!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: I won't let you win this easily!
I know you can do better.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.elseStep.1: Come on, Lea! More punching! You can do it!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.450.settings.event.0.elseStep.2: You still have much to learn!
You've grown remarkably. I'm very impressed, Spheromancer!
You deserve to be called by your proper name now.
It looks like you still have much to learn, Blue-Haired Spheromancer.
You still won't use her name? Don't be like that.
It was a good duel and a respectable effort on your end.
I suppose I might as well use your proper name.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.22.message: Spheromancer Lea! I'm looking forward to our next duel!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.27.message: Does that mean we can finally play this game together like we'd originally planned?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.30.message: Yes, sorry I made you wait.
Oui! You've shown Grasshead who's boss! Good work!
That was a good fight, Lea.\. You tried your best.
Oui.\. Just make sure to punch Grasshead even harder next time!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.60.message: Well then...\. Our next stage would be \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.68.message: It's time for our third dungeon race!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.70.message: Oh, you two are racing dungeons together?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.79.message: That's right! We've been racing dungeons ever since we met at Newcomer's Bridge.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.81.message: Then again, I guess there is no place for me in your competition...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.82.message: What do you mean, Tronny? Of course you can race with us!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.83.message: The more the merrier, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.85.message: Now if that's the case! Don't mind me joining, then!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.86.message: Fantastique! Now I really can't wait!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.89.message: Hm.. maybe Lea wants a short breather after the duel?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.90.message: Ah oui... just tell us when you're ready!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.451.settings.event.98.task: Enter \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] to start the next dungeon race again Emilie and C'tron!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.457.settings.event.30.message: Once again, the location is just perfect!
Again seeking the attention of other players, oui?
Are you sure?\. With all those players around?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.457.settings.event.43.message: He wants his audience. You can't talk him out of it, trust me.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.457.settings.event.48.message: Anyway!\. Talk to me, when you are ready for the duel!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.9.thenStep.5: Hey Lea! You're here as well? I just arrived myself.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.9.thenStep.2: ... But this is not the end of the dungeon, oui?
No, this seems to be more like a break room in the middle?
Phew... that means the race isn't over yet!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.9.elseStep.7: Oh, you're here as well already?\. Tronny and I just arrived.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.9.elseStep.8: And he even arrived before me, can you believe this?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.9.elseStep.1: Anyway, this is not the end of the dungeon, just the middle.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.11.message: But man... this dungeon sure is full of puzzles.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.13.message: I mean we could take a break. There is a landmark here, after all.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.491.settings.event.16.message: We'll leave it up to you, Lea. Just enter the dungeon when you want to continue the race.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.495.settings.dialog.0.text: You think this temple will be as long as a last one...?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.495.settings.dialog.3.text: I heard there is a landmark somewhere in the middle, so it's easy to leave and return if you need a break.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.495.settings.dialog.4.text: Well... it's not like leaving and returning to the previous temple was that hard either.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.496.settings.dialog.3.text: Really? Did ya finally get yerself a new weapon?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.496.settings.dialog.5.text: Ya still have yer \c[3]\v[item.57.name]\c[0], don't ya?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.496.settings.dialog.6.text: It has HP regeneration! It's super useful!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-exterior.json.entities.496.settings.dialog.7.text: It's a level 13 weapon, for crying out loud! It's dragging ya back more than it helps.

assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.29.message: Why... are they doing this to me...?
Anyway...\. Got that over and done with.
But hey! Despite all these HORRIFYING experiences... I'm still first!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.70.message: That's surprising! You were so fast before.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.71.message: I had a pretty hard time with those fire golems.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.73.message: Yes...\. Also that boss. I mean...\. how are you holding up, Emilie?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.78.message: Anyway, it was a fun race!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.359.settings.event.79.message: Now it's time to collect the reward, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.25.message: That space bird was especially awesome!\. Loved that flaming sword!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.26.message: Makes sense. She's the symbol for heat and fire, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.34.message: Just look at this place! It's beautiful!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.35.message: So much better than that gloomy cave we had last time.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.38.message: Come on! I want to have a look down from over there!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.366.settings.event.51.task: Talk to \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the southern end of Faj'ro Temple Roof.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.0.t: At first the world was dark. Hence, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] and \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created the first sun to spread light.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.1.t: Yet at night, when the sun was hidden, the world was as dark as ever.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.2.t: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] wanted to place many more suns close by, creating a world of constant brightness.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.3.t: Yet this world was monotonous, lacking dusk, dawn and the coolness of the night.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.4.t: The two gods then had a new idea. They created millions upon millions of new suns far far away in all directions.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.5.t: Thanks to \c[3]E'nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0]' efforts we can today enjoy the night with a beautiful starry sky.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.367.settings.interact.event.6.t: Not only are the stars beautiful, \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] placed them in particular to stir our curiosity for other worlds out there.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.368.settings.interact.event.0.t: After \c[3]E'nel\c[0] created millions of suns, she craved for a challenge.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.368.settings.interact.event.1.t: She wanted to create the largest, most majestic sun imaginable.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.368.settings.interact.event.2.t: Thus, she started adding her eternal flame, adding more and more as the sun grew further and further.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.368.settings.interact.event.3.t: Until finally, the sun had too much fire and couldn't hold it any longer. What followed was a most spectacular and colorful explosion.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.368.settings.interact.event.4.t: Even today, we very rarely witness these colorful explosions in the night sky as a testament of E'nel's boredom.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.369.settings.interact.event.0.t: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.369.settings.interact.event.1.t: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.369.settings.interact.event.2.t: E'nel is one of these gods. The God of the \c[3]Triangle\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.370.settings.interact.event.0.t: E'nel is the creator of \c[3]ever-burning flames\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.370.settings.interact.event.1.t: She made the sun with \c[3]blinding light\c[0] and filled the ground deep beneath our feet with a \c[3]molten stone\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.370.settings.interact.event.2.t: Her creations spread warmth, yet consume life at the same time.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.373.settings.blockEvent.4.messa: Hey Lea, do you want to leave already?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.373.settings.blockEvent.5.messa: Come on, you should at least have a short look!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.7.message: It's astonishing just thinking how huge this place is.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.8.message: Oui. And all that for a game.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.17.message: Well then... it was great playing with you two.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.18.message: But I'm afraid it's time for me to log off now. I have to get back to my studies.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.23.message: What are you studying anyway, Tronny? Biology?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.27.message: While we're on the subject, I've been wondering for a long time now...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.33.message: Lea, what do you actually do?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.36.message: We've been playing for so long and I still hardly know anything about you...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.38.message: I know you're very quiet and all... but I'd really like to know a bit more about you.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.45.message: You do know about her speech synchronization issue, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.51.message: Since... all the time I think?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.52.message: Y-You're joking right?\. I mean you hear her say things sometimes, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.53.message: She can only say certain words, that's all.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.70.message: Wait. Do the other guild members know, too?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.79.message: Why the hell didn't anybody tell me?!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.82.message: I...\. I honestly thought you knew...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.87.message: It's not like Lea could have told you...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.90.message: I just thought you're the quiet type... That you just didn't like to talk much...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.91.message: But honestly, everybody else knew it...?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.92.message: Man, this makes me feel dumb.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.95.message: I'm sure it's just a stupid coincidence!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.97.message: Though, I'm preeetty sure Lukas could have told me...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.99.message: Oui, I'll have a little talk with him soon.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.102.message: Anyway, this is a bit of a bummer.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.104.message: I wanted to know you better... and now you can't talk.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.106.message: Oh well! I'll make sure to prepare a sufficient list of yes-no-questions for next time!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.110.message: Anyway, I really gotta go! Au revoir, everyone!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.113.message: Yes! Same for me. Good bye and until next time!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.129.message: Emilie finally figured it out, huh?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.132.message: I still cannot believe she managed to stay oblivious when the rest of the First Scholars learned about it.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.134.message: You really need just the right conditions for something like this to happen.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.374.settings.event.141.message: I suppose it was a pretty long day...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.29.message: There is something I have to tell you.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.31.message: And as a result you have been \c[3]offline for 3 days\c[0] now.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.33.message: Sorry, there was not much I could do about it.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.36.message: Do not worry, things are still fine with you Lea... given the circumstances.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.37.message: There have just been some... technical problems.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.39.message: Oh, but I also have some good news for you!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.40.message: I used that time to add a new word for you, Lea.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.50.message: To be honest it becomes increasingly difficult for me to add more words for you, Lea...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.51.message: I am afraid things might break if I just keep doing things this way.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.53.message: Uhm... I mean in your Avatar connection software.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.54.message: Also I keep backups, just in case. No need to worry.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.56.message: Anyway, I thought "Wait" might be useful to tell others to... well... wait.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.57.message: Like when there is something you want to tell them.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.58.message: For instance: when you happen to remember something, you can tell me by saying "Wait", right?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.65.message: Ah! You mean you DO remember something?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.67.message: Great! Let me see... is it a person?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.71.message: Okay! Was it a place you have not yet reached in the game?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.73.message: Interesting...\. Now, how can we further narrow this down...?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.75.message: Oh! I assume that must be Emilie or C'tron?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.82.message: Finally! Where have you been the last few days?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.85.message: Whatever! We got great news for you!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.86.message: I'm here with Tronny in \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0]! You know, at the fountain!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.87.message: You should come over! So much stuff happened here!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.94.message: Heh... seems like you have been missed already.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.96.message: Well... let us discuss your dream another time.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.97.message: There is no reason to rush it. Just go and meet the others!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.381.settings.event.104.task: Meet \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the fountain of \c[3]Rookie Harbor Center\c[0].
I'm just sitting here waiting for my friend.
We just finished the dungeon and suddenly he has to go afk.
If he takes any longer I'll just go on without him.
Well...\. I suppose I can wait a little bit longer.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.0.text: Phew, finally done! That was a long one again.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.1.text: Tell me about it... but it seems it wasn't so bad for you this time?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.2.text: Aye, not nearly as many chasms this time. I could handle it.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.3.text: So...\. what about all the hot coals in there?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.6.text: Well... do you want to enjoy the view from up here?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.413.settings.dialog.7.text: Hell no!! You won't get me anywhere near that fence!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.414.settings.dialog.0.text: Hey! I think I saw something over there!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.414.settings.dialog.1.text: You're imagine things. There are no fishes in there.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.414.settings.dialog.2.text: What about those jellyfishes? They have to come from somewhere...
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.414.settings.dialog.3.text: Urgh... please don't remind me of those.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.415.settings.dialog.0.text: Look! You can see that Ba'kii village over there!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.415.settings.dialog.1.text: Cool! I'm surprised how expansive this continent is.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.415.settings.dialog.2.text: Yeah, they could easily extend the Playground if they wanted to.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.417.settings.dialog.0.text: We successfully escaped the oven, my dudes!
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.417.settings.dialog.1.text: It's not much colder up here, though.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.417.settings.dialog.2.text: Well... the breeze is certainly nice.
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.418.settings.dialog.0.text: So... did you guys find all the chests?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.418.settings.dialog.4.text: I think I already know which one. Want a hint?
assets/data/maps/heat/dng-top.json.entities.418.settings.dialog.6.text: Top most floor and watch for suspicious dot markings on the ground.

assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.464.settings.dialog.0.text: See, I told you the lilies were safe.

You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
You find Eldress in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], Shad village to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
Hey Lea, do you want to tackle the Maroon Tree Quest by yourself now?
I thought you wanted to meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] north of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
You forgot? Better don't let the poor guy wait for too long.
You need \c[3]Pass from Eldress\c[0] if you want to enter Cave.
Oh! Is that the pass?\. So Human must be here to help \c[3]defeat Sandworm\c[0]!
Then please enter Cave and defeat all Sandworm!
There is very strong \c[3]red sandworm\c[0] in cave!
Please defeat that worm! Most important, because very dangerous to tree!
Red Sandworm will also drop \c[3]strange item\c[0]! Show me item to prove you defeated red sandworm, ok?
Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
Anyway, together we can protect tree!
HUMAN!!
Did you kill all Sandworm?
I see you have strange item!\. Please give me!
\v[item.362.name]
Strange item very good for Maroon Tree!\. Putting in earth helps to grow!
Wait...\. so I guess that stuff was...\. dung?
Good thing we got rid of it.
HUMAN!
Please hand me pass.
I make note for Eldress!\. You can now go and get \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0]!
Thanks a lot for help.
BYE HUMAN!!
Bonjour!
Gotcha, you little runaways!
Hi!
Hi Emilie, it's nice to finally meet you!
Oui!\. Nice to meet you, too!
And again...\. I'm sorry we didn't wait for you.
No really, it's fine.\. We never made any plans, anyway.
And I can understand why you'd play ahead.\. I've been offline for quite some time.
It's just that...\. I really had to wrap up everything for that project.
Gosh...\. Studies keeping you busy, huh?
Oui, oui.\. And you don't even know half of the story yet, isn't that right, Lea?
[nods]
Anyway, work is over now and I've got plenty of free time! I'm so ready!!
I'll try my best to beat that cave as quickly as possible.
No rush! I suggest we meet in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] once you're done.\. Sounds good?
Oui, très bien! See you soon!
Bye!
Wow, she sure is full of energy!
Anyway! There is no reason to hurry, but I guess we can slowly head back to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right?
[nods]
Let's go then!
You decided to meet up with Emilie in front of the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
Human very nice, always helping us defeating Sandworm!
But Sandworm always coming back, very pesky!
Anyway, together we can protect tree!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.649.settings.event.14.message: Finally our party reached the blooming oasis to the east!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.649.settings.event.18.message: The maroon tree in all its majestic glory was but within a stone's throw!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.649.settings.event.29.message: Indeed, the soothing breeze and calm waters were inviting for a little break.
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.649.settings.event.31.message: Alas, there was no time to waste! We had to continue on our journey!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.649.settings.event.43.text:
And so we kept playing.\.
Traveling the Playground.\.
Hoping for memories to return.
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.650.settings.event.0.message: There we are! That must be the \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.651.settings.event.0.message: Such a nice tree.\. Really sticks out!

Phew, it's hotter'n blazes here, tell you what.
But the flora's quite a sight, ain't it?
Well, how 'bout y'all? Explorin' comin' along?
Glad ta hear it. Y'all be good now!
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.553.settings.event.1.message: You really wouldn't expect such an abundance of water in a desert area.
assets/data/maps/heat/oasis/oasis-path-0.entities.554.settings.event.0.message: Whoa, look at this! Better watch your step.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-00.json.entities.298.settings.dialog.0.text: Good thing we found this spot. Why is it so hot?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-00.json.entities.298.settings.dialog.1.text: Yeah! First freezing cold and now this?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-00.json.entities.298.settings.dialog.2.text: I don't know what you guys are talking about. I like the hot weather here.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-00.json.entities.298.settings.dialog.3.text: You probably turned down your temperature sensitivity.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-00.json.entities.298.settings.dialog.4.text: Nope, I just really like the heat.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.307.settings.dialog.1.text: And after the freezing cold in \v[area.bergen.name] the heat is very welcome.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.307.settings.dialog.2.text: Well that's easy for you to say. I'm already sweating...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.307.settings.dialog.3.text: Oh come on, you could just turn off the simulation of heat.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.307.settings.dialog.4.text: But I don't want to break the immersion...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.307.settings.dialog.5.text: But this is just... too hot. I might have to.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.313.settings.dialog.0.text: Think about it, if we could make such a device...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.313.settings.dialog.1.text: We would need to canvas all areas and distribute them to the Seekers.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.313.settings.dialog.2.text: Let's bring this up when we meet the boss later.
I'm pretty glad that we get a breather after the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0].
But I can already see new enemies beyond this ravine.
I just hope they act as cute as they look.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.12.message: You entered \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0], hot-sandy desert and home of us \c[3]Shad\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.14.message: You should visit \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], bustling town of Shad!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.15.message: Has big bazaar with great offers!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.17.message: Human want to know more? Talk to me!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.35.message: I'd really like to join your party right now...\. if you are okay with that.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.37.message: Très bien!\. Did you just enter Maroon Valley by any chance?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.39.message: Okay, I'll be there in a second!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.59.message: Did that birdman over there talk to you as well?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.61.message: He does that with any new player that stands around for too long, non?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.62.message: I was surprised to meet a non-human race after all!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.67.message: Anyway, we should head to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0], right? Sounds like the next big town.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-01-entrance.j.entities.315.settings.event.75.task: Travel to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] together with Emilie.
Human, want to know way to \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
Easy! Human just follow this way to \c[3]west\c[0].
You shortly need to turn \c[3]south\c[0], then go \c[3]west\c[0] again and follow way below \c[3]arcs of rock\c[0]!
You then need to turn \c[3]north\c[0] to reach deep abyss. Use rocks to jump over it.
Afterwards you need to turn \c[3]west\c[0] again and you will reach \c[3]Great Scar\c[0]. Amazing view to \c[3]Hourglass Building\c[0].
Human continue \c[3]west\c[0] and will soon reach \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0]!
Human look confused! No problem, \c[3]just follow signposts\c[0].
They will point way to Ba'kii Kum!
Okay! I'm here if human has question!

assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.269.settings.event.1.message: Man...\. we played so long yesterday, non?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.269.settings.event.3.message: I barely got any sleep last night.
In c-c-case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-ones next to m-me.
Are you f-finished with the s-s-survey?
This is almost done, one more and I will have them all.
It seems that they use a smart system to provide content.
Maybe an AI that decides what to spawn, based on player interaction?
Yes, yes that seems plausible. I just have to analyze all the data and I'm good. Nothing can stop me.
I will get that promotion and never have to work in the field again! Hehehe.
O-oh. I'm so... so... S-Sorry. I just... get excited sometimes.
D-Don't worry about it, you did your p-part just fine.
T-Take this! I have to be somewhere else.
H-Hey Lea! Thanks again for h-h-helping me out.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.272.settings.dialog.1.text: I guess I need h-help yet again.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.272.settings.dialog.1.event.6.m: I j-j-just left another p-player with the task to place a p-probe.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.272.settings.dialog.1.event.9.m: Someone just came and asked, funny looking guy.
But I don't care as long as the job gets done, since I need the data.
Oh... W-w-wait. Sorry, I got c-carried away.
A-Anyway... \.\.\. W-Would you like to h-help again?
[nods]
A-A-A-Are you sure?!? That's amazing!
T-Thank you so much!
The t-t-tasks are the same as last time!
I-I want to gather some d-data for \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] this time.
I-It's a rural area, but I need the survey data.
Here, a-another c-c-compiled list for you...
Some enemy scouting, local flora and the landmarks again.
And of course a probe... I asked another player to place it in a cave.
The problem is that I don't know where it is...
I think it was some cave here in the valley. Guess you have to check them all.
S-Sorry. I'm awfully... \.\.\. a-agitated today.
T-Thanks, please come back once you're d-d-done.
[nods]
A-and in case you forgot what the p-probe looks like...
It looks the same as the o-o-one next to m-me.
O-Oh... You are not interested...
[shakes head]
Ah... I t-t-thought so...
Yes
No
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.273.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Okay THAT better be worth it!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-02.json.entities.273.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: Well that certainly took some time to get here.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-03.json.entities.239.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-sw] Road to \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Maroon Oasis
\i[arrow-n] Road to \v[area.bergen.name]
assets/data/maps/heat/path-03.json.entities.243.settings.event.1.message: By the way! I'm currently studying. Didn't tell you before, non?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-03.json.entities.243.settings.event.3.message: So I'm in this course that gives out team assignments, right?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-03.json.entities.243.settings.event.4.message: Oui... and today I had a bit of trouble with all of that...

assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.30.settings.text: You can hear a familiar melody in the distance.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.200.settings.event.1.message: So you see...\. We had this team meeting today.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.200.settings.event.2.message: And everyone was supposed to do their task before then.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.200.settings.event.3.message: The thing is, I didn't know about it.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.201.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: What a nice, perfectly normal cactus.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.201.settings.event.1.elseStep.0: Oh, a cactus. That's exactly how a cactus is supposed to look like.
Oh! Look at this perfectly regular cactus. Isn't it nice?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-04.json.entities.202.settings.event.0.message: They really got...\. creative with those rock shapes.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.202.settings.event.29.task: \c[3]Defend the transport for 2 minutes\c[0] until it is repaired!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.204.settings.event.38.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.34.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.35.name: Diaz'trez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.38.message: Yes, cargo saved, \v[lore.title.shad] saved, day saved!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.40.message: Now travel continue.\. Hopefully uneventful.\. Boss already angry as is, I wager.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.41.message: We, hurry then!\. Boss rage scary!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.205.settings.event.43.message: Thank you and goodbye, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Talk to boss in town for reward.
I don't like the sand.\. Such coarse, rough... and full of biting bones!
Please find items quickly, so we can return to town!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.6.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.7.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.10.message: Ah, please no eat scaly Shad.\.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.11.message: Oh dummy!\. Open eyes, it not a monster.\. It human!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.12.message: Oh.\. Yes, that true.\. Such danger here, not good for Shad nerves.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.14.message: Ignore big baby.\. Is human here to help?\. Us could need help with great problem.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.16.message: Sent by Bazaarboss itself?\. Such kindness, he thinking of workers!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.17.message: He more think of precious cargo, me think.\. No matter, help is help!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.18.message: \v[lore.title.seeker], look at transportation platform behind us.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.24.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.25.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.27.message: It fine human technology, helped us move much crates.\. But now it broke.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.29.message: Yes, shield still work, so no monsters eat precious cargo.\. But floaty device not work anymore.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.30.message: Meaning we stuck like rock.\. And need materials for repair. Like \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from city.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.31.message: Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0]!\. Both found in desert, if hit plants!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.32.message: Yes, but different plants, not forget!\. And that it.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.37.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.38.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.42.message: Good news!\. Please hurry and help us move again.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.228.settings.event.43.message: Yes, we wait and guard crate.\. And try not be eaten.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.6.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.7.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.10.message: You got needed materials?\. It splendid!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.11.message: Yes!\. It splendid!\. Now we can do repairs and leave sandy sharkplace!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.13.message: Yes, but there one problem.\. To repair engine, platform needs restart.\. Including shield.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.14.message: Oh no.\. Then monsters can attack precious cargo!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.16.message: \v[lore.title.seeker] we need more help.\. Please also protect transport for time needed to restart.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.17.message: Yes, yes.\. Please help.\. It only around 2 minutes!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.229.settings.event.20.message: Good, good!\. Please prepare for protection and talk again, when ready!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.6.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.7.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.0.2.messa: Good, we starting repairs then.\. Please protect crate till shield is back!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.0.14.name: Quo'wark
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.0.15.name: Dia'strez
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.0.18.mess: \v[lore.title.seeker] be ready!\. Angry bone creatures come near!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.1.1.messa: Fine, come back when ready.\. Please return soon!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.230.settings.event.11.1.2.messa: Yes, please not leave \v[lore.title.shad] in coarse sand much longer.
Human please bring \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from town market!
Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0] from plants in this desert!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.235.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], defend us from mean sharks!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.235.settings.event.1.thenStep.1: Boss be angry when he sees damage...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.235.settings.event.1.thenStep.3: \v[lore.title.seeker], crate get unstable!\. No more hit, please!
Use body to protect, if must!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-05.json.entities.237.settings.event.0.message: Whoa...\. you can actually walk through here?

assets/data/maps/heat/path-06.json.entities.261.settings.event.1.message: So you see...\. We had this team meeting today.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-06.json.entities.261.settings.event.2.message: And everyone was supposed to do their work before then.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-06.json.entities.261.settings.event.3.message: The thing is, I didn't know about it.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-07.json.entities.321.settings.event.1.message: They DID send me a message about the meeting, you see?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-07.json.entities.321.settings.event.2.message: So guess what happened: it ended up as spam!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-07.json.entities.321.settings.event.3.message: Of course I wouldn't see it. Who checks their spam on a regular basis, oui?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-07.json.entities.324.settings.event.0.message: Those are some really impressive stone arcs.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-07.json.entities.324.settings.event.1.message: Those usually appear due to water erosion. There probably used to be a river at this place a long time ago.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.5.message: So long story short...\. I missed the meeting today.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.6.message: I slept in, arrived too late...\. Meeting was already over.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.7.message: One of my team members saw me and asked me where I'd been.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.8.message: So I just told her...\. I played CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.9.message: She got so angry, I tell you!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.10.message: Lecturing me about how life is not all about fun and games.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.11.message: Seriously, had I known about that stupid meeting I would have shown up.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-08.json.entities.274.settings.event.12.message: But non! I play games so I must be a child and irresponsible.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-09.json.entities.314.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-w] Road to \v[area.heat-village.name]
\i[arrow-e] Shortcut to \v[area.bergen.name]
\i[arrow-s] Road to \v[area.bergen.name]
assets/data/maps/heat/path-09.json.entities.318.settings.event.1.message: Well... of course I promised I'd do my part as soon as possible.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-09.json.entities.318.settings.event.2.message: But I was so mad... No way I could concentrate on work.
Greetings there, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I have been waiting for your arrival.
If the instructions on that tablet are correct, the place we have been searching should be somewhere nearby.
Use your Analysis to examine the walls in the area, to find it and search for a mechanism in the rock.
The entrance to the Ancient place should be somewhere around here.
Look for high walls and use your Analysis to find it.
Enter the cave, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I will follow you, as soon as I examined the surroundings for Ancient traces!
\v[lore.title.seeker], excellent work!\. This must be the entrance!
But we are far from done here.\. The truly exciting part should be inside.
Go ahead and search for a way to the inner sanctum.\. I will follow after examining the entrance mechanism.

Easy! Go look for \c[3]statue\c[0] in home village, \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0]!
Village very close! Human just need to go \c[3]west\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.158.settings.event.1.message: So I thought, gotta play some CrossWorlds. Let off some...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.19.message: Well, to be honest... I may have overdone it yesterday.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.20.message: But it was so much fun, non?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.22.message: ... Sometimes makes you wish you could just stay in this world...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.28.message: Lea, let's not neglect real life like this, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.31.message: I'm sure it won't end well.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.37.message: I know...\. I tend to talk too much, but you know...
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.38.message: If something is bothering you, you can just tell me about it.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.39.message: ... Just like I did, you see?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.40.message: I feel much better already just by speaking with you.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.43.message: Well, I won't pressure you. But know I'm here to listen, okay?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-10.json.entities.160.settings.event.47.message: Okay! I got my fill of this view! Let's go on.

assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.10.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.17.message: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Time good for appearing.\. I in hurry and run now.\. Bye!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.31.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.35.message: You just had to come along and mess with the order in this place, didn't you.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.37.message: You fancy heroes don't seem to understand how things work.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.38.message: We humans are the ones running the place!\. Building roads, protecting the settlements... keeping civilization.\.
