assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.40.message: We should just take what we need.\. And you won't stop me, \v[lore.title.seeker] or not!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.446.settings.event.45.message: Let me teach you some rules of the world I kept running.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.448.settings.dialog.0.text: Come on, be a good, simple citizen and pay the toll. It is needed for your protection.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.448.settings.dialog.1.text: But human guard. Taxes get paid and rest trademoney is needed for life.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.448.settings.dialog.2.text: We need that money to properly keep the peace you need for your profitable business. So just pay up.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.448.settings.dialog.3.text: This not justice. Not fair. Such scandal!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.448.settings.dialog.4.text: I am justified to \c[5]take it by force\c[0]. Don't make me repeat myself!
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.451.settings.event.10.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.451.settings.event.12.message: You... you sure learned some fancy tricks at \v[lore.title.seeker]-academy, eh?
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.451.settings.event.14.message: Well... as for us old-fashioned guards... we only learned to uphold justice and honesty.
assets/data/maps/heat/path-11.json.entities.451.settings.event.16.message: But we also deal with a lot of shady trickery, so\..\..\..
I already introduced myself before, right?
Well... I know \c[3]C'tron\c[0] is a bit strange. You can also call me \c[3]Toby\c[0] if you like.
Or \c[3]Tronny\c[0]. That's what all the guild members call me.
Drat! You can't speak! I forgot again!
I'm so sorry. I tend to be a bit of an airhead sometimes.
Too bad, I didn't have the chance to meet her yet.
Did you already finish that \c[3]Maroon Tree Quest\c[0]?
So how about we do that quest together? Sounds good?
I-I mean...\. of course there is no reason to rush.
We could do a couple other quests first or just explore.\. Whatever you prefer.
You and C'tron decided to explore Maroon Valley and solve the \c[3]Maroon Tree Defender\c[0] quest together.

assets/data/maps/heat/special/cursed-tem.entities.2.settings.event.25.text: I will never let you have them.

assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.33.settings.event.8.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.33.settings.event.11.message: You even saw through my holographic hidden entrance?\. Truly you \v[lore.title.seeker]s are something else.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.33.settings.event.13.message: But this will be the end of the line for you.\. No one will beat me, when I am this well prepared.\.\. Behold...!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.33.settings.event.43.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.12.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.15.message: D-damn it.\. All those preparations... done for nothing.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.28.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.30.name: Zaida
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.31.message: You are coming with me, traitor!\. You are a stain on the honor of the Ba'kii Guard!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.33.message: Ah, hello Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You have done well in apprehending him.\. Now we will bring him to justice.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.34.message: What, you?\. I was your superior and that is how you show your respect?
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.35.message: I am a guard of \v[area.heat-village.name] and sworn to protect shad- and humankind from evil.\. Like you, traitor.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.36.message: I see...\. the guard truly has become soft.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.40.name: Billston
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.42.name: Zaida
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.45.message: ...don't think you've seen the last of me!\. My human ingenuity will always find a way!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.48.message: We will see about that.\. For now you're under arrest.\. Now move it!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/guards-bil.entities.61.settings.event.49.message: Yes, yes.\. Whatever you say, officer.

assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.3.settings.interact.event.2.0.1: Thank you for deciding to use the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0], the ideal choice for mining, demolition, pest-control and passionate festivities!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.3.settings.interact.event.2.0.2: This highly-advanced machine is programmed to follow its user after activation and dispenses explosive devices (also known as \c[3]"bombs"\c[0]) after being hit with a \c[3]charged range attack\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.3.settings.interact.event.2.0.3: When reloading and generally not dispensing "bombs" it will try to evade the movements of its user with highly refined movement algorithms.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.3.settings.interact.event.2.0.4: It can be manually deactivated again at this console or it will automatically return to the idle-state when the user leaves the space of operation (for example: a cave).
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.3.settings.interact.event.2.0.5: WARNING: Keep stored in dry and cool locations. Should only be used by trained personnel. Keep far away from children and dogs.

assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.31.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker], we are still working on preparing the next expedition to the inside.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.31.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Our leader will tell you when we can continue.\. I can't wait for what lies beyond those sands!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.19.name: Hira
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.21.message: \v[lore.title.seeker], this is amazing!\. Surely the greatest discovery since the opening of the \v[area.heat-dng.name]!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.24.message: Yes, it might not look like much.\. In fact it gives an impression of being a dead-end.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.30.message: ... and the nature of the sand...\. it all hints to a hidden way into a deep sanctuary of Ancient nature.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.33.message: Yes, it is so very exciting!\. Now sadly...
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.35.message: ... the mechanism seems to be unusable to us right now.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.36.message: To find a way inside, we will need to examine this place and properly integrate it into Trackwalker.
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.38.message: Yes, this will take some time to finish.\. But we have already made great progress today.\. Amazing job, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
assets/data/maps/heat/special/heatadv-qu.entities.34.settings.event.40.message: You can now return to HQ and leave this to us.\. Send my regards to the leader, yes?

assets/data/maps/heat/test.json.entities.68.settings.event.19.task: \c[3]Defend the tree for 2 minutes\c[0] for the salve to take effect!
assets/data/maps/heat/test.json.entities.70.settings.event.7.text: Salve lost effect. The sickness returned!
assets/data/maps/heat/test.json.entities.70.settings.event.18.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again

assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f2/room-cold.j.entities.63.settings.event.60.text: Press \i[cold] to switch to \c[3]cold mode\c[0] at any time!

assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/boss.json.entities.25.settings.event.16.text:
You can use the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] to enter \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] and \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0]! 

Just travel to \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] and head \c[3]eastward\c[0]!

PS: The \c[3]shop in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]\c[0] has \c[3]new equipment\c[0]!

assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.8.message: Oh! So you've met those, too...
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.13.message: I want to strangle the person responsible for these enemies.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.16.message: By the way! The cold element is great, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.20.message: You could almost say it is.\..\..\. cool!
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.24.message: A-Anyway... It's refreshing to have it in this hot environment.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.25.message: To be honest, I was really craving some ice cream since we've been running through the desert.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.27.message: Oh~ Ice cream really would hit the spot right now!
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.28.message: It's too bad you can't just summon it with one of those cold skills.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.29.message: Man, how strange would that be?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.30.message: I'd enjoy throwing ice cream at those laser moths and seeing them SUFFER!
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.32.message: Gosh... you really do hate those moths, don't you?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.33.message: Very much. Anyway, let's wrap up this race.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/f4/corridor-ea.entities.30.settings.event.34.message: Yes! It shouldn't be much longer.

assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-01.json.entities.21.settings.event.1.message: Oui, oui! And take your time!

assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.8.message: Wait, why a D-Link?\. Isn't this a race?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.11.message: Anyway, I guess you both have already met the new foes of this dungeon, non?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.13.message: I don't care about the Jellyfish, Tronny.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.14.message: Moths.\. They added moths.\. And once again, they are \c[3]huge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.16.message: I hate bugs!\. And those things are close enough!
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.19.message: But didn't you know that moths play an important role in our ecosystem?
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.21.message: Pollinating flowers, food source for birds...
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.22.message: They are also a great indicator for the health of the environment!
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.23.message: To me they are only a great indicator for places I want to leave.
assets/data/maps/heat-dng/g/room-02-cros.entities.77.settings.event.24.message: In conclusion: Moths suck! Race continues now!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.34.settings.interact.hoverText: The rough gem in the west. Home to collectors and the Shad.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.34.settings.interact.title: - \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] -
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.578.settings.event.16.message: Here we are, that should be the village!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.578.settings.event.17.message: So...\. how about we go ahead and visit the major building now?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.578.settings.event.18.message: You know, to continue the plot and all.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.578.settings.event.21.task: Continue the plot within \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0] together with Emilie.
I mend big light panel you humans gave to Shad.
Much work but still grateful for gift.
I mend big light panel you humans gave to Shad.
Much work but still grateful for gift.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.586.settings.dialog.1.text: Well, I guess we head into the dungeon?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.586.settings.dialog.2.text: We could also do some quests. You decide.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.1.text: Yeah, that was one hell of an area.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.3.text: But look at this right here.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.4.text: I was told this was like an urban village for these Shad or whatever.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.5.text: Looks like they're pretty advanced after all. I mean this is a solar farm, right?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.6.text: I think this was built by humans.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.7.text: At least a friend told me there's some kind of relationship going on between humans and Shad.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.589.settings.dialog.8.text: Oh, that makes more sense... I guess.
Helps to protect Shad and humans from hard desert.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.597.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Ooh, look at this, Lea. It's a solar farm!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.597.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: I read about this. It's built by the humans to help the Shad.
Anything wrong?\. I'm just sitting here.
Dourk
Anything wrong?\. I'm just sitting here.
Hi!
C-crimes in the bazaar?\. What are you talking about?\. I don't know anything!
So it was you on the communicator?\. Damn that Billston...
I thought someone as ruthless as him would at least be more careful.
He roped me into this, I swear!\. Told me about all the money, threatened me if I refused, all that!
"No one will care about it,"\. he said. "Those scaly idiots don't know how to handle the money anyway!"\. So much for that.
Well, time to come clean then, I suppose.\. At least I can bring down that jerk with me.
[nods]
Dourk
Billston
Well, well, well.\. Where might you lot be going?
Hi!
I knew something was wrong once I noticed my communicator missing.\. You \v[lore.title.seeker]s are a sneaky lot, hm?
Forget it, man!\. You messed up!\. This is over!
It is,\.\. r-\.right...?
Oh, for you it is.\. Me, though?\.\. I prepared something special just for moments like this!
Dourk
Billston
This will be the end of you and no one will ever know the truth!
D-dude, look where we are...\.\. this is madness!
Silence!\. These expensive preparations won't go to waste.\.\. And I'm out of here!
Bye!
Dourk
W-well... you know how to handle this, right?
[nods]
Good... so... I'll just be hiding around that corner.\. Good luck!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.22.name: Dourk
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.24.message: Well, that certainly was something!\. But leave it to a \v[lore.title.seeker] to save the day, eh?\. Hahahaha...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.26.message: Anyway, time to go on our ways, right?\.\. Bye!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.32.message: What...?\. After all we've been through?\. I was a victim as much as everyone here!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.34.message: ... Alright, alright... I will turn myself in.\. At least it's just across the street.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.49.name: Dourk
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-1.jso.entities.613.settings.event.51.message: I'll see myself inside.\. So... bye \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Sorry for the trouble and...\. thanks for not letting me die, I guess.

assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.334.settings.condAnims.0.intera: Examine the insides of the vase
Yes, hello, I'm here.\. Is that you boss?
You sound weird today, boss.\. Please don't get angry again...
I am still laying low at the Solar Farm, just as you said.\. Everything is alright, yes?
Hello?\.\. Boss?\.\. Did anything go wrong?!
Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Hands off that vase!\. Stealing is prohibited, even for the fancy likes of you!
I have nothing to offer human... yet.
Return later, once Ancients have given you more blessings.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.10.message: Oui, I like this place! Everything is so bright and colorful.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.17.message: I'm... not getting on your nerves, right?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.19.message: You know... I'm aware that I talk a lot...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.20.message: And you're very quiet most of the time, just listening.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.21.message: I just hope I'm not bothering you in that way...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.26.message: Oh and I'm very much fine with you being so quiet.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.27.message: You actually remind me of an old friend of mine...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.28.message: Still...\. I'd really like to know more about you.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.29.message: So maybe some day, if you feel like it, please tell me more about you!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.33.message: Well then... I suppose I better log off now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.35.message: Well... you see, I still gotta do my part of the assignment.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.39.message: And again: Merci for playing with me and listening to my rambling.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.40.message: That really helped me a lot.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.42.message: Don't worry, I'll hurry up with my work. I'll be back soon enough!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.43.message: And don't forget about our race at the Faj'ro Temple!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.80.message: Lea...\. I am sorry I cannot...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.87.message: You are wondering about your \c[3]real life\c[0]...\. Correct?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.89.message: I was afraid you would ask sooner or later.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.91.message: I am not sure if this is the right time...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.97.message: Please promise me to stay calm.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.100.message: Your \c[3]real self\c[0]...\. is currently in a \c[3]coma\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.108.message: You have been suffering from head trauma for several months now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.112.message: For some strange reason, it seems that you regained your consciousness within CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.113.message: That is...\. why we play the game, Lea.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.114.message: By recovering your memory in the game we hope that you will be able to wake up in real life.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.117.message: We still have everything under control, okay?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.119.message: Your situation is serious, but this is no race against time.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.120.message: We just have to try out everything and hope for the best.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.129.message: I am sorry that I could not bring myself to tell you this earlier...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.130.message: I just...\. I knew it would be difficult.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.134.message: I really cannot imagine how you must feel right now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.135.message: All I can tell you is that there is hope...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.138.message: So... let us not give up, okay?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.141.message: Anyway, it is probably better to give you more time to cope with this.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.786.settings.event.142.message: Should we call it a day?
Pretty human!\. Bestest, funnest toys for small ones!\. Make happy and cheer!
Human \v[lore.title.seeker] do search for troublemaker on market?
Hurray!\. Trade was hard times with money and goods being stolen.
Was worried guards lose interest in case.\. Mustache guard very watchful but he also speak much to rectangle.
Yes yes!\. Weird small rectangle he sometimes talk to.\. Seem much importance to him.
Hope human find solution.\. We Shad like market and sharing our goods.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.1.text: The next dungeon is going to be \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.2.text: As members of the \c[3]Omni Gilders\c[0] we have to gather as much loot as we can.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.3.text: This is what this is about?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.4.text: I'm sure everyone knows how to hit stuff by now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.5.text: Sshh! This might be important, Jena!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.798.settings.dialog.7.text: Yes, as I said. We gotta get as much loot as we can.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.0.text: Hey bro, do you think we need a damage dealer at some point?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.2.text: Twin tank bros all the way.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.3.text: Alright, exactly what I wanted to hear.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.805.settings.dialog.0.text: You ever wonder what these do?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.805.settings.dialog.3.text: So basically, you're as clueless as I am?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.819.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Wow, the bird guy wasn't lying. That's one big bazaar, non?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.819.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Shad try to trade as much as they can.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.819.settings.event.1.thenStep.1: Sometimes, they do over-promote I guess.
What is it, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Can't you see that I am busy keeping order in this unruly place?
What is it, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Can't you see that I am busy keeping order in this unruly place?
Shad merchants being robbed, is that the story of the day again?
That is completely impossible.\. Not on my watch anyway.\. And it's always my watch during business hours!
Listen, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I know your kind always searches for grand adventures and villains to slay.
But this is just some village ploy by them shady scaleskins to cash in on compensations.
Anyway, there is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
There is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
There is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
When I first arrived here, the strange beings we call \v[lore.title.shad] made me uneasy.
But soon I learned what honorable people they were beneath their scaly skin.
Nowadays I love serving in this small village.\. It is so peaceful here, compared to the larger human settlements!
Hey \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Can I help you with anything?
Ah, you are here because of those criminal activities here on the market?
I see, so the Sergeant is finally losing his patience.\. I can't blame him.
Listen, I want this to be solved as much as he does.
The Shad are an honest and trusting folk, they don't deserve this.
Just... it always happens without anyone of us or the traders noticing.\. We are completely at a loss!
Honestly, one would think that at least Billston would notice something, that crazy workaholic.
But no, the stuff seems to just vanish without any trace.\. Unbelievable.
I hope you can find anything, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
The Shad are an honest and trusting folk, they don't deserve this.
Human!\. Got quality tableware for sale!\. Best craftworks, it much smooth!
Such shame.\. Human table have sad.
Human asking about crime on market?
It big problem!\. Goods and money vanishing from market stand.
We Shad busy selling quality crafts for fair price to happy customers, so no notice!
But bearded guard, he care very much!\. Always visiting, asking about money, food breaks and giving hints for safety!
Still things get stolen.\. He very disappoint and sad I fear.
Hope human find solution.\. We Shad like market and sharing our goods.
Human, take look over market!\. Baki Bazaar crafts are finest on Shadoon!
Also, all profit go to hardworking \v[lore.title.shad] and helping humans.
Kney'tehab
Hi!
Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], you are greeted!\. Much pleasing is felt from heroic presence.
Much useful wisdom could be learned from communication, I dare proclaim with greatest certainty.
But, as humans like saying, time is of the essential ingredient for early bird.
To honor clever statement, let us swiftly slice core of problem at our hand.
Transport with important content is long expected to arrive from \v[area.bergen.name].\. It has not.
Content very precious and important.\. Desert dangerous.\. Human following?
[nods]
Excellent.\.\. Concluding, you, strong \v[lore.title.seeker], find transport and help it reach us.\. Then get reward, yes?
Please.
[nods]
That good decision, smart human.\. Wealth awaits the both of us!
Search transport along main route from \v[area.bergen.name] to \v[area.heat-village.name].
Should be guarded by two employees of generous Baki Bazaar.\. Unless eaten by hungry desertlife.
If still alive, complain about delay.\. Then help delivery to continue.
If eaten... shame, but business must go on.\. Return for less convenient plan B.
Bye.
[shakes head]
Human certain?\. No interest in progress of shad and humans?\. Sad.
Search transport along main route from \v[area.bergen.name] to \v[area.heat-village.name].
Also find two delivery assistants and help.\. If alive.\. If not, shame, but you return for plan B.
\v[lore.title.seeker] returned.\. So has transport.\. Our thanks are boundless.
Rewards not boundless but still big.\. Human deserve it for bringing great contribution.
The Union is of hope for grand cooperation continuing in future!
Kney'tehab
Hi!
Ah, human \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Return brings great joy.
It seem that indeed nose for business is among the many talents of the \v[lore.title.seeker].
In way of any, \v[lore.title.seeker] remember important delivery and unreliable employees?
[nods]
Well, forget employees, they not important now.\. But content of crate is very much.
It core ingredient for profitable venture of great benefits:\. \c[3]Creating drinks of enjoyment, in way of Ancients!\c[0]
\v[lore.title.seeker] interested in more work?
[nods]
Human thirst for profit express signs of starving wolf.\. This tip scales of trade in most pleasant direction.
Scales however rare in this venture, since \v[lore.title.seeker] work with other human.\. Not bad luck we hope.
You speak to \c[3]human woman with red hair\c[0] in the \c[3]trade-building behind me\c[0].\. She very popular, hard to miss I often hear.
Contents of precious chest will already be used by woman so work can start with hastiness.
Rest will be explained in human to human meeting.\. \v[lore.title.seeker] brain absorbed procedure?
[nods]
Excellent.\. Then make hurry and do progress!
Bye.
[shakes head]
\v[lore.title.seeker] not want to reap fruit of mystery chest?\. Sun done damage to curiosity of brain?
You speak to \c[3]woman with red hair\c[0] in \c[3]Trade house\c[0].\. Easy to find, she very popular for reasons of mystery.
\v[lore.title.seeker]! Happy report of success already flew into reach.\. Splendid!
Already sight is filled with smell of sweetness and taste of ripened drink... and lush profits, not to forget.
Also brewed liquid miraculous creator of friendship and persuasion according to human myths of trade.
Yes, yes.\. This indeed might be venture of century for bazaar.\. \v[lore.title.seeker] get regal reward and thanks from heart!
Human, take look over market!\. Baki Bazaar crafts are finest on Shadoon!
Also, all profit go to hardworking \v[lore.title.shad] and helping humans.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.29.message: Did you have a bad dream?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.33.message: I mean, it is a good thing that you have those dreams.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.34.message: After all, they are the gateway to your lost memory.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.35.message: But of course, they also include the things you would rather not remember.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.37.message: I assume you do not precisely remember any people or places yet, do you?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.40.message: Okay.\. We just have to give it enough time.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.43.message: Anyway. I thought it would be better for you to have some company today.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.44.message: ... after all the things I told you yesterday ...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.45.message: So I planned to wait until Emilie was online, but it seems she is rather busy at the moment.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.47.message: But then I noticed that this Hexacast person went online.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.48.message: The one that contacted you yesterday, remember?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.49.message: Why not give him a call?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.62.message: Uhm...\. I hope you're doing fine?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.64.message: So...\. should we start a party today?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.67.message: How about we meet at the \c[3]West Entrance\c[0] Landmark, the one right to the \c[3]north of Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.829.settings.event.75.task: Meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the \c[3]West Entrance\c[0] Landmark to the north of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.11.message: It seems like Emilie is still busy with the Maroon Tree Cave.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.12.message: Well...\. I guess I'll have a look around the market.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.31.message: Hm.\. Are you looking for my friend?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.33.message: He's not here.\. I plan to meet him soon, though.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.35.message: I heard you've been dueling, hm?
And you even managed to defeat him.\. He was impressed.
He told me you still have much to learn. I suppose you lost that match, hm?
What'd you expect? He's an experienced player after all.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.38.message: Anyways, he talks a lot about you. Almost makes me jealous.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.40.message: Hm.\. A girl of few words, aren't you?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.41.message: It looks like you don't appreciate his attention.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.43.message: What can I say?\. That's just him.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.44.message: Always obsessed with strangers. Especially Spheromancers.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.46.message: So you'd rather avoid him, right?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.47.message: Better leave then before he runs into you.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.60.message: Ah, there you are. I was just browsing consumables.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.61.message: It's kinda funny how they decorate it with all those fruits you actually can't buy, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.78.message: I heard you can still count with your fingers, right?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.84.message: It's actually quite amazing how precisely they managed to synchronize your dexterity.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.85.message: That means you can move your fingers as much as you could in real life. Wanna give it a try?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.93.message: Yeah, that one isn't for everybody.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.94.message: Anyway, since you can mimic things with your hands, maybe sign language would be an option for communication?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.96.message: Well...\. I guess it'd be a bother to learn it.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.97.message: Also, I guess most other players don't know sign language either.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.100.message: We really wouldn't have this problem if they'd simply support text-based communication.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.101.message: But they removed it all. Because of "immersion".
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.102.message: People have complained about this before.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.110.message: I did it!\. I defeated that red worm!\. Finally!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.113.message: But man, those worms were annoying. So hard to punch.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.114.message: I guess projectiles would have been more feasible?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.115.message: I'm a Pentafist, non? What do you think my fists are for?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.117.message: Anyway, I'll head back to Ba'kii Kum now! See you soon!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.123.message: Okey-dokey!\. Let's go back to the \c[3]quest hub\c[0], then!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.831.settings.event.130.message: Uhm...\. anyway...\. Let's just go, okay?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.23.message: Sorry.\. He spotted you as you left.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.24.message: Uhm, hello!\. I'm C'tron.\. I suppose you know each other?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.25.message: I see you found yourself another party member, Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.28.message: Anyway!\. I'm glad to see you progressed this far into the game!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.29.message: It is due time to put your skills to another test!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.38.message: Blue-haired Spheromancer!\. I challenge you to another \c[3]duel\c[0]!
Come on, Lea!\. His derrière deserves another beating!
Come on, Lea!\. It's your chance to get your revenge!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.61.message: What is it?\. You seem less eager this time.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.78.message: Is this important to you?\. Well then.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.85.message: Accept the duel!\. If you earn my respect, I might call you by your name!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.92.message: Let's meet in front of the Faj'ro Temple!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.93.message: I'll be expecting you.\. Make sure to be well prepared!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.110.message: Oh bother.\. Sometimes I wonder why I keep up with that oddball.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.127.message: Oh.\. He's some kind of self proclaimed Justice guy.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.130.message: I see.\. What a...\. unique character.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.133.message: Anyway!\. It's time for a party of three!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.142.message: Let's wrap up that quest already so we can finally go to Faj'ro Temple!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.143.message: Agreed!\. I guess next we should report to the Eldress, right?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.144.message: I do think so, Monsieur Tronny!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.834.settings.event.147.task: It's finally time to complete the \c[3]Maroon Tree Defender\c[0] quest together with Emilie and C'tron!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.21.message: I wonder if we ever get to fight those huge space birds.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.22.message: Eh...\. I haven't heard of that, yet.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.23.message: So this is your first time playing CrossWorlds, too?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.24.message: Pretty much. But I know some people who've played longer.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.25.message: Oh, like the other guild members?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.26.message: Ah, no. Not them. I don't know them personally.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.27.message: I just joined the First Scholars because they seemed like fun.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.28.message: I like that they're not all about the gameplay.\. It's funny how Hlin tries to get the most out of the lore and all.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.31.message: Man, I can't wait to reach the level of Lukas and the others.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.32.message: Then we can do all kinds of guild events!\. Raids and all that!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.34.message: Oh yes, that does sound like fun!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.39.message: You've got to beat your name into that guy's head already, Lea!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.41.message: You should make sure you're well prepared.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.42.message: You know...\. solve some quests, upgrade your equipment and all that.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.47.text: You are free to change your party as you please now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.843.settings.event.48.task: Meet \c[3]Apollo\c[0] for the duel in front of \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.1.text: Just some goofy looking guy with a wood leg.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.2.text: He wanted to give me something.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.3.text: But I think it's a trap.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.4.text: Come on, don't be such a chicken!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.5.text: Well, if you want it so bad, why don't you go?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.846.settings.dialog.6.text: Well, what if it is a trap...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/baki-2.jso.entities.851.settings.event.1.message: There wasn't a single one in that desert!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.30.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Arid Breeze is always welcoming of guests.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker], be our guest!\. There is much to talk about, I am sure.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Joel Mahir
Hi!
I greet you, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The proud explorers of the Arid Breeze are honored by your visit.
My name is Jonathan Lorenzo Mahir el Valente Al-Nassar, the leader of our company of braves.
...L-Lea?!
Don't worry, to my friends I am just Joel Mahir.\. And everyone is a friend to me, especially a pretty \v[lore.title.seeker] like yourself.
It would please me to listen to the story of your exploits, \v[lore.title.seeker], but first we must water our accomplishments.
See, a place of great importance in Ancient society is almost in our reach.\. After all these years of searching!
And we know of the final piece that would complete this puzzle... it must only be collected now!
So, young \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Do you want to claim that honor?
[nods]
Splendid!\. With a \v[lore.title.seeker] like you by our side, I can almost taste the juices of success!
The object we need is a stone tablet with Ancient inscriptions and a map of the area in the old times.
However, it has been claimed by a pack of dastardly \v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]s!
Worse, they are of the stubborn and cowardly kind.\. They will just hide under their rocks and never move.
But fret not, for we have requested a mobile explosion dispenser from our friends in Bergen.
With that apparatus you will be able to clear out their cave and claim the tablet!
We will prepare some of our best tea for your return.
Bye.
[shakes head]
No?\. That is a shock.\. I would not have expected you to deny this humble request.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Find the cave of those cowardly turtles!\. It is at the northern entrance of the Maroon Oasis.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Once inside, activate the mining machine to clear the way and dispose of those creatures.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], you have returned to us.\. And that smile on your lips speaks of your success, does it not?
Ah, astonishing.\. This is truly Ancient work.
For even something as mundane as a travel guide to display such elegance. Magnificent!
I can hardly wait to finally feast my eyes on the main course.\. I hope we can count on you again when the time comes!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Ah, it is our lovely friend \v[lore.title.seeker] again, filling our presence with joy!
And that you are returning in this time of discovery is truly good fortune.\. The winds are on our side!
We have inspected that precious artifact you found on your last adventure and found hints to a holy place.
How about it, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Are you ready to claim the fruits of our work?
Yes, of course you want to!\. What could be more exciting?
Hira, one of our most able explorers, has pinpointed the location of the entrance to a small area.
Meet up with her at Torn Road in \v[area.heat-area.name].\. She will explain the details.
No, truly?\. But how could you resist, with exploration being so close?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Meet our explorer Hira on the Torn Road in \v[area.heat-area.name].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.5.event.3: She will help you find the Entrance.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.6.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], welcome back!\. Word of your latest exploits already reached us!
You have made great progress.\. And there is still more to discover, oh the excitement!
The result couldn't be better.\. Because, what is life without another goal to strive for?
Now Hira will continue excavating the place to find a way to go even deeper.
We will keep a spot for you on the next expedition!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.7.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker], be our guest!\. There is much to talk about, I am sure.

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Would like to give quest of spiritual journey to help find wisdom.\. Sadly, it gave humen brain difficulty to handle.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.62.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: Shad working with wise humen to make ceremony be friendly to \v[lore.title.seeker] brain in future.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.0.text: It's really a shame that this faction does not offer any quests right now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.1.text: Yes, especially since it apparently was very heavy on the background lore of the Ancients. I would have loved to see that.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.text: Dito. But \v[lore.title.dev-company] won't risk another lawsuit \c[1]after what happened here\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.4.me: Oh, hey there.\. Are you wondering about the lack of quests from the fourth  faction of this town?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.7.me: Well, supposedly the entire questline has been about exploring the Ancient past with some sort of dream-ritual, or whatever.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.8.me: Yep, something really colorful and funky.\. A friend solved it a while ago.\. Told me she got a burning headache afterwards.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.10.m: Sounds bad enough, but for some people it was worse.\. The news were full with cases of seizures and such.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.12.m: It was rare and caused no lasting harm, but the PR was still terrible.\. So they took it out until the problems are solved.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.71.settings.dialog.2.event.13.m: It's a shame for missing content, but better save than sorry.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.73.settings.dialog.0.text: Dear players, due to technical difficulties, the quests of this faction will not be available right now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.73.settings.dialog.1.text: Both the health and enjoyment of our players are very important to \v[lore.title.dev-company], so the quest will return once all the problems have been  safely resolved.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.73.settings.dialog.2.text: Thank you for your understanding and sorry for the inconvenience.

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.43.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Move along, nothing to see here.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Take a seat and listen to the latest town gossip.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Always nice to see fresh faces in this dusty ol' town.
Come, join this old man and his array of local blabbermouths.
Ba'kii Kum might be small, but it is a good place.\. Full of harmony and peaceful coexistence.
Old human forgetting much theft happen on our markets.\. Very disrespect.
Ah, of course.\. Some silly hotheads still can't seem to appreciate the merits of our cooperation.
And my guards, they always see nothing.\. It hurts to think of them as unreliable, when they should inspire trust.
But grey human!\. Here is \v[lore.title.seeker], to deliver great justice!\. She could help!
Mh, indeed.\. She could.\. But remember, they are very busy folk!
So, \v[lore.title.seeker]... could you spare some time on helping our Shad friends?
Ah, young folks being so helpful, it warms this old heart.
The crimes against shadkind usually happen at the bazaar in the town-center.
You should talk to some of the residents and guards.\. They might tell you in detail what happened recently.
Best start with Billston, the Chief Guard on the current shift. He should be at the center of the bazaar.
Ah, that is a shame.\. You might indeed have bigger fish to fry.
But we will still be here, whenever you change your mind.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Go to the center of town and talk to citizens and guards.\. They might tell you what is going on.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: Best start with Billston, the Chief Guard of the current shift. He should be at the center of the bazaar.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], welcome back!\. We just had a troubled young man confess his crime.
He certainly did bad things, but he came clean, so I don't think we need to punish him too much.
The other things he said though... it makes me sad that a bad egg like Billston was just among us.
I should have been more vigilant.\. Maybe this old man has become too soft with age.
Aw, no!\. Old human is bestest of protector!
Yes!\. Preserving great peace for shad and humans!
Shucks, you are too kind with this rusty soldier.\. But you are right, we should just look forward!
Thank you for your help, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Billston is still at large but his crimes should stop for now.
I hope we can count on your help again, in case more trouble arises.\. Goodbye!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Young \v[lore.title.seeker], you found your way back to us?\. How swell!
I am sure you are still worried about the traitor Billston being at large.
But now we do finally have hints of his whereabouts!
Can we count on you again, to finally bring that scoundrel to justice?
You really are a treasure, young one!
According to reports reaching us, Billston has left the city and hides somewhere in \v[area.heat-area.name].
There, he sometimes robs Shad traders of their money and goods, before hiding again.
Though he should not be far from the settlement, since he should still need water and human supplies on a regular basis.
So, if you want to find him, you should start patrolling the main route through the desert from here!
Splendid!\. It is reassuring to have you helping us again.\. Godspeed, young \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Oh, I thought you couldn't wait to finally catch him.\. But maybe you just want to prepare a bit more?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.5.event.3: The traitor Billston should be somewhere on the main route through \v[area.heat-area.name].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.5.event.4: He should still need regular supplies, so best start searching near the settlement.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.6.event.q: Ah, once again our hero has returned!\.
Yes, you have done well.\. Billston was apprehended and led to a secure prison cell.
He will cause no more crimes against the unity of our species from now on.
Though, I do fear that he was not acting alone.\. There is still a lot of work to do for us.
But... for now we should celebrate the harmony of shad and humankind.\. And all the progress that has been made!
You should take your well earned reward.\. And know that you will always be welcome in our midst!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/f.entities.84.settings.npcStates.7.event.3: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Take a seat and listen to the latest town gossip.

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.45.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Lea!
Hi!
You have a rare talent at surprising me, kid!
It seems like I found myself at a dead end yet again.
It's another of those broken items I'm searching for, for my kids. A sword this time.
I have an actual lead this time, but I can't find the next clue.
I fear at this rate, it might be too late for me...
Would you be able to help an old man?
Thanks, kid!
You don't know how much this means to me at this point.
Why...?
Ah it doesn't matter, let's get right to the point.
This time, a broken item is hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0].
There is a secret passage in the \c[3]southwest\c[0] of the area.
But to unlock the passage you have to offer some sort of \c[3]Coin\c[0].
I don't know what exactly this coin is, but I found out that an NPC somewhere in this village has one.
It should be in one of the houses since I already talked to every NPC in the village.
Maybe it's somewhere higher up, or hidden?
At my age, jumping around on houses is a bit too much...
So this is where you could help me.
[nods]
Alright! Talk to me again if you forget anything.
Well, off you go then.
And don't keep an old man waiting, kid!
I understand, though I'm also disappointed. I expect you to help an old man.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.45.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Hello young lady, do you want me to tell you about the place again?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.45.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: This time, a broken item is hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0].
There is a secret passage in the "south west" of the area.
But to unlock the passage you have to offer some sort of \c[3]Coin\c[0].
I don't know what exactly this coin is, but I found out that an NPC somewhere in this village has one.
It should be in one of the houses since I already talked to every NPC in the village.
I see, then off you go. Don't keep an old man waiting.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.45.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Welcome back kid, any luck finding the \c[3]Broken Sword\c[0]?
[nods]
Ha ha! Wonderful!
Only 2 missing now...
Mh... Yes, I think it is time I told you why I'm searching for these, right?
You've been a great help and it is only fair for you to know.
Even if I'm not a fan of telling other people about my problems.
You see, I played CrossWorlds with my kids since the game was in its testing phase.
I think they called it "Closed Beta" or something like that.
It was a fun time. I was able to spend time with all of my 5 children.
Everyone was off somewhere in the galaxy, so this game was the perfect meeting ground.
But...
Something happened...
And we had a falling out...
...and now I'm trying to find these broken items to fix things. Ironic, right?
My kids always told me this story of a hidden quest where every class needs to participate.
You find some broken equipment and bring it to a special place.
But we could never actually find it.
It was only a couple of weeks ago that I started hearing rumors.
And thanks to you, I found 3 of the 5 broken items in less than a week.
I can't thank you enough, Lea!
Well, it looks like it is time for me to go.
I hope we meet again soon. I'm sure you are as motivated as I am to find the last 2 broken pieces.
[nods]
Have a good day, young lady. Goodbye.
Bye!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Oy Lady. Can I interest you in a rare trinket?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: One that will surely bring you nothing but good fortune, I swear!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: I wonder what the coin does...
A coin is sometimes used as a fee for something.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/h.entities.28.settings.event.0.message: A flame inside a building? Really?

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.70.settings.dialog.2.text: ... are you sure this is about the book?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.70.settings.dialog.3.text: ...because you could just take the book and get off the table.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.70.settings.dialog.4.text: We're literally surrounded by couches and cushions!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.70.settings.dialog.5.text: Sorry, I'm just totally immersed in this book right now!
I'm just looking at the info tables a bit.
Mostly offerings from other players to team up and stuff.
But from time to time you find a neat little lore tidbit using the \c[3]Seeker Senses\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.106.settings.text: Lamps and where to find them
I'm watching the advisor over there.
I want to find out how varied his responses actually are.
It's been disappointing so far. He really does just say the same thing over and over again.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.118.settings.dialog.0.text: Dear humans! Great Eldress is waiting upstairs!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.118.settings.dialog.1.text: She has an important story for you!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.119.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]
Ah've found a way ta spice up that hat Ah gave ya'll.
Bigger an' better, jes' like that.
Ah'll see ya'll in the fields. 'Til nex' time!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Human, are you willing to help us in exchange for \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0]?
Please take this \c[3]Pass\c[0]. Needed to enter cave below \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
Shad understand. Please talk to us when you change mind.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Please defeat pesky \c[3]sandworms\c[0] in cave below \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: We will give \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] as reward. You need orb to enter \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Dear Human! Did you defeat pesky sandworms below Maroon Tree?
Indeed, I see note on pass.
Thank you so much, human. Because of your help, tree will live many more years!
Now I'll hand you \c[3]shiny thing\c[0] for reward.
Human now can go to \c[3]mystic statue\c[0] at market to receive key to \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
We got the Shiny Orb, everyone!\. The pinnacle of creativity!
Well... it's the Shad.\. They prefer simple terminology, right?
Time to collect the \c[3]Yellow Sand Shade\c[0] from the statue in \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Thank you human for helping Shad!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Tree will live many more years!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.4.event.4: ... If human still help us defeat sandworm for years to come.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.67.settings.npcStates.4.event.6: You have to thank the sandworms for helping us keep good diplomatic relations with the Shad.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.6.message: Dear humans, I am Eldress of Ba'kii Kum.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.7.message: You have my thanks for visiting our small, humble town of Shad.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.8.message: For many years Humans and Shad have worked together.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.9.message: We traded, we shared, we fought together.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.10.message: So today Ba'kii Kum is town of Shad and Human.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.11.message: We know that Humans want to learn about Ancients.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.12.message: Ancients are Ancestors of us Shad - yet we still know little!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.13.message: Therefore, we want to help Humans!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.16.message: Ba'kii Kum is home of \c[3]mystic statue\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.18.message: Statue holds key to \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], important place for Seeker Human.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.19.message: However, Statue only react if Human holds \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.20.message: We have \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] and will give to Human.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.26.message: In \c[3]East part of Maroon Valley\c[0] you find majestic \c[3]Maroon Tree\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.28.message: Maroon Tree very important to Shad, but attacked by \c[3]Sandworms\c[0] of Track.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.29.message: We ask Human to defeat pesky Sandworms in cave below Maroon Tree.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.30.message: We will give \c[3]Shiny Orb\c[0] for defeating Sandworms.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.31.message: Human help Shad and Shad will help Human! Is a trade!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.35.message: Please talk to me to accept task!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.36.message: In name of all Shad, thank you for listening!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.45.message: So we gotta save the tree! D'accord.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.77.settings.event.46.message: Sounds like a mandatory quest.\. Let's accept it!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.79.settings.event.4.message: Hey Lea, I want to check out the balcony!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/q.entities.84.settings.dialog.1.text: There are no mistakes, just happy little accidents.

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/s.entities.2.settings.npcStates.0.event.sh: I can offer hardest steel to protect soft human body.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/s.entities.3.settings.npcStates.0.event.sh: Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Need some provisions on this hot day?

assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Oh, a \v[lore.title.seeker] wants to talk to me?\. I am sorry but I don't think we got any business right now.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Aww, don't give me that face.\. I'm sure we can talk later!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Hey there, lady.\. Anything I can help you with?
Kney'tehab sent you to me to test our new toy?\. That's amazing news!
Even finding a \v[lore.title.seeker] to help me.\. The boss can be such a sweetheart when he wants to!
See, we have found a way to implement a human device into locations flowing with Ancient energy.
Here we wired a distillery into a puzzle to brew ourselves some drinks in the way of the Ancients!
I know, right?!\. Drinks flowing with Ancient power must be the stuff!
I'm so excited I'd love to start right away!\. But we need a few materials first to get our baby running.
Here, take a list of the things.\. It's mostly ingredients from different places and some ice for the cooling.
Great!\. It will be worth it, I promise you!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Gather all the ingredients that we need for a test run.\. Oh, and some ice for the cooling!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Amazing, you really got everything!\. Now we can begin with the fun part.
Let me just prepare everything you need!
Alrighty, that's it.\. Here, take this and go down the stairs behind me to your right.
I will follow you and tell you how to get our precious machine running!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Go down the stairs behind me to your right.\. I will follow you and explain how it works!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.5.event.2: Sorry, but I'm busy here.\. I'm sure you'll manage on your own.\. Don't forget that the console has an instruction!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Amazing job down there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I already told the boss so he can prepare your reward!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: \c[3]Come back afterwards\c[0] if you wanna brew more of the finest!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker], great to see you back!
We already tweaked our sweet little machine with the data of your tests.\. The stuff it produces is just the best!
We can open it up for you to use it on your own again, if you agree to give it some further tests!
Great!\. You will see that we have changed the way it works a bit.
You will now have a \c[3]limited amount of time\c[0] to refine those ingredients as much as possible!
Basically, to help us out you should just try to reach as much \c[3]quality\c[0] as you can.
That'll also \c[3]increase the number of drinks\c[0] produced, so it's win-win for everyone!
Thing is, reaching high qualities is tricky, because it's about maintaining a \c[3]high heat\c[0] without making mistakes.
Well, I'm sure you will get the hang of it.\. I will give you another batch of ingredients to start right away.
You can get more from my assistant down there, if you also bring the base materials.
What, seriously?\. But why wouldn't you?\. There's no pressure, really...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Try to get as much \c[3]quality\c[0] out of it as possible!\. Our data says that \c[3]maintaining high heat is key\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.8.event.3: My assistant Bru down there can prepare more brewing sets if needed.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/interior/t.entities.23.settings.npcStates.9.event.q: Wow, \v[lore.title.seeker], Those quality-ratings were just off the charts!\. Amazing work!
That'll really help us refine the mechanics.
Also, we worked on another recipe for you to use.\. You should try it out when you have the time!
Anyway, things are getting busy again.\. See you around, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Wanna get more drinks done?

assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.48.settings.event.39.thenStep.1: Hey, there \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You got everything done here?
Alright!\. What do the numbers say, Bru?
Numbers say good quality of liquid goods.\. Seem \v[lore.title.seeker] done well!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.48.settings.event.39.thenStep.2: Great, it seems like everything went off without a hitch!\. We will extract the product soon.
I will notify the boss of your success, so you can go back to him and get your reward!
But you should definitely come back afterwards, so we can brew more of this fine stuff.\. Looking forward to it!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.48.settings.event.39.elseStep.9:
Brewing process finished!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.81.settings.event.33.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.3.name: Bru'shy
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.6.message: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker] welcome!\. Red-headed expert of the brew is coming down as well to give explain.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.17.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.19.message: Alrighty, let's get this going, shall we?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.30.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.32.message: Here we are!\. Now take a look at this!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.38.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.41.message: Amazing, huh?\. Our partners in Bergen really outdid themselves with this beauty!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.42.message: Not gonna go into technical details but it will brew us amazing drinks and infuse them with Ancient power!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.44.message: If we prove ourselves worthy that is.\. You know how the Track works: No reward without trials.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.46.message: I'm sure a \v[lore.title.seeker] like you will do just fine!\. So lemme explain...
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.52.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.54.message: After starting, the machine will \c[3]request energy\c[0] from one of those \c[3]steam-receivers\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.66.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.68.message: You will need to put some \c[3]ice\c[0] in there quickly.\. At first you can use a \c[3]bubble generator\c[0] for that.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.75.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.77.message: Later you will have to \c[3]catch waterbubbles\c[0] that the Track sends through those \c[3]pipes\c[0] from who knows where.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.91.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.93.message: Oh, and you should also \c[3]throw some ice at the machine itself\c[0] once in a while.\. We don't want it \c[3]overheating\c[0], do we?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.95.message: Well, and that's about it.\. You got everything?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.96.0.2.messag: Perfect!\. My assistant Bru will check the numbers while you are at work, but I'm sure you will do great!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.96.0.4.messag: I myself sadly can't watch you because I have business to attend to upstairs.\. So we'll talk again once it's finished, yes?
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.96.1.2.messag: Alrighty, then lemme explain it again.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.96.1.8.name: Ryda
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.84.settings.event.96.1.10.messa: This is the machine that will create our wonderful, magic booze.\. If it is used correctly!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.85.settings.interact.event.1.th:
- Instruction to Ancient Brewing -
Quality drinks using the mystical powers of the Track, steam and only the best natural ingredients!
After activating this machine, it will request energy from the \c[3]4 steam ovens\c[0]. Those requests have to be met with \c[3]icedisks\c[0] quickly and correctly!
In the beginning a \c[3]static bubble generator\c[0] will be available, though later it will vanish. At this point, bubbles ejected from the \c[3]pipes left and right\c[0] have to be used.

Due to the immense powers flowing through it, the brewing machine will \c[3]overheat\c[0] with time. \c[3]Cooling it with ice\c[0] will be necessary to prevent \c[3]overheating\c[0] and a \c[3]time-consuming cooldown-phase\c[0].
\c[3]Not meeting a request\c[0], \c[3]putting ice in a wrong oven\c[0] or \c[3]overheating the machine\c[0] will damage the ingredients and \c[3]reduce the overall quality\c[0] of the product.
On the other hand, brewing \c[3]quality\c[0] will increase at a higher rate with \c[3]growing requests\c[0] and when maintaining a \c[3]high heat\c[0]!
The \c[3]higher the quality\c[0], the \c[3]more useable drinks\c[0] can be created from \c[3]the same amount of ingredients\c[0]!

\c[3]Not meeting a request\c[0], \c[3]putting ice in a wrong oven\c[0] or \c[3]overheating the machine\c[0] will do \c[3]damage\c[0] to the ingredients. With too much \c[3]damage\c[0], the brewing will \c[1]fail\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker] impress Ancients for great liquids!\. I will keep eyes on numbers.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker] done well.\. Extracting goods will done soon.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: \v[lore.title.seeker] talk to Ms. Ryda upstairs.\. Much progress is on the foot.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.3.event.t: Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.4.event.t: Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/di.entities.86.settings.npcStates.5.event.t: Wish much success.\. May Ancients bless precious liquids!

assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/ex.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
Your prolonged journey
brought you to this barren field.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/ex.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
Surrounded by boundless sand
I shall hand you the Shade of the same.
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/ex.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
It will open the passage
to the \c[3]Temple of Faj'ro\c[0].
assets/data/maps/heat-village/special/ex.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
Traveler, envoy of change,
your next trial awaits you.

assets/data/maps/henne-test-1.json.entities.52.settings.event.3.message:
O hai Lea.
Kill all the evil robots to leave The Room.

assets/data/maps/henne1337.json.entities.5.settings.event.0.task: This is just some Test task!
assets/data/maps/henne1337.json.entities.5.settings.event.1.message: Guys, check out this cool message system I came up with!
assets/data/maps/henne1337.json.entities.5.settings.event.2.message: I'm not even sure what I'm doing here!
assets/data/maps/henne1337.json.entities.5.settings.event.3.message: Make sure to hit those enemies with balls.

assets/data/maps/henne9001.json.entities.14.settings.event.7.message: Welcome stranger. Good luck with this and remember: Cloudy drink kills frog!

assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.40.message: I know you can hear me! Where is he?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.42.message: Shizuka, I have to ask you to leave.
assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.43.message: So, you're keeping him here? What do you think you are doing?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.44.message: Time is running short. We don't have a choice!
assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.45.message: So you abduct a dying person and let him work until his last breath? Is that it?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/entrance.json.entities.20.settings.event.46.message: I am going to talk some sense into him! Don't get in my way!

assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.2.settings.blockEvent.2.message: Please, Lea. Now is not a time to leave.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.2.settings.blockEvent.3.message: Let's follow Satoshi into the room to the \c[3]west\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.23.settings.blockEvent.3.messag: Uhm, did you not want to go outside with Shizuka?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.23.settings.blockEvent.4.messag: I am pretty sure our technical talk will not be all that interesting for you.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.25.settings.blockEvent.1.messag: Doesn't seem like he is in there.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.49.settings.event.10.message: A system to extract information from players...\. this is unbelievable!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.50.settings.event.11.message: From here on out Sergey and I will dive into the technical details.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.50.settings.event.12.message: You two probably don't want to stick around for that.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.50.settings.event.13.message: Maybe spend some time together as well? Talk it out?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.50.settings.event.18.message: Come on, you know what I mean.
