assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-1.json.entities.50.settings.event.33.message: Honestly there is nothing interesting to see in this building and anyway... I hate it in here.

assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.28.message: Kind of breaks the atmosphere, doesn't it?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.30.message: We're not here to have a good time, Shizuka.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.38.message: So... you are now an Evotar.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.39.message: Can you move around freely in the Playground?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.41.message: No... These days I am confined within this building.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.42.message: That is also why I know little of what is happening outside.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.43.message: Are you aware that Lea... has been in Evotarground again recently?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.44.message: I suspected it from some protocol readings I had access to.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.45.message: I suppose they tried to drag Lea back into it?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.46.message: Yes. And once she was there they could effectively track our connection.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.47.message: They almost managed to locate me.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.48.message: That means Sidwell is already fully aware of your actions. This is troublesome.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.49.message: Something else I wonder... How did Lea learn the truth about herself?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.50.message: You do not know?\. Your little sister paid us a visit.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.63.message: She confronted Lea with the truth... very abruptly.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.65.message: I don't see the problem. I merely told her the truth.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.66.message: You know full well what consequences your actions could have had!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.70.message: Well it happened, we can't change it now.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.72.message: I'm glad that Lea was strong enough to overcome it this time around.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.75.message: Yes, congratulations, Lea.\. We're all so very proud of you.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.78.message: Shizuka, stop acting like a child.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.85.message: You never stopped acting like a freak!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.86.message: Only caring for your dear little AI sister!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.99.message: Look, I know you have your issues with Lea.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.100.message: But you need to understand one thing.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.101.message: She is our best chance to get out of this mess. Both of us.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.104.message: It's thanks to her that we got in contact with Sergey.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.105.message: Not only that, but she's the only one who can reach the \c[3]Evotar Server\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.106.message: Why is now the first time I hear of this?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.107.message: I couldn't share this with you or anybody else.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.108.message: We're all being monitored, it would have jeopardized the whole plan.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.27.settings.event.111.message: With both Sergey's and Lea's help, we might be able to get everyone out of this.
The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
Right, we should start preparations at once!
We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
So true! We should help human make language simple!
The stocks have been rather good this week.
Very much, I made a good fortune.
Isn't the weather just fantastic today?
Indeed! The sun is shining, it's fantastic, the best!
Let's all go out and play!
Yes, let's go out and play!
But before that I have to finish work.
I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
Right, we should start preparations at once!
The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
The stocks have been rather good this week.
Very much, I made a good fortune.
We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
So true! We should help human make language simple!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.18.message: For Shizuka and Gautham there might have been a slim chance to escape this whole mess.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.19.message: But for me...\. it was close to impossible.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.20.message: However now that Lea is here, things have changed.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.21.message: Because she has an \c[3]access key embedded\c[0], she can reach the Evotar Server.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.24.message: Why does Lea have the key out of all people?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.50.settings.event.25.message: Because...\. I tricked Sidwell into giving it to her.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.19.message: Oh yes...\. that data corruption.\. What the heck.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.20.message: You really did not go easy on me.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.21.message: I had to make sure that not just anyone could fix it.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.23.message: Honestly...\. all of this was a huge gamble.\. But here you are.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.24.message: You received my message and found me.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.32.message: And now...\. we need to figure out how Lea can reach the Evotar Server before Sidwell has a chance to wipe its data.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.33.message: And I already have a few ideas I'd like to discuss with you in detail, Sergey.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-garden.js.entities.51.settings.event.49.message: Let's relocate back to the previous room.

assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.19.message: What do you think you're doing?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.20.message: You are in no condition to do this kind of work now!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.21.message: All you should do is rest...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.22.message: ... Why should I rest when I'm way beyond recovery?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.26.message: I need to finish this work. It's my final task.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.27.message: ... I told you about the agreement.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.29.message: I finish this and they will let you go...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.57.message: I'm so sorry I got you involved in this.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.0.settings.event.59.message: Just promise me...\. that you will...\. get away...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.15.settings.npcStates.4.event.4: Do you think you are prepared to execute the plan?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.15.settings.npcStates.4.event.5: Mind that once we start, things will have to move quickly.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.15.settings.npcStates.4.event.7: Alright then, let's get everyone together.
Alright. Talk to me when the time has come.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.15.settings.npcStates.5.event.3: You should know what to do. Let's hurry and proceed with the plan.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.43.message: Does that mean...\. is he with you as well?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.54.message: Make sure he can read the number of this device.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.56.message: It's possible to connect to it using an IDN-Client.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.58.message: Oh? Just make sure to look closely at the number, Lea!
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.77.message: Satoshi...\. I am so glad to see you again.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.79.message: Same for me.\. It has been too long...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.88.message: I'm sure you have a lot of questions, but before we continue, let me start a little program.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.109.message: Alright, let's stay close and talk quietly.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.111.message: Having this noise around us should sufficiently mess with the protocol.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.114.message: Well then... allow me to get straight to the point.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.115.message: Sergey, you should already know about Evotars.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.116.message: Is Lea...\. aware about herself as well?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.119.message: Good...\. this will make things much easier.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.120.message: Lea, let me start by saying that you are, in fact, the \c[3]first functional Evotar\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.121.message: Minus a few remaining technical issues... like your \c[3]malfunctioning speech module\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.123.message: Wait...\. so I didn't imagine it? You can talk?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.124.message: Partially... I hard-coded a few words into her module.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.125.message: I wasn't even aware that was an option...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.126.message: You always manage to surprise me, Sergey.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.127.message: It is nothing, please go on.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.52.settings.event.129.message: Let me tell you what happened after Gautham, Shizuka, and I left Instatainment.
Isn't the weather just fantastic today?
Indeed! The sun is shining, it's fantastic, the best!
Let's all go out and play!
Yes, let's go out and play!
But before that I have to finish work.
The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
Right, we should start preparations at once!
I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
Right, we should start preparations at once!
We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
So true! We should help human make language simple!
We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
So true! We should help human make language simple!
The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
The stocks have been rather good this week.
Very much, I made a good fortune.
The stocks have been rather good this week.
Very much, I made a good fortune.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.20.message: Well...\. Not that it mattered to me.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.21.message: Do you mean...\. your heart disease?\. Please do not tell me...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.22.message: I'm sorry...\. The Satoshi you knew died two years ago.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.23.message: Standing in front of you...\. is the \c[3]Evotar of Satoshi\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.25.message: I myself created this copy as an offer to Mr. Sidwell, so I could continue to serve him.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.26.message: In return, I wanted him to let Shizuka go.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.27.message: I was naive to ever think he'd fulfill his end of the agreement.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.32.message: Nothing could have been done about my disease anyway.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.33.message: Becoming an Evotar was the only option for me to stay in this world.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.79.settings.event.47.message: We need to switch rooms now.\. Otherwise the masking will lose its effect.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.22.message: You two are still at it?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.23.message: I think we're done for the most part.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.24.message: Though there is one more thing.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.25.message: Shizuka, how is \c[3]Gautham\c[0] doing these days?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.26.message: Well...\. I didn't speak much with him recently.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.27.message: He's busy designing his levels and flying around in his fancy avatar.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.29.message: Gautham... it might be especially difficult to get him out of this.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.40.message: We did in fact meet him while we were in Evotarground.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.41.message: From what we saw... it looked like he is physically located in the Playground. Could that be the case?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.42.message: Yes.\. Somehow, Sidwell convinced him to do that.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.43.message: It is easier to keep him under control that way.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.44.message: And well...\. Gautham was always excited about creating his own worlds.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.45.message: The prospect of experiencing it in person was quite appealing to him.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.47.message: Really...\. I think he's a lost cause.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.48.message: He's stuck in his fantasy world, playing his little god figure...
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.49.message: That blue avatar with orange clothing?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.51.message: That is... unexpected. He acts like such a different character.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.53.message: In any case, we should try to figure out if he's on our side with this or not.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.54.message: Shizuka, can you try talking to him about this?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.55.message: Just hinting at what is happening?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.61.message: Well then... I think I have a good grasp of the situation now.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.62.message: We will need time for preparations though.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.64.message: Certainly. If you have any more questions, you know how to reach me.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.65.message: Yes...\. I am glad I was able to meet both of you again.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.69.message: Looking at what Sidwell accomplished so far, I'm certain he has specific ways to track your actions.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.70.message: Beause of that please be extra careful if you plan to involve any other player.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.71.message: I will... and I already have my suspects.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.80.settings.event.74.message: Well then...\. good bye and see you soon.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.30.message: I looked a bit more into the technical side of things.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.31.message: The Evotar Server is most likely derived from an old version of the official game servers.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.32.message: That means it should be vulnerable to a certain DoS attack we experienced in the past.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.38.message: Now please for us common folks, too.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.40.message: Well, in other words...\. there is a way to make the Evotar Server \c[3]crash\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.42.message: Once it happens, Sidwell will have a hard time restarting it.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.43.message: Thus, the server will not respond to anything, including queries to wipe the data.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.44.message: That will give us enough time for Lea to reach it physically.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.46.message: So, how exactly will it work?\. How do we make it crash?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.47.message: The keys are the \c[3]Evotars\c[0] running around Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.48.message: We need to subject them to a certain type of field effect, as many and as quickly as possible.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.49.message: If we succeed, things should overflow on the Server, making it crash.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.50.message: However, for this to work...\. we will need a lot more players to participate.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.51.message: That's why I plan to involve a few other players, specifically those Lea has met before.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.53.message: I suppose it's a risk we have to take.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.54.message: I currently see no other options, unfortunately.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.59.message: I can't enter the official Playground, but I can move around Vermillion Wasteland.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.62.message: Hm...\. I think it would be better if you avoid logging into the game while we storm the Evotarground.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.63.message: Since Sidwell is aware of your current location outside the game, you need to be quickly relocated.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.64.message: Otherwise, things will end with him taking you hostage.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.65.message: Right...\. there is the real life side of things as well.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.70.message: One last thing, did you manage to talk with Gautham?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.73.message: He has been acting...\. very strange.\. Even more strange than usual.\. And that's saying a lot.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.74.message: Once I mentioned Lea, he started raving about how she managed to escape his dungeon tower.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.75.message: I guess you really left an impact.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.79.message: Anyway...\. I decided I'd better not tell him too much.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.80.message: Really...\. he's pretty much turned into a nutcase by now.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.83.message: We will see if we can drag him out somehow.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.84.message: I know a few people from the maintenance crew that might be able to help us with this.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.89.message: Good...\. then how do we proceed?
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.91.message: For now, we should call it a day.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.92.message: As soon as I have everything prepared, Lea and I will try to gather the other players.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.93.message: And once we have the help we need, we start with the plan as soon as possible.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.94.message: Alright, let's give it our best shot.
assets/data/maps/hideout/inner-office.js.entities.81.settings.event.95.message: That we will.\. See you soon!

assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.40.settings.event.28.message: I'm sorry but I can't let you go any further.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.42.settings.event.6.title: Dodge!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.42.settings.event.12.title: Attack!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.43.settings.event.9.message: You will have to do better than that.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.277.settings.event.1.message: Now that I think about it... Satoshi did mention an unused location within Sapphire Ridge back then.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-1.json.entities.277.settings.event.2.message: He must have talked about this place.

assets/data/maps/hideout/path-2.json.entities.61.settings.event.11.message: You know this is what he wants as well!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-2.json.entities.61.settings.event.12.message: Sure, you'd like to think that!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-2.json.entities.268.settings.event.1.message: Does this mean he actually used this place in the end?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-2.json.entities.268.settings.event.2.message: Just how did he manage to hide it from Instatainment?

assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.100.settings.event.44.message: You don't know when to stop, do you?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.112.settings.event.3.title: Charge!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.112.settings.event.6.title: Charge!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.112.settings.event.7.title: Let's go!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.113.settings.event.5.message: You can throw as many enemies at me as you like.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.113.settings.event.6.message: The level threshold doesn't exactly work in your favor.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.417.settings.event.0.message: If you interrupt him, all of his hard work will be lost.\. Don't do this!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.417.settings.event.1.message: So?\. It never should have happened in the first place!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.452.settings.event.2.message: So far this place seems entirely abandoned...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.452.settings.event.3.message: Please do not let this be a dead end...
This spot is pretty nice, isn't it?
Certainly better than anything you'd find in Vermillion Wasteland.
Let's sit down for a bit.
So what words can you say exactly?
That all happened because of a stupid joke.
I often complained that horns don't fit the Spheromancer design at all.
So of course, one day Sergey gifted them to me.\. Very funny.
And then they'd always log into my account and equip them.
And now you ended up with them. Sorry for that.
Don't ask me. I didn't do it.
Well... at least they left you the scar.
Guess we both have the same taste. Makes sense.
But you're lucky, you know that?
You didn't have to witness your brother dying in front of you.
And the futility of the whole situation...
They just kept you in that room... all the time.
Honestly, none of this is your fault.
For what I did to you...
This whole situation...\. it's been going on for so long already...
I just don't know what to do anymore...
How much longer I can take this...
How can you be like this, after all the things I did to you?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.16.message: Did you just forget everything I told you?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.20.message: So the bot is fully aware of itself and it doesn't even matter anymore!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.21.message: And then you simply escape your prison...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.27.message: ... just strolling around with my memories...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.30.message: ... like they're yours to use freely.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.40.message: Can somebody PLEASE JUST DELETE YOU ALREADY?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.43.message: Oh how I'd love to just rip your head off!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.44.message: But what does it even matter in this cursed simulation?!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.46.message: If I only knew the machine you're running on!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.47.message: I'd gladly crush those circuits myself!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.52.message: Don't you dare just "sorry" me like that!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.53.message: I know exactly why you are here.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.57.message: You have no right to see him. You have no right to exist...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.58.message: All you should do is disappear!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.59.message: But since you won't do that...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.72.message: I will fight you.\. Right here.\. Right now.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.455.settings.event.73.message: As long as it takes you... to give up!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.456.settings.event.1.elseStep.0: Don't let it get to your head. I'm was just testing you.
So is that all the revolutionary AI is capable of!?
Seriously, is that all you're capable of?
Why do you keep going, you stupid program?!
Just playing around in CrossWorlds while we're stuck here!
Have at least the decency to stay out of this!
I don't care for you! Nobody cares for you!
I can keep going as long as necessary!!
Just because you won doesn't mean I'll let you proceed!
You don't look like you're going to leave though.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.781.settings.event.10.message: This whole area is just so terribly delimited...\. no way to move around.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.781.settings.event.17.message: Still, there is a little spot at the lake over there.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.9.message: Phew... that was a lot to take in, correct?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.12.message: Oh, right! We should head back to the \c[3]east of Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.13.message: Specifically, to that \c[3]Old Dojo\c[0] where you got the Meteor Shade.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.14.message: According to Satoshi an entrance to Evotarground is hidden in that area.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.15.message: I would like to have a look at it.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.788.settings.event.22.message: You can use that teleporter for a quick connection to the \c[3]dojo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.8.message: Uhm...\. Lea?\. Should we log out now?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.16.message: You seem to like this place...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.23.message: This plan is very risky... there are so many things that could potentially go wrong.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.26.message: Uhm...\. sorry.\. Building confidence is not exactly my strong suit.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.28.message: By now you probably already guessed it, but I plan to involve the other First Scholar members.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.29.message: We will need their help to properly execute the plan.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.31.message: That also means I have to explain the full situation to them...\. and tell them about you.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.33.message: I understand that you are nervous about this, but there really is no way around it.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.36.message: And... I am pretty positive they will understand.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.38.message: Trust me on that, you are no stranger to them anymore.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.41.message: Also...\. here is something I should have said a long time ago...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.44.message: We had such a long journey together...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.45.message: You went through such a number of hardships... and you always kept going.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.46.message: Really, I could not have imagined a better partner.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.790.settings.event.51.message: So what about now? Ready to logout?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.39.message: Well then, time to get everyone together!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.43.message: I worked really hard and managed to add a couple more words to your vocabulary!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.51.message: I am sure that will help getting everyone together, correct?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.64.message: Well then, let us call the others.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.65.message: The goal is to get everyone to assemble in the \c[3]meeting room\c[0] at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0].
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.791.settings.event.66.message: Let us move there first, shall we?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.28.message: Oh my, what a lovely hideout!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.30.message: Japp.\. Certainly beats our small headquarters.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.32.message: Well...\. we had the connections after all.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.47.message: I am not sure what else there is to say other than...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.48.message: Thank you very much for everything.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.49.message: We could not have done it without your help.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.53.message: We served Justice where Justice was due!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.58.message: Sergey...\. Lea will be back, right?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.61.message: Please promise me she will return...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.62.message: I... unfortunately cannot give you that promise.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.63.message: I can only promise that I will try my very hardest to make that happen.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.77.message: I'm gonna miss you so much...
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.79.message: You have to return someday... It has to happen....
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.107.message: Ha!\. Finally I can witness that infamous hug!
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.144.message: And let us hope we will meet again.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.197.message: Seriously...\. just how touchy can you even get?
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.215.message: Good night and sweet dreams, Lea.
assets/data/maps/hideout/path-3.json.entities.799.settings.event.230.text:
Now it is up to me.\.
To make sure we can meet again.

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/infested-c.entities.151.settings.event.0.message: Oh, the cave is instanced. Looks like we're on our own.

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.13.settings.event.4.text: There is no way to break that icy wall alone. \c[3]Report back to Mrs Basu in \v[area.jungle-city.name]!\c[0]
Use the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0]  to melt the icy walls.
\c[3]Teleport it with charged Wave projectiles\c[0] and \c[3]trigger heat-explosions with repeated Shock attacks\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.14.name: Forni
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.17.message: S-s-seeker!\. H-hello.\. I-it is good to see y-you f-finally arrive.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.19.message: O-oh, I-I am s-sorry.\. W-waiting in this c-c-cold m-might have g-gotten to m-me.\. P-please exc-cuse me for a s-second.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.22.name: Forni
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.24.message: Alright, much better.\. I am sorry, these temperatures may have frozen my professionalism along with my tongue.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.26.message: In any case, \v[lore.title.seeker], we have work to do!\. Feast your eyes on this technological marvel!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.31.name: Forni
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.33.message: Our engineers called it the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0].\. A ridiculous name, to be sure, but its heating capacities are truly unmatched.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.35.message: It's finely attuned to Trackwalker, meaning that you, \v[lore.title.seeker], will be able to control it with your abilities.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.37.message: It is too heavy to move, but a \c[3]charged Wave projectile\c[0] will start a teleportation sequence that \c[3]relocates it to your position\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.38.message: Hitting it with \c[3]repeated Shock attacks\c[0] will trigger a powerful \c[3]heat-explosion\c[0] that will melt even the thickest ice!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.39.message: Though the machine will enter a \c[3]short cooldown phase\c[0] afterwards.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.45.name: Forni
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.47.message: Now use this wonderful machine to melt through the ice and solve your assignment.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.56.name: Darrel
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.58.message: I will be waiting here.\..\..\. In the cold.\.\. So please make haste, yes.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.23.settings.event.62.text:
Use the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0]  to melt the icy walls.
\c[3]Teleport it with charged Wave projectiles\c[0] and \c[3]trigger heat-explosions with repeated Shock attacks\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: You will be able to control the \c[3]Hyperforce Plasmaoven\c[0] with your \v[lore.title.seeker] abilities.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Use \c[3]charged Wave projectiles\c[0] to \c[3]teleport it to your position\c[0] and \c[3]repeated Shock attacks\c[0] will trigger a \c[3]heat-explosion\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: But remember that the machine will enter a \c[3]short cooldown phase\c[0] after the explosion.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Now use it to melt that icewall.\. Teleport the oven next to it and then trigger an overcharged explosion!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I-I'm freezing.\. This is not what I studied law for!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.40.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I am protecting the civilians from monsters.\. Please do your job before the cold gets them.

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.6.settings.event.2.message: Alright the \c[3]first wave\c[0] should be incoming.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.6.settings.event.3.message: The critters got \c[3]a shield\c[0] that will \c[3]reflect damage\c[0], so hold your fire at first.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.6.settings.event.4.message: Wait for the turrets to \c[3]neutralize the shields\c[0] before attacking!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.33.settings.event.2.message: Alright, first one down.\. The blobs dislike the cold so I will \c[3]unlock Cold Turrets\c[0] now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.33.settings.event.3.message: Activate them by using a \c[3]Cold-elemental charged shot\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.33.settings.event.4.message: Though, while elemental turrets are \c[3]stronger\c[0] they also \c[3]don't disrupt shields\c[0], so you'll need to \c[3]mix them up with neutrals\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.34.settings.event.2.message: Seems like those Plants dislike fire.\. Unlocking \c[3]Heat-turrets\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.34.settings.event.3.message: Obviously, you can activate them with \c[3]charged Heat-elemental shots\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.34.settings.event.4.message: They also \c[3]don't disrupt shields\c[0], though, so remember to activate some more \c[3]neutral turrets\c[0] as well.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.36.settings.event.0.message: A lot of critters incoming!\. This should be their \c[3]last assault\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.36.settings.event.1.message: I'm gonna put up everything we've got.\. Put it to good use!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.37.settings.event.26.message: Good job, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. \c[3]Come back here\c[0], so we can review the results!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.38.settings.event.34.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.48.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please don't disturb my work!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.48.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Ah, there you are.\. Finally, I thought that would-be thespian would never let you through.
So, you have come to help us open this door here, right?
Don't worry, we will leave the complicated part to this technical marvel here.
You, \v[lore.title.seeker], will simply defend it against the incoming wave of enemies.
For that purpose you can use the Trackwalker-compatible defensive system we prepared.
It's only one right now, but we will spawn more over time.
They will automatically attack incoming enemies once you've activated them.
Talk to me again once you want to start.\. You will learn the rest on the go.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.48.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Mika
Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Ready to defend against the incoming waves?
[nods]
Alright.\. I will start up our generator here in a second.
Mika
But first, activate that turret by \c[3]hitting it a few\c[0] times and then using a \c[3]charged projectile on it\c[0]!
[nods]
Hit \c[3]the turret\c[0] first with \c[3]repeated shots\c[0] and lastly with a \c[3]charged shot\c[0] to activate it
[shakes head]
Okay, but please make up your mind soon.\. We want to be finished here at some point.
How?
Alright, I will give you a short briefing as to how this will work out.
After I properly activate our Pathhacker here, enemies will \c[3]attack in waves\c[0].
You gotta defeat them, \c[3]before they reach this point\c[0] and damage our precious machine here.
Careful though, because they'll all have \c[3]shields that reflect damage\c[0].\. So just attacking blindly won't be an option.
Mika
Thankfully we prepared some automated \c[3]defensive turrets\c[0] here.
To activate a turret, \c[3]hit it a few times\c[0] and then use a \c[3]charged projectile on it\c[0]!
When activated with the \c[3]neutral element\c[0] they will \c[3]disrupt the shields\c[0] with each hit.
Later I'll also unlock \c[3]elemental modes\c[0] that will \c[3]cause more damage instead of disrupting the shields\c[0].
Each turret consumes \c[3]25 energy\c[0] on activation.\. You will earn additional energy by \c[3]killing critters and after each wave\c[0].
Mika
Anyway, can we start this up already?
Yes, start the waves
No
Detailed Instructions
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.48.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Good job, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. We neutralized the energy field of the door and there are no more waves on the radar.
Now we just need to unlock the door-mechanism itself.\. Your job here is done.
Report back at our headquarters to get your reward.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.48.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker]. We're still working on opening that door.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.16.name: Taio
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.17.message: Halt!\. Who so darest to enter this cave?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.19.message: Aha!\. At last, yon mighty \v[lore.title.seeker] we requested hath reached us!\. But wilt thou provest worthy?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.22.message: We shall see!!\. By custom of olde, thyne ability shall be tested by trial of...!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.28.name: Mika
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.30.message: BY THE ANCIENTS, STOP MAKING NOISE AND SEND HER DOWN HERE ALREADY!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.38.name: Taio
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.49.settings.event.39.message: A-alright.\..\..\. Thou hast heard the voice.\. Procedest down and to thy left.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.51.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Speaketh to comrade Mika deep in this denne.\. She shall enlighten thee.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.51.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Splendid work, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I beseech thee to give the most verily regardes to our liege.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.51.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Hail, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Thyne presence is most welcome in thise denne.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.51.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Well met, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Thyne presence is expected in thee womb of thise denne.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.51.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Hail, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Thyne presence is most welcome in thise denne.
The barrier is down!\. Another hit and we're done for!
Our barrier has taken some heavy hits!\. Better step up your game, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Barrier is almost down!\. Keep it together, \v[lore.title.seeker]!

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.4.settings.event.10.message: The \c[3]first wave\c[0]  incoming from the \c[3]left side\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.4.settings.event.11.message: As before those \c[3]shields\c[0] will \c[3]reflect damage\c[0], so \c[3]wait for the neutral turrets to get rid of them\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.4.settings.event.12.message: I've also activated the \c[3]Heat and Cold turrets\c[0].\. You can still \c[3]activate them with a charged shot of their respective element\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.4.settings.event.13.message: But don't forget that only \c[3]Neutral Turrets can break shields\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.4.settings.event.37.message: Attention \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. We also got hostiles incoming on the \c[3]right side\c[0] now!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.30.settings.event.3.message: Good job, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. It seems like they will continue to attack \c[3]from both paths at once\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.30.settings.event.4.message: I will now activate our new \c[3]Shock- and Wave-elemental turrets\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.30.settings.event.5.message: As usual \c[3]activate them with a charged shot of their respective element\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.31.settings.event.0.message: \v[lore.title.seeker], my analysis shows that the enemies are \c[3]weak to Shock on the left\c[0] and \c[3]to Wave on the right side\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.31.settings.event.1.message: You should plan you turrets accordingly!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.31.settings.event.31.message: Careful, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Something big is \c[3]approaching from the right\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.32.settings.event.0.message: Fourth group incoming, again from both sides.\. Hang in there, we should be always done.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.33.settings.event.0.message: Dang, I am getting a ton of energy readings!\. Seems like they are mounting a \c[3]huge last assault\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.33.settings.event.1.message: I will put out all of the turrets we got left.\. Make them count!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.34.settings.event.30.message: \c[3]Come back to me for a second\c[0], so we can finish this off!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.35.settings.event.33.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please don't disturb my work!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Okay, there you are.\. So I guess we can finally push through the last hurdle.
This should be similiar to last time you helped us out.\. So just let me give you a short rundown.
Here we have our new and improved \c[3]Trackpower Extraction Device\c[0]!
It will drain the mystical Energy of the Track from this position of power and save it for later use!
Of course, as you'd expect, starting the extraction will provoke hordes of monsters to attack us.
Yeah, typical Track-tantrums, am I right?\. In any case you will have to defend it, \v[lore.title.seeker].
Though this time those sly beasts will come from two paths at once!
All the more reason to use our amazing Turret Defense Grid again.
You just gotta \c[3]hit them a few times\c[0] before \c[3]activating them with a charged attack\c[0], just like last time.
Well, you should get how this works by now.\. Just talk to me again once you want to start.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Mika
Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Ready to defend against those waves?
[nods]
Alright.\. I will start up our generator here in a second.
Mika
Okay, waves should start as soon as I release the safety.
So activate that turret by \c[3]hitting it a few\c[0] times and then using a \c[3]charged projectile on it\c[0]!
[nods]
Hit \c[3]the turret\c[0] first with \c[3]repeated shots\c[0] and lastly with a \c[3]charged shot\c[0] to activate it
[shakes head]
Okay, but let's please get on with it soon.\. This is not the most comfortable place for a picnic.
How?
Alright, I will give you a short briefing as to how this will work out.
After I properly activate our Extractor here, enemies will \c[3]attack in waves\c[0].
And this time from two paths at once even!
You need to defeat them \c[3]before they reach this point\c[0] and damage our precious machine here.
Careful though, because they'll all have \c[3]shields that reflect damage\c[0].\. So just attacking blindly won't be an option.
Mika
Thankfully we prepared some automated \c[3]defensive turrets\c[0] here.
To activate a turret, \c[3]hit it a few times\c[0] and then use a \c[3]charged projectile on it\c[0]!
When activated with the \c[3]neutral element\c[0] they will \c[3]disrupt the shields\c[0] with each hit.
Later I'll also unlock \c[3]elemental modes\c[0] that will \c[3]cause more damage instead of disrupting the shields\c[0].
Each turret consumes \c[3]25 energy\c[0] on activation.\. You will earn additional energy by \c[3]killing critters and after each wave\c[0].
You should also know that every \c[3]type of turret has its own attack pattern\c[0].
You should pay attention to that and learn which one works best on which position!
[nods]
Mika
Anyway, can we start this up already?
Yes, start the waves
No
Detailed Instructions
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Well, well... will you look at that.
\v[lore.title.seeker], our machine is running smoothly and has already gathered lots of the Ancient energy!
Truly a fantastic piece of tech, this baby.\. Moments like this make all the trouble seem worth it.
Oh, yeah.\. You also did fine.\. This operation would have been difficult without your protection.\. So, thanks!
So, yes.\. Report back to our HQ to get your reward!\. And until next time.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.39.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Busy analyzing the data right now!
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.40.settings.event.15.name: Mika
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.40.settings.event.22.name: Mika
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.40.settings.event.23.message: Good to see that you've finally arrived.\. I already finished the preparations a while ago.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/questcave-.entities.40.settings.event.25.message: Well, let's not stand around here, wasting time.\. I will be waiting for you on standby at the machine.
Alright!\. Now activate that other turret on the left, so we can start properly!
The barriers are down!\. Another hit and we're done for!
Our barriers have taken some heavy hits!\. Better step up your game, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Barriers are almost down!\. Keep it together, \v[lore.title.seeker]!

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.93.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: I hate this cave. Way too gloomy and wet. Ruins ma suit, ya know?
We're almost there, just down this way.

assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.3.settings.npcStates.0.event.qu: This is the part of the cavern that got breached by those darn guards.
Once I move the box here, the chip will start tracking your movement.
Your goal is to find a way to the exit south of here without a guard noticing you.
You have to do it alone. No other Seekers.
Talk to me when ya ready, capiche?
And be prepared, because I won't let ya go until ya done, woman.
Oh wait, before my dad yells at me again. Here's a \c[3]Smokaway\c[0] and some \c[3]Intel on the Guards\c[0] our men found.
Use the Smokaway when you get caught, you'll be able to run back here and I'll close the box, got it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.3.settings.npcStates.1.event.qu: Alright, talk to me again if ya want to chicken out.
Also, don't attack the guards in any way. Don't wanna raise suspicion, right?
Use \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] to call me once you're through.
Don't waste my time woman. Get on with it already.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.3.settings.npcStates.2.event.qu: I see ya got some people with you. As said; ain't gonna work. Come back when you lose ya company, capiche?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.3.settings.npcStates.3.event.qu: I knew ya would chicken out.
Then don't stand here and find a way woman.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.6.message: Mh... Oh it's you. Did ya find a way?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.8.elseStep.0: Finally! And it only took you one try. I'm actually impressed.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.10.message: Give me a minute, I'll use the same way using the tracker chip I gave you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.21.message: Damn woman, was this really the only way?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.22.message: So much walking... \.\.\. Thankfully I don't have to carry the goods. That would be just awful.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.24.message: Don't give me that look, will ya?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.25.message: Ya can go back to my dad with the tracker chip and get your reward.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.27.message: Ya can keep the \v[item.343.name] and explore this cavern if ya want.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.28.message: Also, be a good girl and make sure to tell him I helped a lot, gotcha?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.29.0.1.messa: I *knew* I could count on ya. Now off you go, the rest is just a long small tunnel anyway.
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.29.1.1.messa: You... what? Come on... at least have some mercy, will ya?
assets/data/maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-ro.entities.394.settings.event.29.1.3.messa: Screw it then. Off you go. I can handle the rest without you.
What are you still here for? Go to my dad with the chip already.
Thank to ya, I'm now to stand here almost all day watching the carriers bringing in the goods.
So thanks for that, really nice of ya.

I know you mean no harm, but please leave Shad alone.
You broke trust and now my people want war.
Sal'ton human. I am sorry but great eldest has forbidden to sell goods to humans.
Sal'ton human. Great eldest has allowed trade with Seekers.
I trade many sets for very few items!
I do not sell valuable goods to filthy humans.
You helped with black creatures. Many thanks!
Sal'ton human. You helped Shad so we will help you.
I trade metals I found in jungle.
Humans have broken trust of Shad. Now we avoid them.
Great thanks, but still not trust humans fully.
This is Shad trade place. But we do not trade with untruthful humans anymore.
This is Shad trade place. You helped us, so maybe traders will help you.
Once humans and Shad were friends. Now many Shad here believe humans are evil.
Village is free of black fiends.
Maybe now we can be friends again.
You are responsible for \c[3]black monsters\c[0] in village!
But same humans also \c[3]defeated black monsters\c[0] in village.
What you want, child?
What is Human doing here?
Grandmother, I have good news. The Wiccats are history!
These Seekers helped get rid of the infestation that befell our village.
Oh, this so?
[nods]
Indeed, it was quite the...
So you work with humans against my will?
Grandmother, please...
I just wish for peace between our races.
I know child, but defeating Wiccats will be no solution for long.
As long as humans poison jungle, our struggle will continue.
Still... It is great relief that our village has been freed.
Seeker.
You helped Shad. For that, we are thankful. I wish your kindness was more common for your kind.
I will order Shad to free way to sacred temple.
But let your people know:
Should your poisoning continue and Wiccats return, there will be no more compromises.
I will go to old home now. K'tara you will come too. Need to talk.
Thank you so much, Seeker!
There is not much I can give you, but I have a few human credits.
I hope we can meet again! For now, it seems I have a good scolding ahead of me.
And with that, the quest was completed!
Justice has been served! For now!
Will it be the last we hear of those black monsters?\. Only the future will tell!
Yeah, that was fun.
Like how you tried to join those conversations and they just ignored you.
Ugh...\. Well yeah.
I assume it's because Lea is our party leader and the NPCs expect her to not answer in the first place.
Anyway, we're now free to enter the Temples to the north!
Hm...\. but I think we played enough for today, Polly.
Right, it was a good session!
Thanks for joining us, Lea.
And...\. it also seems you lightened up a little.
[nods]
I'm happy to hear that.
Maybe we can play sometime again.
Sure. It would be much easier to catch you for another duel that way!
Bye!
Please, give the girl some rest, Polly.
Alright. For now.
Until then, Spheromancer Lea!
Goodbye!
Bye!
Hello, Lea!
I did not expect this turn of events.
But it seems you got along quite well...
Well then, should we call it a day as well?
[nods]
Alright then...\. Good night, Lea!
Bye!
Logout
This is \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. Village of Shad.
Human not welcome here, but we make exception for \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
You are welcome guest in V'rda Vil!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.782.settings.dialog.3.text: They come into jungle filled with dreams and aspiration!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.782.settings.dialog.4.text: They want it all and try to use power of Ancients, the Track and power of Technology!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.31.message: It must be a strange feeling waking up in the middle of the jungle like this.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.36.message: Actually, I would like to ask a few more questions about your memories of Sapphire Ridge.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.38.message: What exactly was it that you saw?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.39.message: Do you think you saw...\. Satoshi and Gautham somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.41.message: Okay...\. here is my hypothesis about all this.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.42.message: Could it be, that there exists some kind of \c[3]hidden location\c[0] somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.48.message: I figured that, assuming they are still working on Evotars, they need a place within the Playground to properly test them.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.49.message: Now...\. there is Vermillion Wasteland, which seems to be used for that.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.50.message: But your memories indicate there might be a place like that in Sapphire Ridge as well, correct?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.52.message: Hopefully we will find a way to access it...
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.61.message: I'm glad to see you're back again.\. You've been missed for quite some time.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.63.message: D-Did you by any chance already do the first mandatory quest of Gaia's Garden?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.66.message: Oh, nice! That means you can enter the dungeon.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.67.message: Uhm...\. did you finish any of the dungeons already?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.70.message: I was in fact...\. uhm...\. planning to run one of them today!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.71.message: So how about...\. we meet up in front of the dungeons?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.76.message: I'll be waiting at the \c[3]Peridot Approach landmark\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.82.message: Oh, C'tron is back I see.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.83.message: Does he want to run the dungeon together with you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.85.message: Uhm...\. I wanted to extend your vocabulary, but I am still not ready.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.86.message: Maybe if I hurry up, I can give you another word soon.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.88.message: Anyway, better not keep C'tron waiting for too long.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.784.settings.event.93.task: Meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the \c[3]Peridot Approach\c[0] Landmark in the north of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.793.settings.event.0.message: Boring wood bridge. Why no laser bridge?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.794.settings.event.1.message: Indeed! Far off from Basin Keep. This tribe is not on friendly terms with humankind!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.795.settings.event.0.message: Oh, we're back in the village of the bird people!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.795.settings.event.1.message: I like this place, also that they're now more friendly with you after you helped them.

assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.646.settings.dialog.0.text: Did human really bring \c[3]black monster\c[0] into village?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.646.settings.dialog.1.text: Didn't you hear about \c[3]source\c[0] of black monster? It very shiny and metal!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.646.settings.dialog.3.text: But we never saw human bring monsters or source into village!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.646.settings.dialog.4.text: That true, but who else could done it?
I can not trade with you human. Humans have made jungle sick.
You may helped Shad, but I still not trust human!
I saw you getting rid of the \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s from here, thanks for that!
Good. And it looks as sturdy as ever.
Now we can sneak past the guards.
But we have to take a \c[3]little detour first\c[0].
The hidden path we need to use is outside the village.
Following the \c[3]right path\c[0] to the Grand Krys'kajo at \c[3]Clinging River\c[0] there's a small tree.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.662.settings.dialog.0.text: Seeker helped us get rid of cats.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.662.settings.dialog.2.text: Maybe not reason for \c[3]black monsters\c[0] after all!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.667.settings.event.1.message: These Shads are experts in wooden constructions.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.667.settings.event.2.message: Even with the fierce weather of the jungle, these bridges are said to remain stable for many years.

K'tara house is now lost thanks to \c[3]black monsters\c[0].
You helped with black creatures, thank you Human.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.788.settings.dialog.1.text: Yes! Probably infested jungle on purpose.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.788.settings.dialog.2.text: They want to take our land!
Find the \c[3]Stone Key\c[0] inside my house and bring it here.
Once you got it, let's meet again at the \c[3]V'rda Vil landmark\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.9.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.13.message: This is the northern part of the village.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.14.message: As you can see, the beasts have already come this far.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.20.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.22.message: These are the black cats that have taken over our village.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.27.message: But these are only a few. The real threat is further ahead in the \c[3]Chief's Den\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.35.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.37.message: However, there is no way the other Shad will let you through.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.39.message: The villagers are dead set on shutting down the power plant. They will deny any other kind of outside help.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.41.message: Yes, I know it's cumbersome. It's the same kind of stubbornness I know from a certain someone...
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.43.message: Anyway, that means we have to help them... in a sneaky way. And I have a plan.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.44.message: You see that house over there?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.49.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.51.message: That is my home. It's now overrun by those creatures, but it has a valuable treasure!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.52.message: One that lets us sneak our way around the guards.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.54.message: All we need to do is get it. That's where you come in.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.59.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.61.message: You need to go into my house and grab my old \c[3]Stone Key\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.62.message: Do you think you can do that?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.65.message: I leave it up to you if you want to get rid of the cats or not.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.66.message: The more are gone, the happier everyone will be I imagine.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.67.message: But they are very aggressive so be careful!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.69.message: Okay, let's open these ropes so you can jump down from here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.70.message: Sadly, there is no other way in...
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.85.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.89.message: Once you've got the key, let's meet again at the \c[3]V'rda Vil landmark\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.90.message: Good Luck and may the Krys'kajo be with you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.93.message: So... we only have to get the key.\. We don't have to fight those kittens, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/clear-p.entities.792.settings.event.94.message: We don't have to.\. Still, those Wiccats are a true threat to those villagers!

Move away human, great eldest has forbidden entry to old home because of \c[3]black monsters\c[0].
Look up to see what you humans did.
You brought \c[3]black monsters\c[0] into our land.
We had to give up great eldest house to keep fiends here.
This path, leads to great eldress house.
You may pass, since you helped.
K'tara
We're finally here.
Let's act quickly. If I remember correctly, the spot was somewhere around here.
K'tara
Eeek! I forgot how suddenly it comes up...
K'tara
Back when I was young, me and the other younglings played here and found this.
I believe it was an old escape route built by the founders of our village.
The important part: We can now get to the Chief's Den.
Up ahead are a lot of Wiccats. And also something which I believe must be their source.
I don't know exactly where the source is, but my bet is in one of the houses.
The others told me it should not be very hard to miss as it looks pretty out of place.
Some kind of \c[3]glowing pole\c[0]... They believe it's an extension from that cursed powerplant.
My hope is that by getting rid of the source, we can put an end to this infestation.
Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
[nods]
I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
Do we have to fight the kittens again...?
It should suffice to get rid of the \c[3]source\c[0]! But we may not be able to avoid fighting some of the Wiccats this time!
This game is cruel...!
Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
You're back! Did you find the source of the infestation?
Where did you find it? What was it?
It was below the Chief's house? And some strange poles that summoned the Wiccats?
That really doesn't sound like something humans could do.
This is a sacred place to my people. We better not tell them that you've been there...
Well, all those Wiccats sure are gone suddenly...
This is amazing. Let's quickly go to our Eldress and tell her the news!
If she sees the cats gone, I'm certain the Shad will calm down.
She is resting in the western part of the village. There is a large tree in the middle of the lake.
It looks like my input wasn't needed.

assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.10.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Thank you again for bringing peace to our village.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hello Seeker! It's good to see you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: No more Wiccats have infested the village.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: And the Shad have calmed down.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.11.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Hello Seeker! It's good to see you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.11.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Thanks so much fore finding the source of this vile infestation!

assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.39.settings.event.25.message: Is that the source of wicked kittens?!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.39.settings.event.26.message: Indeed! Summoning evil black cats on poor villagers! This can't stand!!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.87.settings.event.19.message: Looks like those were the last of them.
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.87.settings.event.25.message: Indeed! Were they really an extension of the power plant? Very mysterious!
assets/data/maps/jungle/clearing/interio.entities.87.settings.event.26.message: Let's return to that K'tara girl for now.

Oh! My guardian senses are detecting that precious \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0] in your belongings!
Don't gimme that look, lady! It's all that I'm detecting!
Anyway, you're free to enter. Good luck!
I'm sure you're dying to enter this temple here to my back, but I have to ask you to show me the \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0] first.
I know it's an annoying formality, but rules are rules!
Just head to \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0]. Really, it should be a breeze for you to acquire that pass over there.
A white Shad came a while back and all the Shad left.
I assume you have something to do with this?
Thanks a lot. I wouldn't know what to do if this escalated...
I'll just pretend they are not here...
The path to the north leads up to the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
You first need to enter the dungeons to the \c[3]left\c[0] and \c[3]right\c[0] to collect the \c[3]\v[item.231.name]\c[0] and \c[3]\v[item.286.name]\c[0].
If you've already finished those dungeons... just revisit the \c[3]boss rooms\c[0]. I'm sure you'll find the shades somewhere in there.
It looks like you're ready to enter! Better be prepared then. This is the last dungeon of Gaia's Garden.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.10.message: Shad will not stand down! Humans have poisoned great jungle.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.11.message: No more! We block entrance for all to save jungle!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.12.message: This is too much for a single guard...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.19.message: I'm very sorry Seeker, but as you can see we have a situation here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.20.message: The Shad formed a wall and blocked the path to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] and its trials.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.23.message: They let no one through and are clearly agitated.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.24.message: I fear that as long as they're acting this way, no Seeker can progress any further.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.25.message: To be honest, I'm not sure what to do.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.27.message: What we need here is an official statement from our mayor.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.28.message: I have yet to receive any instructions concerning this whole mess...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.30.message: Seeker, it would be a huge help if you could send word to the mayor.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.33.message: Thank you! I will try and hold the fort here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.36.message: It seems that fate won't let us reach the temples just yet!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.37.message: Let us quickly seek an audition with the mayor before this conflict escalates any further!
So...\. back to the city again?
And where do we find that mayor?
Why of course, in the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
Okay. I start seeing the pattern here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.342.settings.event.39.task: Visit the \c[3]mayor\c[0] in \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0] to tell him about the Shad blocking the path to the temples.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.343.settings.dialog.0.text: Is there no way for us to find common ground?
