assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.343.settings.dialog.1.text: No! Humans have broken trust with Shad.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.31.message: Wait...\. something is coming from down there!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.75.message: Oh you have got to be kidding!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.87.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.91.message: I'm so sorry. I could not stop them.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.93.message: The \c[3]Wiccats\c[0], they're back already! Some of my people have been attacked!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.94.message: Now they're hell bent on shutting down the power plant for real.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.97.message: Hey Tara, it's been a while. And you brought a lot of company as well!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.101.name: Dr. Cretia
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.106.message: Let me guess, the Cats are back?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.108.message: Well, we got them too. Right at the power plant.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.111.message: I've got them right where I want them!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.113.message: This is the perfect opportunity to research the heck out of these buggers!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.114.message: To determine their source - the actual reason for their existence!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.115.message: Spoilers: It won't be the power plant.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.116.message: I wish I had your confidence...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.117.message: Oh I don't need confidence! I have science!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.118.message: Anyway Tara... Please try to keep your folks calm.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.119.message: I can't have them charge the power plant for the time being.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.123.message: You have experience in dealing with those Wiccats, correct?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.125.message: Great! Follow me this way, I need your assistance ASAP!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.130.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.133.message: Yeah, she's the kind that takes your assistance for granted.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.134.message: Still... this might be our only chance to resolve this conflict peacefully...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.138.message: Looks like we have to solve another little quest before entering the last dungeon.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.139.message: Oui, oui. It would have been too easy otherwise, I guess!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.350.settings.event.140.task: Solve the quest \c[3]The Root Cause\c[0] to get access to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
Lou and I have known each other for a long time.
Without her, I probably wouldn't have found my interest in human society.
Anyway, if she's that confident I'm sure she has a plan that will help us all.
You follow her to the power plant. I'll try and hold off my people for as long as I can.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.14.message: Here we are! That famous dungeon crossing!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.23.message: I think that is up to us.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.24.message: There are two temples we have to complete first in any order.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.45.message: Once we have completed both, we can enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] to the north!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.53.message: Mon dieu, that's a lot of dungeons.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.55.message: Well, we don't have to do them all at once.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.56.message: Oui, but I'd like to finish at least one of them today.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.65.message: Oh right, what about you Lea?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.66.message: Are you ready to dive right into dungeon crawling?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.68.message: If you like, we can take a stroll through the jungle first. Punching some more parrots.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.69.message: Well, yeah...\. we could do that.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.70.message: We leave it up to you, Lea.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.71.message: But of course, no entering a dungeon without us!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.371.settings.event.74.task: Run the \c[3]So'najiz\c[0] or \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.11.message: So...\. should we start another dungeon now?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.12.message: Well...\. It is a bit late, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.13.message: I'm afraid I have to logout soon.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.14.message: Oui, same for me. I don't think another dungeon fits in.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.17.message: Before we log off, we should drop by the headquarters and say hello to Lin and the others.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.18.message: Just let them know that Lea is back again and ready for action.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.22.message: D'accord! Let's not wait too long, then.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.23.message: I'm not sure how much longer they'll be online.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.374.settings.event.25.task: Talk to \c[3]Hlin\c[0] in the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.7.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.11.message: Lou and I were just talking. Thank you so much for finding the cause of all our problems.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.12.message: I already talked to my people and for now they at least will let you Seekers to the tree.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.13.message: However, it might take a while until they all see the fruits of your labor.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.15.message: I will do my best to restore the relationship between humans and Shad.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.entities.376.settings.event.16.message: Thank you again, Seeker and may we meet again!

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: The good Seeker, what can I do for you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: It was built pretty much at the same time we built the city.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.7: We made sure not to interfere with the track at all.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: To put it simply: The plant only absorbs energy that is naturally emitted by the temple.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.9: Simple and clean energy. Quite brilliant if I do say so myself.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Dr. Cretia
Make yourself comfortable, Seeker. This may take a while.
Dr. Cretia
So...\.\.\. We know that the power plant isn't causing this problem, you know why?
...Why?
Because the jungle was already "infested" when we started building the plant.
The Shad here seem to forget about that. But I understand their frustration.
Also these cats...\.\.\. \c[3]They attack on sight\c[0].
Normally sub-types of the same family follow the same patterns.
Meaning they SHOULD behave like Shokats. But they don't.
This got me thinking: \c[3]Where have I seen this before?\c[0]
Well, the \c[3]Bergen Mine\c[0] of course!
The track itself spawned these little bugs that took over our machinery and integrated it into its temple.
So... Maybe the same thing is happening here!
\c[3]Something\c[0] is controlling those cats and making them so hostile.
I studied those bugs for quite a while, you know. Fascinating technology.
They used a special frequency and impulses to override systems.
Obviously I extracted both the frequency and the semi-magnetic impulse rate.
Where is it?
Ah, there you are!
And done! That was easier than I expected.
Dr. Cretia
Everything's ready! Let's head outside for the field experiment!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Please come back and report your findings once you do, okay?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.26.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Dr. Cretia
Well hello, Seeker. You have been gone quite a while.
Excuse my overprotective Bodyguard.
Somehow the Mayor thinks it's necessary... As if I needed it.
So, what did you find?
Sorry...
What? You found a strange black sloth north of the Infested Marshes?
It was doing something to a part of the track?
A pole appeared and repaired part of the temple?
[nods]
Very interesting...
Could it be that these poles were triggered as a certain counter-measure?
I analyzed the data I got from the poles you fought here.
These poles act very much like a form of debugging process.
Each pole checking a certain sub-function or routine.
When it can't find a "problem" it extends the search by creating more poles.
Something must have gone wrong and the track's "Debugger" identified the Shad and us as the cause.
Which isn't too far fetched, judging from our experience with the mine...
Ironic that the actual cause was right in front of them.
Well, anyway. Since no more poles are spawning I think we can assume we "calmed" the track.
Still, I will make my way there now to make sure my assumptions are correct.
Even though I'm pretty sure I'm right.
Probably take Vince along to "protect" me from the evil track.
Thank you, Seeker. I will talk to K'tara on my way there.
Hopefully the Shad will see reason.
You can now finally access the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] for real!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.29.settings.event.9.message: What business do you have with Dr. Cretia?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/lou-office.j.entities.29.settings.event.12.message: I see. Please wait here for a moment.

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
A little spark can grant life
to any creature of this world.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
Yet a most furious thunder
will humble those creatures in awe.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
Among the fiercest of lightning
you stayed persistent.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
With calm and calculated waves,
you phased through electric discord.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.12.text:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.14.text:
Take this Shade, one of a pair,
to reach the grand tree.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-expo-s.entities.4.settings.event.23.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.

Too bad, I thought I had a pretty good run this time.
That boss at the end was pretty neat.
That final part was pretty intense, wasn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.122.settings.event.32.message: And I thought you'd do well since you figured out the puzzles so quickly.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.122.settings.event.33.message: Well...\. I had a pretty hard time at the last section.\. Too many of those enemies.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.122.settings.event.34.message: Yeah that was quite something, wasn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.122.settings.event.35.message: Alors, the space bird is waiting!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.0.t: \c[3]G'oni\c[0], the creator of ever-flowing waters and twin-brother of \c[3]K'win\c[0], was busy filling our planet with oceans and lakes.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.1.t: The water overflowing from the lakes was slowly moving down the hills into the ocean. However, the water in the oceans was almost motionless.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.2.t: As K'win watched those boring, calm waters, she had an idea. She created light winds flying over the ocean, creating an abundance of dancing waves on its surface.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.3.t: At first G'oni did not like this change, as he preferred his waters calm and quiet.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.4.t: But as he saw creatures playing with the waves and using the winds to travel across the oceans, he reluctantly agreed to keep it.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.5.t: This made K'win very enthusiastic and so she decided to create stronger and stronger winds, making the waves go higher and higher.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.6.t: This led to the most fearsome storms and tidal waves, flooding vast amounts of land. G'oni quickly interfered.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.126.settings.interact.event.7.t: K'win understood that she made a terrible mistake. To make it up to her twin-brother, she created many creatures to live deep within the waters.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.0.t: When \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] witnessed the advancements of our kind, they decided to send the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0] wrapped in an \c[3]Envelope of solid rock and ice\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.1.t: As he sent out the envelope, \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] was ever-so-careful, only giving it the slightest nudge. After all, he didn't want his creation, the earth and mountains, to be damaged when the message arrived.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.2.t: \c[3]K'win\c[0] watched the envelope fly towards us, ever so slowly. She watched and watched, growing more and more impatient.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.3.t: She knew that Di'aro wanted to be careful, but if this continued the message would never arrive in time.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.4.t: K'win then remembered how our kind could withstand her most powerful thunderstorms and fierce hurricanes. She was confident that we could receive a fast-approaching message just as well.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.5.t: Without hesitation, K'win reached back and gave the envelope a massive blow, launching it toward us at high speed.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.127.settings.interact.event.6.t: It is thanks to her confidence in our resilience that our kind received the Message of the Sky in time.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.128.settings.interact.event.0.t: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.128.settings.interact.event.1.t: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.128.settings.interact.event.2.t: \c[3]K'win\c[0] is one of these gods. Born a twin to \c[3]G'oni\c[0], she is the God of the \c[3]Pentagon\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]storms and lightning\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.129.settings.interact.event.0.t: K'win is the creator of \c[3]storms and lightning\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.129.settings.interact.event.1.t: Her strong winds keep our world in constant motion, her fierce thunderstorms are awe-inspiring, sparking curiosity within us.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.129.settings.interact.event.2.t: Finally, her little sparks also give life to every creature of this world.
One dungeon completed, two to go!
So that means we're finally ready for that Grand-something dungeon, right?
You are ready to enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] now!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.132.settings.event.30.message: This place here is pretty nice, don't you think?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.132.settings.event.31.message: I'd like to have a small look around before we continue.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.132.settings.event.32.message: Sure! Though I have to admit that huge electric stream up there makes me slightly nervous.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.139.settings.dialog.0.text: Why... Why would they do this...?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.139.settings.dialog.1.text: Making me fall...\. through the ground...?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.139.settings.dialog.3.text: The ground...\. that's the thing that makes you...\. not fall...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.139.settings.dialog.4.text: How dare they take this away from me?!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.139.settings.dialog.5.text: Come on... this wasn't exactly "falling", right?\. More like...\. floating!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.150.settings.dialog.0.text: Hot damn, that current up there! Those Ancients sure know how to be flashy.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.150.settings.dialog.1.text: No joke, they really must have plenty of power to keep it running at all times.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.150.settings.dialog.2.text: Yeah, no wonder the locals tap the power of the temple.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.151.settings.dialog.0.text: Hey, do you see that darker area over there between the mountains?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.151.settings.dialog.1.text: Oh yeah, that's \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0]!\. It's always night over there.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.151.settings.dialog.2.text: How does that work? What's even blotting out the sun in the first place?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.151.settings.dialog.3.text: Shadoon works in mysterious ways.\. Don't think too much about it.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.152.settings.dialog.0.text: Wow... Trees as far as the eye can see. Gaia's Garden really is huge.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.152.settings.dialog.1.text: It definitely felt that way. Took us some time to walk through it.

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.318.settings.blockEvent.0.thenS: This is \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0]. One of the temples in Gaia's Garden.
Are you sure you want to enter the dungeon already, Lea?
Shouldn't you meet up with \c[3]C'tron\c[0] first?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.318.settings.blockEvent.0.elseS: Come on, Lea. No more dungeon running today.
There is still another day tomorrow, right?
Here we go...\. Let the race continue!!
Uhm...\. we already started the race of the \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0].
I mean we can just put that race on the hold and run the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] instead.
It's your call!
You want to start the race of the Zir'vitar Temple?
Hm... Looking at your stats and level, do you really think that you're prepared, Lea?
True... I heard your average stats should be somewhat above \c[3]180\c[0].
We can look for better equipment at Basin Keep first, if you want.
Anyway it's your call!
I think we're all well prepared, non?
Ready to start the race of the Zir'vitar Temple?
[nods]
Okey-dokey!
Everybody get ready!
[shakes head]
D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
[yes]
[no]
Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
Don't forget about our race, non?
Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.459.settings.event.8.message: Here we are... the Zir'vitar dungeon.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.459.settings.event.18.message: Well... we're at the border of the \c[3]infested jungle\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.459.settings.event.19.message: Oh right, and the infestation comes from the power plant here?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.459.settings.event.20.message: That's what the shad believe anyway.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.6.message: Well, well. You certainly match the description.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.8.message: Are you not the Seeker who solved the problem with the Shad?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.11.message: Ah, so my calculations were indeed correct. As always.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.12.message: Anyway, your help has been very much appreciated. My name is \c[3]Dr. Lou Cretia\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.14.name: Dr. Cretia
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.15.message: Of course the Shad are a tad off in their thesis that the power plant is the root cause for this strange "infestation".
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.16.message: I would know, it's my obligation to make sure of it.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.18.message: There is no leakage, no parameters off the expected spectrum.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.19.message: From the track's perspective, the plant might as well not be here!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.20.message: Obviously something else must be causing this.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.21.message: I'm not sure what exactly, but I will continue to investigate.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.23.message: Well...I'm sure you're here to enter the temple. So I won't distract you any further.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.24.message: Good luck and if there is anything you'd like to know, feel free to drop by in my office.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.25.message: It's in that building to the left!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.465.settings.event.38.name: Dr. Cretia
Good. First step, let's get rid of the \c[3]cats and their source\c[0]!
You know how to deal with those, right?
Let's first get rid of these \c[3]cats and their source\c[0]!
Perfect. I took some measurements and things are behaving exactly as I expected.
You see, you might think the \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s\c[0] and their source are already defeated.
But in fact, we only scratched the surface of the problem!
I call this the \c[3]Frequency And Impulse Rattler\c[0] or the \c[3]FAIR\c[0].
This device is able to disrupt a rather large field around you.
Anything that uses the same frequency should get picked up by this device.
And if my calculations are correct, you should be able to see the real source of the problem!
See? I knew it! We just uncovered another hidden part of the track's working!
These poles must be the \c[3]true source\c[0], controlling and spawning the cats over time!
Now that we can see them, we should be able to remove them!
Go ahead, Seeker! But be careful, these poles are the real thing. They might behave differently!
Go ahead, Seeker! But be careful, these poles are the real thing. They might behave differently!
Who would have thought the track could hide these poles in plain sight.
And it seems they form a kind of chain stretching out over a larger area.
This mechanism feels somewhat familiar, though I can't put my finger on what it does exactly.
This pole here pointed downwards, right?
So this means there are more of these, maybe they lead to a kind of root from which all these poles originated.
In which case you must find it!
Please come back and report your findings once you do, okay?
Great! I'll be in my office again, pondering on what we found so far.
Dr. Cretia told us to close off this area for now.
Dr. Cretia told us to close off this area for now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.473.settings.event.4.name: Dr. Cretia
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.473.settings.event.10.name: Dr. Cretia
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.473.settings.event.13.message: Please ignore them for now. We'll deal with those in a bit!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.478.settings.event.4.message: We need to make sure they don't escape.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.480.settings.event.3.message: So much data... Come back to me, Seeker.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/shock-exteri.entities.491.settings.event.9.message: Looks like it's not over yet.

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.10.settings.event.10.text: ...with the endurance of a flowing river...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.10.settings.event.11.text: ... with the agility of a gust of wind....
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.12.settings.event.10.text: ...with the strength of a burning sun...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.12.settings.event.11.text: ... with the resilience of a solid mountain...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.10.thenStep.4: In the end, both Spheromancers came in first! Exactly how it was meant to be!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.10.thenStep.2: Oui, oui, Spheromancers rule. Blah, blah.
You win this time, this doesn't mean anything!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.10.elseStep.5: Spheromancer Lea! We've been waiting for you!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.10.elseStep.6: Hah...\. at least I wasn't last.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.10.elseStep.1: Just how long have you been waiting?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.12.message: Well to be fair, I've run the Grand Krys'kajo before.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.17.message: Obviously. This is not my first CrossWorlds character.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.18.message: Then...\. then why didn't you say anything?!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.19.message: You dragged me into the whole thing.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.20.message: I figured you'd be aware that I'm an advanced player.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.21.thenStep.0: Well... you lost to Lea several times in the duels so I thought you were all talk.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.21.thenStep.3: No, that's just because Lea is exceptionally skilled! That's all!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.21.elseStep.0: I didn't think an advanced player would seek duels with new players like Lea.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.21.elseStep.2: Well, there aren't too many Spheromancers to be found with matching level.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.31.message: The \c[3]very top of the Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.39.message: Oui, and all we had to do is beat an ape and gigantic whale in a tree.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.41.message: Are we really that high up?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.42.message: It is just an illusion of course. We Seekers would not survive long in space without oxygen.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.14.settings.event.43.message: Uhm...\. do we even need to breathe as avatars?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.13.text:
Your journey has brought you 
to many different places.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.14.text:
From freezing mountains,
over scorching deserts,
to the unforgiving wilderness.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.15.text:
Now you stand victorious,
high above the ground.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.16.text:
You mastered all 4 elements,
withstood all the trials.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.17.text:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.19.text:
Take this Shade 
to open the path further to the east.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.29.text:
Your resourcefulness is apparent 
and deserves to be further rewarded.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.30.text:
I shall add to your strength
to prepare you for challenges to come.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.15.settings.event.57.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.36.message: So...\. did you see anything new in your dreams?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.38.message: Well...\. anything you think you will be able to communicate?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.42.message: It is fine, Lea. I suppose they are just dreams in the end.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.46.message: It is located to the \c[3]east of Autumn's Fall\c[0], remember?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.48.message: And once we are there...\. well....\.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.49.message: I suppose we just have to walk around until you recognize the places from your dreams.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.51.message: If I remember correctly you first have to solve a \c[3]main story quest\c[0] in order to access the whole location.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.52.message: So it is probably a good idea to focus on that first.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.55.message: It is fine to explore the area with your friends.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.56.message: But once we get close to uncovering that hidden location, we should make sure we are alone.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.57.message: I expect none of this is really supposed to be...\. official.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.71.message: Oh! What a coincidence. I guess you just logged in, didn't you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.73.message: Emilie already told me how you did the temple together with Apollo.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.74.message: That really must have been interesting.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.77.message: I just did the dungeon at my own pace. It was nice for a change.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.78.message: Anyway, I just collected the \c[3]Star Shade\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.79.message: So if you want me to tag along in Sapphire Ridge, just tell me!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.82.message: By the way...\. This place is quite amazing, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.90.message: A view like this... just like a clear sky at night.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.109.text:
When you see it, 
you start to realize...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.110.text:
... just how insignificant 
we are to this world.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.112.text:
By the way...\.
I know a good sign for this.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.140.message: How come you know this? Did somebody teach it to you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.143.message: I never knew you actually learned sign language before.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.147.message: You should drop by the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] now that you're online.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.148.message: We've got some great news for you!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.150.message: I'll go ahead, let's meet over there!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.164.message: How do you know that sign, Lea?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.166.message: Or rather...\. do you remember who taught it to you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.169.message: Well, we could enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] now...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.170.message: But I suppose you might as well go to your \c[3]guild first\c[0] and listen to their news.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.18.settings.event.173.task: Visit your guild at \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] and listen to their news.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.27.message: Because you can learn all the \c[3]level 3 combat arts\c[0] now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.33.message: Do you want to duel with Lea? Right now?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.34.message: Well...\. Now certainly isn't the best time.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.35.message: We both need time to prepare, get familiar with all the new skills.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.37.message: Oui, also we played for a whole lot at once, didn't we?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.38.message: It's about time to log off.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.39.message: That...\. is a good point, too.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.40.message: Anyway, didn't expect to say this but it was pretty fun racing with you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.41.message: You should join our party again some time, Grasshead.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.45.message: Anyway, I'll logout now. See you around.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.47.message: Until then, Spheromancer Lea and Pentafist Emilie!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.64.message: Alright, looks like we are finally ready!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.65.message: Now that we collected the \c[3]Star Shade\c[0], we can enter \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.67.message: Anyway, we have played for a pretty long time again.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.19.settings.event.68.message: Should we call it a day as well?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.25.settings.dialog.1.text: The floor is TRANSPARENT! There is NO FENCE!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.25.settings.dialog.4.text: They made me go HIGHER up than ANYONE has any RIGHT to be!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.25.settings.dialog.6.text: Do they want to scar me for life?!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.29.settings.dialog.0.text: E'nel really is one badass goddess. Look at that flaming blade.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.29.settings.dialog.3.text: I-I mean her sword! It's all flames! Must be really hot, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: The absolute silence of the vacuum.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.8: Well...\. I suppose the last one doesn't apply.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.45.settings.dialog.0.text: I bet this god has a number of tricks up his sleeve!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.45.settings.dialog.4.text: Now I wonder what card games the Ancients used to play.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.0.text: Phew... that boss was quite something, wasn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.1.text: Oh yeah! That ape was raging like crazy at end!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.2.text: Oh... did you guys defeat the whale first?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.3.text: Yeah... isn't that pretty much the only way?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.4.text: No, you can defeat the ape first as well.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.5.text: You just need to knock it off the whale in the later rounds, using those wave teleport bubbles.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.46.settings.dialog.6.text: Whoa, I didn't even notice! I was just 100% focused on punching that whale...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.47.settings.dialog.0.text: And? Did you recognize any constellations yet?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.47.settings.dialog.1.text: Not really... do you think the celestial sphere is even the same?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.47.settings.dialog.2.text: I heard this place isn't too far from our planet, so it should be about the same.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.47.settings.dialog.3.text: Well...\. unless all of this is just simulated, which it probably is.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-expo-sp.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.text: Right...\. They like to mess with things like this to keep their artistic freedom.

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.6.message: Finally! We're here! Look at that huge tree!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.12.message: So that's the Grand Krys'kajo? Certainly majestic.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.17.message: Oui! So... are you ready for the final sprint?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.21.message: I-I'm sorry but I really have to leave.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.26.message: That quest from before just took so much longer than I expected.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.27.message: I still have things to prepare for an assignment tomorrow...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.29.message: Sorry...\. But you know...\. It's fine if you two continue the run without me.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.31.message: No Tronny, you're a part of this as well!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.32.message: Except I wasn't there when you ran the Temple Mine, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.35.message: Sorry, but I really have to log out now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.36.message: We can do the run together tomorrow if you like, but again it's fine if you continue without me.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.38.message: Anyway, see you two soon!\. Good bye!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.50.message: Assignment blah blah.\. Have to log off blah.\. Responsibility blah.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.53.message: Oui, oui. It was the same for me before, I know...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.54.message: Anyway, what should we do?\. Should we continue the race or not?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.63.message: The Grand Krys'kajo, crown of the jungle!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.65.message: Finally.\. They sure added enough obstacles along the way.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.69.message: Well then, ready for the final run?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.72.message: I've had enough for today. We just ran two whole dungeons in a row.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.73.message: Also the whole thing is a bit too stressful for my taste.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.74.message: Have the dungeons been too difficult?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.75.message: No, I mean your constant nagging while you waited for me.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.76.message: Oh...\. I was just wondering whether you've been stuck.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.77.message: I didn't ask for help.\. I just like to take things slow.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.80.message: That's a shame. I was looking forward to running it today.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.81.message: Just climb up that tree yourself then.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.82.message: I'll do it myself tomorrow and take it slow.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.83.message: And that's really fine with you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.84.message: Sure, I'd rather just logout now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.92.message: Oh, look who's over there. Hi Lea!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.105.message: Here's an idea: how about you join Lea's party again and run the dungeon with her?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.127.message: What did your friend just say there? Join Lea's party... \c[3]again\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.135.message: You two...\. have played in a party?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.144.message: Indeed. We had a most formidable party just two days ago!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.146.message: That must have been rough times. I'm so sorry...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.149.message: Anyway! Together we're 3 people now, non?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.150.message: Do you want to join our dungeon race or not?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.151.message: You actually make a competition out of this? That's cute.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.154.message: Look, I usually avoid partying with Pentafist scrubs...
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.155.message: But with two Spheromancers this might almost be enjoyable.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.157.message: So yes! I'll join your race!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.158.message: Oui, no way you'll back out of this now!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.159.message: The race is on! And this Pentafist scrub will kick your ass!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.161.message: Good! What are we waiting for then?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.336.settings.event.173.task: It's time to finally run the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and... \c[3]Apollo\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.337.settings.blockEvent.6.thenS: Ready to start the race of the huge-ass tree?
Please, this is the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0], the most sacred place in Gaia's Garden.
Oui, oui, but are you ready though?
D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.337.settings.blockEvent.6.elseS: Hey Lea, don't forget to call Grasshead before we start the race.
I'm looking forward to kicking his derriere myself this time.
Hey Lea, don't forget about \c[3]Tronny\c[0]! We want to race the dungeon together, right?
So you want to run the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] already?
You should call \c[3]Emilie\c[0] for the dungeon race.
Spheromancer Lea, what about that Pentafist Girl?
As much as I'd like to have a race between two Spheromancers, we should proceed as was originally planned!
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie... Apollo, right?
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/tree-exterio.entities.361.settings.interact.event.0.t:
Some ancient gibberish you can't make out. But there is a sequence of arrows below:
---
\i[ancient-code-1] \i[ancient-code-2] \i[ancient-code-3] \i[ancient-code-4] \i[ancient-code-5]
