assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.8.text:
Water rises up to the sky,
falls upon the earth, flows into the sea.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.9.text:
An everlasting circle painting this world
in the vivid colors of abundant flora.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.10.text:
Yet under the pressure of deep waters,
you stayed persistent.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.11.text:
With lightning fast conduction,
you pulled your way through fluid obstacles.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.12.text:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.14.text:
Take this Shade, one of a pair,
to reach the grand tree.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-expo-sp.entities.4.settings.event.23.text:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.

Aww, just second?\. I thought I was rather quick this time.
Whaaat? I'm the last one this time?
Yes, Lea!\. I get it!\. You waited!\. Mon Dieu!
To be fair, we didn't really wait that long. It was pretty close.
Oui...\. And this is not our last race!
Anyway, let's just go to the space bird.
It's Lea who wanted to "wait" for us!
More like you made us wait, chérie!
Well...\. it was close.\. So we didn't wait that long.
Hush!\. Let me have this moment.
I actually just came in second this time. Tronny was first.
Well...\. I suppose water is sort of my element?
Oui and you didn't even waste any second complaining about water pressure.
Well then, let's head to the Space Bird, d'accord?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.0.t: As \c[3]G'oni\c[0] created oceans, lakes, and rivers spreading across the land, he was happy to see that plants flourished close to the water.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.1.t: However, he was constantly busy refilling the lakes on the land as the water kept flowing down the hills back into the ocean.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.2.t: Then G'oni had an idea. He took the water from the oceans and moved it into clouds floating high in the sky.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.3.t: Then he asked \c[3]K'win\c[0], his twin-sister and creator of wind and thunder, to move the clouds back to the land.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.4.t: Once the clouds would reach the lakes, G'oni would let them rain down, refilling the lakes and making the water flow in circles.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.5.t: K'win, however, thought this flow was boring. So instead she decided to move the clouds all over the place and let them rain right over the land.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.6.t: At first G'oni was furious watching the water being spread in this chaotic manner.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.7.t: However, he quickly noticed how rich plant life started to appear on every corner of the land, far beyond the edges of his lakes and rivers.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.347.settings.interact.event.8.t: As he saw the planet covered in trees and flowers, he quickly accepted the chaotic nature of rain falling wherever it pleases.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.348.settings.interact.event.1.t: He blessed our planet with vast oceans, strong currents, calm lakes, and long rivers stretching over every corner of this land.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.348.settings.interact.event.2.t: His creations also gave birth to an endless variety of plants, painting our lands in beautiful colors.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.349.settings.interact.event.0.t: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.349.settings.interact.event.1.t: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.349.settings.interact.event.2.t: \c[3]G'oni\c[0] is one of these gods. Born a twin to \c[3]K'win\c[0], he is the God of the \c[3]Hexagon\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]ever-flowing waters\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.350.settings.interact.event.0.t: When \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] witnessed the advancements of our kind, they decided to send the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0] wrapped in an \c[3]Envelope of solid rock and ice\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.350.settings.interact.event.1.t: However, Di'aro was concerned. His envelope was massive in size and it could lead to great disaster, if it landed in the wrong spot.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.350.settings.interact.event.2.t: Fortunately, \c[3]G'oni\c[0], being quiet and observative, detected the \c[3]signal\c[0] from our kind and determined the exact position where we expected the message to arrive.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.350.settings.interact.event.3.t: He told the other gods and together they aimed the envelope in the right direction so that our kind could receive it properly.
One dungeon completed, two to go!
So that means we're finally ready for that Grand-something dungeon, right?
You are ready to enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] now!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.352.settings.event.31.message: Honestly don't feel like staying here too long.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.352.settings.event.32.message: Yeah, the constant rain isn't all that comfortable, is it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.357.settings.dialog.0.text: We did it! Another dungeon finished!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.357.settings.dialog.1.text: Yep, under water dungeon crawling. Pretty neat.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.357.settings.dialog.2.text: In fact I think this was my favorite dungeon so far!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.357.settings.dialog.3.text: Everything on one floor, no chasms to fall into, perfect!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.357.settings.dialog.5.text: With the exception of those teleporters that send you straight through the ground.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.366.settings.dialog.0.text: ... How often did they do the race already?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.366.settings.dialog.2.text: Some people have too much energy.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.369.settings.dialog.0.text: Can we leave already? The rain is getting on my nerves.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.369.settings.dialog.1.text: I swear I saw something over there in the lake!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.369.settings.dialog.2.text: If you want to watch more sea creatures you can just head straight back into this temple!
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.373.settings.dialog.0.text: So why are we standing here again?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.373.settings.dialog.1.text: Waiting for our last party member.
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.373.settings.dialog.2.text: Can't we just wait at the crossing?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.373.settings.dialog.4.text: Yes, but back then we didn't know it would be raining non-stop.

assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.398.settings.blockEvent.0.thenS: This is \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0]. One of the temples in Gaia's Garden.
Are you sure you want to enter the dungeon already, Lea?
Shouldn't you meet up with \c[3]C'tron\c[0] first?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.398.settings.blockEvent.0.elseS: Come on, Lea. No more dungeon running today.
There is still another day tomorrow, right?
Here we go...\. Let the race continue!!
Uhm...\. we already started the race of the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0].
I mean we can just put that race on the hold and run the \c[3]So'najizTemple\c[0] instead.
It's your call!
You want to start the race of the So'najiz Temple?
Hm... Looking at your stats and level, do you really think that you're prepared, Lea?
True... I heard your average stats should be somewhat above \c[3]180\c[0].
We can look for better equipment at Basin Keep first, if you want.
Anyway it's your call!
I think we're all well prepared, non?
Ready to start the race of the So'najiz Temple?
[nods]
Okey-dokey!
Everybody get ready!
[shakes head]
D'accord, just don't let us wait for too long~
[yes]
[no]
Hey Lea, we should call C'tron before entering the Temple.
Don't forget about our race, non?
Lea, what about Emilie? We wanted to race the dungeon together, right?
Lea, what about that dungeon race? You were planning to enter the dungeon together with Emilie and C'tron, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.407.settings.event.17.message: Hey Tronny...\. Tronny...\. you see this?
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.407.settings.event.18.message: It's in the middle of a \c[3]lake\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/dng/wave-exterio.entities.407.settings.event.19.message: Yes...\. it is.\. What about it?

assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.756.settings.event.0.message: So many lilies. I'm impressed they can hold our weight.

Ahh, hello!\. Are you are the \v[lore.title.seeker] that was sent to help me?
Oh, I'm so excited!\. You \v[lore.title.seeker]s are so cool and I have never worked with one.
Ah, I'm sorry!\. I should concentrate on the work.\. Important work with the help of a cool \v[lore.title.seeker], yes, yes!
I will use my tools here to examine the water at different spots in this area.
Gonna check for pollution and radiation and take those samples we need.
Meanwhile you will have to protect me from angry denizens of the Track that might appear.
Yes, it's such a shame that we have to hurt them, but we've got no choice here.
At least their dead bodies will return to the Track and feed the new life, so it's okay!
Anyway, I will prepare myself.\. Talk to me again when you are ready to go!
Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Are you ready to escort me around?
Alright.\. Just let me prepare myself real quick.
Aw, alright.\. I will wait for you here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.892.settings.event.11.name: Linde
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.892.settings.event.12.message: Good, I will mark the first spot I have to investigate!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.892.settings.event.21.name: Linde
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.892.settings.event.22.message: All set, we can start now!\. And please protect me from angry critters, okay?
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.892.settings.event.28.task: \c[3]Protect Linde\c[0] while she inspects the area
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.897.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Don't want to stress you, but this is getting a bit painful...
Ouchie... seems like they really are angry.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.898.settings.event.17.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.899.settings.event.22.message: All finished!\. Onto the next one!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.901.settings.event.23.message: Good job so far!\. Just one more spot left!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.903.settings.event.3.message: They just keep on coming... must be really angry today.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.904.settings.event.1.message: Starting with the last one.\. We almost got it, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.904.settings.event.16.message: Hang in there, we're almost done!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.910.settings.event.28.name: Linde
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.910.settings.event.29.message: Okay, I got all the data we need for now.\. Great job, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.910.settings.event.31.message: I would love to chat a bit more with you, but I gotta bring the samples back to the HQ.\. Before more angry critters appear.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.910.settings.event.32.message: So this means goodbye for now.\. Thanks again for everything and good luck on your adventures!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.914.settings.event.0.message: Now that's a place where I'd definitely dive into the water when I could!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.914.settings.event.1.message: You sure?\. Jungle rivers are incredibly active ecosystems.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.914.settings.event.3.message: There's all kind of stuff in there.\. Including bugs.\. Lots of bugs.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.914.settings.event.4.message: Sacre bleu! Why do you have to destroy my fantasies?!
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.914.settings.event.5.message: Water is deadly, Emilie.\. Deadly...\. and probably not real.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.915.settings.event.0.message: There really is no end to this place.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/grove-path.entities.915.settings.event.1.message: Gaia's Garden! Wilderness as far as the eye can see!

assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/lost-shrin.entities.279.settings.interact.event.1.t: Strange markings are at the side of the tablet. In the middle are multiple buttons that resemble arrows and letters. Do you want to press some of them?

assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/lost-shrin.entities.65.settings.event.1.message: Let's hope this one has some nice treasure!

assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/lost-shrin.entities.185.settings.event.0.message: Do you see all those lilies?
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/lost-shrin.entities.185.settings.event.1.message: They need like 4-6 hours of daylight.
assets/data/maps/jungle/grove/lost-shrin.entities.185.settings.event.4.message: Probably some in-game lore. Ancient Shad technology, blah blah.

Another minute in this infested mess and I would have died of boredom.
Now come on. Let's get this over with. And stay out of my way, capiche?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.722.settings.event.1.message: That's right! We are within the \c[3]infested jungle\c[0]! A mysterious disease has befallen this part of the forest!

assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.630.settings.event.1.thenStep.0: Look, such a nice and perfectly regular mushroom.
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.630.settings.event.1.elseStep.0: What an admirable and perfectly average mushroom!
That's a nice regular mushroom, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.631.settings.event.0.message: This part of the jungle is pretty creepy, non?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.631.settings.event.1.message: What is it, Pentafist?\. Are you afraid?

assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.820.settings.event.0.message: Hm...\. getting kinda hungry for mushrooms.
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.820.settings.event.1.message: Really? Those huge blue and purple mushrooms make you hungry?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.820.settings.event.2.message: Why not?\. Don't you folks eat cheese with blue mold and stuff like that?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.820.settings.event.3.message: Whoa, hold up!\. Let's not fall back to stereotypes here!
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.820.settings.event.4.message: But oui...\. Roquefort is pretty neat sometimes.
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.821.settings.event.0.message: So many giant mushrooms in this area.\. Do you think those are edible?
assets/data/maps/jungle/infested/infeste.entities.821.settings.event.1.message: It's safer to assume they're not!

assets/data/maps/jungle/left/path-left-0.entities.729.settings.event.0.message: So much water...\. as expected for a jungle.
assets/data/maps/jungle/left/path-left-0.entities.730.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Mon dieu, we finally reached it!
assets/data/maps/jungle/left/path-left-0.entities.730.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: Oh, we finally reached it!\. Let's hope it was worth it.
This chest was most challenging to acquire!
Now that certainly took some time.

assets/data/maps/jungle/left/path-left-0.entities.630.settings.event.0.message: Would you look at the size of that trunk.
assets/data/maps/jungle/left/path-left-0.entities.630.settings.event.1.message: As expected of a jungle, the trees can grow to an astonishing size!

assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.552.settings.event.13.message: A lot of new enemy types here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.552.settings.event.16.message: You see... Emilie will probably be fine by herself.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.552.settings.event.18.message: ... Sorry.\. I should not have said that.
Welcome to the Jungle,
we got cats and plants.
We got everything you want
Seeker, we know the names.
Welcome to the Jungle, we got cats and plants. We got everything you want Seeker, we know the names.
Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
Unless you are very confident in your skills. But I don't want to hear any excuses!
Are you ready for the duel?
Oh, I see. Having business with your girl again?
Joern, you just arrived in time for some glorious Spheromancer action!
We're about to start our third duel!
Didn't we want to start exploring Gaia's Garden today?
Yes! Right after the duel! It won't take that long.
Fine. I'll be cheering from the side, then.
By the way, Lea, all by yourself today?
Today we cross paths for a third time.
Once again it is time for me,\. Apollo,\. to lead you along the right path.

The path of a 
proper Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.18.message: Spheromancer Lea! I see you finally reached Gaia's Garden!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.20.message: That means we both now possess the \c[3]cold\c[0] and \c[3]heat\c[0] element!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.21.message: In other words, it is due time...
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.29.message: Spheromancer Lea!\. I challenge you to our \c[3]third duel\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.38.message: I'll be waiting at the \c[3]open field\c[0] over there!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.48.message: Do not tell me he has been on a stakeout here all this time...
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.566.settings.event.51.task: Start the duel with \c[3]Apollo\c[0] in \c[3]Gaia's Garden - Jungle Entrance\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.569.settings.event.4.message: Spheromancer Lea!\. Don't forget about our duel!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.570.settings.event.4.message: Spheremancer Lea!\. Don't forget about our duel!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.577.settings.event.0.thenStep.0: Well done! Now let's all \c[3]cool down\c[0] again!
The temperature puns are still not funny.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.577.settings.event.0.elseStep.0: I won't let you win this easily!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.577.settings.event.0.elseStep.1: Come on, Lea. Don't give up!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.577.settings.event.0.elseStep.2: You still have much to learn!
Beaten once again!\. Spheromancer Lea, you are quite the formidable opponent!
This time I was defeated. Spheromancer Lea, you've grown immensely!
It was a good duel, indeed!
Now there, you used to be more of a challenge, Spheromancer Lea!
It seems you are still not quite at the right path, Spheromancer Lea.
Still, it was a good duel!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.32.message: Hey Lea, is everything alright with you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.37.message: You're all by yourself... and honestly don't look that happy to me.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.46.message: She really doesn't talk much, does she?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.55.message: Lea, can you say "Apollo" for me?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.58.message: You can't say it, can you?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.66.message: Do you have issues with your speech module?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.71.message: How is that even still a thing these days?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.76.message: Do you want to explore the jungle \c[3]together with us\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.89.message: She seems so miserable being alone like this.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.90.message: Don't you feel sorry for her?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.92.message: I don't mind her joining us, if you're fine with it, Joern.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.100.message: What do you say, Lea? Shall we travel together?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.104.message: Good!\. Let's create a party, then.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.125.message: Shouldn't you be happy?\. We have a party with two Spheromancers now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.126.message: Right, now that you mention it!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.127.message: Two \c[3]Spheromancers\c[0] and a \c[3]Quadroguard\c[0], quite the noble party indeed!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.131.message: Our noble band just entered the realm of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.132.message: Indeed! What else is there to do than seek the human settlement hidden within this wilderness!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.135.message: The towering fortress of the jungle!\. This shall be our destination!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.578.settings.event.140.task: Explore \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] together with Apollo and Joern. Your next destination is \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.580.settings.event.3.thenStep.0: Still falling for the same trick.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.591.settings.dialog.0.text: So...\. shall we go then?\. The jungle is waiting!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.591.settings.dialog.1.text: I don't know...\. I don't really feel like it.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.591.settings.dialog.3.text: Not sure...\. maybe we just played for a bit too long.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.592.settings.dialog.0.text: Finally we have proper trees in this game!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.592.settings.dialog.1.text: Didn't we have trees in the other areas as well?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.592.settings.dialog.2.text: Pfff! You mean those oversized bushes? Barely trees, really.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.592.settings.dialog.3.text: What does it matter anyway? We can't even climb.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.593.settings.dialog.0.text: Phew... they even support the perception of humid weather.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-01-entrance.entities.593.settings.dialog.2.text: Nope I'm fine! Just give me a little time to get used to it.

assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.23.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-n] \v[area.jungle-city.name]
\i[arrow-w]\i[arrow-e] Roads to Grand Krys'kajo
\i[arrow-e] Road to V'rda Vil
\i[arrow-s] \v[area.autumn-fall.name]
I d-d-don't have any probes left, but I g-g-guess you know how they look.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.642.settings.dialog.0.text: I wonder if she'll turn up again...
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.642.settings.dialog.0.event.5.m: At t-this point, someone might t-think you're stalking me.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.642.settings.dialog.0.event.7.m: It has been a while! And a-a-as usual you came at the right moment.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.642.settings.dialog.0.event.8.m: Another player has just p-placed a probe somewhere in t-t-t-this jungle.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.642.settings.dialog.0.event.9.m: Even though I had some problems earlier.
D-D-Don't worry about it... It was just a misunderstanding.
It j-j-just means I don't have much t-t-time left.
S-So would you be willing to help me survey this area too?
T-Thank you! T-this will be the last time, I p-p-promise.
I d-d-don't have any probes left, but I g-g-guess you know what they look like by now.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.2.name: Baxton
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.6.message: It seems we meet yet again. It must be fate.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.8.message: Reports in this area have been made by dutiful players that a strange player was seen here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.9.message: One that appears as a humble NPC seeking help from other players.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.10.message: Let me ask quite bluntly here Lady Lea...
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.11.message: Did you accept a quest from an NPC by the name of... let me see here... \.\.\. \c[3]Henry\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.13.message: Well this is quite unsettling. You are the third person to report so.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.14.message: I fear we have a person with malicious intent here.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.16.message: Ah, fear not Lady Lea. I do not believe you are involved in such shady business.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.17.message: I must however follow procedure and file a report against this player.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.18.message: Even if it is highly probable that \c[3]Henry\c[0] is just a cover name.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.19.message: For now, I will manually complete the quest that has been given to you.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.20.message: I am following a lead that will take me all the way to \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.660.settings.event.21.message: May we meet again under more pleasant circumstances next time, Lady Lea. Goodbye!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.664.settings.event.0.message: So... a city in the middle of the Jungle?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.664.settings.event.1.message: Yes, and a giant of a city at that!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.664.settings.event.3.message: Indeed! Human ingenuity shaped this hotspot of civilization amid this hostile environment!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.664.settings.event.4.message: I can't wait to see it.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.21.message: By the way, Lea.\. One thing I was wondering about...
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.22.message: Back when you explored the jungle together with Grasshead.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.23.message: ...\. How often did you lose sight of him?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.33.message: It blends perfectly with the grass and plants of this place.
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.44.message: Oh, you have got to be kidding me!!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-02-crossroa.entities.665.settings.event.53.text:
I lied to her to keep her going.\.
Protecting her from the truth.\.
\.
Yet over time I noticed this...\.
growing feeling of guilt.

assets/data/maps/jungle/path-03-sync.jso.entities.31.settings.interact.hoverText:
\i[arrow-n] Grand Krys'kajo
\i[arrow-w]\i[arrow-e] Roads to \v[area.jungle-city.name] 
\i[arrow-w]\i[arrow-e] Roads to \v[area.autumn-fall.name]
\i[arrow-e] Road to V'rda Vil

It's good to see you again.
Well then, the temple should be just to the north of here.
But before we go there, let's just wait for a moment?
So, was it my imagination or did I just spot a certain horned girl?
Well...\. I invited both of you, see?
I heard that things have been somewhat complicated between you two.
Oui, you could say that again.
I'm still bummed that we had to cancel it.
Then Lea has been gone for so long and now she's acting all strange.
It's all just inherently difficult, you know, since Lea can't talk and explain herself.
But...\. is there really a need to know exactly what happened?
Oui.\. I mean it would at least help!
Let me just try and ask Lea a couple of questions, okay?
Sure, give it your best shot.
Did you \c[3]intentionally\c[0] leave the raid?\. Was it something you wanted to do?
Was it some kind of accident?\. Or something else outside your control?
And when we couldn't reach you for a week, was that intentional?
So in short... all these things that happened are not something you \c[3]wanted\c[0] to happen.
Then what about that whole thing with Lukas? What was that about?
Emilie, please. I'm sure that's even more difficult to answer.
Instead...\. let me ask the most important questions.
Over all this time, \c[3]did you miss us\c[0]?
And now...\. do you want to \c[3]play with us again\c[0]?
See? Isn't that all that matters?
I don't know what got over me...
I was angry...\. but I also missed you.
I just wanted to know what happened...\. I was frustrated...
But it's okay...\. I don't have to know everything.
I'm glad we worked this out!
It's good to have you back, Lea!
And...\. just in time for the dungeon race, non?
That's right! We've all finished the mandatory quest, so we're good to go!
So what are we waiting for? Let's go!
Did you just reconcile with Emilie and C'tron again?
Oh...\. That was quicker than I expected.
Well...\. It might be a bit late...\. but anyway.
Here's a new word for you. Finally.
Well I thought...\. it might have helped?
Yes, I know it is too late now.
Hey, I think that's the first time I've heard you say that. I mean "Sorry".
Well, it's a little late to apologize now, Mademoiselle!
Come on, let's not waste any more time!
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-04-end.json.entities.673.settings.event.1.message: We ended up in a pretty strange corner again, didn't we?
assets/data/maps/jungle/path-04-end.json.entities.674.settings.event.0.message: We've been walking around for some time now.\. Where is the temple?

assets/data/maps/jungle/right/right-path.entities.716.settings.event.0.message: Lots of dead trees here. Woodcutters at work?
assets/data/maps/jungle/right/right-path.entities.716.settings.event.1.message: I believe those trees merely died of old age.
assets/data/maps/jungle/right/right-path.entities.716.settings.event.2.message: Humankind quickly learned that lumbering this forest will lead to fierce counter reactions of the Track.

assets/data/maps/jungle/right/right-path.entities.410.settings.event.1.message: Yes, rain is all too common for this climate.

This here jungle has a startlin' variety of flora.
Jes' look at this'un here. Weren't too far away Ah found the same plant, but open.
An' Ah found a fish inside!
Well, how's the explorin' comin' along? Y'all must be close ta done soon, Ah'd reckon.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.416.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Vending Machine\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.476.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Vending Machine\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.14.message: No joke, that's a big city.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.27.message: Yet there resides a severe lack of \c[3]Justice\c[0] dividing the rich from the poor!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.28.message: I also don't like the rain.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.29.message: Yes, the rain... the poor folks of this city have to suffer through it all year long!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.31.message: They say it's the Jungle's answer to this iron scar amid its sea of trees!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.34.message: First there is a dire need to prepare for all the dangers of this wilderness!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.587.settings.event.35.message: Fortunately we will find lots of \c[3]expertly crafted goods\c[0] in this trading hotspot!
And of course, there is the urgent task to speak to the mayor!
Remember the blockade in front of the temples?
And of course we shall fulfill our Seeker's duty and visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] to the north!
You decide to visit the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] in \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]. You probably need to talk to somebody to enter the temples?
I see, another Seeker has arrived.
I ask you to excuse the rather unfortunate weather. Sadly, this is the norm in our city.
I just wish they'd finally finish the construction of the building to my back.
Anyway!\. Surely you're seeking passage to the \c[3]Ancient Temples of the jungle\c[0], correct?
Your destination is \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0], located in the \c[3]northern part of the jungle\c[0].
Please mind the \c[3]powerplant\c[0] right next to the temple complex.
It is the major power source of our city.
It should pose no obstacle to your task, so all we ask you is to leave it intact.
Excellent! I wish you the best for your adventures!
You will find the temples of \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] in the \c[3]north of the jungle\c[0]. Good luck!
The Boosi Man
Good evening, tiny one!
I am the \c[3]Boosi Man\c[0]!\. I'm doing business in this town, you see?
And I just happen to be looking for some kind souls to help me!
See, I'm about to start a new...\. attraction in this town.
But alas, I am in grave trouble!\. What I am missing is \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0].
It's something you can only find outside in the jungle.\. A place that I am unable to visit!
Why?
Well, I got my reasons and they are very legitimate.
So, do you have some free time to help big ol' me?
[nods]
Terrific!
You can collect \c[3]\v[item.320.name]\c[0] from those \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/pumpkin]\c[0]!
They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
Bye...
[shakes head]
That is too bad!\. You see, my business could very well be the next big thing!
You definitely want to be a part of it!\. Talk to me when you change your mind, tiny one!
Bye...
They wander about in the \c[3]infested Jungle\c[0] to the \c[3]northeast\c[0]!
I require those flames!\. They are essential for...\. decoration!
Well then!\. Let's work together to create the next big thing of Basin Keep!
I see you collected the flames!
Terrific!\. Things are almost ready, then.
The only thing we need to do, is a \c[3]test run\c[0]!
Tiny one, can I count on your help once again?
Spooktacular!\. I'll be inside constructing everything!\. It will only take the ghost of a second.
Just follow me inside when you're ready!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.726.settings.text: There was a HOLE here. It's gone now.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.13.message: The tension between Humans and Shad around here is bad as it gets.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.14.message: It really doesn't help that the Mayor is acting so selfish.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.17.name: K'tara
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.20.message: I was born in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0], a small village in the south east of Gaia's Garden.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.21.message: But I spend a large amount of time with humans.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.23.message: Anyway, let's not dwell for too long, my village is in danger!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.24.message: You see, our village was attacked by \c[3]strange black cats\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.25.message: They've already pushed us out of the north side.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.26.message: It's because of this power plant... It is disrupting the ancient Track and it's punishing us for it.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.28.message: And my people are not happy.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.29.message: They are ready to fight and I fear the worst if we don't do something.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.30.message: I'm sure if we can drive these beasts away the Shad will calm down, but we have to act fast!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/center.json.entities.732.settings.event.31.message: Let's first meet in \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. There is a landmark in the \c[3]eastern part of the village\c[0].
Oh, you already unlocked it? Let's not waste time then!
As said, the village is in the \c[3]south east\c[0] of the jungle.
The humans put up way-markers so it should be easy to find.
That was clever use of sign language, Lea!
And the NPC even recognized it.\. I'm impressed.
Our journey shall continue, \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0] our next destination!

Hey girl, ya looking for some rare weapons?
Really? This is a once in a life time offer, ma girl!
Just a simple trader looking for a particular \c[3]Drill\c[0]...
Well look at you, young one.
Found yourself something rare with that \c[3]\v[item.90.name]\c[0].
Could upgrade it for you if you want...
Only need certain items for it.
Been a while since I held this in my hands.
Time to go. Find a new place to stay.
Maybe we will meet again, can still sense a greater power in my drill.
The \c[3]Pack\c[0] might have let you in, but that doesn't mean I have to sell you anything, Seeker.
A seeker inside here? You sure must have some good connections.
This is a private party \c[3]Seeker\c[0], you better run off\..\..\.. fast.
Unless you got yourself a pass of course.
What's this? A pass? From the Boss himself?
I don't know what you did \c[3]Seeker\c[0], but rules are rules.
Sorry \c[3]Seeker\c[0], the market is closed off for your kinda folks.
Unless you got yourself a pass, of course.
Now look at that. You got yourself a Pass. From the man himself.
Make sure to leave lots of cash, alright?
Have fun, \c[3]Seeker\c[0], and don't lose the pass.
The rain will cleanse your soul.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.624.settings.dialog.0.text: What's up with this part of town?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.624.settings.dialog.2.text: Well, apparently this used to be the workers' quarters back when the power plant was built.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.624.settings.dialog.3.text: But it became a slum after most of the traders and the general businesses moved in.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.624.settings.dialog.4.text: Wow, alright. Kinda makes you sad, don't ya think?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.629.settings.dialog.0.text: Don't you think it's strange that we don't take damage from the rain?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.629.settings.dialog.1.text: I think it's strange that you're sitting on the wet floor.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.629.settings.dialog.2.text: But yes, it is weird. It's pouring down and I feel the rain, but no damage.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.629.settings.dialog.3.text: I guess it's some kind of game development magic again.
A Seeker? Should I ask her? Guess she's as good as anyone, really.
Hey, ya looking to make some quick cash?
My Dad wants me to collect some goods for him from the infested jungle region.
But I ain't no fighter or collector. Dunno why he thinks this is a good "entry trial" too.
So, ya in or out? Ain't got all day.
Good, then let's get down to business.
I need ya to get me 10 \c[3]Venom Shrooms\c[0] and 5 \c[3]Glowing Spheres\c[0], gotcha?
Good, good. Come back when ya got them. And make it quick, ya hear?
Buzz off then, I'll find someone to do the work for me.
Still here? Doesn't look like ya got my goods. Go on then, make it quick.
Oh it's you. Ya finally got my goods?
Well, about time I might say, woman.
Alright, that's all I need. Here's your cash. Nice knowing ya, I guess.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/east.json.entities.633.settings.dialog.0.text: Can't do this for dad. Ain't no fighting in me...

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/entrance.js.entities.380.settings.event.0.message: Oh I can see it now.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/entrance.js.entities.380.settings.event.1.message: Yes, Basin Keep in all its glory is towering in front of us!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/entrance.js.entities.381.settings.event.1.message: Did you notice that there's not a single laser bridge in the whole jungle?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/entrance.js.entities.381.settings.event.2.message: Maybe they're hard to maintain due to the climate and vegetation...

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.4.settings.event.5.name: The Boosi Man
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.4.settings.event.8.message: Tiny one, it seems you already had \c[3]great fun\c[0] in Pumpkin Land!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.4.settings.event.15.message: Now it's time for the \c[3]grand finale\c[0]!
BUGS! WHY DOES IT HAVE TO BE BUGS?!
THEY COULD HAVE JUST THROWN MORE PUMPKINS AT US!
NO, IT HAS TO BE BUGS!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.7.settings.event.4.thenStep.0.m: KILL THEM! KILL THEM WITH FIRE!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.7.settings.event.4.thenStep.1.m: NO WAIT! ICE! KILL THEM WITH ICE!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.17.message: Well I sure had plenty of fun, tiny one!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.18.message: It's hard enough to haunt anybody in this city, with everyone so busy.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.19.message: So I knew I had to aim for something big, start a proper... boosiness!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.21.message: It's the only way to get any attention these days.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.22.message: Well, I sure call this a success!\. Thanks a lot for your participation, tiny one!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/halloween/b.entities.11.settings.event.28.thenStep.0: Great fun I had, oui. And I thought I was safe from these things past the Temple Mine.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.21.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Sorry Lady, ain't selling stuff to \c[3]Seekers\c[0] unless the boss tells me to.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.21.settings.npcStates.1.event.s: Boss tells me I gotta sell you the \c[3]One Up\c[0]. Dunno why, but here you go.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.24.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Go down if you want to talk to the Boss, \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.3.message: You there \c[3]Seeker\c[0]. Blue Hair, Spheromancer, horns.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.5.message: Da Boss tells us of a woman we are to look out for. You fit the description.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.6.message: You recently helped a certain \c[3]Mick\c[0], right?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.8.message: Good. In that case I must ask you to go down the stairs and meet the boss.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.9.message: A no is not acceptable I'm afraid.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.26.settings.event.11.message: There's nothing you have to worry about. Please come with me.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.19.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Welcome \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
Excuse the rather rude invitation.
Hi...
I assure you there is nothing for you to be afraid of.
In fact, I invited you here to thank you.
My men tell me you helped my boy here.
Gathering precious resources from the perilous infested parts of the jungle.
[nods]
A great feat I might say. Even when he was to gather them himself.
Ah come on, Dad. I did it all by myself, I swear.
Shut it, boy. It is bad enough you have brought shame on yourself and the family.
Quiet now!
Now, \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
What you did for my son showed me you have great potential.
Potential that we could use for a little problem.
You see, our family runs a business that is vital to this humble part of the city.
Many citizens require the processed substance procured from mushrooms found in the infested jungle.
The health concerns of my people are just as important to me as the ones of my own family.
We sell this medicine for cheap, thanks to our own trading route.
But let us say that this route is... not official.
Recently the \c[3]High Trader Council\c[0] breached our route which led to an obvious shortage of medicine for our poor people.
Guards now patrol part of the route.
Finding another route would just bring more guards on us eventually, so another solution must be found.
And with you, I think we might just have found one.
Your \c[3]Seeker Skills\c[0] should allow you to find paths where none were before, am I not right?
[nods]
Yes, I think so too! Now what if instead of trying to find a new route, we smuggle the goods past the guards?
The fine guards would do their honest work and we would do ours. No one gets hurt.
Of course this favor would not come without reward.
I'm sure you already noticed that \c[3]Outsiders\c[0] are not allowed to enter our trade hubs here in \c[3]Pond Slums\c[0]?
If you agree to help us, I will personally grant you a pass allowing you entrance to our trade hubs.
So what do you say? Are you willing to help us in these most desperate of times?
Splendid!
Now, the trading route I spoke of runs below the city, starting right here in the basement and going all the way to the infested jungle.
I want you and my son to go to the infested jungle entrance and find a way past the guards.
What? I have to go with her?
You will do as I say, do you understand?
... Yes sir...
Meet my son at \c[3]Lost Lookout\c[0] in the infested jungle. He knows the secret entrance.
He will give you a \c[3]special chip\c[0] which allows us to track the path you took, so don't worry about jotting everything down.
Off you go then, for the good of the people.
Now how unfortunate. However I do understand your position.
If you ever change your mind, please visit me.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.19.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: As said dear \c[3]Seeker\c[0], go find my son in Lost Lookout in the infested part of the jungle.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.19.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: He will guide you towards the rest.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.19.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: I have already received word from my son.
Splendid work! Now all we need is the tracker chip and we can get right back to procuring the mushrooms.
With this we can finally start our production again and help the dear sick people.
The Calzone Family will be forever in your debt.
As promised, a pass to our trader hubs is your reward.
I hope our wares will be to your liking.
I will also advise our own cashier upstairs to sell our product to you.
May it aid you in battle as it eases the pain of the people of Pond Slums.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.19.settings.npcStates.3.event.3: Our production is running along just fine, all thanks to you.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ca.entities.37.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: The Boss is just around the corner to the left.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.16.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. These are the headquarters of the Woodland Vanguard.\. Nice to see you around!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Hey there!\. You're a \v[lore.title.seeker] aren't you?
Great, just what I needed.\.\.\. ...no,\. really,\. we do have an urgent need for a \v[lore.title.seeker] here.
Our recent progress led us into some areas with heavy critter-concentration, so we need some additional muscle.
Well, not just muscle... also smarts and specialized \v[lore.title.seeker] skills.\. Sounds like just your thing?
Neat!\. And just like the briefing says, you won't be doing all the work by hand.
A network of defensive turrets is already on site.\. State-of-the-art, almost indestructible and easy to use.
...if you are connected to Trackwalker, that is.\. Someone failed to notice that when ordering a truckload of those things...
It's the main reason we need you at all, \v[lore.title.seeker].\.\. No offense.
Anyway, enter the cave in the \c[3]Calm Backyard of \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].\. You'll get the details there.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Go to \c[3]Calm Backyard in \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] and enter the cave.\. You'll get all the details there.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], you're back.\. Seems like we finally made some progress, thanks to you.
The experts on site still need to properly open that door, but it's only a matter of time.
Hey, how does this sound: Once we make progress, we'll work together again, eh?
Great!\. I will send out a request over the Seeker HUB once we're ready.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], nice seeing you again.\. Still interested in our temple excavation I assume?
Well, of course you are!\. And we got some great news for you on that front:\.\. The door has been opened!
We are now just about to plug into the track's energy circuits from the temple that lies behind it.
But for that we will need someone to lead the defenses again.\. How about it, got some free time on your schedule?
Alright, reliable as before I see.\. Lets hope that's also true for that tech you will be using again.
That defensive system from last time got a bit of an upgrade but should be working about the same.
Go back to that \c[3]Grubby Cave\c[0] on \c[3]Calm Backyard\c[0] and go through that door inside.
We already got some of our colleagues inside that can fill you in on the details.
Dang, you must really be busy.\. Hope you can find some time for us in the near future.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: The temple is behind that door in the \c[3]Grubby Cave\c[0] you visited last time.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: You can enter that cave from the \c[3]Calm Backyard\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: Oh hey!\. The \v[lore.title.seeker] makes her heroic return after once again taming the wild!
Yes, you did a good job indeed.\. And an important one.\. Replacing that device would've set us back for weeks if it broke.
But now we can siphon that sweet, precious Track-energy and also extract more information for future missions.
Hopefully we can count on you again in the future, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We got nothing to do for you right now.\. Nice to see you, though!

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey there Seeker!\. Welcome to the comfy retreat of \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Such a pleasant sight, welcome to our snug little retreat!
We, \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0], strive to protect the balance and purity of this wonderful habitat that is \v[area.jungle.name].
Of course, with humanity always expanding this has become both more and more important and challenging.
Having one as distinguished as a \v[lore.title.seeker] extend their hand to aid us can make a vast difference!
In fact, just now we are in need of someone to protect one of ours during a screening of local water sources.
Do you feel ready to assist us and our mission?
Wonderful!\. The investigation was long overdue because of the dangerous location.
Meet up with Gardener Linde at the \c[3]Royal Grove\c[0].\. She will be waiting near the teleporter.
Keep her safe so she can work for the well-being of our environment!
That is truly a shame.\. Please come back when you have changed your mind.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Meet Gardener Linde at the \c[3]Royal Grove\c[0] and support her.\. She is waiting near the teleporter.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Ah great, welcome back \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. We already received the water samples and started the examination.
The data has been dearly missing.\. Now we can finally get back on track with our work.\.
Well, it will take some time before we have useable information.\. Maybe we will need your help again, noble \v[lore.title.seeker]!
But for now, please take this reward.\. May the Ancients' bless you!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], right on cue!\. The water sample you helped to collect has proven to be useful.
We recently got the results of the test back and the data is definitely worrisome.
An unusual concentration of unfamiliar energy has been found in the water.
Reports suggest that it is strong enough to influence even larger animals and plants.
As we speak, infected plants roam \v[area.jungle.name] to spread the disease right into the roots of our beloved forest.
\v[lore.title.seeker], will you lend us your aid again, to weed out this threat?
Excellent!\. You are perfect for this job, I am certain of it.
Now, we still do not know how the infection started spreading.\. So you should start by eradicating its offshoots.
There have been several sightings of \c[3]infected \v[combat.name.jungle/plant]\c[0] in \c[3]Western \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
They seem to \c[3]remain hidden near bodies of water\c[0] while drenching the grounds with their infectious energy.
Though with all that excess energy, you should be able to \c[3]sense them from afar\c[0] with your \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker] analysis\c[0].
Please hurry and dispose of them.\. Meanwhile we will try to find the real root of the problem.
\v[seeker.title.lore], please.\. This could have dire consequences for the entire area.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Search for the \c[3]infected \v[combat.name.jungle/plant]\c[0] near bodies of water in \c[3]Western \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: They will try to hide, but with your \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker] analysis\c[0] you should be able to \c[3]sense them from afar\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], you have done well in isolating the infection!\. Meanwhile we were able to find the cause of the problem!
Another plant has been found, older and with a much stronger concentration of energy.\. It must be the source!
And now it has taken root in \c[3]Wet Passage\c[0], directly next to central streams of water.
\v[lore.title.seeker], you must face it and finally return it to the ground, before the infection starts again.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: The source of the infection has taken root on \c[3]Wet Passage\c[0], between two rivers.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.8.event.3: Go there and destroy it to preserve the forest's balance.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.9.event.q: Fantastic!\. With that threat now banished, my fellow gardeners can swarm out and purify the waters.
How and where that plant was able to amass such power remains a mystery, but we will investigate the trail.
You, \v[lore.title.seeker], have done truly excellent work!\. Take these rewards and be blessed.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: There's no need for your help, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. So let me work.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Yes, what is it... \v[lore.title.seeker] I assume?\. You're not here to waste my time, are you?
Good, because that's already getting eaten by this damn city as is.\. Don't need no smartass adventurers doing the same.
And since we're already talking, are you here to help with one of those time consuming problems plaguing Basin Keep?
Now there's a start for a brighter day.\. Hope we can keep it that way.
Listen, \v[lore.title.seeker]: We got a volatile situation at hand in our Western district.
An organized mob of armed birds has stormed an office building from the air and taken hostages.
Yes, it's a mess.\. And we still don't know their demands and exact numbers.
I hate outsourcing matters of public security but we got no choice here.\. Also, Track-related messes are a \v[lore.title.seeker]'s specialty, right?
Look, there's no use debating this now.\. Better talk to our officer on site and see that you make yourself useful.
It's the \c[3]Clipson Tower\c[0] in the \c[3]Northern part of our Western district\c[0].\. Now get moving!
No?\. And there I thought you might actually be useful.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Talk to our officer on site and see how you can solve the hostage situation.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: He is waiting in front of the \c[3]Clipson Tower\c[0] in the \c[3]Northern part of our Western district\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: Oh, don't give me that smug face, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. You stirred up a lot of trouble with your lil' shootout!
Messing up the negotiations, starting an office brawl around the hostages?
We got traumatized white collars and the press slamming our ears about your methods!\. You are a loose cannon, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Still, I can't deny that you got the results.\. The problem has been resolved without major injuries.
Alright, I'll let your methods slide this time.\. Take your reward and stay in touch.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: There's no need for your help, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. So let me work.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Sgt. Bronzel
Hi.
Ah, the troublemaker has returned.\. I assume that your lack of self-restraint has not changed?
...why?
A bit huffy, are we now?\. Well, dealing with the press and signing all those reports was not pleasant either, \v[lore.title.seeker].
In any case, we could use your help for another job.
This time no human lives will be directly involved, so you can let loose as much as you want.\. Should be right up your alley, to be frank.
[nods]
Good.\. I figured you'd be up for another opportunity to blast those criminal birds.
It's about the situation in the damn \c[3]Clipson Tower\c[0] again.
The building has been evacuated by now, but the Papagang still controls the highest floors.
Why...?
Well, those feathery crooks have holed up with crates full of precious stolen fruits, slowly transporting it away.
I would love to just storm the place from the air, but we can't. The press would murder us for such a risky operation inside the city.
That's why you, \v[lore.title.seeker] will help us with this!
How?
Look, I'm too busy to hold your hand here.\. Just talk to \c[3]Officer Nailson\c[0] in front of the \c[3]Clipson Tower\c[0] again.
Bye.
[shakes head]
Oh, don't play games with me, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Either help us out or stop wasting my time.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Talk to \c[3]Officer Nailson\c[0] about the details of the operation.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: He is waiting in front of the \c[3]Clipson Tower\c[0] in the \c[3]Northern part of our Western district\c[0], as usual.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: There you are again.\. Seems like everything went according to the protocol.\. Excellent.
Apparently you really are very reliable.\..\..\. As long as your job doesn't involve diplomacy or public relations.
Well, we'll just need to use your talents accordingly in the future.\. For now, you did good.
Now take your reward and let me finish my reports.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.44.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: There's no need for your help, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. So let me work.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.0.text: Well, that was fascinating.\. It is not often that you can truly take a non-violent path to solve a quest.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.1.text: It was hella interesting.\. Too bad I messed it up midway through.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.2.text: Even so, I heard that effectively talking to those birds will lower their morale and make the fight easier.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.3.text: Oh boy, it was that complex, eh?\. Really impressive how far they are pushing some of those late-game quests.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.text: I hope the developers continue on this path.\. It is so satisfying to use \c[1]diplomacy instead of violence\c[0] for once.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.event.7.me: Oh, hi.\. A fellow Spheromancer.\. That's rare.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.event.8.me: So, you wonder how to those misguided birds could be dissuaded from violence with mere words?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.event.10.m: It's easy.\. Just open your heart and think of what led them down their dark path.\. What they might desire.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.event.11.m: Yes, that... But I assume it comes down to triggering some flags with the right words or something.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.47.settings.dialog.4.event.13.m: You do not seem much for talking, mhm?\. Well, I guess some players just prefer to simply hit things.\. You do you, girl.

This building houses the office of the Basin Trade Partnership.\. Please talk to our spokesperson if you seek to assist us.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. There is no need for your help right now but please enjoy your stay.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: The authorities were able to track the lost machines up onto \c[3]Old Timber\c[0] in the eastern \v[area.jungle.name].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Maybe your specialized \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-senses\c[0] can find some traces that they overlooked.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We are still preparing the tools to assault the frozen cave.\. Please come back later.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Go back into the cave in \c[3]Old Timber\c[0] in the eastern \v[area.jungle.name].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: We have prepared a device that will help you reach that criminal \v[combat.name.snowman] and exterminate it.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.21.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. There is no need for your help right now but please enjoy your stay.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please work hard for the prosperity of our city.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Please concentrate on finding my cooling machines.\. They are state-of-the-art and extremely valuable in this climate!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Our engineers are still working hard on a device that will get through that wall of ice.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Please come back later, if you want to help us again.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Our heating device stands ready in that cave you found that snowfiend in.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: A few of my employees will wait for you and give you more detailed instructions.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.61.settings.npcStates.8.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Please work hard for the prosperity of our city.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.3.name: Mrs Basu
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.4.name: Mr Frigo
Well, well.\. Look who came back again.
Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Would you like to help this gentleman now?
What is it, young woman?\. Is it not obvious that we are having an important meeting right now?
Well, actually.\..\..\.\. You are a \v[lore.title.seeker], am I correct?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.5.elseStep.12: Sir, this young woman should have the perfect qualifications to solve your predicament.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.5.elseStep.15: Oh, has she though?\. I am not entirely convinced by those new-age \v[lore.title.seeker] folk.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.5.elseStep.19: In any case, sir, she might be our best chance to get your machines back in time!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.5.elseStep.21: So, \v[lore.title.seeker], are you interested in helping us?
Wonderful!\. Then allow me to give you a briefing on the situation.
This gentleman is \c[3]Mr Tony Frigo\c[0], head of \c[3]"Frigo Frost&Fire"\c[0], producer of the finest domestic appliances on \v[lore.title.planet].
Yes, yes, enough flattery.\. I am more interested to see what your enthusiasm is actually worth, \v[lore.title.seeker].
An entire line of \c[3]powerful cooling machines\c[0] has been robbed from our hands.\. Find them and I'll see to it you're properly rewarded.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.6.accepted.11: Indeed.\. When the authorities were investigating they lost the lead on \c[3]Old Timber\c[0] in the eastern \v[area.jungle.name].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.62.settings.event.6.accepted.12: Maybe your specialized \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-senses\c[0] can find some traces that lead to the robber's hideout.\. Please be vigilant!
Ha, as expected.\. Those young people are too busy with their fantastic adventures to help us hard-working businessmen.
It is indeed a shame.\. Please reconsider, honorable \v[lore.title.seeker].\. It would be a great help.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.63.settings.dialog.0.text: So you are telling me that the entire production line is lost and we can't do anything?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.63.settings.dialog.1.text: Sir, we have already worked with the authorities but they lost the trail and currently do not have the personnel to intensify the investigations.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.63.settings.dialog.2.text: Our clients are relying on our cooling technology that got stolen and I am supposed to just calm down and wait?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.63.settings.dialog.3.text: Yes, sir, we understand your displeasure.\. We even requested \c[1]the help of a \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] to solve this.\. One might arrive at any second!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.63.settings.dialog.4.text: \c[1]A \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0], eh?\. I doubt that those will be of use when even the authority has failed.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.3.name: Mrs Basu
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.4.name: Mr Frigo
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.8.message: Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Have you made progress on your assignment?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.12.message: I see... so you managed to secure only some of the machines before that criminal snow-creature blocked your way.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.15.message: An aberrant \v[combat.name.snowman] from \v[area.bergen-trails.name] invading \v[area.jungle.name] to steal cooling devices?\. This is outrageous!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.17.message: Indeed, and it presents a threat even beyond this robbery once it properly settles down.\.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.20.message: Not on my watch.\. I will instruct my best technicians to find a way through that icy blockade.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.22.message: \v[lore.title.seeker], you have proven your worth.\. I hope you will return and finish this job once preparations are ripe.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.64.settings.event.25.message: S-sir, how noble of you!\. Well, \v[lore.title.seeker], I hope you will not let us down.\. Please return to us in the future!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.66.settings.event.3.name: Mrs Basu
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.66.settings.event.4.name: Mr Frigo
Ah, you returned.\. I hope you are ready to finally finish what you started.
Well, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Can we count on you?
Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], good news.\. Preparations to finally subdue that dangerous \v[combat.name.snowman] have finally been finished!
Yes.\. Our engineers have redoubled their efforts and created an oven that will easily melt through even the coldest ice.
I ordered one of my subordinates to deliver it into the cave.
Meanwhile, the target has not left the cave so you should be able to corner and defeat it.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.66.settings.event.5.elseStep.11: So, do you want to take this on now?
Excellent!\. Mr Frigo will explain to you everything you need to know.
Well, I will leave the details to my subordinates on site.\. They are waiting for you in front of that icy wall.
They will give you a short introduction to our specialized heating device and how to break through the ice.
Good, then you should be on your way.\. The cave is still in \c[3]Old Timber\c[0] in the eastern \v[area.jungle.name], in case you forgot.
Good luck and please get rid of that scoundrel once and for all.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.66.settings.event.6.accepted.11: Yes, and retrieve my precious machines.
What?\. After we had to prepare everything you still need more time?
I understand, if you still need more preparation but please return soon.\. This cold hearted criminal is a threat we can not ignore.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.3.name: Mrs Basu
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.4.name: Mr Frigo
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.8.message: \v[lore.title.seeker], you are back!\. We have already gotten the news, magnificent work!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.10.message: Yes, you did well.\. Impressive.\. I should have seen your worth from the beginning.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.12.message: Be that as it may.\. You solved our problem, so you will be rewarded as promised.\. I put in some equipment that might come in handy.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/fa.entities.67.settings.event.14.message: My, what a lucrative venture for all of us!\. I hope we can have more work in the future, \v[lore.title.seeker].

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ha.entities.13.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Please \c[3]enter the teleporter\c[0] to start your ride!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ha.entities.14.settings.event.11.message: Please \c[3]enter the teleporter\c[0] to start your ride!

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Good day, Madam. Can I help you?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: I am terribly sorry, but we are currently offering no apartments.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.44.settings.npcStates.0.event.5: Please contact our landlord in his office.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.46.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Lea, dear!
Hi!
You've done it again, young lady.
Maybe I should see a doctor about my ears...
Are you up for finding another piece of broken equipment?
[nods]
Great! I was just about to skim through these books. A player told me there is a hidden text here that leads to the next one.
This time we're searching for a \c[3]Broken Deck\c[0]. That seems to be the default weapon of Hexacasts. A deck of cards.
Why not help me? We players can simply use our \c[3]Seeker Sense\c[0] or whatever it was called.
Does come in handy for an old man like me.
Anyway, are you ready?
Thanks kid!
Only two more to go.
But let's not get ahead of ourselves.
Judging from the last couple of pieces, this one should be hidden somewhere in \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0], right?
[nods]
Let's just start searching through these books.
If you find something of use, you can go ahead and look for it.
You know I'm too old to be running around willy-nilly.
Kid, you know why I'm looking for these. Don't leave me hanging.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.46.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Hello young lady, found anything of use?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.46.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Good job, kid! So tell me, what is it?
Lea, I don't know what game you're trying to play but this is no way to treat your elders.
Too bad... Guess we just have to keep looking.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.46.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Welcome back kid, any luck finding the \c[3]Broken Deck\c[0]?
[nods]
I knew I could depend on you, Lea.
That means, there's only one left.
[nods]
How...?
Mm? What is it, kid?
Why...?
I don't understand. Just say what you want.
[shakes head]
You can't say?
[nods]
So you can say some words, but not full sentences?
[nods]
Well that sure is weird. I know some people have problems with the talking in this game.
But this is new.
Sorry...
It's okay, Lea. We'll get around it somehow.
I'll just keep asking and you can use your hands, head or whatever possible, okay?
Alright, so I will just take a wild guess and assume you want to know how this will all work out?
[nods]
As you know, my kids always wanted to find the treasure connected to the 5 broken arms.
Well... I promised my children we would find it.
And I want to keep this promise by contacting them once we've found all of the pieces.
If I tell them I found all the broken bits... Maybe, just maybe they will agree to meet with me.
All I want is time to explain myself.
Why...?
I... I'd rather not involve you more than I already have, Lea.
Thank you for your hard work. It's time for me to go.
Bye!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.48.settings.interact.title: \c[3]The Lost Shrine\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.48.settings.interact.event.0.te: Archaeologists once found a stone tablet near the entrance to the \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0]. On this tablet a riddle was written...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.48.settings.interact.event.1.te:
"Those who seek the lost shrine, must go to the most royal of coverts"
"Behind a tree..."
The latter part was already too old to read.
