assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ho.entities.48.settings.interact.event.2.te: Below the text a strange sequence of arrows was written too. Researchers assume the shrine is to be found in the fittingly named area: \c[3]The Royal Grove\c[0]

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.8.settings.interact.hoverText:
\c[3]GF\c[0]: Items N' Goods
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Basin Arsenal
\c[3]2F\c[0]: Umbrella Inc.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.13.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Welcome! Find all our vending goods here but with a personal touch.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.15.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Need some equipment on this rainy day?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I'm sorry dear customer but Umbrella Inc. is currently experiencing a \..\..\.. sort of outbreak.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.23.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: In order to avoid any residents from getting inf... \.\.\.from having a bad time, we have closed off access to the third floor.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.1.text: Are you going to be done anytime soon?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.2.text: We spent like 30 minutes here, just take the stronger one.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.3.text: But the stronger one looks worse...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.4.text: What are you talking about? You know equipment doesn't change your appearance.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.5.text: But why does it look different in the shelf then?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/ma.entities.26.settings.dialog.6.text: Because it's more fancy? What do I know.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.1.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.96.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Good ta see y'all again, girl!
As Ah said in the DM, Ah've got a peachy new upgrade fer yer hat!
It's stronger an' smells nice too!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.1.text: There is nothing on this table.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.2.text: T-the table surface is really shiny!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.3.text: Really? Is that why you have to sit on it?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.4.text: Y-Yes! I have to inspect it really closely.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.5.text: I think I start to understand.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.6.text: This is not about the table or whats on the table.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.8.text: You just like to sit on tables, don't you?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.100.settings.dialog.9.text: What?\. No!\. I just...\. want to watch things closely.
Good day and welcome to \v[area.jungle-city.name], Seeker.
This hub serves as both a meeting place for Seekers as well as the bureau for most official business handled in the city.
Please be advised that while the major handles Seeker-related topics, his time is very limit.
As such, you are free to simply enter the Temples north of \v[area.jungle.name] whenever you desire.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.111.settings.dialog.0.text: Man, there are not a lot of resting places in this hub...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.111.settings.dialog.1.text: What? \.\.\. There is one right over to the left?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.111.settings.dialog.3.text: That's some quality A first world problem you got there.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.23.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Seeker? Isn't there some wild people you need to help?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.23.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Look who it is. I already heard of your heroic deed.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.23.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Thanks for that, now the power plant is accessible to my people again.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.4.name: Sullyvan
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.6.message: You have to listen to me, Mayor Sullyvan.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.7.message: You again? If you want to speak to me, please make an appointment.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.9.message: This is an emergency! Things are about to escalate!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.18.name: Sullyvan
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.20.message: I'm so sorry sir, she just burst in...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.22.message: It's okay Penny, this seems... important.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.24.name: Penny
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.32.name: Sullyvan
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.35.message: The village of \c[3]V'rda\c[0] is currently under attack by dangerous creatures. We've already lost the entire north of the village.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.36.message: Oh. I'm very sad to hear that. But how does this concern us in any way?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.37.message: You see... The Shad are \c[3]blaming the power plant\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.38.message: Well, of course! They always do. And I always tell them the same thing:
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.39.message: The power plant is fine. We make sure it's all in perfect harmony with your oh-so-holy track.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.40.message: Please listen. Things are not the same! We are desperate.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.41.message: The Shad now started a protest in front of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] as we speak.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.42.message: They want to stop the power plant and are ready to use force.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.43.message: What? You Shad want to use force? With sticks and stones? Don't make me laugh!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.44.message: I know you hold little respect for us, but I beseech you, don't let this end in a blood bath!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.45.message: What choice do I have? You know as well as I do that we depend on the power plant.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.46.message: We can't simply turn it off.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.47.message: I'm very much aware. What you can do is help us free the village from those creatures.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.48.message: If you do, things might calm down again. A few of your guards should suffice...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.49.message: You wild people come around with your petty problems and I'm supposed to spare some guards for you...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.50.message: Speaking of annoyances! What's that \c[3]Seeker \c[0]doing back there?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.56.message: Oh! I didn't even see you there.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.58.message: If you need somebody to deal with your “creatures”, I'm sure a Seeker like this will do the job!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.60.message: If you want to access the temple to the north, it's in your interest to resolve this dispute quickly, right?
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.63.message: Please Seeker, we're in dire need of any help.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.64.accepted.4: The Seeker can do her thing and everybody will be happy.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.64.accepted.8: I now see you hold little respect for Seekers as well.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.64.accepted.9: My job here is to run a city in the middle of a dense jungle!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.64.accepted.1: I don't have time for wild people and adventurers.
You two do what you must to solve your problems.
And make sure you free the passage to the power plant soon or I will become another problem for you.
Now if you'd please excuse me!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.25.settings.event.64.accepted.2: Meet me outside Seeker, I'll tell you everything I know.
I've had enough of his arrogance.
Solve the quest \c[3]An Infested Village\c[0] together with Apollo and Joern.
Such arrogance! This mayor encapsulates himself in his own world, blocking off all outside issues!
Indeed, very much like his iron-walled city.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.19.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Greetings Seeker. Do you have any business with the mayor?
Do you perhaps want to proceed along the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0]?
Then you don't need to see the mayor.
Your next task as Seekers is to visit the temples in the \c[3]north of Gaia's Garden\c[0].
All Seekers are free to enter those dungeons, no permission required!
Maybe also tell your fellow Seekers that they don't have to show up here. They just keep doing it.
Why would they even want to see the mayor anyway?
It's not like he has any business with the track, right?
It seems the mayor of this town doesn't want to be involved in any of the Seeker's business!
No need to visit the \c[3]mayor\c[0] this time. You can just head straight to the temples of \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.19.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: If you want to proceed along the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0] you don't need to see the mayor.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.19.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Just visit the Temples in the \c[3]north of Gaia's Garden\c[0].
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.19.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: I'm sorry Seeker, but thanks to this noisy Shad I have my hands full with re-scheduling.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.19.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: Hello Seeker, the Mayor is free if you want to visit him.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/interior/qu.entities.47.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Cool, thanks to this weird Shad I now have to wait for my appointment with the mayor.

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.10.settings.event.17.name: Hostage
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.10.settings.event.18.message: Ohhh, please Ms. \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Free me from this scoundrel, so I can get home safely!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.10.settings.event.26.task:
\c[3]Stun\c[0] the Papagangster with \c[3]a charged attack\c[0] to \c[3]free the hostage\c[0].
\c[1]Be careful to not get too close or hurt the hostage!\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.57.settings.event.10.message: Apparently NPCs with more refined communicative recognition have been implemented at this point.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.57.settings.event.11.message: It is a shame that your vocabulary is not up to these tasks...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.93.settings.event.13.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again

assets/data/maps/jungle-city/special/hos.entities.22.settings.event.13.text:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again

Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. There is nothing to see here, so please stand back.
Welcome, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. The chief told me we would get some qualified support.\. Let's hope you are up for it!
The situation here is highly volatile.\. Criminals of the violent Papagang have stormed the building and taken hostages.
We assume that they have demands of some sort, but we can't make any sense of their squawking.
This is where you come in, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Go in there and try to \c[3]negotiate with them\c[0] to keep those hostages safe.
Try to use your fancy \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-eloquence\c[0] to \c[3]resolve it peacefully\c[0].\. Don't traumatize those civilians!
But if all else fails, at least \c[3]free the hostages\c[0] before engaging in a wild shootout!\. \v[area.jungle-city.name] is counting on you!
Go inside and try to negotiate with those flying gangsters to keep the hostages safe.\. Violence might traumatize the civilians.
If talking still fails, at least \c[3]free the hostages\c[0] before engaging in a wild shootout!
Finally, you're back.\. We heard a lot of noise in there, so I assume you couldn't solve it peacefully?
That's a shame.\. Would have made our reports easier and saved a lot of trouble with the press.
In any case, you cleared up the situation and prevented serious damage.\. We can count that as a win.
I will call the sarge and give him a brief report.\. Go back to the HQ to get your reward.
Report back to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. I already gave him a summary of your performance.
Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker]. Everything's peaceful in this disctrict.
Oh, thank the Ancients, you're back, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Maybe now we can finally get this damn tower back under control.
At least there are no hostages between the lines, but still...\. Those criminal birds seem more aggressive than ever.
They got themselves fortified up on the roof with crates full of fruits and other stolen goods, while preparing to fly them away.
You need to get inside and \c[3]take the elevator to the highest floor\c[0].\. From there you can reach \c[3]the roof\c[0] and \c[3]secure the crates\c[0].
We will send some \c[3]transport aircraft\c[0] to pick them up.\. All you will need to do is \c[3]power their magnets\c[0] to load the crates.
Well, and keep the gangsters at bay.\. We're counting on you, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Go inside and \c[3]take the elevator to the highest floor\c[0].\. From there you can reach \c[3]the roof\c[0] and \c[3]secure the crates\c[0].
Ah, there you are.\. Nice job up there, we got confirmation that all the crates have made in back in one piece.
Looks like you showed a pretty solid performance this time.
Even Sgt. Bronzel and, Ancients help us, the press won't find much to complain about.
Time to go back to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. The report of the operations should have already reached him.
Return to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. The report of this operation should have already reached him.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.329.settings.npcStates.10.event: Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker]. Everything's peaceful in this disctrict.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.0.text: Dude, you won't believe what happened at work.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.1.text: Someone breached our systems. All of them.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.2.text: Damn.. You always were so paranoid about security.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.3.text: Adding like millions of checks and such.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.4.text: I am, man! I have no idea how the intruder got in...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.5.text: Almost like it was one of us...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.6.text: Obviously we all took polygraphs, all kinds of drama.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.7.text: But nothing was found. Nothing at all.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.9.text: It should be. Unless someone KNEW all the passwords.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.10.text: I'm not sure who to trust at work anymore.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.333.settings.dialog.12.text: I would, but I really need the money, man...
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.0.text: Hey dude, check out my Balls!
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.1.text: Dude. are you serious with the \c[3]unfunny jokes?\c[0]
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.1.event.4.m: Please don't make any Ball jokes ever again.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.1.event.6.m: I know you're a relatively new player so let me tell you this: No.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.1.event.7.m: It's as unfunny as it gets and will make you very unpopular very quick.
assets/data/maps/jungle-city/west.json.entities.337.settings.dialog.1.event.8.m: So I can't relish in my sophisticated humor?

assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.4.settings.event.7.thenStep.0.t: A new future lies ahead of you.
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.7.settings.event.2.thenStep.0.t: The path to the future is \c[3]locked away\c[0]...
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.7.settings.event.2.elseStep.0.t: You wonder what will happen next.
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.7.settings.event.2.elseStep.1.t: This point marks the beginning of the \c[3]Post Game Episode\c[0].
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.7.settings.event.2.elseStep.2.t: It will be a collection of \c[3]additional game content\c[0] to be released... eventually.
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.7.settings.event.2.elseStep.3.t: You can save here to start with the Post Game Episode once it's available.
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.2.thenStep.0.t: Maybe the \c[3]key to the future\c[0] lies in the \c[3]past\c[0].
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.2.elseStep.0.t: You ponder about returning to the \c[3]past\c[0].
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.3.text:
Return to the \c[3]past\c[0].

You can return back to the \c[3]beginning of Chapter 10\c[0] shortly after you met Satoshi.
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.4.text:
Your actions in the past might impact your future.

You will keep your \c[3]level, items and quest progress\c[0].
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.5.text: You will also have the option to \c[3]skip the Final Raid and Dungeon\c[0].
assets/data/maps/meta-space.json.entities.9.settings.event.8.text: Do you want to return to the \c[3]past\c[0]?

CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER! CHEATER!

assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.15.message: Oh, they added a welcome sign. Very hospitable.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.21.message: Are you looking for that redhead pentafist from before?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.23.message: Well... I am afraid you will not find her here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.24.message: You see, each player is placed into a separate instance of these rooms.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.26.message: You will find plenty of puzzles ahead.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.27.message: You really would not want other players to interfere around here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.6.settings.event.28.message: So it is all about who will be fastest by themselves, right?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.27.message: Oh, they added a welcome sign. Very hospitable.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.31.message: Anyway, this is supposed to be the first dungeon for new players.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.32.message: It should be feasible for you. Especially after Carla's track on the cargo ship.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.34.message: Wait, I see a developer note over here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.35.message: "Sorry, this dungeon is still incomplete. Expect more content in the next release."
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.37.message: Huh. This is strange. I thought CrossWorlds was released several years ago.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/entrance.js.entities.12.settings.event.38.message: Anyway, there should be at least some puzzles to solve here.

Press and hold \i[quick] to open the \c[3]quickmenu\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1-6.js.entities.44.settings.text: A chest! But what is inside?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1-6.js.entities.45.settings.text: A Chest! Some yummy \c[3]\v[item.1.name]es\c[0] were inside.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1-6.js.entities.46.settings.text: A Chest! But what is inside?

assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1.json.entities.10.settings.event.0.message: Alright, Lea... I will be gone for a couple of minutes.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1.json.entities.10.settings.event.1.message: I will contact Jet and Carla, and try to investigate that blue individual.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1.json.entities.10.settings.event.2.message: I am sure you will be fine by yourself. See you later!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-1.json.entities.10.settings.event.4.message: ...I really have to work on your vocabulary.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-4.json.entities.8.settings.event.9.guiInfo.sett: THE TIME FOR REVENGE IS NIGH!

assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.2.settings.event.37.task: Complete the final dungeon of \c[3]Newcomer's Bridge\c[0].
Press \i[menu] to open the menu.
Select \c[3]equipment\c[0] to equip the new items.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.40.settings.event.0.message: Oh...\. Right. Enemies start to give EXP at this point.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.9.message: Greetings from Jet and Carla.\. Everything is back to normal on the M.S. Solar.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.10.message: There are no traces left of that blue individual.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.12.message: I also tried to find some information about him, but there is nothing.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.14.message: We can be pretty certain that he is not connected to the official game.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.15.message: I just cannot imagine a regular player leaving CrossWorlds and going on a rampage like this.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.16.message: Something very strange is going on here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.17.message: ...\. Not to mention that he recognized you.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.19.message: Your memory might, in fact, contain some answers to all of this.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.23.message: Anyway, there is no need to worry about this right now.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.24.message: Our goal is simply to play CrossWorlds!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.54.settings.event.26.message: And I see you've made a lot of progress already!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.69.settings.event.0.message: You already reached level 3?\. That is strange.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.69.settings.event.1.message: I thought you were supposed to reach level 2 at this point.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.69.settings.event.2.message: I suppose they may have added more enemies...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-5-newe.entities.70.settings.event.8.text: \c[3]Equip items\c[0] to prepare yourself for battle.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.4.message: I have a little upgrade for you, as well!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.6.message: I finally managed to add another word to your vocabulary.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.8.message: Well, you know how it is.\. No shiny effects from me.\. Just the upgrade.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.17.message: I think you will need this one, since I will not be able to introduce you to other people anymore.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.22.message: Do not look at me like that...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.23.message: I know, it takes a long time to add these words.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.24.message: It is a very involved process, actually.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.25.message: I need to manually extend your Thought Control Model...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.26.message: ...essentially modifying a statistically generated code base by hand.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.29.message: The technology to control avatars is...\. well...\. complicated.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.40.settings.event.31.message: Anyway, the second word is done.\. I will work on the next one right away!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.41.settings.event.21.text: Activate circuits using \c[3]Circuit Points (CP)\c[0], earned with each level up.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.41.settings.event.34.text: Certain skills unlock \c[3]combat arts\c[0] that can be used in battle.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.41.settings.event.38.thenStep.3: You can \c[3]switch between branching skills\c[0] at any time without spending CP!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.41.settings.event.38.elseStep.1: You can \c[3]switch between branching skills\c[0] at any time without spending CP!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-dng/room-final..entities.41.settings.event.52.text: You now got \c[3]special points\c[0] (SP) used for \c[3]combat arts\c[0].

The \c[3]Rhombus Arena\c[0] is currently under construction.
However the new arena will include a much larger pool of activities for battle-ready Seekers.
These activities will include \c[3]Ranked Battle\c[0] for both Solo- & Teamplay, \c[3]Challenges\c[0], \c[3]Boss Rush\c[0] and more!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/arena-1.jso.entities.793.settings.dialog.2.text: Yeah, those trees have some serious damping qualities.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/arena-1.jso.entities.832.settings.dialog.0.text: Ah, the soothing sounds of water on my umbrella...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/arena-1.jso.entities.832.settings.dialog.2.text: If only more Seekers would jump into the water for me.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.836.settings.dialog.0.text: Alright... just need to write a \c[3]conclusion part\c[0]...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.836.settings.dialog.0.event.5.m: I'm writing a thesis on the \v[lore.unlock.real-planet]\c[3]Raritan Gem\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.836.settings.dialog.0.event.6.m: You know, the planet this game's played on?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.836.settings.dialog.0.event.8.m: So yeah, stranger. Maybe another time.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.863.settings.dialog.0.text: This is where we first met.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.863.settings.dialog.1.text: I totally ran into you, looking at the cars, haha.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-e.js.entities.863.settings.dialog.2.text: And in retrospect I couldn't be happier about it.

I was expecting you to arrive \c[3]alone\c[0]. We should make sure that no one else is involved in this.
No time to waste, please come this way.
Follow Albert to \c[3]Rhombus Square - Residential District\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-s.js.entities.633.settings.dialog.0.text: And then she said: "You city folk don't know plants".
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-s.js.entities.633.settings.dialog.1.text: But she was born here, wasn't she?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-s.js.entities.633.settings.dialog.2.text: That's what I thought too, but she was derailing the argument anyway.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-s.js.entities.635.settings.dialog.0.text: Ah, Seeker. What you obtained is ancient. Be careful with it.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.81.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.81.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: This bridge is currently under repair.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.82.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: This bridge is currently under repair.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.83.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: We are terribly sorry, dear player.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.83.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: This bridge is currently under repair.
We are terribly sorry, dear player.
This bridge is currently under repair.
We are terribly sorry, dear player.
This bridge is currently under repair.
We are terribly sorry, dear player.
We are currently investigating a malfunction in these fences.
Hi!
Oh?\. Good day, Lea.
Having a stroll around Rhombus Square?
[nods]
Oh, who are you? A new member of the First Scholars?
Yes, she just joined a couple weeks ago.
Well then, I hope you're enjoying CrossWorlds, young lady!
Lea!
Oh yes! I'm Ivan. Nice to meet you!
Actually something quite peculiar about her...\. It seems her speech module isn't working.
Oh it isn't? She just said her name though, didn't she?
We believe she is using some kind of workaround that allows her to say a few words.
[nods]
Hi!\. Bye.\. How.\. Why.\. Sorry.
This is...\. very strange.
I'd suggest you contact support, but if you already rely on a workaround like this, the problem must be really persistent.
You think there is anybody you could talk to about this?
Not really...\. I'm unfortunately out of touch with the development department.
I expected as much.
There was that one time when I tried to promote some research projects to integrate upcoming AI technologies.
I talked to some of the engineers back then.
But it wasn't met with a lot of enthusiasm, so I gave up on it. It's really a shame.
I heard that Instatainment cut down on the R&D department in general, didn't they?
That's pretty much the case, yes.
Why?
Business is going well enough and most shareholders want to avoid risks as much as possible.
Instatainment has lost much of its innovative spark these days.
Oh, is it that late already? It's time for me to go.
Anyway, it was nice to see you again Albert! Until next time!
Sure, just let me know when you have some free time again.
Have a nice day, everyone!
Bye!
Logout
Well then, I have to leave as well.
Good bye!
Bye!
Who was that person?
He seems to be closely involved with Instatainment.
What was his name again? Ivan?
[nods]
No way!
That must have been \c[3]Mr. Vestorovich\c[0]!
He is a shareholder of Instatainment.
I can barely believe this.
He is supposed to be such a busy person, yet here he was talking casually with Albert.
Lea, this is huge!
Mr. Vestorovich, he has been active in the field of AI for some time now.
I tried to get in touch with him back when Satoshi was still at Instatainment, but we never had any luck.
However, since Albert seems to know him personally, we might get our chance to meet him.
I am 100% positive he would be thrilled to learn about \c[3]Evotars\c[0]!
So... now we just have to reach Albert and ask him about it...
How?
That is the tricky part.
Remember the \c[3]hologram projector\c[0] in the meeting room of the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0]?
If we can meet him personally there, I might be able to talk to him directly.
It looks like he is \c[3]still online\c[0].
Let us just head to the meeting room and see if he is close by.
[nods]
Go to the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] and check if Albert is there.
It's too bad that \c[3]Ivan\c[0] didn't have the chance to meet you...
Oh well...\. let's just say he is well connected with Instatainment.
And I'm sure he would have been excited about Evotars.
Unfortunately, he just left for a business trip.
No chance to meet him anytime soon.
It was very fortunate that you spotted me together with Ivan back then.
He really seems to be excited about Evotars.
That will help a great deal when we start to talk with Instatainment.
Though I suppose the meeting could have gone better.
Still...\. let's try our best to convince Instatainment.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.945.settings.event.24.message: Oh!\. Were you just talking about Ivan?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.945.settings.event.26.message: Come on!\. I want to meet him already!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.945.settings.event.35.message: I bet he's amazing at \c[3]BBQs\c[0],\. being a proper\. \c[3]steakholder\c[0]\. and all!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.945.settings.event.47.text:
And then, before I knew it...\.
it was already time to say goodbye.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.0.text: Just what caused this bridge to collapse?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.1.text: It's not like Avatars are heavy and can just break it.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.2.text: Can't be the cars either, those are tied to a grid.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.960.settings.dialog.3.text: I'm more concerned with your obsession to sit on the ground...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.974.settings.dialog.0.text: Man, I never saw him this excited...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.974.settings.dialog.1.text: At least we get some rest...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/center-se.j.entities.974.settings.dialog.2.text: Until the shop opens, that is.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.31.message: You should now be able to travel to all landmarks within the Playground again.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.34.message: It is probably a good idea to say hello to your friends again...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.35.message: We have been missing for quite some time.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.48.message: It has been what?\. A week?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.50.message: Oui. Lost for words. As always.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.51.message: Meet me at the guild headquarters.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.52.message: I want to talk to you in person.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.61.message: Well...\. you disappeared in middle of the raid, remember?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central-inn.entities.181.settings.event.63.message: It is probably a good idea to talk to her soon.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.106.settings.event.18.message: That was fun! Can't wait to reach the mainland.
You can quickly reach all of CrossWorlds from here.
Though there should only be one destination for us newbies: \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.1.text: This is the central teleportation hub of this world.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.2.text: From here you will be able to quickly travel to all locations you have reached on the mainland.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.3.text: Note that new recruits will only be able to travel to \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0] at first.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.4.text: You will visit several locations as you travel along the \c[5]Track of the Ancients\c[5].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.4.event.4.m: Do you want to know more about the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.4.event.5.0: The \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0] is an ancient \c[3]assessment system\c[0] based on a highly advanced technology.
As Seekers it is your task to walk the Track and discover all the secrets it holds.
Once you reach \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0] you can attend the Introductory briefing to learn more about it.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.118.settings.dialog.5.text: Once you reach a new major location on the mainland, a connection to CrossCentral will be established for quick travel.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.0.text: Huh, those poor advisor NPCs. Just explaining the same thing over and over again.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.1.text: You know that those NPCs are actually artificial intelligences, right?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.3.text: Yeah, it's hard to tell at the beginning, but you will notice eventually.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.4.text: Their interactions with players are somewhat limited.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.5.text: Man, we've come pretty far with AI research, haven't we?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.6.text: Sure... yet we still have trouble passing the \c[5]Turing Test\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.6.event.4.m: Hey there, can we help you?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.6.event.7.m: Oh, are you wondering about the \c[3]Turing Test\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.121.settings.dialog.6.event.9.m: Oh? You're a curious one, I like that!
The Turing Test is quite simple:
You have two people writing each other via text.
The twist: one of them is actually a machine.
If the actual person can tell from the conversation that the other person is a machine, you fail the Turing Test.
It's difficult, because it's not just about simulating natural language.
The machine needs to have a memory, general knowledge and many other things to properly respond like a human being would.
Oh! It's you from Newcomer's Bridge again.
Look, we're getting closer to the mainland!
If you look closely, you can already see Rookie Harbor on the horizon.
So...\. this is it?\. Is this the entrance to the city?
Indeed! From here you can take the sky rail to any part of the city.
There is a shopping district, a residential area, and of course the \c[3]arena\c[0].
I recommend checking out the stores. The \c[3]Booster Items\c[0] are especially interesting.
We'll be going then! See you around!
So how about it, Lea? Should we explore the city together?
D'accord! Just call us then when you change your mind!
It does not hurt to have a look around the city now.
Just do not forget that our next destination is the \c[3]north of Sapphire Ridge\c[0].
Search the \c[3]north of Sapphire Ridge\c[0] to look for the place you saw in your dreams.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.346.settings.dialog.1.text: We're back in Rhombus Square. You should have seen that coming.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.346.settings.dialog.2.text: I know...\. they're still the worst, though!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.346.settings.dialog.2.event.6.m: You walked through the deep chasms of a mine, climbed up a giant tree, and stood in the middle of space.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.346.settings.dialog.2.event.7.m: After all that, do those puny Sky Rails still a pose a challenge to you?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/central.jso.entities.346.settings.dialog.2.event.9.m: You know what?\. You're right.\. They really shouldn't.
Nothing tops the horror of standing in literal space.
Screw this, let's explore the city!

You can go ahead! Just take any of those sky rail terminals.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.15.message: Ha!\. ...\. Told you I would be...\. first...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.22.message: Ah, oui~\. But wasn't that fun?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.23.message: I was very surprised by that boss at the end!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.25.message: Um...\. Pardon.\. I didn't even introduce myself.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.33.message: So...\. Are you ready to take the sky rails?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.47.message: I wish we could already explore the city itself, but non~
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.49.message: Didn't you know?\. The sky rail will take you straight to \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.50.message: From there you'll be transported to the mainland.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.51.message: You will only be able to enter Rhombus Square much later.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.66.message: Before, you just appeared out of nowhere.\. Suspicious!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.67.message: And what do I see now?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.69.message: And this is unheard of.\. I'm forced to assume~
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.89.message: Monsieur, going straight for the accusations?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.90.message: How can you be so sure about it?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.91.message: Just because you are stuck at level 3 doesn't mean...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.95.message: No player on record has ever reached level 4 at this point.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.96.message: Young lady, surely I don't need to explain to you the faults of such actions.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.98.message: Cheating will never pay off in the long run!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.100.message: Is that all you have to say?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.101.message: Oh dear, what is going on here?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.109.message: Joern, I have exposed this cheater here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.111.message: Yes, about the wrongness of her actions!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.116.message: I'll just go ahead and pretend I don't know you.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.128.message: He sometimes pretends to be a moderator.\. He is not.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.143.message: Young lady, I'll let you off this time.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.155.message: Mon Dieu!\. What was the deal with him?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.157.message: I hope we don't meet players like this around here too often.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.166.message: I want to finally reach \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.167.message: You can come with me, if you want to.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.172.message: Whoa...\. My heart just stopped there for a second.\. That was close.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.173.message: It is all because you collected those extra EXP from that \c[3]crab boss\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.149.settings.event.174.message: I should have noticed this earlier.\. Sorry.
From here you can take the sky rails to reach \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.164.settings.dialog.0.text: No floor... there is no floor....
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.164.settings.dialog.2.text: You just fly through the air... it's all transparent!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.164.settings.dialog.5.text: Please stay strong, just this one last time.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.164.settings.dialog.6.text: I'm sure things will be better once we reach the mainland.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.0.text: Dear Seekers, you are now permitted to enter the \c[3]mainland of Shadoon\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.1.text: You can take the sky rails from here to reach \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0], our central teleportation hub.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.2.text: Note that as new Seekers you are not yet permitted to enter the \c[3]city of Rhombus Square\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.3.text: Such permission will be granted once you've made sufficient progress along the \c[5]Track of the Ancients\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.3.event.4.m: Do you want to know more about the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.170.settings.dialog.3.event.5.0: The \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0] is an ancient \c[3]assessment system\c[0] based on a highly advanced technology.
As Seekers it is your task to walk the Track and discover all the secrets it holds.
Once you reach \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0] you can attend the introductory briefing to learn more about it.
Those sky rail terminals will bring you to \c[3]CrossCentral\c[0].
You can take any one of them, they all go to the same place.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.174.settings.dialog.0.text: Whoa, this city looks huge! And so clean and shiny!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.174.settings.dialog.1.text: Yeah, and they won't let you in it until much later.
Well, in case you are wondering why I'm sitting here...
Apparently he felt sick after the last stage.
Now I have to wait here for him to come back.
Damn it, I want to go on so badly!
Aww, don't look so sorry! We're talking first world problems here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.0.text: That turret boss at the end was pretty cool, huh?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.1.text: Most def! That ball streaming attack was intense, dude!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.2.text: I also like how it was mostly about ranged combat.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.3.text: Whatcha talking about, dude? I just went in and punched it hard!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.4.text: What?\. How did you do that?\. It moved to the center of that hole in the second phase, didn't it?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.5.text: Well, I just jumped on its platform and did ma punching!\. Also, some dodging.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.6.text: That sounds like a risky tactic.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-end.jso.entities.180.settings.dialog.7.text: Well, I ain't choosing a Pentafist for no reason! Gotta punch stuff! That's ma skill, dude!

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.173.settings.event.2.thenStep.1: I still cannot believe what just happened on the M.S. Solar.
Anyway, we are now in the official Playground.
This area is packed with all kinds of security measures.
More interference from that blue individual is highly unlikely here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.173.settings.event.2.thenStep.2: This is the official introduction to CrossWorlds.
I placed you right in front of the last part.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.173.settings.event.2.thenStep.3: It is important that we do this part the official way to avoid suspicion.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.173.settings.event.2.thenStep.4: It is absolutely essential that you pass as a regular player.
We must avoid being reported at any cost.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.173.settings.event.2.thenStep.5: Do not worry too much about your speech synchronization issues.
You are in fact not the first player with these problems.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.176.settings.event.0.message: Most of these players here should be newcomers just like you.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.176.settings.event.1.message: Veterans usually skip this part, obviously.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.179.settings.dialog.0.text: C'mon, there's no need to be afraid.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.179.settings.dialog.1.text: You know I can't deal with heights...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.179.settings.dialog.2.text: It's all just a game, there's no danger, y'know?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.179.settings.dialog.3.text: I know... It just feels so real.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.179.settings.dialog.4.text: Just give me some time, ok?
First a greeting and now silence? You're a strange one.
S-Sorry... that came across the wrong way.
You must be here for the view.
CrossWorlds expands over the whole land you see over there.
People call it the \c[3]Croissant\c[0]... because the island is shaped like one.
It's not my first time up here.
I usually redo the introduction phase with each character.
I just enjoy the view from here.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.14.message: Hm...\. But I have not noticed you up here before.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.15.message: Oh!\. Does this mean you caught up after me?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.18.message: Huh!\. You must be very quick with the tutorials!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.19.message: But I got the hang of it now, too.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.20.message: You will not beat me on the last tutorial stage, non!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.184.settings.event.21.message: Let's meet at the end.\. I will be waiting!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.195.settings.dialog.0.text: Dear \c[3]Seekers\c[0], you're about to enter the final stage of Newcomer's Bridge.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.195.settings.dialog.1.text: You will be confronted with a multitude of puzzle and combat situations.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.195.settings.dialog.2.text: Make use of all the skills you learned in the previous stages!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.195.settings.dialog.3.text: Expect your skillset to be further expanded over the course of the final stage.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.195.settings.dialog.4.text: As a reward for passing Newcomer's Bridge you will be granted access to the mainland.
Please step on the red teleport panel to enter the final stage.
Dang, I can barely see a thing!
"You should totally choose a short avatar", they said.
You're in the same boat, huh?
Congratulations on reaching the third stage of Newcomer's Bridge!
You have just arrived at the final waiting area.
You can take a break here and enjoy the view.
Once you are ready, proceed to the teleporter at the other end of this area to enter the final stage!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.204.settings.dialog.1.text: Yeah, good thing they added those laser railings!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.204.settings.dialog.4.text: The best type of laser there is.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.207.settings.dialog.0.text: Ocean as far as the eye can see.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.207.settings.dialog.1.text: Huh... now that we're on this distant moon...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.207.settings.dialog.2.text: It makes you wonder what kind of sea life you'd find down there.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.207.settings.dialog.3.text: Hell yeah! You think we can just jump down into the water with our avatars and explore?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/dng-top.jso.entities.207.settings.dialog.4.text: More like "explode"... I heard avatars are not all that water resistant.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/bo.entities.24.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Here you can acquire the Booster Item introduced in Version 1.35-1 of CrossWorlds.
As this is your first visit here, allow me to explain!
These Traders behind me hold a\c[3] Booster Add-On\c[0] for each one of the major areas.
Once acquired and turned on, \c[3]enemies in the affected area will become much stronger\c[0].
They will also \c[3]drop rare gem stones used in various trading offers\c[0] around \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].
However each trader requires a \c[3]legendary item\c[0] that can be \c[3]found in the affected area\c[0].
They are very well hidden! Try communicating with other players in order to locate them!
Good Luck and happy hunting, Seeker!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/bo.entities.24.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: Here you can acquire the \c[3]Booster Items\c[0] introduces in Version 1.35-1 of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/bo.entities.24.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Do you need a refresher on how to acquire and use Booster Items?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/bo.entities.24.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: These Traders behind me, hold a\c[3] Booster Add-On\c[0] for each one of the major areas.
Once acquired and turned on, \c[3]enemies in the affected area will become much stronger\c[0].
They will also \c[3]drop rare gem stones used in various trading offers\c[0] around \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].
However each trader requires a \c[3]legendary item\c[0] that can be \c[3]found in the affected area\c[0].
They are very well hidden! Try communicating with other players in order to located them!
Good Luck and happy hunting, Seeker!
Good Luck and happy hunting, Seeker!

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/cu.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: 'Sup. Looking for some treasure? Look no further.
\c[3]Only one item per body\c[0] though, rules are rules.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/eq.entities.37.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: These are the weapons of Rhombus Square, the finest any human can produce!

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.15.1.1.messag: Hm?\. No need to be so shy!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.15.2.2.messag: Hm? Oh don't worry, you didn't make me wait for that long.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.16.message: Welcome to my little mansion, \c[3]Anna\c[0]! It's nice to see you again.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.18.2.3.messag: Ah...\. did I get your name wrong?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.18.2.6.messag: I'm sorry, my memory for names has seen better days.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.18.3.4.messag: You just arrived, don't tell me you want to leave already.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.19.message: Anyway, I'm glad you arrived safely.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.20.message: It's good to see that you managed to stay dry with all the \c[3]rain outside\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.22.3.2.messag: Huh, did I say something strange?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.24.message: It's sunny out there, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.28.message: I probably sound like a senile old man to you, don't I?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.30.message: Ouch.\. That was a bit too honest, don't you think?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.32.2.2.messag: Oh? Do you want to leave? Did I do something wrong?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.36.message: I was told you are an AI.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.37.message: One of the most effective ways to distinguish a poor AI from a human is testing how it reacts to nonsense.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.39.thenStep.0: And despite your lack of speech, I have to say your reactions so far seem very much human-like.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.39.elseStep.0: And your reactions have been...\. pretty good so far!
And I have to be honest...\. some of your answers have been rather strange, Lea.
Even taking into account your speech limitations.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.40.message: Anyway, let's do a little quiz.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.42.message: Don't worry, it should be simple.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.63.message: Say Lea, do you remember the appearance and taste of \c[3]fruits and vegetables\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.66.message:
In that case,\. what's your \c[3]favorite\c[0]?\.
A:\. Lettuce,\. B:\. Tomatoes,\.
C:\. Bananas,\. D:\. Eggplants?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.68.message: Good. "\c[3]\v[tmp.food]\c[0]" you say. Please remember this for a moment.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.71.message: Some time ago, I had a long talk with an old friend.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.72.message: He just went on about his garden at home.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.76.message: And when he was done...\. I told him this is all really \c[3]fascinating\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.77.message: Here is my second question: \c[3]did I tell him the truth\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.81.message:
What \c[3]color\c[0] is most commonly associated with it?
A:\. Red,\. B:\. Green,\.
C:\. Purple,\. D:\. Yellow?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.83.thenStep.1: The color of "\c[3]\v[tmp.food]\c[0]" is "\c[3]\v[tmp.color]\c[0]".\. Sounds reasonable!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.83.elseStep.1: The color of "\c[3]\v[tmp.food]\c[0]" is "\c[3]\v[tmp.color]\c[0]"?\. Are you sure?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.85.thenStep.0: And you handled this one \c[3]perfectly\c[0].\. That's for sure.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.85.elseStep.0: And your answers have been...\. well...\. \c[3]so-so\c[0].
And well...\. I \c[3]expected better\c[0] to be honest.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.87.message: You could in fact just be a human-controlled program mocking an AI.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.88.message: But Mr. Asimov proposed a little \c[3]experiment\c[0] to prove that you are in fact a real AI.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.90.message: He gave me a small program to send you a \c[3]prerecorded message\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.91.message: I will send this message now.\. Get ready!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.105.message: Mr. Asimov claimed you are capable of receiving and understanding the full recording in a \c[3]split second\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.107.message: That is certainly a feat impossible to humans.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.108.message: In the middle of this recording will be a simple question.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.109.message: Be careful not to miss it.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.111.message: Anyway...\. the weather sure is nice isn't it?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.113.message: I'm just talking to add some padding to this recording.\. Don't mind me.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.118.message: Please remember the answer until after the recording is over.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.121.message: Some of my peers find it rather strange that I sometimes play CrossWorlds, you know?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.123.message: They keep telling me a person in my position should have better things to do.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.124.message: But why should it matter what I do as a recreational activity?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.125.message: Plus, I feel the technology of CrossWorlds is highly fascinating.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.126.message: Of course I do. That's why I invested into Instatainment, after all.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.128.message: Anyway, this is the end of the recording.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.129.message: Now please answer my question from before!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.141.1.7.messa: You received a recording of about a minute and responded to it...\. almost \c[3]immediately\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.141.1.9.messa: This proves, without a doubt, that you are indeed an AI.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.144.message: Are you sure you received the full recording?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/in.entities.70.settings.event.145.message: Now I have to wonder if you really are an AI.
Honestly...\. I feel this was a waste of time.
Still...\. I feel this was a waste of time.
Lea, you are not the advanced AI I was hoping to meet today.
Pretty much the most \c[3]human-like AI\c[0] I have witnessed so far!
I am very glad to hear this.
I'd like to meet up soon to discuss this matter in more detail.
Please contact my secretary to make an appointment.
I will do that right away! Thank you for your time.
No, I thank you for giving me the opportunity to see this!
And Lea...\. I hope you enjoyed our conversation as much as I did.
Hohoho! Quite the sassy girl, aren't you?
As for your performance...\. I'm a bit on the edge to be honest.
Some of your answers have been rather strange.
Anyway, thanks a lot for the interesting conversation.
I will get back to you.
Goodbye, Lea. And I hope to see you again!
Goodbye and have a nice day, Lea.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/it.entities.40.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hello, welcome!\. Take a look at our great selection of items.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/it.entities.43.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hey! We offer special items, supported by only the finest of backers.

Didn't ya read the sign outside?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/ol.entities.2.settings.npcStates.1.event.qu: Didn't ya read the sign outside?
Leave an old man alone.
Sorry...
You need a smith?
Sorry lass, this old geezer wants to enjoy his retirement.
Better find someone else.
How?
Don't be stubborn, old friend.
Been a long time.
Well look who's still alive.
Time sure did no harm to you.
Been eating my vegetables is all.
You haven't lost your cheek, either.
So, what about this lass?
At this point I'm sure you sent her.
True. Thought the girl might have some trouble convincing you.
Guess I was right.
I quit the hermit smith life a long time ago, friend.
My creations have long been forgotten, or left broken.
She has the drill.
The drill you say? How is that old thing still around?
Can't stop what drives progress.
Was in pretty bad shape when I got my hands on it.
Did what I could. But it needs the stone.
The stone? And you think this lass can handle it?
Never was more sure about anything.
Mh...
Ahhh, fine then. But you know she has to find the fragments of the stones first, aye?
Already did. All you need to do is put 'em together.
Thought of everything, eh?
Well, I'll still need an ember strong enough to melt them.
And the only one strong enough would be a \c[3]\v[item.456.name]\c[0].
If you bring me one, I can make the stone.
But you know what this means for you?
I'm ready.
Why did I even ask.
So Seeker, find me a \c[3]\v[item.456.name]\c[0]. You might have luck finding one here in \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].
[nods]
Will stay here, have some catching up to do.
Find me a \c[3]\v[item.456.name]\c[0]. You might have luck finding one here in \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/interior/ol.entities.2.settings.npcStates.3.event.qu: Alright, let's see if these old bones can still create something.
You both just wait here. I'll be back in a bit.
Always used his instant teleportation or whatever he calls it.
Will be preparing things on my end. Find me in The \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] once you're done here.
Here, take a look at this beauty.
I haven't felt this alive in a while, lass.
I guess I have you to thank for that.
And it looks like that old fool already left, huh?
Didn't even say goodbye. He'll never change.
Well, my work is done. Go find him to awaken the true power of the drill.
My work is done. Go find \c[3]him\c[0] to awaken the true power of the drill.
I can see the drill has awakened.
I will miss that old fool...
Don't fret, lass. He'll just be sleeping for a long time.
Looks like I can finally see my drill at full power.
Must have been ages since I last used it.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.37.settings.blockEvent.2.messag: Lea...\. It should go without saying that you should meet Mr. Vestorovich in there \c[3]alone\c[0]. Please disband your party.
Isn't this part of the city quite beautiful?
Indeed you could say it is very...\. fency!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.276.settings.interact.title: Villa
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.329.settings.interact.title: Twin Home
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.374.settings.interact.title: Twin Home
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.636.settings.interact.title: Fan Club
To fish, one must become the fish. Become one with the water.
Be a radical fish, my friend.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.708.settings.dialog.0.text: Have you seen latest comment on the fish board?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.708.settings.dialog.2.text: One of the devs said that they have no plans to ever bring fishing back.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.708.settings.dialog.4.text: And the kicker: They said most people just enjoy hitting plants more.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.708.settings.dialog.5.text: But what about us? Some just want some peace and tranquility while fishing.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.748.settings.interact.title: Coming Soon
Lea, you need to enter his mansion \c[3]alone\c[0]. No one else must be involved.
He wants to find out just how advanced of an AI you really are.
Well...\. just try to \c[3]act naturally\c[0]. Human-like.
Pretty much like you did so far.
Meet Mr. Vestorovich in his mansion in \c[3]Rhombus Square - Residential District\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.8.thenStep.1: Mr. Vestorovich at least seemed very intrigued.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.8.thenStep.2: If we can convince him of the potential of Evotars, we might get Instatainment to support the research after all.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.8.thenStep.3: Which means, we might be able to create a future for Evotars!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.9.thenStep.0: I am not sure, to be honest.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.9.thenStep.1: Lea, you behaved a little bit strangely in there. Were you nervous?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.9.thenStep.3: Hm...\. we will just have to see how it turns out.
Did you even want to prove you were an intelligent AI?
It felt more like you have been messing around.
We might have just gambled away our best chance to create a future for Evotars.
I am afraid saying sorry will not fix this.
We will have to see if more opportunities come up.
Lea unfortunately failed the most important test.
That was weird.\. Sending you those recordings usually works perfectly fine.
Was there maybe an issue when Mr Vestorovich used it?
Well...\. it cannot be helped now.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.12.message: Anyway, next I suppose you have to resolve this whole "Evotarground" situation, right?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.13.message: Right, and we are on it.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.14.message: Please make sure not to tell anyone else about Lea just yet.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.15.message: It is important that we keep things secret for now.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.16.message: Understood. If there is anything else I can help you with, just let me know.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.17.message: Of course, and thanks a lot for everything so far!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.32.message: Right. \c[3]Getting ready to re-enter Vermillion Wasteland\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.33.message: Once you feel prepared, let us visit Shizuka and Satoshi again at the \c[3]Old Hideout\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/residential.entities.994.settings.event.36.task: Prepare yourself for reentering Vermillion Wasteland. Talk to \c[3]Satoshi\c[0] at the \c[3]Hideout\c[0] when ready.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.0.text: So what did you wanna talk about?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.1.text: Well, We know each other for a while now, so...
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.2.text: You gonna confess your love to me? REALLY?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.801.settings.dialog.3.text: Huh? No, I wanted to ask if you can watch my cats while I'm on vacation.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.812.settings.dialog.0.text: I'm not sure about this cactus juice.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.812.settings.dialog.1.text: It's the latest in juice design. Engineered for maximum taste.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.812.settings.dialog.2.text: Can you tell me more about the company who made it?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/shops-1.jso.entities.812.settings.dialog.3.text: I apologize this information is confidential.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.2.settings.title: South Arch
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.2.settings.description: This stop is close to both the Arena and the Southern Residence District.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.3.settings.title: Shopping District
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.3.settings.description: Both shops and cafes call this part of town their home.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.4.settings.title: CrossCentral
assets/data/maps/rhombus-sqr/sky-rail-ma.entities.4.settings.description: The entrance to Rhombus Square and exit to the main land.

assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.13.message: One step at a time, Carla.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.15.message: Lea, do you remember the concept of an MMO?
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.16.1.1.message: Well, MMO stands for "Massively Multiplayer Online".
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.16.1.2.message: It is a term for video games that support a large number of players simultaneously.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.16.1.3.message: Usually, all these players are connected to a virtual environment from all around the world.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.17.message: Now, CrossWorlds is like an MMO, just with one striking difference.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.18.message: The world of this game is not virtual.\. It is real.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.19.message: All players are remotely connected to this world through special avatars.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.20.message: These avatars have a physical form and are tightly connected to all 5 senses of the player.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.21.message: And you, Lea, are currently logged into this game as well.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.25.message: Oh, me?\. No, I'm not a player.\. I just work here!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.26.message: In fact, you're the only avatar on this whole ship.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.28.message: That is correct.\. This cargo ship belongs to the maintenance staff of CrossWorlds.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.29.message: The actual game takes place in the land you see over there - the Playground.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.30.message: The reason you are here, Lea, is because you are not a regular player.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.31.message: You have lost your memory and we are trying to recover it.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.33.message: You see, you have been in this game before.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.34.message: Being logged into this game, there is a chance you might remember your past.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.35.message: And that is why we will try to get you into the real Playground soon.
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.36.message: Yeah, in fact you'll be going to that glass palace of a city over there!
assets/data/maps/rhombus-square-view.jso.entities.9.settings.event.42.message: That's Rhombus Square. It's where all players start.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.486.settings.blockEvent.4.messa: Hey Lea!\. Please don't just run off like that, d'accord?\. We're over here!
Hoi!\.\. We're not set up yet, but we're giving it our all to deliver the bestest foods as soon as we can!
Come back later, yeah?!\. It will be amazing, just you watch!
Ah, hello.\. I'm sorry, but we haven't properly prepared our shop yet.
Please visit us later to get a taste of our high-quality foods.
Sorry \v[lore.title.seeker], but this shop isn't ready yet.
Come back later if you want to get some revitalizing tea.
Did you know that these treasure chests are instanced for each player?
Oh well... it means I opened this treasure chest myself before.
The content is replicated for each player.
That's cool, right? No more annoying empty chests because some random player reached it before you!
Yeah.... anyway, gotta meet my friends at the entrance.
Heh, you reached this spot. Not bad!
No reason to hold back. Go claim your prize!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.510.settings.dialog.2.text: I wanna go through the market later~
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.510.settings.dialog.7.text: Also,I wanna take a bath in that fountain, naked.
If you put water into a fountain...
It becomes the fountain.
You just jumped into the fountain, didn't you?
That's not how you become water, my friend.
What is it? You learned the \c[3]Wave\c[0] element?
Wave doesn't make you water, my friend.
Clearly waves are merely an aspect of water, as it is of sound and more.
Really...\. What even is wave? Such nonsense.
Water is what you need to be.\. Water and only water.
Could I interest you in some cool and delicious ice cream?
Well... unfortunately we are out of stock right now.
But, if you bring me some \c[3]fresh ice from Bergen Trail\c[0], I could quickly produce new ice cream.
So... could you bring me some \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0]? About \c[3]5\c[0] should suffice.
You can find \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] in the snowy parts of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].\. Just continue to the west until you reach the mountain area.
Did they seriously ask you to fetch ice from a distant mountain?
What is this, the middle ages?
Oh, that's too bad. Maybe another time!
Hm... it seems you don't have enough \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] yet. I need about \c[3]5 pieces\c[0].
You can find \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] in the snowy parts of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0]. Just continue to the west until you reach the mountain area.
Oh, you brought me the \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0]! Thank you so much!
And here's your ice cream! Don't eat it all at once, it might make your head hurt!
You know what? They could have declared "Bergen Ice" a speciality.
