That would explain why you would have to go so far just to fetch it.
People perform all kinds of elaborate tasks, because it is a speciality, do they not?
Well, nevermind. I am not a game designer.
Ice cream sure sells quickly when the weather is right.
I'm sorry, the northern part is currently under construction.
It will open up to the public with the next content update!
Sorry, the northern part of the town is blocked due to construction.
It will be open again in a future update!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.0.text: I'm really looking forward to the next content patch.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.1.text: I heard rumors about a black market!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.3.text: By the way, does it make sense to call it a "patch"?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.4.text: I mean it's not just code. They're doing actual construction work over there.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.5.text: It's just a habit from old virtual MMOs. Don't overthink it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.6.text: Yeah. I'm also still waiting for that kitchen patch.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.8.text: My sink is broken. Landlord's gotta patch that!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.567.settings.dialog.9.text: Stop it, you're making my brain hurt.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.575.settings.blockEvent.4.messa: Where are you going Lea?\. We're over here!
Oh dear!
Hmpf, didn't your father tell you not to startle people?
[shakes head]
Well... \.\. He clearly should have!
Kids these days, don't know their manners!
Now now, don't be sad, young lady.
At least you look like you are actually sorry.
Now that's better!
Hmmmmm\..\..\..
I think I like your attitude.
Look, if you want to make up for startling me, why not help me out?
Now don't look at me like that. It's not hard at all. All I want you to do is find me a \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0]. Simple enough, right?
[nods]
Very good. Someone told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
Do you think you can find it?
Good to hear! But don't keep me waiting alright?
[shakes head]
What? Young lady, I expected more of you!
But, I'll give you another chance, so come back when you are ready to redeem yourself.
Aha! Look who's back. Are you ready to help me now, young lady?
Very good. Someone told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
Do you think you can find it?
Good to hear! But don't keep me waiting alright?
What? Still nothing? My patience has its limits!
Welcome back young lady. Did you find the \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] yet?
Oh, that's unfortunate. I do hope you find it.
Some player told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
Welcome back young lady. Did you find the \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] yet?
I knew I could count on you.
Such a fine young lady with expert listening skills.
Thanks a lot. I even have a little something for you as a reward!
Oh, I never asked you for your name!
Well, I'm not good with long goodbyes, so let's keep this one short.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.577.settings.event.0.message: That man just now... \.\.\. He looked like he was wearing gear from each class.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.577.settings.event.2.message: Normally that should not be possible. I wonder how he managed to sneak this past the developers.
I really love all these gifts, but I sure would like to know where they're coming from.
Alright, I don't know what you mean.
Just forget I asked. I'll find out myself.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.15.message: Alright, next stop, the town center!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.19.message: Oh, is that a market over there?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.21.message: Japp!\. You'll find most of the \c[3]traders\c[0] around here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.22.message: ...Well, they're all over the place to be frank.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.29.message: The catch: you first need to collect all the \c[3]required trade items\c[0] in the wild.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.30.message: It takes time, but it's worth it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.618.settings.event.31.message: Further up is another important building.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.17.message: Surprise, you'll find a lot of \c[3]quests\c[0] there!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.18.message: ... Just like in many other places in town and elsewhere.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.19.message: All those quests are optional, but the rewards usually make it worthwhile.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.25.message: Hey Lea, are you still with us?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.28.message: But she was really fast at the tutorial, almost beat me to it!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.29.message: Well like they say -\. still waters run deep, right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.30.message: Oui, oui.\. What about that main quest?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.31.message: They kept talking about the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.32.message: Oh right, I almost forgot about that.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.33.message: You'll have to enter the Quest Hub, anyway.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.34.message: There is a mandatory introduction for all new players.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.35.message: They'll explain all about it there.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.36.message: I suggest you go in right away and just get it over with.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.620.settings.event.44.task: Listen to the \c[3]Mandatory Introduction\c[0] inside the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of Rookie Harbor. It's mandatory.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.6.message: So, how was it, Lea?\. Enjoyed being in Space?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.8.message: Well, now you should understand your task, being part of Track Walker and all.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.19.message: By the way, Lea.\. Spheromancer?\. That's surprising.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.21.message: They're pretty unpopular.\. Don't ask me why - they're fine balance wise.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.22.message: What about Pentafist?\. They're awesome, right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.623.settings.event.23.message: Japp!\. And I couldn't imagine you in any other class.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I have to keep watch on the market and protect our citizens, so please excuse me.
Good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Are you the reinforcements I was promised?
Finally!\. We got some really pesky thieves at the markets lately, stealing from both the stands and customers.
I just saw one committing theft at the stands but he was gone before I could catch him.
I have to remain here and keep watch, so it's up to you to catch him, understand?
Great. I saw him running towards the small park in the southeast, so go and get that crook!
The thief should be in the small park in the southeast, so go and get him!
Damn, I saw that he got away from you.\. What the hell happened there?
Well, what's done is done.\. I saw him running southwest to a dead-end alley by the sea.
Make sure to catch him this time!
I saw him running southwest to a dead-end alley by the sea.
Make sure to catch him this time!
He escaped again?! You've got to finally nail him down, before we become a laughingstock!
I put that scoundrel behind bars, thanks to you!\. You better report back to Sgt. Brassler now.
Good to see you again, \v[lore.title.seeker]. The market has been rather quiet since we nailed that pickpocket.
Ahh!\. What... what do you want from me?
I...\. I see.\. So you want to arrest me for my crimes?
Alright, it was only a matter of time.\. But I just had to earn money somehow for...\. for...\. here let me show you...
That mean scoundrel ran past here!\. You must have given him a solid spanking. Good job!
Still not satisfied?\. Well, he ran towards \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] if you wanna whip him some more.
Young people these days... no manners, I tell you.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.631.settings.dialog.0.text: Young people these days have no manners.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.631.settings.dialog.1.text: Running through the streets \c[5]like they're fleeing from the police\c[0] without regard for others.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.631.settings.dialog.1.event.3.m: Hello, young lady.\. Did you also see that unkempt ruffian running through the street like a madman?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.631.settings.dialog.1.event.4.m: He was stinking of smoke and looked very suspicious, I tell you!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.631.settings.dialog.1.event.6.m: I saw him running to the southwest to a dead end by the sea if you wanna teach him a lesson.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.0.text: All this buzzing in the town...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.6.text: Back in my day everything was better.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.7.text: Oh boy, here we go again.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.8.text: People were nicer, greeting you on the street and everything.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.text: Even the \c[5]name of this damn city\c[0] was better.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.event.2.m: See? Look at that Seeker just staring at me, like I'm some decorative prop.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.event.5.m: Ignore him. He just doesn't like it when things change.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.event.6.m: You're damn right! \v[lore.unlock.rookie-harbor.Page-02-01]\c[3]Port Harbor\c[0] was such a nice name for this town.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.event.7.m: But they changed it because of all the Seekers starting their journey here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.9.event.8.m: My only real solace is that I can still enjoy my fish with fresh apples.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.634.settings.dialog.10.text: I can't stand all these Seekers buzzing around.
Please excuse me, I've got calls to do.
Ah, good day.\. I appreciate your desire to work for us, but you should get your official faction-briefing in \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] first.
It is on the ground floor of this huge building here.
Ah, it is you again.\. Are you interested in assisting me now?
It's a deal then.\. My client requires \c[3]two Fruit and Veggie Sets each\c[0] and also a precious \c[3]Spice Set\c[0] to boot.
You can procure them right here on the central market near the fountain.
For the exchange, you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
That is unfortunate.\. But you can change your mind as long as the job is still available for the taking.
You can get all the required goods on the central market near the fountain.
For the exchange you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
I see you managed to get everything.\. Quickly, go to the \c[3]Pub at the Beginner's Arc\c[0] and give it to the barkeep.
I've already gotten the message from our satisfied customer.\. Good job!
Here is your payment.\. I hope I can count on your future assistance.
Oh my, oh my, oh my!
Ah, there you are again.\. I'm currently facing a high priority problem and it is giving me quite the headache.
You see, I am waiting for an urgent delivery of fresh ingredients from one of our contracted food collectors.
An important business lunch will be ruined if she doesn't show up soon!
Yes, thank you for asking.\. It would indeed be very helpful if you could lend me a hand again and keep your eyes open for our collector.
She should be somewhere in Autumn's Rise.\. Could you try to find her and examine what happened?
Excellent! I am expecting swift results.
Hrm, it can't be helped then.\. Please come back if you change your mind, this is no joking matter!
Please concentrate on your task at hand.\. Time is of the essence here!
Ah, there you are. I've already received the package. Well done!
This could finally mean a breakthrough for my career, I can feel it in my gut!\. Along with a burning hunger for nutrition.
In any case, here is your due reward.
By Jove!\. This is your big chance, Philamore.\. All you need to do is find the right...
Ah, it is you again!\. I say, you truly find the most opportune times to accost me.
I have another task for you.\. And this time the main headquarters are involved.\. Truly, a huge opportunity!
So please lend me your assistance!
Oh, what a relief, to hear that from one as reliable as yourself.\. Now the road to success shall be smoothly paved.
In any case, I cannot tell you much about the mission itself.\. My task was simply to acquire an able helper.
So please go to the very North of the \c[3]Alley Quarters\c[0] and enter the \c[3]Traders Kontor\c[0].
Then go upstairs to talk to the high board.\. I will announce your arrival and task so you can enter.
And please, give the board my warmest of regards.\. They will surely appreciate it.
Oh no, what a dilemma.\. Please rethink your decision, there is so much on the line!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.637.settings.npcStates.10.event: Head to the very North of the \c[3]Alley Quarters\c[0], enter the \c[3]Traders Kontor\c[0] and go \c[3]upstairs\c[0].
Please be very professional when talking to the board.\. This is a crucial step in both of our careers.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.637.settings.npcStates.11.event: \v[lore.title.seeker], let me thank you again for your splendid work with the headquarters.
The chairman thanked me most sincerely.\. My promotion is just around the corner, I can almost smell it!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.637.settings.npcStates.12.event: Ah, good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Pleased to meet you.
My name is Mr. Nomsworth and I am a humble mediative employee of the local trading association.
Now, as you might've already assumed, a man of my position is always busy brokering business agreements big and small.
Thus, there's always a need for helping hands willing to do some necessary legwork.\. For a generous payment of course.
Just now I have an unresolved assignment by the Pub for a delivery of mixed food ingredients.
It requires collecting raw materials in the wild, trading them for the required items here in the market and of course delivering them to my client.
A rather simple task, fitting for the beginning of a lucrative relationship, I would say.\. Can I count on your cooperation?
It's a deal then.\. My client requires \c[3]two Fruit and Veggie Sets each\c[0] and also a precious \c[3]Spice Set\c[0] to boot.
You can procure them right here on the central market near the fountain.
For the exchange, you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
That is unfortunate.\. But you can change your mind as long as the job is still for the taking.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.9.message: Hello, Lea! It's good to see you again.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.10.message: Oui, you almost made me worried!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.11.message: Now I really wonder what happened with you~
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.13.message: I guess I should start poking you with questions now!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.15.message: Come on, Emilie. I'm sure that would be bothersome.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.17.message: Anyway, I want to show you something! This way!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.29.message: They finally opened the \c[3]North of Rookie Harbor\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.37.message: Yes, and you can find even more traders up there!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.38.message: Also, the stores now offer \c[3]better equipment\c[0], since we've beaten Faj'ro Temple.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.40.message: Oui! And you better make sure to upgrade!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.43.message: Because here comes the big news!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.48.message: Oui! I can hardly believe it myself.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.49.message: They found a raid event where players of our level can participate!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.50.message: That means we'll be fighting together with Lukas, Lin and the others!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.51.message: ...Well, kind of. There will be two tracks with two teams running in parallel.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.53.message: Anyway, the raid is happening tomorrow. You showed up just in time!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.55.message: You still didn't collect that shade, right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.58.message: It's one of the prerequisites to join the raid.\. You first need to collect the \c[3]Green Seed Shade\c[3].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.59.message: You find it in \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]. That's to the north of Rookie Harbor. Just take the exit in \c[3]Rookie Harbor East\c[3].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.60.message: That's right, just look for the \c[3]glowing bird statue\c[0]. You can't miss it!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.61.message: Anyway, C'tron and I already did the quest... But I'm fine doing it again with you, if you want.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.62.message: Same for me! Do you want us to join?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.63.1.1.messa: Ah, I see...\. well that's ok! We may just spoil the surprise for you, right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.63.1.2.messa: Ah oui...\. Anyway, please tell us when you collected the Shade!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.63.1.3.messa: Just contact me quickly via D-Link!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/center.js.entities.658.settings.event.64.task: Enter \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] via the exit in \c[3]Rookie Harbor East\c[0] and find the \c[3]statue\c[0]. It has a quest for you.
Hey you, are you interested in something real special?

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.23.settings.condAnims.0.interac: The five Virtues mirror the foundation on which the Ancients' culture was built. Before a participant can begin the Track of the Ancients they must choose a virtue as part of their \c[3]Class\c[0].

\c[3]Triangle: The Virtue of Strength. \c[0]
Usually associated with the Element Heat.

\c[3]Square: The Virtue of Endurance. \c[0]
Usually associated with the Element Cold.

\c[3]Pentagon: The Virtue of Agility. \c[0]
Usually associated with the Element Shock.

\c[3]Hexagon: The Virtue of Wisdom. \c[0]
Usually associated with the Element Wave.

\c[3]Circle: The Virtue of Balance. \c[0]
This Virtue is not specifically associated with any elements and instead opts to balance each element.
Obtaining each element in turn is the only way, as far as we know, of unlocking the mystery of the Ancients.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.24.settings.condAnims.0.interac: Humankind found the planet Shadoon 30 years ago.
At first we tried to harvest the planet for its precious resources. We built mines, uncovered ruins, and drilled into the ground.
While doing so, we also destroyed part of the Track of the Ancients. This activated the self-defense program of the self-sufficient system that keeps the Track intact.
After this it became almost impossible to harvest any more resources as the Track itself fought back. We became aware of the finesse with which this system was built.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.25.settings.condAnims.0.interac: The Goal of Operation Track Walker is to \c[3]research the Ancient Technology instead of destroying it\c[0].
We began to look for ways to be part of the Track itself, to have humans participate. To our surprise integrating ourselves into the system was easy.
We were even able to augment the Track to make it possible for humans, or \c[3]Seekers\c[0] as we now call them, to choose one of the five virtues and collect the four elements.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.26.settings.condAnims.0.interac: What happens when all four elements are collected and brought to the center temple in Shadoon is still unknown to us.
Even after 10 years of Operation Track Walker not a single Seeker has managed to overcome the final challenge.
All we can guess is that the Ancients left their vast knowledge base for their descendants to find, as some legends and artifacts we've uncovered seem to indicate.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.27.settings.condAnims.0.interac: Rhombus Square is the capital of humankind on Shadoon. Seekers start their journey in a custom course simulating challenges on the Ancient's Track.
However, in order for a Seeker to gain access to the city, they must first collect all four elements on the Track of the Ancients.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.28.settings.condAnims.0.interac: Every Seeker must collect the four elements, which are scattered all throughout Shadoon. Each one of them gives the Seeker control over a specific elemental domain.
These elements are \c[3]Heat\c[0], \c[3]Cold\c[0], \c[3]Shock\c[0], and \c[3]Wave\c[0]. This enumeration also reflects the order in which the elements are usually collected.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.29.settings.condAnims.0.interac: The Track of the Ancients is a lengthy trial of agility, intelligence, and strength, which played a large role in the Ancients' Society.
It is a self-sufficient system in which a challenger selects one of \c[3]five Virtues\c[0] to collect four distinct \c[3]Elements\c[0].
Even now, after 10000 years this system is still intact and active.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.30.settings.condAnims.0.interac: The Ancients were a highly advanced humanoid society which lived on Shadoon approximately 10000 years ago.
For unknown reasons they left this planet. Only a few native tribes remained.
The descendants of these tribes are known to us as the \c[3]Shad\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.14.message: Suddenly I was in the middle of space and this old geezer kept talking to me.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.17.message: I suppose they wanted to pep up the boring introduction, non?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.18.message: Oui, oui! \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0] it is!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.19.message: Let's go back.\. Lukas is waiting.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.27.message: By the way, Lea.\. I took the liberty of adding a few more entries to your \c[3]encyclopedia\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.28.message: For example... all past events and people we have met so far.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.29.message: And a few insights on the technology, of course.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.31.message: What?\. I just like to organize things.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.57.settings.event.33.task: Meet up again with \c[3]Schneider\c[0] and \c[3]Emilie\c[0] to continue your tour through Rookie Harbor.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.58.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: In this room you can read more about the history of \v[lore.title.planet] and \v[lore.title.operation-trackwalker].

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.29.settings.condAnims.0.interac: Large parts of Humankind are organized into the \c[3]4 big factions\c[0].
Each of them are responsible for different aspects of human civilization, all of them crucial for survival and prosperity.
The main headquarters of the factions are located in \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] but every human settlement harbors one \c[3]local subdivision\c[0] for each of them.

The \c[3]Venture Alliance\c[0] is mainly responsible for doing pioneer work by exploring and claiming new land, hunting and scavenging wildlife and mining natural resources.
It is represented in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] by the \c[3]Falldivers\c[0].

The \c[3]Human Preservation Department\c[0] is mainly responsible for the protection and discipline of the human settlements on \v[lore.title.planet].
It is represented in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] by the \c[3]Rookie Harbor Guard\c[0].

The \c[3]Association of Human Advancement\c[0] is mainly responsible for trade, manufacturing and scientific research.
It is represented in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] by the \c[3]Coastal Trading Coalition\c[0].

The \c[3]Amity of Balance\c[0] is mainly responsible for farming, gathering and the research of native life and gaining an understanding of the inner workings of the \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients].
It is represented in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] by the \c[3]Fruits of Autumn\c[0].

While the factions are filled with highly resourceful experts of their field, they often need the support of the \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]s\c[0] because of their special connection to the \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.32.settings.interact.title: \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We should talk after you have gotten your briefing upstairs.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I see that you have completed the introduction to \v[lore.title.operation-trackwalker].
Thus you are now also qualified to use your abilities as a \v[lore.title.seeker] to assist the \c[3]4 factions\c[0] in their duties.
They are organizations that secure humanity's survival and prosperity through their special fields of expertise.
More detailed information can be accessed in the terminal behind you.
For now you should know that each faction has a subdivision in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], like in every settlement.
To better understand our society and your place in it, you should get introduced to all of them.
For this purpose I will now issue an official assignment.\. Please accept.
Good.\. Visit the representative of every faction in \v[area.autumn-area.name] and introduce yourself.
Most of them can be found in their respective headquarters \c[3]near the market or the western entrance\c[0].
Though the HQ of the CTC is still inaccessible to new \v[lore.title.seeker]s, their ambassador can be found \c[3]just outside this building\c[0].
Once you have visited all of them, return to me to get your reward.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Visit the representative of every faction in \v[area.autumn-area.name] and introduce yourself.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: Most of them can be found in their respective headquarters near the market or the western entrance.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.2.event.4: Though the HQ of the CTC is still inaccessible to new \v[lore.title.seeker]s, their ambassador can be found \c[3]just outside this building\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.2.event.5: Once you have visited all of them, return to me to get your reward.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: You have visited all of the factions in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]. Excellent.
I hope you now understand how you can help humanity, besides solving the \v[lore.title.track-of-ancients].
And remember that they might have new tasks available for you as time goes on.
So you should return and offer your help as you progress further.
But for now take these rewards as a gesture from the \v[lore.title.human-government].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.4.event.3: Remember that all factions might have new tasks available for you as time goes on.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.55.settings.npcStates.4.event.4: So you should return to offer your help as you progress.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.75.settings.dialog.0.text: That's such a cute little cactus~
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.75.settings.dialog.1.text: Look! I think it's starting to blossom!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.75.settings.dialog.4.text: Do you really have to sit on the table to watch it?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.78.settings.dialog.2.text: You already said that 5 minutes ago!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.78.settings.dialog.3.text: Blame that messed up search interface.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.79.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: What you see here is the \c[3]Bulletin Board\c[0]. You can use it to see \c[3]open quests in this area\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.79.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: If you want to know more about quests, I suggest you talk to my fellow advisors at the counter over there.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.80.settings.dialog.0.text: All new recruits, please go to the \c[3]upper floor\c[0] for the introductory briefing.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.89.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We should talk after you have completed your briefing upstairs.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.89.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I see that you have completed the introduction to \v[lore.title.operation-trackwalker].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.89.settings.npcStates.1.event.3: To become the best \c[3]Seeker\c[0] you can be, we host a famous Teacher here in Rookie Harbor: \c[3]Master Sensei\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.89.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: He can teach you everything you need to know and more. Once you have mastered both the \c[3]Heat\c[0] and \c[3]Cold\c[0] elements, please find him in  \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name] - Info Hub Dojo\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/central-q.entities.89.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Congratulations on mastering your Seeker abilities with Master Sensei.

Sorry lady, but no entry for you.
We're currently investigating a rather unpleasant animal incident here.
EVERYTHING IS OKAY! PLEASE ENJOY YOUR DAY!
I really wonder what's behind those boxes...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/east.json.entities.441.settings.dialog.0.text: Wow, that's quite the view. Didn't expect this.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/east.json.entities.441.settings.dialog.1.text: You can say that again. Look! You can even see all these weird ruins.
Small lass try'n to get in a secret club, aye?
Sorry litt'l one, not gonna pass 'til some's gonna vouch for ya.
I like this spot, always calms me down.
I see you got the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] with you! Nice, nice!
Well then, good luck on your journey!
If you want to pass the barrier up ahead you first have to collect the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0].
You get it at the end of the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], right after the boss battle.
Canst thou not see how I ponder?

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.11.message: This briefing serves as an introduction to the history of this place and the nature of our cause.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.23.message: We're currently located on the natural satellite \c[3]Shadoon\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.24.message: This place was once inhabited by intelligent lifeforms that we refer to as the \c[3]Ancients\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.26.message: While the Ancients ceased to exist a long time ago, they left behind a technological heritage to behold:
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.37.message: Originally, it served as an assessment of social standing within the Ancients' culture.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.38.message: It is a technological marvel, a highly-advanced and self-sufficient system that remains intact to this day.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.39.message: It wasn't long after humankind arrived on Shadoon that we realized its value.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.42.message: We augmented the Track so that humanity might walk it as well.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.44.message: And that is where you come in, new recruit.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.46.message: Together with the other Seekers you will start the journey along the Track of the Ancients.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.47.message: Your path will be paved with obstacles, but every step you take will further our cause:
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.50.message: Your main task will be the collection of four elements: \c[3]Heat, Cold, Shock, and Wave\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.57.message: Beginning with the element \c[3]Heat\c[0], your first destination will be the village of \c[3]Bergen\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.58.message: To reach it, you need to pass the \c[3]western barrier\c[0] of Rookie Harbor.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.67.message: I will now give you your first \c[3]Shade\c[0] to grant you passage to the west.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.79.message: Finally, I will give you the \c[3]Disc of Insight\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.9.settings.event.86.message: This device will record all of the knowledge you encounter on your journey.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.9.message: You reached the \c[3]first milestone\c[0] of operation \c[3]Track Walker\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.22.message: With the \c[3]Blue Ice Shade\c[0] you can now access \c[3]Maroon Valley\c[0] to the west of Bergen.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.23.message: Therein awaits your next destination, the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0], housing the second element: \c[3]Cold\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.24.message: To proceed, seek an audience with the Eldress of the local village \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.33.message:
Take this reward 
for your accomplishments.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.41.message: The circuit override allows you to \c[3]reset one of your circuit boards\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.10.settings.event.42.message: Visit the first basement floor of the \c[3]Info Hub in Rookie Harbor\c[0] to use it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.11.settings.event.9.message: You collected your \c[3]second element\c[0] and reached another milestone of operation \c[3]Track Walker\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.11.settings.event.22.message: With the \c[3]\v[item.230.name]\c[0] you can now access \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] to the northeast of \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.11.settings.event.23.message: To proceed, seek the \c[3]ancient statue\c[0] within Autumn's Fall and accept your next trial.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.11.settings.event.32.message:
Take this reward 
for your accomplishments.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.12.settings.event.21.message: You acquired the \c[3]\v[item.376.name]\c[0] giving you access to \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0] to the north.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.12.settings.event.22.message: It is an expansive jungle and home of several temples.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.12.settings.event.25.message: Your next task is to acquire both of these elements and complete the final trial of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.13.settings.event.9.message: You collected \c[3]all 4 elements\c[0] and mastered the final challenge of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.13.settings.event.10.message: The time has come to enter the final stage of operation \c[3]Track Walker\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.13.settings.event.23.message: With the \c[3]\v[item.410.name]\c[0] you can access \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] to the east of \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.13.settings.event.24.message: To proceed, seek the \c[3]Cave Inn\c[0] to learn more about your next task.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.13.settings.event.33.message:
Take this reward 
for your accomplishments.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.12.message: And with this, I am proud to announce that you've reached the very \c[3]frontier of operation Track Walker\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.13.message: This is as far as humankind has walked the Track.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.14.message: In other words, you successfully completed your objective!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.17.message: With every Seeker completing the Track, we feed essential input into the Ancient's system, enabling us to access it further.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.18.message: However, we have yet to unlock its final part.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.19.message: Until that time comes, you are officially freed from your duty!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.32.message: As a reward for your accomplishments, you can now access the main city of Rhombus Square.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.33.message: This place provides many opportunities to further enhance your skills.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.34.message: And of course, your continued assistance to the community of Shadoon would be greatly appreciated.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.43.message: In addition, you shall receive your usual reward as well.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.51.message: Seeker, you have our deepest gratitude.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.52.message: When the time has come to walk the track even further, we will meet again.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.14.settings.event.53.message: Good bye and as always, stay vigilant.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.15.settings.event.9.message: You collected the \c[3]\v[item.286.name]\c[0], one of the two shades required to enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.15.settings.event.10.thenStep.0: Now that you collected both of the Shades it is time to take on the final challenge of Gaia's Garden.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.15.settings.event.11.message:
Take this reward 
for your accomplishments.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.16.settings.event.9.message: You collected the \c[3]\v[item.231.name]\c[0], one of the two shades required to enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.16.settings.event.10.thenStep.0: Now that you've collected both of the Shades it is time to take on the final challenge of Gaia's Garden.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/expo-spac.entities.16.settings.event.11.message:
Take this reward 
for your accomplishments.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-equ.entities.9.settings.npcStates.0.event.sh: We offer higher quality equipment made in Rookie Harbor!
Yes, yes, this interior design might seem familiar to you, but it really is the details that make the difference.
Also we are currently remodelling.\. So, you buying or what?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-equ.entities.9.settings.npcStates.1.event.sh: We offer higher quality equipment made in Rookie Harbor!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-equ.entities.31.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hey! We offer special items, supported by only the finest of backers.

Hello \v[lore.title.seeker]. Welcome to the headquarters of the \c[3]Fruits of Autumn\c[0].
If you are interested in advancing humanity's understanding of this planet, talk to the Chief Woodkeeper.
He should currently be studying the local plantlife in our gardens.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track is in harmony right now, so there is no need for your assistance.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Welcome to our humble garden, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I appreciate your interest in our work, but you should visit \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] first.
On the ground floor is an introduction into the different branches of the great tree that is human civilization.
It is mandatory for receiving assignments from us or any other branch in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I am glad to see you return to us.
Do you desire to help us in our plight now?
Excellent. I will give you some bottles, filled with concentrated and fermented juice made from the fruits of our garden.
It has proven in the past to have a beneficial effect on the self-regulatory instincts of the Track.
Use \c[3]your instincts as a \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] to find the afflicted trees and treat them with the extract.
It should suffice to cure the trees at this stage.\. Take care, young \v[lore.title.seeker]!
I understand that your life is a restless one, but I still implore you to not take this matter lightly.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: Please make haste, before the sickness spreads and endangers the stability of the entire Track.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Ah, you are done. Wonderful!\. Your effort should have quelled the threat to \v[area.autumn-area.name].
You have our deepest thanks.\. May we continue to preserve the harmony on this world together.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. It is good to see you return to us.
As it happens, the well-being of nature requires our attention once again.
Another case of the sickness has been observed in \v[area.autumn-area.name], this time in a more intense form.
Worse yet, it has stricken a sacred tree that has been proven to be vital to the ecosystem of the entire area.
I fear that healing it will be more arduous than with the other cases, but it must be done at all costs.
So, can I ask you for your assistance once again?
Excellent. I will give you a cup, filled with a highly concentrated salve made from the fruits of our gardens.
With it you can treat the disease just like before, but there are two vital differences.
First, since the condition is more severe, the medication will \c[3]take time\c[0] to fully take effect.
Also, the strong smell and taste of the salve will \c[3]lure the creatures of the area towards it\c[0].
Thus, after applying the salve, you will need to \c[3]defend the tree\c[0] until it is fully healed.
I see you understand.\. Now please be swift!
I understand that your life is a restless one, but I still implore you to not take this matter lightly.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Remember that you will need to \c[3]defend the tree\c[0] for some time after treating it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: I heard that your efforts have once again quelled the threat to \v[area.autumn-area.name].\. Wonderful!
You have our deepest thanks.\. May we continue to preserve the harmony on this world together.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.8.event.q: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I am glad to see you, for our land is in peril once again.
A proud bovine has fallen victim to a vile sickness and is now experiencing a burning pain.
It annihilated its whole herd in fiery anguish before starting fires all over \v[area.autumn-fall.name].
Will you help us to bring peace to this tortured being?
You are a true hero!\. I know how revolting the thought of putting down a living being must be to you.
Thanks to its burning trail it became clear that the Bovine has hidden itself in a cave on the \c[3]Secluded Path\c[0].
You can reach that location by travelling to the \c[3]northeast of \v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].
Though beware: You might need to accept a challenge from the Track before you can enter this part of the land.
Make haste, young \v[lore.title.seeker], before the flames of rage can ignite more precious lives!
Much will be at stake if the rage of this once proud Bovine is not stopped.\. Please rethink your decision!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.9.event.2: Enter the \c[3]Densewater Caverns\c[0] to bring peace to the raging Bovine.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.58.settings.npcStates.9.event.3: You can find it on the \c[3]Secluded Path\c[0] in the \c[3]northeast of \v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].
Ah, you are back, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. So the wrath of the proud beast has finally been extinguished?
That is good to hear.\. May it rest in peace.\. And may you continue to bring peace and harmony to this world!
True words, my friend,\. and wise.\. Goodbye.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I am glad to see you, for our land is in peril once again.
A proud bovine has fallen victim to the sickness that before has affected several trees and is now experiencing great pain.
In its anguish it extinguished its entire herd before starting to terrorize the entirety of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
Will you help us to bring peace to this tortured being?
You are a true hero!\. I know how much the thought of putting down a living being must be to you.
Reports have stated that the poor bovine has developed great power and extreme resistance to damage.
Go to \c[3]Path 3 in \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] and meet up with \c[3]Helen\c[0], one of our leading herbalists, to find a solution.
I understand that your life is a restless one, but I still implore you to not take this matter lightly.
Please quickly meet up with our chief herbalist Helen.\. You should find her on \c[3]Path 3 in \v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
Ah, you are done. Wonderful!\. Your effort should have quenched the threat to \v[area.autumn-area.name].
You have our deepest thanks.\. May we continue to preserve the harmony on this world together.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track is in harmony right now, so there is no need for your assistance.
Welcome to our gardens, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I am Manzana, the Chief Woodkeeper of this branch.
It is always reassuring to have your kind supporting our fruitful endeavours.
In fact, your appearance comes at a fortunate time, as we have noticed unrest brewing among the thickets of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
A sickness has befallen trees in different locations and threatens the balance of the Track in the entire region.
Would you be able to assist us in stemming it, before it can cause widespread harm?
Excellent. I will give you some bottles, filled with concentrated and fermented juice made from the fruits of our garden.
It has proven in the past to have a beneficial effect on the self-regulatory instincts of the Track.
Use \c[3]your instincts as a \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] to find the afflicted trees and treat them with the extract.
It should suffice to cure the trees at this stage.\. Take care, young \v[lore.title.seeker].
I understand that your life is a restless one, but I still implore you to not take this matter lightly.

Move along, nothing to see here!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Nice seeing you around, rookie. We have no need of your assistance just now though.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: A \v[lore.title.seeker] recruit?\. You better get your faction-briefing at \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] first, before going sightseeing.
You can find the responsible official on the ground floor of that building.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Ah, it looks like the young \v[lore.title.seeker] has returned to plain ol' me.
Can you finally squeeze some work in the name of justice into your schedule?
It's good to see a young \v[lore.title.seeker] recognize the importance of such mundane tasks.
You can find the guard in question in the central area of the Marketplace, near the \v[lore.title.seeker]-HUB.\.
Ask her about the problem and solve the case.
Well then, in that case you better get going.\. I'm sure there are a few Ancient dragons in need of slaying.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: You better get going, recruit, before it's too late.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: I already got the report.\. You did a fine job out there... for a rookie.
In any case, you are welcome to help us out again in the future.\. The Rookie Harbor Guard is always busy.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Nice to see you around, rookie.\. We have need of your assistance again.
As if the usual struggle with the Track isn't enough, we have violent threats growing from within our own settlements.
And it seems like some people are smuggling dangerous weapon systems onto the continent through our harbor.
Needless to say, this is a danger for every law-abiding citizen on the planet.
So, can I count on your help again?
Excellent.\. We already got \c[3]Officer Cedric\c[0] investigating the case right on location.
Meet up with him at the harbor at \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and he will brief you on the details.
Got too important already to handle boring guard work, huh?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: You better go to the harbor, before more weapons get through.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: Cedric already made a report and brought the criminal in.
For such an unimpressive guy, he sure caused a lot of trouble.
Yes, it's unlikely that he acted alone.\. For starters, those shipments must have been sent by someone else.
We'll put him through some sharp interrogation 'til he spills the beans about his accomplices.
Right, that's on us now.\. Cedric told me that you did well in handling this, so enjoy your reward.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.8.event.q: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Found your way back to humble \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], eh?
About time, frankly.\. The whole weapon smuggling business didn't do us the courtesy of just stopping.
In fact it has only gotten worse.\. You got some free time again, to make a contribution to a peaceful society?
Good to see you didn't forget your roots.\. Stopping criminals like the old days.
Problem is, they're not delivering their shipments to our harbor the usual way, where we can find and catch them.
Instead the weapons are sent over the ocean on their own to who knows what secret transfer point.
Basically we have to catch and destroy them midway on their route from \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name].
We got something prepared.\. Go to \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and talk to \c[3]Captain Turbine, South of the teleporter\c[0].
He will give you a more detailed briefing and send you in the right direction.\. Now get going, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Got no more time for boring ol' \v[area.rookie-harbor.name], eh?\. Quite a shame.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.9.event.2: Go to \c[3]Beginners Arc\c[0] and talk to \c[3]Captain Turbine, South of the teleporter\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.13.settings.npcStates.9.event.3: He will explain how to stop those shipments.
Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I already received the combat report.\. Splendid work.
What you sunk must've been an entire month's worth of work.
That should set them back a lot and give us some room to breathe and work on long-term solutions.
Well, I'm sure we will see you around again, when the time comes.
Until then, good fortune on your adventures, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
Nice seeing you around, rookie. We have no need of your assistance just now though.
Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker] graces the plain ol' city guard with her presence.
Got some time off from solving ancient mysteries, do you?
Well, we could also use some help here in the city.
One of our watchmen at the market called for reinforcements a moment ago.
None of those fancy Trackwalking-adventures, I suppose, but matters of inner security are not to be taken lightly either, yes?
It's good to see a young \v[lore.title.seeker] recognize the importance of even mundane tasks.
You can find the guard in question in the central area of the Marketplace, near the \v[lore.title.seeker]-HUB.\.
Ask her about the problem and solve the case.
Well then, in that case you better get going.\. I'm sure there are some Ancient dragons in need of slaying.

Hey, girl, welcome to the cozy adventurers hangout of the \c[3]Falldivers\c[0].
Just go to our lounge if you wanna chill and share stories with other kindred spirits.
\c[3]Forerunner Elenya\c[0] should also be there, if you're searching for whomever calls the shots right now.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Sorry sweetie, got nothing for you right now.\. Unless you're just here for the pleasure of my company, of course.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Hey there \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We love fresh company around here, but you gotta visit \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] before joining the action.
We can only hand you assignments once you took that faction-briefing on the ground floor.
Annoying, but even we gotta follow some of those pesky rules around here, y'know?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.2.event.q: Heya \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Did you come back to help us out with our problem?
Awesome!\. I'll transmit you the alleged location of the whole debacle so you should be able to track the thing down.
Just remember to mind \c[3]your instincts as a \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] and you'll be back here enjoying my company in no time.
Alright. That's a shame, but we'll manage somehow.\. Just hit me up if you change your mind.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.3.event.2: I don't wanna stress you out but you better get on the case before the data wanders into some beast's stomach.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.4.event.q: Welcome back.\. I see retrieving the data went off without a hitch?
Great job.\. Hopefully that will stop Tucos from moping around.
He's a great scout, when he isn't a reckless airhead.\. He shouldn't be down over some lame misstep.
Anyway, take this reward.\. I hope to see you around for future endeavors or quality time.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.5.event.q: Hi Sweetie, you arrived at just the right moment!
You see, we just went through Tucos' data and found something interesting.
Turns out, that ambush on him wasn't just a random stroke of bad luck.
Believe it or not,\. our information hints towards an organized band of Hillkats that are performing coordinated strikes.
They might've trailed Tucos specifically after spotting him doing the exploration.
I know right?\. You never know with the Track, but intelligent digging rodents?
But I guess we should've expected some intelligence from those sneaky buggers with their fancy headsets.
In any case, Tucos has already gone out again to find their hideout and requested a Seeker to meet up with him.
So how about it, did that weirdness pique your interest?
I knew you couldn't resist.\. Heck, I'd love to trade if not for those pesky responsibilities I have here.
Tucos wanted to wait for reinforcements at \c[3]Pathway 5\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
You better not keep him waiting! He will definitely want to meet you and give his thanks for last time.
Aw, really?\. I would've bet my lunch that you'd be all over that.
But that problem won't be gone anytime soon, so you can talk to me again if you changed your mind.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.6.event.2: Tucos should be waiting for you at \c[3]Pathway 5\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.6.event.3: You better hurry up, before he loses patience and does something reckless.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.7.event.q: Welcome back.\. From his bragging, it seems like you and Tucos had quite the adventure.
Don't worry, his report was twice as much about you as it was about himself, which must mean a lot, I suppose.
In any case, I'm more interested in this mysterious artifact you've apparently found.
Huh, interesting.\. Doesn't seem compatible with human tech.\. Not with our standard equipment, anyway.
But don't you worry!\. We'll somehow crack this nut and get whatever useful information is in there!
Just come back later and we'll fill you in on whatever we find!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.8.event.q: Welcome \v[lore.title.seeker], it's been a while!\. Seems like you've really been around by now, eh?
Your experience will come in handy!\. We made progress with that device you found back then.
Yep, it was quite a bit of busywork, but it gave us some leads for future expeditions.
How about it?\. We could really use the help of a \v[lore.title.seeker] who knows their stuff!
Great!\. Now we can finally use our new toys, with you on board!
Can't tell you much about it myself, but we got one of our tech-specialists, Deggart, waiting for you.
Meet him at the \c[3]Village Remains\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] and he will explain everything!
That's right at the border of \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0], in case you forgot.
Alright, then good luck with that.\. And give Deggart my regards!
Aw, dang, that's disappointing.\. Maybe you just need some more time to prepare?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.9.event.2: The device is with our Scout Deggart by the \c[3]Village Remains\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-fac.entities.78.settings.npcStates.9.event.3: He should be waiting directly at the border to \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
Oh, sorry, your success made me overly excited.\. I gotta keep up my dignified leader image or whatever.
So, honored \v[lore.title.seeker], your performance in the last operation was exceptional.
Hereby, in my function as kickass leader of our organization, I give you our most official of thanks.
There was also a great quantity of classified information that was uncovered from the data that the probe exposed.
Expect a big expedition into unknown lands in the future.\. We'll keep in touch, yeah?
Sorry sweetie, got nothing for you right now. Unless you're just here for the pleasure of my company, of course.
Heya \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Nice meeting some valiant fresh blood around here.
I would love to do some bonding with a fellow explorer, but right now there's a problem with one of our jobs.
Tucos had just finished a detailed geographical survey that's supposed to serve as the basis for future expeditions.
But then he had to get jumped by wildlife and lose the storage unit with all the data, that careless klutz.
So, since you're here, could you help us out with that?\. A \v[lore.title.seeker] should be more than qualified for that kinda task.
Awesome!\. I'll transmit you the alleged location of the whole debacle so you should be able to track the thing down.
Just remember to mind \c[3]your instincts as a \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] and you'll be back here enjoying my company in no time.
Alright. That's a shame, but we'll manage somehow.\. Just hit me up if you change your mind.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-har.entities.69.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Hey there, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You can make yourself comfortable but you better also order something.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-har.entities.69.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Ah, finally, another \v[lore.title.seeker] visiting my humble establishment.\. Are you the one with the new supplies?
About time.\. That Mr. Nomsworth promised me those ingredients hours ago.
Makes me wonder why we even pay fancy paperpushers like him for just doing some calls anyway.
Next time I might just contact those doing the real work myself.
Anyway, I'll send him a confirmation about the job.\. You better go back to him to get your reward.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-har.entities.69.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: I've already transmitted the okay to that good-for-nothing.\. Better go get your pay before it vanishes from his memory.
