assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. If you desire more in-depth knowledge about your abilities, talk to our experts here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Also you can reset your skills using a \c[3]\v[item.428.name]\c[0] using the \c[3]Circuit Reset Terminal\c[0] downstairs!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Be greeted, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I am Mys Li, grandniece of the great Master Sensei.
The art of combat was flowing through our lineage long before \v[lore.title.seeker]s were even a mere thought.
All that wisdom can be yours, if you are willing to learn.
What aspect of the fist do you seek to refine?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: [nods close combat question]
Yes, the art of close combat is indeed fast and powerful.
Even groups of enemies can be kept at bay by skilled fighters.
You, Spheromancer, will execute a series of \c[3]3 swings\c[0] followed by a powerful \c[3]spin attack\c[0] of great range.
Though the last attack is rather slow, creating openings for counterattacks.
Thus a wise fighter considers to \c[3]dash\c[0] out of a combo to continue attacking without delay.
This legendary technique is called \c[3]dash cancel\c[0] and can be used to cancel almost everything.
More questions?
[nods ranged combat question]
Yes, the art of ranged combat is useful indeed for it allows you to attack your enemies \c[3]at a distance\c[0].
It can be divided into\c[3] fast volleys of small projectiles\c[0] and \c[3]well-aimed charged shots\c[0].
Quickly fired small shots are one of the best ways to \c[3]deal a lot of damage quickly\c[0] as long as you aim properly!
But keep in mind that impatient throwing will \c[3]slow down your aim\c[0]!\. Better to aim properly before you start attacking.
Carefully attacking with charged shots, on the other hand, is \c[3]a less efficient source of damage\c[0].
However, they cause strong \c[3]knockback\c[0], can sometimes \c[3]break\c[0] your foes and, when used with an element, even cause \c[3]status conditions\c[0]!
Also charged shots will \c[3]ricochet from solid objects\c[0] thus allowing for attacks from surprising angles!
You should know, however, that some enemies are \c[3]resistant to ranged combat\c[0].\. Melee combat will have better results in those cases!
More Questions?
[nods dashing question]
The dash is an essential technique in fights and allows you to traverse short distances at blinding speeds.
The speed alone allows for safer evasion, but it has another property: the mythical \c[3]Flash Step\c[0].
A dashing fighter will be \c[3]completely invincible for a fleeting moment\c[0] and even \c[3]phase through some objects\c[0]!
That moment is short, but it can be prolonged by strengthening your \c[3]Flash Step\c[0] ability and \c[3]Focus\c[0].
Do not forget, though, that the number of successive dashes is \c[3]limited to 3\c[0] and a short break is needed afterwards.
More questions?
[nods guard question]
When facing vicious attacks, raising your Guard is often the wisest course of action.
It will \c[3]greatly reduce all damage\c[0] in the direction you face and is often safer than trying to evade.
Though beware that your shield can \c[3]break\c[0] after absorbing a lot of damage.
The efficiency and endurance of your shield depends on your \c[3]Defense\c[0] and the specialized \c[3]Solid Guard\c[0] modifier.
However, if your guard is \c[3]timed perfectly\c[0], it will \c[3]never break\c[0] and \c[3]negate all damage\c[0].\. This is the fabled \c[3]Perfect Guard\c[0].
There are, however, some mighty attacks that mysteriously \c[3]ignore\c[0] a shield.\. Be wary of those.
More questions?
[shakes head]
Fine.\. Come back when you desire guidance again.
Secrets of Close Combat
Secrets of Ranged Combat
Secrets of Dashing
Secrets of Guarding
No, thanks!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.27.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Bro!\. Straighten up and get in shape!\. Your body is your temple, man!
No "but"s or "if"s or "maybe"s.\. Your body is what keeps you alive so you must work for it, bro!
And you must know how your body works, man.\. I can explain, just hit me up.
Bro, what do you need to know?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.27.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: [nods stats question]

Bro, there's 4 basic stats in CrossWorlds:
\c[3]HP, Attack, Defense, Focus\c[0].
The \c[3]HP\c[0] are your life. More HP means more damage that you can take and survive by tanking like a boss.
Pumping HP will also make \c[3]healing more effective\c[0], both for eating and your body's own healing.
More \c[3]Attack\c[0] increases the damage you inflict with your attacks.
But bro, remember there's more factors that change the damage, like modifiers you get from your gear.
Your \c[3]Defense\c[0] will reduce received damage and protect your HP from getting chipped.
It will also strengthen your \c[3]shield\c[0] when you try to block and tank damage.
And \c[3]Focus\c[0]... bro... dude... that's doing a lot of things, man.\. Like \c[3]how fast\c[0] you increase those \c[3]SP\c[0].
Also having higher Focus increases the chance of doing \c[3]critical hits\c[0] and decreases the chance of taking them.
Then there're those sick \c[3]Status Conditions\c[0], dude.\. Again, high Focus makes you do more and take less!
Finally, the windows for \c[3]Perfect Guards\c[0] and \c[3]Dash Invincibility\c[0] get longer with higher Focus.\. Believe it, man!
It's all important, bro, so train your body!\. And get good \c[3]equipment\c[0], cuz that's actually \c[3]way more important for stats\c[0].\.\.\. Bummer.
Got more questions, bro?
[nods buffs question]
Dude, you're interested in a proper diet?\. Good thinking, bro!
\c[3]Foods\c[0] are the primary source of getting \c[3]buffed\c[0].\. Use those and look at your power soar, man!
It's only \c[3]temporary\c[0], though, and you can only have \c[3]two food buffs active at a time\c[0].\. Limited digestion, man.
Staying buffed can make a huge difference, so stay well fed.\. Your body will thank you!
Got more questions, bro?
[shakes head]
Take care, bro!\.
Explain stats
Explain buffs
No, thanks!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.28.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: G'day, mate!\. I'm the Tech professional, specialist of circuits and other hardware.
\v[lore.title.seeker]s like you are utilizing advanced biolink-hardware to draw powers from the Track.
If you wanna know more about the application just shoot your questions.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.28.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: [nods basic circuit question]
Well, to improve your Circuit you need to collect \c[3]CP\c[0] (Circuit Points).
You can get more CP by \c[3]growing your level\c[0] and from some \c[3]special artifacts\c[0] that sometimes get awarded to dutiful \v[lore.title.seeker]s.
If you have CP you can use them in one of your \c[3]Circuits\c[0], either Neutral or one of the elements, if you have any.
\c[3]Skill nodes\c[0] need to be connected to the center and have one of 3 levels.
Higher levels tend to be more powerful but also need more CP to activate.
Skills on \c[3]branches\c[0] can be \c[3]switched at any time without a cost\c[0].\. For the rest you gotta do a \c[3]full reset at the terminal downstairs\c[0].
More questions?
[nods circuit synergy question]
See, as you grow as a \v[lore.title.seeker] you will wield up to \c[3]4 elements\c[0] in addition to Neutral.
Each of them have their own Circuit that \c[3]only empowers you with the right Elemental Mode\c[0].
An exception is the \c[3]Neutral Circuit\c[0] that represents the very core of your Circuit Board.
Activated Nodes on the Neutral Circuit also empower elemental modes with \c[3]50% of their values\c[0].
More questions?
Ah, some modifiers can be tricky.\. Which one confuses you?
[nods Iron Stance question]
The \c[3]Iron Stance\c[0] modifier lets you \c[3]ignore the stun and knockback from attacks\c[0].\. So you can just keep on fighting!
Though you can only ignore attacks up to a certain \c[3]limit\c[0], depending on their \c[3]damage\c[0].
The \c[3]maximum damage\c[0] you can ignore is the \c[3]Iron Stance percentage of the Max HP value\c[0].
So a fighter with \c[3]1000 MaxHP\c[0] and \c[3]10% Iron Stance\c[0] can ignore all attacks of \c[3]100 damage or less\c[0].
Obviously it's more reliable against many small attacks compared to powerful hits.
And without a decent Defense and MaxHP you won't find it very useful either.
Any other mods that confuse you?
[nods Pin Body question]
The Pin Body modifier \c[3]reflects a certain amount of damage\c[0] to attackers when \c[3]blocking\c[0] their attacks.
The reflected damage depends on how much is \c[3]absorbed by the shield and your overall defense value\c[0].
While the attacker's defense reduces the damage as usual, the \c[3]defense of the defender further increases it\c[0].
Thus it is a very useful ability for defensive fighters.\. Just tank your enemies to death, mate!
Any other mods that confuse you?
[nods Assault question]
The Assault modifier adds \c[3]additional shockwaves\c[0] to your melee attacks.
The total strength of all shockwaves is the modifier percentage of the normal strength.
\c[3]Additional shockwaves\c[0] will appear each \c[3]25% modifier value\c[0], though the overall damage stays the same.
Any other mods that confuse you?
[nods Cross Counter question]
The Cross Counter modifier increases \c[3]damage on a counter\c[0].
This means attacks against enemies that are either \c[3]currently attacking\c[0] or \c[3]preparing for an attack\c[0].
Any other mods that confuse you?
[nods Bouncer question]
The Bouncer modifier increases \c[3]damage against weakened enemies\c[0].
This explicitly affects enemies that have been \c[3]broken in some way\c[0].\. Breaking works differently for every foe.
You'll find this only in special equipment, though, not in any Circuit.
Any other mods that confuse you?
More questions?
Iron Stance
Pin Body
Assault
Cross Counter
Bouncer
Other Question
[shakes head]
Alrighty.\. Come again, whenever you're confused about skills and the like.
Circuit Functionality
Different Circuits
Specific Modifiers [new page]
No, thanks!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.29.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: Yes, what is it?\. Who dares interrupt my science?
Oh, it is a \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Oh well, you might be worthy of my knowledge.
You must know, I am the greatest expert of Elemental Science in all of Southern Rookie Harbor!
So give me all your banal questions and let me enlighten you!
You need help from my genius?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.29.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: [nods elemental question]
Oh, you still need to understand the basics?\. Alright.
By drawing upon the power of the Track, \v[lore.title.seeker]s can extend their basic abilities with one of \c[3]4 elements\c[0].
To actually do that, though, you will need to \c[3]earn\c[0] each Element in the \c[3]Temples of the Track\c[0].\. Prove yourself worthy, so to speak.
Aside from being \c[3]superior in raw power\c[0] compared to Neutral, they can also deal \c[3]additional damage\c[0] to the right enemies.
However, there's also the possibility of enemies being \c[3]resistant\c[0] to one Element or another, so don't turn your brain off!
This also applies to you as well, so keep an eye on your \c[3]resistances\c[0] if you enter dangerous environments.
Also you should know that Elemental Modes incur a \c[3]natural resistance penalty of -50%\c[0] to their \c[3]counterpart\c[0].
For example, using \c[3]Heat-Mode\c[0] you will take \c[3]50% more damage from cold attacks\c[0], unless you raise your resistances.
Anything else?
[nods overload question]
When using an element mode other than Neutral, your \c[3]element load\c[0] will increase.
This happens when you do any action during \c[3]any\c[0] element mode: throwing a ball, doing a slash, etc.
It is of no matter if you hit a foe or not, so blindly attacking is a foolish thing to do.
Just pay attention to your \c[3]elemental display in the upper left corner\c[0], if you want to know your Overload.
The icon will fill up in a \c[3]yellow\c[0] color.\. Once it's filled, an \c[3]Elemental Overload \c[0]will happen and force you into Neutral.
To decrease the element load, you can switch back to \c[3]Neutral Mode\c[0] and \c[3]continue attacking\c[0] enemies.
\c[3]Using Neutral\c[0], especially when attacking enemies, will cool down the Overload much more quickly.
Anything else?
[nods condition question]
Ah, status conditions.\. An immensely fascinating topic.\. Some see it as the truly cultured way of fighting.
In any case, each Element has an associated Condition that will weaken an enemy in some way.
\c[3]Heat\c[0] can cause \c[3]Burn\c[0], which causes \c[3]damage over time\c[0], depending on \c[3]your MaxHP\c[0].
\c[3]Cold\c[0] can cause \c[3]Chill\c[0], \c[3]slowing\c[0] down the victim's movement and attacks.
\c[3]Shock\c[0] can cause \c[3]Jolt\c[0], which does some \c[3]damage over time\c[0] while also \c[3]interrupting and stunning\c[0] the enemy periodically.
Keep in mind that \c[3]Jolt damage\c[0] depends on \c[3]your own attack power\c[0], basically as if you were performing the attack yourself.
\c[3]Wave\c[0] can cause \c[3]Mark\c[0], which will \c[3]increase all ranged damage\c[0] that the victim receives.
To trigger a condition you must repeatedly use \c[3]charged shots\c[0] or \c[3]certain combat arts\c[0] on an enemy.
You will see a \c[3]special bar\c[0] under the enemy that fills until the condition is finally triggered.
It will trigger faster if the attacker's \c[3]Focus\c[0] is higher than the defender's.\. \c[3]Rush-skills\c[0] will further increase the speed and effect.
Anything else?
[shakes head]
I hope my lecture was of help.
Element Basics
Elemental Overload
Status Conditions
No, thanks!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.0.text: Just look at her go! I tell you, Mys Li is best girl.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.1.text: Dude, I heard you the first 100 times. And I still don't get it. She's just some one-note tutorial NPC!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.2.text: Well, actually she gets fleshed out nicely in the tie-in graphic novels that center around her adventures!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.3.text: She got what...?!\. What else is there, "Mr Nomsworth - Middle Management Miracles"?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.4.text: Hey, her growth as a fighter and the final confrontation with her corrupted father had me on the edge of my seat!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.5.text: And now she fights a sandbag all day, what a perfect character arc.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inf.entities.37.settings.dialog.6.text: Shush, my girl earned this peace.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.0.text: Did you notice that strange device next to the Inn-Keeper?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.4.text: Yeah, I forgot you joined CrossWorlds a bit later.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.5.text: In the first release, you had to recharge your balls once you ran out of stamina.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.6.text: There was even an extra gauge for that in the HUD.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.7.text: Really? Wow, I can't imagine having fun doing that.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.8.text: That's why they removed it, I guess. No one was happy.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.25.settings.dialog.9.text: But they keep this asset in as a reminder of the old times.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.28.settings.npcStates.0.event.q: Kehahaha. Dornt fash yerse quine. Jean tauld me aw abit ye!
Shocker fur ye, huh? Heard yer speech module is broken.
Ye swatch loch th' cheerful lassie nonetheless.
Keha, sae ye want tae ken somethin' abit th' \c[3]legendary bunny\c[0], aye?
Alrecht, haur is whit Ah ken!
Ah heard, ye need tae fin' some sort ay roon capture device.
Ye can teel Jean Ah micht hae foond thes device, but she still needs somethin' else.
But ah dunnae ken whit 'at is, kehahaha.
Ah will send Jean aw th' details.
Ye micht foond it mair when ye gab tae uir triblader mukker.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-inn.entities.28.settings.npcStates.1.event.2: Awrite Lea, Ah send everythin' tae Jean.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-ite.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hello, how can I help you?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-ite.entities.29.settings.dialog.0.text: That's quite the promotion for a sandwich.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-ite.entities.29.settings.dialog.3.text: I prefer my good old ordinary sandwiches, really.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.17.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: Good day, Miss \v[lore.title.seeker]. I welcome you to the headquarters of the \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-shock-rookieharbor]\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.17.settings.npcStates.0.event.3: If you are looking to trade, you can find goods from all over \v[lore.title.planet] here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.17.settings.npcStates.0.event.4: Our range of goods is sure to expand over time so you are advised to return from time to time.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.17.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: If you are on an assignment for our corporation, you can find the management upstairs.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.18.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I am sorry, ma'am, but this part is restricted to the staff.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.18.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: I am sorry, ma'am, but this area is restricted to the staff.
I see you have business with the board.\. In that case please go upstairs and have a nice day.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.18.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Good day, ma'am.\. You can go upstairs.\. Have a nice day.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: I am sorry, \v[lore.title.seeker] but the market is hot.\. Please do not distract me.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.1.event.q: Ah, good evening, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. We have been expecting you.
Mr. Nomsworth spoke very highly of your abilities.\. Let us hope that his trust is not misplaced.
As you hopefully know, \v[area.rookie-harbor.name] is a central settlement with strong connections all over \v[lore.title.planet].
There is barely a commodity that cannot be found on our mighty venues of capitalism.
Though we still lack the capacity to acquire high-quality metal without relying on the other settlements.
It will be your most urgent task to remedy this.\. I hope we can still count on your assistance?
Excellent.\. Then go to \v[area.bergen.name] and visit their trader of metalworks.
We have already negotiated a satisfying arrangement.\. You will fulfill our end of the bargain.
Good.\. Now go and carry out your task.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.2.event.2: Go to \c[3]\v[area.bergen.name]\c[0] and talk to their \c[3]trader of metalworks\c[0] in the \c[3]Trader's Den\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.2.event.3: He will have a task for you to fulfill.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.3.event.q: \v[lore.title.seeker], welcome back!\. The necessary tools have already arrived and they work splendidly.
From now on, we will be able to trade higher quality metal directly in \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].
You have been a great help.\. Nomsworth really deserves a pat on the back for picking you.
And you of course will get also your reward.\. We should stay in contact for future deals.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-nor.entities.16.settings.npcStates.4.event.2: I am sorry \v[lore.title.seeker], but the market is hot.\. Please do not distract me.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.70.settings.npcStates.1.event.4: Thanks again fer helpin' me with them plants!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.70.settings.npcStates.1.event.5: It's been a pleasure takin' care o' them so far.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.70.settings.npcStates.1.event.6: Thanks to some modern techno doodads Ah can keep 'em on display like that.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.4.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.6.message: Welcome to mah cozy greenhouse y'all!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.8.message: Don't be shy now, darlin'. Here's where all yer hard workin' pays off.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.14.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.18.message: Y'all did all the hard work, really.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.19.message: Ah was able to preserve all o' them precious flora y'all kept hittin'.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.22.message: What Ah'm try'na say is: Thanks, Seeker.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.23.message: Y'all helped me fulfill mah dream and words can't say how much that means to me.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.25.message: Well, guess it's time ta give that strawhat one last upgrade, dont'cher think?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.30.name: Talatu Lips
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.33.message: Oh and take this too, will ya.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-tal.entities.71.settings.event.34.message: Y'all drop in whenever ya feel like!

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/inner-wea.entities.25.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: We offer high quality equipment made in Rookie Harbor!

Well hey there, if it ain't the master botanist herself!

Hey!\. It's nice here in the shade, isn't it?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.128.settings.dialog.0.text: Your friend's still not here. What's the holdup?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.128.settings.dialog.1.text: I dunno... he said he'd arrive around this time.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.128.settings.dialog.2.text: Maybe he's stuck in Rhombus Square, watching the city from afar... you know how it is...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.128.settings.dialog.3.text: Yeah... Can't wait to finally enter that place, too!
... Oh well... Ever notice how that tree has fruit?
I heard those are not instant matter but actual fruit!
Now I really wonder how they taste...
Oh well... it's not like you can eat real-life fruit as an avatar.
If you're waiting for somebody, this is the right spot.
Pretty much everyone here is waiting for new players arriving from Cross Central.
... You seem to be a new player, too. So you know what I mean, right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.133.settings.dialog.1.text: C'mon, relax. There is still time.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.133.settings.dialog.2.text: The raid is scheduled in 10 minutes.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.133.settings.dialog.3.text: Nothing is planned. It's going to be a mess...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.133.settings.dialog.4.text: Don't be so serious about it. It's supposed to be fun, remember?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.136.settings.dialog.0.text: All that water... makes you want to jump right into it!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.136.settings.dialog.1.text: Not sure I'd do that with your amount of armor.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.136.settings.dialog.2.text: Also, you'd just dissolve and respawn.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.148.settings.dialog.0.text: Mh... I swear there was an entrance here...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.20.message: Look at all these old style buildings!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.25.message: It's like we are in some kind of medieval fantasy world, non?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.26.message: So...\. Right now I'm waiting here to meet a friend.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.28.message: But I haven't seen him so far.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.30.message: There are just so many people here...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.44.message: I see you brought a friend?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.45.message: Ah oui, that's Lea!\. I met her during the tutorial.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.47.message: And this dark lord meanie here is \c[3]Lukas\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.51.message: So you finally reached the \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Having fun so far?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.54.message: The mainland.\. You'll get the idea once you see the map.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.55.message: Anyway, this is \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. It's known for the incoming shipments of rookies like you.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.56.message: It's also a fairly big place, which tends to be confusing for said rookies.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.57.message: So I thought I'd give you a small tour!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.174.settings.event.71.task: \c[3]Schneider\c[0] is kind enough to show you around Rookie Harbor. Just follow him together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
Ah I see, you now can open the golden chests.\. Congrats!
Yeah you can't open it yet.
But you will be able to do it later in the game.
You might want to add a \c[3]stamp\c[0] on your \c[3]map\c[0] to remember it.
In case you don't know what I mean, just have a closer look at the \c[3]map menu\c[0]!
Thanks! I don't know why, but lately random people just give me stuff for free.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.179.settings.event.11.message: If you really want to dig into all the details of CrossWorlds, this is your place.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.179.settings.event.12.message: Combat arts, skills, all the stats from A to Z, you name it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.179.settings.event.15.message: Frankly, it's a good thing to know about all that stuff.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.179.settings.event.17.message: It's just a place to go back to whenever you're confused about something.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.179.settings.event.26.message: I know!\. What's "Schneider" supposed to mean?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.184.settings.event.4.message: Oi, Lea!\. Why are you running away?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/south.jso.entities.184.settings.event.6.message: I promise, I'll make it short!
Okay... I guess that's the end of the line then.\. It's really a shame...

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/q.entities.32.settings.event.0.guiInfo.set:

Use \c[3]Charged Throw\c[0] to mark target!

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/q.entities.58.settings.event.10.text: \c[1]You let too many weapons pass by that will now reach the continent!\c[0]

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/s.entities.11.settings.npcStates.0.event.s: Hi... make it quick, I think I'm gonna close soon and head to the bar...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/s.entities.13.settings.event.4.message: Good day! Do you by chance have any Sandwiches for sale?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/s.entities.13.settings.event.5.message: Yepp, only 2500 Credits! Should I wrap it up for you?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/special/s.entities.13.settings.event.15.message: Why do they always run away? My wares are top-notch, right?

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.399.settings.event.3.elseStep.0: Come back here to get your reward!
I'm sure you can rock them railings too!
Try to reach them boxes back there, \c[3]without touching the ground\c[0]!
Just ollie up the box here and start \c[3]grinding those rails\c[0]!
Whadda ya say? Ready to style?
Chilidog!\. Show me what ya got!
If ya change your mind, just come visit me.
Try to reach them boxes back there, \c[3]without touching the ground\c[0]!
Just ollie up the box here and start \c[3]grinding those rails\c[0]!
Aww yeah, that was sick, girl!
May your mushrooms always be sauteed and your onions always be grilled. Gravy, girl!
You'll find a lot of awesome rails to grind all around this planet!
May your mushrooms always be sauteed and your onions always be grilled. Gravy, girl!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.6.message: Fantastique! Right at the sea, just like they said!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.14.message: Look, you can still see Rhombus Square over there.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.15.message: The futuristic city is cool, but it's nice to be at the sea for a change, non?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.22.message: ... Whoa! Would you look at the time.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.24.message: Have we been really playing for that long?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.26.message: ... So yes, I have to logout.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.28.message: Merde!\. And I was having so much fun.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.31.message: But hey! Before I leave, we really should share contacts, non?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.37.message: Next time, let's go out there and beat things up together!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.50.message: ...So it seems you already made a friend!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.52.message: I was worried that your speech malfunction would isolate you from other players.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.53.message: It is good to know there are players like Emilie that just overlook that.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.54.message: Though she did not seem to notice it in the first place, did she...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.56.message: ... Anyway, it has been a really long day, Lea.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.58.message: I suggest we log off, too.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.59.message: I sort of need a break as well, you see?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.419.settings.event.62.message: Do not worry... We will be back in the game soon enough.
Did you actually come all the way here to talk to me?
That's...\. nice.\. But I'd actually prefer to be alone right now...\. That's why I'm here.
Sorry, I'm not in the mood for small talk.
I just want to sit here alone.
You probably have a gift for me, right?
It always comes around this time of the year.
They're always very sweet presents, really.
This time just reminds me of another player who... \.\.\. is not playing anymore.
Sorry, I'm just unloading my baggage on you. Just leave the present here.
Thanks a lot for the present.\. That was really nice.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.21.message: And...\. you still remember everything from yesterday, right?\. Meeting Emilie and all that?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.25.message: Oh, by the way!\. It seems that Emilie is online as-
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.29.message: It's like a call. Just take it!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.36.message: This is a direct link!\. First time you've see it?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.39.message: Anyway, I just saw that you came online!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.40.message: I logged in a few minutes ago myself!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.41.message: I'm in the city just to the north.\. Come on, let's meet up!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.49.message: See? That was fast, was it not?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.424.settings.event.50.message: You should meet her.\. It is much more fun to explore CrossWorlds with others.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.425.settings.event.14.title: Landmarks and Teleportation
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.425.settings.event.14.content: How to use \c[3]Landmarks\c[0] for fast travel.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.425.settings.event.14.acceptSte: You can \c[3]teleport to Landmarks\c[0] by selecting them within the \c[3]Map menu\c[0]
You can also switch to the \c[3]World Map\c[0] view.
Here you can move to \c[3]other areas you visited before\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.425.settings.event.22.message: Fantastique! Right at the sea, just like they said!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.425.settings.event.24.message: The city should be right up ahead!\. Go, go!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.427.settings.event.5.text: Check your \c[3]accepted and solved quests\c[0] and read about the game's \c[3]lore\c[0]!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.14.name: Cedric
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.15.message: I see you've found something here.\. But what was up with that noise?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.17.message: What, there was an automated Turret in the crate and it just attacked you on its own?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.19.message: That's worse than we thought.\. And there might be even more of those around here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.20.message: But at least we have a suspect who is involved in this crime and should still be near.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.22.message: Keep an eye out for a \c[3]shady looking dockworker\c[0] checking on crates.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.430.settings.event.23.message: We might be able to properly solve this mess once we get him.
Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I have to keep watch on the harbor and protect our citizens, so please excuse me.
Hello, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I assume they sent you to help me investigate this smuggling case?
Excellent.\. I want you to examine the crates on the eastern part of the harbor.
The data signature of the suspicious goods has already been sent to you, so you should be able to sense it.
I'll be here investigating our leads to potential culprits.\. Come back when you've found something.
The crate should be somewhere around here so you better find it!
You go find that suspicious dockworker!\. I'll make sure he doesn't leave for the city.
Well met, \v[lore.title.seeker]. There has been no further trouble at the docks so far but we should stay vigilant.
Huh... what?\. Can't you tell I'm working?
You wanna know what I'm doing?\. Keeping this harbor running without proper payment, as usual.
But hey, if the high and mighty Seeker wants to inspect our shipments that badly... just give me a second.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.447.settings.event.10.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.447.settings.event.12.message: Can't let a humble worker earn his cash in peace, huh?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.447.settings.event.20.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.447.settings.event.22.message: But trying to annoy me on my home-turf was a bad move, lady.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.447.settings.event.23.message: Now stay here and stop bothering me, will you?\. I'll even leave you some company.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.455.settings.event.3.message: Don't think that's all I got!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.9.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.13.message: Still not satisfied after all those shipment inspections?\. You sure are persistent.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.15.message: Well, I guess it is time to bury the hatchet and get one of those lawyers, eh?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.38.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.39.message: Or maybe I'll just get rid of you and walk away.\. How does that sound?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.456.settings.event.41.message: Say all you want, there is no turning back now.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.10.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.12.message: Hrm, after all that trouble, those buckets of junk can't even get rid of some \v[lore.title.seeker]s.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.14.message: Really makes you question the point of it all...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.18.message: Hey, I'll be nice. No need to get violent with me.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.19.message: But, I guess I do have to face my problems the responsible way now...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.39.name: Sober Frank
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.40.name: Cedric
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.43.message: I've had just about enough of illegal turrets and smokebombs being thrown around here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.45.message: Don't let falling for his little trick bother you, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Seems to happen all the time lately.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.46.message: You did good work flushing him out and disposing of those toys of his.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.48.message: You sure like to get rough as long as it's just us lowly workers, don't you?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.49.message: Keep your mouth shut.\. We can have a nice long talk back at the station.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.52.message: And you better go there too and report to Sgt. Brassler.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.53.message: He'll be pleased with what you've done here, even if he doesn't show it.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.56.message: Alright, off you go.\. Don't make me tie you up and carry you all the way.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.467.settings.event.57.message: Okay, okay.\. At least leave a hard-working citizen some dignity.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.472.settings.event.4.thenStep.1: Sacrebleu! Why would they add a door there?!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.472.settings.event.4.elseStep.0: This door honestly just went where it was supposed to. Very consistent.
What was that? Did they honestly design it that way?
Yarrr, the sea sounds restless.\. A storm is afoot.
Arr, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You the one they sent to board our proud battleship here?
Hope a landlubber like you can hold yer own without steady land under yer feet.\. The sea is a fickle lady, I tell ye.
Alright, alright.\. Just wanted to get you in the mood.\. Think like a smuggler to catch one, eh?
Got a lot of those criminals these days, sending weapons directly over the sea.
Only way to catch them is by intercepting them directly on the sea.\. This is where you come in, \v[lore.title.seeker].
You will patrol the suspected smuggling routes with our state of the art combat platform here.
It's equipped with a \c[3]Naval Protection Cannon\c[0], or \c[3]NPC\c[0] for short, that's linked with your fancy Trackwalker systems.
So you'll be able to easily mark targets with your \c[3]charged projectiles\c[0] and the cannon will do the rest.
Everything's been set up already, so just talk to me again if you wanna start your patrol.
Captain Turbine
Are you ready to go?
[nods]
Good.\. The route is already programmed into the ship.\. Just get aboard.
Captain Turbine
Make sure to destroy as many weapons as you can.
If \c[3]too many get through\c[0] this operation will be considered \c[3]failed\c[0].
Well, I'm sure you could've guessed that already.
Off you go.\. Good hunting!
[nods]
Bye!
[shakes head]
Don't take too much time.\. More shipments are arriving every day!
How?
Well, you will patrol the smuggling route and make sure those weapons don't reach the continent.
Captain Turbine
To help you, we prepared this masterpiece of naval warfare that is able to fire devastating projectiles.
To use it, just \c[3]mark\c[0] an enemy with a \c[3]charged projectile\c[0] when the turret is \c[3]ready\c[0].
Aside from doing \c[3]high damage\c[0] those will also \c[3]stun\c[0] and \c[3]disrupt shields\c[0].
Also, depending on the \c[3]element\c[0] you used to mark the enemy, the type of shot will differ.
\c[3]Neutral\c[0] shots are your standard single-target projectile.\. \c[3]No special attributes\c[0] but \c[3]fast reloading\c[0].
\c[3]Heat\c[0] shots cause an \c[3]explosion\c[0] on hit, damaging \c[3]nearby targets\c[0] as well.
Lastly, \c[3]Cold\c[0] shots are \c[3]single-target\c[0] as well, but they are \c[3]more powerful\c[0] and also \c[3]slow down\c[0] whatever they hit.
\c[3]Other Elements\c[0] are still \c[3]not implemented\c[0], so they will just trigger the \c[3]Neutral projectiles\c[0].
The turret is also pretty sturdy.\. Though, you should still be careful of \c[3]explosives\c[0] and \c[3]disruption shots\c[0].
Those will do \c[3]great damage\c[0] to your ship and also \c[3]stun\c[0] it shortly.\. You won't want it exploding in the ocean, right?
Captain Turbine
Anyway, are you ready to go now?
Yes, start the patrol
No
Detailed Instructions
Report back to Sergeant Brassler.\. The logs have already been sent.
Well met, \v[lore.title.seeker]. There has been no further trouble at the docks so far but we should stay vigilant.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.13.name: Captain Turbine
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.14.message: Welcome back, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Seems like you wrecked that shipment nicely!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.16.message: It was also a good testrun for our NPC here.\. I think it will be very useful defending against future attacks.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.17.message: In any case you did well, but I'm sure you wanna be back on land again.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.27.name: Captain Turbine
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.28.message: Report back to Sgt. Brassler now, to get your due reward.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/teleporte.entities.480.settings.event.29.message: I will send him those impressive combat logs immediately.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/test.json.entities.48.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: A painting is a memory that never fades.

assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.0.text: Man, there are markets literally everywhere in this town.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.1.text: I know, right? The city plaza is filled with market stands!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.2.text: And there is another market in the northern part, too.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.3.text: You can find a lot of rare stuff there, I heard.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.4.text: Nobody told me that CrossWorlds is essentially a part-time shopping spree...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.6.text: ... Now I really feel like bashing some hedgehags.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.311.settings.dialog.7.text: ... for a change of pace, you know?
I'm afraid this resting spot is for one person only.
Go look for another crate. This one is mine.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.345.settings.dialog.1.text: Good question, I'd like to leave ASAP. I have some errands to run later.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.345.settings.dialog.2.text: He's probably chilling at that chest in the center again.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.345.settings.dialog.3.text: Bugging people about how they should "claim their prize".
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.346.settings.dialog.1.text: Really? I just arrived! Let's rest for a while.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.346.settings.dialog.2.text: Man, you were just chillin' at the chest right?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.346.settings.dialog.5.text: Hey! I was \c[5]helping this girl\c[0], you gotta believe me!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.346.settings.dialog.5.event.0.t: Oh hey! Thanks again for helping me out with my friends!
I'll take that silent smile as a \c[3]No Problem\c[0], I guess.
Oh, it's you... Thanks for lying to my friends...
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.346.settings.dialog.5.event.0.e: Oh! You're that girl I helped with the chest in the marketplace!
See Hina, told you I was helping someone!
Alright alright, you win... \. \. this time.
I knew it. You're were slacking off again.
Aw, come on. Why would you do that? I wasn't slacking off, promise!
I'm expecting a delivery, so if you have something for me just leave it here.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.14.message: Finally, this is the \c[3]west\c[0] part of the town.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.15.message: In this shop here you can buy \c[3]consumable items\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.19.message: Further down you'll find an armory with basic \c[3]equipment\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.23.message: And when you continue to the west from here you'll enter \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.24.message: You'll find a lot of enemies along the way.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.25.message: Be careful not to take on too many \c[3]Hedgehags\c[0] at once, or those guys will eat you for breakfast!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.26.message: Anyway, just follow that way to get to \c[3]Bergen\c[0].
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.33.message: By the way, do you two want to form a party?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.34.message: Oui, that would be great, right Lea?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.36.message: And you, Lukas?\. Will you travel with us, too?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.37.message: Hm...\. I unfortunately have to leave you soon.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.39.message: Trust me, it's not that fun to travel around with a high-level friend.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.40.message: Unless you don't care for the challenge.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.41.message: You could watch us take on those Hedgehags!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.42.message: Japp.\. That totally sounds like a lot of fun, doesn't it?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.43.message: No really, I have to head back to the guild.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.44.message: There is just too much stuff going on right now.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.45.message: The crap will be steaming if I'm gone for too long.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.46.message: I see, Monsieur is just too important for us rookies.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.47.message: Oh, please don't be that way.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.48.message: You can set up a \v[lore.unlock.direct-link.p1]\c[3]Direct Link\c[0] if something comes up, alright?
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.49.message: Let's meet again once you reach Bergen Village.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.55.message: Come on, Lea.\. Let's do some leveling until we're worth the Dark Lord's attention!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.62.message: See you soon, Emilie!\. And you too, Lea!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.81.message: So...\. where is the option...\. Ah, oui!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.91.message: Voilà! We just formed a party!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.93.message: Or maybe look for quests in town?\. I'll let you decide, Lea!
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.97.title: Party Members
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.97.content: Learn about the party members, the Social menu and party strategy.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.97.acceptSte: The status of your party members is displayed below your own.
You can change the behavior of your party members via the \c[3]Party Strategy\c[0] menu.
Here you can see detailed stats of all your party members.
assets/data/maps/rookie-harbor/west.json.entities.378.settings.event.99.task: Start your journey to \c[3]Bergen\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
Howdy, partner!\. You sure look like a healthy gal who can appreciate a nice piece of meat.
Haha, I always sniff out good taste.\. It's, like, my special talent.
The name is Selena Teak and I have grand plans:\. To create the perfect steaks for everyone to enjoy!
At least that's what I want to do, but I still don't have the proper ingredients for that.
And since I can't just leave the city and search for them... Maybe you can help me with that?
Girl, you are the best!\. It will be amazing, you won't regret it!
Anyway, I definitely need some nice \c[3]Raw Meat\c[0] of course.\. The \c[3]Bovines\c[0] in \v[area.autumn-area.name] should do nicely!
Though I heard that you gotta have, like, \c[3]a good Rank\c[0] to get some meat from them.\. Whatever that means.
Then I need some firewood that brings out the taste perfectly.
I don't know much about all the trees here but... best bring me some \c[3]very light\c[0] and also \c[3]some sharp\c[0] wood.
You should find both of them \c[3]on a mountain\c[0] somewhere. Good luck!
Whaaaat, not interested?\. That's such a shame... just think of all the steaaaak!
Bring me some nice \c[3]Raw Meat\c[0], \c[3]very light\c[0] wood and \c[3]some sharp\c[0] wood.
You can get the meat from \c[3]Bovines\c[0] with \c[3]a good Rank\c[0] and you can find the wood \c[3]somewhere on a mountain.\c[0]
Amazing.\. That's, like, everything I asked for.
Just stay right here, okay?\. I have to try out my recipe immediately.
That's... mhm... not what I wanted...
The heat-balance was way off and the wood's fragrance didn't give the meat the taste I wanted...
I'm sorry girl, but I can't use this.\. Not for the steak of my dreams.
You will still get your reward, don't worry.\.  Just... for the steaks we will have to try something else next time.
Don't worry, I will, like, think of something.\. Talk to me later if you wanna help me again.
Howdy girl, good to see you again.\. I think I figured out a better wood combination for grilling the steak.
Yeah, I'm pretty sure about it this time!\. Let's give this another try, shall we?
Alright!\. It won't disappoint again, believe me!
This time I wanna go with a mix of \c[3]very dense and regal wood from a mountain\c[0] and \c[3]wood that is extremely dry\c[0]!
I guess you'd find the latter in, like, dry areas?\. Would make sense, right?
Well, and of course I will need more raw meat again!\. You got everything?
Great!\. So good luck finding everything.\. Think of the steaks!
Awww, no trust left because of that one failure?\. Come on girl, I think we are onto something here!
Remember, aside from the meat I need different wood that for the first try!
\c[3]Very dense and regal wood from a mountain\c[0] and \c[3]dry wood from, like, a desert \c[0] should do the trick!
Yay~, you are back again.\. And do I smell some nice meat and wood there?
Yes, that looks awesome!\. Let me have another try right now!

...absolutely perfect!!\.\.
The texture, the aroma!\. It is the perfect steak!
Thank you so much, girl!\. It never would've worked without those ingredients you brought me!
Here, I'll give you the first batch of steaks to enjoy.
You can get as many as you want from my booth here, as long as you bring the ingredients!
Howdy!\. Don't you love the smell of steak in the morning?
Ms. Teak
Howdy, gal!\. Did you come by to check how business is going?
[nods]
Aw, how nice of ya.\. It's going great!\. Those steaks really hit the bullseye of people's tastebuds here.
But I talked a lot to some valued customers and got some ideas to improve my precious meat even more.
How about it, gal?\. You feeling it in you to help me out again?
[nods]
Yeehaw, I knew I could count on you, my dear!
Just like last time, it's all about the ingredients.\. I've done some research on the precious plants of the East!
Once again, I'd like to try some new wood in combination with what we already got.
So please bring me some \c[3]old wood\c[0] from the \c[3]jungle in the east\c[0].
I also want to experiment a bit with marinating the meat before grilling.
For that I would love to get my hands on some \c[3]honey\c[0] and a bunch of \c[3]sweet apples\c[0]!
You should find all of that in \v[area.autumn-fall.name] in the east or that jungle I mentioned!
As for the meat, I still got a lot of that here to experiment.\. Is everything else clear?
[nods]
Alright!\. Then give it your all.
Bye!
[shakes head]
Awwwww, really?\. You're already satisfied with what we got?\. Think of the possibilities!
Get me some \c[3]old wood\c[0] from the \c[3]jungle in the east\c[0] and some ingredients for the marinade.
Some \c[3]honey\c[0] and a bunch of \c[3]sweet apples\c[0] from the East should do nicely!
Gal, you're back!\. And what is that?\. Do I see some of the most perfect ingredients that have ever been found?
Yes, yes!\. Exactly what I wanted, perfect!\. Just you wait, I will put it to good use immediately!
By the Ancients!\. This... this might be the best piece of meat that has ever grazed this planet.
Truly gal, I'm serious.\. You gotta taste some of this.\. This is perfect.
Here, take a few to enjoy.\. But make sure to brace yourself when eating!
I will make sure to stock up my booth right now.\. There'll be as many as you can eat!
Thank you again for all the hard work.\. I hope to "meat" you again, many times in the future.

assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.5.message: Ugh... those \c[3]large Wave balls\c[0]...\. how do they even work?\. They make my brain hurt.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.6.message: Yeah, they are strange but they do make sense if you watch them closely.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.7.message: Wait, don't tell me any more. I'll figure it out myself.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.8.message: By the way, did you already meet the... I think third enemy type?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.12.message: Why can't I just punch them?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.13.message: They're ghosts. You can't simply punch ghosts.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.14.message: Well, that is until we finally get the element of this temple, I suppose.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f1/room3.json.entities.112.settings.event.16.message: I can't wait for that moment!

assets/data/maps/shock-dng/f2/room-eleme.entities.76.settings.event.58.text: Press \i[wave] to switch to \c[3]wave mode\c[0] at any time!

assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room1.json.entities.58.settings.event.6.message: You don't have to wish me luck. Just run slow and I'll be happy.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room1.json.entities.58.settings.event.7.message: I won't give you that luxury.

assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.6.message: Is this temple the \c[3]Wave\c[0] or \c[3]Shock\c[0] dungeon?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.9.message: I mean there is electricity all over the place.\. Enemies shoot lightning bolts and all that.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.10.message: I think it's \c[3]Wave\c[0] because you use the Wave element, non?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.11.message: Those weird balls phasing through the walls are Wave, right?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.14.message: But you always get the element opposite to the dungeon's theme.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.15.message: Like getting Heat in the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0] which is all cold and frozen.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.16.message: I wouldn't call the \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0] the Cold dungeon because you get Cold.
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.17.message: What?\. I thought Faj'ro was the Cold dungeon!
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.18.message: That place is literally filled with ovens and heated coals!
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.19.message: How can you call it the Cold temple?
assets/data/maps/shock-dng/g/room2to3.js.entities.29.settings.event.20.message: I get the Cold element and punch stuff to make it cold in the Cold dungeon.

assets/data/maps/templates/parkour.json.entities.0.settings.text:
A rock formation!
You're filled with \c[3]Determination\c[0]

You don't really seem happy to see me.
Huh, nice view from here, don't you think?
Follow her! She is probably just shy!
Do you have fun running in circles?
... Do you mind if I... join you?
...Hey, you really start hurting my feelings here!
She probably just likes to stand on containers! Follow her!
Is there something wrong with me?
Why do you avoid me like that?
She tries to escape! Quick! Follow her!
assets/data/maps/test.json.entities.27.settings.npcStates.0.event.2: The path of a proper Spheromancer!
assets/data/maps/test.json.entities.28.settings.event.10.text: This is so mysterious, you guys!

assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f2/room-01.jso.entities.5.settings.event.14.text: One has proven the mastery of Shock and Wave.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f2/room-01.jso.entities.5.settings.event.15.text: Yet this was not one's final challenge.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f2/room-01.jso.entities.5.settings.event.16.text: I will meet this one again!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f2/room-01.jso.entities.39.settings.event.20.text: Now it is time for one to take another challenge...
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f2/room-01.jso.entities.39.settings.event.28.text: \s[2]... for one to fight another master of Shock and Wave!

assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.12.thenStep.7: It looks like the Spheromancers are leading the race as of now!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.12.thenStep.8: Let's continue before that Pentafist catches up-
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.12.thenStep.2: Indeed! We Spheromancers are at the very front as expected!
Oui, oui, just keep your smug face while it lasts.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.12.elseStep.9: I just got here myself. Grasshead has been waiting.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.12.elseStep.1: Still I'm saddened to see a Spheromancer overtaken by a mere Pentafist.
Well, the race isn't over yet.
Who knows, maybe this Pentafist Scrub will end up overtaking you as well!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.13.message: Anyway, we all just crossed blades with the Son of the East.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.14.message: Still think it's just a funny ape, Pentafist?
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.15.message: That battle was quite intense, non?
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.15.settings.event.16.message: Apes are still funny though! That will never change!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.25.settings.dialog.1.text: You can barely see anything through the leaves...
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.25.settings.dialog.2.text: Come on, let's continue with the temple.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.26.settings.npcStates.0.event.6: Like green clouds, up in the sky.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.33.settings.dialog.0.text: There are...\. too many of them...\. and too little space...
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.33.settings.dialog.1.text: Don't give up, pal! I know you can do it!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.33.settings.dialog.2.text: And once I thought they were cute...
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.34.settings.dialog.0.text: I knew it! Once I saw this giant tree, I knew this was gonna happen!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.34.settings.dialog.1.text: Of course they'd make us climb it up and walk on those narrow branches!!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f3/branch-midd.entities.34.settings.dialog.2.text: Those stupid game designers with their stupid heights!!

assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f4/boss.json.entities.16.settings.event.16.text: One has reached the very top of Grand Krys'kajo.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f4/boss.json.entities.16.settings.event.17.text: Standing high above the earth, one is now ready.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/f4/boss.json.entities.24.settings.event.13.text: One has fully ascended Krys'kajo and shown true mastery of Shock and Wave.

assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.12.text: Another strange visitor has arrived at the roots.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.13.text: One trying to reach the top of Krys'kajo as well?
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.14.text: One needs to prove the mastery of \c[3]Shock\c[0] and \c[3]Wave\c[0] for one to ascend.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.15.text: I shall watch this one closely.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.29.message: Ape Guy!! Did you meet the ape guy?
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.32.message: Also what is this? Wasn't this supposed to be a race?
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.35.message: Why not? It doesn't hurt to have a few breaks in between.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.37.message: Oui, but I had to talk about the ape!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.40.message: This ape oversees every Seeker that enters this place.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.41.message: It's a mysterious yet honorable creature of ancient origin.
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.42.message: So? I still think it's funny!
assets/data/maps/tree-dng/g/center-02-co.entities.77.settings.event.44.message: Fine then. Let's properly start the race already.

assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.7.message: Isn't this dungeon an amazing place?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.8.message: It is! Quite amazing to see the bottom of the lake like this.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.9.message: I actually have to stop myself from staring at it for too long.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.10.message: We're in a race after all.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.14.message: We're below a \c[3]lake\c[0]! And there's water everywhere!
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.15.message: Aren't you supposed to complain about \c[3]water pressure\c[0] or something?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.17.message: Well... you see... It's fine here.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.18.message: This is not a natural cave after all.\. It's a temple constructed by the Ancients.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.19.message: I'm sure they have the technology to create a separate circulation of water below a lake.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.20.message: So my suspension of disbelief isn't really compromised.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.491.settings.event.24.message: Wait, are you running ahead while we have these conversations?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.5.message: Bonjour everyone! How is it going?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.8.message: I'm enjoying this entirely bug-free dungeon!
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.9.message: Well...\. it is underwater-themed. Bugs really wouldn't fit in here.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.10.message: That's right! Only lots of fish. Fish is ok.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.12.message: They're not too bad either. Pretty fun to punch into them!
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.14.message: So...\. all those enemies are \c[3]Wave-themed\c[0], right?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.15.message: Does that mean Wave is the element of \c[3]fish and blob\c[0]?
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.16.message: I suppose it's related to water, but in an abstract way.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.17.message: You got "waves" in water, but a lot of other things as well...
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.18.message: I for one am just glad it doesn't include bugs for once.
assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-04-l.entities.492.settings.event.20.message: Yes, yes. We get it, Lea.

assets/data/maps/wave-dng/b1/center-05-e.entities.114.settings.event.58.text: Press \i[shock] to switch to \c[3]shock mode\c[0] at any time!

assets/data/maps/wave-dng/g/room-entranc.entities.183.settings.event.3.message: I think she means to say she'll wait for us at the end of the race...
