assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.name: Flame Jab
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.descripti: A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.name: Calamity Trigger
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.descripti: Draw in enemies with blazing fire balls and finish them with a massive fire whirl.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.name: Blazing Dragon
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.descripti: Lock in enemies with 2 powerful strikes followed by a flaming air combo.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.name: Ragnarök
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.descripti: The end is here. Draw in Enemies, engulf them in an upwards fire whirl and end with blazing ground explosion.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_B.name: Vermillion Echo
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_B.descripti: Summon the spirit of the dragon and lock enemies in a fierce combo that ends with a fire tornado.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.name: Burn!
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: A controllable blazing burst of fire that deals damage over a small area.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.name: Flare Burn!
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Jump into the air and fire a destructive laser along the direction you are facing.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.name: Crimson Strike
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.description: Dash through your enemies while leaving a trail of fire.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.name: Ashen Mine
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.description: Place a mine that explodes when enemies are nearby.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.name: Crimson Stream
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.description: Surround yourself with fire and dash a long way, leaving hot damaging magma on the ground.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.name: Mine Valley
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.description: Dash and place multiple mines which can seek enemies when not touched.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.name: Scarlet Rain
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.description: Mark enemies by dashing through them which will be bombarded by a blazing meteor shower.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.name: Recoil Trumpet
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack and counter with a flaming explosion.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.name: Ring of Fire
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Creates a ring of fire around you, dealing damage to enemies walking into it.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.name: Kindling Fanfare
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack, jump into the air and counter with a fiery laser beam.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.name: Burning Pulse
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Create a long lasting fire circle that erupts in flaming outbursts several times.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.name: Ignite Embers
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack, lock enemies in an upwards combo and finish with a hellish downwards laser.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL3_B.name: Ancient Sun
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.HEAT.GUARD_SPECIAL3_B.descriptio: Conjure forth the power of the Sun and immolate yourself in fire making melee attacks burst out in flame for short while.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.name: Frozen Star
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.descripti: Long startup time for massive damage.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.name: Ice Twirl
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.descripti: Performs a stationary ice whirl attack with wide range and strong knockback.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.name: Blizzard Hawk
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.descripti: Take a stand and do massive damage with 3 frozen stars.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.name: Ice Tornado
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.descripti: Extend the Ice Twirl by sucking in enemies with multiple hits and then ejecting them.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.name: Eternal Winter
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.descripti: Take a stand and conjure a massive frozen ice spear from the ground the impales enemies.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_B.name: Polar Pirouette
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_B.descripti: Begin a dance of multiple huge ice whirl attacks and lock enemies in and end it all with a massive pirouette that blast enemies away.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.name: Hail Flurry
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Quickly shoots a mass of icy spikes.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.name: Snow Flawke
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Hit enemies with a big snow explosion, caging them within icicles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.name: Hail Storm
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Shoot an icicle that bounces of walls 2 times, creating homing mini icicles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.name: Frigid Flawke
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Shoot a large snow ball, leaving an icicle trail and caging enemies with multiple icicles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.name: Gatling Arctillery
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Summon an Ice Turret with spikes around you and blast your enemies away with a volley of icicles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.name: Indigo Strike
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.description: Dash with high speed, leaving a trail of icicles behind you, damaging enemies on contact.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.name: Indigo Rush
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.description: Dash a long distance, leaving icicles which create multiple additional icicle trails.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.name: Frozen Stance
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack and counter with a cold strike, slowing down your enemy.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.name: Brisk Barrier
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Blast enemies away and spawn several icicles in front of you, blocking projectiles and damaging enemies on contact.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.name: Freeze Frame
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack and completely freeze the enemy, leaving it open for more attacks.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.name: Icy Bastion
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Spawn multiple icicles around you an create a protective but slowing shield that hurt enemies on contact.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.name: Crystal Keeper
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Perfect guard an attack, initiate a quick combo and completely freeze all enemies in front of you.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL3_B.name: Fimbulvetr
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.COLD.GUARD_SPECIAL3_B.descriptio: Winter is here. Summon multiple huge icicles around you and create a protective but slow barrier that hurts enemies.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.name: Tesla Twist
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.descript: Attack with a series of multiple fast spin attacks within a small radius.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.name: Plasma Spike
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_B.descript: Hit a single enemy into the air following up with a lightning strike.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.name: Tesla Waltz
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.descript: Perform a volley of controllable spin attacks while drawing in enemies and finish off with a powerful whirl.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.name: Battery Assault
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_B.descript: Lock a single enemy into a fast ground combo followed by multiple hit in the air and a strong lightning finisher.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.name: Song of Storms
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.ATTACK_SPECIAL3_A.descript: Lock a single enemy into a hyper speed combo that creates a doppelganger and finishes with a faster-than-light attack chain.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.name: Diving Spark
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.descripti: Throw a projectile that creates a delayed lightning bolt damaging everything around it.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.name: Homing Wisp
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.descripti: Shoot an array of small homing projectiles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.name: Chain Blitz
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.descripti: Fire a projectile that creates a chain along up to 4 enemies which will get hit by a lightning bolt.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.name: Radiant Swarm
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.descripti: Throw a shock ball that will bounce off an enemy and create a sphere that emits multiple homing projectiles.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.name: Mjölnir
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.descripti: It's hammer time. Throw a ball that chains multiple enemies together and evaporates them with a massive lightning bolt.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL3_B.name: Celestial Legion
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.THROW_SPECIAL3_B.descripti: Call upon the help of the gods and summon 3 spheres that spam an enemy with bullets and finish it off with a lightning explosion.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.name: Amber Strike
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Perform a fast dash that attacks one enemy multiple times on contact.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.name: Thunder Dart
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Dash through enemies leaving a shocking trail of lightning.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.name: Amber Breaker
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Dash through a single enemy multiple times at the speed of light and finish with a strong punch.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.name: Storm Walker
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Lightning returns with a controllable chain attack of 3 dashes which hit all enemies on the path.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.name: Flickering Stars
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Stop time and pummel an enemy with an uncontrollable series of attacks, finishing off with a diving spark and balls.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL3_B.name: Lightning Prophecy
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.DASH_SPECIAL3_B.descriptio: Create an start and end point and dash between it multiple times automatically attacking everything in between.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.name: Clock Block
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.descripti: Block one attack and slow down time for everything but yourself.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.name: Glitch Time
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.SHOCK.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.descripti: Block one attack and stop time for everything but yourself.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.name: Ki Thrust
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.ATTACK_SPECIAL1_A.descripti: Frontal attack with high damage, sending all hit enemies flying.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.name: Spirit Blast
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.ATTACK_SPECIAL2_A.descripti: Draws enemies to the front of the player and then blasts them away with a powerful attack.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.name: Fae Round
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Shoots a super fast projectile penetrating a line of enemies.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.name: Essence Drain
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Hit enemies with a swarm of projectiles absorbing its HP.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.name: Elven Orb
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Shoots a super fast projectile that bounces between the player and a wall for several times and penetrates everything in between.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.name: Vital Pulse
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Hit an enemy with a swarm of projectiles, absorbing its HP before blasting it away with a final attack.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.name: Ether Snipe
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Charge up a sniping attack that can bounce 3 times until it hits an enemy. Each bounce increases the strength of the attack.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL3_B.name: Wave Motion Beam
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.THROW_SPECIAL3_B.descriptio: Siphon HP from the enemies and trade it for a huge controllable wave beam that drains your HP.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.name: Guarding Gale
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL1_A.descriptio: Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies for several seconds.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.name: Pain Grip
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL1_B.descriptio: Block one attack and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.name: Poltergeist
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL2_A.descriptio: Spawns aura that pushes away nearby enemies and throws projectiles for several seconds.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.name: Circle of Valor
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL2_B.descriptio: Block all attacks for a few seconds and regenerate part of the blocked damage.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.name: Karma Scale
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.GUARD_SPECIAL3_A.descriptio: Enter critical mode but become invincible. Absorb any enemy attacks for a short time. The more absorbed, the larger the ending explosion and the more HP healed.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.name: Verdant Strike
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL1_A.description: Dash with high speed, damaging and stunning enemies along the way.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.name: Warp Decoy
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL1_B.description: Dash away and leave behind a decoy, distracting your foes.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.name: Verdant Stream
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL2_A.description: Dash through enemies at high speed and draw them into your trail behind you before causing a powerful explosion.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.name: Toxic Revenant
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL2_B.description: Dash away and leave behind a deadly decoy that distracts and damages your foes.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.name: Vortex Tide
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL3_A.description: Charge up by creating a Vortex behind you and blast off leaving behind a huge wave explosion.
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL3_B.name: Gungnir
assets/data/players/lea.json.actions.WAVE.DASH_SPECIAL3_B.description: Dash through and create 4 decoys that pummel an enemy multiple times ending with a combined wave attack.
